"Martha Washington Cookies","1 cup pecan halves",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat egg whites and salt until foamy; gradually add brown sugar and vanilla."
"Step 3","Continue beating until stiff peaks are formed. Fold in pecan halves."
"Step 4","Drop by teaspoon onto greased cookie sheet. Bake for 1 hour."
"Stir and Drop Sugar Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Stir and Drop Sugar Cookies I",".67 cup corn oil",
"Stir and Drop Sugar Cookies I","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Stir and Drop Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon grated lemon zest",
"Stir and Drop Sugar Cookies I",".75 cup white sugar",
"Stir and Drop Sugar Cookies I","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Stir and Drop Sugar Cookies I","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Stir and Drop Sugar Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Stir oil into beaten eggs. Add lemon rind and vanilla. Blend in sugar until mixture thickens."
"Step 3","Sift flour, baking powder and salt; stir into wet mixture."
"Step 4","Drop by teaspoons about 2 inches apart on UNGREASED cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Dip the bottom of a glass in oil then in sugar. Flatten each cookie by gently pressing with bottom of glass. Dip in sugar before stamping each cookie."
"Step 6","Bake in preheated oven until the edges are golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove immediately from cookie sheet and cool on a wire rack."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 cup butter or margarine",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the sugar, brown sugar, and eggs until creamy. Melt the butter or margarine in a saucepan over low heat and mix into the sugar along with the vanilla. Combine the flour and baking soda; stir into the batter until it becomes dough. Mix in chocolate chips. Drop by teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven for 5 to 7 minutes, until browned at the edges."
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies","6 tablespoons butter, softened",
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies","1 large egg",
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies","2 tablespoons corn syrup",
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies",".33 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies",".25 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 baking sheets."
"Step 2","Using an electric mixer, beat 6 tablespoons butter and 1/4 cup sugar in a large bowl until creamy. Add the egg; beat until smooth. Beat in corn syrup. Whisk together the flour and cocoa in a small bowl. Beat half of the flour mixture into the butter mixture until well incorporated. Beat in the remaining flour. Divide dough in half."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured board, roll each half of the dough into a rectangle. Cut each large rectangle into 1x3 inch rectangles. Place cookies on prepared baking sheets, 2 inches apart. Bake until firm, 10 to 15 minutes. Let cookies stand on baking sheets for 5 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely."
"Step 4","While the cookies are baking, make the filling. Heat chocolate chips in a small saucepan on lowest heat. Stir until chocolate is almost completely melted. Remove from heat; stir until smooth. Allow to cool to room temperature. Beat 1 cup confectioners' sugar and 1/2 cup butter in a large bowl until smooth. Scrape the melted chocolate into the bowl; beat well."
"Step 5","Spread 1/2 teaspoon filling on the bottom of 30 cooled cookies; top with remaining cookies. Sprinkle filled cookies with confectioners' sugar."
"Forgotten Cookies I","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Forgotten Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Forgotten Cookies I","1 pinch salt",
"Forgotten Cookies I","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Forgotten Cookies I",".25 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (170 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat egg whites with the salt until foamy. Slowly add sugar, one tablespoonful at a time, beating after each addition until the meringue stands in stiff peaks."
"Step 3","Stir in vanilla and fold in chocolate chips. Drop by teaspoonfuls on a lined baking sheet and place in preheated oven."
"Step 4","After 2 minutes, turn off oven. Leave meringues in oven overnight. Remove from pan and store in cookie tin lined with paper towel."
"Paleo Cashew Butter Cookies",".5 cup cashew butter",
"Paleo Cashew Butter Cookies",".25 cup dried cranberries",
"Paleo Cashew Butter Cookies",".25 cup chopped almonds",
"Paleo Cashew Butter Cookies","1 tablespoon coconut oil",
"Paleo Cashew Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Paleo Cashew Butter Cookies","2 tablespoons pitted, chopped dates",
"Paleo Cashew Butter Cookies","1 tablespoon honey",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix together cashew butter, dried cranberries, almonds, coconut oil, egg, dates, and honey in a bowl until thoroughly incorporated. Place spoonfuls of mixture onto a nonstick baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until cookies smell toasted, about 12 minutes. Allow to cool and harden."
"Cinnamon Nutella® No-Bake Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Cinnamon Nutella® No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Cinnamon Nutella® No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Cinnamon Nutella® No-Bake Cookies","1 (10 ounce) package cinnamon chips",
"Cinnamon Nutella® No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)",
"Cinnamon Nutella® No-Bake Cookies","3 cups old-fashioned rolled oats",
"Step 1","Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine sugar, butter, and milk in a saucepan; bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat and stir in cinnamon chips and chocolate-hazelnut spread until melted. Fold oats into mixture."
"Step 3","Drop mixture by walnut-size spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies","1 cup sugar",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies","10 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies","1 egg",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies",".25 teaspoon almond extract",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies",".33 cup sour cream",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies","1 .5 cups fresh blueberries",
"Blueberry Cheesecake Cookies","4 ounces cream cheese, cut into 1/4-inch pieces and frozen",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a medium bowl. Set aside."
"Step 3","Beat sugar and butter in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes. Mix in egg, vanilla extract, and almond extract until well combined. Add in 1/3 of the flour mixture and stir until just combined. Stir in 1/2 of the sour cream. Continue alternating additions of the flour mixture and sour cream, beginning and ending with the flour mixture, stirring until just combined. Do not overmix. Gently fold in blueberries and frozen pieces of cream cheese."
"Step 4","Drop 1 1/2 tablespoon-sized balls of dough onto the prepared baking sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until the bottom of the cookies just begins to brown, 15 to 18 minutes. Cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup vegetable shortening",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Southern Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper or a silicone liner. Whisk together the flour, cinnamon, ginger, cloves, baking soda, and salt in a bowl until thoroughly combined."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mash vegetable shortening and sugar together until smooth and creamy; mix in the egg and molasses. Stir the flour mixture into the molasses mixture to make a smooth dough, and mix in the chocolate chips. Drop by scant tablespoon or small dough scoop about 2 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until slightly golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Allow to cool on sheets 1 to 2 minutes before removing to finish cooling on wire racks."
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","2 cups chopped dried figs",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","1 large orange",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","2 cups toasted walnuts, chopped",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","1 cup honey",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies",".5 cup dark rum",
"Sicilian Fig Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","To make Pastry: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in a large mixing bowl. Add the butter, eggs, vanilla and milk. Stir into a smooth dough. Remove dough from bowl and shape into a circle. Cut into 4 equal pieces, wrap in plastic and chill."
"Step 2","To make the Filling: Use the zest and juice of the orange and place in large bowl. Mix in figs, raisins and nuts. Process in food processor until evenly chopped. Stir in honey, rum and cinnamon, and set aside."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Remove dough from refrigerator. Roll one piece of dough at a time into an 8-inch wide strip about 1/4-inch thick. Cut lengthwise in half, forming two long strips, each about 4 inches wide. Lay strips on work surface. Brush top inch of each with cold water. About 1/3 of the way up from the bottom of the dough, place 1/4 of the filling in a 1-inch wide strip, running from end to end. Fold the moistened edge of the dough over the filling and press to seal edges. Cut each strip into 1-inch rectangles and place on cookie sheets. Repeat with remaining sections of dough."
"Step 5","Bake 13 to 16 minutes, or until tops are golden. Let cool on cookie sheets for 10 minutes. Transfer to wire racks."
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven","1 cup butter, softened",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven",".25 cup cornstarch",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together butter and brown sugar. Beat in eggs, peanut butter and vanilla."
"Step 3","Add flour, cornstarch, salt, baking soda and baking powder. Stir in chocolate chips."
"Step 4","Roll into balls about 1 1/2 teaspoonfuls (or use cookie scoop) and place onto ungreased cookie sheets about 2 inches apart. Flatten slightly because they do not flatten much while cooking."
"Step 5","Bake for 10 minutes."
"Almond Joy® Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","1 ripe banana",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","5 cups chocolate chips",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","2 cups sweetened flaked coconut",
"Almond Joy® Cookies","2 cups chopped almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat white sugar, brown sugar, and banana together in a separate bowl until smooth and creamy; beat in eggs, 1 at a time, until well mixed. Stir in vanilla extract."
"Step 4","Stir banana mixture into flour mixture until batter is well mixed; fold in chocolate chips, coconut, and almonds. Drop batter by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are beginning to crisp, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool cookies on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Wagon Wheel Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Wagon Wheel Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Wagon Wheel Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Wagon Wheel Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Wagon Wheel Cookies","1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Wagon Wheel Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Wagon Wheel Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Wagon Wheel Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Wagon Wheel Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Wagon Wheel Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Stir in walnuts if desired. Cover dough and chill for at least one hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Roll the balls in confectioners' sugar. Place the cookies 2 inches apart onto the cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.Chinese Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chinese Cookies","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Chinese Cookies","1 egg",
"Chinese Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chinese Cookies","3 .5 cups cake flour",
"Chinese Cookies","1 .25 teaspoons baking soda",
"Chinese Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Chinese Cookies",".5 cup ground walnuts",
"Chinese Cookies","1 cup prepared chocolate fudge frosting",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the sugar and shortening. Stir in the egg and vanilla, beat until light and fluffy. Combine the cake flour, baking soda and salt, stir into the creamed mixture. Dough will be stiff, you may need to use your hands to mix. Roll dough into a log about 15 inches long, and roll in the ground nuts. Wrap and chill dough for at least an hour or until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Unwrap dough and cut into 1/2 inch slices. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheets before removing to cool completely on wire racks. When cool, place a dollop of fudge icing onto the center of each cookie."
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies III","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies III","6 tablespoons butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies III","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Combine flour, baking powder and salt. Set aside."
"Step 2","Melt 1 cup of chocolate chips over low heat. Cream butter and sugar. Add melted chocolate chips and vanilla; beat in eggs; add flour mixture and remaining chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Wrap in plastic and freeze until firm (about 20 minutes)."
"Step 4","Make small balls (1 inch); roll in confectioners' sugar. Place on ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Cool on wire rack."
"Grandma Minnie's Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies","3 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Grandma Minnie's Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Grandma Minnie's Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Grandma Minnie's Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandma Minnie's Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Grandma Minnie's Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies","1 egg, lightly beaten",
"Grandma Minnie's Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies","3 tablespoons cream",
"Grandma Minnie's Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) ."
"Step 2","Over a large bowl, sift together all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sugar. Cut in butter and blend with a pastry blender until mixture resembles cornmeal. Stir in lightly beaten egg, cream, and vanilla. Blend well. Dough may be chilled, if desired."
"Step 3","On a floured surface, roll out dough to 1/8 inch thickness. Sprinkle with sugar; cut into desired shapes. Transfer to ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 6 to 8 minutes, or until delicately brown."
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","1 .5 cups unsalted butter, softened",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs, lightly beaten",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies",".75 cup chopped toasted pecans",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","44 caramels caramel candies",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","6 tablespoons heavy whipping cream",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","coarse sea salt",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","1 (6 ounce) bag semisweet chocolate chips",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Pecan Cookies","1 tablespoon vegetable oil",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 3 to 4 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter and sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until pale and fluffy. Beat in vanilla extract. Reduce mixer speed to low and gradually beat in flour and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Press dough together in plastic wrap; roll dough into 1 1/2-inch balls."
"Step 3","Place beaten eggs in one small dish and pecans in another dish. Dip each dough ball into the eggs and roll in pecans. Place dredged balls on the prepared baking sheets; press your thumb into the center of each ball."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes. Press each cookie again, with a spoon. Return to the oven and continue baking until golden, about 10 minutes more. Cool on wire racks."
"Step 5","Combine caramels and heavy cream in a small saucepan over low heat. Cook, stirring constantly, until caramels are melted and mixture is smooth, 4 to 6 minutes. Spoon the mixture into the thumbprints of the cookies and sprinkle with sea salt."
"Step 6","Melt chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl in 15-second intervals, stirring after each melting, 1 to 3 minutes. Stir in oil. Drizzle chocolate over the cookies."
"(Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars","2 cups white sugar",
"(Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars","2 large eggs",
"(Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars","2 cups peanut butter",
"(Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars",".75 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"(Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars",".75 cup dark chocolate chips",
"(Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars",".5 cup chopped raw pecans",
"(Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars",".5 cup chopped raw almonds",
"(Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars","1 cup flaked coconut",
"(Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a 9x13-inch glass baking dish with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Mix sugar and eggs together in a bowl until smooth; stir in peanut butter until well blended. Pour peanut butter mixture into the prepared baking dish."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cookie base is partly cooked, 8 minutes."
"Step 4","Layer semisweet chocolate chips, dark chocolate chips, pecans, almonds, and coconut onto the cookie base. Slowly pour sweetened condensed milk evenly over the toppings."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until coconut is slightly brown, about 30 minutes."
"Step 6","Cool completely before removing cookie bars from pan. Peel away parchment paper and cut into small squares using a sharp knife."
"Easy Chocolate Crackled Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix",
"Easy Chocolate Crackled Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Easy Chocolate Crackled Cookies","1 tablespoon water",
"Easy Chocolate Crackled Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Easy Chocolate Crackled Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, beat together the shortening, water, and eggs. Add the cake mix, and mix until smooth."
"Step 3","Roll the dough into walnut sized balls, and roll the balls in the confectioners' sugar. Place cookies 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven. These are best served the same day, as the confectioners' sugar becomes absorbed by the cookie giving it a pasty look. This can be fixed by dusting the cookies with sugar again."
"Linda's Monster Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","2 cups light brown sugar",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","4 cups rolled oats",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Linda's Monster Cookies","1 cup candy-coated chocolate pieces",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a very large bowl, cream together the margarine, butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and rolled oats; stir into the sugar mixture. Mix in chocolate chips and candy-coated chocolate pieces. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 11 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are golden. If you like chewy cookies, take them out before they look done."
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","1 .25 cups margarine",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies",".75 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","1 egg, lightly beaten",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground cloves",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","2 medium (7 to 7-7/8 long)s ripe bananas, sliced",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","1 .5 cups raisins",
"Oatmeal Banana Raisin Coconut Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves; stir into the creamed mixture until well blended. Stir in the oats, bananas, raisins and coconut, one at a time using a wooden spoon. Drop by rounded spoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 11 to 13 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Forgotten Cookies II","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Forgotten Cookies II","1 pinch salt",
"Forgotten Cookies II",".67 cup white sugar",
"Forgotten Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Forgotten Cookies II","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Forgotten Cookies II","1 cup salted peanuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper or aluminum foil."
"Step 2","In a large glass or metal mixing bowl, beat egg whites and salt until foamy. Gradually add sugar, continuing to beat until whites form stiff peaks. Fold in the vanilla and chocolate chips. Add peanuts if desired. Spoon onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Place the cookies into the preheated oven, shut the door and turn off the oven immediately. Let cookies sit in the turned off oven for 5 to 6 hours or overnight."
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II","1 .25 cups butter, softened",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 cup white sugar",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II","1 egg",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II",".75 cup flaked coconut",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies II","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. Mix in the egg and vanilla. Combine flour and baking soda; blend into creamed mixture. Stir in the rolled oats, coconut, and white chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven, or until lightly browned. Cool on wire racks."
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies","1 cup packed dark brown sugar",
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Onesy-Twosy Cookies","1 cup chopped salted peanuts",
"Step 1","Cream the shortening, peanut butter, white sugar, brown sugar and vanilla together. Blend for 3 minutes. Add in the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition."
"Step 2","Sift the baking soda, flour and salt together. Add the flour mixture to the peanut butter mixture and mix to combine. Stir in the chopped nuts. Cover and chill dough for 2 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Pinch off 1 inch balls of the dough and place on an ungreased baking sheet. Press tops with floured fork tines. Bake at 350 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes or until edges are golden but the center is still soft. Allow to cool for 2 minutes on the sheet then remove to a rack to continue cooling."
"Cake Mix Cookies VII","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Cake Mix Cookies VII","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cake Mix Cookies VII","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cake Mix Cookies VII",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Cake Mix Cookies VII","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips or other goodies",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the cake mix and baking powder. Add eggs and oil, then mix until well blended. Stir in chocolate chips, or your choice of additions. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Bake less for chewy cookies and more for crispy cookies. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Glazed Apple Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","1 .33 cups packed brown sugar",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","1 egg",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Glazed Apple Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Glazed Apple Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Glazed Apple Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","1 cup apples - peeled, cored and finely diced",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Glazed Apple Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","1 .5 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","1 tablespoon butter",
"Glazed Apple Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Glazed Apple Cookies","2 .5 tablespoons half-and-half cream",
"Step 1","Beat shortening and brown sugar together until light and fluffy. Beat in egg and blend thoroughly."
"Step 2","Stir together flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, cloves and nutmeg."
"Step 3","Stir half the dry ingredients into creamed mixture. Stir in nuts, apple and raisins, then stir in remaining half of dry ingredients and milk. Mix well."
"Step 4","Drop from tablespoon 1 1/2 inches apart onto lightly greased baking sheet. Bake in a preheated 400 degree oven for 10-12 minutes. Remove cookies to racks and while still warm, spread with glaze."
"Step 5","To make Glaze: Combine powdered sugar, butter, vanilla and enough cream to make glaze of spreading consistency. Beat until smooth. Spread on warm cookies."
"Soft Molasses Cookies V","1 cup butter, softened",
"Soft Molasses Cookies V",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Soft Molasses Cookies V","1 egg",
"Soft Molasses Cookies V",".75 cup molasses",
"Soft Molasses Cookies V","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Molasses Cookies V","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Soft Molasses Cookies V",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Soft Molasses Cookies V","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and egg until well blended. Stir in the molasses. Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and ginger; stir into the molasses mixture. Cover the dough and chill for at least 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Place the cookies 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Coconut Gumdrop Cookies","1 cup gumdrops, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Stir in the coconut, rolled oats, pecans and gumdrops. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Place the cookies 2 inches apart onto the cookie sheets. Gently flatten cookies using a fork dipped in flour."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Nanaimo Bars III",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Nanaimo Bars III",".25 cup white sugar",
"Nanaimo Bars III","5 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Nanaimo Bars III","1 egg, beaten",
"Nanaimo Bars III","1 .75 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Nanaimo Bars III","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Nanaimo Bars III",".5 cup finely chopped almonds",
"Nanaimo Bars III",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Nanaimo Bars III","3 tablespoons heavy cream",
"Nanaimo Bars III","2 tablespoons custard powder",
"Nanaimo Bars III","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Nanaimo Bars III","4 (1 ounce) squares semisweet baking chocolate",
"Nanaimo Bars III","2 teaspoons butter",
"Step 1","In the top of a double boiler, combine 1/2 cup butter, white sugar and cocoa powder. Stir occasionally until melted and smooth. Beat in the egg, stirring until thick, 2 to 3 minutes. Remove from heat and mix in the graham cracker crumbs, coconut and almonds (if you like). Press into the bottom of an ungreased 8x8 inch pan."
"Step 2","For the middle layer, cream together 1/2 cup butter, heavy cream and custard powder until light and fluffy. Mix in the confectioners' sugar until smooth. Spread over the bottom layer in the pan. Chill to set."
"Step 3","While the second layer is chilling, melt the semisweet chocolate and 2 teaspoons butter together in the microwave or over low heat. Spread over the chilled bars. Let the chocolate set before cutting into squares."
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies","1 egg",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies",".25 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies","40 piece (blank)s milk chocolate candy kisses, unwrapped",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies","4 teaspoons raspberry jam",
"Raspberry Almond Kiss Cookies",".25 teaspoon almond extract",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, 1/2 cup white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. blend in the egg and 1 teaspoon almond extract. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Cover dough and refrigerate for at least one hour, or until easy to handle."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Roll dough into 1 inch balls, roll the balls in the remaining white sugar and place them 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. While hot from the oven, immediately press a chocolate kiss into the center of each one. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Step 4","In a small bowl, mix together the confectioners' sugar, milk, raspberry jam and 1/4 teaspoon almond extract until smooth. Drizzle over cooled cookies."
"Eggless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Eggless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Eggless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Eggless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Eggless Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup buttermilk",
"Eggless Peanut Butter Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Eggless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Eggless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Eggless Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Mix the shortening, peanut butter, white sugar, brown sugar and buttermilk until smooth and fully combined."
"Step 3","Add the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt to the peanut butter mixture and mix until well blended."
"Step 4","Drop cookies 2 inches apart on lightly greased cookie sheet. Flatten with a fork that has been dipped in flour. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes."
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 cup shortening",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".75 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl cream shortening, brown sugar and granulated sugar. Add eggs and mix thoroughly."
"Step 3","Combine the baking soda, salt and flour and stir into creamed mixture"
"Step 4","Add oatmeal and chocolate chips and stir until well blended."
"Step 5","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet. Bake for 15 minutes."
"Cake Mix Cookies VI","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cake Mix Cookies VI",".33 cup water",
"Cake Mix Cookies VI",".25 cup margarine",
"Cake Mix Cookies VI","1 cup peanut butter",
"Cake Mix Cookies VI","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Cake Mix Cookies VI","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the eggs, water, margarine and peanut butter. Stir in the cake mix and blend well. Finally, fold in chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.Easy Thanksgiving Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package orange cake mix (such as Duncan Hines® Orange Supreme)",
"Easy Thanksgiving Cookies","1 cup sweetened dried cranberries, or more to taste",
"Easy Thanksgiving Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Easy Thanksgiving Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix cake mix, dried cranberries, vegetable oil, and eggs together in a bowl until dough is smooth. Drop 1 to 2 tablespoons batter per cookie onto a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cooked through, 6 to 10 minutes. Cool cookies on baking sheet for about 5 minutes; transfer to a sheet of waxed paper to cool completely."
"Ranger Joe Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Ranger Joe Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Ranger Joe Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Ranger Joe Cookies","1 egg",
"Ranger Joe Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Ranger Joe Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Ranger Joe Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Ranger Joe Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Ranger Joe Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Ranger Joe Cookies","1 cup crisp rice cereal",
"Ranger Joe Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix the butter, sugar and egg until smooth and creamy."
"Step 3","Sift the flour, baking soda and baking powder. Add this to the butter mixture. Stir in the vanilla, oatmeal, puffed rice cereal, and peanut butter. Mix until combined."
"Step 4","Drop by heaping teaspoons onto ungreased baking sheets and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned around the edges."
"Old Time Soft Sugar Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Old Time Soft Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Old Time Soft Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Old Time Soft Sugar Cookies",".75 cup buttermilk",
"Old Time Soft Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Old Time Soft Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Old Time Soft Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Old Time Soft Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream together the shortening and the sugar. Stir in the egg, buttermilk and vanilla."
"Step 2","Combine the flour, baking soda and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture and stir to combine. Chill dough in the refrigerator for 1 hour. Drop mixture by rounded teaspoons 2 inches apart on a lightly greased baking sheet. If desired sprinkle tops of cookies with white sugar before baking."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 7 to 9 minutes or until set."
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies",".75 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature",
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons unsalted butter, room temperature",
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies","4 teaspoons confectioners' sugar",
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies",".75 cup chopped walnuts",
"German Walnut Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Beat 3/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons butter in a large bowl using an electric mixer until creamy. Add 3/4 cup plus 4 teaspoons confectioner's sugar, egg yolk, and salt; beat until smooth. Knead in 2 1/4 cups plus 2 tablespoons flour and 3/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons walnuts."
"Step 2","Shape dough into 2-inch thick rolls and press them into rectangles using a flat item like a cutting board (they should look like oversized butter sticks). Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate until firm, about 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Cut dough into thin slices and lay them on an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C) and bake until very lightly browned, about 5 more minutes."
"Step 6","Remove from the baking sheet and cool on a wire rack, about 20 minutes."
"Betty Brown's Butter Cookies","1 cup salted butter, softened",
"Betty Brown's Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Betty Brown's Butter Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Betty Brown's Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Betty Brown's Butter Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Betty Brown's Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Betty Brown's Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Betty Brown's Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Beat butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Sift flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl; mix, 1 cup at a time, into creamed butter mixture until dough is just mixed. Form dough into 1-inch-thick disks and place on a plate; chill in refrigerator, 2 hours to overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll disks into desired thickness on a lightly floured work surface using a floured rolling pin. Arrange dough on a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are just starting to turn golden brown, 7 to 10 minutes."
"Scottish Shortbread III","1 pound unsalted butter",
"Scottish Shortbread III","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Scottish Shortbread III","1 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter and sugar with mixer. Add flour and mix with a wooden spoon. Use hands to thoroughly mix."
"Step 3","Press into a jelly roll pan. Prick to bottom all over with a fork being sure the fork hits the bottom and the pricks are close together."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 minutes. Reduce the heat to 300 and continue to bake for 40 minutes more. Wait 2 minutes then cut into finger size bars. Cool thoroughly in pan."
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Cinnamon Graham Crunchy Cookies","2 cups crumbled cinnamon graham crackers",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream butter, sugar and brown sugar until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla and beat until smooth. In another bowl, mix flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt. Add dry ingredients to creamed mixture and stir until it becomes a soft dough."
"Step 2","Stir in oats, chocolate chips, pecans, and 1 cup of graham cracker crumbs."
"Step 3","Drop teaspoonfuls of dough into remaining graham cracker crumbs and coat well. Place on a lightly greased baking sheet and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10-13 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack and store in airtight container."
"Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies",".75 cup blanched slivered almonds",
"Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies","1 cup sugar",
"Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies","1 egg",
"Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies","⅛ teaspoon baking powder",
"Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spread the almonds out on a baking sheet. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, until lightly browned or until they give off an aroma. Remove from the oven, and allow to cool completely. Grind to a consistency resembling rough sand in a food processor or blender. Be sure almonds are cool, or you will make almond butter."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the almond extract and milk. Sift in the flour, baking powder and salt, and mix in along with the ground toasted almonds to form a soft dough. Refrigerate the dough for 15 to 20 minutes. This will help the cookies keep their shape after pressing."
"Step 3","Lightly grease cookie sheets, and fill cookie press with dough. Press out cookies at least 1 inch apart depending on the size. You can experiment with different cookie designs. I've found most true Swedes tend to use the star shape, however, you're free to use whatever shape suits your fancy."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are lightly browned. Cool on the cookie sheets for a minute before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 teaspoon peppermint extract",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 (5 ounce) milk chocolate candy bar, chopped",
"Candy Cane Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 cup coarsely chopped peppermint candy canes",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and peppermint extracts. Combine the flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until all of the dry has been absorbed. Mix in the chocolate chunks and chopped candy cane. Form spoonfuls of dough into balls, and place them 2 inches apart onto an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven."
"Squash Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Squash Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Squash Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Squash Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Squash Cookies","1 .5 cups mashed, cooked butternut squash",
"Squash Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Squash Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Squash Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Squash Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Squash Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Squash Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Squash Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Squash Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped pecans",
"Squash Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Squash Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in the eggs and squash. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and spices; add to mixture, stirring until well blended. Stir in raisins and nuts. Spoon onto cookie sheets spacing cookies 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until edges are golden."
"Chocolate Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Spice Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Spice Cookies","1 cup buttermilk",
"Chocolate Spice Cookies","3 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Spice Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Spice Cookies",".5 tablespoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Chocolate Spice Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Spice Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped pecans",
"Chocolate Spice Cookies",".5 cup raisins, soaked in water and drained",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the sugar and shortening, add the buttermilk, and mix until creamy. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking soda, cloves and cinnamon; stir into the creamed mixture. Then stir in the soaked raisins and pecans. By the time you are this far along, you may find it easier to mix with your hands."
"Step 3","Roll the dough into 1 inch balls and place them on the cookie sheet and flatten slightly. Bake for 7 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Watch carefully as the bottoms tend to burn easily."
"Rock Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Rock Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Rock Cookies","3 cups raisins",
"Rock Cookies","2 cups chopped black walnuts",
"Rock Cookies","2 cups dates, pitted and chopped",
"Rock Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Rock Cookies","5 large eggs eggs",
"Rock Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Step 1","Cream together the butter or margarine and the brown sugar. Add the eggs, and beat well. Add the flour and baking soda. Chop the dates, and add them with the raisins and walnuts to the dough."
"Step 2","Spoon dough onto cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for approximately 8 minutes."
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies","2 tablespoons orange juice",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies","1 egg",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies","3 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Cranberry Kitchen Cookies","2 .5 cups fresh cranberries, roughly chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter, white sugar and brown sugar. Beat in the milk, orange juice and egg. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Stir in chopped walnuts and cranberries. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are golden. Let cookies cool on the cookie sheet for 2 minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely"
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies","1 beaten egg",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies",".25 cup molasses",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon nutmeg",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package white chocolate chips",
"Chewy White Chocolate Chip Gingerbread Cookies",".5 cup white sugar, for rolling",
"Step 1","Beat together the butter with 1 cup of sugar in a mixing bowl until the mixture is smooth, and stir in beaten egg and molasses. In another bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, ginger, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, and salt; stir the flour mixture into the molasses mixture by half cupfuls. Stir in the white chocolate chips. Refrigerate dough for at least 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Scoop up a generous spoonful of dough, and roll it into a ball. Roll the ball in sugar, place onto an ungreased baking sheet, and flatten slightly. Sprinkle a little sugar onto the cookie, if desired. Repeat for the rest of the cookies."
"Step 4","Bake the cookies in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 10 to 15 minutes. Allow to cool on the baking sheet for about 1 minute before removing to finish cooling on racks."
"Everything Cookies II","1 cup butter",
"Everything Cookies II","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Everything Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Everything Cookies II","1 egg",
"Everything Cookies II","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Everything Cookies II","1 cup rolled oats",
"Everything Cookies II","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Everything Cookies II","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Everything Cookies II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Everything Cookies II","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Everything Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Everything Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Everything Cookies II","1 cup crisp rice cereal",
"Everything Cookies II","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter or margarine with the sugars. Beat in the egg."
"Step 2","Add in the cream of tartar, oats, coconut, vegetable oil and vanilla. Sift together the flour, salt and baking soda and add to the mixture. Stir in crisp rice cereal and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoon on greased baking sheets. Bake in a 350 degree F (175 degree C) oven for 12 minutes."
"Sesame Seed Cookies III","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III",".75 cup white sugar",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III",".25 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III",".25 cup shortening",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III",".25 cup milk",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III",".25 cup milk",
"Sesame Seed Cookies III",".75 cup sesame seeds",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Blend in butter and shortening until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Make a well in the center and add eggs, 1/4 cup of milk and vanilla. Mix until a soft dough forms. Divide the dough into 4 pieces. Roll each piece out into a long snake 1/2 inch in diameter. Cut snakes into 2 inch pieces. Dip each piece in remaining milk, then roll in sesame seeds. Place 1 inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","1 cup butter or margarine, softened",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans, divided",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","1 tablespoon white sugar",
"Caramel Pecan Cookies","5 rolls chocolate-covered caramel candies",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, 1 cup white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, and baking soda; stir into the sugar mixture until well blended. Stir in 1/2 cup of the pecans. Cover, and refrigerate dough for 1 hour, or until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In a shallow bowl, combine the remaining 1/2 cup pecans and 1 tablespoon of sugar; set aside."
"Step 3","Press 1 tablespoon of cookie dough around each chocolate coated caramel, forming a ball. Dip one side of each ball into the pecan mixture; and place pecan side up, 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 minutes in the preheated oven (the cookies will look soft). Cool on the pans for one minute before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Mincemeat Cookies II","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Mincemeat Cookies II","1 cup shortening",
"Mincemeat Cookies II","1 egg",
"Mincemeat Cookies II","2 cups prepared mincemeat pie filling",
"Mincemeat Cookies II","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mincemeat Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Mincemeat Cookies II","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together brown sugar and shortening."
"Step 3","Add in egg and mincemeat and mix well. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda and stir into mincemeat mixture."
"Step 4","Drop onto cookie sheet and bake 7 - 10 minutes."
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds","1 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds","1 egg",
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds","2 cups white chocolate chips",
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds",".75 cup chopped almonds",
"Apricot and White Chip Cookies with Almonds",".75 cup dried apricots, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the flour, baking soda, and salt. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Stir in the dry ingredients until well blended, then stir in the white chips, almonds, and apricots."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls onto an unprepared cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies should be golden brown. Remove from the baking sheet to cool on wire racks."
"Chocolate Orange Cookies","1 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate",
"Chocolate Orange Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Chocolate Orange Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Orange Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Orange Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Orange Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Orange Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Orange Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Chocolate Orange Cookies","1 tablespoon orange zest",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). In a microwave-safe dish, melt the unsweetened chocolate, stirring frequently until smooth. Set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Divide dough in two. Mix orange zest into one half, and melted chocolate into the other half. Use a bit of each mixture to form a ball about 1 inch in diameter."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until center is set. Cool on wire racks.Chocolate-Dipped Orange Shortbread Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate-Dipped Orange Shortbread Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate-Dipped Orange Shortbread Cookies","3 tablespoons orange zest, divided",
"Chocolate-Dipped Orange Shortbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate-Dipped Orange Shortbread Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Chocolate-Dipped Orange Shortbread Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground cloves",
"Chocolate-Dipped Orange Shortbread Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate-Dipped Orange Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Chocolate-Dipped Orange Shortbread Cookies","4 ounces milk chocolate, melted",
"Step 1","Combine flour, sugar, 2 tablespoons orange zest, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment. Add butter and beat until mixture resembles crumbs and starts to stick together. Work until dough sticks together and forms a smooth ball that is not sticky, adding milk if mixture is too dry. Press into a disk shape and wrap in wax paper. Chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes"
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Lightly flour a clean countertop. Roll dough to 1/2-inch thickness. Cut into shapes with cookie cutters and place on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until bottoms are lightly golden, 18 to 22 minutes. Transfer cookies to wire racks and cool completely, about 30 minutes."
"Step 5","Line the countertop with wax paper. Dip tops of cookies into the melted chocolate, allowing excess to drip back into the bowl. Place cookies on the wax paper and immediately sprinkle tops with remaining 1 tablespoon orange zest. Let dry."
"Shortbread Cookies IV","1 cup white sugar",
"Shortbread Cookies IV","2 cups butter, softened",
"Shortbread Cookies IV","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Shortbread Cookies IV","1 cup white rice flour",
"Shortbread Cookies IV","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream butter and 1 cup of sugar until very fluffy. Gradually add the flour and rice flour. As the dough gets stiffer, turn it out onto a well floured surface, and knead it until smooth."
"Step 3","Press dough into a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan, score into bars and prick with a fork. Sprinkle remaining sugar over the top, and bake for 30 to 35 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Cut along scored lines into bars while still warm. Cool before serving."
"Pumpkin Cookies V","2 cups shortening",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","2 cups white sugar",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","2 cups canned pumpkin",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","1 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","6 tablespoons butter",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","8 tablespoons milk",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Cookies V","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Step 1","Cream shortening, white sugar and pumpkin. Add eggs and mix well. Sift together the baking soda, ground cinnamon, salt and flour. Add to pumpkin mixture and mix well."
"Step 2","Drop from spoon to cookie sheet. Bake 10 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","To Make Frosting: Cook butter, milk, and brown sugar until dissolved. Cool and add confectioners' sugar and vanilla. Spread over warm cookies."
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies","2 .25 cups unbleached all-purpose flour",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening (such as Crisco®)",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons almond extract",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 cup dried tart cherries",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".75 cup chopped walnuts",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Cherry Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag semi-sweet chocolate chunks (such as SACO®)",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease baking sheets. Whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat the unsalted butter, butter flavored shortening, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Add the eggs one at a time; beat in the vanilla extract and almond extract with the last egg. Mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Fold in the cherries, walnuts, pecans, and chocolate chunks, mixing just enough to evenly combine. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until browned around the edges, 11 to 13 minutes. Cool on cookie sheet for 2 minutes; remove cookies to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II","3 tablespoons white sugar",
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II","1 cup dark brown sugar",
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine the 3 tablespoons white sugar and the cinnamon in a small bowl and set aside."
"Step 3","Blend dark brown sugar and white sugar in a large bowl with mixer on medium speed. Add butter and blend until grainy. Add eggs and vanilla extract, mixing until light and fluffy."
"Step 4","Whisk flour, baking soda and salt together in a separate bowl. Add to sugar mixture, mixing at low speed just long enough to combine. Overmixing makes tough cookies!"
"Step 5","Roll dough into 1inch balls, then roll each ball into cinnamon-sugar to coat. Place cookies on ungreased cookie sheets and bake at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) for 18 to 20 minutes. Remove from sheets and let cool on racks."
"EVOO Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"EVOO Sugar Cookies",".67 cup extra-virgin olive oil",
"EVOO Sugar Cookies","1 cup sugar",
"EVOO Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"EVOO Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"EVOO Sugar Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"EVOO Sugar Cookies",".5 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F (185 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Cream together eggs, olive oil, and sugar in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and pale gold in color. Add flour, baking powder, and salt and mix until just combined. Fold in chocolate chips. Shape dough into a ball and refrigerate for 30 minutes."
"Step 3","Use a teaspoon to drop spoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet, leaving about 2 inches of space in between as cookies will spread. Refrigerate leftover dough to bake in batches."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until just golden around the edges, about 8 minutes. Allow to cool for 2 minutes on the baking sheet before transferring to a cooling rack."
"Easy Ice Cream Sandwiches","1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix",
"Easy Ice Cream Sandwiches",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Easy Ice Cream Sandwiches","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easy Ice Cream Sandwiches","2 eaches eggs",
"Easy Ice Cream Sandwiches",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Easy Ice Cream Sandwiches",".5 cup butterscotch chips",
"Easy Ice Cream Sandwiches",".5 gallon vanilla ice cream, softened",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the cake mix, butter, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips, and butterscotch chips. Roll dough into 2-inch balls and place them onto the prepared baking sheets. Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Do not overbake; the cookies should be set, but still soft. Let cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before removing to finish cooling on wire racks."
"Step 3","Using an ice cream scoop, mold the softened ice cream into a ball about the size of the cookies. Place scoop of ice cream between two cookies and gently press together. If you like a smooth edge, run the back of a spoon around the edge of the ice cream sandwich. Working quickly, fill all of the cookies, lay out on a baking sheet, and place in the freezer to harden. Serve when the ice cream has frozen solid. Sandwich cookies can be stored in a freezer bag for up to two weeks."
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies","1 .25 cups butter",
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies","2 large eggs egg",
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies","54 piece (blank)s milk chocolate candy kisses, unwrapped",
"Jeanne's Chocolate Kiss Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl mix butter and sugar till fluffy, add eggs and vanilla mix well. Sift together flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt, and add to creamed mixture."
"Step 3","Roll dough into balls about 1 inch in diameter then roll in white sugar. Place balls on ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 8 to 10 minutes. Place unwrapped chocolate kiss in the center of each cookie while still hot. Let cool and enjoy!"
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup margarine, softened",
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup white sugar",
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup brown sugar",
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 large eggs eggs",
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon salt",
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"The Best Double Chocolate Chip Cookie","3 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Sift in the flour, baking soda, salt and cocoa powder; mix well. Stir in the chocolate chips. Roll tablespoonfuls of dough into balls and place them one inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies","1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies","1 (6 ounce) package white chocolate chips",
"Linda's Cranberry Cookies",".5 (6 ounce) package dried cranberries",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease two baking sheets. Combine flour and baking soda in a bowl."
"Step 2","Beat the butter, white sugar, brown sugar, and instant pudding with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat the first egg into the butter until completely blended, then beat in the vanilla with the last egg. Mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Fold in the white chocolate chips and cranberries; mixing just enough to evenly combine. Drop spoonfuls of the dough 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of the cookies become golden brown, 9 to 12 minutes. Cool in the baking sheet for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Yummy Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease two cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, peanut butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and almond extracts. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Roll dough into 1 inch balls and place them 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Use a wet fork dipped in sugar to make the crisscrosses on the top."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. Grab a glass of milk and enjoy!"
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII",".75 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII",".25 cup brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII","1 egg",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII",".75 cup self-rising flour",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII","1 .5 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies VII","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar, until smooth. Beat in the egg then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and salt: stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in the quick oats and raisins. Spread evenly into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges are starting to brown. Let cool in pan before cutting into bars."
"Soft Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Soft Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Soft Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Soft Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Soft Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Soft Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Soft Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Soft Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Combine margarine, peanut butter, sugars, egg, and vanilla. Blend together very well."
"Step 2","Add flour, baking soda and salt with mixer. Chill dough 15 minutes in the refrigerator. Roll into balls by hand."
"Step 3","Place on sprayed cookie sheet and bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven until edges very lightly browning (about 7 to 10 minutes). Don't overcook. We store them in a plastic storage containers, and they stay soft!"
"No Bakes","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"No Bakes","2 cups white sugar",
"No Bakes",".5 cup milk",
"No Bakes",".5 cup butter",
"No Bakes","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"No Bakes",".5 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"No Bakes","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Heat cocoa, sugar, milk and butter over medium heat. Boil these verrrrry slowly (they will turn out better) when they reach the boiling point boil them for no longer than 90-120 seconds."
