"Step 2","Stir together oats, peanut butter and vanilla with a big wooden spoon or Kitchen Aid. Pour the hot mix over the oatmeal mix and drop on wax paper."
"Amy's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Amy's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Amy's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup margarine, softened",
"Amy's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Amy's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Amy's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Amy's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Amy's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Amy's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium-sized mixing bowl, combine flour and baking soda. Set aside. In another large mixing bowl, combine butter, white sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, and pudding mix. Beat until smooth and creamy. Beat in eggs. Gradually stir in flour mixture. Stir in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop batter by heaping teaspoonfuls, about 2 inches apart, onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 9 to 9 1/2 minutes, or until browned."
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","1 cup shortening",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting",".5 cup white sugar",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","1 cup pumpkin puree",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","1 egg",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","3 tablespoons butter",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting",".25 cup milk",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Penuche Frosting","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together shortening, 1/2 cup brown sugar, and white sugar. Mix in pumpkin, egg, and vanilla. Sift together flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt; mix into the creamed mixture. Stir in walnuts. Drop dough by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on wire racks."
"Step 4","In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the 3 tablespoons butter and 1/2 cup brown sugar. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 1 minute, or until slightly thickened. Cool slightly, then stir in the milk, and beat until smooth. Gradually stir in 2 cups confectioners' sugar until frosting has reached desired consistency. Spread on cooled cookies."
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","3 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","1 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","1 cup butter",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","1 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","2 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IV","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Combine eggs, vanilla and raisins in a small bowl; cover and let stand for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","In a large bowl, cream the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together. Sift together the flour, cinnamon, and baking soda; stir into the creamed mixture. Then stir in the raisin mixture, rolled oats, and nuts."
"Step 4","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto an unprepared cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes, or until lightly browned."
"Bar Cookies from Cake Mix",".5 cup butter",
"Bar Cookies from Cake Mix",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Bar Cookies from Cake Mix","2 tablespoons water",
"Bar Cookies from Cake Mix","1 egg",
"Bar Cookies from Cake Mix","1 (18.25 ounce) package white cake mix",
"Bar Cookies from Cake Mix","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Bar Cookies from Cake Mix","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking pan."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Mix in water and egg, then stir in cake mix. Finally, mix in nuts and chocolate chips. Spread mixture into pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 30 to 35 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool completely before cutting into bars."
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies","1 teaspoon peppermint extract",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Peppermint Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in egg, then stir in vanilla and peppermint extracts. Combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on cookie sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Vegan Tahini Cookies","1 cup spelt flour",
"Vegan Tahini Cookies","2 tablespoons spelt flour",
"Vegan Tahini Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Vegan Tahini Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Vegan Tahini Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Vegan Tahini Cookies",".33 cup grape molasses",
"Vegan Tahini Cookies",".33 cup tahini",
"Vegan Tahini Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Vegan Tahini Cookies","1 tablespoon grape molasses",
"Vegan Tahini Cookies",".25 cup sesame seeds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons spelt flour, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in a large bowl; stir well. Make a well in the center; add 1/3 cup grape molasses and tahini. Stir to combine. Roll small portions of dough between your palms into small balls, about 1/2 inch in diameter."
"Step 3","Combine water and 1 tablespoon grape molasses in a small bowl or shallow dish. Place sesame seeds in a second bowl. Roll balls in the molasses; coat with sesame seeds. Place 2 inches apart on the baking sheet. Flatten with the bottom of a glass."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated until lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Let cool on the baking sheet.Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II",".5 cup lard",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II","3 tablespoons sour cream",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II","3 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream butter, lard and sugar. Add eggs and beat. Mix sour cream and baking soda together and add to egg mixture. Add flour and salt and mix well."
"Step 2","Chill dough until firm enough to roll."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll out dough and cut with cookie cutter. It's wise to keep dough in refrigerator between rolling out batches. Bake for 5 - 7 minutes."
"Better than Sex Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Better than Sex Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Better than Sex Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Better than Sex Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Better than Sex Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Better than Sex Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Better than Sex Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Better than Sex Cookies","1 .67 cups vanilla baking chips",
"Better than Sex Cookies","4 ounces macadamia nuts, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixer bowl, beat butter and sugar until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla extract; beat until light and fluffy."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, stir together flour, baking soda and salt; gradually blend into butter mixture."
"Step 4","Stir in vanilla chips, and macadamia nuts. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Bake for 9 minutes. (Do not overbake; cookies will be soft. They will puff while baking; flatten upon cooling.) Cool slightly, remove from cookie sheet to wire rack. Cool completely."
"Dirt Pudding","2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant French vanilla pudding mix",
"Dirt Pudding","3 cups milk",
"Dirt Pudding","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Dirt Pudding","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Dirt Pudding",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Dirt Pudding","1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed",
"Dirt Pudding","1 (14 ounce) package chocolate cream-filled sandwich cookies, crushed (divided)",
"Step 1","Whisk French vanilla pudding mix with milk in a large bowl until softly set, about 2 minutes. Pudding will thicken as it stands. Cream confectioners' sugar, cream cheese, and butter in a separate bowl until smooth and creamy. Stir cream cheese mixture into pudding until thoroughly combined; gently fold frozen whipped topping into the mixture."
"Step 2","Place half the cookie crumbs into the bottom of an 9x12-inch dish; retain remaining crumbs for topping. Spread the filling over the layer of cookie crumbs and top with remaining crumbs, covering completely. Chill for at least 30 minutes."
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".5 cup dark cocoa powder",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".33 cup white sugar",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".33 cup brown sugar",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs","1 egg",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, cocoa powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Beat butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, and vanilla extract together with an electric mixer in another bowl until smooth and creamy. Gradually beat flour mixture into butter mixture until dough is just incorporated. Spread dough out onto prepared baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until set, about 14 minutes. Cool completely and crumble as desired."
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®","1 (16.5 ounce) roll Pillsbury® refrigerated chocolate chip cookie dough",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®",".33 cup all-purpose flour",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®",".5 cup finely chopped pecans",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®","24 caramels caramels, unwrapped",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®","2 tablespoons half-and-half",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®",".33 cup semisweet chocolate chips, melted",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®","1 teaspoon coarse sea salt",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F. In large bowl, break up cookie dough. Stir or knead in flour until well blended. Shape tablespoonfuls of dough into balls; roll in pecans, pressing into dough. Place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Bake 12 to 16 minutes or until edges are light golden brown. Using handle of wooden spoon, make indentation in center of each cookie. Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheet to cooling racks. Cool completely, about 20 minutes."
"Step 3","Meanwhile, in microwavable bowl, microwave caramels and half-and-half uncovered on High 1 to 2 minutes, stirring once, until caramels are melted. Spoon about 1 teaspoon caramel into indentation of each cookie. Cool 15 minutes."
"Step 4","Drizzle with melted chocolate; sprinkle with salt. Let stand about 15 minutes or until chocolate is set."
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 .25 cups sorghum flour",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 cup white rice flour",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 teaspoon xanthan gum",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","2 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 cup hemp seed hearts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine sorghum flour, rice flour, baking soda, xanthan gum, and salt together in a large bowl."
"Step 3","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes. Beat eggs one at a time into the butter mixture; add vanilla extract. Pour butter mixture over flour mixture. Beat together until combined, about 2 minutes. Fold chocolate chips and hemp seeds into the cookie dough."
"Step 4","Place cookie dough in the refrigerator to firm up, at least 20 minutes."
"Step 5","Drop heaping tablespoons of dough 2 inches apart on baking sheets; press down with the back of the spoon to flatten slightly."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until cookie edges are lightly golden, 8 to 11 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool before taking off the parchment paper, about 10 minutes. Cool baking sheet before re-using for another batch."
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup evaporated milk",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Step 1","In large bowl combine oats, vanilla and salt. Stir in pecans."
"Step 2","In a medium saucepan, combine sugar, evaporated milk, butter and cocoa. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat, stir in oats mixture."
"Step 3","Drop mixture by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let cool."
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 cup ground pecans",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".5 cup German sweet chocolate, grated",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".25 cup German sweet chocolate, grated",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream the butter and 1/3 cup confectioner's sugar until light and fluffy. Add the vanilla extract."
"Step 2","In a separate bowl, combine the flour, ground pecans, 1/2 cup ground chocolate, cinnamon and salt; mix well."
"Step 3","Gradually add the dry ingredients to the creamed mixture."
"Step 4","Wrap dough in plastic wrap and chill 1 to 2 hours, or until firm."
"Step 5","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 6","Shape the dough into 1-inch balls. Place balls 1 inch apart on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 15 to 18 minutes, or until the cookies are firm to the touch. Cool 1 minute on the baking sheet, then transfer to a wire rack."
"Step 7","For the coating, sift 1/2 cup of the confectioner's sugar and 1/4 cup of the ground cocoa into a shallow bowl. While cookies are still warm, roll them in the coating."
"Sesame Seed Cookies I","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I",".75 cup milk",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I",".063 teaspoon anise oil",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I","2 ounces sesame seeds",
"Step 1","Combine flour and sugar in a bowl. Cut in shortening with a pastry blender-or work with your hands - until mixture resembles coarse meal."
"Step 2","Add anise oil (optional) small amount for it is very strong, to 1/2 cup of the milk and add to flour mixture. Gradually add more of the milk mixing until dough holds together."
"Step 3","Pull off small portions of dough and roll between palms of the hands into a roll about finger size. Roll in sesame seeds. Seeds stick better if put in sugared water and taken out and put on a clean lintless cloth. Roll on cloth with seeds, then flatten out too about 1/4-inch thickness. Cut into 2 inch strips, place on ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove, cool completely, then store in an airtight container."
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 cup chopped dark chocolate",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 cup brewed coffee, cooled",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 tablespoons heavy cream",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 teaspoons red sugar sprinkles",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 teaspoons green sugar sprinkles",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Gently melt the chocolate in a small saucepan over very low heat, and allow to cool for about 5 minutes. Stir the butter and sugar together in a large bowl, and mix in the chocolate, molasses, eggs, and vanilla extract."
"Step 3","Sift 5 cups of flour with the cinnamon, cloves, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. Gradually stir the flour mixture into the chocolate mixture by cupfuls, alternating each addition of flour with about 2 tablespoons of coffee, until all the coffee is incorporated. Dough should be soft but not runny. Add more flour if needed to make a soft dough, but cookies will be dry if the dough is too stiff. Use a small scoop or melon baller to form 1-inch balls, and place them on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are set and just beginning to brown at the edges, about 10 minutes. Let cool on sheets for about 1 minute before removing to continue cooling on a rack until slightly warm, 8 to 10 minutes."
"Step 5","To make frosting, stir together confectioners' sugar, cream, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract in a bowl until smooth. Frost the cookies while they're still a little warm. Sprinkle with red or green sugar sprinkles."
"Molasses Cookies IV","2 cups white sugar",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 cup shortening",
"Molasses Cookies IV","2 large eggs eggs",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Molasses Cookies IV",".67 cup molasses",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Molasses Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Molasses Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Molasses Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Stir in the eggs, vanilla and molasses. Sift together the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger and salt; stir into the molasses mixture. Shape dough into a log 2 inches in diameter. Wrap in wax paper and refrigerate overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees c). Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Unwrap cookie dough, and cut into 1/4 to 1/2 inch slices. Place on prepared cookie sheets and bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".5 cup butter, melted",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners","1 egg",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".75 cup Stevia Extract In The Raw™",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".5 cup macadamia nuts",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. In a large bowl, beat together the melted butter, egg, vanilla extract and Sugar In The Raw® (or Sugar In The Raw®/Stevia In The Raw® combo)."
"Step 2","Meanwhile, mix dry ingredients (flour, baking soda, salt) in a separate bowl. Add dry ingredients to wet ingredients and stir well to combine. Slowly add nuts and chocolate chips until well combined."
"Step 3","Drop the dough in spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 10 minutes."
"Snickerdoodles II","1 cup shortening",
"Snickerdoodles II","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 .75 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Snickerdoodles II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Snickerdoodles II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the shortening and 1 1/2 cups of white sugar until smooth. Stir in the eggs one at a time, blending well after each. Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt; stir into the batter until blended."
"Step 3","Roll the dough into balls the size of small walnuts. Roll in a mixture of 2 tablespoons sugar and 2 teaspoons cinnamon. Place 2 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned, but still soft."
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 egg",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter in a large mixing bowl using an electric mixer until creamy; add sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder. Beat until combined. Scrape sides of bowl down if needed. Stir egg and vanilla extract into butter mixture until just combined; mix in flour."
"Step 3","Fill the cookie press with dough; press cookies onto an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes."
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","1 cup buttermilk",
"Step 1","In a mixing bowl, cream sugar, butter and vanilla until light colored. Beat in eggs."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, sift together flour and baking powder. In a separate small bowl, dissolve the baking soda in the buttermilk. Stir the egg mixture and buttermilk mixture into the dry incrementally. The dough should be stiff. Refrigerate overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll dough out on a lightly floured surface to 1/4 inch thick. Cut with cookie cutters and arrange on cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 8 to 10 minutes."
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 pinch sea salt",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar, packed",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs, lightly beaten",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chunks",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup sweetened shredded coconut",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup pecans, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with a silicone baking mats or parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add flour mixture to butter mixture, 1/4 cup at a time, until dough is well-combined. Gently stir chocolate chunks, coconut, and pecans into dough. Scoop dough in 1-inch balls onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are set, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool completely."
"Ceramic Mold Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies","1 egg",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Step 1","Thoroughly cream the butter by hand. Add sugar and mix til fluffy. Beat in the egg and then the milk or cream."
"Step 2","In a separate bowl mix together all the dry ingredients. Stir them into the butter. Knead the dough for just a minute. Chill the dough until firm."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Form the cookies as directed above. Bake for 10 - 12 minutes or until the edges brown. *Quantity will vary depending on the size of your ceramic molds."
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","2 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".5 pound fresh figs",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".33 cup honey",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","1 tablespoon lemon juice, or to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat sugar and butter with an electric mixer in a large bowl until fluffy. Beat eggs in, one at a time, until combined; stir in vanilla extract. Fold in flour mixture until well blended."
"Step 4","Combine figs, honey, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in a food processor; pulse until smooth. Stir in lemon juice until filling is slightly thinner than jam."
"Step 5","Shape dough into 1-inch balls; place on a non-stick baking sheet. Make thumbprints in batter with a wet finger. Spoon 1 teaspoon of filling into each thumbprint."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","2 cups raisins, soaked in water and drained",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Stir in the eggs, one at a time, and then the vanilla. Mix in the flour and baking soda until combined. Then stir in the raisins just enough to distribute evenly."
"Step 3","Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on wire racks."
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®",".5 cup butter or margarine, melted",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®","1 (7 ounce) package flaked coconut",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®","1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®","1 (12 ounce) package semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®",".5 cup Jif® Creamy Peanut Butter",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (325 degrees F for glass dish). In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter; mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan. Top evenly with coconut then pour sweetened condensed milk evenly over coconut layer."
"Step 2","Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned."
"Step 3","In small saucepan, over low heat, melt chocolate chips with peanut butter. Spread evenly over hot coconut layer."
"Step 4","Cool 30 minutes. Chill thoroughly. Cut into bars. Garnish as desired. Store loosely covered at room temperature.Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks","1 .5 cups unbleached all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks",".33 cup rolled oats",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks","1 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks",".25 cup honey",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Cookies with Chocolate Chunks","5 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate",
"Step 1","Mix flour, oats, baking soda, and salt in medium bowl."
"Step 2","Using an electric mixer, beat peanut butter, brown sugar, butter, honey, egg, and vanilla in large bowl until well blended. Stir dry ingredients into the peanut butter mixture in 2 additions. Stir in chopped chocolate."
"Step 3","Cover and refrigerate until dough is firm and no longer sticky, about 30 minutes."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Butter 2 heavy large baking sheets."
"Step 5","With hands, roll 1 heaping tablespoonful of dough for each cookie into 1 3/4 inch diameter ball. Arrange cookies on prepared baking sheets, spacing 2 1/2 inches apart."
"Step 6","Bake cookies until puffed, beginning to brown on top and still very soft to touch, about 12 minutes. Cool cookies on baking sheets for 5 minutes. Using metal spatula, transfer cookies to rack and cool completely. (Can be made 2 days ahead. Store in airtight container at room temperature.)"
"Cracked Sugar Cookies II","1 cup shortening",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies II","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies II","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies II","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies II",".25 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and 1 1/2 cups sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until well blended. Cover dough and refrigerate for at least 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Roll dough into 1 inch balls and roll the balls in the remaining sugar. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 9 minutes in the preheated oven, or until just barely golden. Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 2 minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Butter Rich Spritz Butter Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Butter Rich Spritz Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Butter Rich Spritz Butter Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Butter Rich Spritz Butter Cookies","1 .25 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Butter Rich Spritz Butter Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Butter Rich Spritz Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Butter Rich Spritz Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Sift together the flour and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Stir in the egg yolks, almond extract and vanilla extract. Gradually blend in the sifted ingredients. Fill a cookie press with dough and shoot cookies about 1 1/2 inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. If you like, decorate with sugar or sprinkles at this time."
"Step 3","Bake for 6 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven."
"Date Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Date Cookies","1 .33 cups white sugar",
"Date Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Date Cookies","3 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Date Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Date Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Date Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Date Cookies","2 teaspoons water",
"Date Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped pitted dates",
"Date Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition. Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and cloves; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Combine the water and dates; stir into the dough along with the chopped pecans. Cover and chill for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II","1 ⅛ cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II","1 egg",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II","1 tablespoon dark rum",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II","1 .5 cups toffee baking bits",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies II",".5 cup chopped almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees F)."
"Step 2","Beat butter and sugar in large bowl until fluffy. Add egg, rum, and vanilla and beat until well blended."
"Step 3","Sift flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt into small bowl. Stir dry ingredients into butter mixture. Mix in toffee and chopped almonds."
"Step 4","Drop batter by heaping tablespoonfuls onto heavy large ungreased baking sheet, spacing 2 inches apart. Bake until cookies puff slightly and crack on top but are still soft to tough, about 11 minutes. Let cookies cool on sheet 1 minutes. Transfer cookies to rack and cool completely. Repeat shaping and baking with remaining batter."
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III","1 .5 cups dark brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III",".67 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies III","2 cups chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, white sugar, salt and peanut butter. Beat in the eggs and vanilla. Combine the flour and baking soda; stir into the batter to form a dough. Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Scoop mounds of dough as large as two tablespoons onto the prepared cookie sheets. Cookies should be at least 2 inches apart. If batter is crumbly, roll portions of dough into rough spheres between the palms of your hands. Flatten cookies down by 1/3 using the bottom of a glass."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until well risen and brown. Do not overbake they will firm up a little as they cool. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies II","2 cups butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies II","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies II",".5 teaspoon coconut extract",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies II","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies II","1 cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies II","1 cup chopped pecans, toasted",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies II","3 tablespoons confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and 2 cups confectioners' sugar. Beat in the vanilla and coconut extracts and salt. Add flour one cup at a time, mixing well after each. Stir in the chocolate chips and pecans. Roll the dough into 1 inch balls and place them 2 inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten with a fork dipped in confectioners' sugar."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until a light golden brown. While cookies are still warm from the oven, dust with the remaining confectioners' sugar."
"No-Bake Chocolate Coconut Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"No-Bake Chocolate Coconut Cookies","1 cup sweetened flaked coconut",
"No-Bake Chocolate Coconut Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"No-Bake Chocolate Coconut Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"No-Bake Chocolate Coconut Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"No-Bake Chocolate Coconut Cookies",".5 cup margarine",
"Step 1","Line a baking sheet with waxed paper."
"Step 2","Mix oats and coconut in a large bowl until thoroughly combined."
"Step 3","Stir sugar, cocoa powder, milk, and margarine together in a saucepan over medium heat until the mixture is smooth. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Pour over the oats and coconut and quickly mix to coat. Drop by tablespoon onto prepared baking sheet; let cookies cool and harden. Store in an airtight container."
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup packed dark brown sugar",
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 ⅛ cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup macadamia nuts, chopped",
"Macadamia Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease 2 large cookie sheets with vegetable shortening."
"Step 2","Cream the butter and sugars together in a large bowl. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract until well blended. Sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt; gradually blend into the batter. Stir in the chopped macadamia nuts and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto the cookie sheets, about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes, or until the cookies are golden brown. Remove from the oven, and transfer the cookies to cooling racks."
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies","2 ⅛ cups roasted unsalted peanuts",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies","1 .25 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies","2 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies",".67 cup peanut oil",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies","3 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies","1 egg",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies","1 tablespoon water",
"Lunar New Year Peanut Cookies","54 peanuts peanuts",
"Step 1","Position a rack in center of oven and preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Pulse peanuts in a food processor until coarse crumbs form. Add confectioners' sugar; process just until mixture looks like fine crumbs and powder, stopping to scrape the bottom if needed. Do not overprocess."
"Step 3","Stir together 2 cups plus 2 tablespoons flour, salt, and baking powder in a large bowl. Stir in peanut mixture until well combined. Drizzle in oil and melted butter. Mix with hands and knead until a coarse dough, akin to Play-Doh®, forms, about 5 minutes. It will soften as you knead. If dough becomes oily or feels too soft, chill 15 minutes. If dough feels dry, add oil, 1 tablespoon at a time, until workable."
"Step 4","Roll dough into 1-inch balls; arrange 1 1/2 inches apart on prepared baking sheets. Lightly beat egg with water in a small bowl. Working with 1 sheet at a time and covering remaining sheet until ready to bake, lightly brush cookie tops with egg mixture. Press a whole peanut gently into the top of each ball."
"Step 5","Bake until light golden, 20 to 22 minutes. Transfer to wire racks to cool completely."
"Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar",".75 cup dark brown sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar",".25 cup cocoa",
"Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Combine all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Set aside."
"Step 2","In a 1 quart wide mouth canning jar, layer dark brown sugar, white sugar, cocoa, chopped pecans, and chocolate chips. Pack everything down firmly before you add flour mixture, it will be a snug fit."
"Step 3","Attach a tag with the following instructions: Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar: 1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) 2. Empty cookie mix into large bowl. Thoroughly blend mixture with hands. Mix in 3/4 cup softened butter or margarine, 1 egg, slightly beaten, and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Shape into walnut size balls, and place 2 inches apart on a parchment lined baking sheet. 3. Bake for 11 to 13 minutes. Cool 5 minutes on baking sheet, then move to wire racks."
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup cocoa powder",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup rice flour",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup tapioca flour",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup sorghum flour",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup chestnut flour",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies",".25 teaspoon xanthan gum",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies","4 ounces chocolate chips",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon gluten-free vanilla extract",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Gluten-Free Double Chocolate Cookies","4 ounces chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicon baking mat."
"Step 2","Mix white sugar, cocoa powder, rice flour, tapioca flour, sorghum flour, chestnut flour, baking soda, salt, and xanthan gum together in a large bowl."
"Step 3","Melt 4 ounces chocolate chips, with butter and vanilla extract in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching. Remove from heat."
"Step 4","Stir eggs into the flour mixture; slowly pour melted chocolate mixture into flour mixture. Stir until incorporated. Fold 4 ounces chocolate chips into the batter."
"Step 5","Drop batter roughly in a ball shape, 1 tablespoon per cookie, onto the prepared baking sheet, keeping balls 2 inches apart."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are spread and top surface is slightly cracked, 12 to 15 minutes. Cool on the pan for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack to allow cookies to set."
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Winter Energy Cookies",".33 cup molasses",
"Winter Energy Cookies",".33 cup smooth peanut butter",
"Winter Energy Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 .5 cups whole wheat flour",
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 cup toasted wheat germ",
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Winter Energy Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Winter Energy Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Winter Energy Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Winter Energy Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Cream the butter, sugar, molasses, and peanut butter in a large bowl. Blend in the eggs and vanilla. Mix the flour, wheat germ, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon in a separate bowl. Stir the dry ingredients into the creamed mixture, until evenly blended."
"Step 2","Stir in the oats, raisins, choc chips, and nuts. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Shape dough into large balls using 1/4 cup of dough per cookie. Place on greased cookie sheets, leaving 3 inches between them. Flatten slightly with a fork. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes. When done, the tops will still be soft to the touch. Cool on the sheets for 5 minutes, then transfer to a rack to cool."
"Butter Snow Flakes","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Butter Snow Flakes",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Butter Snow Flakes",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Butter Snow Flakes","1 cup butter",
"Butter Snow Flakes","1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Butter Snow Flakes","1 cup white sugar",
"Butter Snow Flakes","1 egg yolk",
"Butter Snow Flakes","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Butter Snow Flakes","1 teaspoon orange zest",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Sift together the flour, salt, and cinnamon; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together butter and cream cheese. Add sugar and egg yolk; beat until light and fluffy. Stir in the vanilla and orange zest. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Fill a cookie press or pastry bag with dough, and form cookies on an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the cookies are golden brown on the peaks and on the bottoms. Remove from cookie sheets at once to cool on wire racks."
"Classic Butter Cookies I","1 cup butter",
"Classic Butter Cookies I","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Classic Butter Cookies I","1 egg",
"Classic Butter Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Classic Butter Cookies I","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Classic Butter Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Classic Butter Cookies I","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Classic Butter Cookies I",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream the butter in a large mixing bowl, gradually add the sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg and vanilla."
"Step 2","Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture."
"Step 3","For all the types of cookie shapes preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) before baking. Bake all cookies on an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Shape the dough in one of the following ways: Roll out the chilled dough and cut with cookie cutters. Sprinkle with colored sugar if desired. Bake for 6 to 8 minutes."
"Step 5","OR: Form dough into logs 2 inches in diameter and slice 1/8 inch thick when chilled. Sprinkle with chopped nuts, if desired, and bake for 7 to 9 minutes."
"Step 6","OR: Shape into balls and bake. Balls may be rolled in sugar mixed with cinnamon if desired. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes."
"Step 7","OR: Put unchilled dough into a cookie press and press into desired shapes chill shaped cookies before baking. Bake chilled cookies for 8 to 10 minutes."
"Step 8","OR: Add 1 cup chopped walnuts and 1/2 cup flour to dough. Chill then shape into balls and bake for 8 to10 minutes. Roll still warm cookies in confectioners' sugar. Once cool sprinkle chilled cookies with more confectioners' sugar."
"Cinnabun Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cinnabun Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Cinnabun Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar",
"Cinnabun Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cinnabun Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cinnabun Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Cinnabun Cookies","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Cinnabun Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cinnabun Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Cinnabun Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Cinnabun Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Cinnabun Cookies",".25 cup butter",
"Cinnabun Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the 1/2 cup butter, shortening, light brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Combine the 1 tablespoon cinnamon, flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Cover and refrigerate dough for at least 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In a small microwave safe dish, heat the 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup of butter and 2 teaspoons cinnamon in the microwave. Stir frequently until butter is melted and the mixture is well blended."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll out each half of the dough to a 12x6 inch rectangle. Spread 1/3 of the cinnamon mixture over each rectangle. Roll each one lengthwise into a log. Cut into 1 inch segments. Use remaining filling to place a small dollop of the mixture onto the cookie sheet where each cookie will be placed, About every 3 inches. Place 1 cookie onto each dollop with the cut side down."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Flip cookie sheet over onto a tray to remove cookies while they are still very hot. If the cookies are stuck, heat the pan in the oven again for a few minutes to soften the cinnamon dollops."
"Danish Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Danish Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Danish Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Danish Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Danish Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Danish Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Danish Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup oatmeal",
"Danish Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Danish Oatmeal Cookies","1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a bowl, mix the flour, baking soda, and salt. In a separate large bowl, mix the butter, 1 cup confectioners' sugar, and vanilla until the mixture is smooth and creamy. Stir in the flour mixture; gently stir in the oatmeal and pecans and lightly mix until combined."
"Step 3","With a spoon, drop about 1 scant tablespoon of dough per cookie onto the prepared baking sheet. Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 20 minutes. Let cool completely before sprinkling cookies with confectioners' sugar."
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie","3 tablespoons white sugar",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 egg",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 .5 teaspoons instant espresso coffee powder",
"Neiman Marcus Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a cookie sheet."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and espresso powder; stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop dough by heaping tablespoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheet. Cookies should be 1 1/2 to 2 inches apart. You should have 12 to 15 large cookies."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. For crispier cookies, bake 2 minutes longer. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Cake Mix Cookies I","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Cake Mix Cookies I",".33 cup vegetable oil",
"Cake Mix Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cake Mix Cookies I","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Pour cake mix into a large bowl. Stir in the oil and eggs until well blended. Mix in chocolate chips. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from pan to cool on wire racks."
"Molasses Cookies II",".75 cup shortening",
"Molasses Cookies II","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Molasses Cookies II","1 egg",
"Molasses Cookies II",".5 cup light molasses",
"Molasses Cookies II","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Molasses Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Molasses Cookies II","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Molasses Cookies II",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Molasses Cookies II","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Molasses Cookies II","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Step 1","Cream together shortening and brown sugar. Stir in egg and molasses and mix well. Fold in dry ingredients and stir. Cover and chill until firm (1 - 2 hours)."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll dough into small balls (I use a small melon baller to help with this) and roll in white sugar. Place on lightly greased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 9 - 10 minutes. Leave on cookie sheet one minute until set.Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II",".5 cup lard",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II","3 tablespoons sour cream",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II","3 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream butter, lard and sugar. Add eggs and beat. Mix sour cream and baking soda together and add to egg mixture. Add flour and salt and mix well."
"Step 2","Chill dough until firm enough to roll."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll out dough and cut with cookie cutter. It's wise to keep dough in refrigerator between rolling out batches. Bake for 5 - 7 minutes."
"Better than Sex Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Better than Sex Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Better than Sex Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Better than Sex Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Better than Sex Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Better than Sex Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Better than Sex Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Better than Sex Cookies","1 .67 cups vanilla baking chips",
"Better than Sex Cookies","4 ounces macadamia nuts, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixer bowl, beat butter and sugar until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla extract; beat until light and fluffy."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, stir together flour, baking soda and salt; gradually blend into butter mixture."
"Step 4","Stir in vanilla chips, and macadamia nuts. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Bake for 9 minutes. (Do not overbake; cookies will be soft. They will puff while baking; flatten upon cooling.) Cool slightly, remove from cookie sheet to wire rack. Cool completely."
"Dirt Pudding","2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant French vanilla pudding mix",
"Dirt Pudding","3 cups milk",
"Dirt Pudding","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Dirt Pudding","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Dirt Pudding",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Dirt Pudding","1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed",
"Dirt Pudding","1 (14 ounce) package chocolate cream-filled sandwich cookies, crushed (divided)",
"Step 1","Whisk French vanilla pudding mix with milk in a large bowl until softly set, about 2 minutes. Pudding will thicken as it stands. Cream confectioners' sugar, cream cheese, and butter in a separate bowl until smooth and creamy. Stir cream cheese mixture into pudding until thoroughly combined; gently fold frozen whipped topping into the mixture."
"Step 2","Place half the cookie crumbs into the bottom of an 9x12-inch dish; retain remaining crumbs for topping. Spread the filling over the layer of cookie crumbs and top with remaining crumbs, covering completely. Chill for at least 30 minutes."
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".5 cup dark cocoa powder",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".33 cup white sugar",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".33 cup brown sugar",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs","1 egg",
"Homemade Chocolate Cookie Crumbs",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, cocoa powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Beat butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, and vanilla extract together with an electric mixer in another bowl until smooth and creamy. Gradually beat flour mixture into butter mixture until dough is just incorporated. Spread dough out onto prepared baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until set, about 14 minutes. Cool completely and crumble as desired."
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®","1 (16.5 ounce) roll Pillsbury® refrigerated chocolate chip cookie dough",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®",".33 cup all-purpose flour",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®",".5 cup finely chopped pecans",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®","24 caramels caramels, unwrapped",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®","2 tablespoons half-and-half",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®",".33 cup semisweet chocolate chips, melted",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies from Pillsbury®","1 teaspoon coarse sea salt",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F. In large bowl, break up cookie dough. Stir or knead in flour until well blended. Shape tablespoonfuls of dough into balls; roll in pecans, pressing into dough. Place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Bake 12 to 16 minutes or until edges are light golden brown. Using handle of wooden spoon, make indentation in center of each cookie. Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheet to cooling racks. Cool completely, about 20 minutes."
"Step 3","Meanwhile, in microwavable bowl, microwave caramels and half-and-half uncovered on High 1 to 2 minutes, stirring once, until caramels are melted. Spoon about 1 teaspoon caramel into indentation of each cookie. Cool 15 minutes."
"Step 4","Drizzle with melted chocolate; sprinkle with salt. Let stand about 15 minutes or until chocolate is set."
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 .25 cups sorghum flour",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 cup white rice flour",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 teaspoon xanthan gum",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","2 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Hemp Seed Cookies","1 cup hemp seed hearts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine sorghum flour, rice flour, baking soda, xanthan gum, and salt together in a large bowl."
"Step 3","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes. Beat eggs one at a time into the butter mixture; add vanilla extract. Pour butter mixture over flour mixture. Beat together until combined, about 2 minutes. Fold chocolate chips and hemp seeds into the cookie dough."
"Step 4","Place cookie dough in the refrigerator to firm up, at least 20 minutes."
"Step 5","Drop heaping tablespoons of dough 2 inches apart on baking sheets; press down with the back of the spoon to flatten slightly."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until cookie edges are lightly golden, 8 to 11 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool before taking off the parchment paper, about 10 minutes. Cool baking sheet before re-using for another batch."
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup evaporated milk",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Instant Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Step 1","In large bowl combine oats, vanilla and salt. Stir in pecans."
"Step 2","In a medium saucepan, combine sugar, evaporated milk, butter and cocoa. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat, stir in oats mixture."
"Step 3","Drop mixture by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let cool."
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 cup ground pecans",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".5 cup German sweet chocolate, grated",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Mexican Wedding Cookies",".25 cup German sweet chocolate, grated",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream the butter and 1/3 cup confectioner's sugar until light and fluffy. Add the vanilla extract."
"Step 2","In a separate bowl, combine the flour, ground pecans, 1/2 cup ground chocolate, cinnamon and salt; mix well."
"Step 3","Gradually add the dry ingredients to the creamed mixture."
"Step 4","Wrap dough in plastic wrap and chill 1 to 2 hours, or until firm."
"Step 5","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 6","Shape the dough into 1-inch balls. Place balls 1 inch apart on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 15 to 18 minutes, or until the cookies are firm to the touch. Cool 1 minute on the baking sheet, then transfer to a wire rack."
"Step 7","For the coating, sift 1/2 cup of the confectioner's sugar and 1/4 cup of the ground cocoa into a shallow bowl. While cookies are still warm, roll them in the coating."
"Sesame Seed Cookies I","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I",".75 cup milk",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I",".063 teaspoon anise oil",
"Sesame Seed Cookies I","2 ounces sesame seeds",
"Step 1","Combine flour and sugar in a bowl. Cut in shortening with a pastry blender-or work with your hands - until mixture resembles coarse meal."
"Step 2","Add anise oil (optional) small amount for it is very strong, to 1/2 cup of the milk and add to flour mixture. Gradually add more of the milk mixing until dough holds together."
"Step 3","Pull off small portions of dough and roll between palms of the hands into a roll about finger size. Roll in sesame seeds. Seeds stick better if put in sugared water and taken out and put on a clean lintless cloth. Roll on cloth with seeds, then flatten out too about 1/4-inch thickness. Cut into 2 inch strips, place on ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove, cool completely, then store in an airtight container."
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 cup chopped dark chocolate",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 cup brewed coffee, cooled",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 tablespoons heavy cream",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 teaspoons red sugar sprinkles",
"Chocolate Coffee Molasses Cookies","2 teaspoons green sugar sprinkles",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Gently melt the chocolate in a small saucepan over very low heat, and allow to cool for about 5 minutes. Stir the butter and sugar together in a large bowl, and mix in the chocolate, molasses, eggs, and vanilla extract."
"Step 3","Sift 5 cups of flour with the cinnamon, cloves, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. Gradually stir the flour mixture into the chocolate mixture by cupfuls, alternating each addition of flour with about 2 tablespoons of coffee, until all the coffee is incorporated. Dough should be soft but not runny. Add more flour if needed to make a soft dough, but cookies will be dry if the dough is too stiff. Use a small scoop or melon baller to form 1-inch balls, and place them on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are set and just beginning to brown at the edges, about 10 minutes. Let cool on sheets for about 1 minute before removing to continue cooling on a rack until slightly warm, 8 to 10 minutes."
"Step 5","To make frosting, stir together confectioners' sugar, cream, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract in a bowl until smooth. Frost the cookies while they're still a little warm. Sprinkle with red or green sugar sprinkles."
"Molasses Cookies IV","2 cups white sugar",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 cup shortening",
"Molasses Cookies IV","2 large eggs eggs",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Molasses Cookies IV",".67 cup molasses",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Molasses Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Molasses Cookies IV","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Molasses Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Molasses Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Stir in the eggs, vanilla and molasses. Sift together the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger and salt; stir into the molasses mixture. Shape dough into a log 2 inches in diameter. Wrap in wax paper and refrigerate overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees c). Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Unwrap cookie dough, and cut into 1/4 to 1/2 inch slices. Place on prepared cookie sheets and bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".5 cup butter, melted",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners","1 egg",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".75 cup Stevia Extract In The Raw™",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners",".5 cup macadamia nuts",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from In The Raw Sweeteners","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. In a large bowl, beat together the melted butter, egg, vanilla extract and Sugar In The Raw® (or Sugar In The Raw®/Stevia In The Raw® combo)."
"Step 2","Meanwhile, mix dry ingredients (flour, baking soda, salt) in a separate bowl. Add dry ingredients to wet ingredients and stir well to combine. Slowly add nuts and chocolate chips until well combined."
"Step 3","Drop the dough in spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 10 minutes."
"Snickerdoodles II","1 cup shortening",
"Snickerdoodles II","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 .75 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Snickerdoodles II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Snickerdoodles II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Snickerdoodles II","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the shortening and 1 1/2 cups of white sugar until smooth. Stir in the eggs one at a time, blending well after each. Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt; stir into the batter until blended."
"Step 3","Roll the dough into balls the size of small walnuts. Roll in a mixture of 2 tablespoons sugar and 2 teaspoons cinnamon. Place 2 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned, but still soft."
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 egg",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Spritz (Cookie Press)","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter in a large mixing bowl using an electric mixer until creamy; add sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder. Beat until combined. Scrape sides of bowl down if needed. Stir egg and vanilla extract into butter mixture until just combined; mix in flour."
"Step 3","Fill the cookie press with dough; press cookies onto an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes."
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Mrs. Schaller's Sugar Cookies","1 cup buttermilk",
"Step 1","In a mixing bowl, cream sugar, butter and vanilla until light colored. Beat in eggs."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, sift together flour and baking powder. In a separate small bowl, dissolve the baking soda in the buttermilk. Stir the egg mixture and buttermilk mixture into the dry incrementally. The dough should be stiff. Refrigerate overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll dough out on a lightly floured surface to 1/4 inch thick. Cut with cookie cutters and arrange on cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 8 to 10 minutes."
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 pinch sea salt",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar, packed",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs, lightly beaten",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chunks",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup sweetened shredded coconut",
"Easy German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 cup pecans, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with a silicone baking mats or parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add flour mixture to butter mixture, 1/4 cup at a time, until dough is well-combined. Gently stir chocolate chunks, coconut, and pecans into dough. Scoop dough in 1-inch balls onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are set, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool completely."
"Ceramic Mold Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies","1 egg",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Ceramic Mold Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Step 1","Thoroughly cream the butter by hand. Add sugar and mix til fluffy. Beat in the egg and then the milk or cream."
"Step 2","In a separate bowl mix together all the dry ingredients. Stir them into the butter. Knead the dough for just a minute. Chill the dough until firm."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Form the cookies as directed above. Bake for 10 - 12 minutes or until the edges brown. *Quantity will vary depending on the size of your ceramic molds."
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","2 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".5 pound fresh figs",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".33 cup honey",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Fig Thumbprint Cookies","1 tablespoon lemon juice, or to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat sugar and butter with an electric mixer in a large bowl until fluffy. Beat eggs in, one at a time, until combined; stir in vanilla extract. Fold in flour mixture until well blended."
"Step 4","Combine figs, honey, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in a food processor; pulse until smooth. Stir in lemon juice until filling is slightly thinner than jam."
