"Step 5","Shape dough into 1-inch balls; place on a non-stick baking sheet. Make thumbprints in batter with a wet finger. Spoon 1 teaspoon of filling into each thumbprint."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","2 cups raisins, soaked in water and drained",
"Helen's Raisin Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Stir in the eggs, one at a time, and then the vanilla. Mix in the flour and baking soda until combined. Then stir in the raisins just enough to distribute evenly."
"Step 3","Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on wire racks."
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®",".5 cup butter or margarine, melted",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®","1 (7 ounce) package flaked coconut",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®","1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®","1 (12 ounce) package semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars by EAGLE BRAND®",".5 cup Jif® Creamy Peanut Butter",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (325 degrees F for glass dish). In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter; mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan. Top evenly with coconut then pour sweetened condensed milk evenly over coconut layer."
"Step 2","Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned."
"Step 3","In small saucepan, over low heat, melt chocolate chips with peanut butter. Spread evenly over hot coconut layer."
"Step 4","Cool 30 minutes. Chill thoroughly. Cut into bars. Garnish as desired. Store loosely covered at room temperature.Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".5 teaspoon kosher salt",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".25 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".5 teaspoon ginger",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".25 teaspoon allspice",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles","⅛ teaspoon nutmeg",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".33 cup light brown sugar, packed",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles","1 large egg",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles","2 teaspoons cinnamon",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles",".25 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chef John's Pumpkin Spice Snickerdoodles","1 tablespoon milk, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a rimmed baking sheet with a silicone mat or parchment paper."
"Step 2","Place flour, salt, baking soda, and cream of tartar in a mixing bowl. Add cinnamon, ginger, allspice, clove, and nutmeg. Whisk until thoroughly mixed, 1 or 2 minutes."
"Step 3","Place butter, sugar, and brown sugar in a separate mixing bowl. Cream together with a spatula or wooden spoon until mixture is smooth, 2 or 3 minutes. Add vanilla and egg. Stir until thoroughly combined."
"Step 4","Pour flour mixture into butter mixture. Stir until just combined or until the flour disappears."
"Step 5","Wrap bowl in plastic wrap. Chill dough in refrigerator for about 1 hour."
"Step 6","Stir cinnamon and sugar together in a shallow bowl or plate."
"Step 7","Scoop dough into 2 tablespoon balls. Roll in cinnamon-sugar mixture to coat all sides. Roll into smooth ball and place on prepared baking sheet, 3 to 4 inches apart. Flatten slightly."
"Step 8","Bake in preheated oven until browned, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Step 9","Cool on baking sheet 5 minutes; sprinkle with additional cinnamon-sugar mixture, if desired. Transfer cookies to cooling rack to cool completely."
"Step 10","If you'd like to add a bit of a shine to your cookies, you can brush them with a simple glaze. Mix confectioners' sugar with milk or lemon juice to achieve brushing consistency. Brush onto cookies. Sprinkle with more cinnamon sugar or pumpkin pie spice, if desired."
"Quinoa Cookies",".67 cup water",
"Quinoa Cookies",".33 cup quinoa",
"Quinoa Cookies","1 cup shredded coconut",
"Quinoa Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Quinoa Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Quinoa Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Quinoa Cookies","2 eaches ripe bananas, mashed",
"Quinoa Cookies",".5 cup applesauce",
"Quinoa Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Quinoa Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Quinoa Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Quinoa Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Quinoa Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Quinoa Cookies",".75 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Bring water and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan. Place a cover on the saucepan, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook at a simmer until the moisture is absorbed completely, 15 to 20 minutes."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 baking sheets."
"Step 3","Mix cooked quinoa, coconut, oats, flour, brown sugar, mashed bananas, applesauce, peanut butter, vanilla, salt, baking soda, and baking powder together in a large bowl. Fold chocolate chips into the quinoa mixture; drop by spoonful onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until browned around the edges, 20 to 25 minutes. Allow cookies to set up a few minutes before transferring to a cooling rack"
"Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package spice cake mix",
"Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 cup quick cooking oats",
"Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Combine cake mix, oats, eggs, and oil in large bowl. Beat at low speed with electric mixer until blended. Stir in raisins."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto baking sheets. Bake for 7-9 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool 1 minute on baking sheet."
"Karen's Rolled Sugar Cookies","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Karen's Rolled Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Karen's Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Karen's Rolled Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Karen's Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Karen's Rolled Sugar Cookies",".75 cup sugar",
"Karen's Rolled Sugar Cookies","2 large egg yolks large egg yolks",
"Karen's Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Combine flour, baking powder and salt in large bowl; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat butter and sugar with electric mixer until fluffy, about 3 minutes. Beat in egg yolks and vanilla. Gradually add flour mixture and combine."
"Step 3","Wrap dough in parchment paper and place in Hefty® Slider bag; refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line cookie sheets with Reynolds® Parchment Paper; set aside."
"Step 5","Roll out dough 1/8-inch thick between 2 lightly floured sheets of parchment paper. Cut dough with 2 inch cookie cutters. Place dough on parchment-lined cookie sheets."
"Step 6","Bake 6 to 8 minutes or until cookies are lightly browned on edges. Slide parchment paper with cookies onto cooling rack; cool."
"Step 7","Decorate as desired. Store in airtight containers for up to 5 days."
"Zucchini Cookies",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Zucchini Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Zucchini Cookies","1 egg",
"Zucchini Cookies","1 cup grated zucchini",
"Zucchini Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Zucchini Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Zucchini Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Zucchini Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Zucchini Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Zucchini Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg then stir in the zucchini. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon; stir into the zucchini mixture. Mix in raisins. Cover dough and chill for at least 1 hour or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet. Cookies should be about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven until set. Allow cookies to cool slightly on the cookie sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie","3 tablespoons margarine",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie",".563 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Snaps Sugar Cookie",".5 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt; set aside. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt margarine. Stir in cocoa, remove from heat and set aside to cool. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, 1 cup white sugar and brown sugar until fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the cocoa mixture and the vanilla. Blend in the sifted ingredients to form a soft dough. Cover dough and refrigerate for at least an hour or two."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Roll chilled dough into 1 inch balls, roll them in the remaining sugar and place them 2 to 3 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Thin Mint Crackers","1 pound bittersweet chocolate",
"Thin Mint Crackers","80 eaches buttery round crackers",
"Thin Mint Crackers",".5 teaspoon peppermint extract",
"Step 1","Using a double boiler method, melt the chocolate coatings over hot tap water for 15 - 20 minutes. Stir . Do not cook or get water into the chocolate."
"Step 2","After it is melted, stir in a couple drops of peppermint flavor into the chocolate."
"Step 3","Dip crackers into the melted chocolate and then place onto a cold cookie sheet and put into the refrigerator to set. (A freezing tray to rest the dipped cookies will keep the bottoms neat looking.)"
"Step 4","In a few minutes take them out and package in candy cups. The cookies are best kept at room temperature or a cool dry place away from any odors."
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 .25 cups packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat together margarine and sugars until creamy. Add eggs, milk and vanilla; beat well. Add combined flour, baking soda and salt; mix well. Stir in oats, chocolate chips and nuts; mix well."
"Step 3","Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 9-10 minutes. Cool for 1 minute on cookie sheet; remove to wire rack."
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Grammy Burnham's Molasses Cookies","1 .5 cups raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together shortening and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the molasses. Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, allspice, and ginger; blend into the molasses mixture. Stir in raisins. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in preheated oven, or until the center is set. Cool on wire racks."
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II","1 egg",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II","1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II",".5 cup sweetened condensed milk",
"Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies II","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat the butter and sugar together in a bowl. Add egg and vanilla and beat well. Add the flour, cocoa powder, salt, baking soda, and baking powder and stir until smooth. Roll the mixture into 1-inch balls about the size of a walnut (larger if desired). Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Press center of each ball with thumb."
"Step 3","Drain cherries and reserve juice. Place a cherry in indentation of each cookie ball."
"Step 4","In a saucepan, heat condensed milk and chocolate chips until chips are melted. Stir in 4 teaspoons of cherry juice. Spoon about 1 teaspoon of mixture over each cherry and spread to cover cherry. (More cherry juice may be added to keep frosting of spreading consistency.)"
"Step 5","Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes."
"Dutch Letter Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dutch Letter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Dutch Letter Cookies","1 cup butter, chilled",
"Dutch Letter Cookies",".33 cup ice water",
"Dutch Letter Cookies","8 ounces almond paste",
"Dutch Letter Cookies","1 egg",
"Dutch Letter Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Dutch Letter Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Dutch Letter Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, stir together flour and salt. Cut in chilled butter until the texture of the mix is mealy with pea sized lumps."
"Step 2","Add ice water gradually while stirring with a wooden spoon until dough forms a ball. Cover your dough and chill for 1/2 hour."
"Step 3","To make filling, in a small bowl, mix together the almond paste and sugar. Add the egg and mix well."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C )."
"Step 5","On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/4 to 1/8 inch thickness, making as square as possible. Cut the dough into strips 6 inches long and 1 1/2 inches wide (about the width of a ruler). Using a pastry bag or a strong plastic bag with a small hole cut from the corner, pipe almond filling down the center of the strip starting halfway down. Fold the top half of the strip down over the almond filling to match the bottom."
"Step 6","Shape strips into desired letters, brush with milk and sprinkle with sugar. Bake in preheated oven for about 20 minutes or until golden brown. If you are using all butter in your recipe, check after 15 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool on a wire rack."
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies","2 cups lard",
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies","2 teaspoons anise seed",
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies",".25 cup brandy",
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Biscochitos Traditional Cookies","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Sift the flour, baking powder and salt into a bowl, and set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the lard and 1 1/2 cups sugar until smooth. Mix in the anise seed, and beat until fluffy. Stir in the eggs one at a time. Add the sifted ingredients and brandy, and stir until well blended."
"Step 3","On a floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/2 or 1/4 inch thickness, and cut into desired shapes using cookie cutters. The traditional is fleur-de-lis. Place cookies onto baking sheets. Mix together the 1/4 cup of sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle over the tops of the cookies."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the bottoms are lightly browned."
"Sugar and Spice Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar and Spice Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Sugar and Spice Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Sugar and Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Sugar and Spice Cookies","1 pinch ground cloves",
"Sugar and Spice Cookies",".5 cup softened butter",
"Sugar and Spice Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Sugar and Spice Cookies","1 egg",
"Sugar and Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Mix the flour, the baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves together in a bowl."
"Step 2","Cream the butter and brown sugar together with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth; beat the egg and vanilla extract into the butter mixture. Add the flour mixture in small amount to the butter mixture, beating each addition until blended. Form the dough into a ball, wrap with plastic wrap, and refrigerate at least 1 hour or up to 3 days."
"Step 3","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets."
"Step 4","Roll the dough out on a floured work surface with a rolling pin to about 1/8-inch thickness. Cut with 2-inch cookie cutters. Arrange the cut cookies onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges begin to brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Peanut Butter Temptations II",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Temptations II",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Temptations II",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Temptations II",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Temptations II","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Temptations II",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Temptations II","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Temptations II",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Temptations II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Temptations II","36 eaches miniature chocolate covered peanut butter cups, unwrapped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the brown sugar, white sugar and butter. Stir in the peanut butter, then the egg and vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt, stir into the peanut butter mixture until the dough comes together. Shape into 1 inch balls and press them into the cups of an unprepared mini muffin pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. As soon as the cookies come out of the oven, press a mini chocolate covered peanut butter cup down into the center of each cookie until only the top is showing. Allow the cookies to cool completely before removing from their pans."
"Rugelach","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Rugelach",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Rugelach","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Rugelach","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese",
"Rugelach",".33 cup sour cream",
"Rugelach",".5 cup white sugar",
"Rugelach","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Rugelach","1 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Rugelach",".5 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Cut cold butter or margarine and cream cheese into bits. In food processor pulse flour, salt, butter or margarine, cream cheese and sour cream until crumbly."
"Step 2","Shape crumbly mixture into four equal disks. Wrap each disk and chill 2 hours or up to 2 days."
"Step 3","Combine sugar, cinnamon, chopped walnuts, and finely chopped raisins (may substitute miniature chocolate chips for raisins)."
"Step 4","Roll each disk into a 9 inch round keeping other disks chilled until ready to roll them. Sprinkle round with sugar/nut mixture. Press lightly into dough. With chefs knife or pizza cutter, cut each round into 12 wedges. Roll wedges from wide to narrow, you will end up with point on outside of cookie. Place on ungreased baking sheets and chill rugelach 20 minutes before baking."
"Step 5","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 6","After rugelach are chilled, bake them in the center rack of your oven 22 minutes until lightly golden. Cool on wire racks. Store in airtight containers...they freeze very well."
"Step 7","Variations: Before putting the filling on the dough, use a pastry brush to layer apricot jam as well as brown sugar. Then add the recommended filling. You may also make a mixture of cinnamon and sugar and roll the rugelach in this prior to putting them on the cookie sheets."
"Pumpkin Spice Cookie","1 (18.25 ounce) package spice cake mix",
"Pumpkin Spice Cookie","1 (15 ounce) can solid pack pumpkin",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the cake mix and pumpkin until well blended. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 18 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Raspberry Star Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Raspberry Star Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Raspberry Star Cookies","1 egg",
"Raspberry Star Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Raspberry Star Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Raspberry Star Cookies","1 (8 ounce) jar raspberry preserves",
"Raspberry Star Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Raspberry Star Cookies","2 teaspoons almond extract",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg. Combine the flour and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Dough will be stiff. On a lightly floured surface, roll half of the dough out to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut into star shapes using a cookie cutter. Set cookies 1 inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Place a teaspoon of jam onto each cookie and spread out towards the points of the stars. Roll out remaining half of the dough and cut into stars the same size. cut holes in the center of each star, then place them onto the jam stars."
"Step 3","Bake for 7 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden around the edges. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks. In a small bowl, mix together the confectioners' sugar and almond extract to form a glaze. Add water a teaspoon at a time if the mixture is too thick to drizzle. Drizzle glaze over cooled cookies."
"Gingerbread Cookie Mix in a Jar","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Gingerbread Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Gingerbread Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Gingerbread Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Gingerbread Cookie Mix in a Jar","2 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Gingerbread Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Gingerbread Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Gingerbread Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Gingerbread Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Step 1","Mix 2 cups of the flour with the baking soda and baking powder. Mix the remaining 1 1/2 cups flour with the ginger, cloves, cinnamon, and allspice. In a 1 quart, wide mouth canning jar, layer the ingredients starting with the flour and baking powder mixture, then the brown sugar, and finally the flour and spice mixture. Pack firmly between layers."
"Step 2","Attach a card to the jar with the following directions: Gingerbread Cookies 1. Empty contents of jar into a large mixing bowl. Stir to blend together. Mix in 1/2 cup softened butter or margarine, 3/4 cup molasses, and 1 slightly beaten egg. Dough will be very stiff, so you may need to use your hands. Cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour. 2. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 3. Roll dough to 1/4 inch thick on a lightly floured surface. Cut into shapes with a cookie cutter. Place cookies on a lightly greased cookie sheet about 2 inches apart. 4. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven. Decorate as desired."
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 cup white sugar",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 egg",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 cup canned pumpkin puree",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Pumpkin Cookies VII","1 (16 ounce) container cream cheese frosting",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter flavored shortening and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla, then stir in the pumpkin puree. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and vanilla instant pudding mix; gradually mix into the pumpkin mixture. Roll into walnut sized balls and place them 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned at the edges. Allow to cool completely before frosting with cream cheese frosting."
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups mini semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (6 ounce) package almond brickle chips",
"Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix sugars, butter and shortening until light and fluffy. Mix in egg and vanilla. Stir in flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt. Stir in chocolate chips and brickle chips."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheet. Make 9-10 minutes until lightly brown.Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup solid vegetable oil-butter spread (such as Smart Balance® sticks), softened",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups shredded unsweetened coconut",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups whole wheat flour",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup dark chocolate chips",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped unsalted almonds",
"Soft Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon plain Greek yogurt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat brown sugar, vegetable oil butter spread, and egg with an electric mixer in a bowl until smooth. Stir in vanilla extract, baking soda, and salt. Add coconut, flour, and oats; stir until just moistened. Fold in chocolate chips, almonds, and yogurt."
"Step 3","Drop spoonfuls of the dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 9 to 11 minutes."
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon peppermint extract",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup cocoa powder",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Minty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .67 cups mint chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter, white sugar, brown sugar, peppermint extract, vanilla extract, and salt together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Beat eggs into butter mixture until well incorporated."
"Step 3","Whisk flour, cocoa powder, and baking soda together in a bowl; gradually add to creamed butter mixture, beating until dough is well blended. Fold chocolate chips into dough. Drop dough by rounded teaspoons onto a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are set in the middle, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool cookies on the baking sheet for about 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","2 .25 cups cake flour",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","1 .25 teaspoons baking powder",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies",".5 cup vegetable shortening",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","4 ounces almond paste",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","2 large eggs",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon juice",
"Gina's Italian Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon almond extract",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine cake flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium bowl."
"Step 3","Combine butter, sugar, and shortening in a large bowl; cream with an electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy. Mix in almond paste until thoroughly combined. Add eggs, vanilla extract, lemon juice, and almond extract. Reduce the mixing speed to low and slowly add dry ingredients. Scrape down the bowl once all dry ingredients are added, then mix on medium speed until evenly combined, about 30 seconds."
"Step 4","Fit a large pastry bag with an 864 or 4S tip and fill bag with batter. Pipe evenly sized cookies onto an ungreased cookie sheet 1 1/2 to 2 inches apart, giving cookies space to puff slightly during baking."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven, in batches if necessary, until bottom edges are slightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Fruit Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Fruit Cookies",".5 cup whole bran cereal",
"Fruit Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Fruit Cookies",".33 cup vegetable oil",
"Fruit Cookies","2 medium (7 to 7-7/8 long)s bananas, mashed",
"Fruit Cookies",".5 cup finely chopped almonds",
"Fruit Cookies","1 .5 cups dried apricots, chopped",
"Fruit Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In large bowl, combine oil, bananas, and vanilla until smooth. Mix in oats, oat bran cereal and salt. Fold in apricots and almonds. Drop dough by spoonfuls 2 inches apart on cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until edges are light brown."
"Aaron's Chocolate Chunk Oatmeal Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package white cake mix",
"Aaron's Chocolate Chunk Oatmeal Cookies","1 (3.4 ounce) package instant butterscotch pudding mix",
"Aaron's Chocolate Chunk Oatmeal Cookies",".67 cup rolled oats",
"Aaron's Chocolate Chunk Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Aaron's Chocolate Chunk Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup sour cream",
"Aaron's Chocolate Chunk Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Aaron's Chocolate Chunk Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Aaron's Chocolate Chunk Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together cake mix, instant pudding, and rolled oats. Add oil, sour cream, water, and vanilla; mix until smooth and well blended. Stir in chocolate chips. Roll dough into 1 1/2 inch balls, and place 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies",".75 cup Ghirardelli® 60% Cacao Bittersweet Chocolate Chips",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies","1 tablespoon Ghirardelli® Unsweetened Cocoa Powder",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies","6 tablespoons butter, softened",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies","1 cup soft brown sugar",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies","2 small eggs",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies","2 .25 cups Ghirardelli® 60% Cacao Bittersweet Chocolate Chips",
"Ghirardelli's® Hot Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow Cookies","30 regulars large marshmallows",
"Step 1","Melt 3/4 cup chocolate chips gently in the microwave or over a pot of simmering water (bain marie). Set aside to cool."
"Step 2","Sift flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl, and stir together."
"Step 3","Beat the butter and sugar together until thick and creamy. Beat in eggs one by one. Add cooled melted chocolate and vanilla extract. Continue beating until ingredients are well mixed."
"Step 4","Fold dry ingredients and 2 1/4 cups chocolate chips into the mix and stir until combined."
"Step 5","Scoop cookie with a 1 tablespoon scoop (if the mix is soft you can pop it in the fridge to stiffen up and this will make it easier to scoop)."
"Step 6","Bake at 350 degrees F for 8 to 9 minutes. Take care not to overbake as these cookies should be almost brownie-like."
"Step 7","Once baked, pop a marshmallow on top and put it back in the oven on broil for 1-2 minutes for a lovely toasted effect."
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","1 .33 tablespoons ground cloves",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","1 .33 tablespoons ground nutmeg",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","2 cups shortening",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","1 cup fructose (fruit sugar)",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Fructose Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon zest",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, combine the flours, baking soda, cream of tartar, cloves, nutmeg, cinnamon and salt. In another bowl, cream the shortening, and fructose. Beat in the eggs, lemon zest and dry ingredients. Mix until well blended. Cover dough and refrigerate for 24 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Drop dough by spoonfuls 1 1/2 inches apart onto cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes until lightly colored. Let cool on wire racks."
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups raisins",
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped walnuts",
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup sour cream",
"Sour Cream Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with aluminum foil or baking parchment."
"Step 2","Steam raisins in a vegetable steamer over shallow water in a saucepan. Boil water for 3 minutes, until raisins are moist. Remove raisins and let dry on cloth."
"Step 3","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, sugar and vanilla until smooth. Beat in eggs and sour cream until well blended. Sift together flour and baking soda; stir into the butter mixture. Mix in raisins, nuts and chocolate. Drop dough by tablespoons 2 inches apart on cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 13 to 15 minutes, until lightly colored. Let cool on wire racks."
"Peanut Butter Haystacks","1 cup butterscotch chips",
"Peanut Butter Haystacks",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Haystacks",".5 cup salted peanuts",
"Peanut Butter Haystacks","2 cups chow mein noodles",
"Step 1","Melt butterscotch chips and peanut butter on top of a double boiler, or in a microwave. Blend together."
"Step 2","Stir peanuts and noodles gently into the melted peanut butter mixture."
"Step 3","Drop dough by forkfuls onto waxed paper. Cool until set."
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 tablespoon maraschino cherry juice",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup maraschino cherries, drained and chopped",
"Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift together flour, baking soda and salt."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, cream together shortening, butter or margarine, sugar, eggs, cherry juice and vanilla. Stir in flour mixture and mix well."
"Step 4","Blend in oatmeal, chopped cherries and chopped nuts. Mix well."
"Step 5","Roll into balls the size of walnuts and slightly mash down. Bake to a golden brown, 8 - 10 minutes."
"Fortune Cookies III","5 tablespoons unsalted butter",
"Fortune Cookies III","4 large egg whites egg whites",
"Fortune Cookies III","1 cup super fine sugar",
"Fortune Cookies III","1 cup sifted all-purpose flour",
"Fortune Cookies III","1 pinch salt",
"Fortune Cookies III","3 tablespoons heavy whipping cream",
"Fortune Cookies III","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Coat baking sheet with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Melt butter in a small saucepan over low heat."
"Step 3","In bowl of an electric mixer, combine egg whites and sugar; beat on medium speed for about 30 seconds. Add flour and salt; beat until mixed."
"Step 4","Add butter, heavy cream and almond extract; beat until mixed."
"Step 5","Pour 1 tablespoon batter onto half the baking sheet. Spread with a spoon into a thin 5 inch circle; repeat on other half of sheet. Bake until edges turn golden brown, about 8 minutes."
"Step 6","Place baking sheet on a heat-resistant surface. Working quickly, slide a spatula under one cookie. Lift and place on a dish towel. Fold cookie in half, pinching at top to form loose semicircle. Insert index fingers into ends; press indentation into center of cookie while bending ends together to form shape of a fortune cookie. This should take about 10 seconds. Once the cookie hardens, you cannot fold it. Repeat with other cookies. Write your message on long strips of sturdy art paper, and thread through cooled cookie."
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup coconut sugar",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup coconut oil",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons hot water",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup dark chocolate chips (such as Ghirardelli® 60% Cacao)",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup chia seeds",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup ground flax seeds",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup cocoa nibs",
"Super Food Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat brown sugar, coconut sugar, butter, and coconut oil with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat the first egg into creamed butter mixture until completely blended; beat in vanilla extract with the last egg."
"Step 3","Stir hot water and baking soda together in a small bowl until baking soda is dissolved; stir into butter mixture. Add cream of tartar and mix well."
"Step 4","Mix flour into butter mixture until dough is smooth; fold in walnuts, chia seeds, flax seeds, cocoa nibs, and salt. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto prepared baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned around the edges, about 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool."
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup buttermilk",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup honey",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Giant Toffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped white chocolate",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix brown sugar, buttermilk, shortening, honey, and egg. Stir in flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Stir in chocolate chips and chopped white chocolate."
"Step 3","Drop dough by level 1/4 cupfuls about 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 12 to 14 minutes, or until edges are golden brown. Cool for 4 minutes, and remove from cookie sheets."
"Snowflake Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Snowflake Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Snowflake Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Snowflake Cookies","3 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Snowflake Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons salt",
"Snowflake Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream the shortening with the sugar. Add the eggs and vanilla and mix well. Sift the flour and salt into the creamed mixture and stir in gradually. Chill dough for at least one hour."
"Step 3","Roll the chilled dough out to 1/8 inch thick and cut into desired shapes. Bake on an ungreased baking sheet for 6 to 8 minutes. Allow cookies to cool before decorating."
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies I","2 cups white sugar",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies I",".5 cup milk",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies I",".25 cup butter",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies I","2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies I","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies I",".5 cup peanut butter",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies I","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Combine sugar, milk, butter and cocoa in a saucepan and bring to a boil, cooking 1 minute."
"Step 2","Remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir and mix well."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoons onto wax paper, letting stand 30 minutes or when dry and cool. Store in well-sealed container."
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies","1 .75 cups rolled oats",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup English toffee-flavored baking bits (such as Heath®)",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup persimmon puree",
"Persimmon Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk oats, flour, toffee bits, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon, and cloves together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat brown sugar and butter together in a bowl with an electric mixer until creamy, 2 minutes. Beat in egg. Beat persimmon puree and vanilla into butter mixture."
"Step 4","Mix flour mixture into persimmon mixture until dough is just moistened and no streaks of flour or oats remain. Drop spoonfuls of dough 1 1/2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until slightly browned on the edges, 8 to 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 10 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Hazelnut and Almond Cookies","8 large egg whites egg whites",
"Hazelnut and Almond Cookies","1 .75 cups white sugar",
"Hazelnut and Almond Cookies","2 .5 cups hazelnuts, skinned and chopped",
"Hazelnut and Almond Cookies","2 .5 cups chopped almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (160 degrees C). Grease cookies sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat egg whites until frothy. Add sugar and beat until mixture is thick and white. Stir in chopped almonds and chopped hazelnuts."
"Step 3","Pour mixture into saucepan over low heat, stirring with a wooden spoon until thick and beige, about 10 minutes. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheets about 1 inch apart."
"Step 4","Bake about 20 minutes, until cookies are dry to the touch. Let cool on wire rack."
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","1 cup butter",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Cream Cheese Cookies II","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together white and brown sugars, butter or margarine, eggs, baking soda, salt, and vanilla. Spoon in flour and mix well. Mix in 1 cup chopped pecans."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoon onto cookie sheets. Bake 8 to 10 minutes. Let cookies cool, then place filling on one cookie and put together like a sandwich."
"Step 4","To Make Filling: Mix together cream cheese, confectioner's sugar and 1 cup chopped pecans (optional). Spread on cooled cookies."
"Hobo Cookies","12 large eggs eggs",
"Hobo Cookies","4 cups white sugar",
"Hobo Cookies","4 cups packed brown sugar",
"Hobo Cookies","1 tablespoon light corn syrup",
"Hobo Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Hobo Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Hobo Cookies","2 cups butter",
"Hobo Cookies","2 cups peanut butter",
"Hobo Cookies","18 cups rolled oats",
"Hobo Cookies","3 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Hobo Cookies","3 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Step 1","Beat together the eggs, sugars, syrup, butter or margarine, vanilla, and peanut butter. Add the baking soda, and beat well. Stir in the oats, chocolate chips and M&M candies."
"Step 2","Place dough by tablespoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 minutes. DO NOT OVERBAKE!!!!!!"
"Pecan Sandies","1 cup margarine, softened",
"Pecan Sandies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Pecan Sandies","1 cup white sugar",
"Pecan Sandies","1 cup confectioners' sugar, sifted",
"Pecan Sandies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pecan Sandies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pecan Sandies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pecan Sandies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pecan Sandies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Pecan Sandies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Pecan Sandies","2 cups chopped pecans",
"Pecan Sandies",".5 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, vegetable oil, 1 cup white sugar and confectioners' sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the pecans. Roll dough into 1 inch balls and roll each ball in remaining white sugar. Place the cookies 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are golden. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","2 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","4 cups white sugar",
"Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 teaspoon peppermint extract",
"Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 .5 cups unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together, butter, sugar and eggs. Mix in remaining ingredients. Blend well."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonful onto a cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8-9 minutes. Cookies will be soft. Cool about 1 minute on cookie sheet then remove to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","Recipe Variation: For a different flavor, omit peppermint extract and use a total of 2 teaspoons of vanilla. Also substitute peanut butter flavored chips for the chocolate chips."
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Cocoa Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter or margarine and sugars until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla; beat well. Add combined flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt; mix well. Stir in oats and raisins, mix well."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake 10 to 12 minutes, until cookies are almost set. Do not overbake. Cool 1 minute on cookies sheets, then move to wire racks. Cool - store tightly covered."
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger",".5 cup white sugar",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger",".75 cup unsalted butter",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger","1 egg white",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger","2 tablespoons dark corn syrup",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger","3 tablespoons chopped crystallized ginger",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Spice Cookies with Crystallized Ginger",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 large cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Add egg white, and corn syrup; mix until fluffy. Stir in the crystallized ginger. Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ground ginger, and cloves; stir into the egg mixture. When dough starts to come together, mix with your hands to form a smooth dough."
"Step 3","Form dough into 1 inch balls and roll in white sugar. Place balls on a cookie sheet 2 inches apart, and press down with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar. Bake in the preheated oven for 12 to 15 minutes, cookies should be golden brown. Let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before Moving to a rack to cool completely. Dip 1/2 of each cookie into confectioners' sugar for decoration."
"Hermit Bar Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Hermit Bar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Hermit Bar Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Hermit Bar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Hermit Bar Cookies",".5 cup warm coffee",
"Hermit Bar Cookies","1 egg",
"Hermit Bar Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Hermit Bar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Hermit Bar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Hermit Bar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Hermit Bar Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar until smooth. Stir in the molasses and egg. Dissolve the baking soda in warm coffee; stir into the molasses mixture. Combine the flour, salt, cinnamon and cloves; Gradually stir into the batter. Mix in raisins. Form dough into 4 long strips lengthwise on the cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool for 5 minutes on the cookie sheets then cut each strip into 2 inch bars while still warm."
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 pinch ground nutmeg",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time. Stir in the vanilla and pumpkin until well blended. Combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg; stir into the pumpkin mixture. Mix in the chocolate chips. Stir in the walnuts if desired. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until edges begin to brown. Allow to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Giant Crisp Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Giant Crisp Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Giant Crisp Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Giant Crisp Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Giant Crisp Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Giant Crisp Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Giant Crisp Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Giant Crisp Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Giant Crisp Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Mix flour, baking soda and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the vanilla. Mix in the dry ingredients until well blended. Stir in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Roll the dough into 2 inch balls and place them 3 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 to 23 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheet before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".5 cup shortening",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 egg",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 cup canned pumpkin",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the pumpkin and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, and cinnamon; gradually mix into the creamed mixture. Stir in the walnuts and chocolate chips. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until light brown. Cool on wire racks."
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons ground allspice",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cloves",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Dad's Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Step 1","Cream first three ingredients until fluffy, add eggs and vanilla. Mix all dry ingredients into butter mixture. Stir in oats. Let dough stand at room temperature for 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheets. Flatten cookies slightly and bake for 10 minutes. Do not overbake."
"Step 4","Take cookies from the oven when still puffy and edges are just beginning to brown. Let cookies cool a minute or two on cookie sheets before removing. Cool completely on racks. They are fragile and difficult to remove from the cookie sheets when they are still warm, so work gently."
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies",".25 cup packed brown sugar",
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies","1 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies",".25 cup cornstarch",
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies",".25 cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips",
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies","3 tablespoons white sugar",
"Sugared Black Raspberry Tea Cookies","1 (10 ounce) jar black raspberry jam",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream butter with brown sugar and 1/3 cup white sugar. Blend in the vanilla and milk. Mix in the flour and corn starch. Stir in the mini chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Form the dough into 1 inch balls, and roll in the remaining white sugar. Place on the prepared cookie sheet, about 1 1/2 inches apart. Use your finger or thumb to press straight down into the center of each ball, making a well for the jam. Neatly fill each cookie with a small amount of jam."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven for 13 to 15 minutes, or until cookies are just beginning to turn golden around the edges. Let cookies cool before eating."
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","2 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened",
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","1 tablespoon lemon zest",
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","2 large eggs eggs",
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","2 cups all-purpose flour, sifted",
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","3 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","1 teaspoon lemon juice, or as needed",
"Heart Cookies Decorated with Royal Icing","red food coloring",
"Step 1","Cream 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons butter in a large bowl with an electric mixer. Add white sugar and lemon zest and mix well. Mix in eggs one at a time and beat well after each addition. Mix in 1/2 of the flour until combined. Mix in remaining flour until dough comes together."
"Step 2","Shape dough with your hands into a thick rectangle. Press flat and wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate for 2 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 4","Dust a work surface with flour and roll out dough into a thin circle. Cut out heart shapes and arrange cut-out cookies on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove hearts from baking sheets carefully and transfer to wire racks. Cool completely, about 15 minutes."
"Step 6","Beat egg whites in a bowl until frothy. Beat in confectioners' sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time, until stiff peaks form. Add lemon juice to thin out the mixture. Add more lemon juice for runnier icing. Divide icing into small bowls and color with red food coloring in different shades of red or pink, keeping a portion of the icing white. Cover with a damp kitchen towel at all times so it won't dry out."
"Step 7","Decorate as you like using different techniques. For the flood technique, use runny royal icing in a piping bag with a small round #2 tip and pipe a line around the edge of the cookies. Fill in the center, evenly distributing the icing with a scriber tool."
"Step 8","For hearts, add dots of a different color onto the wet icing and drag the scriber tool downwards through the dots. For lips, add an oval shape onto the wet icing and shape the oval into lips with the scriber tool."
"Step 9","For feathers or patterns, pipe a line around the edge, then add stripes in different colors. Drag the scriber tool down through the stripes. For a marbled effect, pipe lines of different colors across a base layer, then drag the scriber tool up and down through the lines. Allow the icing to set completely."
"Ghirardelli Flourless Fudgy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup finely chopped pecans",
"Ghirardelli Flourless Fudgy Chocolate Chip Cookies","Cooking spray",
"Ghirardelli Flourless Fudgy Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups powdered sugar",
"Ghirardelli Flourless Fudgy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup Ghirardelli Premium Baking Cocoa",
"Ghirardelli Flourless Fudgy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon table salt",
"Ghirardelli Flourless Fudgy Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 large egg whites, at room temperature",
"Ghirardelli Flourless Fudgy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Ghirardelli Flourless Fudgy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup Ghirardelli 60% Cacao Bittersweet Chocolate Baking Chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","Place pecans in a single layer on a baking sheet, and bake in preheated oven until toasted and fragrant, 6 to 8 minutes, stirring halfway through. Let cool completely, about 20 minutes."
"Step 3","Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper; lightly coat parchment with cooking spray."
"Step 4","Sift together powdered sugar, Ghirardelli Premium Baking Cocoa, and salt in a large bowl. Whisk egg whites in a separate bowl until frothy, about 1 1/2 minutes. Stir egg whites and vanilla into powdered sugar mixture. Batter will be very thick. Stir in Ghirardelli Bittersweet Chocolate Chips and toasted pecans until well combined."
"Step 5","Using a 1 1/2-inch cookie scoop (about 2 tablespoons), scoop dough, and place 3 inches apart on prepared baking sheets."
"Step 6","Bake in preheated oven until tops are shiny and cracked, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool on baking sheet 5 minutes; transfer to wire racks and cool completely, about 15 minutes."
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies","6 slices maple-cured bacon, chopped",
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies","1 cup softened butter",
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies",".67 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate-Chocolate Chip Bacon Cookies","2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chunks",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Place the bacon in a large, deep skillet, and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain the bacon slices on a paper towel-lined plate. Crumble."
"Step 3","Beat the sugar, butter, eggs, and vanilla extract with an electric mixer in a large bowl until fluffy and smooth. Stir in flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt. Mix in the chocolate chips and bacon. Drop cookies by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Let stand 5 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups miniature chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a bowl until creamy. Add pumpkin, egg, and vanilla extract; beat until smooth."
"Step 3","Mix flour, oats, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a separate bowl; stir into creamed butter until combined. Fold chocolate chips into batter. Drop 1 to 2 tablespoons batter for each cookie onto a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges of each cookie are lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Chinese Christmas Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chinese Christmas Cookies","1 cup peanut butter chips",
"Chinese Christmas Cookies","1 cup chow mein noodles",
"Chinese Christmas Cookies","1 cup dry-roasted peanuts",
"Step 1","Melt chocolate and peanut butter chips in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently, until smooth."
"Step 2","Mix chow mein noodles and peanuts in a large mixing bowl. Pour chocolate mixture over noodles and peanuts and turn to coat."
"Step 3","Line a baking sheet with waxed paper. Drop mixture by rounded tablespoonfuls onto prepared sheet. Refrigerate until set, about 2 hours."
"Sugar Cookie Cutouts","1 cup butter, softened",
"Sugar Cookie Cutouts","1 cup white sugar",
"Sugar Cookie Cutouts","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sugar Cookie Cutouts","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookie Cutouts","3 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookie Cutouts","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Sugar Cookie Cutouts",".25 cup heavy whipping cream",
"Sugar Cookie Cutouts",".5 cup colored sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Sift together the flour and baking powder, stir into the creamed mixture alternately with the heavy cream. Cover dough, and chill for 2 to 3 hours, until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 inch apart on the prepared cookie sheets. Sprinkle with colored sugar if desired."
"Step 4","Bake for 12 to 14 minutes in the preheated oven, until bottoms and edges of cookies are light brown. Remove from baking sheet and cool on wire racks. Store in an airtight container."
"Oatmeal Date Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies","1 cup dates, pitted and chopped",
"Oatmeal Date Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F and grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In separate bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside."
"Step 3","In a large bowl, cream together shortening and both sugars until light and fluffy, using electric mixer at medium speed."
"Step 4","Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each. Blend in vanilla."
"Step 5","Gradually add dry ingredients to creamed mixture, mixing well with spoon."
"Step 6","Stir in oats, dates and walnuts."
"Step 7","Drop dough by teaspoonfuls, about 2 inches apart, on cookie sheet."
"Step 8","Bake for 8 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on racks."
"Apple Squares","1 cup sifted all-purpose flour",
"Apple Squares","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Apple Squares",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Apple Squares",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Apple Squares",".25 cup butter or margarine, melted",
"Apple Squares",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Apple Squares",".5 cup white sugar",
"Apple Squares","1 egg",
"Apple Squares","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Apple Squares",".5 cup chopped apple",
"Apple Squares",".5 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Apple Squares","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Apple Squares","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x9 inch pan. Sift together flour, baking powder, salt, and 1/4 teaspoon of cinnamon; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together melted butter, brown sugar, and 1/2 cup of white sugar with a wooden spoon until smooth. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Blend in the flour mixture until just combined, then stir in the apples and walnuts. Spread the mixture evenly into the prepared pan. In a cup or small bowl, stir together the remaining cinnamon and sugar; sprinkle over the top of the bars."
"Step 3","Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in preheated oven; finished bars should spring back when lightly touched. Cool in the pan, and cut into squares."
"No Bake Choco-Peanut-Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"No Bake Choco-Peanut-Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"No Bake Choco-Peanut-Oatmeal Cookies","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"No Bake Choco-Peanut-Oatmeal Cookies","3 tablespoons crunchy peanut butter",
"No Bake Choco-Peanut-Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"No Bake Choco-Peanut-Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"No Bake Choco-Peanut-Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Wipe 1 wide band of butter around the rim of a 3 quart pan to prevent boil-over."
"Step 2","Combine milk, sugar, cocoa, butter and peanut butter."
"Step 3","Stir and bring to boil over medium heat. Let boil for 1 1/2 minutes, do not stir."
"Step 4","Remove from heat. Stir in oats and vanilla. Stir until oats evenly distributed."
"Step 5","Drop by teaspoon onto waxed paper. Cool. Makes 4 to 5 dozen."
"Fun Cookie Suckers",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Fun Cookie Suckers","3 ounces cream cheese",
"Fun Cookie Suckers","1 cup white sugar",
"Fun Cookie Suckers","1 egg",
"Fun Cookie Suckers","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Fun Cookie Suckers","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fun Cookie Suckers","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Fun Cookie Suckers",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Fun Cookie Suckers","assorted colors of paste food coloring",
"Fun Cookie Suckers","24 eaches lollipop sticks",
"Step 1","In a bowl cream butter, cream cheese and sugar until fluffy. Add egg and vanilla; beat until smooth"
"Step 2","In a medium bowl combine flour, baking powder and salt. Add dry ingredients to the creamed mixture. Stir till soft dough forms. Divide dough into fourths. Tint each with a different food color. Wrap in plastic wrap and chill for 2 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Working with each color, shape dough into 3/4 inch balls. For each cookie place 1 pink, 1 green, 1 blue and 1 orange ball together to make 1 large rainbow colored ball. Shape into a 12 inch long roll (like a snake); starting at one end, coil roll to make a 2 3/4 inch round cookie. Place cookies 3 inches apart on lightly greased baking sheet. Carefully insert lollipop sticks into bottoms of cookie"
"Step 4","Bake cookies for 8 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool and store in an airtight container."
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies",".33 cup vegetable oil",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","3 tablespoons water",
"Paydirt Peanut Butter Cookies","1 (17.5 ounce) package peanut butter cookie mix",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine peanut butter(including peanut butter from box mix), shortening, oil and water in a large mixing bowl, blend until smooth. Adding one at a time, blend in sugar, brown sugar , eggs and vanilla, mixing well."
"Step 3","In a smaller bowl combine flour, salt, and baking soda. When those are combined, add dry mix from boxed cookie mix to flour mixture and stir using a whisk to break up any lumps."
"Step 4","Combine dry mixture a little at a time into wet mixture and mix well. It may become necessary to finish mixing dough by hand."
"Step 5","Roll dough into 1 1/2 to 2 inch balls and place a baking sheet leave 2 to 2 1/2 inches between cookies. Cross-hatch dough balls using a fork to flatten to 1/2 to 3/4 inch thickness. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) about 7 to 10 minutes, until edges start to turn light brown. Remove from oven let stand for 5 minutes and transfer cookies to wire rack.White Chocolate Holiday Spritz Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"White Chocolate Holiday Spritz Cookies","1 egg",
"White Chocolate Holiday Spritz Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Holiday Spritz Cookies",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"White Chocolate Holiday Spritz Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Holiday Spritz Cookies","salt",
"White Chocolate Holiday Spritz Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package white chocolate chips",
