"White Chocolate Holiday Spritz Cookies",".75 cup multicolored candy sprinkles (jimmies), as desired",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease or line two cookie sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Cream the butter in a mixing bowl until light colored and fluffy. Beat in the egg and vanilla until smooth. Add food coloring, if desired. Gradually mix in the confectioners' sugar, flour, and salt to make a smooth dough."
"Step 3","Place dough into cookie press cylinder fitted with 1 inch sawtooth ribbon disk. Press dough into long strips on prepared cookie sheets. Use a paring knife dipped into flour to score the strips every two inches."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until edges are slightly golden, about 6 minutes. Remove from oven, cool slightly, and cut along score lines while they are still warm. Transfer to wire racks to cool completely."
"Step 5","Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Melt white chocolate chips in the top of a double boiler placed over medium heat, or in the microwave. Add food coloring, if desired. Spread white chocolate icing on the bottom of one cookie and place the bottom of a second cookie into the icing to form a sandwich. Place cookie sandwich onto prepared baking sheet. Repeat to assemble remaining cookies, and refrigerate on the baking sheet 10 minutes to set icing. Remove and dip ends of cookies into white chocolate, then into candy sprinkles. Place cookies on wax paper until white chocolate is set."
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, room temperature",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon maple extract",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup chopped cooked bacon",
"Maple-Bacon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup bittersweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper. Whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar with an electric mixer until smooth. Add one egg; beat until blended into the butter mixture. Add the remaining egg, vanilla extract, and maple extract; beat until well blended and slightly fluffy. Stir in the flour mixture a little at a time, mixing just until combined. Stir in the bacon and chocolate chips. Scoop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges turn golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Remove from the oven, and cool on a wire rack."
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies II","1 cup butterscotch chips",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies II",".75 cup unsalted butter",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies II","2 tablespoons boiling water",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies II","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies II","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies II",".75 cup white sugar",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies II","1 pinch salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a small saucepan, melt butterscotch chips and butter over low heat, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. In a medium bowl, stir together the boiling water and baking soda. Stir in the melted mixture, then stir in the flour, quick oats, sugar and salt. Mix until everything is well blended."
"Step 3","Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto unprepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies will be very crisp. Remove to cool on wire racks."
"Aggression ( Oatmeal ) Cookies","6 cups rolled oats",
"Aggression ( Oatmeal ) Cookies","3 cups packed brown sugar",
"Aggression ( Oatmeal ) Cookies","3 cups butter",
"Aggression ( Oatmeal ) Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Aggression ( Oatmeal ) Cookies","1 tablespoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Put ingredients together in a bowl. For each child's bowl, use 1 cup oatmeal, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1/2 cup butter or margarine, 1/2 cup of flour, and 1/2 teaspoon of baking soda."
"Step 2","Then mash, knead, and squeeze with hands until there aren't any lumps of butter. Form into small balls not as big as a walnut. Put on ungreased cookie sheet. Butter the bottom of a small glass and dip in granulated sugar. Flatten each ball of dough, dipping glass in sugar each time."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes. Let cool on cookie rack."
"Easy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Easy Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 cup peanut butter",
"Easy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Easy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easy Peanut Butter Cookies","2 cups buttermilk baking mix",
"Easy Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat condensed milk, peanut butter, egg and vanilla until smooth. Add biscuit mix, and mix well. Chill at least 1 hour."
"Step 3","Shape dough into 1 inch balls. Roll the balls in sugar. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Flatten balls slightly with a fork."
"Step 4","Bake for 6 to 8 minutes, or until lightly browned (DO NOT OVERBAKE). Cool. Store in a tightly covered container at room temperature."
"Nutty-Boy Peanut Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Nutty-Boy Peanut Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Nutty-Boy Peanut Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Nutty-Boy Peanut Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Nutty-Boy Peanut Cookies","1 egg",
"Nutty-Boy Peanut Cookies",".25 cup butter",
"Nutty-Boy Peanut Cookies","1 cup peanuts",
"Step 1","Cream the butter. Beat in the sugar, egg and milk. Sift flour and baking powder together. Combine with butter mixture."
"Step 2","Reserve 2 dozen whole nuts and chop the rest info fine pieces. Add the chopped nuts to the mixture."
"Step 3","Using a teaspoon, drop the mixture onto a buttered baking sheet. Put a whole nut on top of each cookie. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until done."
"Funfetti® Cookies","1 (15.25 ounce) package cake mix with candy bits (such as Pillsbury® Funfetti®), or more to taste",
"Funfetti® Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Funfetti® Cookies","1 egg",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix cake mix, butter, and egg together in a bowl until well combined; roll into balls and place on a baking sheet, about 1 1/2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies start to brown and crack, about 10 minutes. Allow cookies to sit on baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Sweet Sourdough Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Sweet Sourdough Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Sweet Sourdough Cookies","1 cup sourdough starter",
"Sweet Sourdough Cookies","1 egg",
"Sweet Sourdough Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sweet Sourdough Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Sweet Sourdough Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sweet Sourdough Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Sweet Sourdough Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease or a baking sheet or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Cream the sugar and butter in a large bowl. Beat in sourdough starter and egg. Stir in the flour, baking powder, vanilla extract, salt, and baking soda until smooth. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Naughty Chocolate and Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Naughty Chocolate and Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Naughty Chocolate and Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs, separated",
"Naughty Chocolate and Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Naughty Chocolate and Peanut Butter Chip Cookies",".25 cup port wine",
"Naughty Chocolate and Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Naughty Chocolate and Peanut Butter Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Naughty Chocolate and Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","1 cup peanut butter chips",
"Naughty Chocolate and Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg yolks, vanilla and port wine. Combine the flour and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Dip each ball in the remaining egg whites. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from the oven and immediately place 4 or 5 of the chocolate and/or peanut butter chips into the center of each cookie. Return to the oven for 2 more minutes to melt the chips. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups packed light brown sugar",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons skim milk",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Byron's Ginger Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup finely chopped crystallized ginger",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt into a small bowl; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, shortening, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and milk. Gradually stir in the sifted ingredients using a wooden spoon. Finally, mix in the chocolate chips and crystallized ginger. Use two spoons to drop cookie dough 2 inches apart onto a cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake on the middle rack of the preheated oven for 12 to 15 minutes. The cookies should be golden brown on the sides and the top should have lost it's shine. Allow to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup margarine",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","3 medium (7 to 7-7/8 long)s ripe bananas, mashed",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","2 cups rolled oats",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream butter and sugar together until smooth. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda, cloves and cinnamon, stir into the creamed mixture. Then add the mashed bananas, rolled oats and chocolate chips, mix until well blended."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded spoonfuls onto unprepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove cookies from pan to cool on wire racks."
"Soft Molasses Cookies II","3 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Soft Molasses Cookies II","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Soft Molasses Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Molasses Cookies II","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Soft Molasses Cookies II","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Soft Molasses Cookies II","1 cup butter",
"Soft Molasses Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Soft Molasses Cookies II","1 egg",
"Soft Molasses Cookies II",".33 cup molasses",
"Soft Molasses Cookies II",".75 cup sour cream",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together flour, baking soda, salt, ginger, and cinnamon; set aside."
"Step 2","Cream butter, and gradually blend in sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in egg and molasses. Mix in sour cream alternately with sifted dry ingredients. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven. Transfer to wire racks to cool."
"Aunt Betz Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Aunt Betz Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Aunt Betz Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Aunt Betz Cookies","2 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Aunt Betz Cookies","2 cups miniature marshmallows",
"Aunt Betz Cookies","12 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Aunt Betz Cookies","3 tablespoons peanut butter",
"Aunt Betz Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Aunt Betz Cookies",".5 cup shredded coconut",
"Step 1","Beat eggs. Combine eggs, sugar, and butter or margarine in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil and let cook on low for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Turn off heat. Add the crumbs, marshmallows and coconut."
"Step 2","Spread mixture into a lightly buttered 9x13 inch dish."
"Step 3","Melt the chocolate chips and peanut butter together and spread over the top of the bars. Refrigerate overnight. Cut into small squares to serve."
"Pecan Pie Bars I","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pecan Pie Bars I",".5 cup white sugar",
"Pecan Pie Bars I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Pecan Pie Bars I","1 cup margarine",
"Pecan Pie Bars I","4 large eggs eggs",
"Pecan Pie Bars I","1 .5 cups light corn syrup",
"Pecan Pie Bars I","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Pecan Pie Bars I","3 tablespoons margarine, melted",
"Pecan Pie Bars I","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Pecan Pie Bars I","2 .5 cups chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the flour, 1/2 cup sugar, and salt. Cut in 1 cup of margarine until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Sprinkle the mixture evenly over the prepared pan, and press in firmly."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven."
"Step 4","While the crust is baking, prepare the filling. In a large bowl mix together the eggs, corn syrup, 1 1/2 cups sugar, 3 tablespoons margarine, and vanilla until smooth. Stir in the chopped pecans. Spread the filling evenly over the crust as soon as it comes out of the oven."
"Step 5","Bake for 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until set. Allow to cool completely on a wire rack before slicing into bars."
"Peanut Butter Crispies II","6 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Peanut Butter Crispies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Crispies II","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Crispies II","1 cup corn syrup",
"Peanut Butter Crispies II","1 tablespoon butter",
"Step 1","In a medium sauce pan, mix together sugar, peanut butter, and corn syrup. Be careful not to let it burn, or it will ruin the recipe. Stir mixture until well melted. Remove pan from heat."
"Step 2","Combine warm peanut butter mixture with crisp rice cereal."
"Step 3","Grease well a 9 x 13 inch pan with butter or margarine. Spread mixture in pan. Allow to cool. When mixture is no longer sticky to the touch, cut into bars."
"Eggless Ginger Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Eggless Ginger Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Eggless Ginger Cookies","1 cup dark molasses",
"Eggless Ginger Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Eggless Ginger Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Eggless Ginger Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Eggless Ginger Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the sugar and shortening until smooth. Stir in the molasses. Combine the baking soda, ginger,cinnamon and 3 3/4 cups of the flour; blend into the molasses mixture. Add more flour if necessary to make dough stiff enough to roll out. Use remaining flour to dust rolling surface. Roll dough out to 1/4 inch thickness and cut with cookie cutters."
"Step 3","Bake for 5 to 7 minutes in the preheated oven. remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Monster Cookies VII","12 large eggs eggs",
"Monster Cookies VII","4 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Monster Cookies VII","4 cups white sugar",
"Monster Cookies VII","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Monster Cookies VII","1 tablespoon corn syrup",
"Monster Cookies VII","8 tablespoons baking soda",
"Monster Cookies VII","2 cups butter",
"Monster Cookies VII","3 pounds peanut butter",
"Monster Cookies VII","18 cups rolled oats",
"Monster Cookies VII","2 .5 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Monster Cookies VII","2 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Step 1","In a very large bowl, mix ingredients in order given. (Use hands if necessary)."
"Step 2","Drop on cookie sheet (an oven liner works well) about 5 cookies to a sheet with ice cream scoop and flatten."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Bake for 12 minutes or longer until done. These burn easily. Makes about 80 saucer size cookies. Note: This recipe does not call for flour."
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies","5 tablespoons white sugar",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup old-fashioned rolled oats",
"Blueberry Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup dried blueberries",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together with an electric mixer in a bowl until creamy and smooth, about 2 minutes. Add egg and vanilla extract; mix until incorporated."
"Step 3","Whisk flour, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a separate bowl; mix into butter mixture until just combined. Fold in oats and blueberries."
"Step 4","Spoon dough, about 1 tablespoon per cookie, onto the prepared baking sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 5","Bake 1 sheet at a time in the preheated oven until cookies are golden brown, about 12 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Kale Cookies",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies","1 .5 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies",".33 cup applesauce",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies",".33 cup finely chopped kale",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies","1 tablespoon butter, softened",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies","2 tablespoons dark chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies","1 egg white",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies","1 tablespoon canola oil",
"Chocolate Kale Cookies","1 teaspoon honey",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, cocoa powder, and baking soda together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Blend applesauce and kale together in a blender until smooth, about 30 seconds."
"Step 4","Beat sugar, butter, egg white, and vanilla together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Stir kale mixture, canola oil, and honey into creamed butter mixture. Stir flour mixture into kale mixture until dough is just mixed; fold in chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls of cookie dough onto the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated until edges are slightly hardened, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Cake Mix Spice Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package spice cake mix",
"Cake Mix Spice Cookies","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Cake Mix Spice Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Cake Mix Spice Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Cake Mix Spice Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat cake mix, eggs, and oil together in a bowl to form a thick batter. Fold raisins and walnuts into the batter; drop by large spoonfuls onto a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until no longer moist on the tops, 9 to 12 minutes.Ricotta Cookies III","1 cup butter",
"Ricotta Cookies III","2 cups white sugar",
"Ricotta Cookies III","2 large eggs eggs",
"Ricotta Cookies III","16 ounces ricotta cheese",
"Ricotta Cookies III","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Ricotta Cookies III","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ricotta Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Ricotta Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Ricotta Cookies III",".5 cup milk",
"Ricotta Cookies III",".5 teaspoon butter",
"Ricotta Cookies III",".5 teaspoon shortening",
"Ricotta Cookies III","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Ricotta Cookies III","1 tablespoon lemon extract",
"Ricotta Cookies III",".5 cup colored candy sprinkles",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the 1 cup of butter and sugar. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the ricotta cheese and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder and baking soda, stir into the ricotta mixture. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","To make the frosting warm the milk, 1/2 teaspoon of butter and shortening, in a small saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally until solids are melted. Remove from heat and gradually stir in the confectioners' sugar and lemon extract. Dip each cookie into the icing then dip in colored sugar or sprinkles."
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 .5 cups butter flavored shortening",
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 large eggs eggs",
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 teaspoons salt",
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","4 tablespoons milk",
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Cream sugar into shortening. Add milk and vanilla beat until fluffy. Blend in egg. Then add dry ingredients and mix well. Stir in chips and nuts."
"Step 2","Drop by teaspoon onto greased baking sheets and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8-10 minutes for chewy cookies or 10-13 minutes for crispy cookies. ENJOY!!!"
"MMMMM... Brownies",".5 cup white sugar",
"MMMMM... Brownies","2 tablespoons butter",
"MMMMM... Brownies","2 tablespoons water",
"MMMMM... Brownies","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"MMMMM... Brownies","2 large eggs eggs",
"MMMMM... Brownies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"MMMMM... Brownies",".67 cup all-purpose flour",
"MMMMM... Brownies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"MMMMM... Brownies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease an 8x8 inch square pan."
"Step 2","In a medium saucepan, combine the sugar, butter and water. Cook over medium heat until boiling. Remove from heat and stir in chocolate chips until melted and smooth. Mix in the eggs and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the chocolate mixture. Spread evenly into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until brownies set up. Do not overbake! Cool in pan and cut into squares."
"Linzer Torte Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Linzer Torte Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Linzer Torte Cookies","1 egg",
"Linzer Torte Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon zest",
"Linzer Torte Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Linzer Torte Cookies",".75 cup blanched slivered almonds, ground",
"Linzer Torte Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Linzer Torte Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground cloves",
"Linzer Torte Cookies","1 cup raspberry jam",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease an 11x7 inch baking pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and lemon peel. In another bowl, stir together the flour, almonds, cinnamon and cloves. Gradually stir the dry ingredients into the creamed mixture. The dough will be stiff, so you may need to knead it by hand to get it to come together. Press half of the dough into the bottom of the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Press half of the dough into the bottom of the prepared pan. Spread the preserves over the crust. On a lightly floured surface, roll the remaining dough into long rope about 1/2 inch in diameter. Place lengths of the rope across the top of the jam in a lattice pattern over the preserves."
"Step 4","Bake 40 minutes or until top is golden. Cool in pan on wire rack. Cut into 2 inch by 1inch bars."
"German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package German chocolate cake mix",
"German Chocolate Cake Cookies","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"German Chocolate Cake Cookies",".67 cup shortening",
"German Chocolate Cake Cookies","1 (16 ounce) container prepared coconut pecan frosting",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the cake mix, eggs and shortening until well blended. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Place the cookies 2 inches apart onto the cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. Match up evenly sized cookies and sandwich them with the coconut pecan frosting."
"Skillet Cookies I","8 tablespoons butter",
"Skillet Cookies I","8 ounces dates, pitted and chopped",
"Skillet Cookies I","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Skillet Cookies I",".75 cup white sugar",
"Skillet Cookies I","1 cup crisp rice cereal",
"Skillet Cookies I","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Skillet Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","In a saucepan over medium heat combine the butter, dates, egg yolks and sugar. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from heat stir in the rice cereal, chopped pecans and vanilla. Stir and let cool."
"Step 2","When you can handle roll into small balls then roll in confectioners' sugar."
"Lacy Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup quick cooking oats",
"Lacy Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup all-purpose flour",
"Lacy Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Lacy Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Lacy Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Lacy Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Lacy Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Lacy Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Cover baking sheets with foil, then coat the foil with a non-stick cooking spray."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, combine oats, flour, salt, and baking powder. In a large bowl, cream sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in egg and vanilla. Mix in the flour and oat mixture until just combined. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets, 2 1/2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes, or until edges turn golden. Cool, then peel cookies off with your fingers. Be sure to re-spray baking sheets with non-stick cooking spray between batches."
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".33 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".33 cup superfine sugar",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".75 cup rolled oats",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".75 cup dried cranberries",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".75 cup white chocolate chips",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)",".5 cup butter, melted and cooled",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)","1 egg, lightly beaten",
"Cookies in a Jar (Emergency Cookies)","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Sift flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt into a bowl; pour flour mixture into a 4-cup glass jar. Layer brown sugar and superfine sugar in the jar, pressing firmly between each layer. Layer oats, cranberries, and chocolate chips. Seal jar."
"Step 2","To make cookies: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Empty dry cookie mix in large bowl. Stir in butter, egg, and vanilla extract until combined. Roll the dough into tablespoon-sized balls and place 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until lightly browned, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool on the sheets for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","48 piece (0.2 oz)s chocolate covered caramel candies",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","1 tablespoon white sugar",
"Caramel Chocolate Cookies","4 ounces vanilla flavored confectioners' coating",
"Step 1","In large bowl, combine one cup sugar, brown sugar and margarine; beat until light, add vanilla and eggs, blend well."
"Step 2","In small bowl, combine flour, cocoa and baking soda, mix well. Add to sugar mixtures; blend well. Stir in 1/2 cup pecans. Refrigerate 30 minutes."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Shape l tablespoon of dough around one caramel candy, covering completely. In small bowl, combine remaining 1/2 cup pecans and l tbsp sugar. Press one side of each ball into pecan mixture. Place nut side up on cookie sheets. Bake 7 to l0 minutes. Cool. Melt candy coating and drizzle over cooled cookies"
"Pumpkin Cookies III","1 cup white sugar",
"Pumpkin Cookies III","1 egg",
"Pumpkin Cookies III","1 cup shortening",
"Pumpkin Cookies III","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Cookies III","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pumpkin Cookies III","1 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Cookies III","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Cookies III","1 cup canned pumpkin",
"Pumpkin Cookies III",".5 cup raisins",
"Pumpkin Cookies III",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together sugar, egg, shortening, and vanilla. Sift together flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon; stir into the creamed mixture. Stir in the pumpkin, raisins, and walnuts. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 10-15 minutes in the preheated oven."
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies",".75 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","1 tablespoon butter",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Delilah's Frosted Cut-Out Sugar Cookies","2 drops any color food coloring",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the milk and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Cover dough, and chill for at least one hour."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets, or line with parchment paper. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/4 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 6 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove cookies from baking sheets to cool on wire racks. Cool completely before frosting."
"Step 4","In a small bowl, beat the butter, 1 teaspoon vanilla and confectioners' sugar until smooth. Mix in the milk one tablespoon at a time until a good spreading consistency is reached. Stir in food coloring to desired shade. Decorate cooled cookies, and set on waxed paper to harden."
"Colossal Cookies",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Colossal Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Colossal Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Colossal Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Colossal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Colossal Cookies","1 (16 ounce) jar crunchy peanut butter",
"Colossal Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Colossal Cookies","6 cups quick cooking oats",
"Colossal Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and peanut butter. Mix in the baking soda, oats, and chocolate chips until well blended. Drop 1/4 cupfuls of dough 4 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Flatten with a fork to 2 1/2 inches in diameter."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven. Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Beth's Orange Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","1 cup sour cream",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Beth's Orange Cookies",".75 cup frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","2 tablespoons grated orange zest",
"Beth's Orange Cookies",".5 teaspoon grated orange zest",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","2 tablespoons frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","4 tablespoons butter, melted",
"Beth's Orange Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Cream white sugar and shortening; add eggs and stir. Add sour cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla; stir and set aside. Sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Add little by little to the creamed mixture and stir well. Add 3/4 cup orange juice concentrate, and 2 tablespoons orange zest. Drop onto greased cookie sheets by teaspoonfuls."
"Step 2","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for about 10 minutes. Frost cookies when they are cool."
"Step 3","To Make Frosting: Mix together 1/2 teaspoon orange zest, 2 Tablespoons of the thawed orange juice concentrate, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 4 Tablespoons of melted butter, 1 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar or enough to make frosting of spreading consistency."
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies","1 egg",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies","1 teaspoon instant coffee granules",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies",".25 cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies",".25 cup white chocolate chips",
"Lots of Chocolate Cherry Cookies","1 cup dried cherries",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Line two large baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Combine flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt in a bowl."
"Step 4","Beat the butter and sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium-high speed, until light and fluffy."
"Step 5","Beat the egg, coffee granules, and vanilla into the butter and sugar mixture until blended."
"Step 6","Change the speed to low and pour in the flour mixture. Beat until just combined."
"Step 7","Stir in semisweet chocolate chips, white chocolate chips, and dried cherries."
"Step 8","Drop spoonfuls of the dough two inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 9","Bake 10 to 12 minutes per batch in the preheated oven, until cookies are just becoming firm."
"Step 10","Let cool on baking sheets for two minutes."
"Step 11","Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Caramel Shortbread Squares",".67 cup butter, softened",
"Caramel Shortbread Squares",".25 cup white sugar",
"Caramel Shortbread Squares","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Caramel Shortbread Squares",".5 cup butter",
"Caramel Shortbread Squares",".5 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Caramel Shortbread Squares","2 tablespoons light corn syrup",
"Caramel Shortbread Squares",".5 cup sweetened condensed milk",
"Caramel Shortbread Squares","1 .25 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, mix together 2/3 cup butter, white sugar, and flour until evenly crumbly. Press into a 9 inch square baking pan. Bake for 20 minutes."
"Step 3","In a 2 quart saucepan, combine 1/2 cup butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, and sweetened condensed milk. Bring to a boil. Continue to boil for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and beat vigorously with a wooden spoon for about 3 minutes. Pour over baked crust (warm or cool). Cool until it begins to firm."
"Step 4","Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl. Heat for 1 minute, then stir and continue to heat and stir at 20 second intervals until chocolate is melted and smooth. Pour chocolate over the caramel layer and spread evenly to cover completely. Chill. Cut into 1 inch squares. These need to be small because they are so rich."
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup margarine, softened",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup black walnuts, coarsely ground",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat margarine and sugars, until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla; beat well. Combine flour, baking soda, salt, and spices. Sift and add to the egg mixture. Stir well."
"Step 3","Grind the raisins up with 1 teaspoon of sugar until they are in small pieces--not mush! Stir in oats, nuts, raisins and mix well, drop by tablespoonful onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until light brown. Cool 1 minute and remove to wire rack. When cool store in airtight container. NOTE: You can add butterscotch or chocolate pieces in place of the raisins."
"Margie's Shortbread Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Margie's Shortbread Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Margie's Shortbread Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Margie's Shortbread Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Margie's Shortbread Oatmeal Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Margie's Shortbread Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon water",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Dissolve the baking soda in the water."
"Step 3","Combine the oats, flour and brown sugar. Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the baking soda mixture and form dough into a ball. Either roll dough out to 1/4 inch thick and cut with cookie cutters or press dough into the bottom of one 9x13 inch baking pan."
"Step 4","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12 to 15 minutes."
"Lavender Shortbread Cookies","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Lavender Shortbread Cookies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Lavender Shortbread Cookies",".25 cup sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Lavender Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh lavender",
"Lavender Shortbread Cookies","1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint leaves",
"Lavender Shortbread Cookies","1 teaspoon grated lemon zest",
"Lavender Shortbread Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lavender Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup cornstarch",
"Lavender Shortbread Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and confectioners' sugar until light and fluffy. Mix in the lavender, mint and lemon zest. Combine the flour, cornstarch and salt; mix into the batter until well blended. Divide dough into two balls, wrap in plastic wrap and flatten to about 1inch thick. Refrigerate until firm, about 1hour."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into shapes with cookie cutters. Cookie stamps will work well on these too. Place on cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 18 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, just until cookies begin to brown at the edges. Cool for a few minutes on the baking sheets then transfer to wire racks to cool completely."
"Chocolate Oatmeal Drop Cookies",".5 cup margarine",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Drop Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Drop Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Drop Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Drop Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Drop Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package German chocolate cake mix",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Drop Cookies","2 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Drop Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, shortening and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Stir in the egg and water. Beat in cake mix until well blended, then stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Easy Chocolate Butterscotch Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix",
"Easy Chocolate Butterscotch Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Easy Chocolate Butterscotch Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Easy Chocolate Butterscotch Cookies","2 cups butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","Combine cake mix, oil and eggs in a large bowl. Add butterscotch chips and mix well."
"Step 3","Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes until the center is just set. Let stand 2 minutes."
"Step 5","Remove to wire rack to cool completely.Cassava Flour Holiday Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup grass-fed butter, softened",
"Cassava Flour Holiday Shortbread Cookies",".33 cup maple syrup",
"Cassava Flour Holiday Shortbread Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cassava Flour Holiday Shortbread Cookies","1 .5 cups cassava flour (such as Otto's®)",
"Cassava Flour Holiday Shortbread Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Combine butter, maple syrup, and vanilla in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment; beat until smooth and creamy. Add flour and salt; continue mixing until a firm dough forms. Flatten dough into a disc, wrap in plastic wrap, and chill for 30 minutes."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Roll dough between 2 pieces of parchment paper to 1/4-inch thickness. Cut out shapes with cookie cutters and place 2 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the the preheated oven until edges are golden, 12 to 14 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","3 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","1 .5 cups milk",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I",".75 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","1 (7 ounce) jar marshmallow creme",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies I","1 tablespoon milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, combine flour, white sugar, cocoa powder, 3/4 teaspoon salt, and baking powder. Stir in 1 1/2 cups milk, eggs, 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla, and shortening. Mix until smooth using an electric mixer. Drop batter by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets. Leave space, and only use a teaspoon; these spread."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven for 7 to 8 minutes. Remove from pan immediately, and cool on wire rack."
"Step 4","To make the filling, combine the butter, confectioners' sugar, 1/8 teaspoon salt, marshmallow creme, 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla, and 1 tablespoon milk in a medium bowl. Beat with mixer until fluffy. Spread filling on one cookie, and top with another sandwich style."
"Whip-Up German Chocolate Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package German chocolate cake mix",
"Whip-Up German Chocolate Cookies","1 cup vanilla yogurt",
"Whip-Up German Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup sour cream",
"Whip-Up German Chocolate Cookies","1 egg",
"Whip-Up German Chocolate Cookies","1 (16 ounce) container coconut pecan frosting",
"Whip-Up German Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Whip-Up German Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Empty the package of cake mix into a large bowl. Combine the yogurt, sour cream and egg; stir into the cake mix until well blended. Mix in the coconut pecan frosting, coconut and walnuts. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Sugar Cookie Bars","1 cup unsalted butter at room temperature",
"Sugar Cookie Bars","2 cups white sugar",
"Sugar Cookie Bars","4 large eggs large eggs",
"Sugar Cookie Bars","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookie Bars","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon salt",
"Sugar Cookie Bars",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sugar Cookie Bars","3 cups prepared frosting",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a 10x15-inch baking pan with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Place butter and sugar into the work bowl of a large stand mixer fitted with paddle attachment; mix on medium-high speed until butter and sugar are light and fluffy, 2 to 3 minutes."
"Step 3","Beat eggs into butter mixture one at a time, letting each egg blend in before adding the next. Beat in vanilla extract. Whisk flour, salt, and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Gradually beat flour mixture into moist ingredients, blending each portion in before adding more. Spread dough into prepared pan."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 30 to 35 minutes. Let cool completely in pan."
"Step 5","Remove from pan and spread frosting over the top; cut into bars and serve."
"Carrot Cookies III",".75 cup white sugar",
"Carrot Cookies III",".75 cup shortening",
"Carrot Cookies III","1 egg",
"Carrot Cookies III","1 cup mashed cooked carrots, cooled",
"Carrot Cookies III","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Carrot Cookies III","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Carrot Cookies III",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Carrot Cookies III",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Carrot Cookies III","2 tablespoons orange juice",
"Carrot Cookies III","1 tablespoon orange zest",
"Carrot Cookies III",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together the sugar, shortening and the egg."
"Step 3","Add cooked cooled mashed carrots, flour, baking powder, salt and vanilla. Mix well."
"Step 4","Drop on greased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes."
"Step 5","To Make Frosting: Combine orange juice with the grated rind of one orange. Add enough confectioners' sugar to thicken. Put on cookies while hot."
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","7 cups all-purpose flour",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder (such as Hershey's®)",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup baking powder",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cloves",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground allspice",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","1 large orange, zested",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup vegetable shortening (such as Crisco®)",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup margarine (such as Parkay®)",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","5 large eggs eggs",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract, or to taste",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup orange juice",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup whole milk",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies",".5 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","3 tablespoons whole milk, or more as needed",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon orange juice, or as needed",
"Italian Frosted Chocolate Cookies","3 cups confectioners' sugar, or more as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, white sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, cinnamon, cloves, allspice, and salt in a large bowl. Stir orange zest into flour mixture. Mix vegetable shortening and margarine into dry ingredients, using your hands, until mixture is crumbly."
"Step 3","Beat eggs and vanilla extract in a bowl with an electric mixer until foamy; add egg mixture, 1/4 cup orange juice, and 1/4 cup milk to flour mixture and knead dough in the bowl until thoroughly combined and dough doesn't stick to your hands, about 8 minutes. Dough will be stiff. Knead cream cheese thoroughly into dough, followed by walnuts."
"Step 4","Form dough into balls about 1 1/2 inches in diameter and place onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 12 to 14 minutes. Cool cookies on racks."
"Step 6","Beat 3 tablespoons milk, 1 teaspoon orange juice, and 1 cup confectioners' sugar in a bowl until smooth; gradually beat in remaining confectioners' sugar until frosting is thick and drizzles slowly from a spoon."
"Step 7","Dip tops of cookies into frosting and place frosted cookies on racks with waxed paper underneath to catch drips. Let cookies dry overnight."
"Coconut Macaroons III",".67 cup all-purpose flour",
"Coconut Macaroons III","5 .5 cups flaked coconut",
"Coconut Macaroons III",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Coconut Macaroons III","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Coconut Macaroons III","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper or aluminum foil."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the flour, coconut and salt. Stir in the sweetened condensed milk and vanilla using your hands until well blended. Use an ice cream scoop to drop dough onto the prepared cookie sheets. Cookies should be about golf ball size."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until coconut is toasted."
"Meringue Mushrooms",".5 cup egg whites",
"Meringue Mushrooms",".25 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Meringue Mushrooms",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Meringue Mushrooms","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Meringue Mushrooms","1 cup white sugar",
"Meringue Mushrooms","1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Meringue Mushrooms","4 ounces chocolate confectioners' coating",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 225 degrees F (110 degrees C). Line 2 cookie sheets with parchment paper or aluminum foil."
"Step 2","In a large glass or metal bowl, use an electric mixer to whip egg whites until foamy. Add cream of tartar, salt, and vanilla. Continue whipping until the whites hold soft peaks. Gradually sprinkle in the sugar so that it does not sink to the bottom, and continue whipping until the mixture holds stiff shiny peaks."
"Step 3","Place a round tip into a pastry bag, and fill the bag half way with the meringue. To pipe the mushroom caps, squeeze out round mounds of meringue onto one of the prepared cookie sheets. Pull the bag off to the side to avoid making peaks on the top. For the stems, press out a tiny bit of meringue onto the other sheet, then pull the bag straight up. They should resemble candy kisses. Do not worry about making all of the pieces exactly the same. The mushrooms will look more natural if the pieces are different sizes. Dust the mushroom caps lightly with cocoa using a small sifter or strainer."
"Step 4","Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven, or until the caps are dry enough to easily remove from the cookie sheets. Set aside to cool completely. Melt the coating chocolate in a metal bowl over simmering water, or in a glass bowl in the microwave, stirring occasionally until smooth."
"Step 5","Poke a small hole in the bottom of a mushroom cap. Spread chocolate over the bottom of the cap. Dip the tip of a stem in chocolate, and press lightly into the hole. When the chocolate sets, they will hold together. Repeat with remaining pieces. Store at room temperature in a dry place or tin."
"Pecan Chewies",".75 cup butter",
"Pecan Chewies","3 cups packed light brown sugar",
"Pecan Chewies","3 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Pecan Chewies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Pecan Chewies","3 cups chopped pecans",
"Pecan Chewies","3 cups self-rising flour",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan, or for thinner bars, use a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan."
"Step 2","Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir in brown sugar until smooth. Remove from heat and let cool slightly."
"Step 3","Stir the eggs and vanilla into the brown sugar and butter. Mix in the chopped pecans, and then the flour. Spread evenly in the prepared pan."
"Step 4","Bake for 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Allow to cool before cutting into bars."
"Moist Persimmon Cookie","2 fruit, without refuses persimmons",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie",".5 cup shortening",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie","1 cup white sugar",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie","1 egg",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Moist Persimmon Cookie","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Peel and de-stem the persimmons and process them in a food processor or blender. You will want enough pulp to equal 1 cup. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the sugar and shortening. Beat in the egg and persimmon pulp. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, cloves and nutmeg, stir into the persimmon mixture. Finally, stir in the chopped nuts and raisins. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Apple Pie Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Apple Pie Cookies","6 ounces cream cheese, softened",
"Apple Pie Cookies","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Apple Pie Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Apple Pie Cookies","5 teaspoons white sugar",
"Apple Pie Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Apple Pie Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Apple Pie Cookies","1 (15.25 ounce) can apple pie filling, or as needed",
"Apple Pie Cookies","2 tablespoons sugar, or to taste",
"Apple Pie Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter, cream cheese, and vanilla extract together in a large bowl until smooth. Add flour, 5 teaspoons sugar, baking powder, and 1 teaspoon cinnamon; mix until dough comes together."
"Step 3","Roll dough into a 1/4-inch thick round on a floured work surface. Cut out 48 circles with a cookie cutter."
"Step 4","Top 24 dough circles with a teaspoon of apple pie filling. Cover with remaining 24 dough circles. Crimp edges with a fork to seal. Arrange cookies on lined baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are golden brown, 23 to 29 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes."
"Step 6","Mix 2 tablespoons sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon together in a shallow bowl. Roll warm cookies in sugar and cinnamon mixture until coated. Transfer to a wire rack to cool, about 10 minutes."
"Worm Cookies","1 (18 ounce) package refrigerated chocolate cookie dough",
"Worm Cookies","24 piece (blank)s gummi worms",
"Step 1","Make a Chocolate Cookies dough but do not bake."
"Step 2","Take the dough and roll it into balls 1 1/2- inch balls. Cut the balls each in half. Take a spoon and while holding the halves, press the spoon into the inside. Do this to all of the halves."
"Step 3","Divide the halves into 2 sets of 12 (or as much dough as you have on hand). On one half, press a worm into the indentation. Take the rest of the halves and press them onto the wormed ones so they are once again balls. Smooth edges."
"Step 4","Bake as called for in the recipe."
"Step 5","Serve and pretend they are regular cookies. Laugh out loud when you see the look on you spouse's and children's faces!!"
"Simple Sugar Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Simple Sugar Cookies",".33 cup shortening",
"Simple Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Simple Sugar Cookies",".67 cup honey",
"Simple Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Simple Sugar Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Simple Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Simple Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Mix sugar, shortening, egg, honey, and lemon extract."
"Step 3","Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well."
"Step 4","Roll dough 1/4 inch thick. Use cookie cutters to cut into desired shapes. Place 1 inch apart on lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake 7 to 8 minutes or until no indentation remains when touched. Cool and decorate."
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","cooking spray",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","1 .5 cups packed dark brown sugar",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","1 .5 teaspoons salt",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","3 cups old-fashioned rolled oats",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","1 (11 ounce) package butterscotch chips",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","16 cookies chocolate sandwich cookies with extra creme filling (such as Double Stuf Oreo®)",
"Oreo®-Stuffed Oatmeal Scotchies","flaked sea salt",
"Step 1","Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper and spray with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Beat brown sugar, butter, and white sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy, about 5 minutes. Scrape down sides of bowl a few times. Continue beating mixture while adding eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition. Add vanilla extract and mix well."
"Step 3","Whisk flour, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl. Slowly add flour mixture to creamed butter mixture while beating on low speed until dough is just mixed. Fold oats and butterscotch chips into dough."
"Step 4","Scoop 32 balls of dough using a large cookie scoop and arrange on the prepared baking sheets. Spray the bottom of a broad, flat glass or bowl with cooking spray and press onto each dough ball to flatten. Place a chocolate sandwich cookie on top of 16 flattened dough balls and cover with remaining 16 flattened dough balls, sealing the edges together with your fingers."
"Step 5","Transfer stuffed cookies to a container or tray and cover with a lid or plastic wrap. Refrigerate at least 1 hour to overnight."
"Step 6","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 7","Arrange cookies on the sheets with no more than 6 per sheet; top with a sprinkling of flaked salt."
"Step 8","Bake 1 tray at a time in the preheated oven until golden brown, 14 to 16 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before transferring to a wire rack to cool."
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds","cooking spray",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds","1 cup cold butter, cut into 1/2-inch pieces",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds","3 .5 ounces white chocolate, chopped",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds",".5 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds","2 tablespoons butter",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds","1 tablespoon white corn syrup",
"Shortbread Cookies with Chocolate and Almonds",".5 cup chopped almonds, toasted",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Place flour, confectioners' sugar, and salt in a food processor; pulse until blended. Add cold butter pieces and vanilla extract; blend until mixture forms clumps. Press butter-flour mixture evenly into the prepared baking dish."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Pierce dough all over with a fork while still hot. Slice dough into 12 squares, then cut each square in half diagonally, forming 24 triangle cookies."
"Step 4","Return cookies to the oven and continue to bake until golden brown, 30 to 35 minutes more. Trace a knife around each cookie to ensure they're completely sliced. Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Step 5","Melt white chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl in 30-second intervals, stirring after each melting, for 1 to 3 minutes (depending on your microwave). Drizzle white chocolate over cookies in a zigzag pattern, using a fork."
"Step 6","Melt milk chocolate chips, 2 tablespoons butter, and corn syrup in another microwave-safe bowl in 30-second intervals, stirring after each melting, for 1 to 3 minutes. Drizzle milk chocolate mixture over white chocolate, using a clean fork. Sprinkle almonds over chocolate. Let stand until chocolate sets, about 1 hour."
"SunButter® Monster Cookies",".25 cup softened organic butter",
"SunButter® Monster Cookies",".75 cup organic brown sugar",
"SunButter® Monster Cookies",".75 cup organic white sugar",
"SunButter® Monster Cookies","2 eaches organic eggs",
"SunButter® Monster Cookies","1 teaspoon gluten-free vanilla extract",
"SunButter® Monster Cookies","1 .25 teaspoons baking soda",
"SunButter® Monster Cookies","1 cup SunButter®, any variety",
"SunButter® Monster Cookies","3 cups gluten-free rolled oats",
"SunButter® Monster Cookies","1 .5 cups combined total monster ingredients: raisins, chocolate candies, etc.",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","In large mixing bowl cream butter and sugars until creamy. Add eggs, vanilla, and baking soda and mix well. Add SunButter® and mix until thoroughly blended."
"Step 3","Stir in oats. Add your monster ingredients and stir until well mixed throughout cookie dough."
"Step 4","Drop heaping tablespoon full onto parchment lined baking sheets. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes until edges are golden brown and cookies are somewhat firm."
"Step 5","Cool and store in airtight container."
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, room temperature",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","1 cup packed dark brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies",".5 teaspoon kosher salt",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour, divided",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies",".67 cup unsweetened Dutch-process cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Crisscross Cookies","1 teaspoon flaky sea salt (such as Maldon®)",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with a silicone baking mat or parchment paper."
"Step 2","Put butter, white sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. Cream together with a mixer until butter clings to sides of bowl and is uniform in color, about 2 minutes. Mix in eggs 1 at a time, waiting until first is incorporated before adding second. Add 2 cups flour; mix on low speed until incorporated. (Dough will be very soft.)"
"Step 3","Divide dough roughly in half and transfer one half to a separate bowl. Mix remaining 1/2 cup flour into one half, then stir in semisweet chocolate chips until evenly distributed. Mix cocoa powder into other half, then stir in white chocolate chips until evenly distributed."
"Step 4","Roll a tablespoon of each dough into a ball and tap lightly on counter to create a flat bottom (see assembly shots at left). Press flat sides together to form a larger ball, then flatten into a half-dark, half-light disk. Cut disk in half with a knife, cutting perpendicular to dough seam. Flip one half over and then firmly press halves back together. You should have a disk with 4 alternating quarters. Repeat with remaining dough. Transfer to baking sheet, spacing about 2 inches apart. Sprinkle with flaky sea salt."
"Step 5","Bake until cookie edges start to turn golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on sheet 10 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Shortbread Sugar Cookie Bars","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Shortbread Sugar Cookie Bars","1 cup butter, softened",
"Shortbread Sugar Cookie Bars",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Shortbread Sugar Cookie Bars",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Shortbread Sugar Cookie Bars",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Shortbread Sugar Cookie Bars","2 tablespoons cinnamon sugar, or to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, butter, confectioners' sugar, salt, and baking powder together in a bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Pat dough into a 9-inch square baking pan. Sprinkle with cinnamon sugar."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, 30 to 35 minutes. Cut into bars while still warm."
"Cherry-Date Skillet Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Cherry-Date Skillet Cookies","1 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"Cherry-Date Skillet Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package chopped pitted dates",
"Cherry-Date Skillet Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"Cherry-Date Skillet Cookies","3 cups crispy rice cereal",
"Cherry-Date Skillet Cookies","1 cup chopped coconut",
"Cherry-Date Skillet Cookies",".5 cup chopped drained maraschino cherries",
"Cherry-Date Skillet Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Cherry-Date Skillet Cookies","2 .5 cups flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Melt butter in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Add sugar and dates to the melted butter; stir until the sugar dissolves, 1 to 2 minutes."
"Step 2","Remove skillet from heat, add egg, and stir quickly to prevent the egg from cooking."
"Step 3","Return skillet to medium heat and cook, stirring constantly, until the mixture comes to a full boil, 4 to 6 minutes; cook at a boil, stirring constantly, for 1 minute more."
"Step 4","Remove skillet from heat. Stir rice cereal, chopped coconut, chopped cherries, and vanilla extract with the dates. Let mixture cool until beginning to firm, about 10 minutes."
"Step 5","Shape mixture by rounded teaspoonful into 1-inch balls. Spread flaked coconut into a wide, shallow dish and roll balls in the coconut to coat."
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies",".25 cup eggnog",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","1 teaspoon rum extract",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies",".25 cup eggnog",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","2 tablespoons light corn syrup",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies",".5 teaspoon rum extract",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Eggnog Cutout Cookies","3 cups powdered sugar, or as needed",
"Step 1","Whisk together flour, baking powder, nutmeg, and cinnamon in a bowl."
"Step 2","Cream together sugar and butter with an electric mixer in a second bowl. Mix in eggs, eggnog, vanilla extract, and rum extract. Add flour mixture and mix by hand until dough comes together. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and chill for at least 2 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 4","Roll out dough to 1/2 thickness on a lightly floured surface. Cut into shapes with cookie cutters and place 1-inch apart on the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in batches in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned on the bottom, 8 to 10 minutes. Carefully transfer to a wire rack and allow to cool, about 30 minutes."
"Step 6","Meanwhile, whisk together eggnog, corn syrup, vanilla extract, rum extract, and nutmeg for the icing in a bowl. Mix in as much powdered sugar 1 cup at a time, until icing is smooth and desired consistency is reached."
"Step 7","Dip cookie tops in icing and place on waxed paper to dry.Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Butterscotch Cookies","1 .67 cups butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl beat the butter or margarine, white sugar and brown sugar together. Add the eggs and vanilla, beating well."
"Step 3","Stir together the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and salt. Gradually add the flour mixture to the butter mixture and stir until blended. Stir in the oats and the butterscotch chips. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges begin to brown."
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Raisin Toffee Cookies","1 cup crushed toffee candy",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in the eggs, one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and cinnamon; stir into the creamed mixture. Blend in the oatmeal and toffee bits. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookie Logs","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookie Logs",".5 cup sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookie Logs","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookie Logs","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookie Logs","2 cups miniature semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookie Logs","1 tablespoon shortening",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookie Logs",".75 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Cream together butter and confectioners' sugar until smooth. Stir in vanilla. Mix in the flour, and then one cup of the chocolate chips. Shape dough into 2x1/2 inch logs. Place logs 2 inches apart on prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 13 minutes in preheated oven, or until firm. Let cookies cool completely before removing from pan (shortbread is brittle)."
"Step 4","Melt the remaining 1 cup chocolate chips and shortening over a double boiler, stirring frequently until smooth. Dip one end of each cookie into the chocolate, then into the nuts. Place onto waxed paper until set."
"Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies",".75 cup sugar",
"Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies","1 egg, room temperature",
"Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies","2 teaspoons anise extract",
"Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies",".5 cup milk, or as needed",
"Aunt Anne's Sesame Cookies","1 cup sesame seeds",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and anise extract until well blended. Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the butter mixture until well incorporated. If you are using a stand mixer, let the dough mix for another minute to add lightness to the dough. The dough will be soft, but will hand roll easily."
"Step 3","Pinch off pieces of dough slightly smaller than a walnut, and roll them into small logs. Dip in milk, then roll in sesame seeds. Place cookies one inch apart on a cookie sheet. Cookies will not spread very much."
"Step 4","Bake for 17 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bottom and sides of cookies are lightly toasted. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks. Store in an airtight container at room temperature."
"No Roll Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"No Roll Sugar Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"No Roll Sugar Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"No Roll Sugar Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"No Roll Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"No Roll Sugar Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"No Roll Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"No Roll Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"No Roll Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"No Roll Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Cream butter or margarine, shortening, white sugar and confectioners' sugar together until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg and the vanilla."
"Step 3","Sift the flour, baking soda, salt and cream of tartar together. Add the flour mixture to the sugar mixture and blend."
"Step 4","Shape dough into walnut-sized balls and place on the prepared baking sheets. Dip a glass in white sugar and press balls flat. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned."
"Gingerbread Men","1 (3.5 ounce) package cook and serve butterscotch pudding mix",
"Gingerbread Men",".5 cup butter",
"Gingerbread Men",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Gingerbread Men","1 egg",
"Gingerbread Men","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Gingerbread Men",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Gingerbread Men","1 .5 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Gingerbread Men","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
