"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the dry butterscotch pudding mix, butter, and brown sugar until smooth. Stir in the egg. Combine the flour, baking soda, ginger, and cinnamon; stir into the pudding mixture. Cover, and chill dough until firm, about 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets. On a floured board, roll dough out to about 1/8 inch thickness, and cut into man shapes using a cookie cutter. Place cookies 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are golden at the edges. Cool on wire racks."
"Spritz Cookies II","1 cup butter, softened",
"Spritz Cookies II","3 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Spritz Cookies II","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spritz Cookies II",".67 cup white sugar",
"Spritz Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Mix the butter or margarine, sugar, egg yolks and vanilla. Add the flour and mix by hand."
"Step 2","Spoon into cookie press and press onto ungreased cookie sheets. Sprinkle with colored sugars."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) oven for 7-10 minutes."
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup butter, softened",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Stir in the pecans and chocolate chips. Use a measuring tablespoon to round dough into balls. Don't roll the balls, just make them rounded. Place onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until centers are set and very lightly browned. Don't overbake. Cool 2 to 3 minutes before removing from baking sheets. Make sure you have lots of ice cold milk!!!"
"T. T.'s Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"T. T.'s Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"T. T.'s Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"T. T.'s Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"T. T.'s Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"T. T.'s Cookies",".33 cup peanut butter",
"T. T.'s Cookies","1 egg",
"T. T.'s Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"T. T.'s Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"T. T.'s Cookies","4 eaches chocolate covered peanut butter cups, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, cream together the sugar and butter. Stir in the peanut butter, egg and vanilla. Add the dry ingredients, mix well. Then fold in the chocolate chips and chopped peanut butter cups. Shape into 2 inch balls and place on unprepared cookie sheets 3 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons lemon extract",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Blue Ribbon Sugar Cookies",".5 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together the flour, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, oil, confectioners' sugar and white sugar until well blended. Stir in the eggs, vanilla and lemon extracts. Gradually mix in the dry ingredients until well blended. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Place the cookies 2 inches apart onto the cookie sheet. Flatten cookies to 1/8 inch thickness using the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar. Colored sugar may be used if you do not plan to frost cookies later."
"Step 3","Bake for 9 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are golden brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams",".75 teaspoon salt",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams",".75 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams","1 cup butter, softened",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams","2 large eggs eggs, slightly beaten",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams","1 cup vanilla baking chips",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams","1 cup chopped macadamia nuts",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Cranberry Dreams","1 cup dried cranberries",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, combine flour, baking soda and salt; set aside. Cream together white sugar, light brown sugar and butter (do not use shortening). Stir in slightly beaten eggs and vanilla."
"Step 3","Add flour mixture until just mixed. Stir in vanilla chips, macadamia nuts and dried cranberries."
"Step 4","Drop dough on an ungreased cookie sheet by small scoop or rounded teaspoon. Bake in preheated oven until cookies are just set, about 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool. Cookies will sink slightly."
"Step 5","Variations: To make chocolate cookies, omit 1/2 cup flour and replace with 1/2 cup cocoa. To make refrigerator cookies: Roll dough into 2 rolls, wrap with plastic wrap and chill or freeze. (If you freeze the dough, thaw for at least 1/2 hour before cutting). Slice 1-inch slices; cut into 4 and place on baking sheet point up. For fancier cookies: Drizzle melted white chocolate on chocolate cookies and melted dark chocolate on the white cookie. Enjoy!"
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Muz's Drop Sugar Cookies","1 tablespoon white sugar, or as desired",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift flour, salt, and baking soda together in a bowl. Beat 1 1/2 cups sugar, butter, shortening, and vanilla extract together in a separate bowl until thoroughly mixed; add egg and beat until creamy. Stir creamed mixture into flour mixture until smooth; stir in milk. Drop teaspoons of dough onto a baking sheet and flatten each with the bottom of a water glass. Sprinkle the tops of each cookie with enough sugar to cover the entire cookie."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned around the edges, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Raspberry and Almond Shortbread Thumbprints","1 cup butter, softened",
"Raspberry and Almond Shortbread Thumbprints",".67 cup white sugar",
"Raspberry and Almond Shortbread Thumbprints",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Raspberry and Almond Shortbread Thumbprints","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Raspberry and Almond Shortbread Thumbprints",".5 cup seedless raspberry jam",
"Raspberry and Almond Shortbread Thumbprints",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Raspberry and Almond Shortbread Thumbprints",".75 teaspoon almond extract",
"Raspberry and Almond Shortbread Thumbprints","1 teaspoon milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together butter and white sugar until smooth. Mix in 1/2 teaspoon almond extract. Mix in flour until dough comes together. Roll dough into 1 1/2 inch balls, and place on ungreased cookie sheets. Make a small hole in the center of each ball, using your thumb and finger, and fill the hole with preserves."
"Step 3","Bake for 14 to 18 minutes in preheated oven, or until lightly browned. Let cool 1 minute on the cookie sheet."
"Step 4","In a medium bowl, mix together the confectioners' sugar, 3/4 teaspoon almond extract, and milk until smooth. Drizzle lightly over warm cookies."
"Italian Easter Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Italian Easter Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Italian Easter Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Italian Easter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Italian Easter Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Italian Easter Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Italian Easter Cookies",".25 cup vegetable oil",
"Italian Easter Cookies","3 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Italian Easter Cookies","5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Italian Easter Cookies","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Italian Easter Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Italian Easter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Italian Easter Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Italian Easter Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Italian Easter Cookies","3 drops red food coloring",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together 1/2 cup butter and white sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 teaspoon almond extract, 1/4 cup milk and oil. Combine the flour and baking powder, stir into the wet mixture. Roll dough into 1 inch balls. On a lightly floured surface, roll the balls out into ropes about 5 inches long. Tie into loose knots and place cookies 1 inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 5 minutes on the bottom shelf and 5 minutes on the top shelf of the preheated oven, until the bottoms of the cookies are golden brown. When cookies are cool, dip them into the icing."
"Step 4","To make the icing, cream together the confectioners' sugar, 1/2 cup butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 teaspoon almond extracts. Beat in 3 tablespoons milk, one tablespoon at a time, then stir in the food coloring if desired."
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","2 tablespoons coffee-flavored liqueur",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","1 cup finely chopped toasted hazelnuts",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Pile-Up Cookies","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper. In a bowl, mix the flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt."
"Step 2","Beat the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a bowl with an electric mixer until soft and creamy, then beat in the eggs, vanilla extract, and coffee liqueur. Gradually beat the flour mixture into the butter-sugar mixture until well combined. Stir in the hazelnuts, semisweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate chips, and white chocolate chips until evenly distributed through the dough. Drop by rounded teaspoons, about 2 inches apart, onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are slightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Excellent Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in oats and nuts until just blended. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Cookies should be at least 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for about 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool cookies on a wire rack."
"Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies",".25 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies",".5 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Mix sugar, butter, egg, and vanilla together in a large bowl. Mix flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt in a small bowl."
"Step 3","Beat flour mixture into sugar mixture slowly until well-combined, about 2 minutes. Stir chocolate chips into cookie dough."
"Step 4","Spoon cookie dough onto the baking sheet, spaced about 2-inches apart."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are crisp, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II",".67 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies II","15 eaches miniature chocolate covered peanut butter cups, unwrapped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream the butter, white sugar, brown sugar, and peanut butter together. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture."
"Step 3","Drop by tablespoonfuls into the cups of a muffin tin. Cups should be about 1/4 full. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, until lightly browned. Remove from oven and immediately press a peanut butter cup into the center of each cookie. Allow the cookies to cool completely before removing from their pan."
"Popularity Cookies","35 crackers soda crackers",
"Popularity Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Popularity Cookies","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Popularity Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Popularity Cookies","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Popularity Cookies","1 cup blanched slivered almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C). Cover a sided cookie sheet with aluminum foil and line crackers on foil."
"Step 2","Combine butter and brown sugar in a saucepan. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil and boil for 3 minutes. Pour over crackers completely."
"Step 3","Bake for 5-6 minutes, watch carefully. Remove cookie sheet from oven, place it on oven door and sprinkle chips over baked crackers. When chocolate gets soft, spread over crackers with back of a spoon. Sprinkle slivered almonds on melted chocolate. Place in refrigerator for at least 8 hours. Break into cookie-size pieces. This recipe freezes well."
"Cookie Bouquet","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cookie Bouquet",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cookie Bouquet",".75 pound unsalted butter, softened",
"Cookie Bouquet","1 cup white sugar",
"Cookie Bouquet","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cookie Bouquet","4 cups confectioners' sugar, sifted",
"Cookie Bouquet","10 tablespoons water, or as needed",
"Cookie Bouquet","2 tablespoons meringue powder",
"Cookie Bouquet","1 teaspoon gel food coloring, or as desired",
"Cookie Bouquet","lollipop sticks",
"Step 1","Whisk flour and salt together in a medium bowl and set aside."
"Step 2","Cream butter and sugar together in the bowl of stand mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 4 minutes. Add vanilla extract and mix to combine. Slowly add flour and mix on low speed until a dough comes together."
"Step 3","Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and shape into 2 flat disks. Wrap each in plastic wrap and chill for 30 minutes."
"Step 4","Line 3 baking sheets with parchment paper. Roll out one of the chilled dough rounds to 1/4-inch thickness and cut out flowers using cookie cutters of your choice. Re-roll the dough up to 3 times and continue cutting out cookies. Transfer cookies to a baking sheet using a flat spatula. Place cookies about 1 inch apart, fitting about 12 on each sheet."
"Step 5","Roll out the second dough round and repeat cutting out flowers until you have about 3 dozen cookies in total. Freeze cookies for 20 minutes to help maintain their shape."
"Step 6","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 7","Bake until the edges start to look pale golden, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool on pans for 5 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack and cool to room temperature, at least 1 hour."
"Step 8","Combine confectioners' sugar, 5 tablespoons water, and meringue powder in the bowl of a stand mixer and mix on medium until a thick icing forms. Add more water, 1 tablespoon at a time, until desired texture is reached. Divide icing among several bowls and tint with desired gel food coloring."
"Step 9","Decorate cookies as desired using a pastry bags and tips. Reserve any leftover icing in an airtight container for attaching the sticks. Let icing dry, 4 hours to overnight."
"Step 10","Attach lollipop sticks to the back of the dry cookies with royal icing. Tie together with ribbon or arrange in a gift box.Lemon Cheesecake Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Lemon Cheesecake Cookies","3 ounces cream cheese, softened",
"Lemon Cheesecake Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Lemon Cheesecake Cookies","1 large egg yolk",
"Lemon Cheesecake Cookies","1 tablespoon freshly grated lemon zest",
"Lemon Cheesecake Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Lemon Cheesecake Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lemon Cheesecake Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Lemon Cheesecake Cookies","5 drops yellow food coloring",
"Lemon Cheesecake Cookies","60 eaches cinnamon red hot candies, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter and cream cheese together in a bowl. Add sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add egg yolk, lemon peel, and lemon extract and beat well."
"Step 3","Sift flour and salt together in a bowl. Add to the bowl with the butter mixture in 3 additions, mixing well after each. Add food coloring and mix in thoroughly."
"Step 4","Press cookies 1 inch apart onto the prepared baking sheet using a cookie press fitted with a flower disc. Press 1 red hot cinnamon candy into the center of each cookie."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until just starting to turn golden brown on the edges, 14 to 16 minutes; do not overbake."
"Step 6","Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies","2 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies","1 cup shortening (such as Crisco®)",
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies","1 cup powdered sugar",
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies","4 teaspoons maraschino cherry juice",
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies","4 drops red food coloring",
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies",".75 teaspoon almond extract",
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies","⅛ teaspoon cherry flavoring (such as Wilton®)",
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies",".75 cup drained, chopped maraschino cherries",
"Chocolate Cherry Kiss Cookies","48 piece (blank)s milk chocolate kisses (such as HERSHEY'S), or more as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Whisk flour and salt together in a small bowl."
"Step 3","Combine shortening, powdered sugar, cherry juice, red food coloring, and cherry flavoring in a large bowl. Add flour mixture and mix well. Stir in maraschino cherries."
"Step 4","Shape dough into 1-inch balls; arrange 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are light golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes. Immediately top each cookie with a chocolate kiss, pressing firmly. Transfer cookies to wire racks to cool completely."
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies","3 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies","1 tablespoon cream",
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies","3 large egg whites egg whites",
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies","1 .25 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped walnuts",
"Ukrainian Snow Cap Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut,",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets or line with parchment paper. Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream the butter and beat in egg yolks one at a time. Stir in cream, and then mix in the dry ingredients to form a light dough. If necessary, cover dough and chill for 30 minutes for easier handling."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness, and cut into small circles. Place the circles onto the prepared baking sheets. In a clean glass or metal bowl, whip egg whites to soft peaks. Gradually add confectioners' sugar while continuing to whip to stiff peaks. Fold in walnuts and coconut. Spoon some of the meringue mixture onto the top of each cookie."
"Step 4","Bake for 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until delicately browned."
"Easy Drop Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Easy Drop Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Easy Drop Cookies","1 egg",
"Easy Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easy Drop Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Easy Drop Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Easy Drop Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Easy Drop Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together butter or margarine and white sugar. Add egg, vanilla and milk. Mix well."
"Step 3","Gradually add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Roll spoonfuls of dough in your hands and dip one end in colored sugar. Place on baking sheets and press top down with a glass. Bake for 12 minutes."
"Cookies for Rookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cookies for Rookies","1 cup quick-cooking oats",
"Cookies for Rookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cookies for Rookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cookies for Rookies",".33 cup butter, softened",
"Cookies for Rookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cookies for Rookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Cookies for Rookies",".25 cup buttermilk",
"Cookies for Rookies",".33 cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Stir together the flour, oats, baking soda and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar until smooth. Stir in the peanut butter and buttermilk. Gradually mix in the dry ingredients, then fold in chocolate chips. Roll dough into walnut-sized balls and place them 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Use a fork dipped in flour to flatten the balls slightly."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly brown at the edges. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Spur Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Spur Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Spur Sugar Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Spur Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Spur Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Spur Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Spur Sugar Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Spur Sugar Cookies",".5 cup evaporated milk",
"Spur Sugar Cookies","5 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream the sugar with the shortening. Stir in the egg, salt and lemon flavoring."
"Step 3","Combine the milk and the evaporated milk. Dissolve the baking soda in the milks. Add this mixture to the creamed mixture and combine well. Stir in enough of the flour to make a stiff dough."
"Step 4","You can either roll out the dough and cut with cookie cutters or roll the dough into balls and press flat with the bottom of a glass. If desired sprinkle the cookies with sugar before baking."
"Step 5","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees CO for 10 to 12 minutes or until cookies are soft and lightly browned around the edges. Be careful not to overbake!"
"Easy Peanut Butter Chip Cookie Bars","1 (18 ounce) package refrigerated sugar cookie dough",
"Easy Peanut Butter Chip Cookie Bars","1 cup peanut butter",
"Easy Peanut Butter Chip Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easy Peanut Butter Chip Cookie Bars","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Easy Peanut Butter Chip Cookie Bars","1 cup mini chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line an 8-inch-square baking pan with heavy duty aluminum foil."
"Step 2","Slice off 1/3 the dough, creating 2 portions. Pat the bigger portion into the bottom of the prepared pan. Reserve the smaller portion for topping."
"Step 3","Combine peanut butter and vanilla extract in a bowl. Beat using an electric mixer on low speed until creamy. Add confectioners' sugar slowly, 1 tablespoon at a time, beating well after each addition. Add chocolate chips."
"Step 4","Drop spoonfuls of the peanut butter mixture onto the cookie dough in the baking pan and pat down to cover the dough. Crumble reserved dough into pebble-like chunks; drop over the peanut butter layer. Pat down slightly."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, about 30 minutes. Let cool in the pan. Lift cookies out by the aluminum foil and cut into bars."
"Oatmeal Cookie Mix II","3 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Cookie Mix II","1 cup brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Cookie Mix II","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Cookie Mix II",".33 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Cookie Mix II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Cookie Mix II","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","In a 1 quart jar, layer the ingredients in the following order: half of the oats, half of the brown sugar, flour. Mix together the sugar, baking soda and cinnamon, put on top of flour, then remaining brown sugar and remaining oats. Screw on the lid and attach a tag with the following instructions:"
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. In a large bowl, beat 1 1/4 cups of butter with 1 egg and 1 teaspoon of vanilla until fluffy. Stir in the contents of the jar. Drop cookies by rounded tablespoons 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on cookie sheets for 1 minute before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Black Walnut Cookies I","1 cup butter",
"Black Walnut Cookies I","1 cup packed dark brown sugar",
"Black Walnut Cookies I","1 egg",
"Black Walnut Cookies I",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Black Walnut Cookies I","1 teaspoon maple flavored extract",
"Black Walnut Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Black Walnut Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Black Walnut Cookies I","1 .5 cups chopped black walnuts",
"Step 1","Cream butter and sugar. Beat in egg and add flavoring. Add in flour and baking powder dissolved in a couple drops of water. Add nuts and mix well."
"Step 2","Divide dough into thirds and roll into logs. Refrigerate until firm (about 1 hour.)"
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Slice logs into thin cookies. Bake for 9 minutes or until light brown in color."
"Snickerdoodles V","1 cup shortening",
"Snickerdoodles V","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Snickerdoodles V","2 large eggs eggs",
"Snickerdoodles V","2 .75 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Snickerdoodles V","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Snickerdoodles V","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Snickerdoodles V",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Snickerdoodles V","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Snickerdoodles V","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Add eggs one at a time, mixing after each. Sift together the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until well blended."
"Step 3","In a small shallow bowl, stir together the 2 tablespoons of sugar with the cinnamon. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls and roll the balls in the sugar mixture. Place cookies 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies should be slightly golden at the edges. Remove to cool on wire racks."
"Old Fashioned Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Old Fashioned Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Old Fashioned Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Old Fashioned Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Old Fashioned Cookies","5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Old Fashioned Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Old Fashioned Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease two cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Cream the sugar with the shortening and the butter or the margarine. Add the baking powder, eggs, milk and flour. Mix until combined."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface roll out the dough to 1/4 inch thick and cut into desired shapes. Place cookies on the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until lightly browned."
"Chocolate Mint Crinkle Cookies","1 .75 cups granulated sugar",
"Chocolate Mint Crinkle Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Mint Crinkle Cookies","4 ounces unsweetened chocolate, melted and cooled slightly",
"Chocolate Mint Crinkle Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Mint Crinkle Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chocolate Mint Crinkle Cookies","1 teaspoon peppermint extract",
"Chocolate Mint Crinkle Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Mint Crinkle Cookies","1 cup powdered sugar",
"Chocolate Mint Crinkle Cookies","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Step 1","Combine the granulated sugar, eggs, melted chocolate, shortening, baking powder, and peppermint extract in a large bowl. Beat with an electric mixer on medium speed until combined, scraping sides of bowl occasionally. Gradually beat in as much of the flour as you can with the mixer. Using a wooden spoon, stir in any remaining flour."
"Step 2","Cover and chill for 2 to 24 hours or until dough is easy to handle."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Line cookie sheets with Reynolds® Parchment Paper; set aside. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Roll balls in powdered sugar and place 2 inches apart on prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake about 9 minutes or until edges are just set. Transfer the cookies on the parchment paper to a wire rack; cool completely."
"Pignoli Cookies II",".5 pound almond paste",
"Pignoli Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Pignoli Cookies II","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Pignoli Cookies II",".25 cup pine nuts",
"Step 1","Use a pastry chopper (or food processor) to break up the almond paste into a granulated form. Put in mixing bowl and gradually add the sugar."
"Step 2","In another small bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff. Fold the egg whites into the sugar/almond paste mixture gently."
"Step 3","On a greased and floured cookie sheet, drop a spoonful of the mixture. Press pine nuts into the top of the cookie (you want to cover the top with nuts)."
"Step 4","Bake at 325 degrees F (170 degrees C) for 10-12 minutes. Cool on wire rack."
"Mississippi Mud Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Mississippi Mud Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Mississippi Mud Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Mississippi Mud Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Mississippi Mud Cookies","6 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Mississippi Mud Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Mississippi Mud Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Mississippi Mud Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Bring sugar, milk and butter to boil. Boil for 2 minutes and remove from heat."
"Step 2","Stir in cocoa and vanilla. Stir in remaining ingredients to coat well."
"Step 3","Drop onto waxed paper by the tablespoonfuls. Cool and enjoy!"
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies",".25 cup packed brown sugar",
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies","1 egg",
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies",".5 cup chopped white chocolate",
"White Chocolate Chunk Pecan Cookies",".33 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Blend sugar and butter together until smooth and creamy. Add the egg and vanilla; blend well."
"Step 2","Sift together the flour, salt, and baking powder; combine these ingredients with the creamed mixture. Add chopped white chocolate and nuts."
"Step 3","Spoon dough out onto a cookie sheet. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for about 5 to 10 minutes, or until golden brown on the bottom. Let cool slightly on the cookie sheet before removing, or they'll break."
"Christmas Wreaths",".5 cup butter",
"Christmas Wreaths","30 regulars large marshmallows",
"Christmas Wreaths","1 .5 teaspoons green food coloring",
"Christmas Wreaths","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Christmas Wreaths","4 cups cornflakes cereal",
"Christmas Wreaths","2 tablespoons cinnamon red hot candies",
"Step 1","Melt butter in a large saucepan over low heat. Add marshmallows, and cook until melted, stirring constantly. Remove from heat, and stir in the food coloring, vanilla, and cornflakes."
"Step 2","Quickly drop heaping tablespoonfuls of the mixture onto waxed paper, and form into a wreath shape with lightly greased fingers. Immediately decorate with red hot candies. Allow to cool to room temperature before removing from waxed paper, and storing in an airtight container."
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons real maple syrup",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup finely ground graham cracker crumbs",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","5 cups rolled oats",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups chopped walnuts",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 (12 ounce) packages semisweet chocolate chips",
"Excessively Good Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (7 ounce) bar milk chocolate candy bar (such as Hershey's®), cut into pieces",
"Step 1","In a large bowl cream, sugar, butter, and maple syrup. Add eggs and vanilla."
"Step 2","Grind the oats in a food processor to a coarse texture. Mix the dry ingredients together (except chocolate) and pour in half, add the cracker crumbs and nuts, mix well and add the rest of the dry ingredients. NOTE: You can use any one of the following kinds of nuts: peanuts, almonds, pecans, walnuts, filberts, cashews or chestnuts."
"Step 3","Add the chocolate chips and chocolate pieces last and form into small balls and place on a ungreased cookie sheet 3 inches apart. Press the cookies flat."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Dough also freezes well."
"Swedish Cookies (Brunscrackers)","2 cups flour",
"Swedish Cookies (Brunscrackers)","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Swedish Cookies (Brunscrackers)","1 cup butter",
"Swedish Cookies (Brunscrackers)","1 cup sugar",
"Swedish Cookies (Brunscrackers)","1 teaspoon vanilla sugar",
"Swedish Cookies (Brunscrackers)","2 tablespoons golden syrup",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Sift together the flour and baking soda."
"Step 2","In a separate bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, vanilla sugar, and golden syrup; mix well. Stir in the flour and mix until just incorporated. Form dough into two, 1 inch thick elongated rolls the length of your cookie pan. Place them on the cookie pan with enough space in between for them to spread."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until they are light golden brown and have flattened; about 20 to 22 minutes if using margarine, or 13 to 15 minutes if using butter. Remove from oven and let cool slightly for about 3 minutes. Cut diagonally into 1 to 2 inch strips while still warm. Remove individual cookies to cool on a wire rack."
"Biscotti Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Biscotti Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Biscotti Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Biscotti Cookies","6 tablespoons shortening",
"Biscotti Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Biscotti Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees F). Grease 2 baking sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, combine flour, sugar, and baking powder. Cut in the vegetable shortening until mixture resembles coarse crumbs."
"Step 3","In a large bowl, beat the eggs until thick and light-colored. Gradually beat the eggs into the flour mixture. Fold in the walnuts."
"Step 4","On a floured surface, roll out the dough 1/4 inch thick. Using a cookie cutter, cut into desired shapes and place 1 1/2 inches apart on baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake for 12 to 14 minutes, until lightly colored. Transfer to wire racks to cool."
"Peanut Butter Bacon Cookies","1 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Bacon Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Bacon Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Bacon Cookies","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Bacon Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Bacon Cookies","7 slices cooked and diced bacon",
"Peanut Butter Bacon Cookies","2 tablespoons white sugar, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat peanut butter, 1/2 cup white sugar, and brown sugar together in the bowl of a stand mixer until well combined. Add egg and baking soda; beat until smooth, 1 minute. Fold in bacon. Form dough into walnut-sized balls."
"Step 3","Pour 2 tablespoons white sugar into a bowl; roll balls in the sugar until coated. Arrange coated balls on a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack.Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","48 piece (0.2 oz)s chocolate covered caramel candies",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","1 tablespoon white sugar",
"Chocolate Covered Caramel Surprise Cookies","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the white sugar, brown sugar, and butter until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, and baking soda, gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in the pecans. Cover dough and chill for at least one hour. Meanwhile unwrap the candies."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","With floured hands, wrap about 1 tablespoon of dough around each piece of candy, completely covering the candy. Roll each ball in the remaining tablespoon of white sugar. Place 2 inches apart on an unprepared cookie sheet. Bake for 7 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies should be set and slightly cracked."
"Step 4","Melt the white chocolate chips in the microwave oven, or in a bowl over simmering water. Drizzle over the cookies when they are cool. If the melted chips are too thick, add vegetable oil to achieve the desired consistency."
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Nutty Crispy Sugar Cookies",".75 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets. Stir together the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs, vegetable oil, and vanilla. Gradually stir in flour mixture until smooth. Stir in nuts. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Flatten cookies with a fork."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes, or until the edges begin to brown. Cool on baking sheets for a minute before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","1 cup butter",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","1 pinch salt",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies I","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Beat sugars, margarine, vegetable oil and salt very well. Add eggs and dry ingredients."
"Step 2","Make into balls, roll in sugar and place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8 minutes. For holidays or special occasions, roll in colored sugar instead of white sugar."
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies","1 .5 cups cold butter",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies",".5 teaspoon rum extract",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies","2 tablespoons cold water",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies","2 teaspoons milk",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies","1 drop food coloring, or to desired shade",
"Shortbread Christmas Cookies","1 tablespoon colored edible glitter, or as desired",
"Step 1","Whisk together flour, sugar, and salt in a large bowl; with a pastry cutter, chop in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir the rum extract and almond extract into the water in a small bowl. Mix into the dry ingredients, a little bit at a time, until the mixture holds together in a ball when you squeeze it."
"Step 2","Place the dough onto a floured work surface, and sprinkle with flour; roll out into a sheet 1/4 inch thick. Cut into shapes with floured cookie cutters, and place 1 inch apart on ungreased baking sheets. Cover with a layer of plastic wrap, and refrigerate for 30 minutes."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Bake the cookies just until the edges are lightly browned, 15 to 18 minutes. Allow to cool on sheets for 2 minutes before removing to wire racks to finish cooling. Cool completely before decorating."
"Step 5","For frosting, whisk the confectioners' sugar and milk in a bowl until smooth. If desired, divide frosting into small bowls, and tint each bowl a desired shade with food coloring. Frost fully cooled cookies, and sprinkle with edible glitter before the frosting sets."
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","1 .33 cups packed brown sugar",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies",".33 cup water",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies",".5 cup wheat germ",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Hearty Breakfast Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease two baking sheets or line them with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, using an electric mixer, beat together butter, peanut butter, brown sugar, and vanilla until creamy. Beat in eggs and water."
"Step 3","Mix together flours, oats, wheat germ, salt, cinnamon, and baking soda. Mix into peanut butter mixture. Stir in raisins or dates (see Cook's Note). Drop by ice cream scoopfuls 2 1/2 inches apart on prepared baking sheets. Flatten slightly."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven for 18 to 20 minutes. Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes, then transfer to cooling racks. Store in an airtight container."
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines","12 eaches craft sticks",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines",".33 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines","1 egg",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines","12 (1 ounce) squares white chocolate",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines","1 egg white",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines","1 .25 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Lollipop Cookie Valentines","3 drops red food coloring",
"Step 1","Soak craft sticks for one hour in a bowl of cold water."
"Step 2","In small heavy saucepan over very low heat, stir chocolate chips until melted and smooth. Remove from heat; let cool."
"Step 3","In large bowl with electric mixer at medium speed, beat butter, brown sugar and vanilla until fluffy. Beat egg in well; beat in cooled chocolate. With mixer at low speed, beat in flour, cocoa powder and salt until smooth. Divide dough in half."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and grease 2 large cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Roll each half out to 1/8 inch thickness between 2 sheets of wax paper; freeze, in wax paper, 5 minutes. Peal top sheets of wax paper off dough; cut dough out using 3-inch heart-shaped cutter. Reroll scraps; freeze again 5 minutes; cut out. Place half of the hearts 1 inch apart on prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 6","Drain sticks, pat dry. Place one stick on each heart to make 2 1/2 inch handle, pressing lightly into dough. Place remaining hearts on top; press edges gently to seal. Bake about 12 minutes until firm to touch. Cool on wire racks."
"Step 7","In 2-quart heavy saucepan over very low heat, or in top of double boiler set over barely simmering water, stir white or milk chocolate until melted and smooth; if using both chocolates, melt in separate 1-quart pans. Remove from heat."
"Step 8","Holding each lollipop by handle, dip into chocolate to coat on both sides; let excess chocolate drip back into pan. Place each lollipop as it is coated on wax-paper-lined cookie sheet; refrigerate 20 minutes until chocolate is set."
"Step 9","To Make Icing: In large bowl with electric mixer at high speed, beat egg white and confectioners' sugar until very smooth. If desired, remove small portion of icing to separate bowl; tint with drops of food coloring. Spoon icing into decorating bag fitted with small writing tip; pipe over lollipops in desired patterns. Decorate with assorted candies and decors; attaching with dots of icing."
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup granulated sugar",
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups NESTLE® TOLL HOUSE® Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels",
"Original Nestle® Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda and salt in small bowl. Beat butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar and vanilla extract in large mixer bowl until creamy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Gradually beat in flour mixture. Stir in morsels and nuts. Drop by rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 9 to 11 minutes or until golden brown. Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely."
"Lemon Snowflake Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package lemon cake mix with pudding",
"Lemon Snowflake Cookies","1 egg",
"Lemon Snowflake Cookies","2 .25 cups frozen whipped topping, thawed",
"Lemon Snowflake Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix the cake mix, egg and whipped topping together. Beat with an electric mixer on medium speed until well blended (batter will be sticky)."
"Step 3","Drop batter by teaspoonfuls into the confectioners' sugar and roll to coat. Place cookies onto ungreased baking sheets and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned."
"No Bake Fudge Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"No Bake Fudge Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"No Bake Fudge Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"No Bake Fudge Cookies",".75 cup peanut butter",
"No Bake Fudge Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"No Bake Fudge Cookies","6 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"No Bake Fudge Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"No Bake Fudge Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Combine white sugar, milk, and butter in a large saucepan; bring to boil for 1 minute."
"Step 2","Remove saucepan from heat and add peanut butter, oats, cocoa, vanilla, and raisins."
"Step 3","Stir well. Drop by teaspoon onto waxed paper. Let sit one hour."
"Cookie Mix in a Jar III","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Cookie Mix in a Jar III","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Cookie Mix in a Jar III",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Cookie Mix in a Jar III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cookie Mix in a Jar III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cookie Mix in a Jar III",".75 cup raisins",
"Cookie Mix in a Jar III","2 cups rolled oats",
"Cookie Mix in a Jar III",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cookie Mix in a Jar III",".5 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Mix together flour, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, baking soda, and salt. Set aside."
"Step 2","Layer ingredients in the following order into a 1 quart, wide mouth canning jar: Flour mixture, raisins, rolled oats, brown sugar, and white sugar. It will be a tight fit, make sure you firmly pack down each layer before adding the next layer."
"Step 3","Attach a tag with the following instructions: Oatmeal Raisin Spice Cookies 1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper. 2. Empty jar of cookie mix into large mixing bowl. Use your hands to thoroughly mix. 3. Mix in 3/4 cup butter or margarine, softened. Stir in one slightly beaten egg and 1 teaspoon of vanilla. Mix until completely blended. You will need to finish mixing with your hands. Shape into balls the size of walnuts. Place on a parchment lined cookie sheets 2 inches apart. 4. Bake for 11 to 13 minutes in preheated oven, or until edges are lightly browned. Cool 5 minutes on cookie sheet. Transfer cookies to wire racks to finish cooling."
"Best Brownies",".5 cup butter",
"Best Brownies","1 cup white sugar",
"Best Brownies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Best Brownies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Best Brownies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Best Brownies",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Best Brownies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Best Brownies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Best Brownies","3 tablespoons butter, softened",
"Best Brownies","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Best Brownies","1 tablespoon honey",
"Best Brownies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Best Brownies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour an 8-inch square pan."
"Step 2","In a large saucepan, melt 1/2 cup butter. Remove from heat, and stir in sugar, eggs, and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Beat in 1/3 cup cocoa, 1/2 cup flour, salt, and baking powder. Spread batter into prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes. Do not overcook."
"Step 4","To Make Frosting: Combine 3 tablespoons softened butter, 3 tablespoons cocoa, honey, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, and 1 cup confectioners' sugar. Stir until smooth. Frost brownies while they are still warm."
"Deep Fried Oreos®","2 quarts vegetable oil for frying",
"Deep Fried Oreos®","1 large egg",
"Deep Fried Oreos®","1 cup milk",
"Deep Fried Oreos®","2 teaspoons vegetable oil",
"Deep Fried Oreos®","1 cup pancake mix",
"Deep Fried Oreos®","1 (18 ounce) package cream-filled chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®)",
"Step 1","Heat oil in deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Whisk together the egg, milk, and 2 teaspoons of vegetable oil in a bowl until smooth. Stir in the pancake mix until no dry lumps remain. Dip the cookies into the batter one at a time, and carefully place into the hot frying oil. Fry only 4 or 5 at a time to avoid overcrowding the deep fryer. Cook until the cookies are golden-brown, about 2 minutes. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate before serving."
"Rum or Bourbon Balls","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Rum or Bourbon Balls",".5 cup white sugar",
"Rum or Bourbon Balls","3 tablespoons corn syrup",
"Rum or Bourbon Balls",".5 cup rum",
"Rum or Bourbon Balls","2 .5 cups crushed vanilla wafers",
"Rum or Bourbon Balls","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Rum or Bourbon Balls",".33 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Place chocolate chips into a microwave-safe medium bowl. Heat in the microwave for 1 minute, stir and then continue to heat at 20 second intervals, stirring between each, until melted and smooth. Stir in sugar and corn syrup. Blend in rum. Add crushed vanilla wafers and chopped nuts. Mix until evenly distributed. Cover and refrigerate until firm."
"Step 2","Roll the chilled chocolate mixture into bite-size balls. Roll balls in a mixture of ground nuts and confectioner's sugar, or just plain confectioner's sugar. Store in a covered container for a week before serving to blend the flavors."
"Wreath Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Wreath Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Wreath Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Wreath Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Wreath Cookies","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Wreath Cookies","1 .5 cups finely chopped walnuts",
"Wreath Cookies",".5 cup raspberry jam",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg yolks one at a time. gradually mix in the flour. Cover dough and chill until firm, about 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Roll dough into balls a little smaller than walnuts. Dip the balls in egg white, then roll them in the chopped walnuts. Place cookies 1 inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Press thumb into middle of each ball to create a divot."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are golden. Remove from oven and repress divots, fill the divots with 1/2 teaspoon of raspberry jam. Remove cookies to cool on wire racks."
"Martian Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Martian Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Martian Cookies","1 egg",
"Martian Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Martian Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Martian Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Martian Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Martian Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Martian Cookies","1 cup quick cooking oats",
"Martian Cookies","1 cup grated zucchini",
"Martian Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Martian Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Martian Cookies",".5 cup butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixing bowl beat butter until soft, add sugar, and beat until fluffy. Add egg and vanilla, beat well."
"Step 3","In a medium bowl stir together flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt. With mixer on low speed, gradually add four mixture to butter mixture, beat until well mixed. With a wooden spoon, stir in oats, zucchini, walnuts or pecans, chocolate and butterscotch pieces."
"Step 4","Drop by rounded teaspoons about 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Cool sheets and then cookies on a cooling rack. ENJOY!"
"Thimble Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Thimble Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Thimble Cookies","1 egg yolk, beaten",
"Thimble Cookies","2 teaspoons lemon juice",
"Thimble Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Thimble Cookies","1 egg white",
"Thimble Cookies","1 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Thimble Cookies","1 cup (approx.) raspberry jam or jelly",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter and sugar; add yolk and lemon juice and beat well. Stir in flour until well blended."
"Step 3","Form into 1 inch balls, dip into beaten egg white then into chopped nuts. Place on greased cookie sheet, make deep indentation in center of each cookie. Bake for 5 minutes, then quickly indent centers again, continue baking for 10 minutes."
"Step 4","Fill center of each hot cookie with raspberry jam or jelly."
"Chocolate Espresso Cookies","3 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate",
"Chocolate Espresso Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Espresso Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Chocolate Espresso Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Espresso Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Espresso Cookies","2 .25 teaspoons finely ground espresso beans",
"Chocolate Espresso Cookies",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Espresso Cookies",".33 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Espresso Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets or line them with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In the top of a double boiler, melt together the unsweetened chocolate, 1 cup of the chocolate chips and the butter. This can also be done in a microwave oven on low setting. Stir occasionally until melted. In a medium bowl, beat the eggs and sugar until thick and light, about 3 minutes. Stir in the espresso. Add the chocolate mixture, mix well. Sift together the flour and baking powder, fold into the egg mixture. Carefully fold in the chopped nuts and remaining chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop dough by tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies will have a crackled appearance when done. Cool on baking sheets."
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II",".5 cup butter, softened",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II",".5 cup shortening",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II",".5 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II","1 egg",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies II","7 ounces macadamia nuts, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Beat butter and shortening until soft and creamy. Gradually add the sugars and beat well."
"Step 3","Add egg and vanilla and beat well."
"Step 4","Combine flour, soda and salt; gradually add to butter mixture beating well after each addition. Stir in chips and nuts."
"Step 5","Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheets. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until done. Remove to wire racks to cool."
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","1 egg",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup solid pack pumpkin puree",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup fresh cranberries",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies","1 tablespoon orange zest",
"Cranberry-Pumpkin Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in vanilla, egg and pumpkin. Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and cinnamon; stir into mixture until well blended. Cut the cranberries in half and stir into mixture along with the orange zest and walnuts. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes."
"No Bake Cookies IV","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"No Bake Cookies IV",".33 cup butter",
"No Bake Cookies IV","16 regulars large marshmallows",
"No Bake Cookies IV",".33 cup creamy peanut butter",
"No Bake Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"No Bake Cookies IV","1 cup flaked coconut",
"No Bake Cookies IV","2 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","In the top half of a double boiler, melt chocolate chips, butter, and marshmallows over low heat. Stir until smooth, and remove from heat. Stir in the peanut butter, vanilla, coconut, and oats. Mix thoroughly. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Refrigerate for about 30 minutes, or until set.Fig Cookies","2 cups fig preserves",
"Fig Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Fig Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Fig Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Fig Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fig Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Fig Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fig Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together shortening, eggs, sugar, and vanilla. Sift flour, soda, and baking powder. Add to egg mixture."
"Step 3","Grease a small cookie sheet with shortening. Pour 1/2 of the dough into pan and spread."
"Step 4","Pour fig preserves over the dough and gently spread. Drop rest of dough over figs. Place in oven. When mixture starts to melt and gets soft, spread the top. Bake for 40 minutes. Cool and then cut into 24 bars."
"Scout Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Scout Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Scout Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Scout Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Scout Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Scout Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Scout Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Step 1","In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add milk and vanilla; beat until light and fluffy."
"Step 2","In a separate bowl, combine flour and baking powder; gradually add to creamed mixture and mix well."
"Step 3","Chill at least 2 hours or overnight."
"Step 4","On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut with trefoil cookie cutter available at Girl Scout stores, or use small cutter of your choice. Place cookies on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 5","Place cookies on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8-10 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on wire racks."
"Mosaic Cookies","4 (1 ounce) squares semi-sweet chocolate",
"Mosaic Cookies","3 tablespoons margarine",
"Mosaic Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mosaic Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Mosaic Cookies","1 egg white",
"Mosaic Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Mosaic Cookies",".5 pound rainbow colored miniature marshmallows",
"Mosaic Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Mosaic Cookies",".75 cup graham cracker crumbs",
"Step 1","Melt the chocolate squares and margarine together. Stir in the vanilla and the pinch salt."
"Step 2","Beat the egg white and slowly add the confectioners' sugar. Blend well. Stir in the chocolate mixture, the marshmallows and the chopped nuts. Blend well. Shape mixture into a log shape and roll firmly in the graham cracker crumbs. Refrigerate. Slice log when ready to serve."
"Marbled Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Marbled Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Marbled Cookies","24 crackers saltine crackers",
"Marbled Cookies","3 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Marbled Cookies","1 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a 9x13 inch pan with aluminum foil and grease the foil."
"Step 2","In a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine the butter and sugar. Simmer for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sugar is dissolved. Line the prepared pan with the saltine crackers. Pour the hot sugar mixture evenly over the crackers."
"Step 3","Bake for 5 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from the oven and quickly sprinkle the chocolate chips over the sugar layer. Return to the oven for just one minute. Then use a spatula to smooth out the melted chocolate chips. Sprinkle the nuts over the chocolate layer. Refrigerate overnight then remove from the foil and break into small pieces."
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)",".5 cup cocoa powder, or more to taste",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)","1 teaspoon salt",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)",".5 cup white sugar",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)",".5 cup shortening",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips, or more to taste",
"Double Coco Double Chocolate Chip Cookies (a twist on Toll House® cookies)","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, cocoa powder, salt, and baking soda together in a large bowl. Whisk white sugar, brown sugar, butter, shortening, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a separate bowl until smooth. Stir sugar mixture into flour mixture until just combined. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts."
"Step 3","Spoon batter, 1 to 2 tablespoons per cookie, onto a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are browned, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool cookies for 5 minutes on the baking sheet before serving."
"Buried Cherry Cookies","1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries",
"Buried Cherry Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Buried Cherry Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Buried Cherry Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Buried Cherry Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Buried Cherry Cookies","1 egg",
"Buried Cherry Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Buried Cherry Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Buried Cherry Cookies","3 (1 ounce) squares bittersweet chocolate, chopped",
"Buried Cherry Cookies",".25 cup sweetened condensed milk",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Drain the cherries and reserve about 2 tablespoons of the juice. Cut the cherries in half if large, and set aside."
"Step 3","Beat the softened butter, sugar, and baking powder with an electric mixer until thoroughly creamed and fluffy, about 1 minute. Beat in the egg and almond extract, then add the flour gradually, and beat just until blended. Pinch off pieces of dough, roll into 1-inch balls, place the balls on an ungreased baking sheet, and press your thumb in the center of each cookie to make a dent. Place a cherry or cherry half in the indentation of each cookie."
"Step 4","In a small saucepan over low heat, melt the chocolate with the condensed milk, and stir until smooth. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of reserved cherry juice to the mixture, or as needed, to thin the frosting; frosting will be thick. Spoon about 1/2 teaspoon of frosting over each cherry, covering the cherry completely."
"Step 5","Bake the cookies in the preheated oven until firm and slightly browned, about 12 minutes. Let cool on the baking sheet for about 1 minute before removing, then move to a wire rack to finish cooling."
"Grammy Sharon's Chocolate No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Grammy Sharon's Chocolate No-Bake Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Grammy Sharon's Chocolate No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Grammy Sharon's Chocolate No-Bake Cookies","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Grammy Sharon's Chocolate No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Grammy Sharon's Chocolate No-Bake Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Grammy Sharon's Chocolate No-Bake Cookies","3 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Step 1","Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat; add sugar, milk, and cocoa powder. Bring mixture to a boil, about 5 minutes; stir in peanut butter until melted, about 5 minutes. Return mixture to a boil and turn heat to low; simmer, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat; stir in vanilla extract."
"Step 2","Fold oats into mixture until thoroughly mixed. Drop mixture by spoonfuls onto a sheet of waxed paper; cool to room temperature."
"Butter Pecan Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Butter Pecan Cookies",".67 cup packed brown sugar",
"Butter Pecan Cookies","1 egg",
"Butter Pecan Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Butter Pecan Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Butter Pecan Cookies","1 .5 cups pecan halves",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream butter, brown sugar and egg. Mix until well blended."
"Step 2","Slowly add flour and salt and mix well. Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F."
"Step 4","Roll one inch pieces of dough into balls and place 2 inches apart on cookie sheets. Flatten balls with the bottom of a glass dipped in flour. Press a pecan into top of dough."
"Step 5","Bake 10 to 12 minutes until lightly colored."
"Crispy Gingersnaps",".75 cup shortening",
"Crispy Gingersnaps","1 cup white sugar",
"Crispy Gingersnaps","1 egg",
"Crispy Gingersnaps",".25 cup molasses",
"Crispy Gingersnaps","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Crispy Gingersnaps","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Crispy Gingersnaps",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Crispy Gingersnaps","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Crispy Gingersnaps","1 tablespoon ground ginger",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream the shortening and sugar. Add the egg and beat until light and fluffy, then stir in the molasses. In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, baking soda, salt, ginger and cinnamon. Add to the egg mixture and stir until well blended. Roll bits of dough into 1 inch balls. Dip each ball in sugar and place on cookie sheet, sugared side up about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes, until cookies have spread and tops have cracked. Let cool on wire rack."
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","2 cups butter, softened",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","2 cups peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","2 cups white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","2 cups brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","4 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","4 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","1 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles","24 fun size bars chocolate-coated caramel-peanut nougat candy",
"Peanut Butter Snickerdoodles",".5 cup white sugar, for sprinkling",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper, and set aside."
"Step 2","Beat together the butter, peanut butter, 2 cups white sugar, and brown sugar in a large bowl, stirring until well mixed and creamy. Mix in the vanilla extract and eggs."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Mix the flour mixture, one cup at a time, into the butter mixture, and stir until you have a smooth dough."
"Step 4","Scoop up 1/4 cup of dough per cookie, and form it into a ball around a fun size candy bar. Set the balls onto a baking sheet at least 6 inches apart, and flatten each ball with a fork in a cross-hatch pattern, making sure the cookie dough is still fully covering the candy bar. Sprinkle each cookie with about 1/2 teaspoon white sugar."
"Step 5","Bake the cookies in the preheated oven until the cookies are slightly browned around the edges, 12 to 14 minutes."
"Pizza-Pan Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Pizza-Pan Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease two 12 inch pizza pans."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar, until smooth. Beat in the cream cheese, then the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Divide the dough in half and press each half onto a prepared pizza pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden at the edges. Cool completely in pans on wire racks. Cut into wedges like a pizza and serve."
"Giant Spice Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package spice cake mix",
"Giant Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Giant Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Giant Spice Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Giant Spice Cookies",".33 cup molasses",
"Giant Spice Cookies","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the cake mix, baking soda and ginger. Make a well in the center and pour in the water, molasses and vanilla. Mix until thoroughly blended. Roll into 10 balls and place them 3 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Flatten slightly."
"Step 3","Bake for 13 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the tops are cracked and cookies are firm. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Cowboy Cookies I","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Cowboy Cookies I","2 cups white sugar",
"Cowboy Cookies I","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Cowboy Cookies I",".5 cup milk",
"Cowboy Cookies I","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cowboy Cookies I","3 teaspoons baking powder",
"Cowboy Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cowboy Cookies I","2 cups butter",
"Cowboy Cookies I","4 large eggs eggs",
"Cowboy Cookies I","3 cups rolled oats",
"Cowboy Cookies I","1 .5 cups flaked coconut",
"Cowboy Cookies I","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Cowboy Cookies I",".75 cup ground walnuts",
"Step 1","Beat together the sugars, butter or margarine and eggs."
"Step 2","Stir in vanilla and milk and mix well. Add in the flour, baking powder and salt and mix well."
"Step 3","Stir in the oatmeal and coconut. Add in the chocolate chips and nuts (optional) and mix well."
"Step 4","Drop by teaspoon on cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes."
"Master Cookie Mix","9 cups all-purpose flour",
"Master Cookie Mix","4 teaspoons baking soda",
