"Master Cookie Mix","2 teaspoons salt",
"Master Cookie Mix","3 cups packed brown sugar",
"Master Cookie Mix","3 cups white sugar",
"Master Cookie Mix","4 cups shortening",
"Master Cookie Mix","8 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Master Cookie Mix","4 cups butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","In your largest bowl, stir together the flour, baking soda, salt, brown sugar, and white sugar. Add the shortening and stir until mixture is mealy. Lightly stir in the chocolate chips and butterscotch chips until they are distributed evenly. Place 4 cups of the master mix into each 1 quart jar."
"Step 2","Attach the following directions to the jar: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In a medium bowl, beat 2 eggs and 1 teaspoon of vanilla until well blended. Add entire contents of the jar to the bowl, stir until combined. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes. This recipe makes about 2 dozen."
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","2 .33 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","1 (11 ounce) package semisweet chocolate chips",
"Giant Oatmeal Chocolate Cookies","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat brown sugar and butter together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; beat in eggs and vanilla extract until smooth. Mix oats, flour, baking soda, and salt into creamed butter mixture until dough is well-mixed; fold in semisweet chocolate chips and white chocolate chips. Scoop 1/4 cup batter per cookie and place on a baking sheet 3 inches apart, partially flattening the dough."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes. Cool cookies on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack."
"Green Tea Shortbread Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Green Tea Shortbread Cookies",".75 cup white sugar, plus more for topping",
"Green Tea Shortbread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Green Tea Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons green tea powder (matcha), or more to taste",
"Green Tea Shortbread Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Place a sheet of parchment paper or plastic wrap on a work surface and dust with flour. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter in a bowl using an electric mixer until fluffy, about 3 minutes. Add 3/4 cup sugar and continue beating until mixture is lighter in color, about 2 minutes more."
"Step 3","Mix flour, green tea powder, and salt together in a separate bowl; gradually add to creamed butter mixture, beating on low speed until dough sticks together. Roll dough to 1/4-inch thickness on the floured parchment paper; cut into 2-inch cookies or bars. Roll remaining dough and cut into more cookies until all the dough is used. Refrigerate for 10 minutes."
"Step 4","Carefully transfer cookies to the prepared baking sheet. Sprinkle sugar over each cookie."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until firm and barely starting to turn golden, about 15 minutes. Cool completely."
"Cashew Nut Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cashew Nut Cookies","1 egg",
"Cashew Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cashew Nut Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cashew Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cashew Nut Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cashew Nut Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cashew Nut Cookies","1 cup sour cream",
"Cashew Nut Cookies","1 cup chopped salted cashews",
"Cashew Nut Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Cashew Nut Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Cashew Nut Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Step 1","Blend together 1/2 cup butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, and sour cream. Add in the baking powder, soda, and flour. Stir in the nuts."
"Step 2","Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto buttered baking sheets. Cook at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from oven, and cool on wire racks."
"Step 3","To Make the Icing: Heat 1/2 cup butter or margarine in a saucepan until it is light amber colored. Remove pan from heat, and stir in confectioners' sugar and the milk. I sometimes have to use more milk to get the icing smooth and creamy. Frost cookies."
"Peppermint Ammonia Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Peppermint Ammonia Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Peppermint Ammonia Cookies","1 cup heavy cream",
"Peppermint Ammonia Cookies","3 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Peppermint Ammonia Cookies","⅛ cup boiling water",
"Peppermint Ammonia Cookies","1 .5 tablespoons bakers' ammonia",
"Peppermint Ammonia Cookies",".5 teaspoon peppermint oil",
"Peppermint Ammonia Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peppermint Ammonia Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Stir in the heavy cream and beaten eggs. Mix the ammonia into the boiling water and stir to dissolve; stir into the butter mixture along with the peppermint oil. Combine the flour and baking powder; stir into the batter until evenly blended. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until edges are golden. Cool slightly on baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Jumbo Banana Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","1 cup mashed bananas",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies",".5 cup evaporated milk",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","1 teaspoon distilled white vinegar",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","2 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies","2 tablespoons butter, softened",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies",".25 cup evaporated milk",
"Jumbo Banana Cookies",".25 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Mix together shortening, 1/2 cup butter, white sugar, eggs, bananas, vanilla, 1/2 cup evaporated milk and vinegar till light and creamy."
"Step 2","In a separate bowl mix together flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to other mixture. Add nuts."
"Step 3","Chill one hour in refrigerator."
"Step 4","Drop by teaspoonful on greased cookie sheet about two inches apart. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for about 15 minutes. Let cool then frost them."
"Step 5","To Make Frosting: Mix 2 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar with 2 tablespoons soft butter or margarine, 1/4 cup evaporated milk, and 1/4 tsp vanilla. Beat until soft. Spread on tops of cooled cookies."
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars II",".5 cup butter",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars II",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars II","2 cups peanut butter",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars II","2 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars II","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Melt butter or margarine over low heat. Add sugars, peanut butter and vanilla. Mix well."
"Step 2","Press into a 9 x 13 inch pan."
"Step 3","Melt chocolate chips and spread over the top. Cool.Italian Cookies II",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Italian Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Italian Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Italian Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Italian Cookies II","8 ounces ricotta cheese",
"Italian Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Italian Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Italian Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Italian Cookies II","2 tablespoons butter, softened",
"Italian Cookies II","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Italian Cookies II",".25 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Italian Cookies II","1 .5 tablespoons milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together 1/2 cup butter and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and ricotta cheese. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the cheese mixture. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are golden. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","In a medium bowl, cream together the remaining butter and confectioners' sugar. Beat in vanilla and milk gradually until a spreadable consistency is reached. Frost cooled cookies."
"Milk Chocolate Florentine Cookies",".67 cup butter, melted",
"Milk Chocolate Florentine Cookies","2 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Milk Chocolate Florentine Cookies",".67 cup all-purpose flour",
"Milk Chocolate Florentine Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Milk Chocolate Florentine Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Milk Chocolate Florentine Cookies",".25 cup corn syrup",
"Milk Chocolate Florentine Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Milk Chocolate Florentine Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Milk Chocolate Florentine Cookies","2 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 2 cookie sheets with aluminum foil and grease the foil."
"Step 2","In a large skillet over medium heat, melt the butter. Stir together the oats, flour, salt and sugar; mix into the melted butter until well blended. Stir in the corn syrup, milk and vanilla. Drop batter by teaspoonfuls 3 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 5 to 7 minutes in the preheated oven, until medium brown. Cool completely before removing from the cookie sheets. In the microwave or in a metal bowl over a pan of simmering water, melt chocolate chips, stirring frequently until smooth. Remove from heat. Spread chocolate onto the bottoms of cookies and sandwich them together."
"Preacher Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Preacher Cookies","4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Preacher Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Preacher Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Preacher Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Preacher Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Preacher Cookies",".5 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"Preacher Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Mix butter or margarine, cocoa, sugar, milk, and salt together in saucepan. Boil for 1 minute."
"Step 2","Stir in oatmeal, peanut butter and vanilla. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto waxed paper. Allow to cool and harden."
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","1 cup butter",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","4 large eggs eggs",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","4 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","2 cups flaked coconut",
"Almond Chocolate Coconut Cookies II","2 cups chopped almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt, stir into the creamed mixture until well blended. Finally, stir in the chocolate chips, coconut and almonds. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies",".5 cup vegetable shortening",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies",".67 cup packed brown sugar",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies",".67 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies",".75 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Perfect Double Chocolate Peanut Candy Cookies","1 .25 cups candy-coated peanut butter pieces (such as Reese's Pieces®), divided",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat the butter and shortening together with an electric mixer until well combined. Beat in the white and brown sugar until the mixture is creamy, then beat the vanilla extract and eggs, followed by the cocoa powder. Beat until the mixture is even in color. In another bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt; stir the flour mixture into the cocoa mixture until the dough is thoroughly mixed. Stir in the chocolate chips and 3/4 cup of peanut butter candies. Reserve the rest of the candy pieces."
"Step 3","Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and refrigerate the cookie dough until chilled, at least 45 minutes. Drop dough by tablespoon onto the prepared baking sheets. Gently press a few more candy pieces into the top of each cookie."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven 8 to 9 minutes; cool on baking sheets for 1 to 2 minutes before finishing cooling on racks."
"Peanut Butter Balls III","2 cups creamy peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Balls III",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Balls III","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Peanut Butter Balls III","3 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Peanut Butter Balls III","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Melt peanut butter and butter in saucepan, over low heat. In large bowl, mix crispy rice cereal and confectioners' sugar well. Pour melted peanut butter and butter over cereal and sugar and blend together thoroughly."
"Step 2","Form into 1 inch or smaller balls, spread on cookie sheets, chill till firm in refrigerator (over night is okay)."
"Step 3","Melt chocolate in double boiler and keep melted while working with balls. A teaspoon is best to use in dipping the balls in chocolate. Dip good and place on cookie sheet. As you dip them place them back on cookie sheet and keep chilled till firm."
"Autumn Harvest Cookies","1 cup softened butter",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies",".5 teaspoon orange extract",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies","1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Autumn Harvest Cookies","1 cup dried cranberries",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Cream together butter and the brown and white sugars in a bowl until smooth. Beat in the eggs, vanilla and orange extract."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, combine the flour, salt, baking powder and pumpkin pie spice; stir flour mixture into the sugar mixture. Add the rolled oats, walnuts and cranberries and mix thoroughly. Using a small ice cream scoop or teaspoon, drop rounded scoops of dough onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are golden, 8 to 10 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Ranger Cookies II",".5 cup shortening",
"Ranger Cookies II",".5 cup white sugar",
"Ranger Cookies II",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Ranger Cookies II","1 egg",
"Ranger Cookies II",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Ranger Cookies II","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Ranger Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Ranger Cookies II",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Ranger Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Ranger Cookies II","1 cup rolled oats",
"Ranger Cookies II","1 cup whole wheat flake cereal",
"Ranger Cookies II",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Cream shortening with sugars. Beat in egg and vanilla."
"Step 2","Mix together dry ingredients and stir into wet mix. Place by heaping spoonfuls on an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 minutes. Remove immediately to cool."
"Monster Cookies V","9 cups rolled oats",
"Monster Cookies V","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Monster Cookies V","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Monster Cookies V","1 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Monster Cookies V","1 cup peanuts",
"Monster Cookies V","2 cups white sugar",
"Monster Cookies V","2 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Monster Cookies V","1 cup butter",
"Monster Cookies V","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Monster Cookies V","6 large eggs eggs",
"Monster Cookies V","2 .5 cups peanut butter",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix together oatmeal, baking soda, chocolate chips, M & M's , and peanuts. Set aside."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, mix together white sugar, brown sugar, butter or margarine, vanilla, eggs and peanut butter."
"Step 4","Combine the two mixes. Wet your hands. Roll into 1 inch balls."
"Step 5","Bake on a greased cookie sheet for 10 to 12 minutes."
"Blueberry Crumb Bars","1 cup white sugar",
"Blueberry Crumb Bars","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Blueberry Crumb Bars","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Blueberry Crumb Bars","1 cup shortening",
"Blueberry Crumb Bars","1 egg",
"Blueberry Crumb Bars",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Blueberry Crumb Bars","1 pinch ground cinnamon",
"Blueberry Crumb Bars","4 cups fresh blueberries",
"Blueberry Crumb Bars",".5 cup white sugar",
"Blueberry Crumb Bars","3 teaspoons cornstarch",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together 1 cup sugar, 3 cups flour, and baking powder. Mix in salt and cinnamon, if desired. Use a fork or pastry cutter to blend in the shortening and egg. Dough will be crumbly. Pat half of dough into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","In another bowl, stir together the sugar and cornstarch. Gently mix in the blueberries. Sprinkle the blueberry mixture evenly over the crust. Crumble remaining dough over the berry layer."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until top is slightly brown. Cool completely before cutting into squares."
"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup brown sugar, light or dark",
"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons butter, at room temperature",
"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 large egg",
"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups King Arthur Almond Flour",
"Gluten-Free Almond Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Lightly grease a baking sheet, or line it with parchment."
"Step 2","Combine the brown sugar, baking soda, salt, and butter, and mix until smooth."
"Step 3","Mix in the vanilla, egg, and almond flour, stirring to combine. Scrape the bottom and sides of the bowl, then mix for 1 minute at medium speed."
"Step 4","Stir in the chocolate chips."
"Step 5","Scoop the dough one level tablespoon at a time onto the prepared baking sheet; a tablespoon cookie scoop works well here."
"Step 6","Gently flatten the cookies to about 3/8-inch thick."
"Step 7","Bake the cookies for 9 to 12 minutes, until golden brown."
"Step 8","Remove the cookies from the oven. Allow them to cool on the pan for 2 minutes, then carefully transfer them to a rack to cool completely."
"Pecan Filled Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Pecan Filled Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar",
"Pecan Filled Cookies","1 egg",
"Pecan Filled Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pecan Filled Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pecan Filled Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pecan Filled Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Pecan Filled Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Pecan Filled Cookies","⅛ cup sour cream",
"Pecan Filled Cookies",".25 cup brown sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and 1 cup brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the sugar mixture. Roll the dough into 1 inch balls and place them 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Make a depression in the center using the cap from the vanilla or the end of a wooden spoon. Mix together the pecans, sour cream and 1/4 cup brown sugar; fill each depression with the mixture."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 11 minutes in the preheated oven, or until light brown. Cool for a few minutes on the cookie sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Grama's Corn Flake Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Grama's Corn Flake Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup light corn syrup",
"Grama's Corn Flake Peanut Butter Cookies","2 tablespoons butter",
"Grama's Corn Flake Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Grama's Corn Flake Peanut Butter Cookies","3 cups cornflakes cereal",
"Step 1","Line a baking sheet with waxed paper. Bring the sugar and corn syrup to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat; stir in butter and peanut butter until thoroughly mixed, and remove from heat."
"Step 2","Place the corn flakes into a large bowl, and pour the peanut butter mixture over the cereal. Mix until the corn flakes are coated with the mixture. Drop by tablespoon onto the waxed paper; flatten slightly if desired. Allow to cool before serving."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)","1 .25 cups packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)","1 teaspoon gluten-free vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)",".25 cup egg substitute",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)","2 .25 cups gluten-free baking mix",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten Free)","12 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F ( 190 degrees C). Prepare a greased baking sheet."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream butter and sugar. Gradually add replacer eggs and vanilla while mixing. Sift together gluten- free flour mix, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Stir into the butter mixture until blended. Finally, stir in the chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Using a teaspoon, drop cookies 2 inches apart on prepared baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven for 6 to 8 minutes or until light brown. Let cookies cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before removing to wire racks."
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies","1 banana",
"Spicy Oatmeal Cookies","1 .75 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, nutmeg and cinnamon. Cut in the shortening, until the mixture appears mealy. Stir in the egg, mashed banana and oatmeal until well blended. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto an unprepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheet to cool on wire racks."
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs egg",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","4 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Scarlett's Best Ever Sugar Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C )."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together sugar, butter, and oil. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt and cream of tartar; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the pecans. Roll the dough into balls the size of walnuts. Place balls onto ungreased sheet. Press each ball down with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar. (Find a glass with a decorative bottom to give cookies a pattern.)"
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes or until golden brown around the edges."
"Egg Free Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Egg Free Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Egg Free Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree",
"Egg Free Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Egg Free Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Egg Free Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Egg Free Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Egg Free Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Cookies","12 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream the sugar, shortening, pumpkin and vanilla together. Mix until light and well combined."
"Step 3","Mix the flour, baking soda and ground cinnamon. Stir the flour mixture into the creamed mixture. Mix until combined. Stir in the chocolate chips."
"Step 4","Drop by teaspoons onto an ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12 to 15 minutes or until set. Let cookies cool on a rack."
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies","1 .75 cups white sugar, divided",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies","1 cup softened butter",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon sea salt",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, divided",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon cayenne pepper",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spicy Mexican Hot Chocolate Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat 1 1/2 cups sugar, butter, vanilla extract, and salt together in a bowl until fluffy. Beat in eggs; add cream of tartar and baking soda. Beat in cocoa powder, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, and cayenne powder. Beat in flour. Stir chocolate chips into the dough."
"Step 3","Mix remaining 1/4 cup sugar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon together in a bowl."
"Step 4","Roll heaping tablespoons of dough into balls. Roll balls in the sugar-cinnamon mixture and place on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until centers are set and edges crack slightly, about 10 minutes. Cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes."
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies","2 tablespoons anise seed",
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies","3 tablespoons rum",
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies","1 .25 cups butter",
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies","1 egg",
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Anise Seed Borrachio Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cloves",
"Step 1","Place the anise seeds in a small bowl with the rum. Set aside to marinate overnight."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, sugar and vanilla until smooth. Stir in the anise seed and rum. Mix in the egg. Combine the flour, salt, baking powder and cloves; stir into the butter mixture until well blended. Cover and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut into desired shapes using cookie cutters. Place cookies on a greased cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown at the edges. Cool for a few minutes on baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons salt",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","4 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","4 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cloves",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","1 teaspoon ground black pepper",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Basic Gingersnap Cookies","1 cup unsulfured molasses",
"Step 1","Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, ginger, cinnamon, cloves, and black pepper; set aside. In a large bowl, or stand mixer with the paddle attachment, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the molasses. Gradually mix in the sifted ingredients. Divide the dough into thirds and wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate for at least one hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/8 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are crisp but not dark. Remove to wire racks to cool completely. Decorate as desired.Carrot Cookies I","1 cup shortening",
"Carrot Cookies I",".75 cup white sugar",
"Carrot Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Carrot Cookies I","1 cup mashed cooked carrots",
"Carrot Cookies I","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Carrot Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Carrot Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Carrot Cookies I",".75 cup shredded coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Mix shortening, sugar, eggs, and carrots."
"Step 3","Blend in flour, baking powder and salt. Stir in coconut."
"Step 4","Drop dough by teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto lightly greased baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until no imprint remains when touched lightly. Immediately remove baking sheet. Let cool."
"Vegan Chocolate Fudge Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Vegan Chocolate Fudge Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Vegan Chocolate Fudge Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Vegan Chocolate Fudge Cookies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Vegan Chocolate Fudge Cookies","7 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Vegan Chocolate Fudge Cookies",".33 cup brown sugar",
"Vegan Chocolate Fudge Cookies",".33 cup mashed banana",
"Vegan Chocolate Fudge Cookies","5 tablespoons coconut oil",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl. Combine white sugar, cocoa powder, brown sugar, mashed banana, and coconut together in a saucepan over low heat. Cook and stir until blended and smooth, about 5 minutes. Add flour mixture; stir until smooth dough forms. Drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, about 8 minutes."
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 cup honey",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies II","1 egg",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies II",".75 cup stone ground whole wheat flour",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies II",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies II","1 .5 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies II","1 apple, cored and chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, honey, egg and vanilla until smooth. Combine the whole wheat flour, baking soda and cinnamon; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in oats and apple. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies","3 .25 cups old-fashioned oats, divided",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies",".33 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies","2 tablespoons ground flax seeds",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies","2 medium (7 to 7-7/8 long)s ripe bananas",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened applesauce",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies","1 tablespoon honey",
"Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Grind 2 1/4 cups oats in a food processor to yield 2 cups ground oats. Add walnuts, raisins, flax seeds, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt. Stir in remaining 1 cup oats. Stir thoroughly with a spoon, but do not grind further."
"Step 3","Make a well in the center of the oat mixture. Add bananas, eggs, applesauce, honey, and vanilla extract. Mash together and stir in oat mixture. Drop tablespoonfuls of the cookie dough on the baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are set, about 14 minutes."
"Witches' Hats","2 (16 ounce) packages fudge stripe cookies",
"Witches' Hats",".25 cup honey, or as needed",
"Witches' Hats","1 (9 ounce) bag milk chocolate candy kisses, unwrapped",
"Witches' Hats","1 (4.5 ounce) tube decorating gel",
"Step 1","Place a fudge stripe cookie with bottom side up onto a work surface. Smear a small dab (about 1/8 teaspoon) of honey onto the bottom of a chocolate kiss, and secure the candy piece to the center of the cookie, covering the hole. Use decorating gel to pipe a small bow onto the cookie at the base of the candy piece. Repeat with remaining ingredients."
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies IV","1 cup margarine",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies IV","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies IV","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies IV","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies IV","1 cup sour cream",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies IV","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies IV","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Sour Cream Sugar Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar. Beat in the eggs, vanilla and sour cream. Combine the flour, baking powder, salt and nutmeg, stir into the creamed mixture until just blended. Dough will be light and sticky. Cover or wrap dough and chill overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut into desired shapes using cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 inch apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, until cookies turn a very light brown. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple",".5 cup softened butter",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple",".5 cup vegetable shortening",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","1 cup white sugar",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","1 cup brown sugar",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","2 large eggs eggs",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple",".5 cup grated carrot",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple",".5 cup golden raisins",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","1 tablespoon softened butter",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","2 cups powdered sugar",
"Carrot Cake Cookies with Pineapple","1 tablespoon juice from canned pineapple",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease 4 cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Whisk the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt together in a mixing bowl; set aside."
"Step 3","To make the cookie dough, beat 1/2 cup butter, shortening, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Add 1 egg and allow to blend into the butter mixture before adding the second egg and the vanilla. Mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Fold in the crushed pineapple, carrot, raisins, and chopped walnuts, mixing just enough to evenly combine. Drop onto the prepared baking sheets by the heaping teaspoonful, allowing 2 inches of space between the cookies."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are golden, 10 to 12 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 5","To make the frosting, beat the cream cheese and 1 tablespoon of butter with an electric mixer in a bowl until smooth. Add the confectioners' sugar and pineapple juice. Beat until no lumps remain. Spread the frosting on the cooled cookies, and allow to dry completely before storing."
"Mom's Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Mom's Rolled Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Mom's Rolled Sugar Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Mom's Rolled Sugar Cookies","4 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Mom's Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mom's Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Mom's Rolled Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Mom's Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Cream butter and sugar; add eggs. Sift dry ingredients 3 times; combine thoroughly with egg mixture. Add vanilla."
"Step 2","Roll in waxed paper and store in refrigerator to chill thoroughly."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll out dough very thin on well-floured board; cut with cookie cutter. Bake on greased cookie sheets for 6 - 10 minutes."
"Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookie","1 cup apple cinnamon granola",
"Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookie",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookie",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookie",".5 cup shortening",
"Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookie",".25 cup white sugar",
"Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookie","1 egg",
"Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookie",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookie",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookie",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix together granola, flour, brown sugar, shortening, white sugar, egg, salt, vanilla extract and baking soda together in a medium size mixing bowl. Mix until well blended."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls 1 1/2 inches apart on baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown. Cool on wire racks."
"Meringue Cookies","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Meringue Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Meringue Cookies","⅛ teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Meringue Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Meringue Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Meringue Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). To prevent burning you can bake on an air cushion baking sheet or put parchment paper on a regular cookie sheet."
"Step 2","Beat egg whites, salt, cream of tartar, and vanilla until very firm. Gradually add sugar and mix. Fold in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls on pan. Bake 300 degrees for 25 minutes. They should only be lightly browned."
"Melted SnowMan Cookie",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie",".75 cup white sugar",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie","1 egg",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie","1 tablespoon milk",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie","12 regulars large marshmallows",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie","3 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie",".25 cup water",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie",".5 cup chocolate chips",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie","1 drop red food coloring, or as desired",
"Melted SnowMan Cookie","1 drop yellow food coloring, or as desired",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter in a bowl using an electric mixer until fluffy, about 2 minutes. Beat white sugar, baking powder, and salt into butter until just combined. Beat egg, milk, and vanilla extract into butter-sugar mixture; add flour and mix until dough is just combined. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until dough is slightly chilled, about 10 minutes."
"Step 3","Scoop dough into balls slightly larger than golf balls; flatten into cookies. Arrange cookies on a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden brown, 10 to 20 minutes. Cool on baking sheet for about 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely, at least 30 minutes."
"Step 5","Butter a microwave-safe plate. Place marshmallows on the prepared plate."
"Step 6","Microwave marshmallows until slightly puffed, 10 to 15 seconds. Gently press marshmallows until bottoms slightly ooze."
"Step 7","Whisk confectioners' sugar and water together in a bowl until icing is slightly thicker than drizzle-consistency. Pour icing over cookies so it runs over the edges, reserving about 1 tablespoon."
"Step 8","Melt chocolate chips in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl, about 30 seconds. Pour melted chocolate into a piping bag with a small tip or a plastic bag with a corner snipped."
"Step 9","Press 1 marshmallow close to an edge of each cookie to be the snowman's head. Draw 'stick arms' onto the icing using the melted chocolate."
"Step 10","Divide the reserved 1 tablespoon icing into 2 small bowls. Mix red food coloring into 1 of the bowls and orange food coloring into the other bowl. Decorate the snowmen with scarves or ties using the red icing and yellow icing."
"Mini Snowball Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Mini Snowball Chip Cookies",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Mini Snowball Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Mini Snowball Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mini Snowball Chip Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mini Snowball Chip Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package semisweet chocolate mini morsels",
"Mini Snowball Chip Cookies",".25 cup confectioners' sugar, or to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine butter, 3/4 cup confectioners' sugar, vanilla extract, and salt in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy. Beat in flour gradually. Fold mini morsels into the dough."
"Step 3","Shape dough into 1 1/4-inch balls; arrange on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until set, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar over cookies while still hot. Cool on the baking sheets for 10 minutes. Transfer to wire racks to finish cooling."
"Grandma's Refrigerator Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandma's Refrigerator Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Grandma's Refrigerator Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Grandma's Refrigerator Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag semisweet chocolate chips",
"Grandma's Refrigerator Cookies","2 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Grandma's Refrigerator Cookies","1 cup shredded coconut",
"Grandma's Refrigerator Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Line a baking sheet with waxed paper."
"Step 2","Combine sugar, milk, and butter in a saucepan. Bring to a boil; simmer until sugar is dissolved, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in chocolate chips, oats, coconut, and walnuts. Drop spoonfuls of mixture 1 inch apart on the lined baking sheet."
"Step 3","Chill until firm, about 1 hour."
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies","2 cups whole wheat flour",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies",".67 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies","3 tablespoons flax seed meal",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies","1 .5 cups raw cane sugar",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies","1 cup vegan butter, softened",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies",".5 cup cinnamon applesauce",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Walnut Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine flour, cocoa powder, flax seed meal, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl."
"Step 3","Combine sugar, vegan butter, and cinnamon applesauce in a separate bowl. Mix until smooth. Pour into the flour mixture; beat until thoroughly combined. Fold in walnuts. Drop spoonfuls of dough 1 inch apart onto the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cookie comes out clean, 15 to 20 minutes."
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","48 piece (0.2 oz)s chocolate-covered caramel candies (such as Hershey's® Kisses®)",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Chocolate Salted Caramel Cookies","1 tablespoon coarse salt",
"Step 1","Beat butter in a bowl with an electric mixer until creamy. Beat in 1 cup white sugar and brown sugar gradually. Beat in eggs and vanilla extract."
"Step 2","Combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and 1/8 teaspoon salt in a separate bowl. Add to the butter mixture gradually, beating well. Cover dough and chill for 20 minutes."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 4","Press a small amount of dough around each caramel-filled candy. Roll into balls. Pour 2 tablespoons white sugar into a small bowl. Dip the top of each ball into the sugar. Place 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle each cookie with some of the coarse salt."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are set, about 8 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes on the baking sheets. Remove to wire racks to cool completely."
"Fluffy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Fluffy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Fluffy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Fluffy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Fluffy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Fluffy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fluffy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fluffy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Fluffy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat margarine, brown sugar, and white sugar together with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth and creamy. Beat first egg into butter mixture. Beat second egg into mixture along with vanilla extract."
"Step 3","Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl; stir into creamed margarine mixture until dough is almost white. Fold chocolate chips into dough. Drop small spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Heidi's Frying Pan Cookies","3 tablespoons butter",
"Heidi's Frying Pan Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped dates",
"Heidi's Frying Pan Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Heidi's Frying Pan Cookies","2 large eggs eggs, lightly beaten",
"Heidi's Frying Pan Cookies","2 cups crispy rice cereal (such as Rice Krispies®)",
"Heidi's Frying Pan Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Heidi's Frying Pan Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add dates, sugar, and eggs; cook and stir until mixture thickens and leaves the sides of the skillet, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat; add crispy rice cereal and pecans. Stir cookie dough until well-mixed."
"Step 2","Place coconut in a shallow bowl. Drop teaspoonfuls of cookie dough into coconut and roll to coat and form into balls. Let cookies cool, about 20 minutes."
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies","cooking spray",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups gluten-free oats, divided",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup cooked and cooled quinoa",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup applesauce",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup dark chocolate chips",
"Quinoa Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Place 1 cup oats in a food processor; pulse 7 to 8 times. Add quinoa and pulse until finely chopped."
"Step 3","Transfer oat and quinoa mixture to a large bowl. Add remaining 1 cup oats, applesauce, eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, baking soda, and salt; mix well to combine. Fold chocolate chips and pecans into the batter."
"Step 4","Drop tablespoons of batter onto the baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, about 14 minutes. Let sit on the baking sheet for 1 to 2 minutes before moving to a wire rack to cool, about 25 minutes."
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey","1 .25 cups quick oats",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey","1 cup white whole wheat flour",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey",".5 teaspoon kosher salt",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey",".5 cup honey",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey",".25 cup unsweetened applesauce",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey","4 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted and cooled",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey","1 large egg",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey",".33 cup dark chocolate chips",
"Healthy Oatmeal Cookies with Honey",".25 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Whisk oats, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and kosher salt together in a large bowl."
"Step 2","Combine honey, applesauce, butter, egg, and vanilla extract in a medium bowl. Whisk until blended. Pour into the bowl with the flour mixture; stir until just combined. Fold chocolate chips and walnuts into the batter."
"Step 3","Place batter in the refrigerator and let chill at least 30 minutes or up to 3 days."
"Step 4","When ready to bake, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and place a rack in the center. Line a large, rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone baking sheet."
"Step 5","Remove chilled dough from the refrigerator. Let sit for 5 to 10 minutes if very stiff."
"Step 6","Drop dough onto the prepared baking sheet in 1 1/2-inch balls using a cookie scoop or spoon, leaving 1 inch of space around each. Gently flatten each cookie with your fingers to 3/4-inch thick."
"Step 7","Bake in the preheated oven until golden, firm around the edges, and set on top, 9 to 10 minutes."
"Step 8","Place the baking sheet on a wire rack. Let cool on the baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring cookies to the wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","2 large eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups",".5 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups","2 tablespoons milk, or more as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 mini muffin pans."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a small bowl."
"Step 3","Combine butter, white sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla extract in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Gradually beat in the flour mixture. Stir in chocolate chips."
"Step 4","Drop rounded tablespoons of the dough into the prepared mini muffin cups."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are light golden brown, 9 to 12 minutes. Cool before removing from the pans."
"Step 6","Meanwhile, beat shortening, butter, and vanilla extract together with an electric mixer in a mixing bowl. Beat in confectioners' sugar gradually, 1 cup at a time. Beat in milk until icing is smooth. Add a little more milk if icing is still dry."
"Step 7","Fill the center of each cooled cookie cup with icing.Kitchen Sink Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","2 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","1 cup vanilla baking chips",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies",".5 cup butterscotch chips",
"Kitchen Sink Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the oats, chocolate chips, vanilla chips, butterscotch chips and chopped pecans. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Cookies should be at least 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"No Bake Cookies I","1 .75 cups white sugar",
"No Bake Cookies I",".5 cup milk",
"No Bake Cookies I",".5 cup butter",
"No Bake Cookies I","4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"No Bake Cookies I",".5 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"No Bake Cookies I","3 cups quick-cooking oats",
"No Bake Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","In a medium saucepan, combine sugar, milk, butter, and cocoa. Bring to a boil, and cook for 1 1/2 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in peanut butter, oats, and vanilla. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto wax paper. Let cool until hardened."
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 cup canned pumpkin",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 cup white sugar",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 egg",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 teaspoon milk",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Combine pumpkin, sugar, vegetable oil, and egg. In a separate bowl, stir together flour, baking powder, ground cinnamon, and salt. Dissolve the baking soda with the milk and stir in. Add flour mixture to pumpkin mixture and mix well."
"Step 2","Add vanilla, chocolate chips and nuts."
"Step 3","Drop by spoonful on greased cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for approximately 10 minutes or until lightly brown and firm."
"Buckeye Cookies III","1 .5 cups creamy peanut butter",
"Buckeye Cookies III",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Buckeye Cookies III","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Buckeye Cookies III","2 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Buckeye Cookies III","2 tablespoons shortening",
"Buckeye Cookies III","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","You'll need wax paper, a double boiler, a cookie pan, and a medium bowl. In the medium size bowl, mix peanut butter, butter, vanilla, and confectioners' sugar (mixture will be stiff)."
"Step 2","Shape into balls and place on a pan covered with wax paper. Place into the refrigerator."
"Step 3","In double boiler, melt chocolate and shortening. Pour into bowl and dip balls with chocolate. Refrigerate for thirty minutes until chocolate is firm."
"Easy Sugar Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Easy Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Easy Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Easy Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Easy Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Easy Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Easy Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In a small bowl, stir together flour, baking soda, and baking powder. Set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in egg and vanilla. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Roll rounded teaspoonfuls of dough into balls, and place onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden. Let stand on cookie sheet two minutes before removing to cool on wire racks."
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles",".5 cup shortening",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together butter, shortening, 1 1/2 cups sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Blend in flour, cream of tartar, soda, and salt. Shape dough by rounded spoonfuls into balls."
"Step 3","Mix 2 tablespoons sugar and cinnamon together. Roll balls of dough in mixture. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 8 to 10 minutes, or until set but not too hard. Remove immediately from baking sheets."
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies",".33 cup soy milk",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies",".33 cup peanut butter",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies","2 tablespoons canola oil",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies",".5 cup vegan semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies",".5 cup walnut pieces",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Oil a large baking sheet."
"Step 2","Stir sugar, soy milk, peanut butter, canola oil, and vanilla extract together with a whisk in a large bowl until completely smooth."
"Step 3","Mix flour, oats, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl; add to the peanut butter mixture and stir to combine. Fold chocolate chips and walnut pieces into the flour mixture."
"Step 4","Drop your batter by large spoonfuls onto prepared baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake cookies in preheated oven until browned along the edges, about 10 minutes. Cool cookies on sheet for 10 minutes before removing to a cooling rack to cool completely."
"Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons Mexican vanilla extract",
"Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Absolutely the Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter flavored shortening, brown sugar and white sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla .Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until light brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Soft Christmas Cookies","3 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Christmas Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Soft Christmas Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Christmas Cookies","1 cup margarine, softened",
"Soft Christmas Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Soft Christmas Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Soft Christmas Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together, set aside. In a large bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Gradually blend in the sifted ingredients until fully absorbed. Cover dough, and chill for 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. On a clean floured surface, roll out small portions of chilled dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut out shapes using cookie cutters."
"Step 3","Bake 6 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are barely brown. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Italian Wedding Cookies III","1 .5 cups unsalted butter",
"Italian Wedding Cookies III",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Italian Wedding Cookies III",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Italian Wedding Cookies III","1 .5 cups finely ground almonds",
"Italian Wedding Cookies III","4 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Italian Wedding Cookies III","3 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Italian Wedding Cookies III",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for rolling",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter or margarine in a bowl, gradually add confectioners' sugar and salt. Beat until light and fluffy. Add almonds and vanilla. Blend in flour gradually and mix well."
"Step 3","Shape into balls (or crescents) using about 1 teaspoon for each cookie. Place on ungreased cookie sheets, and bake for 15-20 min. Do not brown. Cool slightly, then roll in the extra confectioners' sugar."
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups whole wheat flour",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a mixing bowl, cream the shortening and peanut butter. Add the brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla; mix well."
"Step 3","Combine oats, flour, baking soda, and salt; add to the creamed mixture and mix well."
"Step 4","Drop by the rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheet. Flatten with fork. Bake for 12 minutes or until done."
"The Best Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"The Best Rolled Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"The Best Rolled Sugar Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"The Best Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"The Best Rolled Sugar Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Best Rolled Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"The Best Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Stir in the flour, baking powder, and salt. Cover, and chill dough for at least one hour (or overnight)."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Roll out dough on floured surface 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick. Cut into shapes with any cookie cutter. Place cookies 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 6 to 8 minutes in preheated oven. Cool completely."
"Monster Cookies VI","3 large eggs eggs",
"Monster Cookies VI","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Monster Cookies VI","1 cup white sugar",
"Monster Cookies VI","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Monster Cookies VI","1 teaspoon corn syrup",
"Monster Cookies VI","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Monster Cookies VI",".5 cup butter",
"Monster Cookies VI","1 .5 cups peanut butter",
"Monster Cookies VI","4 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Monster Cookies VI","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Monster Cookies VI","1 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a very large bowl, beat the eggs."
"Step 3","Add the remaining ingredients in order, mixing well."
"Step 4","Use an ice cream scoop to put on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes."
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".5 cup light brown sugar",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".25 cup white sugar",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)","1 egg",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)","1 cup white sugar",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".5 cup butter, melted",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)","2 large eggs eggs",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".33 cup cocoa powder",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Brookies (Brownie Cookies)","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish."
"Step 2","Beat softened butter, light brown sugar, 1/4 cup white sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract together in a large bowl until creamy. Add 1 egg; beat until light and creamy, about 2 minutes."
"Step 3","Whisk 1 1/4 cups flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and baking soda together in a bowl. Gradually stir flour mixture into butter mixture until dough is combined. Stir chocolate chips into dough. Spread dough into the bottom of the prepared baking dish to cover completely."
"Step 4","Stir 1 cup white sugar, melted butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract together in a bowl; add 2 eggs and beat well. Mix cocoa powder into butter mixture until well-combined. Stir 1/2 cup flour, baking powder, and 1/8 teaspoon salt into cocoa mixture until batter is combined. Pour brownie batter over cookie dough and spread to cover completely."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brookies comes out clean, 20 to 25 minutes. Cool completely before cutting into bars."
"German Chocolate Thumbprint Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"German Chocolate Thumbprint Cookies","1 cup evaporated milk",
"German Chocolate Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"German Chocolate Thumbprint Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"German Chocolate Thumbprint Cookies","3 large egg yolks egg yolks, beaten",
"German Chocolate Thumbprint Cookies","1 .5 cups flaked coconut",
"German Chocolate Thumbprint Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped pecans",
"German Chocolate Thumbprint Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package German chocolate cake mix",
"German Chocolate Thumbprint Cookies",".33 cup butter, melted",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a heavy 2-quart saucepan, combine sugar, milk, 1/2 cup butter, vanilla and egg yolk. Blend well. Cook over medium heat for 10 to 13 minutes or until thickened and bubbly. Stir frequently. Stir in coconut and pecans. Remove from heat and cool to room temperature."
"Step 3","Reserve 1 1/4 cups of the topping mixture and set aside. In a large bowl, combine cake mix, melted butter and remaining topping mixture. Stir by hand until thoroughly moistened. Shape dough into 1 inch balls. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Using your finger, make an indention in center of each ball. Fill each indention with 1/2 teaspoon of reserved topping."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 13 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 teaspoons kosher salt",
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, very soft",
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup light brown sugar",
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 large egg",
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chef John's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Whisk flour, salt, and baking soda together in a bowl. In a separate bowl, cream the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together until mixture is light and fluffy, 3 to 4 minutes. Add the egg, milk, and vanilla extract. Whisk liquids together in small areas around the bowl, then all together to avoid separation."
"Step 2","Pour dry ingredients into the wet ingredients; stir until flour is thoroughly mixed in. Stir in the chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Transfer dough to a resealable plastic bag. Refrigerate until dough is firm, at least 2 hours."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 5","Scoop out rounded tablespoons of dough and place on prepared baking sheet, leaving 4 inches of space between cookies (about 8 per sheet). Bake in preheated oven until cookies are golden brown, about 12 minutes. Slide parchment and cookies onto a cooling rack for a few minutes. Remove parchment and finish cooling the cookies on the rack."
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies","1 cup walnuts",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies","1 .5 cups old-fashioned rolled oats (not instant)",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies",".33 cup whole wheat flour",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies",".5 cup ground flax meal",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies",".5 cup almond butter",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies",".25 cup canola oil",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies",".25 cup blue agave nectar",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies",".33 cup brown sugar",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies","1 egg",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies",".5 cup dried cherries",
"Whole Grain Breakfast Cookies","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Pulse the walnuts in a food processor several times to chop; continue processing until the walnuts are ground into flour; transfer to a bowl. Mix in the rolled oats, whole wheat flour, flax meal, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon until thoroughly combined."
"Step 3","Combine the almond butter, canola oil, agave nectar, brown sugar, egg, and vanilla extract in the food processor and process a few seconds to blend the ingredients well; transfer the almond butter mixture to a large bowl and fold in the dried cherries and chocolate chips. Mix the walnut-oatmeal mixture into the almond butter mixture (dough will be very thick)."
"Step 4","Scoop up heaping teaspoons of dough, and form into balls; lay the dough balls onto the prepared baking sheets, about 2 inches apart."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from oven and flatten the cookies with a spatula. Allow to cool for about 5 minutes on the baking sheets before removing to finish cooling on wire racks."
"Irish Soda Bread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Irish Soda Bread Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Irish Soda Bread Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Irish Soda Bread Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Irish Soda Bread Cookies",".5 cup dried currants",
"Irish Soda Bread Cookies",".25 cup buttermilk",
"Irish Soda Bread Cookies","1 egg",
"Irish Soda Bread Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Irish Soda Bread Cookies","1 teaspoon caraway seed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine dry ingredients in a mixing bowl. With a pastry blender, cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Stir in currants."
"Step 3","Mix in beaten egg. Pour in milk and mix with a fork to make a soft dough (may need a little more milk)."
"Step 4","On a floured surface, shape dough into a ball and knead lightly 5 or 6 times. Roll out dough to 1/4 inch thick and cut into squares and triangles with a knife (approximately 2 inches in diameter)."
"Step 5","Bake for 12 to 14 minutes or until slightly browned."
"Chef John's Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","8 ounces cold, unsalted butter, cut into thin slices",
"Chef John's Rosemary Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chef John's Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh rosemary (not minced)",
"Chef John's Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","1 teaspoon kosher salt",
"Chef John's Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","⅛ teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chef John's Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chef John's Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","white sugar, or as desired",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Place cold butter, sugar, rosemary, salt, and vanilla extract in bowl. Combine with the back of a spatula or spoon, slowly incorporating ingredients together until butter has softened somewhat and ingredients come together."
"Step 3","Pour flour into bowl with butter mixture. Flour your hands to then incorporate flour into the butter, using fingertips and rubbing mixture together until flour-y crumbs become buttery crumbs, 1 to 2 minutes. Press mixture together into a dough ball."
"Step 4","Transfer dough to lightly floured work surface. Press dough into a disk, then into a 1/2-inch thick rectangle. Cover with a piece of plastic wrap. Flatten dough to 1/4-inch thick using a flat pan or rolling pin. Reshape into a rectangle."
"Step 5","Cut dough lengthwise into 5 even strips about 1 inch wide, trimming extra dough if necessary. Cut each strip into 6 evenly sized squares. (You can roll out scraps to form more cookies if necessary). Transfer cookies to prepared baking sheet. Sprinkle each cookie with about a pinch of sugar. Using a fork, poke 4 rows of holes into each cookie."
"Step 6","Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, about 50 minutes."
