"Step 7","Cool cookies 10 minutes on sheet; transfer cookies to rack to cool completely."
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Craisin Cookies","1 cup dried cranberries",
"Step 1","Beat butter, sugars, eggs and vanilla for 5 minutes. In another bowl, combine oats, flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Add to butter mixture 1 cup at a time."
"Step 2","Mix in raisins and craisins."
"Step 3","Drop by spoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets and bake for 12-14 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). These freeze very well. Enjoy!!Pumpkin Raisin Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","1 egg",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","1 cup solid pack pumpkin puree",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies","2 tablespoons warm water",
"Pumpkin Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream the shortening and sugar until smooth. Add the egg, and vanilla; mix until fluffy. Stir in the pumpkin. Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt, pumpkin pie spice, and cinnamon; stir into the pumpkin mixture. Finally, stir in the raisins and walnuts."
"Step 3","Drop cookie dough by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, cookies should be light brown around the edges. Brush with the spice glaze, and transfer to racks to cool."
"Step 4","To make the spice glaze, mix confectioners' sugar with 2 tablespoons of warm water until there are no more lumps. Stir in the 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon. If the glaze is too thick, add a little more water."
"Pink Icing Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Pink Icing Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Pink Icing Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Pink Icing Cookies","1 cup milk",
"Pink Icing Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pink Icing Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Pink Icing Cookies","3 teaspoons baking powder",
"Pink Icing Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a cookie sheet."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream the margarine and sugar together. Add the eggs one at a time, mix well. Stir in the milk and vanilla. Sift together the flour, salt and baking powder; stir into the creamed mixture until everything is well blended. Drop cookie dough by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. The tops of the cookies should spring back to the touch like a cake. Cool on wire racks before frosting."
"Greek Butter Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Greek Butter Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Greek Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Greek Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Greek Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Greek Butter Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Greek Butter Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar for rolling",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, sugar and egg until smooth. Stir in the vanilla and almond extracts. Blend in the flour to form a dough. you may have to knead by hand at the end. Take about a teaspoon of dough at a time and roll into balls, logs or 'S' shapes. Place cookies 1 to 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned and firm. Allow cookies to cool completely before dusting with confectioners' sugar."
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","⅛ teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies",".25 cup granulated sugar",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","Dark chocolate kiss candies",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line two cookie sheets with Reynolds® Parchment Paper."
"Step 2","Beat the shortening and peanut butter in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium to high speed for 30 seconds. Add the brown sugar, baking powder, and baking soda. Beat until combined, scraping the sides of the bowl occasionally. Beat in the egg, milk, and vanilla until combined. Beat in as much of the flour and cocoa powder as you can with the mixer, using a wooden spoon at the end if necessary."
"Step 3","Place the granulated sugar in a small bowl. Shape the dough into 1-inch balls. Roll the balls in sugar to coat. Place the balls 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until edges are firm. Immediately press a dark chocolate candy into the center of each cookie. Slide the parchment with the cookies on it to a wire rack; cool completely."
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies",".33 cup water",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons butter",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies","2 .25 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Raisin Filled Spice Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Step 1","In a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine the 1/3 cup of sugar, water, raisins, butter and pinch of salt. Bring ingredients to a boil, and cook until thick, you should be able to see the bottom of the pan while stirring when finished. Remove from heat and set aside to cool."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Sift together the flour, cinnamon, allspice, cloves, salt and baking powder, set aside. In a medium bowl, cream shortening and sugar until smooth. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Add dry ingredients, mix until blended, then finally stir in the milk."
"Step 4","On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut into 2 1/2 inch circles. Place a teaspoon of filling onto the center of half of the cookies. Cover with the other half of the cookies. Press the edges together with the tines of a fork. Sprinkle with sugar and bake on unprepared cookie sheets for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven."
"Oatmeal MM Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies",".67 cup brown sugar",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies","1 egg",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies",".25 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies",".25 teaspoon almond extract",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal MM Cookies","1 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla until well blended. Combine the oats, flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the candy-coated chocolate pieces. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until light golden brown."
"Heavenly Shortbread","2 cups butter, softened",
"Heavenly Shortbread","1 cup white sugar",
"Heavenly Shortbread","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Heavenly Shortbread","2 teaspoons cornstarch",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (170 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream softened butter thoroughly. ( If using margarine, add four drops of butter flavoring.) Slowly add sugar."
"Step 3","Sift flour and corn starch before adding. Mix well. Press into an ungreased jelly roll pan 11 x 15 x 1 1/2 inches."
"Step 4","Bake 30 minutes or until very light brown. Score and cut while warm."
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies","⅛ teaspoon baking soda",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies","1 egg",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies","1 lemon, zested and juiced",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies","1 drop yellow food coloring, or as desired",
"Lemon Crinkle Cookies",".75 cup powdered sugar",
"Step 1","Sift flour, baking powder, salt, and baking soda together in a medium bowl. Set aside."
"Step 2","Beat sugar and butter together in a large bowl using a handheld electric mixer or a stand mixer with the paddle attachment until creamy. Beat in egg, vanilla extract, lemon extract, lemon zest and juice, and yellow food coloring. Scrape down the sides of the bowl and mix once more, making sure everything is combined. Add flour mixture and mix until just combined."
"Step 3","Cover bowl and refrigerate cookie dough for 1 hour."
"Step 4","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone baking mat."
"Step 5","Scoop dough using a cookie scoop or spoon into roughly 1 1/2-inch rounds. Slightly flatten cookies to 1/2-inch thickness."
"Step 6","Pour powdered sugar into a shallow bowl. Place flattened rounds in powdered sugar and cover until well coated. Remove with a fork or spoon and place on the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 7","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are no longer glossy and have a matte look, 12 to 15 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool on the baking sheet for 3 to 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Light and Chewy Cake Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package reduced fat white cake mix",
"Light and Chewy Cake Cookies",".5 cup low-fat sweetened condensed milk",
"Light and Chewy Cake Cookies",".5 cup egg substitute",
"Light and Chewy Cake Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter chips",
"Light and Chewy Cake Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray cookie sheets with non-stick cooking spray."
"Step 2","Mix ingredients in the order given. Drop by tablespoons onto cookie sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 3 1/2 to 4 minutes, then switch racks and bake another 3 1/2 to 4 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool on racks."
"Oatmeal Crispies I",".67 cup shortening",
"Oatmeal Crispies I",".33 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Crispies I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Crispies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Crispies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Crispies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Crispies I","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Crispies I","1 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Crispies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Crispies I","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Crispies I","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Cream together shortening, margarine, and sugars."
"Step 2","Beat in eggs and vanilla."
"Step 3","Mix in flour, salt, and baking soda. Add oats and walnuts. Mix well."
"Step 4","Shape into long rolls and roll in wax paper. Chill until firm."
"Step 5","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 6","Slice 1/4 inch slices and place on ungreased cookie sheet. Press with fork dipped in milk."
"Step 7","Bake for 10 minutes."
"Persimmon Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Persimmon Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Persimmon Cookies","1 egg",
"Persimmon Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Persimmon Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Persimmon Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Persimmon Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Persimmon Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Persimmon Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Persimmon Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Persimmon Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Persimmon Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Persimmon Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Persimmon Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Persimmon Cookies","1 cup persimmon pulp",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together the shortening and sugar. Add egg and vanilla; mix well."
"Step 3","Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, cloves, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Stir flour mixture into creamed sugar mixture."
"Step 4","Stir in the raisins, chopped nuts, 1/4 teaspoon salt and persimmon pulp; mix well."
"Step 5","Drop by the teaspoonful on greased or parchment lined cookie sheet. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes. Transfer to wire racks to cool."
"Norway's Best Pepper Cookies","1 ⅛ cups butter",
"Norway's Best Pepper Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Norway's Best Pepper Cookies",".25 cup heavy whipping cream",
"Norway's Best Pepper Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Norway's Best Pepper Cookies","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Norway's Best Pepper Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Norway's Best Pepper Cookies","1 teaspoon ground black pepper",
"Norway's Best Pepper Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cardamom",
"Norway's Best Pepper Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Step 1","Cream together the butter and the sugar until light and fluffy. Stir in the cream. Add the baking soda and little water (no more than 2 tablespoons) to the butter mixture."
"Step 2","Sift the spices, baking powder and flour into the butter mixture. Blend until a nice dough is formed. Roll dough into sausages about 2-1/2 inches in diameter wrap tightly and let dough chill thoroughly."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Remove chilled dough and cut into thin slices. Bake on a lightly greased cookie sheet for 6 to 8 minutes. Let cookies cool on wire rack."
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups gluten-free flour",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies",".25 cup cream cheese, softened",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Gluten-Free Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl. Beat white sugar, 3/4 cup butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer; beat in eggs, 1 at a time, until mixture is smooth. Mix butter mixture into flour mixture and form dough into a ball. Wrap ball with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll dough onto a lightly floured surface and cut into shapes using cookie cutters. Arrange cookies on a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges begin to brown, about 10 minutes. Cool cookies on the baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 5","Beat cream cheese, 1/4 cup butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth. Slowly beat confectioners' sugar into cream cheese mixture until icing is smooth; spread onto cooled cookies."
"Gingerbread Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Gingerbread Cookies I","2 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Gingerbread Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Gingerbread Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Gingerbread Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Gingerbread Cookies I","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Gingerbread Cookies I","1 cup margarine, melted",
"Gingerbread Cookies I",".5 cup evaporated milk",
"Gingerbread Cookies I","1 cup unsulfured molasses",
"Gingerbread Cookies I",".75 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Gingerbread Cookies I",".75 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Gingerbread Cookies I","4 cups unbleached all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the sugar, ginger, nutmeg, cinnamon, salt, and baking soda. Mix in the melted margarine, evaporated milk, molasses, vanilla, and lemon extracts. Stir in the flour, 1 cup at a time, mixing well after each addition. The dough should be stiff enough to handle without sticking to fingers. If necessary, increase flour by up to 1/2 cup to prevent sticking."
"Step 3","When the dough is smooth, roll it out to 1/4 inch thick on a floured surface, and cut into cookies. Place cookies on the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. The cookies are done when the top springs back when touched. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Oatmeal Carmelitas","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Carmelitas",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Carmelitas","1 cup quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Carmelitas",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Carmelitas",".75 cup melted butter",
"Oatmeal Carmelitas",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Carmelitas","6 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Oatmeal Carmelitas",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Oatmeal Carmelitas",".75 cup caramel ice cream topping",
"Oatmeal Carmelitas","3 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease one 9x9 inch square pan."
"Step 2","Combine the 1 cup flour, baking soda, oats, brown sugar, salt and melted butter. Mix to combine, mixture will be very crumbly. Press half of the mixture into the bottom of the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes."
"Step 4","Let cool slightly then sprinkle over the crust the chocolate chips and chopped nuts. Mix the caramel ice cream topping with the 3 tablespoons of flour and drizzle over the chocolate chips. Top with the remaining oatmeal mixture. You will need to break it into small pieces to cover."
"Step 5","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 minutes. Let bars cool before cutting."
"Peanut Mallow Bars","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Peanut Mallow Bars","2 tablespoons water",
"Peanut Mallow Bars",".33 cup butter or margarine, softened",
"Peanut Mallow Bars","1 egg",
"Peanut Mallow Bars","4 cups miniature marshmallows",
"Peanut Mallow Bars","2 cups peanut butter chips",
"Peanut Mallow Bars",".67 cup light corn syrup",
"Peanut Mallow Bars",".25 cup butter or margarine",
"Peanut Mallow Bars","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Peanut Mallow Bars","2 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Peanut Mallow Bars","2 cups salted peanuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking pan."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the cake mix, water, butter, and egg until well blended. Spread into the bottom of the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Remove from the oven, and sprinkle the marshmallows over the top. Return to the oven for about 2 minutes, just to melt the marshmallows together. Remove from the oven, and place pan on a wire rack to cool."
"Step 4","In a saucepan, combine the peanut butter chips, corn syrup, and butter. Stir over medium-low heat until melted and well blended. Remove from the heat, and stir in the vanilla, rice cereal and peanuts. Spread in an even layer over the marshmallows. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting into squares."
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups butter",
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies","4 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies","6 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Tender Crisp Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream butter, shortening and sugars until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients, add to creamed mixture; mix to blend."
"Step 2","Shape dough into 1 inch balls. Dip in regular or colored sugar or decorator sprinkles. Place on lightly greased cookie sheet. Flatten slightly with the bottom of a water glass."
"Step 3","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10-12 minutes. *Larger cookies bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 minutes."
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 large egg",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 (3 ounce) bar dark chocolate, cut into chunks",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies","3 tablespoons white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Combine brown sugar, butter, white sugar, and salt in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until a creamy, deep brown mixture forms. Add egg and vanilla; beat until mixture lightens and becomes smooth, 10 to 15 seconds."
"Step 2","Mix flour and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Add slowly to the wet ingredients until mostly incorporated, but some white traces of flour remain. Fold in milk chocolate, dark chocolate, and white chocolate using a spatula, not the mixer. Cover the dough and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 48 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) when ready to bake."
"Step 4","Divide cold dough into 2 1/4-ounce portions and place on a cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges start to look golden brown and crispy, 10 to 12 minutes. Do not overbake; the centers will not look fully done. Cool until cookies are set, about 30 minutes."
"Cardamom Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Cardamom Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cardamom Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cardamom",
"Cardamom Cookies","1 pinch ground cinnamon",
"Cardamom Cookies",".25 teaspoon grated lemon peel",
"Cardamom Cookies",".25 cup ground almonds",
"Cardamom Cookies","6 tablespoons butter",
"Cardamom Cookies","1 egg",
"Cardamom Cookies","2 teaspoons milk",
"Cardamom Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Sift together flour, sugar, and spices; stir in peel and almonds. Cut in margarine till mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in egg and milk till mixture forms a ball; chill."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll out to about 1/8-inch thickness. Cut into circles 1-3/4 inches in diameter. Place on ungreased cookie sheet; sprinkle with sugar. Bake for 6 to 8 minutes until edges are brown."
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies","1 .33 cups white sugar",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies","1 egg",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies","1 .5 cups canned pumpkin puree",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies",".25 cup heavy cream",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies",".5 cup crushed pineapple, drained",
"Pumpkin-Pine Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Stir together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon and cloves; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, sugar and egg until smooth. Stir in the pumpkin and cream. Gradually mix in the dry ingredients until well blended and then stir in the oats, pineapple and pecans. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until bottoms begin to brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely.Monster Cookies VIII","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Monster Cookies VIII",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Monster Cookies VIII","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Monster Cookies VIII","2 large eggs eggs",
"Monster Cookies VIII",".67 cup margarine, melted",
"Monster Cookies VIII","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Monster Cookies VIII","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the cake mix, oats and baking powder. Make a well in the center and add the eggs and margarine; mix until well blended. Stir in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups butter",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups brown sugar",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat butter, eggs, and vanilla until well blended. Beat in the brown sugar and confectioners' sugar. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon, stir into the sugar mixture. Finally, stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Place the cookies 2 inches apart onto the cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Sandy's Super Sugar Cookies","5 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sandy's Super Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Sandy's Super Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sandy's Super Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Sandy's Super Sugar Cookies","2 cups butter, room temperature",
"Sandy's Super Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Sandy's Super Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sandy's Super Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Sift flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl."
"Step 3","Beat butter and white sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy; beat in vanilla extract. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Gradually add flour mixture to butter mixture on low speed until dough is just-combined."
"Step 4","Divide dough into 4 portions; refrigerate 3 portions. Roll remaining portion out on a lightly-floured work surface to 1/4-inch thick. Use cookie cutters to cut dough into desired shapes and transfer cookies to prepared baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until slightly golden at the edges, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. Repeat rolling, cutting, and baking process with remaining dough portions."
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Sue's Two-Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream the shortening, white sugar, and brown sugar together with a wooden spoon. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt, stir into the creamed mixture. Finally stir in the semi sweet chips and the white chips, if the batter is too stiff, you may need to use your hands."
"Step 3","Drop cookies by heaping spoonfuls onto unprepared cookie sheets. Bake for 7 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. I always like to take my cookies out of the oven when they are light brown and not yet set. It creates a softer cookie. Allow cookies to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheet before removing to cool on wire racks."
"The Best Lemon Bars","1 cup butter, softened",
"The Best Lemon Bars",".5 cup white sugar",
"The Best Lemon Bars","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Best Lemon Bars","4 large eggs eggs",
"The Best Lemon Bars","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"The Best Lemon Bars",".25 cup all-purpose flour",
"The Best Lemon Bars","2 fruit, without seeds lemons, juiced",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, blend together softened butter, 2 cups flour and 1/2 cup sugar. Press into the bottom of an ungreased 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until firm and golden. In another bowl, whisk together the remaining 1 1/2 cups sugar and 1/4 cup flour. Whisk in the eggs and lemon juice. Pour over the baked crust."
"Step 4","Bake for an additional 20 minutes in the preheated oven. The bars will firm up as they cool. For a festive tray, make another pan using limes instead of lemons and adding a drop of green food coloring to give a very pale green. After both pans have cooled, cut into uniform 2 inch squares and arrange in a checker board fashion."
"Quick Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Quick Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Quick Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Quick Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, mix together the peanut butter, sugar, egg, and baking soda until well blended. Roll dough into 1 inch balls, and place on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 6 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on cookie sheets until set, before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup unsalted butter",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon orange zest",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Orange Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Sift flour, baking powder and salt into and set aside. Cream butter, sugars, orange zest and vanilla extract together in a large bowl until light and fluffy."
"Step 3","Add eggs one at a time beating well after adding each one. Add dry ingredients and stir until combined. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts and mix until well blended."
"Step 4","Drop dough by slightly rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on cookie sheets. Flatten slightly. Bake cookies for 15 or 16 minutes or until golden. Cool on the cookie sheets."
"Mel's Magnificent Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, chilled",
"Mel's Magnificent Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mel's Magnificent Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mel's Magnificent Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mel's Magnificent Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Mel's Magnificent Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mel's Magnificent Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mel's Magnificent Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mel's Magnificent Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix butter, eggs, vanilla and sugars together. Add dry ingredients and blend well, until mixture is whipped. Mix in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop tablespoon sized pieces dough onto a greased cookie sheet; bake for 8-10 minutes, until edges are browned. Remove from oven before the center is browned."
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies","1 egg",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies",".5 cup cornmeal",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies","⅜ teaspoon salt",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies","1 .5 cups finely chopped cranberries",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies",".33 cup brown sugar",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies",".33 cup water",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies","1 .5 tablespoons butter",
"Cranberry Cornmeal Linzer Cookies","1 .5 tablespoons lemon juice",
"Step 1","Beat 3/4 cup butter and and white sugar together in a bowl with an electric mixer until creamy. Beat egg into butter mixture."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, cornmeal, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl. Gradually add flour mixture to butter mixture; stir. Beat vanilla into butter mixture. Form dough into a ball, wrap tightly in plastic wrap, and refrigerate until firm, at least 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 4","Roll dough out onto a lightly floured surface to 1/8-inch thick. Cut dough with a round or Linzer cookie cutter. Use a smaller cutter to cut the center from the tops. Place cookie bottoms and tops 1-inch apart on prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are lightly golden, 10 to 12 minutes. Transfer to wire racks to cool."
"Step 6","Stir cranberries, brown sugar, and water together in a saucepan over medium-high heat; cook until cranberries are soft, about 10 minutes. Stir butter and lemon juice into cranberry mixture; remove from heat and cool."
"Step 7","Spread a small amount of the cranberry mixture onto one side of the bottom half of a cookie. Place the top half of the cookie on top of the cranberry mixture. Repeat assembly process with remaining cookies and cranberry filling."
"Soda Cracker Cookies","35 crackers soda crackers",
"Soda Cracker Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Soda Cracker Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Soda Cracker Cookies",".75 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Soda Cracker Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a 15 x 10 inch baking pan with foil and grease it well. Line the pan with soda crackers."
"Step 2","In a medium saucepan, melt the butter. Add the brown sugar and cook stirring it until it dissolves. Bring to a boil and cook about 3 minutes, stirring constantly. Immediately pour mixture over the soda crackers."
"Step 3","Bake for 3 to 5 minutes or until the mixture starts to bubble. Spread the chocolate chips over the hot cookies. Let set for a minute. Spread the chocolate evenly. Sprinkle with nuts. Let cool, then cut into bars."
"Chinese Restaurant Almond Cookies","2 .75 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Chinese Restaurant Almond Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chinese Restaurant Almond Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chinese Restaurant Almond Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chinese Restaurant Almond Cookies","1 cup lard",
"Chinese Restaurant Almond Cookies","1 egg",
"Chinese Restaurant Almond Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Chinese Restaurant Almond Cookies","48 almonds almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift flour, sugar, baking soda and salt together into a bowl. Cut in the lard until mixture resembles cornmeal. Add egg and almond extract. Mix well."
"Step 3","Roll dough into 1-inch balls. Set them 2 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet. Place an almond on top of each cookie and press down to flatten slightly."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges of the cookies are golden brown, 15 to 18 minutes."
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies","2 eaches eggs",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies","1 cup oats",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies","1 cup crispy rice cereal (such as Rice Krispies®)",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Coconut Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat brown sugar, white sugar, and butter together with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Add 1 egg one at a time, allowing the first to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next with the vanilla."
"Step 3","Stir flour, baking soda, salt, and baking powder together in a bowl. Beat into the butter mixture until just incorporated into a dough. Fold oats, crispy rice cereal, and coconut into the dough; mixing just enough to evenly combine."
"Step 4","Drop cookie dough by teaspoonful onto baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in preheated oven until browned, 8 to 9 minutes. Cool cookies slightly on baking sheets before moving to cooling racks to cool completely."
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","1 cup vegetable shortening",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies",".25 cup butter",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","3 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract, or more to taste",
"Soft Frosted Sugar Cookies","2 tablespoons milk, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat vegetable shortening, white sugar, 1/4 cup milk, eggs, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract together in a bowl. Whisk flour, salt, and baking soda in a separate bowl. Slowly beat flour mixture into shortening mixture to make a smooth dough."
"Step 3","Roll dough out 1/4-inch thick on a floured work surface and cut into shapes. Arrange cookies on baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are firm, about 10 minutes. Let cool."
"Step 5","Beat butter, confectioners' sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, and 2 tablespoons milk in a bowl with an electric mixer on high speed until frosting is spreadable and slightly fluffy. Frost cooled cookies."
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 cup butter",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 pinch salt",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 .5 cups flaked coconut",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","2 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Cracker Jack Cookies I","1 .5 cups chopped salted peanuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt, stir into the creamed mixture. Gently stir in the oatmeal, coconut, rice cereal and chopped peanuts, try not to pulverize the rice cereal."
"Step 3","Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup butter at room temperature",
"Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup vegetable shortening (such as Crisco®)",
"Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","2 eaches eggs, separated",
"Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour, sifted",
"Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","1 .5 cups finely chopped pecans",
"Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","1 (8 ounce) jar raspberry jam, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter, vegetable shortening, and brown sugar together in a bowl until smooth and creamy; beat in egg yolks and vanilla extract. Retain egg whites for a later step. Stir flour into butter mixture 1 cup at a time; mix in salt."
"Step 3","Beat egg whites in a separate bowl; transfer pecans to a shallow bowl. Pinch off and roll dough into 1-inch balls, dip each in beaten egg white, and roll in pecans. Place cookies on an ungreased baking sheet. Use your thumb to form an indention into the top of each cookie and spoon a small amount of raspberry jam into the hollow."
"Step 4","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until very lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Coconut Icebox Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Coconut Icebox Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Coconut Icebox Cookies","1 egg",
"Coconut Icebox Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Coconut Icebox Cookies",".5 teaspoon coconut extract",
"Coconut Icebox Cookies","1 .75 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Coconut Icebox Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Coconut Icebox Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Coconut Icebox Cookies","1 cup shredded coconut",
"Step 1","Cream the butter until smooth; add sugar and continue creaming until light and fluffy. Stir in egg, vanilla and coconut flavoring."
"Step 2","Sift the flour with the salt and baking soda. Alternately add the flour mixture and the shredded coconut to the creamed mixture. Form the dough into logs about 2 inches in diameter. Tightly wrap dough and chill for at least two hours or overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Remove dough from refrigerator and cut into 1/4-inch slices. Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet until the edges are golden, about 10 minutes. Cool on wire rack."
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon coffee-flavored liqueur",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Allison's Supreme Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and coffee liqueur. Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the sugar mixture. Mix in the oats, chocolate chips, and walnuts. Roll tablespoonfuls of dough into balls, and place them 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden. Cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before eating!"
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","4 large eggs",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","1 .67 cups white sugar",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","1 teaspoon salt",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Paul's Pumpkin Bars","2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, mix the eggs, sugar, oil, and pumpkin with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon and salt. Stir into the pumpkin mixture until thoroughly combined."
"Step 3","Spread the batter evenly into an ungreased 10x15 inch jellyroll pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in preheated oven. Cool before frosting."
"Step 4","To make the frosting, cream together the cream cheese and butter. Stir in vanilla. Add confectioners' sugar a little at a time, beating until mixture is smooth. Spread evenly on top of the cooled bars. Cut into squares."
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies","4 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate",
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup vegetable shortening",
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Super Duper Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Melt the chocolate and shortening in a saucepan over low heat. Remove from heat and mix in sugar and vanilla. Beat in eggs 1 at a time. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Stir in the chocolate mixture and nuts. Chill dough in the refrigerator 3 hours or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Place confectioners' sugar in a bowl. Roll dough into 1 inch balls. Roll dough balls in confectioners' sugar to coat. Arrange 3 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. The cookies will look soft when removed from the oven. Transfer to a wire rack to cool. Enjoy!"
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies IV",".5 cup butter",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies IV",".75 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies IV","1 egg",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies IV","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies IV","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon salt",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies IV","8 ounces white chocolate, chopped",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies IV","1 (6.5 ounce) jar macadamia nuts, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt, stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the white chocolate and nuts. Drop cookies by heaping teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet, about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned. Cool on wire racks. When cool, store in an airtight container.Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup roasted and salted sunflower seeds",
"Sunflower Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the white sugar, brown sugar, and butter until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, and baking soda; stir into the creamed mixture until just blended. Mix in the rolled oats and sunflower seeds. Stir in coconut if desired. Drop dough by heaping teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Leave room for spreading."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the cookies begin to brown around the edge. Allow cookies to set for a few minutes on the sheet before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies",".75 cup light brown sugar",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies",".75 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies",".75 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies",".5 cup white chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Lover's Dream Cookies","7 piece (blank)s chocolate hard candies, crushed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Mix in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa powder and baking soda; stir into the butter mixture until well blended. Mix in the semisweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate chips, white chocolate chips, and crushed candies so they are evenly distributed. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 6 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven, or until tops are no longer shiny."
"Poop Emoji Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Poop Emoji Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","4 teaspoons baking powder",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla sugar",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","9 tablespoons unsalted butter, cubed",
"Poop Emoji Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","1 egg",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","3 tablespoons confectioners' sugar",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","2 teaspoons lemon juice, or as needed",
"Poop Emoji Cookies","90 eaches candy eyeballs",
"Step 1","Combine flour, 1 cup confectioners' sugar, 3/4 cups plus 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, baking powder, vanilla sugar, and salt in a large bowl. Work in butter with your fingers until mixture resembles small crumbs. Add milk and egg and knead into a soft dough. Place in a bowl, cover, and refrigerate for 30 minutes."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Roll dough into long, thin 8-inch ropes, pinching one end into a pointy tip. Arrange in the shape of a little poop-mound with the pointy tip on top and place onto the prepared baking sheet, leaving space between individual cookies."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly darkened on the bottom and dried, 10 to 12 minutes. Carefully remove from baking sheet and transfer onto a wire rack to cool completely, about 2 hours."
"Step 5","Mix 3 tablespoons confectioners' sugar with lemon juice to form a thin icing. Glue 2 candy eyeballs on each poop cookie and let dry."
"Chocolate Meringue Cookies","3 large egg whites egg whites",
"Chocolate Meringue Cookies","⅛ teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Chocolate Meringue Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Meringue Cookies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Meringue Cookies","1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Meringue Cookies",".33 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine egg whites, cream of tartar, and vanilla. Beat until the whites form soft peaks. Slowly add sugar; beat until stiff peaks form, and mixture becomes glossy. Fold in cocoa and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop mixture by teaspoonfuls on to a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes."
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon green tea powder (matcha)",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup unsalted butter, melted",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"Matcha Green Tea Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease baking sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Sift flour, matcha, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl. Beat brown sugar, butter, and white sugar together in a large bowl using an electric mixer until blended; beat in vanilla extract, egg, and egg yolk until light and creamy."
"Step 3","Mix flour mixture into creamed butter mixture until dough is just blended; fold in chocolate chips using a wooden spoon. Drop cookie dough, 1 heaping tablespoon per cookie, onto the prepared baking sheet 2 to 3 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool cookies on the baking sheet for 2 to 3 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups old-fashioned oats",
"Devouring Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla extract; stir to combine. Sift flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and baking powder together in a separate bowl; stir into butter-sugar mixture until thick and free of clumps. Gradually stir oats, 1 cup at a time, into batter until evenly mixed. Fold in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Scoop 1 to 2 tablespoons batter and drop onto prepared baking sheet. Repeat with remaining batter, keeping about 2 inches between each scoop."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are lightly browned, 9 to 10 minutes. Let cookies cool on the baking sheet before removing, 30 minutes."
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Double Chocolate Chip Macadamia Cookies","1 cup chopped dry roasted macadamia nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Gradually blend in the sifted ingredients. Mix in the white chocolate and semisweet chocolate chips and macadamia nuts. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Soft Sugar Cookies V","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Sugar Cookies V","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Soft Sugar Cookies V",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Soft Sugar Cookies V",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Sugar Cookies V",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Soft Sugar Cookies V","1 cup butter, softened",
"Soft Sugar Cookies V","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Soft Sugar Cookies V","1 egg",
"Soft Sugar Cookies V","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Soft Sugar Cookies V",".5 cup sour cream",
"Step 1","Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and nutmeg; set aside. In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg, vanilla and sour cream until well blended. Stir in the sifted ingredients. Wrap dough in plastic wrap and chill overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup margarine, softened",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Vanishing Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat margarine and sugars until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla: beat well."
"Step 3","Combine flour, baking soda, cinnamon and salt; add to margarine mixture and mix well."
"Step 4","Stir in oats and chocolate morsels. Mix well."
"Step 5","Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 6","Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown."
"Step 7","Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet; remove to wire rack. Store in airtight container."
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter at room temperature",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups light brown sugar",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups old-fashioned rolled oats",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons coarse kosher salt",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup dried cranberries",
"Cranberry-Nut Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped toasted pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place an oven rack in the upper third of the oven. Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Place unsalted butter and light brown sugar into the work bowl of a stand mixer and mix on medium-slow speed until very fluffy, 3 to 4 minutes. Beat in the vanilla extract, followed by eggs, one at a time. Reduce mixer speed to lowest speed and leave running."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, whisk together the rolled oats, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, kosher salt, and nutmeg. Pour the dry ingredients into the slowly running mixer in thirds; mix in dried cranberries and nuts until just incorporated. Using a large cookie scoop, place dough on prepared baking sheet about 2 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake one batch at a time in the preheated oven just until the edges are brown, 17 to 18 minutes. Allow to cool on baking sheets for about 5 minutes before removing to finish cooling on wire racks."
"Peppermint Meringue Cookies","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Peppermint Meringue Cookies","⅛ teaspoon cider vinegar",
"Peppermint Meringue Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Peppermint Meringue Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Peppermint Meringue Cookies","3 eaches peppermint candy canes, crushed",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 225 degrees F (110 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with aluminum foil or parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large glass or metal bowl, whip egg whites, vinegar and salt to soft peaks. Gradually add sugar while continuing to whip until stiff peaks form, about 5 minutes. Fold in 1/3 of the crushed candy canes, reserving the rest. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls, one inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Sprinkle remaining crushed candy canes over the top."
"Step 3","Bake for 90 minutes in the preheated oven, or until dry. Cool on baking sheets."
"Rosettes I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Rosettes I","1 tablespoon white sugar",
"Rosettes I","1 cup sifted all-purpose flour",
"Rosettes I","1 cup milk",
"Rosettes I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Rosettes I",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Rosettes I","vegetable oil for frying",
"Rosettes I","sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Combine eggs, sugar and salt; beat well. Add remaining ingredients and beat until smooth."
"Step 2","Heat a rosette iron in deep, hot oil (375 degrees) for 2 minutes."
"Step 3","Drain excess oil from iron. Dip in batter to 1/4 inch from the top of the iron, then dip iron immediately into hot oil (375 degrees)."
"Step 4","Fry rosette until golden, about 30 seconds. Lift out; tip upside down to drain. With fork, push rosette off iron onto a rack placed over paper towels."
"Step 5","Reheat iron 1 minute; make next rosette."
"Step 6","Sprinkle rosettes with confectioners' sugar."
"Spring Cleaning Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","2 tablespoons evaporated milk",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Spring Cleaning Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, shortening, white sugar and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the evaporated milk and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; stir into the sugar mixture. Mix in the oats, chocolate chips, coconut and pecans. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Cookies should be spaced about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 13 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Cool slightly on cookie sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Chocolate Chip Meringue Cookies",".67 cup granulated sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Meringue Cookies","2 teaspoons cornstarch",
"Chocolate Chip Meringue Cookies","3 large egg whites egg whites, at room temperature",
"Chocolate Chip Meringue Cookies",".5 teaspoon white vinegar",
"Chocolate Chip Meringue Cookies",".5 cup mini semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Meringue Cookies","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Chip Meringue Cookies","1 teaspoon Cocoa powder",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a small bowl, whisk together sugar and cornstarch; set aside."
"Step 3","In a large bowl beat egg whites with an electric mixer, until foamy. Beat in vinegar on medium speed until soft peaks form (about 2 minutes). On high speed, beat in sugar mixture, 1 tablespoon (15 mL) at a time, until stiff glossy peaks form (about 2 to 3 minutes). Fold in chocolate chips and cocoa powder, until just blended."
"Step 4","Drop by tablespoonfuls (15 mL), about 1-inch (2.5 cm) apart, onto prepared baking sheets. Bake for 30 minutes or until cookies are dry to touch, rotating pans halfway through. Remove cookies from sheets and place on cooling racks. Sprinkle with cocoa powder, if desired. Cool completely. Store in airtight containers."
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies","2 sheets Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies",".75 cup granulated sugar",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies","2 tablespoons finely shredded orange peel",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies","1 tablespoon finely shredded lemon peel",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies",".33 cup milk",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies","2 tablespoons melted butter",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies","1 tablespoon orange juice, or as needed",
"Orange & Lemon Butter Cookies",".75 cup powdered sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line two cookie sheets with Reynolds® Parchment Paper; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat the butter and sugar in a large bowl using an electric mixer about 2 minutes or until light and fluffy. Add the egg, orange peel, lemon peel, and vanilla and beat until well blended."
"Step 3","Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium bowl. Add half of flour mixture to the butter mixture, beating until just combined. Add the milk. Beat about 10 seconds. Beat in the remaining flour mixture until just combined."
"Step 4","Drop tablespoon-size mounds of dough on prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until set and the bottoms are browned. Transfer the cookies on the parchment paper to a wire rack; cool completely."
"Step 6","Drizzle with Citrus Glaze to serve."
"Step 7","Citrus Glaze: In a small bowl combine melted butter and orange juice. Add powdered sugar; beat until smooth. If necessary, add more orange juice, 1/2 teaspoon at a time, to make drizzling consistency. Drizzle over cookies."
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","3 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","1 .25 cups raisins",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Sarah's Raisin Cookies","2 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Step 1","In a small bowl, combine the eggs, vanilla extract, almond extract and raisins. Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon; stir into the sugar mixture. Mix in the raisin mixture until well blended. Stir in oats. Roll into 1 inch balls and place them 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Easy Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package vanilla flavored cake mix",
"Easy Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Easy Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Easy Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easy Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat egg yolks and margarine together until well blended. Stir in vanilla. Gradually add cake mix while beating with an electric mixer. Mixture should be stiff. If it is sticky to the touch, refrigerate for 20 minutes."
"Step 3","Form teaspoonfuls of the dough into balls, and roll in sugar. Place on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 11 minutes for soft cookies, and for 13 minutes for crispy cookies."
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies","1 cup molasses",
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies",".75 cup lard",
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies",".5 cup hot water",
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Nauvoo Gingerbread Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, mix together the sugar, molasses, lard, and hot water until smooth. Stir in eggs. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and ginger; stir into the batter to make a soft dough. Add more flour if needed. Cover the bowl and refrigerate dough for at least 1 hour, or until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Roll out the dough to 1/4 inch thickness on a floured surface. Cut into desired shapes using cookie cutters. Place cookies onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until cookies appear dry in the center."
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"World's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the shortening, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the batter until blended. Mix in oats and walnuts. Drop by teaspoonfuls, 1 inch apart, onto greased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Immediately remove cookies to wire racks and allow to cool."
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","2 .25 cups pitted prunes",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","3 cups raisins",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","3 teaspoons baking soda",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","1 tablespoon lemon zest",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","1 cup milk",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies","1 lemon",
"Prune and Raisin Filled Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","To Make Filling: Boil prunes until plump. Put raisins in pan, cover with water and heat until water steams. Strain and add 1/2 cup of sugar to raisins, mix well and heat again until almost dry. Remove from heat and set aside. Pit the cooked prunes, if not already pitted, chop and add to raisins. Add chopped nuts, if desired. Set fruit mix aside overnight."
"Step 2","The next day make the dough. In large bowl, mix together the flour, baking soda, sugar and salt. Make a well in the center. Add the eggs, milk, grated lemon rind and oil and mix to form dough. Knead the dough to the consistency for rolling."
"Step 3","Divide the dough into 6 parts. Roll each part into a rectangle of 1/8 inch thickness. Put 1/6 of the fruit mix onto the dough rectangle and spread evenly."
"Step 4","Fold the dough lengthwise into the center. Fold the other side in slightly past center, and press seam lightly. Pinch ends to close. Lift the loaf with a spatula and place on lightly greased cookie sheet with seam under."
"Step 5","Bake in 400 degree F (205 degrees C) oven for 18 - 20 minutes (top should be lightly brown). Allow to cool then cut crosswise slices about 1 inch thick."
"Step 6","To Make Glaze: Use juice of 1 lemon and enough confectioners' sugar to obtain consistency for brushing top of cookie. Drop sprinkles onto glaze and allow glaze to set. Enjoy!Spring Lime Tea Cookies","2 teaspoons lime juice",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies",".33 cup milk",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies","1 egg",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies","2 teaspoons lime zest",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies","2 tablespoons lime juice",
"Spring Lime Tea Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Combine the 2 teaspoons of lime juice with the milk, let stand for 5 minutes."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and 3/4 cup sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the lime zest and milk mixture. Combine the flour, baking powder and baking soda, blend into the creamed mixture. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges are light brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","To make the glaze, stir together the remaining lime juice and sugar. Brush onto cooled cookies."
"Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .25 cups packed light brown sugar",
"Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 cup peanut butter",
"Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together shortening, brown sugar, and peanut butter until smooth. Stir in egg, milk, and vanilla. Combine flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture until well blended. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Cookie Pops",".75 cup white sugar",
