"Cookie Pops",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cookie Pops",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Cookie Pops","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cookie Pops","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cookie Pops","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cookie Pops","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cookie Pops",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cookie Pops","2 cups rolled oats",
"Cookie Pops","1 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Cookie Pops","20 eaches lollipop sticks",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together white sugar, brown sugar, and butter. Add vanilla and eggs; mix well. Sift together flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into butter mixture. Finally, mix in rolled oats. Refrigerate dough for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll dough into 2 inch balls. Place balls on a cookie sheet, Press down slightly, and insert a lollypop stick into each one. These will spread a bit so don 't put too many to a pan. Bake 8 to 12 minutes, or until golden brown. Cool 1 minute then arrange small candies into a happy face design. The cookies will be chewy, but firm."
"Super Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Super Sugar Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Super Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Super Sugar Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Super Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Super Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Super Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Super Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Super Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Super Sugar Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Cream vegetable oil and butter or margarine. Add sugars and blend well. Add eggs and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients and add above. Refrigerate dough for several hours after mixing."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Dough will be soft. Shape into balls. Dip in sugar. Place on greased cookie sheet. Flatten slightly with a glass dipped in sugar. Bake for 12 minutes."
"Tea Cookies I","1 cup butter, softened",
"Tea Cookies I",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Tea Cookies I","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Tea Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Tea Cookies I","1 pinch salt",
"Tea Cookies I","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Tea Cookies I",".75 cup chopped walnuts",
"Tea Cookies I",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for dusting",
"Step 1","Beat together the butter and confectioners' sugar till creamy. Add vanilla."
"Step 2","Mix the dry ingredients, stir into creamy mixture. Blend well."
"Step 3","Add the nuts, mix well, roll the dough out into two balls. Wrap in plastic wrap and chill for at least 1 hour in the refrigerator."
"Step 4","Flatten dough out and cut into 15 or 20 equal size pieces, shape into balls. Place on ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes till firm but not brown. While still warm roll into confectioners' sugar, let cool and roll again."
"Cookie Butter Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Cookie Butter Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Cookie Butter Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Cookie Butter Cookies",".5 cup cookie butter",
"Cookie Butter Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Cookie Butter Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cookie Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Cookie Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cookie Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cookie Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cookie Butter Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter, brown sugar, and 3/4 cup white sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Add cookie butter and peanut butter; beat until fluffy. Mix flour, egg, baking soda, baking powder, and salt into the butter mixture creating a cookie dough. Roll dough into teaspoon-size balls."
"Step 3","Spread 1/3 cup sugar into a shallow dish. Roll dough balls in the sugar to coat and arrange onto the prepared baking sheet. Press dough balls with a fork twice to flatten slightly and press a crosshatch shape into the top of the cookies."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, about 12 minutes."
"Whipped Shortbread Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Whipped Shortbread Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Whipped Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Whipped Shortbread Cookies",".25 cup red maraschino cherries, quartered",
"Whipped Shortbread Cookies",".25 cup green maraschino cherries, quartered",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, combine butter, flour, and confectioners' sugar. With an electric mixer, beat for 10 minutes, until light and fluffy. Spoon onto cookie sheets, spacing cookies 2 inches apart. Place a piece of maraschino cherry onto the middle of each cookie, alternating between red and green."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 17 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the bottoms of the cookies are lightly browned. Remove from oven, and let cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes, then transfer cookies on to wire rack to cool. Store in an airtight container, separating each layer with waxed paper."
"Rubber Cookies","1 cup sorghum molasses",
"Rubber Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Rubber Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Rubber Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Rubber Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Rubber Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Rubber Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Rubber Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Rubber Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Rubber Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Rubber Cookies",".5 apple",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a Dutch oven or large saucepan over medium heat, heat sorghum, stirring constantly. Stir in baking soda and remove from heat. Stir in the sugar and eggs; mix well. Combine the salt, cinnamon, allspice, cloves and nutmeg; mix into the sorghum mixture. Gradually stir in the flour until dough is stiff enough to roll out. The amount of flour may be adjusted."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into desired shapes using cookie cutters. I like to cut them into squares with a pizza cutter. Place cookies 1 inch apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are firm but not crisp. Remove from baking sheets immediately or they will stick. Cool on wire racks. When cool, place into an airtight container with the 1/2 apple for about a week, or until they are soft enough to bend. Frost with confectioners' sugar frosting if you like."
"Twisty Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Twisty Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Twisty Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Twisty Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Twisty Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Twisty Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Twisty Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Twisty Cookies","1 cup chopped almonds",
"Twisty Cookies","3 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Twisty Cookies","2 teaspoons rum",
"Twisty Cookies",".5 teaspoon whiskey",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Combine white and brown sugar, butter and eggs. Stir in flour, baking soda and salt. The dough will be stiff."
"Step 3","Stir in nuts, chocolate chips, rum and whiskey. Drop dough by tablespoonful onto cookie sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes."
"Persimmon Cookies II","2 fruit, without refuses ripe persimmons, pureed",
"Persimmon Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Persimmon Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Persimmon Cookies II","1 egg",
"Persimmon Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Persimmon Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Persimmon Cookies II","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Persimmon Cookies II",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Persimmon Cookies II",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Persimmon Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Persimmon Cookies II","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease or line one baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg and salt."
"Step 3","Cream the butter or margarine with the sugar. Beat in the egg and persimmons. Add the flour mixture and mix until combined, stir in the chopped nuts. Drop by teaspoonfuls, 2 inches apart, onto the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12 to 15 minutes."
"Guyanese Lime Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies","1 teaspoon lime zest",
"Guyanese Lime Cookies","3 tablespoons lime juice",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 large baking sheets. Stir together the flour, baking powder, salt, 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg, and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon in a bowl; set aside. Stir together 1/3 cup sugar, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg, and 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon in a separate bowl and set aside."
"Step 2","Cream together the butter, 1 cup sugar, and lime zest in a large bowl until light and fluffy. Gradually beat in the lime juice, then the flour mixture 1/2 cup at a time. Form the dough into walnut-sized balls, and roll in the spiced sugar mixture. Arrange onto prepared baking sheets 1 inch apart. Flatten the balls slightly using a decorative cookie stamp or the bottom of a glass."
"Step 3","Bake the cookies in the preheated oven until the edges of the cookies turn golden brown, 13 to 16 minutes. Cool the cookies on wire racks, then store in an airtight container up to 1 week."
"Lemon Pie Bars","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lemon Pie Bars",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Lemon Pie Bars","1 cup butter, softened",
"Lemon Pie Bars","4 large eggs eggs",
"Lemon Pie Bars","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Lemon Pie Bars",".5 cup lemon juice",
"Lemon Pie Bars","1 tablespoon lemon zest",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix 2 cups of flour and confectioner's sugar together. Cut in the butter or margarine. Mix well until the dough resembles pie dough consistency. Press the dough into a 9x13 inch baking pan."
"Step 3","Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until golden brown."
"Step 4","Beat together eggs, sugar, 4 tablespoons flour, lemon juice and lemon rind for at least 1 minute. Pour the mixture over the baked crust."
"Step 5","Bake the bars another 20 minutes, or until the lemon topping has set. Sprinkle with confectioner's sugar when cooled."
"Spice Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Spice Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Spice Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Spice Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Spice Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spice Cookies","1 cup dried currants",
"Spice Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Spice Cookies","1 cup milk, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease 2 baking sheets."
"Step 2","Combine sugar, butter, eggs, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves in a bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy. Combine flour, currants, and baking soda in a separate bowl. Stir into the butter mixture alternately with tablespoons of milk until the flour is fully incorporated."
"Step 3","Drop spoonfuls of batter onto the prepared baking sheets. Press down lightly with a fork. Dip fork in sugar or water if it sticks."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes. Let stand on the baking sheets for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Mary's Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Mary's Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Mary's Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Mary's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mary's Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Mary's Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mary's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mary's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Mary's Sugar Cookies",".25 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and confectioners' sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and stir in the vanilla and almond extract. Combine the flour, baking soda and cream of tartar; blend into the creamed mixture. Cover and chill for at least two hours."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Divide the dough into two parts. On a lightly floured surface, roll each piece of the dough out to 3/16 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto greased cookie sheets. Sprinkle cookies with plain or colored granulated sugar."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Special K Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Special K Cookies","1 .33 cups peanut butter",
"Special K Cookies","1 cup white corn syrup",
"Special K Cookies","4 cups high protein crisp rice and wheat cereal",
"Special K Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Special K Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Step 1","Blend syrup, sugar, vanilla and salt in a 2 quart microwave-safe dish. Cook on high 4 minutes, or until mixture boils and sugar dissolves."
"Step 2","Stir in peanut butter, then add the cereal."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let cool before storing."
"Ultimate High Altitude Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter or margarine",
"Ultimate High Altitude Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Ultimate High Altitude Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Ultimate High Altitude Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Ultimate High Altitude Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Ultimate High Altitude Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Ultimate High Altitude Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Ultimate High Altitude Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ultimate High Altitude Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Mix in eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the batter just until blended, then mix in the chocolate chips so they are evenly distributed. Drop cookies by heaping teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets spacing 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges begin to turn golden, 12 to 15 minutes. Allow cookies to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)",".5 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","1 cup butter",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)",".75 cup white sugar",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","1 egg",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting (The World's Best!)","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, baking powder, cinnamon, baking soda, nutmeg, and ginger together in a bowl. Beat 1 cup butter, white sugar, brown sugar, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, and egg with an electric mixer in a separate large bowl, beating until mixture is smooth. Beat in pumpkin puree. Gradually stir dry ingredients into pumpkin mixture. Batter will be moist."
"Step 3","Spoon batter by teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes. Let cookies cool for about 5 minutes on sheets before removing to finish cooling on waxed paper."
"Step 5","Beat cream cheese, 1/4 cup butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract in a bowl with an electric mixer until soft and creamy. Beat in confectioners' sugar, about 1/2 cup at a time, until frosting is smooth and spreadable. Frost cooled cookies with cream cheese frosting."
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup whole wheat flour",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Iowa City Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup wheat and barley nugget cereal (e.g. Grape-Nuts™)",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. Beat in the egg, and vanilla. Sift together the flour, whole wheat flour, and baking soda; stir into the creamed mixture. Then stir in the oatmeal, chocolate chips, walnuts, and cereal. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on wire racks."
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","2 cups raisins",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","1 cup water",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","1 .75 cups white sugar",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Jumbo Raisin Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Place water and raisins in a small saucepan, and bring to boil. Boil 3 to 4 minutes. Set aside to cool."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg; set aside."
"Step 4","In a large bowl, cream together shortening and sugar. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Stir in raisins along with the liquid in which they were boiled. Blend in flour mixture, then mix in the walnuts. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in preheated oven, or until firm. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III",".67 cup shortening",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III","1 tablespoon water",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies III",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","In large bowl cream shortening, sugar, water and vanilla extract. Beat in eggs. In a separate bowl, combine flour, cocoa, salt and baking soda and gradually add to creamed mixture. Beat until just blended. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts."
"Step 2","Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 7 - 9 minutes. Do not overbake. Cool 2 minutes before removing from cookie sheet.Sugar Cookies X","2 cups white sugar",
"Sugar Cookies X","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookies X","1 cup butter",
"Sugar Cookies X","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Sugar Cookies X","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Sugar Cookies X","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sugar Cookies X","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sugar Cookies X","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookies X","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, mix oil, butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla until creamy."
"Step 2","Mix together cream of tarter, baking soda, flour, and salt. Add these dry ingredients to the creamed mixture. Chill dough for 15 to 20 minutes."
"Step 3","Roll dough into balls, and place on greased cookie sheets. Press balls with a glass dipped in sugar to flatten."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8 to 10 min."
"Banana Cake Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Banana Cake Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Banana Cake Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Banana Cake Cookies","1 cup mashed bananas",
"Banana Cake Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Banana Cake Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Banana Cake Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Banana Cake Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Banana Cake Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Banana Cake Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Banana Cake Cookies","3 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Banana Cake Cookies","1 tablespoon butter, melted",
"Banana Cake Cookies",".75 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Banana Cake Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream shortening; add brown sugar, beating well. Add eggs and banana; beat well."
"Step 3","Sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and spices. Add to creamed mixture; mix well. Stir in pecans."
"Step 4","Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls, 2 inches apart onto greased cookies sheets. Bake for 12 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool. Dip half of cooled cookies into Powdered Sugar Icing."
"Step 5","To Make Icing: Combine 3 cups confectioner's sugar, 1 tablespoon melted butter or margarine, and 3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract. Add milk to yield desired consistency (you may need to add a little extra), beating until smooth."
"German Cut-Out Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"German Cut-Out Cookies","2 cups brown sugar",
"German Cut-Out Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"German Cut-Out Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"German Cut-Out Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"German Cut-Out Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"German Cut-Out Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"German Cut-Out Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Beat in the eggs and vanilla extract until well blended. Combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. Decorate with your favorite frostings or sprinkles if you like."
"Northland Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Northland Cookies","6 tablespoons butter",
"Northland Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Northland Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Northland Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Northland Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Northland Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Northland Cookies",".5 cup chopped almonds",
"Step 1","Mix brown sugar, butter or margarine, and water. Add flour, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt. Stir in nuts and mix well."
"Step 2","Shape in roll 2 1/2 inches in diameter, cover and chill until firm."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Cut dough into 1/8-1/4 inch slices. Bake on greased cookie sheet 8-10 minutes."
"Ginger Snap Cookies","1 .5 cups unsalted butter",
"Ginger Snap Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Ginger Snap Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Ginger Snap Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Ginger Snap Cookies","4 .5 cups unbleached all-purpose flour",
"Ginger Snap Cookies","4 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Ginger Snap Cookies","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Ginger Snap Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Ginger Snap Cookies","3 tablespoons grated fresh ginger",
"Ginger Snap Cookies","1 cup chopped crystallized ginger",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream the butter and the brown sugar until fluffy. Add molasses and eggs and mix well."
"Step 3","Combine flour, ground ginger, baking soda and salt and add to butter mixture. Blend in fresh and candied ginger. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto parchment covered baking sheet, about 2 inches apart. Bake about 10 minutes, or until lightly golden. Cool."
"Spool Sugar Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Spool Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, oil, white sugar and confectioners' sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs, one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt; stir into the sugar mixture until just blended. Cover and chill dough for at least 3 hours or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Roll the chilled dough into walnut sized balls and roll the balls in the remaining sugar. Place them 2 inches apart onto the cookie sheets. Press into each ball with the open end of a plastic thread spool. Dip the spool into the sugar between each cookie to prevent sticking problems."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Do not over bake or you will lose the delicate taste. Enjoy!"
"Triple Chocolate Cookies","1 package Duncan Hines® Moist Deluxe® Swiss Chocolate Cake Mix",
"Triple Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup butter or margarine",
"Triple Chocolate Cookies","1 large egg",
"Triple Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Triple Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Triple Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup coarsely chopped white chocolate",
"Triple Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F."
"Step 2","Combine cake mix, melted butter and egg in large bowl. Beat at low speed with electric mixer until blended. Stir in all chips and pecans. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake at 375 degrees F for 9 to 11 minutes. Cool 1 minute on baking sheet. Remove to cooling racks."
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies I","1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies I",".33 cup vegetable oil",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Toffee Cookies I",".75 cup coarsely chopped chocolate-covered toffee candy bars",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, combine the cake mix, oil, and eggs Beat with an electric beater for 3 to 4 minutes, until well blended. With a spoon, stir in the chopped candy."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on to cookie sheets that have been coated with nonstick baking spray. Bake for 9 to 11 minutes, or until the cookies are firm. Remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","1 .5 cups butter flavored shortening",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","2 cups light brown sugar",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies",".5 cup dark brown sugar",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","2 cups cinnamon chips",
"Cinnamon Spice Drop Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter flavored shortening, light brown sugar and dark brown sugar. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the milk and vanilla, blending until the mixture is light and fluffy. Combine the flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, baking soda and salt; stir into the batter until well blended. Mix in cinnamon chips and if using, pecans. Drop rounded spoonfuls of dough onto the prepared cookie sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, just until the cookies lose their gloss. Remove from the cookie sheets to wire racks to cool."
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies","1 cup butter, melted",
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies","1 cup wheat bran",
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies",".75 cup rolled oats",
"Peanut Butter and Bran Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a bowl, beat together the butter, brown sugar, white sugar, vanilla, peanut butter and eggs. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, bran, oats, and baking soda. Stir the flour mixture into the butter mixture until smooth. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 18 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove to a rack to cool."
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies","2 large eggs egg, beaten",
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies","3 tablespoons coffee-flavored liqueur",
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Chip Coffee Cookies","3 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the coffee liqueur. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon, stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Ginger and Spice Cookies","4 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cloves",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies",".5 cup unsulfured molasses",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Ginger and Spice Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream the butter with the sugar until light and fluffy. Stir in molasses and eggs. Stir in vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda, ginger, cinnamon, cloves and salt. Gradually stir into the butter mixture. Lightly cover a piece of wax paper with sugar. Drop tablespoon-sized pieces of dough onto paper and coat with sugar."
"Step 3","Bake 14 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Let cool on wire racks."
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","3 cups oats",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips, or more to taste",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies",".5 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chocolate Chips Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Beat eggs and vanilla extract into butter mixture until incorporated."
"Step 3","Whisk oats, flour, chocolate chips, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl; slowly stir into butter mixture until dough is just mixed. Scoop dough using a small scooper onto baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are lightly browned, about 15 minutes."
"Pizzelles III","3 large eggs eggs",
"Pizzelles III",".75 cup white sugar",
"Pizzelles III",".5 cup butter, melted",
"Pizzelles III","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Pizzelles III","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pizzelles III","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, beat eggs and sugar until thick. Stir in the melted butter and vanilla. Sift together the flour and baking powder, and blend into the batter until smooth."
"Step 2","Heat the pizzelle iron, and brush with oil. Drop about one tablespoon of batter onto each circle on the iron. You may need to experiment with the amount of batter and baking time depending on the iron. Bake for 20 to 45 seconds, or until steam is no longer coming out of the iron. Carefully remove cookies from the iron. Cool completely before storing in an airtight container."
"Step 3","For chocolate pizzelles, add 1/4 cup cocoa sifted together with flour and baking powder, 1/4 cup more sugar and 1/4 teaspoon more baking powder. I find that for the chocolate mixture, the iron must be well oiled to start and then brush on more as needed."
"Easy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Easy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Easy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Easy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Pour the cake mix into a large bowl. Stir in the butter, eggs and vanilla with an electric mixer until well blended. Stir in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 11 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges are golden. Cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before removing to cool on wire racks."
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies II","1 cup white corn syrup",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies II","2 cups peanut butter",
"No Bake Peanut Butter Cookies II","4 .5 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Step 1","Cook over medium heat the white sugar and the corn syrup for one minute. Remove from heat and add the vanilla, peanut butter and crispy rice cereal."
"Step 2","Drop by teaspoons onto wax paper. The cookies will be slightly soft when done."
"Grandma Tibbitts Sugar Cookies","1 cup lard",
"Grandma Tibbitts Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Grandma Tibbitts Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Grandma Tibbitts Sugar Cookies","1 cup buttermilk",
"Grandma Tibbitts Sugar Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandma Tibbitts Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Grandma Tibbitts Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Grandma Tibbitts Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the lard and sugar. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the buttermilk. The mixture will be very runny at this point. Combine the flour, baking soda, nutmeg and salt; stir into the buttermilk mixture by hand using a wooden spoon. Try not to over mix the dough or the cookies will be dense. Drop by spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. For cut out cookies, the dough should be refrigerated for a couple of hours. Roll out to 1/2 inch thickness and flour your cookie cutter between each cut."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Shortbread Cookies III","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Shortbread Cookies III","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Shortbread Cookies III","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Shortbread Cookies III","1 cup cornstarch",
"Shortbread Cookies III",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Work all the ingredients together with your hands until blended. Shape all of the dough into 1 inch balls."
"Step 2","Bake cookies on ungreased cookie sheets, 2 inches apart at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) for 20 minutes."
"Step 3","Let cool 10 minutes then carefully lift with spatula to cake racks to cool. Store in air tight container with wax paper between layers. Cookies keep well."
"Step 4","Variations: Flatten some balls with tines of fork and press 1/4 of a red or green glace cherry in center of each. Make thumbprint indentation in some balls and fill with a tiny bit of jam, jelly or marmalade. Dip some balls in slightly beaten egg white and roll in finely chopped walnuts. Bake as they are or make an indentation in top and spoon in a little jam or marmalade. Dip some balls in egg white and roll in desiccated coconut. Bake as they are or make an indentation and spoon in a little jam, jelly or marmalade."
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting","cooking spray",
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting","1 (16.5 ounce) package refrigerated sugar cookie dough",
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting","1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, or as needed",
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting",".75 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature",
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting","3 cups confectioners' sugar, sifted",
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting","3 tablespoons canned coconut milk, or more as needed",
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting","1 teaspoon coconut extract",
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting",".25 cup colored sugar",
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting",".25 cup candy sprinkles",
"Sugar Cookie Cups with Coconut Buttercream Frosting",".25 cup shredded coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a mini muffin tin with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Scoop up 2 teaspoons of cookie dough and roll into a ball. Place the ball in the prepared tin. Repeat with remaining cookie dough."
"Step 3","Dip the bottom of a shot glass in flour and use to press each ball of dough into a cup shape; the top of each cup should be about 1/4 inch below the rim of the tin."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 10 minutes. Press again with the shot glass to reinforce the cup shape. Continue baking cookie cups until very lightly browned, about 1 minute more. Cool in the tin for 5 minutes. Transfer carefully to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 5","Beat butter in a bowl with an electric mixer until fluffy. Beat in confectioners' sugar, 1 cup at a time, until well blended. Add coconut milk and coconut extract; beat at high speed until frosting is light and fluffy. Add 1 tablespoon coconut milk if frosting is too thick."
"Step 6","Spoon or pipe frosting into each cookie cup. Decorate with colored sugar, candy sprinkles, and shredded coconut."
"Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup coconut oil",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup almond milk",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup vegan chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream coconut oil and brown sugar together in a bowl with an electric mixer until thoroughly mixed, about 5 minutes. Mix in almond milk and vanilla until incorporated, 1 to 2 minutes."
"Step 3","Whisk flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl. Add the flour mixture to the almond milk mixture, stirring until combined; dough will be crumbly. Fold in chocolate chips."
"Step 4","Roll the dough into tablespoon-sized balls and place on ungreased or parchment-lined baking sheets. Flatten each ball out a bit with your palm, pressing any crumbs back together."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are golden brown and set, about 8 minutes.Busia's Cutout Cookies",".67 cup butter",
"Busia's Cutout Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Busia's Cutout Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Busia's Cutout Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Busia's Cutout Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Busia's Cutout Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Busia's Cutout Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Busia's Cutout Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Cream butter and sugar. Beat in eggs."
"Step 2","Dissolve the baking soda in the milk, then add to mixture. Add the vanilla and mix well"
"Step 3","Place salt in with flour and slowly stir into mixture. The dough should not be too sticky and should pull away from the sides of the bowl easily. If the dough is sticky, add a little more flour."
"Step 4","Form the dough into a roll about a foot long and 2-3 inches in diameter. Roll up in wax paper and put in the refrigerator for 1 hour."
"Step 5","Remove from refrigerator and let dough come to room temperature. Roll out dough a chunk at a time (one dough log makes about 4 chunks)."
"Step 6","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 7","Cut your cookies and decorate or bake plain for 8-10 minutes. Enjoy!"
"Gloreo Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix",
"Gloreo Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Gloreo Cookies","2 tablespoons water",
"Gloreo Cookies","2 tablespoons vegetable oil",
"Gloreo Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Gloreo Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Gloreo Cookies","5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Gloreo Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Gloreo Cookies","1 (.25 ounce) package unflavored gelatin",
"Gloreo Cookies",".25 cup cold water",
"Gloreo Cookies",".5 cup powdered chocolate drink mix",
"Step 1","Mix together the cake mix, eggs, water, cooking oil and cocoa until you can shape it all into a large ball. Let stand 20 minutes."
"Step 2","Shape into 1/2 inch balls, placed 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheets. Flatten each cookie with bottom of glass greased once but dipped into instant chocolate drink powder."
"Step 3","Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 8 minutes. Remove cookies at once and quickly flatten each with back of spatula. Let cool 20 minutes."
"Step 4","To make filling: Soften 1 envelope unflavored gelatin in 1/4 cup cold water; set in heatproof cup in pan, simmering until clear. Cream together shortening, confectioners' sugar and vanilla. Add cooled gelatin. Beat 10 minutes. Use 1 tablespoon to fill each cookie. Press cookies gently together to spread the filling."
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (3.4 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup chopped maraschino cherries",
"Spumoni Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup chopped pistachios",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Sift together the flour and baking soda; set aside."
"Step 2","Cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar in a large bowl until smooth. Stir in the instant pudding mix until well combined. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Blend in the flour mixture. Fold in the chocolate chips, cherries, and pistachios. Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased baking pans."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until light brown, about 10 minutes."
"Treasure Cookies","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Treasure Cookies",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Treasure Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Treasure Cookies","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Treasure Cookies",".5 cup butter, melted",
"Treasure Cookies","1 .33 cups flaked coconut",
"Treasure Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Treasure Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a small bowl mix cracker crumbs, flour and baking powder."
"Step 3","In a large mixing bowl, beat condensed milk and margarine until smooth."
"Step 4","Add cracker crumb mixture and blend well. Stir in coconut, chocolate chips, and pecans."
"Step 5","Drop by rounded teaspoon on a cookie sheet sprayed with non-stick spray. Bake 9-10 minutes or until lightly browned. Store loosely covered at room temperature."
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","15 ounces ricotta cheese",
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","2 tablespoons baking powder",
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Ricotta Cheese Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bow, with the mixer a low speed, beat the sugar and butter until combined. Increase speed to high and beat until light and fluffy (about 5 minutes). Reduce speed to medium and beat in the ricotta, vanilla and eggs."
"Step 3","Reduce speed to low. Add flour, baking powder and salt; beat until dough forms."
"Step 4","Drop dough by level tablespoons, about 2 inches apart; onto the prepared baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for about 15 minutes or until cookies are very lightly golden (cookies will be soft). With spatula, remove cookies to wire rack to cool."
"Step 5","When cookies are cool, prepare icing. In small bowl, stir confectioners' sugar and milk until smooth. With small spreader, spread icing on cookies; place a candied cherry piece on top of each cookie or sprinkle with colored sugar or candy sprinkles."
"Doubly Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Doubly Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Doubly Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"Doubly Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Doubly Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Doubly Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Doubly Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Doubly Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Doubly Delicious Peanut Butter Cookies","2 cups peanut butter chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine sugars, peanut butter and shortening in large bowl. Beat at medium speed of mixer until well blended. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well afer each addition. Combine flour, baking soda and salt. Add gradually to creamed mixture at low speed. Mix just until blended. Stir in peanut butter chips with spoon. (Dough will be stiff.)"
"Step 3","Shape into 1 1/2 inch balls. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheet. Make crisscross marks on top with floured fork tines."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are set and tops are moist. Cool about 8 minutes on baking sheet before removing to flat surface."
"Ghirardelli Double Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","1 cup cold salted butter, cubed",
"Ghirardelli Double Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","1 cup granulated sugar",
"Ghirardelli Double Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Ghirardelli Double Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ghirardelli Double Chocolate Shortbread Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Ghirardelli Double Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","2 cups Ghirardelli semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Ghirardelli Double Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag Ghirardelli semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Beat butter, sugar, and vanilla in bowl of a heavy-duty stand mixer* fitted with a paddle attachment on low speed just until blended and creamy, 3 to 5 minutes. With mixer running on low speed, gradually add flour and cocoa and beat until dough comes together, about 1 minute, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as needed. Beat in 2 cups chocolate chips on low speed until just combined."
"Step 2","Divide dough in half and roll each half into a compact 2-inch-thick log (about 8 inches long). Wrap each log in parchment paper or plastic wrap, and freeze just until firm (but not frozen solid), about 25 minutes."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line 2 large rimmed baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 4","Remove cookie dough logs from freezer and unwrap. Using a sharp serrated knife and a sawing motion, cut cookie dough into 1/2-inch-thick rounds. If rounds crumble slightly, press dough back together. Place rounds on prepared baking sheets, spacing cookies about 2 inches apart."
"Step 5","Bake, 1 sheet at a time, in preheated oven until firm, 15 to 18 minutes. Let cool completely on baking sheets, about 20 minutes."
"Step 6","To decorate, place one 12-ounce package Ghirardelli semi-sweet chocolate chips in a medium microwaveable bowl. Microwave on HIGH until chocolate is melted and smooth, about 1 minute, stirring at 30-second intervals. Dip each cookie halfway into melted chocolate and place on parchment paper-lined baking sheets."
"Step 7","Refrigerate until chocolate has set, about 15 minutes."
"Meatball Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Meatball Cookies",".67 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Meatball Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Meatball Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Meatball Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Meatball Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Meatball Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Meatball Cookies","1 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Meatball Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Meatball Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Meatball Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Meatball Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Meatball Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Meatball Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Meatball Cookies","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Meatball Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Meatball Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Cream the butter margarine or shortening, white sugar, eggs and vanilla."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, stir the flour, 2/3 cup cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, salt and spices. Add flour mixture to butter mixture. If too sticky add more flour, if too dry add a little milk. Add nuts and mix with hands. Must be of consistency to roll into little 1/2 - 1 inch balls."
"Step 4","After you have cookie dough to handling consistency by adjusting it with either the flour or milk, roll into little balls, place on the cookie sheet and bake for about 10-12 minutes, cookie should be firm. Do not overcook. Remove from oven, let rest on the sheet for a few moments and remove to wax paper. When cool, frost with confectioner's sugar and cocoa glaze."
"Step 5","To Make Glaze: Combine 4 cups confectioner's sugar, 1/4 cup cocoa, add about 1/2 cup milk. Consistency should be of a glaze. Pour small amount of glaze over each cookie (about 1 tsp.). Decorate with sprinkles while glaze is still wet."
"Zebra Cookies","4 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, melted",
"Zebra Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Zebra Cookies","3 large eggs egg, beaten",
"Zebra Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Zebra Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Zebra Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Zebra Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Zebra Cookies","48 piece (blank)s chocolate candy kisses with white stripes",
"Zebra Cookies",".25 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, combine the melted chocolate, sugar, eggs, oil, and vanilla. Mix well. Stir in the flour and baking powder. Cover and chill for at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Unwrap the candy kisses."
"Step 3","Roll cookie dough into walnut sized balls and roll each ball in the confectioners' sugar. Place cookies 2 inches apart on an unprepared cookie sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Tops should be crackled and the edges should be golden brown. While the cookies are still hot, press a candy kiss into the center of each one. Remove to cool on racks."
"Clothes Pin Cookies","1 pound butter, softened",
"Clothes Pin Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Clothes Pin Cookies","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Clothes Pin Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Clothes Pin Cookies","1 .25 cups ice water",
"Clothes Pin Cookies","1 cup milk",
"Clothes Pin Cookies",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Clothes Pin Cookies","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Clothes Pin Cookies","8 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Clothes Pin Cookies","1 (7 ounce) jar marshmallow creme",
"Clothes Pin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Mix 1/4 pound of the butter with 3 cups of flour, 2 tablespoons white sugar, egg yolks, and water. (Done like making pie dough with a pastry blender.)"
"Step 2","Chill for 1 hour then roll out like pie dough on a floured pastry sheet. Spread another 1/4 pound of the butter over dough. Fold dough together and refrigerate 1 hour. Repeat this procedure until all of the butter is used."
"Step 3","Cut dough into fourths. Wrap each quarter in plastic wrap. Chill."
"Step 4","Take out one quarter at a time and allow to stand at room temperature long enough that it softens enough that the dough can be rolled."
"Step 5","Roll dough out on floured pastry sheet/ board. Cut dough into 1/2 inch wide X 4-5 inch long strips. Wrap around clothes pins or dowel pins pinching ends."
"Step 6","Bake at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 12-15 minutes until lightly browned. Slide off sticks while still very warm and then cool completely."
"Step 7","To Make Filling: In a saucepan over medium heat, cook 1 cup milk and 1/2 cup flour until thick stirring constantly. Let cool."
"Step 8","Cream together shortening, confectioners' sugar, marshmallow cream, and vanilla. Add cooked mixture to creamed mixture and beat till fluffy. Fill cooled pastry curls with filling."
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped pitted dates",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies",".75 cup orange juice",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies",".75 cup water",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies","1 teaspoon orange zest",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies",".67 cup chopped pecans",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Orange Date Pinwheel Cookies","2 teaspoons orange zest",
"Step 1","In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, combine the dates, 1/4 cup sugar, a pinch of salt, orange juice and water. Cook, stirring frequently until the dates have softened. Remove from heat and stir in 1 teaspoon orange zest and pecans. When mixture has cooled, process in a food processor or blender until pecans are finely ground. Set aside."
"Step 2","Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and 3/4 teaspoon salt; set aside. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, 1/2 cup white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla and 2 teaspoons orange zest. Gradually mix in the dry ingredients to form a smooth dough. Divide dough into thirds, wrap in plastic, and refrigerate until firm."
"Step 3","Roll each third of the dough out into a rectangle 1/4 inch in thickness. Spread 1/3 of the filling over each rectangle leaving a 1 inch strip of dough uncovered on one of the long sides. Starting at the edge opposite of the uncovered strip, roll the dough up jellyroll style and press lightly to seal. Wrap the rolls in waxed paper and refrigerate until firm."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. slice chilled rolls of dough into coins about 1/4 inch thick. Place slices 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly golden. Allow cookies to cool for a few minutes on the cookie sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Double Chocolate Cookie Bars","24 cookies chocolate sandwich cookies",
"Double Chocolate Cookie Bars",".25 cup butter, melted",
"Double Chocolate Cookie Bars","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Double Chocolate Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Double Chocolate Cookie Bars","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Set aside 6 cookies and grind the rest in a food processor or blender. In a small bowl, stir together the cookie crumbs and butter until well blended. Press into the bottom of an 11x13 inch pan."
"Step 3","Over a double boiler or in the microwave, melt 1 cup of chocolate chips together with the condensed milk and vanilla. Stir frequently until smooth. Spread evenly over the crumb crust. Sprinkle the remaining cup of chocolate chips over the top. Break remaining cookies into pieces by hand and sprinkle over the top."
"Step 4","Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven. Chill completely before cutting into bars or it will make a big mess."
"Low-Carb Almond Cinnamon Butter Cookies","2 cups blanched almond flour",
"Low-Carb Almond Cinnamon Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Low-Carb Almond Cinnamon Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Low-Carb Almond Cinnamon Butter Cookies",".5 cup low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®)",
"Low-Carb Almond Cinnamon Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon sugar-free vanilla extract",
"Low-Carb Almond Cinnamon Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine almond flour, butter, egg, sweetener, vanilla extract, and cinnamon in a bowl; mix until well combined."
"Step 3","Roll dough into 1-inch balls. Place on the prepared baking sheet and press down with a fork twice in a criss-cross pattern."
"Step 4","Bake in the the preheated oven until edges are golden, 12 to 15 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Hello Dollies I","2 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Hello Dollies I",".25 cup white sugar",
"Hello Dollies I",".5 cup butter, melted",
"Hello Dollies I","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Hello Dollies I","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Hello Dollies I","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Hello Dollies I","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine the graham cracker crumbs, sugar and melted butter. Press into the bottom of an 9x9 inch baking pan. Layer the chocolate chips, coconut and pecans over the crumbs. Pour the sweetened condensed milk over the top."
"Step 3","Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 25 to 30 minutes. Let cool and cut into squares."
"Grad Cap Cookies","10 (4 inch) pieces pull-apart red string licorice (such as Twizzlers®)",
"Grad Cap Cookies","50 eaches miniature chocolate covered peanut butter cups, unwrapped",
"Grad Cap Cookies","1 cup prepared chocolate frosting",
"Grad Cap Cookies","50 cracker (2-1/2 square)s chocolate-covered graham cracker cookies",
"Grad Cap Cookies","50 piece (blank)s candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)",
"Step 1","Cut licorice candy whips into 2-inch pieces, and pull them apart to make small strings. Set aside."
"Step 2","Place a miniature peanut butter cup upside down on a work surface; top with a dab of frosting. Center a chocolate-covered graham cracker cookie onto the frosting to make a small cap with a mortarboard. Gently press the cookie onto the peanut butter cup."
"Step 3","Place a small dab of frosting in the center of the graham cracker cookie and attach a red licorice string as a tassel, letting the tassel drape over the edge of the cookie. Place a candy-coated milk chocolate piece onto the center of the cookie over the end of the tassel to make a button."
"Step 4","Repeat with remaining candies and cookies to make 50 graduation caps with tassels."
"Habanero Cookies","10 peppers habanero peppers, seeded and minced",
"Habanero Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Habanero Cookies","1 cup softened butter",
"Habanero Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Habanero Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Habanero Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Habanero Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Habanero Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix the peppers, sugar, butter, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until smooth. In a separate bowl, sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir into the pepper mixture just until combined. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Cool on wire racks."
"Vinegar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Vinegar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Vinegar Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Vinegar Cookies","1 teaspoon distilled white vinegar",
"Vinegar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Vinegar Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (170 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter or margarine and sugar. Add other ingredients. Drop by teaspoon on lightly greased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 18-20 minutes."
"Jan Hagel Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Jan Hagel Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Jan Hagel Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jan Hagel Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Jan Hagel Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"Jan Hagel Cookies","1 egg white",
"Jan Hagel Cookies",".5 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Cream the butter and sugar. Add the egg yolk and beat thoroughly. (This should be very creamy.) Add the flour and cinnamon and mix well."
"Step 2","Spread thinly on 1 1/2 cookie sheets. Press down mixture with fingers, then score with a fork. Brush on a film of egg white mixed with a little water. Sprinkle the nuts over the top."
"Step 3","Bake 1/2 hour at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Remove from oven and cut into squares or oblongs. When cold, remove from cookie sheet."
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","2 cups butter, softened",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","2 cups white sugar",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","4 large eggs eggs",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","5 cups rolled oats",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","4 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","8 ounces finely grated chocolate bar",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe II","3 cups chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together butter or margarine, white sugar, and brown sugar. Add eggs and vanilla."
"Step 3","Mix together in a separate bowl: salt, baking powder, baking soda, flour and oatmeal (put small amounts of oatmeal in blender until it turns to powder. Measure out 5 cups of oatmeal and only powderize that, NOT 5 cups powderized oatmeal)."
"Step 4","Mix all of the above."
"Step 5","Add: chocolate chips, grated chocolate bar, and chopped nuts (any kind)."
"Step 6","Bake on greased cookie sheet (make golf ball sized balls) and bake about two inches apart. Bake for 8 -10 minutes. Do not overbake."
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","1 .25 cups butter or margarine, softened",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","1 .25 cups brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","1 egg",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Dried Fruit Cookies","1 cup dried cranberries, or other dried fruit",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)"
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg, gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the quick oats and dried fruit. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the unprepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.German Chocolate Brownie Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".67 cup shortening",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies","1 tablespoon water",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".5 cup evaporated milk",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".25 cup shortening",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks, beaten",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"German Chocolate Brownie Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Combine brown sugar, 2/3 cup shortening, water, and 1 teaspoon vanilla in large bowl. Beat until well blended. Beat eggs into creamed mixture."
"Step 2","In another bowl, combine flour, cocoa, salt, and baking soda. Mix this mixture into creamed mixture until just blended. Stir in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheet about 2 inches apart. Place cookie sheet in the middle of the oven. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 7 to 9 minutes, or until cookies are set. Do not over bake. Cool for 2 minutes on baking sheet. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","To Make Frosting: Begin by combining evaporated milk, white sugar, 1/4 cup shortening, and egg yolks in medium saucepan. Stir over medium heat until thickened. Remove pan from heat. Stir 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, pecans, and coconut into the warm mixture. Cool completely, and frost cooled cookies."
"Viennese Crescent Holiday Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Viennese Crescent Holiday Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Viennese Crescent Holiday Cookies","1 cup hazelnuts, ground",
"Viennese Crescent Holiday Cookies",".5 cup sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Viennese Crescent Holiday Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Viennese Crescent Holiday Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Viennese Crescent Holiday Cookies","2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Viennese Crescent Holiday Cookies","1 vanilla bean",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, butter, nuts, 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar, salt, and vanilla. Hand mix until thoroughly blended. Shape dough into a ball. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour."
"Step 3","Meanwhile, place sugar in a bowl or small container. With sharp chef's knife, split vanilla bean lengthwise. Scrape out seeds, and mix them into the sugar. Cut pod into 2 inch pieces and mix into sugar."
"Step 4","Remove dough from refrigerator and form into 1 inch balls. Roll each ball into a small roll, 3 inches long. Place rolls 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet, and bend each one to make a crescent shape."
"Step 5","Bake 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until set but not brown."
"Step 6","Let stand 1 minute, then remove from cookie sheets. Place hot cookies on a large sheet of aluminum foil. Sprinkle with prepared sugar mixture. Turn gently to coat on both sides. Cool completely and store in an airtight container at room temperature. Just before serving, coat with more vanilla flavored sugar."
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies",".5 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies","1 egg",
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Oatmeal Toffee Cookies","2 cups toffee baking bits",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir in the egg and vanilla until smooth. Sift together the flour, salt and baking soda, stir into the creamed mixture. Then stir in the rolled oats. Finally, stir in the pecans chopped candy bar pieces."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto the prepared cookie sheets, and flatten slightly. Bake for 10 to 18 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies will have a dry appearance when finished baking."
"JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .25 cups firmly packed light brown sugar",
"JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 cup JIF® Peanut Butter",
"JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup Butter Flavor CRISCO® Stick",
"JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla",
"JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .75 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Place sheets of foil on countertop for cooling cookies."
"Step 2","Combine brown sugar, JIF® peanut butter, shortening, milk and vanilla in large bowl. Beat at medium speed of electric mixer until well blended. Add egg. Beat just until blended."
"Step 3","Combine flour, baking soda and salt. Add to creamed mixture at low speed. Mix just until blended."
"Step 4","Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten slightly in crisscross pattern with tines of fork."
"Step 5","Bake one baking sheet at a time for 7-8 minutes or until set and just beginning to brown. Do not over-bake. Cool 2 minutes on baking sheet. Remove cookies to foil to cool completely."
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup HERSHEY'S® Milk Chocolate Chips",
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup REESE'S® Peanut Butter Chips",
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup sugar",
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup REESE'S® Creamy Peanut Butter",
"Double Peanut Butter & Milk Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter or margarine, softened",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","Beat butter, sugar and peanut butter in medium bowl until creamy. Add egg and vanilla; beat well. Stir together flour, baking soda and salt; add to butter mixture, blending well. Stir in milk chocolate chips and peanut butter chips. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 12 to 14 minutes or until light golden brown around the edges. Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet. Remove to wire rack; cool completely."
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars",".5 cup butter",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars",".25 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars","1 egg, beaten",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars","1 .25 cups crushed chocolate cream-filled sandwich cookies (such as OREO® Cookies)",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars",".5 cup butter",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars","2 tablespoons instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars","3 tablespoons heavy cream",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Cookie Nanaimo Bars","1 tablespoon vegetable oil",
"Step 1","Line a 9x9-inch square pan with parchment paper. Place 1/2 cup of butter into the top half of a double boiler, and melt over simmering water. Stir in the sugar and cocoa powder until the mixture is smooth and the sugar has dissolved. Whisk in the beaten egg and gently cook, whisking constantly, until the mixture thickens up, about 1 minute. Remove the double boiler top from the heat, and stir in the cookie crumbs until very well mixed. Press the crust into the prepared dish, and refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes."
"Step 2","In a mixing bowl, beat together 1/2 cup of butter with the vanilla pudding powder and cream with an electric mixer until the mixture is fluffy. Slowly beat in the confectioners' sugar, and continue beating until the mixture is very creamy and pale yellow, about 2 minutes. Spread the filling over the crust, and return to the refrigerator for at least 30 more minutes."
"Step 3","Melt semisweet chocolate chips with vegetable oil in the top of a double boiler over hot water, and stir until the mixture is very smooth. Remove the chocolate mixture from the heat, allow to cool slightly, and pour over the vanilla layer. Use a spatula to spread the chocolate completely over the vanilla layer. Place the dish in the refrigerator to cool until the chocolate loses its gloss but is not completely hard, about 30 minutes."
"Step 4","With a sharp knife, cut into 5 rows by 5 rows (25 squares), return to refrigerator, and chill at least 15 minutes to overnight. Serve cold."
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Chocolate Rocky Road Cookies","48 miniature (3 dia)s miniature marshmallows",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). In a small sauce melt together the butter and 1/2 cup of the chocolate chips, stirring frequently. Remove from heat and set aside to cool."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the melted chocolate mixture with the sugar, eggs and vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt, stir into the chocolate mixture. Finally, stir in the chopped nuts and remaining chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls onto unprepared cookie sheets. Press a miniature marshmallow into the center of each cookie. Bake for 7 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets immediately to cool on wire racks."
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 egg",
