"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 teaspoon mint extract",
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Addictive Double Chocolate Mint Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar in a large bowl until fluffy. Stir egg, vanilla extract, and mint into the mixture until thoroughly combined. Mix flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt into wet ingredients to make a smooth dough. Gently fold chocolate chips into the dough. Drop by spoonfuls onto baking sheets."

"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IX",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IX","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IX",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IX","4 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies IX","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix canola oil, brown sugar, eggs and vanilla until well blended. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg; stir into the sugar mixture. Mix in the oats and raisins last. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."

"Moist and Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup reduced fat margarine",
"Moist and Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup reduced fat peanut butter",
"Moist and Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Moist and Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Moist and Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Moist and Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Moist and Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Moist and Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Moist and Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Step 1","Mix margarine, peanut butter, sugar and egg. Stir in baking powder, baking soda, salt and flour."
"Step 2","Chill dough for several hours or overnight."
"Step 3","Roll dough into 1 1/4 inch balls. Place 3 inches apart on lightly greased baking sheet. Flatten crisscross style with a fork dipped in flour or sugar."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 minutes at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Trail Mix Cookies",".5 cup applesauce",
"Trail Mix Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Trail Mix Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Trail Mix Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Trail Mix Cookies","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Trail Mix Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Trail Mix Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Trail Mix Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Trail Mix Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Trail Mix Cookies","1 .25 cups quick cooking oats",
"Trail Mix Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Trail Mix Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Trail Mix Cookies",".33 cup dried cranberries",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 baking sheets."
"Step 2","Beat applesauce, white sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla in a large bowl. In another bowl, use an electric mixer to beat egg whites until they are frothy and begin to firm up. Fold egg whites into applesauce mixture. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon. Fold into the egg mixture. Stir in the oats, chocolate chips, walnuts, and cranberries. Drop by heaping teaspoons on prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake cookies in preheated oven until set and lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Remove immediately to wire racks to cool."
"Cashew Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cashew Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Cashew Cookies","1 egg",
"Cashew Cookies",".33 cup sour cream",
"Cashew Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cashew Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cashew Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cashew Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cashew Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cashew Cookies","1 .75 cups chopped cashews",
"Cashew Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Cashew Cookies","3 tablespoons heavy whipping cream",
"Cashew Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Cashew Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the 1/2 cup butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the egg, beating well, then stir in the sour cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in cashew pieces. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","To make the frosting, melt 1/2 cup butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook until butter turns a light brown color, be careful not to burn it. Remove from heat and stir in the cream. Gradually beat in the confectioners' sugar and 1 teaspoon vanilla until smooth. Spread onto cooled cookies."
"Buttermilk Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Buttermilk Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Buttermilk Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Buttermilk Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups buttermilk baking mix",
"Buttermilk Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Buttermilk Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix butter or margarine, sugar and egg together. Stir in baking mix, nuts, and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop teaspoonfuls of dough about 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheet. Bake about 10 minutes, or until lightly browned."
"Lemon-Marmalade Cookie Sandwiches",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Lemon-Marmalade Cookie Sandwiches",".5 cup sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Lemon-Marmalade Cookie Sandwiches","2 teaspoons lemon zest",
"Lemon-Marmalade Cookie Sandwiches","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Lemon-Marmalade Cookie Sandwiches","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Lemon-Marmalade Cookie Sandwiches",".5 cup toasted hazelnuts",
"Lemon-Marmalade Cookie Sandwiches",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Lemon-Marmalade Cookie Sandwiches",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Lemon-Marmalade Cookie Sandwiches","3 tablespoons lemon marmalade",
"Step 1","In a mixing bowl beat butter and 1/2 cup sugar with an electric mixer until smooth. Beat in lemon peel and vanilla."
"Step 2","In a food processor, finely grind flour, nuts, salt and cinnamon. Add to butter mixture and mix just until dough holds together."
"Step 3","Gather dough into a ball and flatten into a disk. Wrap in plastic and chill for about 1 hour or until firm."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Butter cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Roll dough on a lightly floured surface to 1/4-inch thick. Cut out cookies with a 3-inch round cookie cutter. Gather scraps into a ball and re-roll to 1/4-inch thick. Cut out cookies, forming total of 12. Transfer cookies to the cookie sheet."
"Step 6","Using a 1-inch round cookie butter, cut out the center of 6 cookies and remove. Bake about 20 minutes or until golden. Cool on rack for 5 minutes."
"Step 7","Leaving a 1/8-inch border, spread 1 1/2 teaspoons of marmalade evenly over each cookie without a hole. Sift additional powdered sugar over cookies with holes. Place cookies with holes sugar side up atop jam-covered cookies."
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup mashed banana",
"High Altitude Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt, set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, sugar and brown sugar. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and mashed banana. Mix in the dry ingredients until just blended, then fold in chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 11 to 13 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Almond Bark Drop Cookies","2 pounds white confectioners' coating",
"Almond Bark Drop Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Almond Bark Drop Cookies","2 cups dry-roasted peanuts",
"Almond Bark Drop Cookies","3 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Almond Bark Drop Cookies","2 cups miniature marshmallows",
"Step 1","In a microwave oven or over a double boiler, melt the white confectioners' coating, stirring frequently until smooth. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter until well blended. Fold in the peanuts crisp rice cereal and marshmallows. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto waxed paper lined baking sheets."
"Step 2","Chill until set. Store in refrigerator."
"X Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"X Cookies",".67 cup sugar",
"X Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"X Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"X Cookies","1 cup butter, cubed",
"X Cookies","1 egg",
"X Cookies",".75 pound dried figs",
"X Cookies",".5 cup chopped almonds, toasted",
"X Cookies",".33 cup apricot preserves",
"X Cookies",".25 cup golden raisins",
"X Cookies",".25 cup chopped candied orange peel",
"X Cookies",".33 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"X Cookies",".25 cup dark rum",
"X Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"X Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"X Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"X Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar for dusting",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Cut in butter using a pastry blender, or pinching between your fingers. Add egg, and mix until a dough forms. It may take a couple of minutes of mixing. When the dough starts to hold together, turn it out onto a floured surface and knead briefly. Shape dough into a long roll, wrap, and set aside."
"Step 2","Place the figs, almonds, apricot preserves, raisins, orange peel, chocolate, rum, and cinnamon into a food processor or blender. Process until finely chopped. If the fruit is hard, it may be soaked in boiling water to soften for 15 minutes before processing."
"Step 3","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). In a small bowl, mix together the remaining egg and milk to make an egg wash."
"Step 4","Divide dough into 12 pieces. On a lightly floured surface, roll each piece out into a 3x12 inch rectangle. Brush the strips of dough lightly with egg wash. Place a strip of the fruit mixture lengthwise down the center of each piece of dough, and fold the edges over. Roll gently to seal. This will make the filled tube of dough a little bit longer. Cut each tube into 3 inch pieces. Make a one inch long slit with a knife down the center of each cut end. Spread the ends out to form an X shape. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto lightly greased cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are golden. Allow cookies to cool on the tray for at least 5 minutes, so they will not be too delicate, before removing to wire racks to cool completely. Dust with confectioners' sugar when cool."
"Bon Bon Christmas Cookies",".5 (8 ounce) package cream cheese",
"Bon Bon Christmas Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Bon Bon Christmas Cookies","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Bon Bon Christmas Cookies","1 .5 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Bon Bon Christmas Cookies","2 (10 ounce) jars maraschino cherries, drained",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, stir together the shortening and cream cheese until well blended. Stir in the flour, you may need to use your hands to help it form a dough. If the mixture seems too dry, add a couple of teaspoons of water. Cover and chill several hours or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Before rolling out the dough, dust the rolling surface heavily with confectioners' sugar. Roll the dough out to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut into 1x4 inch strips. Place a cherry on the end of each strip. Roll up each strip starting with the cherry. Place on prepared cookie sheets and dust with a little of the confectioners' sugar."
"Step 4","Bake for 7 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies should brown slightly. Dust again with the confectioners' sugar. Allow cookies to cool before serving, the cherries are very hot!"
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies","1 .5 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Chocolate Refrigerator Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Thoroughly cream shortening and sugar; add egg and beat well. Melt chocolate over low heat. Add chocolate and vanilla to shortening mixture. Mix well."
"Step 2","Sift dry ingredients; add to creamed mixture alternately with milk. Stir in nuts."
"Step 3","Shape into rolls. Wrap in waxed paper; chill thoroughly or overnight."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 5","Using a sharp knife, cut 1/4 inch thick slices off the rolls and place about 2 inches apart on cookie sheets. Bake 8 to 10 minutes."
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","2 cups shortening",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","2 cups brown sugar",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","6 cups rolled oats",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 cup milk",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","2 cups raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, allspice and cloves; stir into the sugar mixture until well blended. Mix in the rolled oats alternately with the milk. Finally, stir in the raisins. Drop by heaping spoonfuls 3 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 11 minutes, or until edges are golden and tops are dry. Cool on cookie sheets for 1 minute before removing to cool on wire racks.Peppermint Bark Snowflake Cookies","1 roll Pillsbury® refrigerated sugar cookie dough",
"Peppermint Bark Snowflake Cookies","3 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Peppermint Bark Snowflake Cookies","1 cup white vanilla baking chips",
"Peppermint Bark Snowflake Cookies","1 tablespoon vegetable oil",
"Peppermint Bark Snowflake Cookies",".33 cup blue candy melts",
"Peppermint Bark Snowflake Cookies",".33 cup creme de menthe baking chips",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 375 degrees F. In large bowl, break up cookie dough; thoroughly work in flour. Work with half of dough at a time, refrigerating remaining dough until needed."
"Step 2","On work surface sprinkled lightly with flour, roll dough 1/4 inch thick. Cut with floured 2 1/2- to 3-inch snowflake-shaped cookie cutters; place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Repeat with remaining dough, rerolling scraps."
"Step 3","Bake 7 to 10 minutes or until cookies are set and edges just begin to brown. Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets to cooling racks. Cool completely, about 10 minutes."
"Step 4","Meanwhile, in medium microwavable bowl, microwave white vanilla baking chips and vegetable oil uncovered on Medium (50%) 1 to 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds, until smooth. Spread mixture on cookies, and place close together on sheet of waxed paper or cooking parchment paper. Let set 5 minutes."
"Step 5","Place blue candy melts and creme de menthe chips in separate medium microwavable bowls, and microwave each uncovered on Medium (50%) 1 to 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds, until smooth. With 2 small spoons, drizzle candy melts and creme de menthe chips over white chips."
"Marie Edwards Cookies",".5 cup margarine",
"Marie Edwards Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Marie Edwards Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Marie Edwards Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"Marie Edwards Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Marie Edwards Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Marie Edwards Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Marie Edwards Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Marie Edwards Cookies","1 egg white",
"Marie Edwards Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Marie Edwards Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Marie Edwards Cookies","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 15x10 inch jellyroll pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine, butter, and sugar, until smooth. Stir in the egg yolk and vanilla. Combine the flour, salt, and 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon, stir into the creamed mixture."
"Step 3","Press the mixture evenly into the prepared jellyroll pan. Beat the egg white until frothy, and spread it over the top of the dough. Combine the remaining cinnamon and sugar, sprinkle it and the nuts over the top of the cookies."
"Step 4","Bake for 15 to 17 minutes in the preheated oven. Cut into diamonds while still warm, then cool completely before removing from the pan."
"Cowgirl Cookies","1 .5 cups margarine, softened",
"Cowgirl Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Cowgirl Cookies","2 .25 cups packed brown sugar",
"Cowgirl Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Cowgirl Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cowgirl Cookies","2 teaspoons almond extract",
"Cowgirl Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cowgirl Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Cowgirl Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Cowgirl Cookies","3 cups regular rolled oats",
"Cowgirl Cookies","1 .5 cups sweetened flaked coconut",
"Cowgirl Cookies","4 (1 ounce) squares white chocolate, chopped",
"Cowgirl Cookies","1 (3.5 ounce) jar coarsely chopped macadamia nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease two cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Cream the margarine together with the white sugar and brown sugar in a mixing bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs, one at a time until thoroughly blended. Mix in the vanilla and almond extracts."
"Step 3","Stir the flour, baking soda, salt, and rolled oats together in a mixing bowl until well blended. Stir the flour mixture into the sugar mixture. Mix in the coconut, white chocolate, and macadamia nuts until evenly blended. Drop by tablespoonfuls 1 inch apart on prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until centers are set and edges are golden brown, about 15 minutes. Cool 3 minutes on baking sheets before removing to cool on a rack."
"Mmm-Mmm Better Brownies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Mmm-Mmm Better Brownies","1 cup white sugar",
"Mmm-Mmm Better Brownies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mmm-Mmm Better Brownies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mmm-Mmm Better Brownies",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Mmm-Mmm Better Brownies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Mmm-Mmm Better Brownies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Mmm-Mmm Better Brownies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Mmm-Mmm Better Brownies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x9 inch baking pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, mix together the oil, sugar, and vanilla. Beat in eggs. Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt; gradually stir into the egg mixture until well blended. Stir in walnuts, if desired. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the brownie begins to pull away from edges of pan. Let cool on a wire rack before cutting into squares."
"Amazing Sugar Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Amazing Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Amazing Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Amazing Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Amazing Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Amazing Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Amazing Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Amazing Sugar Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, baking soda, and baking powder in a small bowl."
"Step 3","Beat butter and 1 1/2 cups sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth; stir in egg and vanilla extract. Gradually blend flour mixture into butter mixture. Roll dough into walnut-sized balls and toss in 1/4 cup sugar; place 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until golden, 8 to 9 minutes. Let stand on cookie sheet 2 minutes before removing to wire racks to cool."
"Blonde Brownies I","1 cup sifted all-purpose flour",
"Blonde Brownies I",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Blonde Brownies I","⅛ teaspoon baking soda",
"Blonde Brownies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Blonde Brownies I",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Blonde Brownies I",".33 cup butter, melted",
"Blonde Brownies I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Blonde Brownies I","1 egg, beaten",
"Blonde Brownies I","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Blonde Brownies I",".67 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Grease a 9x9-inch baking pan."
"Step 2","Measure 1 cup sifted flour. Add baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Sift again. Add 1/2 cup chopped nuts. Mix well and set aside."
"Step 3","Stir the brown sugar into the melted butter and mix well. Cool slightly."
"Step 4","Mix the beaten egg and vanilla into the brown sugar mixture. Add flour mixture, a little at a time, mixing just until combined."
"Step 5","Spread the batter into the prepared pan. Sprinkle 1/2 to 1 cup chocolate chips on top. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 20 to 25 minutes."
"Tart Lemon Triangles","⅜ cup butter",
"Tart Lemon Triangles",".25 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Tart Lemon Triangles","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Tart Lemon Triangles","3 large eggs eggs",
"Tart Lemon Triangles","1 cup white sugar",
"Tart Lemon Triangles","1 tablespoon grated lemon zest",
"Tart Lemon Triangles",".25 cup lemon juice",
"Tart Lemon Triangles","3 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Tart Lemon Triangles","2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar for dusting",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Process butter, 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar and 1 cup flour in food processor 10 seconds, or blend with pastry blender. Pat dough evenly into 9 inch round pie plate."
"Step 3","Bake 12 to 15 minutes, until golden."
"Step 4","Combine eggs, white sugar, lemon zest, lemon juice and 3 tablespoons flour and mix until smooth; pour mixture over hot crust."
"Step 5","Bake 15 to 20 minutes more, until firm. Let cool completely in baking dish. Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar and cut into 12 triangles."
"Oatie Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatie Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Oatie Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. Process the rolled oats in a blender or food processor until almost powdered, combine with the sifted ingredients."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Gradually stir in the dry ingredients until well blended. Fold in the chocolate chips and pecans. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup diced, pitted dates",
"Healthier Soft Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Add eggs, one at a time, allowing each egg to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next. Beat in vanilla extract. Combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon in a separate bowl; stir into butter mixture. Fold in oats and dates. Cover and chill dough for at least one hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease two baking sheets."
"Step 3","Roll dough into walnut-sized balls and place 2 inches apart onto baking sheets. Flatten each cookie with a large fork."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until cookies are golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies","⅛ teaspoon baking soda",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cardamom",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies",".67 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies","1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies","3 tablespoons almond paste",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies","1 egg",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Jen's Almond Cardamom Cookies",".25 teaspoon lemon zest",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and cardamom. Set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, cream cheese and almond paste until smooth. Beat in the egg, vanilla and lemon zest. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients until well mixed. Drop by spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Upside Down Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Upside Down Cookies","3 tablespoons white sugar",
"Upside Down Cookies","4 teaspoons baking powder",
"Upside Down Cookies",".5 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Upside Down Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Upside Down Cookies",".67 cup milk",
"Upside Down Cookies",".25 cup packed brown sugar",
"Upside Down Cookies",".25 cup butter, melted",
"Upside Down Cookies","3 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Upside Down Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Upside Down Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a muffin pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, and cream of tartar. Cut in shortening until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Sprinkle on the milk, and stir to mix. Place dough on a floured surface and knead for about ten strokes. Too much kneading will toughen up the dough. Divide the dough in half."
"Step 3","In a small bowl, mix together the brown sugar and cinnamon. On a floured surface, roll out 1/2 of the dough at a time to a 12x10 inch rectangle. Brush with the melted butter, and sprinkle the cinnamon mixture evenly over the dough. Cut the rectangle into 5 strips 12 x 2 inches each. Stack the strips on top of one another, and cut the stack into 2 inch squares. Place the squares, layered side down, into the muffin cups. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes."
"Step 4","In a small bowl, stir together the confectioners' sugar and milk until smooth. When cookies come out of the oven, drizzle the icing on."
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup gluten-free all purpose baking flour",
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon xanthan gum",
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter at room temperature",
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies","6 tablespoons white sugar",
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies","6 tablespoons brown sugar",
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easy Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine gluten-free flour, xanthan gum, baking soda, and salt in a bowl and set aside."
"Step 3","Cream butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a bowl. Beat in egg and vanilla extract. Gradually mix in the flour mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheet. Dip spoon in water and lightly flatten each cookie with the back of the spoon."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 9 to 11 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool on the tray for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies","1 apple - peeled, cored and shredded",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Aunt Hazel's Apple Oatmeal Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F."
"Step 2","Mix together brown sugar and butter until light and fluffy."
"Step 3","Beat in eggs and vanilla."
"Step 4","Mix in the rest of the ingredients, except for powdered sugar and milk. Stir until well blended."
"Step 5","Drop on cookie sheet and bake 9 to 12 minutes."
"Step 6","Mix powdered sugar and milk in small bowl and drizzle over cooled cookies."
"Coffee Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup finely ground almonds",
"Coffee Shortbread Cookies","1 .25 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Coffee Shortbread Cookies",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Coffee Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons instant coffee powder",
"Coffee Shortbread Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Coffee Shortbread Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In large bowl combine almonds, flour, confectioners' sugar and coffee. Cut in the butter and mix together until well blended. Shape dough into a ball, wrap in foil or plastic and refrigerate for at least half an hour."
"Step 2","On lightly floured surface roll chilled dough to about 1/4 inch thickness. Cut with 2 inch cookie cutter. Place cookies 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet and sprinkle tops with granulated sugar."
"Step 3","Bake 10-12 minutes in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven or until edges are just firm. Remove from sheet. Cool cookies on wire rack."
"Rocky Road","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Rocky Road","1 cup peanut butter",
"Rocky Road","4 cups miniature marshmallows",
"Step 1","Grease a 9 x 9 inch pan."
"Step 2","Heat chocolate chips and peanut butter over low heat in a medium saucepan until chips are completely melted. Remove from heat. Stir in marshmallows."
"Step 3","Pour into prepared pan. Cool. Can be put into refrigerator to cool. Cut and Enjoy!"
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, room temperature",
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies",".5 cup sour cream",
"Cookie Jar Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Combine the flour with the baking powder, baking soda, salt and nutmeg. In a clean 1 quart-sized glass jar with a wide mouth layer the white sugar followed by the flour mixture. Press firmly in place and seal. Attach a card with the following instructions:"
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat 1 cup room-temperature butter until light and fluffy. Mix in 1 egg until combined. Add 1/2 cup sour cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla and blend at low speed. Gradually add contents of jar and mix until fully incorporated. Wrap cookie dough in plastic or foil and refrigerate for several hours or overnight. Remove dough from the refrigerator. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Roll chilled dough out on a lightly floured surface and cut dough into desired shapes. Place on an ungreased cookie sheet and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) until edges are golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Finger Sandwich Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups butter",
"Finger Sandwich Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Finger Sandwich Butter Cookies","1 .5 large eggs eggs",
"Finger Sandwich Butter Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Finger Sandwich Butter Cookies","30 drops red food coloring",
"Finger Sandwich Butter Cookies","3 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Finger Sandwich Butter Cookies","1 .25 teaspoons baking powder",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together butter and sugar. Add eggs, vanilla and food coloring of your choice. Add dry ingredients and mix well."
"Step 3","Place dough in a pastry bag fitted with a number 4-S tip (the S means 'star'), and pipe out in 2 inch bars on greased baking pan. (Can also be piped into rosettes or other shapes)"
"Step 4","Bake for about 5 to 7 minutes. Put baked cookies together with jam, frosting or melted chocolate."
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 teaspoons baking soda",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground mace",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground cloves",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup cornflakes cereal, crumbled",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"A to Z Everything-but-the-Kitchen-Sink Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Sift together flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, mace, nutmeg, and cloves; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in milk and vanilla. Gradually mix in the sifted ingredients until well blended. Using a wooden spoon, stir in the cornflakes, oats, coconut, chocolate chips, and walnuts. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls, and place 2 inches apart on prepared cookie sheets; flatten slightly."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. I found that slightly under baking these yields wonderfully chewy cookies!"
"Amish Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Amish Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Amish Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Amish Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Amish Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Amish Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Amish Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Amish Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Amish Cookies",".75 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the butter, oil, white sugar, and confectioners' sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, and cream of tartar. Stir into the sugar mixture until just combined. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven, or until bottoms are lightly browned. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Martina Cookies","2 cups butter, softened",
"Martina Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Martina Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Martina Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter in a large bowl until creamy and fluffy. Mix flour, confectioners' sugar, and vanilla extract into the creamed butter to form a dough. Roll dough into walnut-sized balls and arrange on the prepared baking sheet. Press the dough balls with the bottom of a glass until dough is flattened to 1/2-inch thick."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are light brown, 10 to 13 minutes.Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I",".25 cup applesauce",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup brown sugar",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I",".33 cup white sugar",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I","3 cups rolled oats",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I",".5 cup raisins",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies I",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, applesauce, brown sugar, and white sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, salt, and baking soda, then gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the oats, raisins, nuts and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) box red velvet cake mix",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies","2 eaches eggs, lightly beaten",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies","1 tablespoon bourbon",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies","2 teaspoons evaporated milk",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Dawn's Easy Red Velvet Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix together cake mix, eggs, oil, and bourbon in a large bowl. Roll the dough into balls the size of walnuts. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the tops start to crack, about 8 minutes. Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Step 4","In a large bowl combine cream cheese, butter, evaporated milk, vanilla, and coconut. Add the confectioners' sugar 1 cup at a time, mixing well with each addition. If consistency is too stiff, add more milk."
"Step 5","Place the chopped pecans in a bowl. Spread a generous amount of icing on the bottom of a cookie, sandwich it with another cookie, pressing firmly so that the icing comes all the way out to the edge. Roll the edges of the sandwich cookies in the chopped pecans. Repeat with the remaining cookies."
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups butter",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups packed dark brown sugar",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","5 cups rolled oats",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","8 ounces finely grated chocolate bar",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups chopped walnuts",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup golden raisins",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Dishpan Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups flaked coconut",
"Step 1","First find a plastic dishpan (this keeps you from burning up your mixer). Blend oatmeal in blender until a fine powder."
"Step 2","Cream butter and both sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix together with flour, oatmeal, salt, baking powder and baking soda. Add chips, candy, nuts, raisins, and coconut."
"Step 3","Roll into balls and place 2 inches apart on cookie sheet. Bake for 6 minutes at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Makes 6 dozen."
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza","1 egg",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza","6 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza","2 tablespoons butter",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza","3 tablespoons milk",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza",".5 cup pecan halves",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza",".5 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza",".25 cup flaked coconut",
"Chocolate Cookie Pizza","2 ounces white chocolate, melted",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine butter, brown sugar, white sugar, vanilla, and egg until well combined. Stir in the flour and the baking soda (dough will be stiff). Pat dough onto an ungreased 12 inch pizza pan or on a cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Remove cookie from oven and let it cool."
"Step 4","In a saucepan heat the chocolate chips, remaining butter or margarine, and milk over very low heat. Stir until chocolate is melted. Remove the chocolate mixture from the heat and stir in the confectioners' sugar. Beat until smooth, glossy, and of spreading consistency. If frosting is not glossy, stir in a few drops of hot water. Spread over the top of the baked and cooled cookie."
"Step 5","Immediately sprinkle with pecan halves, M&M candies, and coconut. Press lightly into frosting. Drizzle top with the melted white chocolate. Let stand until set. Remove from pan if desired. Cut into wedges."
"Lemon Pound Cake Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Lemon Pound Cake Cookies",".67 cup salted sweet cream butter, softened",
"Lemon Pound Cake Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lemon Pound Cake Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Lemon Pound Cake Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Lemon Pound Cake Cookies","2 teaspoons lemon extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream sugar and butter together in a bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Whisk flour and baking powder together in a separate bowl; gradually beat into creamed butter mixture until just combined. Beat eggs, 1 at a time, into butter-flour mixture until dough is thoroughly mixed; stir in lemon extract. Drop small scoops of dough onto a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies spring back when touched, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Pecan Praline Cookies","35 large rectangular piece or 2 squares or 4 small rectangular pieces graham crackers",
"Pecan Praline Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Pecan Praline Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Pecan Praline Cookies",".25 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Pecan Praline Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (170 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Place crackers on 10x15-inch sheet cake pan, covering bottom."
"Step 3","Bring sugar, butter, and cream of tartar to a boil in a saucepan. Add nuts; pour mixture oven the top of the crackers."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes. Cool for a few minutes in the pan; remove from pan while still warm."
"French Butter Cakes (Madeleines)","2 large eggs eggs",
"French Butter Cakes (Madeleines)",".75 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"French Butter Cakes (Madeleines)","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"French Butter Cakes (Madeleines)",".33 cup white sugar",
"French Butter Cakes (Madeleines)",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"French Butter Cakes (Madeleines)","1 tablespoon lemon zest",
"French Butter Cakes (Madeleines)",".25 cup butter",
"French Butter Cakes (Madeleines)",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Butter and flour 12 (3 inch) madeleine molds; set aside."
"Step 2","Melt butter and let cool to room temperature."
"Step 3","In a small mixing bowl, beat eggs, vanilla and salt at high speed until light."
"Step 4","Beating constantly, gradually add sugar; and continue beating at high speed until mixture is thick and pale and ribbons form in bowl when beaters are lifted, 5 to 10 minutes."
"Step 5","Sift flour into egg mixture 1/3 at a time, gently folding after each addition."
"Step 6","Add lemon zest and pour melted butter around edge of batter. Quickly but gently fold butter into batter. Spoon batter into molds; it will mound slightly above tops."
"Step 7","Bake 14 to 17 minutes, or until cakes are golden and the tops spring back when gently pressed with your fingertip."
"Step 8","Use the tip of the knife to loosen madeleines from pan; invert onto rack. Immediately sprinkle warm cookies with granulated sugar. Madeleines are best eaten the day they're baked. Leftover madeleines are wonderful when dunked into coffee or tea."
"Step 9","Variation: Chocolate Madeleines: Omit lemon zest. Increase sugar to 1/2 cup. Substitute 1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder for 2 tablespoons of the flour; sift into batter with flour."
"Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","2 tablespoons hot water",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Step 1","Mix sugars, peanut butter, and shortening. Add baking soda to the hot water. Add to mixture. Stir well."
"Step 2","Stir in the eggs. Add the flour. Roll dough into balls."
"Step 3","Place balls on ungreased cookie sheet. Press with fork dipped in water to make criss-cross design. Bake at 350 - 375 degrees F (175 - 190 degrees C) for about 8-10 minutes."
"Ghraybeh Cookies",".5 cup cake flour",
"Ghraybeh Cookies",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Ghraybeh Cookies","1 cup semolina flour",
"Ghraybeh Cookies","1 cup clarified butter",
"Ghraybeh Cookies",".67 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Ghraybeh Cookies",".75 teaspoon orange flower water",
"Ghraybeh Cookies","30 almonds blanched almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift together the cake flour, all-purpose flour, and semolina and set aside. Beat the butter for at least 10 minutes until it is fluffy. Then beat 2 more minutes while sprinkling in the blossom water and confectioners' sugar. Fold in the flour mixture gradually. Then refrigerate the soft dough in covered bowl for about 10 minutes."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll or pat the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness, and cut into 1 inch sided diamonds and place them 1/2 inch apart on an ungreased baking sheet. Then place an almond in the center of each cookie."
"Step 4","Back 35 to 40 minutes in the preheated oven. Do not over bake. Let the cookies cool for at least an hour. The are best served after they have cooled for several hours."
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies","1 ⅛ cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies",".5 cup turbinado sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies","1 egg, lightly beaten",
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Apricot Cookies","1 cup chopped dried apricots",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a cookie sheet."
"Step 2","Mix the flour and baking soda in a bowl. In a separate bowl, beat together the butter, turbinado sugar, and brown sugar until fluffy, then beat in the egg, vanilla, and salt. Stir the flour and baking soda into the butter mixture. Fold in the chocolate chips and apricots. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto the cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Brownie-Mallow Bars","1 (19.8 ounce) package brownie mix",
"Brownie-Mallow Bars",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Brownie-Mallow Bars",".25 cup water",
"Brownie-Mallow Bars","2 medium (blank)s eggs",
"Brownie-Mallow Bars","1 (10.5 ounce) package miniature marshmallows",
"Brownie-Mallow Bars","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Brownie-Mallow Bars","1 cup peanut butter",
"Brownie-Mallow Bars","1 tablespoon butter",
"Brownie-Mallow Bars","1 .5 cups crispy rice cereal",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish."
"Step 2","Mix brownie mix, oil, water, and eggs in a large bowl until smooth; spread into prepared baking dish."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 28 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle marshmallows over brownie and continue baking until slightly melted, about 3 minutes more. Remove from oven and cool completely."
"Step 4","Heat chocolate chips, peanut butter, and butter in a saucepan over low heat; cook and stir until smooth. Remove from heat and stir in rice cereal. Spread over cooled brownies. Refrigerate until firm; slice brownies to serve."
"Bunny Cookies","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Bunny Cookies",".67 cup shortening",
"Bunny Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Bunny Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Bunny Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Bunny Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Bunny Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons orange zest",
"Bunny Cookies","1 tablespoon orange juice",
"Bunny Cookies",".25 cup cinnamon red hot candies",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the sugar and shortening. Add eggs and beat until smooth. Stir in the flour, baking powder, and salt until well blended. Mix in the orange juice and orange zest."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut out rabbit shapes with a cookie cutter. Place rabbits onto an unprepared cookie sheet and place the cinnamon candies onto them for eyes. Bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Frost if desired."
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I","3 tablespoons shortening",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I","2 tablespoons brown sugar",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I",".33 cup molasses",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I",".25 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I","1 pinch ground nutmeg",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies I","1 dash ground allspice",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening, brown sugar and molasses until smooth. Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ginger, cloves, nutmeg and allspice; blend into the creamed mixture. Work dough with hands until well blended. Cover and chill for about 4 hours. Dough must be thoroughly chilled to hold together."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Roll out dough paper thin a little at a time. Cut into desired shapes using cookie cutters. Place on greased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 5 to 6 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned."
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies I","3 cups margarine, softened",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 .5 cups white sugar",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies I","4 large eggs eggs",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies I","8 cups all-purpose flour",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies I","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon salt",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies I","4 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together margarine, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to egg mixture, and mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Instead of just dropping them onto the cookie sheet, I roll the cookies into balls - it makes them all look very uniform and nice!"
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven for 12 to15 minutes, or until light brown. Cool on a wire rack."
"Pecochoc Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pecochoc Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pecochoc Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Pecochoc Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pecochoc Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons instant coffee granules",
"Pecochoc Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Pecochoc Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Pecochoc Cookies","3 tablespoons white sugar",
"Pecochoc Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pecochoc Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Pecochoc Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Pecochoc Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Pecochoc Cookies","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine baking soda, baking powder, salt, flour and instant coffee in a mixing bowl."
"Step 3","Cream the butter with the brown and white sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs, milk and vanilla extract. Gradually add flour mixture to the butter mixture and beat well. Stir in the chopped pecans and chocolate chips; mix well to blend. Drop cookies by tablespoon onto an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake for 15 minutes or until cookies are golden in color."
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 egg",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies","10 ounces white chocolate, chopped",
"White Chocolate Chunk Cookies",".5 cup chopped and toasted macadamia nuts",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream butter and shortening; gradually add sugars, beating well at medium speed with an electric mixer. Beat in egg and vanilla. Combine flour, soda, and salt; stir into creamed mixture. Stir in white chocolate and macadamia nuts. Chill dough for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets. Drop dough by heaping tablespoonfuls 3 inches apart onto prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 14 minutes in preheated oven. Cookies will be soft. Cool slightly on cookie sheets; transfer to wire racks to cool completely."
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix",".5 cup white sugar",
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix",".75 cup light molasses",
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix","1 .25 teaspoons baking soda",
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix",".5 cup butter",
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Pfeffernuesse Cookie Mix",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Stir together flour, sugar, baking soda, spices, and dash black pepper."
"Step 2","In large saucepan, combine molasses and butter; heat and stir until butter melts. Cool to room temperature."
"Step 3","Stir in eggs. Add dry ingredients to molasses mixture; mix well. Cover. Chill several hours or overnight."
"Step 4","Shape into 1 balls. Place on greased cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 12 to 14 minutes or until cookies are done. Remove. Cool. Roll in powdered sugar."
"Norwegian Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Norwegian Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Norwegian Butter Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Norwegian Butter Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Norwegian Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Hard boil the eggs and separate the yolks. Cream the butter and hard boiled egg yolks. Beat in the sugar and add the flour vanilla extract. Mix thoroughly. Put through a cookie press or arrange by teaspoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 10 to 12 minutes, or until lightly browned."
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 egg",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Forever Fresh Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","2 cups cornflakes cereal",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 cup oatmeal",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 cup coconut flakes",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 cup walnuts",
"Forever Fresh Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat together the butter, vegetable oil, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth and creamy. Then add egg, vanilla, salt, baking soda, and cream of tartar, and mix with an electric mixer until slightly fluffy. With a spoon, gradually stir in flour until well mixed. Stir in cornflakes, oatmeal, coconut, walnuts, and chocolate chips. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets, 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake in a preheated oven for 12 minutes, or until slightly brown. Remove from oven; allow cookies to cool 5 minutes on baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Zucchini Brownies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Zucchini Brownies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Zucchini Brownies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Zucchini Brownies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Zucchini Brownies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Zucchini Brownies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Zucchini Brownies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Zucchini Brownies","2 cups shredded zucchini",
"Zucchini Brownies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Zucchini Brownies","6 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Zucchini Brownies",".25 cup margarine",
"Zucchini Brownies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Zucchini Brownies",".25 cup milk",
"Zucchini Brownies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour a 9x13 inch baking pan."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the oil, sugar and 2 teaspoons vanilla until well blended. Combine the flour, 1/2 cup cocoa, baking soda and salt; stir into the sugar mixture. Fold in the zucchini and walnuts. Spread evenly into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until brownies spring back when gently touched."
"Step 4","Make frosting while brownies cool. Melt together the 6 tablespoons of cocoa and margarine; set aside to cool."
"Step 5","Meanwhile, blend together the confectioners' sugar, milk and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. Stir in the cocoa mixture. Spread over cooled brownies before cutting into squares.Michelle's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Michelle's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Michelle's Soft Sugar Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Michelle's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Michelle's Soft Sugar Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Michelle's Soft Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Michelle's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Michelle's Soft Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream the margarine and add the sugar gradually. Beat until light and fluffy. Add eggs one at time, mixing well after each addition."
"Step 2","Stir in the vanilla. Add the flour, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt gradually to the creamed mixture, stirring in by hand. Cover and chill dough overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 4","Roll dough out on a floured surface to 1/8 to 1/4 inch thick and cut into your favorite shapes. Place cookies onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 6 to 8 minutes or until cookie has a golden appearance."
"Caramel Cream Sandwich Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Caramel Cream Sandwich Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Caramel Cream Sandwich Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"Caramel Cream Sandwich Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour, sifted",
"Caramel Cream Sandwich Cookies","2 tablespoons butter",
"Caramel Cream Sandwich Cookies","1 .25 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Caramel Cream Sandwich Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Caramel Cream Sandwich Cookies","4 tablespoons heavy cream",
"Step 1","Cream 1 cup butter or margarine. Gradually add brown sugar, creaming well. Add egg yolk and blend. Add flour, stirring until the mixture forms a dough. Chill slightly for easier handling."
"Step 2","Roll dough into small balls, about the size of a marble. Place on an ungreased baking sheet and flatten to 1/8 inch thickness with the palm of the hand. Press with fork in one direction to make a design."
"Step 3","Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 9 to 12 minutes until cookies just begin to brown very lightly. Remove from sheet while warm. Place flat sides of two cookies together with frosting, sandwich-style."
"Step 4","To Make Browned Butter Frosting: Brown 2 tablespoons butter slightly in saucepan. Remove from heat and blend in 1 1/4 cups sifted confectioners' sugar. Gradually add 1/2 teaspoon vanilla and 4 to 5 teaspoons cream until it becomes a spreading consistency."
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies","1 cup grated carrots",
"Peanut Butter Carrot Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together the margarine, brown sugar, white sugar, and peanut butter."
"Step 3","Add in the egg and the milk. Sift together the flour, salt and baking soda and stir in. Stir in oats. Add in the carrots and chocolate chips. Drop by teaspoon onto cookie sheets and bake for 15 minutes."
"Peanut Butter Shortbread Cookies","2 cups natural peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Shortbread Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Shortbread Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Shortbread Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","Mix in the order given. Spoon onto cookie sheet and gently press into cookie shape. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes until golden. NOTE: You can add choclate chips to half the recipe for an awesome taste."
"Tea Cookies II","1 (18.25 ounce) package strawberry cake mix",
"Tea Cookies II","2 cups frozen whipped topping, thawed",
"Tea Cookies II","1 egg",
"Tea Cookies II",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix well in a large bowl the cake mix with the dessert topping and the egg."
"Step 3","Drop by small teaspoon into the confectioners' sugar and roll into a ball. Coat well."
"Step 4","Place 1 1/2 inches apart on greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until golden brown. Remove and cool."
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I",".75 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I",".5 cup shortening",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I","2 tablespoons milk",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I","1 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies I","30 eaches miniature chocolate covered peanut butter cups, unwrapped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixer bowl cream peanut butter, shortening, 1/3 cup sugar and the brown sugar. Add egg, milk and vanilla; beat well."
"Step 3","Combine flour and baking soda; gradually add to creamed mixture, blending thoroughly. Shape dough into 1 1/2 inch balls; roll the balls in sugar."
"Step 4","Place on ungreased cookie sheet; bake 10-12 minutes. Remove from oven and IMMEDIATELY place unwrapped peanut butter cup on top of each cookie, pressing down so that cookie cracks around edges. Cool slightly; remove from cookie sheet."
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies",".75 cup margarine",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Grandmas Cowboy Cookies","2 cups miniature semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, margarine, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the peanut butter and vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda and cream of tartar; stir into the sugar mixture. Mix in the oats, walnuts (if desired) and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Brown Sugar Cookies","2 cups brown sugar",
"Brown Sugar Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Brown Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Brown Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Brown Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Brown Sugar Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Brown Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Brown Sugar Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat brown sugar, butter, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy."
"Step 3","Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together in a separate bowl. Stir flour mixture into butter mixture until dough is fully combined."
"Step 4","Pour confectioners' sugar onto a large plate. Spoon dough, 1 1/2 teaspoons per cookie, onto confectioners' sugar and roll to coat. Arrange coated dough on a baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are lightly browned, 12 to 14 minutes. Cool cookies on baking pan for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Italian Fig Cookies I","2 cups shortening",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","3 cups white sugar",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","6 large eggs eggs",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","8 cups all-purpose flour",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","7 teaspoons baking powder",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","1 pinch salt",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","2 cups whole milk",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","4 pounds dried figs",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","1 pound raisins",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Italian Fig Cookies I",".5 cup white sugar",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","1 whole orange, with peel",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","1 small apple",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","1 .5 cups chopped pecans",
"Italian Fig Cookies I","1 cup water",
"Step 1","To Make Dough: Cream sugar and shortening. Add eggs, vanilla, and salt. Blend in flour and baking powder by hand. Knead dough until smooth and workable. Add milk to reach workable consistency. (This takes a while and you will get a workout, but you'll know when it's right.)"
"Step 2","To Make Filling: Cut up figs, orange, and apple into small pieces. (It is easier to grind this way). Grind figs, raisins, orange, and apple. If the mixture is too dry or thick, mix in up to 1 cup of water, if desired. (I do not use the water, the juice from the apple and orange are enough). The spices and chopped nuts are added to the ground fig mixture. After the fig mixture is ground, I sprinkle them in over the mixture and mix (knead) it in by hand. STICKY! But good."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll out some dough. (should be kind of thin). Put fig mixture in a line. Wrap dough over mixture, sealing figs inside dough. Trim to desired length, using a diagonal cut. Make small diagonal slits in the sides of the cookies. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet for 10-15 minutes. (Dough makes good cookies without the filling also). Wonderful with coffee."
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 (15.25 ounce) can fruit cocktail, drained",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Fruit Cocktail Drop Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening, brown sugar and white sugar. Stir in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon and cloves, stir into the creamed mixture. Carefully fold in the raisins, fruit cocktail and nuts, try not to crush the fruit."
"Step 3","Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to12 minutes in the preheated oven."
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Ginger-Touched Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup chopped crystallized ginger",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening, butter, brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in the eggs, peanut butter and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt and ground ginger, stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the rolled oats and candied ginger. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto an unprepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Remove from the baking sheet to cool on wire racks. Store in an airtight container when cool."
"Persimmon Cookies I","2 fruit, without refuses ripe persimmons, pureed",
"Persimmon Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Persimmon Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Persimmon Cookies I",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Persimmon Cookies I",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Persimmon Cookies I",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Persimmon Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Persimmon Cookies I","1 egg",
"Persimmon Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Persimmon Cookies I",".5 cup butter",
"Persimmon Cookies I","1 cup raisins",
"Persimmon Cookies I","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Dissolve baking soda in persimmon pulp and set aside."
"Step 3","Sift flour, spices and salt together, set aside."
"Step 4","Cream together butter or margarine and sugar until fluffy, beat in egg and persimmon. Stir in dry ingredients. Stir in nuts and raisins."
"Step 5","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet. Bake for 15 minutes."
"Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup almond butter",
"Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup raw honey",
"Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup dairy-free and gluten-free chocolate chips (such as Enjoy Life®)",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk almond butter, honey, egg, baking soda, vanilla extract, and salt together in a bowl; fold in chocolate chips. Drop batter, about 2 tablespoons per cookie, onto the prepared baking sheet about 1 1/2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges start to crisp, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool cookies on baking sheet for 10 minutes before removing."
"Melt - In - Your - Mouth Shortbread","1 cup butter, softened",
"Melt - In - Your - Mouth Shortbread",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Melt - In - Your - Mouth Shortbread",".25 cup cornstarch",
"Melt - In - Your - Mouth Shortbread","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
