"Step 2","Whip butter with an electric mixer until fluffy. Stir in the confectioners' sugar, cornstarch, and flour. Beat on low for one minute, then on high for 3 to 4 minutes. Drop cookies by spoonfuls 2 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Watch that the edges don't brown too much. Cool on wire racks."
"Chef John's Russian Tea Cakes","1 cup unsalted butter, room temperature",
"Chef John's Russian Tea Cakes","1 .33 cups confectioners' sugar, divided",
"Chef John's Russian Tea Cakes","1 cup finely chopped toasted walnuts",
"Chef John's Russian Tea Cakes","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Chef John's Russian Tea Cakes","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chef John's Russian Tea Cakes","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chef John's Russian Tea Cakes","2 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Chef John's Russian Tea Cakes","1 cup confectioners' sugar for dusting, or more as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Arrange rack in center position of oven."
"Step 2","Place butter, 1/3 cup packed powdered sugar, walnuts, salt, and vanilla in a bowl. Top with the flour. Mix with your clean hands until the dough starts to clump up. Keep mixing by hand until all the flour and clumps of butter are evenly mixed into the dough and it can be easily formed into balls."
"Step 3","Scoop out dough and roll by hand into uniformly round balls, just slightly larger than 1 inch. Place on a rimmed baking sheet lined with a silicone baking mat about 2 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until lightly golden, 15 to 25 minutes depending on the size of the cookies."
"Step 5","Let cool exactly 5 minutes then roll in remaining 1 cup confectioners' sugar. Let cookies cool completely and toss them again in the confectioners' sugar."
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Cream sugar, shortening (may substitute 1/2 cup butter or margarine), eggs and vanilla thoroughly. Mix in remaining ingredients. Refrigerate 4 to 5 hours or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Shape dough by rounded teaspoonfuls into balls. Place on ungreased baking sheet. Flatten with greased bottom of glass dipped in sugar. Bake for 10 minutes."
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","1 cup butter, at room temperature",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","1 cup brown sugar, packed",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","2 tablespoons vanilla-flavored cream sherry",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","7 cups chopped mixed nuts",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","2 cups chopped raisins",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","2 cups pitted chopped dates",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","1 pound candied pineapple, coarsely chopped",
"My Grandma's Fruitcake Cookies","1 pound red and green candied cherries, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Grease several baking sheets. Sift together the flour, cinnamon, and baking soda in a bowl; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat together the butter and brown sugar in a large mixing bowl until fluffy, about 5 minutes. Beat in the eggs, one at a time. Gradually beat the flour mixture into the butter mixture, alternating each addition with about 2 tablespoons of milk until all the milk is incorporated and the dough is soft. Beat in the sherry, and mix in the nuts, raisins, dates, pineapple, and cherries until thoroughly mixed. Drop the dough by rounded teaspoons onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are set and the bottoms are very lightly browned, 20 to 30 minutes. Cool on wire racks."
"Easy Lemon Cake Cookies with Icing","1 (18.25 ounce) package lemon cake mix",
"Easy Lemon Cake Cookies with Icing","2 large eggs eggs",
"Easy Lemon Cake Cookies with Icing",".33 cup vegetable oil",
"Easy Lemon Cake Cookies with Icing","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Easy Lemon Cake Cookies with Icing",".25 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Easy Lemon Cake Cookies with Icing","1 tablespoon milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with foil."
"Step 2","Mix together cake mix, eggs, and vegetable oil. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto baking sheets and bake for no more than 8 minutes. Do not overbake! Once all the cookies are done. Remove the foil. You have a no need to clean baking sheet."
"Step 3","To Make Lemon Icing: Mix together confectioners' sugar, lemon extract, and milk. Mix ingredients together (more or less to your desired liking). When the cookies are warm or completely cooled, place as much icing on them as you like!"
"Mint Cookie Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Mint Cookie Cookies","1 egg",
"Mint Cookie Cookies",".25 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mint Cookie Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Mint Cookie Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mint Cookie Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons water",
"Mint Cookie Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mint Cookie Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mint Cookie Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mint Cookie Cookies","24 eaches thin chocolate covered mint cookies",
"Mint Cookie Cookies","24 halves pecan halves",
"Step 1","In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter, white and dark sugars. Beat in the egg, water and vanilla. In a separate bowl, sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Blend flour mixture into the butter mixture, and stir well. Wrap dough in waxed paper and chill at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Cover each thin mint with 1 tablespoon of dough. Place on cookie sheet and top with a pecan."
"Step 3","Bake at 375 for 10 to 12 minutes. Let cool slightly on cookie sheet before removing to racks."
"Mama's Chewy Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Mama's Chewy Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Mama's Chewy Oatmeal Cookies",".33 cup milk",
"Mama's Chewy Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Mama's Chewy Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mama's Chewy Oatmeal Cookies","4 cups quick cooking oats",
"Mama's Chewy Oatmeal Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour, or more if needed",
"Mama's Chewy Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mama's Chewy Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat brown sugar, shortening, milk, egg, and vanilla extract in a bowl until mixture is creamy. Stir oats, flour, baking soda, and salt into moist ingredients. Drop dough by spoonful onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes.Italian Almond Cookies II","2 pounds almond paste",
"Italian Almond Cookies II","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Italian Almond Cookies II","8 large egg whites egg whites",
"Italian Almond Cookies II","2 cups white sugar",
"Italian Almond Cookies II","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Italian Almond Cookies II","2 cups sliced almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, use your hands to mix together the almond paste, flour, egg whites, white sugar and confectioners' sugar until well blended. The mixture will be very sticky. Place the sliced almonds into a small bowl. Scoop out rounded teaspoonfuls of the dough and drop them into the almonds. Roll until completely coated. Place 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Cool on cookie sheets for a few minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Shortbread Supreme","1 cup butter",
"Shortbread Supreme",".5 cup white sugar",
"Shortbread Supreme","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, beat the butter and sugar with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Stir in flour by hand until the dough is smooth. Extra flour can be added if the dough is not stiff enough to roll out."
"Step 3","On a floured surface, roll dough to 1/4 inch thickness and cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place 1 inch apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges are lightly browned. Cool on cookie sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire cooling racks."
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II",".75 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II",".75 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II","2 tablespoons milk",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II","1 cup rolled oats",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II","1 .5 cups raisins",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II",".25 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II",".75 cup water",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II","2 tablespoons lemon juice",
"Peanut Butter Thumbprint Cookies II","2 tablespoons cornstarch",
"Step 1","For cookies, cream margarine with peanut butter. Mix in sugar, then beat in eggs and milk. Stir in baking soda, oats, and flour."
"Step 2","To Make Filling: Combine raisins, water, and lemon juice. Heat until nearly boiling. Mix sugar with cornstarch; add enough (cold) water to make a paste. Stir into raisin mixture and heat until clear."
"Step 3","Shape dough into walnut-sized balls. Place on a greased cookie sheet. Using your thumb, indent the center of each ball, making a fairly good-sized hollow spot. Fill with about a teaspoon of filling. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for about 10-12 minutes."
"Pioneer Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Pioneer Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Pioneer Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Pioneer Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pioneer Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pioneer Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pioneer Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Pioneer Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Cream together butter or margarine, brown sugar, milk and vanilla. Mix well."
"Step 2","Stir in flour and baking soda. Blend well. Mix in one cup oatmeal and stir. Add in raisins and mix well."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheets and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 - 12 minutes."
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","1 cup blanched slivered almonds, toasted",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","4 (1 ounce) squares bittersweet chocolate, chopped",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","4 (1 ounce) squares milk chocolate, chopped",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mechelle's Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease or butter cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a small bowl, toss together almonds, bittersweet, semisweet and milk chocolate pieces, and oats; set aside. Sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; set aside."
"Step 3","In a large bowl, cream together butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Stir in the flour mixture until just blended; Mix in oats, nuts, and chocolates. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire racks to cool completely."
"Honey Wheat Cookies",".5 cup butter or margarine, softened",
"Honey Wheat Cookies",".5 cup natural peanut butter",
"Honey Wheat Cookies",".5 cup honey",
"Honey Wheat Cookies","1 egg",
"Honey Wheat Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Honey Wheat Cookies","1 cup sifted whole wheat flour",
"Honey Wheat Cookies",".5 cup dry milk powder",
"Honey Wheat Cookies",".5 cup wheat bran",
"Honey Wheat Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, mix together the butter and peanut butter until smooth. Mix in the honey, egg and vanilla. Combine the whole wheat flour, dry milk powder, wheat bran and baking soda; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges begin to brown. Remove from baking sheet to cool on wire racks."
"Make Ahead Cookie Mix",
"Chocolate Chip Chunk Cookies",
"OREO Cookie Balls",
"Ambrosia Cookies",
"Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies",
"LauHilLau Cookies",
"No Bake Cereal Cookies",
"Moravian Spice Cookies",
"Chewy Gooey Cookies",
"Cookie Pralines",
"Mayonnaise Cookies",
"Almond Cookies (Dim Sum Variety)",
"Corn Flake Cookies II",
"Derby Day Chocolate Chip Cookies","Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Bobbie's Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Combine flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the oats, chocolate chips, raisins, and pecans, one ingredient at a time. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies","1 stick unsalted butter, at room temperature",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies",".33 cup unsifted powdered sugar",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies","⅛ teaspoon almond extract",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies",".25 teaspoon fine salt",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies","1 large egg yolk",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies",".33 cup white sugar, or as needed",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup fruit jam, divided",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies","1 cup powdered sugar, or as needed",
"Perfect Thumbprint Cookies","1 tablespoon milk, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix butter and powdered sugar together with a rubber spatula until creamy. Add vanilla extract, almond extract, salt, and egg yolk. Mix with the spatula. Add flour and blend until just combined."
"Step 3","Use a sorbet scoop to portion dough into 1/2-ounce (1-tablespoon) balls. Roll balls in a plate of white sugar to coat; roll again between your palms. Place several inches apart on a silicone-lined baking sheet. Flatten balls lightly with your fingers."
"Step 4","To make shortbread cookies with a little jam, poke a well into each cookie using the end of a thick wooden spoon dusted with powdered sugar or using one of your fingers. Fill cookies with fruit jam. Tap baking sheet against the counter to let jam settle."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until tops are barely blonde and bottoms are slightly golden, about 15 minutes. Let cool on a wire rack before icing."
"Step 6","Meanwhile, mix powdered sugar with a little milk until you have a consistency that will hold its shape when piped. Pipe icing on top of cookies in a zigzag pattern. Let sit for 15 minutes before serving."
"Step 7","For a more jam-forward cookie, press your thumb into the cookies to make large, shallow indentations. Spoon in jam. Tap baking sheet against the counter."
"Step 8","Bake until not quite golden brown, about 15 minutes. Let rest on pan for 5 minutes before transferring a wire rack. Dust with powdered sugar."
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup margarine",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","1 .25 cups rolled oats",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Stir together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, salt and cinnamon; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Stir in the dry ingredients using a wooden spoon. Mix in the oats and chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto cookie sheets, leaving 2 inches between cookies."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","3 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"The Best Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","In a small bowl, combine the eggs, raisins, and vanilla. Cover and chill for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, salt, cinnamon and baking soda; add to the creamed mixture and stir until all of the dry ingredients are absorbed. Next, stir in the egg and raisin mixture, then stir in the rolled oats and pecans. Dough will be stiff. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto an unprepared cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges are golden. Allow cookies to cool 5 minutes on the baking sheet before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Jam Filled Butter Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Jam Filled Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Jam Filled Butter Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Jam Filled Butter Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jam Filled Butter Cookies",".5 cup fruit preserves, any flavor",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and egg yolks. Mix in flour a little bit at a time until a soft dough forms. Roll dough into 1 inch balls. If dough is too soft, refrigerate for 15 to 20 minutes. Place balls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Use your finger or an instrument of similar size to make a well in the center of each cookie. Fill the hole with 1/2 teaspoon of preserves."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown on the bottom. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Robbi's M&Ms® Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Robbi's M&Ms® Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Robbi's M&Ms® Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Robbi's M&Ms® Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Robbi's M&Ms® Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Robbi's M&Ms® Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Robbi's M&Ms® Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Robbi's M&Ms® Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Robbi's M&Ms® Cookies","1 .5 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, mix sugar, eggs, shortening, and vanilla thoroughly. Add flour, salt, and baking soda to creamed mixture. Blend well. Add 3/4 cup candies."
"Step 2","Drop dough by teaspoonful onto baking sheet. Slightly push a few candies on top of each dough ball with remaining candies."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 9 to 11 minutes."
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","14 tablespoons butter, softened",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".75 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 cup granulated sugar",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","3 cups Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)",
"Vanishing Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","In large bowl, beat butter and sugars on medium speed of electric mixer until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla; beat well."
"Step 3","Add combined flour, baking soda, cinnamon and salt; mix well."
"Step 4","Add oats and raisins; mix well."
"Step 5","Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 6","Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown."
"Step 7","Cool 1 minute on cookie sheets; remove to wire rack. Cool completely. Store tightly covered."
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I",".75 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I",".75 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I","2 .75 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies I","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl, cream together butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs and vanilla until fluffy. Stir together flour, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt. Gradually beat into butter mixture. Stir in oats and raisins. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Cool slightly, remove from sheet to wire rack. Cool completely."
"Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies","1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"Cream Cheese Sugar Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, combine the sugar, butter, cream cheese, salt, almond and vanilla extracts, and egg yolk. Beat until smooth. Stir in flour until well blended. Chill the dough for 8 hours, or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough 1/3 at a time to 1/8 inch thickness, refrigerating remaining dough until ready to use. Cut into desired shapes with lightly floured cookie cutters. Place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Leave cookies plain for frosting, or brush with slightly beaten egg white and sprinkle with candy sprinkles or colored sugar."
"Step 4","Bake for 7 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until light and golden brown. Cool cookies completely before frosting."
"Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Mexican Wedding Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Mexican Wedding Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mexican Wedding Cookies","2 teaspoons water",
"Mexican Wedding Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mexican Wedding Cookies","1 cup chopped almonds",
"Mexican Wedding Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Stir in vanilla and water. Add the flour and almonds, mix until blended. Cover and chill for 3 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 325 degrees."
"Step 3","Shape dough into balls or crescents. Place on an unprepared cookie sheet and bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from pan to cool on wire racks. When cookies are cool, roll in confectioners' sugar. Store at room temperature in an airtight container."
"Marshmallow Treats",".25 cup butter",
"Marshmallow Treats","4 cups miniature marshmallows",
"Marshmallow Treats","5 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Step 1","Melt butter in large sauce pan over low heat. Add marshmallows and stir until melted and well-blended. Cook 2 minutes longer, stirring constantly. Remove from heat."
"Step 2","Add cereal. Stir until well coated."
"Step 3","Using buttered spatula or waxed paper, press mixture evenly and firmly in buttered 13 x 9 inch pan. Cut into 2 x 2 inch squares when cool."
"Triple the Ginger Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Triple the Ginger Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Triple the Ginger Cookies","1 egg",
"Triple the Ginger Cookies",".25 cup molasses",
"Triple the Ginger Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Triple the Ginger Cookies","2 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Triple the Ginger Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Triple the Ginger Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Triple the Ginger Cookies","1 .5 tablespoons minced fresh ginger root",
"Triple the Ginger Cookies",".5 cup chopped crystallized ginger",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and molasses. Combine the flour, ground ginger, baking soda, and salt; stir into the molasses mixture using a wooden spoon. Mix in the fresh and crystallized gingers. Cover, and refrigerate dough for at least 2 hours, or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Shape dough into 1 inch balls, and place about 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned. Cool on wire racks."
"White Chip Chocolate Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"White Chip Chocolate Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"White Chip Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"White Chip Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"White Chip Chocolate Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chip Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"White Chip Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chip Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"White Chip Chocolate Cookies","1 .67 cups white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in the white chocolate chips. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are set. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Citrus Shortbread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Citrus Shortbread Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Citrus Shortbread Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Citrus Shortbread Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Citrus Shortbread Cookies",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Citrus Shortbread Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Citrus Shortbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Citrus Shortbread Cookies","1 tablespoon grated orange zest, or more to taste",
"Citrus Shortbread Cookies","2 cups sweetened dried cranberries, chopped",
"Step 1","Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl; set aside. Beat the butter and confectioners' sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Stir in the vanilla and almond extracts and orange zest. Mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Fold in the cranberries; mixing just enough to evenly combine."
"Step 2","Divide the dough into 2 equal portions, then roll into logs about 7 inches long. Wrap each log in wax paper or plastic wrap, and chill in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Remove wax paper, and cut the cookie dough into 1/2-inch slices. Arrange the slices on a baking sheet about 1 inch apart."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until firm but not browned, about 10 minutes."
"Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine ingredients and drop by teaspoonfuls on cookie sheet. Bake for 8 minutes. Let cool. Recipe doesn't make very many, so you could double recipe as you desire."
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX",".75 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX",".75 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX",".25 cup whole wheat flour",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX","1 cup rolled oats",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IX","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, white sugar and peanut butter until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, wheat flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Finally, mix in the oats and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are golden. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups white chocolate chips",
"White Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Stir in the eggs, one at a time, and then the vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt, stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the rolled oats, white chocolate chips and pecans. Drop by tablespoons onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti",".25 cup light olive oil",
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti",".75 cup white sugar",
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti",".5 cup dried cranberries",
"Cranberry Pistachio Biscotti","1 .5 cups pistachio nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together oil and sugar until well blended. Mix in the vanilla and almond extracts, then beat in the eggs. Combine flour, salt, and baking powder; gradually stir into egg mixture. Mix in cranberries and nuts by hand."
"Step 3","Divide dough in half. Form two logs (12x2 inches) on a cookie sheet that has been lined with parchment paper. Dough may be sticky; wet hands with cool water to handle dough more easily."
"Step 4","Bake for 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until logs are light brown. Remove from oven, and set aside to cool for 10 minutes. Reduce oven heat to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C)."
"Step 5","Cut logs on diagonal into 3/4 inch thick slices. Lay on sides on parchment covered cookie sheet. Bake approximately 8 to 10 minutes, or until dry; cool."
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup margarine",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Cowboy Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream margarine, oil, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time. Gradually stir in the sifted ingredients until well blended. Mix in oats and butterscotch chips. Drop from a teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven, or until edges are golden. Let set up on the cookie sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Grandmother's Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Beat eggs, and stir in raisins and vanilla. Refrigerate for at least an hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Cream together shortening, brown sugar, and white sugar until light and fluffy. Combine flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon; stir into the sugar mixture. Mix in raisins and eggs, then stir in oats and walnuts. Roll dough into walnut sized balls, and place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven, or until edges are golden. Cool on wire racks.Double Peanut Butter Cookies I","1 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Double Peanut Butter Cookies I","1 tablespoon milk",
"Double Peanut Butter Cookies I",".5 cup white sugar",
"Double Peanut Butter Cookies I",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Double Peanut Butter Cookies I",".25 cup light corn syrup",
"Double Peanut Butter Cookies I",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Double Peanut Butter Cookies I",".5 cup shortening",
"Double Peanut Butter Cookies I","1 cup peanut butter",
"Double Peanut Butter Cookies I","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Combine flour, sugar, soda and salt. Cut in shortening and peanut butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Blend in syrup and milk."
"Step 2","Shape in roll 2 inches in diameter; chill. Slice 1/8 to 1/4 inches thick."
"Step 3","Place 1/2 the slices on ungreased cookie sheet; spread each with 1/2 teaspoon peanut butter. Sprinkle chocolate chips on top of the peanut butter. Cover with remaining cookie slices; seal edges with a fork."
"Step 4","Cover with remaining cookie slices; seal edges with a fork. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 minutes, or until browned."
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies","1 cup Becel® Buttery Taste or Original Margarine*",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies","1 cup firmly packed light brown sugar",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies",".25 cup granulated sugar",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies","2 large eggs large Naturegg™ Omega 3 eggs",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies",".25 cup instant coffee granules or instant espresso",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies","2 tablespoons skim milk or water",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies",".5 cup HERSHEY'S® Cocoa",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Mocha Crinkle Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Combine flour, baking soda and salt in medium bowl; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat Becel Buttery Taste margarine with sugars in large bowl. Beat in eggs and vanilla until blended. Gradually add in flour mixture; beat just until blended. Stir coffee granules into milk. Stir milk mixture and cocoa powder into dough. Drop by tablespoonfuls into confectioners sugar; roll to generously coat. Arrange on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 8 minutes or until edges are firm. Cool 2 minutes on wire rack; remove cookies from sheets, cool completely."
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II","6 tablespoons brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II","6 tablespoons white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 cup natural peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".5 teaspoon kosher salt",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".75 cup mini semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter or margarine with brown sugar and white sugar. Add egg and vanilla. Mix well. Stir in peanut butter, baking soda, and salt. Make sure it is well blended. Add flour and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop teaspoons of cookie dough then flatten with fork slightly on greased cookie sheet. Bake for 5-6 minutes or until just showing a hint of brown on edges. Don't overcook. Let cool on cookie sheet for 5 -10 minutes. Then transfer to cooling rack."
"Swedish Jam Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Swedish Jam Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Swedish Jam Cookies",".33 cup dark corn syrup",
"Swedish Jam Cookies","1 egg, separated",
"Swedish Jam Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Swedish Jam Cookies","1 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Swedish Jam Cookies","1 cup any flavor fruit jam",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Stir in the corn syrup and egg yolk. Gradually stir in the flour until fully incorporated. Cover and chill for at least 1/2 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 3","Roll dough into 1 inch balls, dip them in the egg white, then roll them in the nuts. Place cookies on the prepared cookie sheet 2 inches apart. Using your finger, make an indention in the center of each cookie."
"Step 4","Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden. Fill each indention with a small amount of jam while cookies are still warm. Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheets."
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup vegetable shortening",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","1 egg",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies",".33 cup seedless raspberry jam",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"White Chocolate Raspberry Thumbprint Cookies","2 tablespoons red sugar sprinkles, or as desired",
"Step 1","Beat butter and shortening together in a bowl with an electric mixer until smooth; add white sugar, confectioners' sugar, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt. Beat until just combined. Stir in egg and vanilla extract. Gradually mix in flour until just combined. Cover and refrigerate dough for 3 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll the dough into 3/4-inch balls and arrange on an ungreased baking sheet. Press your thumb or end of wooden spoon into the center of each dough ball making an indentation. Spoon 1/4 teaspoon jam into each thumbprint."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies become lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool on a wire rack for 5 minutes."
"Step 5","Place white chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl; cook in microwave in 10-second intervals, stirring after each interval, until chips are melted. Spoon melted white chocolate into a disposable decorating or plastic bag. Snip off one small corner of bag; drizzle white chocolate over cookies. Sprinkle with red sugar."
"Million Monster Cookies","2 cups shortening",
"Million Monster Cookies","2 cups butter, softened",
"Million Monster Cookies","4 cups white sugar",
"Million Monster Cookies","4 cups packed light brown sugar",
"Million Monster Cookies","9 large eggs eggs",
"Million Monster Cookies","4 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Million Monster Cookies","8 cups all-purpose flour",
"Million Monster Cookies","4 teaspoons baking powder",
"Million Monster Cookies","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Million Monster Cookies","8 cups rolled oats",
"Million Monster Cookies","2 cups chopped pecans",
"Million Monster Cookies","2 cups shredded coconut",
"Million Monster Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Million Monster Cookies","2 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Step 1","In a very large mixing bowl, cream together the shortening, the butter or margarine, the sugars, the eggs, and the vanilla."
"Step 2","Add to the mixing bowl the flour, the leavenings, the oats, the nuts, the coconut, the chocolate chips, and the M & M candies."
"Step 3","Drop dough by spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. To make extra large cookies, drop by ice cream scoopfuls."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes, longer for large cookies. Remove, and cool on wire racks."
"Nutmeg Refrigerator Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Nutmeg Refrigerator Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Nutmeg Refrigerator Cookies",".67 cup packed brown sugar",
"Nutmeg Refrigerator Cookies","1 egg",
"Nutmeg Refrigerator Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Nutmeg Refrigerator Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Nutmeg Refrigerator Cookies",".25 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Nutmeg Refrigerator Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Nutmeg Refrigerator Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, cream of tartar, salt and nutmeg; stir into the creamed mixture until well blended. Divide dough and shape into rolls 2 inches in diameter. Wrap in aluminum foil and store in refrigerator for at least 2 hours and up to one week."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Slice the logs into rounds about 1/4-inch thick. Arrange the slices on a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake the cookies until the edges are light brown, about 8 minutes."
"Thumbprint Cookies III","2 cups unsalted butter",
"Thumbprint Cookies III","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Thumbprint Cookies III","4 large eggs eggs",
"Thumbprint Cookies III","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Thumbprint Cookies III",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Thumbprint Cookies III","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Thumbprint Cookies III",".5 cup seedless raspberry jam",
"Thumbprint Cookies III","2 cups finely chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter and sugar in large bowl at low speed until mixture becomes fluffy. Separate the eggs and beat in egg yolks, vanilla and salt until blended. Add flour all at once. Beat at low speed, scraping side of bowl often, 2 minutes or until well mixed."
"Step 3","Beat egg whites, slightly."
"Step 4","Roll dough into 1 inch balls and dip each ball into egg whites. Roll in nuts. Place about 1 inch apart on greased sheets. Make a depression in center of each cookie with thumb."
"Step 5","Bake for about 10 minutes or until light brown. Cool on wire rack. Fill with jam. To Make Ahead: Cookies can be frozen after baking if you do not put jam in them. The cookies can also be dusted with confectioners' sugar."
"Butterfinger® Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Butterfinger® Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Butterfinger® Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Butterfinger® Cookies",".75 cup granulated sugar",
"Butterfinger® Cookies",".5 cup butter or margarine, softened",
"Butterfinger® Cookies","1 large egg",
"Butterfinger® Cookies","36 pieces NESTLE® BUTTERFINGER® Bites Candy, coarsely chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda and salt in small bowl. Beat sugar and butter in large mixer bowl until creamy. Beat in egg; gradually beat in flour mixture. Stir in Butterfinger pieces. Drop by slightly rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely."
"One Oh One Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 cup butter",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 egg",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"One Oh One Cookies","3 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 cup crisp rice cereal",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"One Oh One Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"One Oh One Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl, mix all ingredients until well blended."
"Step 2","Drop on greased cookie sheets and bake for 12 to 15 minutes."
"Almond Cookies I",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Almond Cookies I",".5 cup white sugar",
"Almond Cookies I","1 egg",
"Almond Cookies I","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Almond Cookies I",".5 cup ground almonds",
"Almond Cookies I","2 teaspoons amaretto liqueur",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg, amaretto, and almonds. Gradually mix in the flour until well blended. Drop by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 5 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven, or until cookies are lightly colored."
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Easy Refrigerator Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream the butter with the white sugar and brown sugar. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, cinnamon and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, mix in the nuts. Divide dough into 3 equal parts, shape each piece into a log about 1 1/2 inches in diameter. Wrap logs in wax paper and chill for 3 hours or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Cut dough logs into 1/4 inch slices and place them on an unprepared cookie sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, until light brown."
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies",".33 cup butter, softened",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies",".5 cup buttermilk",
"Mini Chip Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups mini semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a medium cookie sheet."
"Step 2","Cream butter or margarine, brown sugar and sugar in a large mixer bowl until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla; beat well. In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt; add alternately with buttermilk to creamed mixture. Beat well. Stir in chips. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 10-12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet and cool."
"Dishpan Cookies III",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Dishpan Cookies III",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Dishpan Cookies III",".5 cup white sugar",
"Dishpan Cookies III","1 egg",
"Dishpan Cookies III",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Dishpan Cookies III","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Dishpan Cookies III",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Dishpan Cookies III",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Dishpan Cookies III",".33 cup rolled oats",
"Dishpan Cookies III","1 cup cornflakes cereal",
"Dishpan Cookies III",".33 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the oil, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Mix in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt, stir into the sugar mixture. Fold in the oats, cornflakes and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto a cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Taralles Cookies","6 large eggs eggs",
"Taralles Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Taralles Cookies","1 orange, zested and juiced",
"Taralles Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Taralles Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed",
"Taralles Cookies","4 tablespoons baking powder",
"Taralles Cookies","1 envelope vanilla powder",
"Taralles Cookies",".5 cup lemon juice",
"Taralles Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat eggs in a large bowl using an electric mixer until fluffy. Add oil, orange zest, and juice; mix well. Beat in sugar slowly."
"Step 3","Combine flour, baking powder, and vanilla powder in a separate bowl. Slowly add to the egg mixture, 1 cup at a time, mixing well after each addition. Beat until almost blended; mix the rest by hand."
"Step 4","Roll dough into 2 ropes; cut into 3- to 4-inch pieces. Twist 2 pieces together or roll individual ropes into circles to make round cookies."
"Step 5","Place cookies 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden but cookies are not yet brown, about 10 minutes. Let cookies cool completely, at least 30 minutes."
"Step 7","Meanwhile, slowly mix lemon juice into a bowl of confectioners' sugar to make a runny icing. Line a few trays with waxed paper. Dip cooled cookies into the icing and transfer them onto the trays to harden."
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies",".33 cup applesauce",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","2 tablespoons orange juice",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","1 teaspoon grated orange zest",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","1 dash ground nutmeg",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Cranberry Orange Oat Cookies","1 cup fresh cranberries, roughly chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Mix in the applesauce, eggs, orange juice and orange zest one at a time, mixing well after each. Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; gradually stir into the orange mixture. Fold in oats and cranberries. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Coconut Oil Sugar Cookies","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Coconut Oil Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Coconut Oil Sugar Cookies",".5 cup coconut oil",
"Coconut Oil Sugar Cookies","3 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Coconut Oil Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Coconut Oil Sugar Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Coconut Oil Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Coconut Oil Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet lightly."
"Step 2","Beat sugar, butter, and coconut oil together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Beat in egg yolks and vanilla extract. Add flour, baking powder, and baking soda gradually; mix until dough just comes together. Mix dough with hands to fully incorporate ingredients. Roll dough into walnut-size balls and place 2 inches apart onto baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cookie tops are cracked, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup peanut butter",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter and Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the peanut butter, water and vanilla. Combine the flour and baking soda, stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the rolled oats and chocolate chips. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto an unprepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until the cookies are lightly toasted on the edges. Remove from the baking sheet to cool on wire racks."
"Butterscotch Pecan Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package butter cake mix",
"Butterscotch Pecan Cookies","1 (3.4 ounce) package instant butterscotch pudding mix",
"Butterscotch Pecan Cookies",".25 cup all-purpose flour",
"Butterscotch Pecan Cookies",".75 cup vegetable oil",
"Butterscotch Pecan Cookies","1 egg",
"Butterscotch Pecan Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Butterscotch Pecan Cookies","1 cup butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the cake mix, instant pudding and flour. Add oil and egg, mix until well blended. Stir in the pecans and butterscotch chips. Batter will be somewhat crumbly."
"Step 3","Scoop cookies with a small ice cream scoop or compress 1 tablespoon of dough into a ball. Place 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges are just starting to brown. Allow cookies to cool for 2 minutes before removing from baking sheet to cool on wire racks."
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II",".5 cup shortening",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II","1 egg",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II",".25 teaspoon almond extract",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II","2 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies II","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Cream shortening and butter. Gradually add confectioners' sugar (powdered sugar), creaming well. Add egg and flavorings. Beat until fluffy."
"Step 2","Sift flour with baking soda and cream of tartar; add and mix well. Stir in pecans."
"Step 3","Drop small teaspoonfuls (or shape into small balls) on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes or until creamy tan in color. While hot, roll in confectioners' (powdered) sugar.Lunchbox Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Lunchbox Cookies","1 cup whole wheat pastry flour",
"Lunchbox Cookies","1 cup quick-cooking oats",
"Lunchbox Cookies",".5 cup 5-grain hot cereal mix",
"Lunchbox Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Lunchbox Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Lunchbox Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Lunchbox Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Lunchbox Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Lunchbox Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Lunchbox Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Lunchbox Cookies",".5 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk all-purpose flour, whole wheat pastry flour, oats, 5-grain cereal, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl. Mix butter with white and brown sugar in a separate large bowl until mixture is smooth and creamy. Beat eggs into creamed mixture with an electric mixer until thoroughly combined. Gradually beat dry ingredients into moist ingredients to make a dough. Stir chocolate chips into dough. Drop batter by heaping teaspoonfuls onto prepared baking sheets, keeping cookies about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned, about 10 minutes."
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups butter flavored shortening",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped macadamia nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter flavored shortening, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the chocolate chips, coconut and macadamia nuts. Roll dough into 1 inch balls and place them 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. Enjoy! - they will be chewy. If you like them crispy, increase the cooking time to about 12 minutes. (My mom loves them burnt!)"
"Italian Anisette Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Italian Anisette Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Italian Anisette Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Italian Anisette Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Italian Anisette Cookies","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Italian Anisette Cookies",".75 cup vegetable oil",
"Italian Anisette Cookies","1 tablespoon anise extract",
"Italian Anisette Cookies","1 teaspoon anise extract",
"Italian Anisette Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Italian Anisette Cookies","2 tablespoons hot water",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl, mix flour, baking powder and white sugar. Make a well in the center and add oil, milk, 1 tablespoon anise extract, and eggs. Mix together until dough is sticky."
"Step 3","Oil fingers and pinch off dough in 1 inch pieces. Roll into a ball and place on a lightly greased cookie sheet, 1 inch apart, flatten top slightly. Bake for 8 minutes. Dip cookies in Icing while warm."
"Step 4","To Make Icing: Blend in 1 teaspoon anise extract and enough hot water to 1 cup confectioner's sugar to form a smooth icing."
"Welsh Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Welsh Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Welsh Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Welsh Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Welsh Cookies",".25 cup butter",
"Welsh Cookies",".25 cup shortening",
"Welsh Cookies",".5 cup dried currants",
"Welsh Cookies","1 egg",
"Welsh Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Welsh Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Mix flour, baking powder, salt and the 1/2 cup sugar in medium bowl until well blended Cut in butter or margarine and shortening with a pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Toss in currants."
"Step 2","Beat egg and milk with a fork in a 1-cup measure; add to flour mixture; mix gently with fork, just until blended. Dough should be consistency of pastry dough."
"Step 3","Roll out dough to 1/4 inch thickness with floured rolling pin on lightly floured pastry cloth or board. Cut with 3 inch floured cookie cutter"
"Step 4","Heat greased griddle or large heavy skillet over moderate heat until few drops of water jump when dropped on surface. Cook cakes, a few at a time, 3 minutes, or until golden brown. Turn with pancake turner and cook another 3 minutes, or until golden brown on second side. Remove to wire rack. Sprinkle with sugar. Let cool completely, then wrap in plastic bags to store. Can also be frozen."
"Sugar Cookies VIII","1 cup butter",
"Sugar Cookies VIII","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Sugar Cookies VIII","1 egg",
"Sugar Cookies VIII","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookies VIII","1 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Sugar Cookies VIII","1 teaspoon orange extract",
"Sugar Cookies VIII","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookies VIII","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix the butter, sugar and egg until light and fluffy. Stir in the vanilla, lemon and orange extracts."
"Step 3","Mix the flour and baking soda together and add it to the butter mixture. Mix until combined."
"Step 4","Bake spoon-sized drop cookies on an ungreased cookie sheet for 10 to 12 minutes or until the edges are golden brown. Remove and place cookies on a cooling rack."
"Peppermint Bark Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies",".5 cup vegetable shortening",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies",".75 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies",".75 teaspoon peppermint extract",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies",".5 teaspoon red food coloring",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies","2 cups white chocolate chips",
"Peppermint Bark Cookies","6 eaches peppermint candy canes, crushed - or more to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. Beat butter, vegetable shortening, light brown sugar, and white sugar in a separate large bowl until creamy. Beat eggs, vanilla and peppermint extracts, and red food coloring into butter mixture until smooth. Gradually beat dry ingredients into wet ingredients until dough is smooth. Fold white chocolate chips and crushed candy canes into dough."
"Step 3","Pinch off 1-tablespoon-sized pieces of dough, roll into balls, and place on ungreased baking sheets. Lightly flatten cookies with the bottom of a drinking glass."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are set but not browned, 9 to 10 minutes. Let cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing to finish cooling on wire racks."
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","1 cup granulated sugar",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","1 egg",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","1 cup canned pumpkin",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","6 ounces softened cream cheese",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies",".33 cup softened butter",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies",".5 (7 ounce) jar marshmallow creme",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice",
"Fall Pumpkin Sandwich Cookies","1 .75 cups powdered sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Line two cookie sheets with Reynolds® Parchment Paper."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice, baking soda, and salt in a medium bowl. In a large bowl, beat butter and sugar with an electric mixer on medium to high speed for 30 seconds. Beat in egg and pumpkin until combined. Beat in as much of the flour mixture as you can with the mixer. Using a wooden spoon, stir in any remaining flour."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded teaspoons 2 inches apart on prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 12-15 minutes or until bottoms are light brown. Transfer the cookies on the parchment paper to a wire rack; cool completely."
"Step 5","Spread the bottoms of half of the cookies with the Marshmallow-Spice Filling, using about 1 tablespoon filling on each. Top each with one of the remaining cookies, bottom side down, to make sandwich cookies."
"Step 6","Spice Filling: Beat 6 ounces softened cream cheese and 1/3 cup softened butter in a large mixing bowl until smooth. Add one-half of a 7-ounce jar marshmallow cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice. Beat until well combined. Gradually add 1 3/4 cups powdered sugar, beating until smooth."
"Booger Cookies","1 cup margarine, softened",
"Booger Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Booger Cookies","1 egg",
"Booger Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Booger Cookies",".75 teaspoon almond extract",
"Booger Cookies","1 (3 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix",
"Booger Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Booger Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Booger Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Booger Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Booger Cookies","1 tablespoon milk, or as needed",
"Booger Cookies","3 drops green food coloring, or as needed",
"Booger Cookies","24 piece (blank)s milk chocolate candy kisses (such as Hershey's Kisses®), unwrapped",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking sheet."
"Step 2","Beat the margarine and 1/3 cup confectioners' sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in the egg, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, and the almond extract until completely incorporated. Mix in the pudding mix until smooth. Stir in the flour until just incorporated, then fold in the chocolate chips, mixing just enough to evenly combine."
"Step 3","Form the cookie dough into 1-inch balls, and place onto the prepared baking sheet. Use your thumb to make an indent into each cookie."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are golden, 10 to 14 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 5","While the cookies are cooling, prepare the filling by stirring 1 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar in a bowl with 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, milk, and food coloring. Add additional milk as needed to make the mixture smooth. Spoon a little of the green filling into each cooled cookie, and top with a candy kiss."
"Peanut Clusters Chocolate Cookie","1 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Clusters Chocolate Cookie",".33 cup evaporated milk",
"Peanut Clusters Chocolate Cookie",".25 cup butter",
"Peanut Clusters Chocolate Cookie",".25 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"Peanut Clusters Chocolate Cookie",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Clusters Chocolate Cookie","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Peanut Clusters Chocolate Cookie",".5 cup peanuts",
"Peanut Clusters Chocolate Cookie","3 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate",
"Step 1","Line cookie sheet with waxed paper."
"Step 2","Mix sugar, milk and butter or margarine over low heat and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and add peanut butter and vanilla until blended. Stir in remaining ingredients."
"Step 3","Drop by tablespoons onto cookie sheet. If mixture becomes too stiff, stir in 1 to 2 drops milk. Refrigerate about 30 minutes or until firm."
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","1 cup butter, softened",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting",".75 cup white sugar",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","1 egg",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","2 tablespoons whole milk",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","1 cup butter, softened",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","3 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","1 .5 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","9 tablespoons evaporated milk, or more as needed",
"Old Fashioned Butter Cookies with Butter Frosting","6 cups confectioners' sugar, or more as needed",
"Step 1","Beat 1 cup softened butter with white sugar in a large bowl until creamy. Beat egg, whole milk, and 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract into butter mixture until smooth. Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt in a separate bowl and gradually stir dry ingredients into moist ingredients to make a smooth dough. Chill dough in refrigerator for 2 to 3 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Dust a pastry cloth or kitchen towel generously with flour."
"Step 3","Divide dough into thirds and roll each third out 1/8-inch thick on the prepared pastry cloth. Cut shapes out of the rolled dough with cookie cutters. Place cookies onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are barely browned, 5 to 8 minutes. Let cookies cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before removing to finish cooling on a wire rack."
"Step 5","Beat 1 cup softened butter, 3 cups confectioners' sugar, 1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract, and evaporated milk in a bowl until smooth. Gradually stir 6 cups confectioners' sugar into mixture until combined. Beat frosting hard until fluffy; stir in additional evaporated milk or confectioners' sugar if needed to reach desired consistency. Frost cooled cookies."
"Candy Cane Snowball Cookies","2 cups butter",
"Candy Cane Snowball Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Candy Cane Snowball Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Candy Cane Snowball Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Candy Cane Snowball Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Candy Cane Snowball Cookies",".33 cup crushed hard peppermint candies, or more as needed",
"Candy Cane Snowball Cookies","8 ounces white confectioners' coating, chopped",
"Step 1","Beat butter and confectioners' sugar in a bowl until creamy; stir vanilla extract into butter mixture. Gradually beat flour into mixture to make a smooth dough. Stir pecans into dough; refrigerate until thoroughly chilled, 3 to 4 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll dough into 1-inch balls and place 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 18 to 20 minutes. Remove to cool on wire racks."
"Step 5","Place crushed peppermints into a shallow bowl. Microwave confectioners' coating in a microwave-safe bowl for 30 seconds; stir. Continue heating in 15-second intervals, stirring after each interval, until coating is warm and smooth. Dip tops of cooled cookies in coating, then press into crushed candy. Set cookies aside to let coating set."
"Angel Cookies I","1 cup butter",
"Angel Cookies I","1 cup lard",
"Angel Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Angel Cookies I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Angel Cookies I","2 teaspoons salt",
"Angel Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Angel Cookies I","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Angel Cookies I","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Angel Cookies I","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Angel Cookies I","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Angel Cookies I","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Cream butter, lard and sugars together. Add eggs one at a time and mix thoroughly. Add vanilla and dry ingredients, stir in chopped nuts."
"Step 2","Chill dough until easy to work with."
"Step 3","Shape into balls and roll in sugar. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for about 20 minutes."
"Elaine's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Elaine's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Elaine's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Elaine's Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Elaine's Peanut Butter Cookies","2 tablespoons water",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Pour the cake mix into a large bowl. Make a well in the center, and add peanut butter, oil, eggs, and water. Mix until well blended. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Flatten slightly using a fork dipped in water."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Let cookies set on cookie sheet for 2 to 3 minutes before carefully removing from the cookie sheet to cool on wire racks."
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies",".33 cup water",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies","4 teaspoons shortening",
"Choco Peanut Butter Cookies",".33 cup chopped peanuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat brown sugar, peanut butter and margarine until fluffy."
"Step 3","Blend in water, egg, and vanilla."
"Step 4","Add combined oats, flour and baking soda; mix well"
"Step 5","Cover; chill 1 hour."
"Step 6","Shape into 1 inch balls. Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Using bottom of glass dipped in sugar, press into 1/4 inch thick circles."
"Step 7","Bake 8-10 minutes or until edges are golden brown. Remove to wire rack; cool completely."
"Step 8","To make Frosting: Melt chocolate pieces in saucepan over low heat. Stir in vegetable shortening, mixing until smooth."
"Step 9","Top each cookie with 1/2 teaspoon melted chocolate. Sprinkle with chopped peanuts. Chill until set. Store tightly covered."
"Raspberry Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup butter at room temperature",
"Raspberry Chocolate Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Raspberry Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Raspberry Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons raspberry extract",
