"Raspberry Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Raspberry Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Raspberry Chocolate Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Raspberry Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Raspberry Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Mash the butter and sugar together in a bowl with a wooden spoon until the mixture is creamy and well blended, and beat in eggs, one at a time. Stir in the raspberry extract, almond extract, and milk. In a separate bowl, stir the flour and baking powder together until thoroughly combined, and gradually beat into the butter-egg mixture. Stir in the chocolate chips, and drop by spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until very lightly browned at the edges, 8 to 10 minutes."
"Chocolate Chip Cake Mix Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate chip cake mix with pudding",
"Chocolate Chip Cake Mix Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Cake Mix Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Chocolate Chip Cake Mix Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Chocolate Chip Cake Mix Cookies",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Chocolate Chip Cake Mix Cookies","1 cup mini semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix together the cake mix, eggs, oil, raisins, oatmeal and chocolate chips. Stir well."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonful onto a greased cookie sheet (Baking stones yield best results). Bake for about 8-10 minutes."
"Step 4","Remove from oven and let cool for 1 minute before removing from cookie sheet. NOTE: For even more chocolate, put a large chocolate kiss in the center of each cookie 1 minute before removing from oven."
"Shortbread Cookies I","2 cups butter, softened",
"Shortbread Cookies I","1 .75 cups white sugar",
"Shortbread Cookies I","6 large eggs eggs",
"Shortbread Cookies I","1 tablespoon caraway seed",
"Shortbread Cookies I","8 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream the butter, and sugar. Mix well."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, beat eggs and add to the butter mixture. Stir in the caraway seeds and flour. Mix well."
"Step 4","Roll out the dough on a floured surface to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into 1 inch squares (or other shapes) and place at least 1 inch apart on cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes...watch closely...until lightly colored. Cool on wire racks."
"Carrot Cake Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Carrot Cake Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Carrot Cake Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Carrot Cake Cookies","1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained",
"Carrot Cake Cookies",".75 cup shredded carrots",
"Carrot Cake Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Carrot Cake Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Carrot Cake Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Carrot Cake Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Carrot Cake Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Carrot Cake Cookies","2 tablespoons ground cinnamon",
"Carrot Cake Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, stir in the crushed pineapple, carrots and raisins. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and cinnamon; stir into the carrot mixture. Mix in the walnuts if desired. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until bottoms begin to brown and cookies are set. Allow cookies to cool for a few minutes on the cookie sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Lauren's Sugar and Spice Black Pepper Cookies","1 (10 ounce) package cinnamon swirl coffee cake mix",
"Lauren's Sugar and Spice Black Pepper Cookies","1 egg",
"Lauren's Sugar and Spice Black Pepper Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Lauren's Sugar and Spice Black Pepper Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Lauren's Sugar and Spice Black Pepper Cookies","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Lauren's Sugar and Spice Black Pepper Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground black pepper",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Remove the cinnamon packet from the mix and reserve 1/3 cup for later."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the cake mix, the rest of the packet of cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg and black pepper. Mix in the egg and shortening until a dough forms. Form dough into 1 inch balls, roll the balls in the reserved cinnamon packet and place them 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until the tops are cracked and puffy. Let cookies set on cookie sheets until completely cool."
"Pill Bottle Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Pill Bottle Cookies",".33 cup heavy whipping cream",
"Pill Bottle Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pill Bottle Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Pill Bottle Cookies",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Pill Bottle Cookies",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Pill Bottle Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"Pill Bottle Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Combine the 1 cup butter, whipping cream and flour thoroughly. Chill for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface roll dough out to 1/8 inch thick. Cut into 1 1/2 inch rounds. Transfer rounds to a tray or waxed paper sprinkled heavily with white sugar, turning to coat both sides with sugar. Place sugar coated rounds on an ungreased cookie sheet. Prick in four places with a fork, forming a prick box."
"Step 4","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 7 to 9 minutes or until slightly puffed. Let cool then put the bottoms of two cookies together with the Creamy Butter Filling."
"Step 5","To Make The Creamy Butter Filling: Blend 1/4 cup butter, confectioners' sugar, egg yolk and vanilla until smooth. If desired tint with food coloring.Ma Ma's Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Ma Ma's Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Ma Ma's Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Ma Ma's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Ma Ma's Sugar Cookies","2 cups self-rising flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Beat in the eggs and vanilla. stir in the self-rising flour to form a dough. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Mom's Ginger Snaps","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps",".75 cup vegetable oil",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps",".25 cup molasses",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps","1 egg",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Mom's Ginger Snaps",".33 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the brown sugar, oil, molasses, and egg. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cloves, cinnamon, and ginger; stir into the molasses mixture. Roll dough into 1 1/4 inch balls. Roll each ball in white sugar before placing 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven, or until center is firm. Cool on wire racks."
"Passover Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup chopped walnuts",
"Passover Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup matzo cake meal",
"Passover Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Passover Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup potato starch",
"Passover Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Passover Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Passover Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Passover Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Spread the walnuts onto a baking sheet, and toast until the nuts start to turn golden brown and become fragrant, about 45 minutes. Watch the nuts carefully as they bake, they burn quickly. Once toasted, set the walnuts aside to cool to room temperature."
"Step 3","Raise oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper. Whisk together the matzo cake meal, salt, and potato starch in a bowl."
"Step 4","In a large bowl, beat the eggs, margarine, and sugar together until smoothly combined. Stir the meal mixture into the wet ingredients until thoroughly combined, and mix in the chocolate chips. Drop the dough by spoonfuls onto the parchment-lined baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove the cookies from the baking sheets as soon as they are removed from the oven; cool on baking racks."
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 cup real maple syrup",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter chips",
"Peanuttiest Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup crushed peanuts",
"Step 1","With an electric mixer, combine peanut butter, butter, vanilla extract, syrup, and eggs."
"Step 2","In another bowl, mix sugars, flour, oats, salt, and baking powder. When the dry ingredients are mixed, fold dry mixture into the earlier (wet) mixture."
"Step 3","Add crushed peanuts and peanut butter chips to the dough."
"Step 4","Roll dough into balls, pressing slightly with a fork. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12-15 minutes, until cookies are slightly browned."
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup blanched slivered almonds",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup instant coffee granules",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons hot water",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Toast almonds in oven for 10 minutes or until brown."
"Step 3","Dissolve coffee in 2 tablespoons hot water. In a separate small mixing bowl mix flour, baking soda and salt."
"Step 4","Beat butter and sugar in an electric mixer at a medium speed until fluffy. Pour coffee, vanilla and eggs into the butter mixture; mix well. Reduce mixer's speed to low and slowly pour flour mixture into the butter mixture."
"Step 5","Fold chocolate chips and almonds into the dough. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet, 3 inches apart."
"Step 6","Bake for 10 minutes."
"Cheesecake Brownies","1 (19.8 ounce) package brownie mix",
"Cheesecake Brownies","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese",
"Cheesecake Brownies","1 egg",
"Cheesecake Brownies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Prepare the brownie mix as directed by manufacturer. Preheat oven to temperature indicated on box. Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","Spread the brownie batter evenly into the prepared pan. Using an electric mixer, beat together the cream cheese, egg and sugar until smooth. Dollop the cream cheese mixture on top of the brownie batter. Swirl together using a knife or skewer."
"Step 3","Bake according to manufacturer's instructions. Brownies will be done when a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Cool in the pan, then cut into bars and serve."
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies",".5 cup butter at room temperature",
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies",".25 cup egg substitute",
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies",".25 cup seedless raspberry jam",
"Raspberry Linzer Cookies","1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar, or as needed",
"Step 1","Mix flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon together in a bowl using a whisk."
"Step 2","Beat white sugar and butter together with an electric mixer on high in a bowl until light and fluffy; add egg substitute and vanilla extract. Beat until well blended."
"Step 3","Gradually beat flour mixture into sugar-butter mixture until dough is soft. Divide dough into 2 equal balls and wrap each portion in plastic wrap. Chill dough in refrigerator for at least 1 hour."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line two baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 5","Roll 1 dough ball into a 1/8-inch thick rectangle on a lightly floured surface; cut into 32 cookies using a square, star, or circular cookie cutter. Repeat with the second dough ball. Cut out the center of 32 cookies using a 1-inch square cookie cutter. Arrange all 64 cookies on the prepared baking sheets about 1 inch apart."
"Step 6","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until edges are lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Cool on pans for 5 minutes before transferring cookies to wire racks to cool completely."
"Step 7","Spread about 1/2 teaspoon raspberry jam into the center of each whole cookie. Sprinkle the cut-out cookies with confectioners' sugar; place 1 cut-out cookie atop each raspberry jam-topped cookie."
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie",".5 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie",".5 cup low fat margarine",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie","5 (1 gram) packets Acesulfame Potassium sweetener",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie","1 egg",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie","1 .25 cups rolled oats",
"Low Sugar Oatmeal Raisin Cookie",".5 cup chopped raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Sift together the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, ginger and salt, and set aside. In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine, brown sugar and sugar substitute. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Add sifted ingredients and stir until combined, then mix in the oats and raisins."
"Step 3","Drop cookies by rounded teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheets."
"Oatmeal Cookie Bars","2 .5 cups dates, pitted and chopped",
"Oatmeal Cookie Bars","2 tablespoons lemon juice",
"Oatmeal Cookie Bars",".75 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Cookie Bars",".67 cup water",
"Oatmeal Cookie Bars","1 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Cookie Bars","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Cookie Bars",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Cookie Bars","1 .5 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Cookie Bars",".75 cup shortening",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","To make Filling: In a saucepan over low heat, combine dates, water, white sugar, and lemon juice. Heat for about 8 minutes, or until thick. Set aside to let cool."
"Step 3","To make Pastry: In a large bowl, combine flour, brown sugar, oats and salt. Mix until well blended. Add in shortening until mixture forms into coarse crumbs."
"Step 4","Press half of pastry mix into pan. Cover with date mixture and spread remaining pastry mix over the top."
"Step 5","Bake 20 to 25 minutes until golden brown. Let cool on wire rack before cutting."
"Oatmeal Shortbread Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Shortbread Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Shortbread Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Shortbread Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","Cream together butter and brown sugar until smooth. Stir in flour and oats. Chill in refrigerator for at least two hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)"
"Step 3","Roll out dough on a lightly floured and sugared surface to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut out with a cookie cutter and bake for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are golden brown."
"3-Ingredient Shortbread Cookies","1 cup butter",
"3-Ingredient Shortbread Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"3-Ingredient Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"3-Ingredient Shortbread Cookies","12 cherries maraschino cherries",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C.)"
"Step 2","Combine butter or margarine, flour and confectioner's sugar and beat for 10 minutes."
"Step 3","Drop from teaspoon onto cookie sheet. Decorate with maraschino cherry pieces."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven for 15 to 18 minutes, or until bottoms are lightly browned."
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon ground white pepper",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Zippy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter or margarine and sugars. Add already beaten eggs and vanilla."
"Step 3","Mix dry ingredients together and mix with creamed mixture. Add chocolate chips and nuts."
"Step 4","Bake 8 to 10 minutes until done. These are not HOT HOT -- Just a little surprise, definitely a little kick, goes well with the chocolate."
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II",".75 cup shortening",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II","1 egg",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 cup mashed ripe banana",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II","3 cups rolled oats",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together shortening and brown sugar. Beat in egg and mashed banana, then stir in vanilla. Combine flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and cloves; stir into the banana mixture. Mix in rolled oats and walnuts. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets. Leave room for spreading."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on cookie sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Biscotti",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Biscotti","1 cup white sugar",
"Biscotti","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Biscotti","3 large eggs eggs",
"Biscotti","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Biscotti","1 tablespoon anise extract, or 3 drops anise oil",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, beat together the oil, eggs, sugar and anise flavoring until well blended. Combine the flour and baking powder, stir into the egg mixture to form a heavy dough. Divide dough into two pieces. Form each piece into a roll as long as your cookie sheet. Place roll onto the prepared cookie sheet, and press down to 1/2 inch thickness."
"Step 3","Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Remove from the baking sheet to cool on a wire rack. When The cookies are cool enough to handle, slice each one crosswise into 1/2 inch slices. Place the slices cut side up back onto the baking sheet. Bake for an additional 6 to 10 minutes on each side. Slices should be lightly toasted."
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Zucchini Cookies","1 .75 cups grated zucchini",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in the grated zucchini. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Oatmeal Pudding Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Oatmeal Pudding Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Pudding Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Pudding Cookies","1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Oatmeal Pudding Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Pudding Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Pudding Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Pudding Cookies","3 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Pudding Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together shortening, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Blend in instant pudding, then beat in eggs until the batter is light and fluffy. Combine flour and baking soda; mix into the batter. Stir in oats and raisins. Dough will be stiff. Drop dough by spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until firm. Cool on wire racks."
"Cream Cheese Cookies IV",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Cream Cheese Cookies IV","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese",
"Cream Cheese Cookies IV","1 egg yolk",
"Cream Cheese Cookies IV",".25 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cream Cheese Cookies IV","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and cream cheese. Blend in the egg yolk and vanilla. Gradually beat in the cake mix. Dough will be stiff. Cover, and chill for 30 minutes."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until firm. Cool on wire racks."
"Buckeyes I","1 .5 cups peanut butter",
"Buckeyes I","1 cup butter, softened",
"Buckeyes I",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Buckeyes I","6 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Buckeyes I","4 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, mix together the peanut butter, butter, vanilla and confectioners' sugar. The dough will look dry. Roll into 1 inch balls and place on a waxed paper-lined cookie sheet."
"Step 2","Press a toothpick into the top of each ball (to be used later as the handle for dipping) and chill in freezer until firm, about 30 minutes."
"Step 3","Melt chocolate chips in a double boiler or in a bowl set over a pan of barely simmering water. Stir frequently until smooth."
"Step 4","Dip frozen peanut butter balls in chocolate holding onto the toothpick. Leave a small portion of peanut butter showing at the top to make them look like Buckeyes. Put back on the cookie sheet and refrigerate until serving."
"Gluten-Free Coconut Flour Shortbread Cookies",".25 cup King Arthur Coconut Flour",
"Gluten-Free Coconut Flour Shortbread Cookies",".25 cup King Arthur Gluten-Free Flour",
"Gluten-Free Coconut Flour Shortbread Cookies",".25 cup sugar",
"Gluten-Free Coconut Flour Shortbread Cookies",".25 cup softened unsalted butter",
"Gluten-Free Coconut Flour Shortbread Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Gluten-Free Coconut Flour Shortbread Cookies","1 large egg",
"Gluten-Free Coconut Flour Shortbread Cookies","⅛ teaspoon coconut flavoring, for stronger flavor",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Lightly grease a baking sheet, or line it with parchment."
"Step 2","Mix all the ingredients, by hand or mixer, until a well-blended, cohesive dough forms; this will take about 2 minutes at medium-low speed in a stand mixer."
"Step 3","Drop the cookie dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheet (a teaspoon cookie scoop works well here), leaving 1 inch between them; these cookies won't spread much when they bake."
"Step 4","Use a fork to flatten each cookie to about 1/4 inch thick, making a cross-hatch design."
"Step 5","Bake the cookies for 8 to 12 minutes, until just browned on the bottom. Allow the cookies to cool completely on the baking sheet."
"Peanut Butter Pinwheel Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Pinwheel Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Pinwheel Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Pinwheel Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Pinwheel Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Pinwheel Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Pinwheel Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Peanut Butter Pinwheel Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Pinwheel Cookies","1 cup smooth peanut butter",
"Step 1","Cream butter or margarine and sugar; add eggs and vanilla. Add dry ingredients to butter mixture. Divide dough into 2 parts."
"Step 2","Roll each part out, to approximate 1/8 inch thick, then spread with 1/2 of the peanut butter. Roll up dough and refrigerate several hours."
"Step 3","Slice and bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 5 - 8 minutes, until slightly brown.Czechoslovakian Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Czechoslovakian Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Czechoslovakian Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Czechoslovakian Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Czechoslovakian Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground cardamom",
"Czechoslovakian Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Czechoslovakian Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Czechoslovakian Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Czechoslovakian Cookies",".5 cup strawberry jam",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease one 8 inch square baking dish."
"Step 2","Cream the butter until soft and fluffy. Add the white sugar gradually, until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg yolks."
"Step 3","Sift the cardamom, allspice and flour together. Gradually add it to the butter mixture and stir to combine well. Stir in the chopped pecans."
"Step 4","Spoon 1/2 of the dough into the prepared pan, spreading evenly. Top with strawberry jam and cover with the remaining dough."
"Step 5","Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 1 hour or until lightly browned. Cool then cut into 1 1/2 inch sized squares."
"Ultimate Sugar Cookies","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Ultimate Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Ultimate Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Ultimate Sugar Cookies",".25 cup light corn syrup",
"Ultimate Sugar Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Ultimate Sugar Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ultimate Sugar Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Ultimate Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Ultimate Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Beat sugar and shortening at medium speed of electric mixer until well blended. Add eggs, syrup and vanilla; beat well. Gradually add combined dry ingredients at low speed. Mix until well blended."
"Step 2","Refrigerate dough 1 hour."
"Step 3","Roll out dough between two sheets of lightly floured wax paper. Cut out with floured cutter."
"Step 4","Bake on ungreased cookie sheets at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 5-9 minutes, depending on size and thickness of cookies. Do not overbake. Cool 2 minutes, then remove from cookie sheets to cool."
"Munn Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Munn Cookies",".5 cup poppy seeds",
"Munn Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Munn Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Munn Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Munn Cookies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Munn Cookies","1 egg, separated",
"Munn Cookies","2 tablespoons lemon zest",
"Munn Cookies",".25 cup lemon juice",
"Munn Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Stir together the flour, poppy seeds, baking powder and salt."
"Step 3","In a medium bowl cream the butter and sugar together until light; beat in the egg yolk, lemon zest and lemon juice. Fold in the flour mixture and mix well."
"Step 4","Divide dough in half and roll each half out on a lightly floured surface until 1/8 to 1/4 inch thick. Cut with cookie cutters and place cookies on the prepared baking sheet. Brush tops of cookies with beaten egg white and sprinkle with white sugar."
"Step 5","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 to 15 minutes or until golden, the edges should be light brown."
"Sugar Cookies V","1 cup white sugar",
"Sugar Cookies V","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Sugar Cookies V","1 cup butter",
"Sugar Cookies V","1 cup shortening",
"Sugar Cookies V","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sugar Cookies V","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookies V","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Sugar Cookies V","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sugar Cookies V","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookies V",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together sugars, shortening and butter. Mix in the eggs and mix well."
"Step 3","Stir in flour, cream of tartar and baking soda. Stir in vanilla and salt and stir until well blended."
"Step 4","Roll dough into walnut sized balls. Flatten with glass bottom dipped in sugar. Bake for 10 minutes."
"Philippine-Made Sugar Cookie","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Philippine-Made Sugar Cookie","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Philippine-Made Sugar Cookie",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Philippine-Made Sugar Cookie",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Philippine-Made Sugar Cookie","1 cup butter, softened",
"Philippine-Made Sugar Cookie","1 cup white sugar",
"Philippine-Made Sugar Cookie","2 large eggs eggs",
"Philippine-Made Sugar Cookie","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Philippine-Made Sugar Cookie","8 ounces semisweet chocolate, grated",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets or line them with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. The mixture should be thick and light yellow. Gradually stir in the sifted ingredients until well blended. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls, three inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Sprinkle grated chocolate over the tops of the cookies."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until the cookies begin to brown around the edges. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks. Store in an airtight cookie jar."
"Aunt Gail's Oatmeal Lace Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Aunt Gail's Oatmeal Lace Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Aunt Gail's Oatmeal Lace Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Aunt Gail's Oatmeal Lace Cookies",".25 teaspoon almond extract",
"Aunt Gail's Oatmeal Lace Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Aunt Gail's Oatmeal Lace Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Aunt Gail's Oatmeal Lace Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Aunt Gail's Oatmeal Lace Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Aunt Gail's Oatmeal Lace Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Stir in the vanilla and almond extracts. Sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the butter mixture. Finally, mix in the rolled oats."
"Step 3","Roll dough into balls about 1 inch in diameter. Place the dough balls about 3 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheet. Dip the bottom of a glass in water and then in sugar, use this to flatten down the cookies. Sugar the glass as needed. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, cookies should be slightly browned. Store in an airtight container."
"Oreo® Cookie Cake","1 (20 ounce) package chocolate sandwich cookies",
"Oreo® Cookie Cake",".5 cup butter",
"Oreo® Cookie Cake","1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed",
"Oreo® Cookie Cake","2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese",
"Oreo® Cookie Cake","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Oreo® Cookie Cake","2 cups milk",
"Oreo® Cookie Cake","1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Step 1","Crush cookies into bite size pieces. Reserve 1 cup for top. Melt butter and mix with rest of cookies. Press into 9x13 pan. Put in freezer for 5 minutes."
"Step 2","Blend 1/2 of the whipped topping, all of the cream cheese and confectioners' sugar. Spread over crust and place cake back in freezer."
"Step 3","Prepare instant pudding with the milk according to package directions then spread over top of cake. Spread the remaining whipped topping on top of the pudding then sprinkle with the remaining cookies. Keep cake refrigerated."
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup whole wheat flour",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup nonfat dry milk powder",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","1 egg",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","2 .25 teaspoons peppermint extract",
"The Best Mint Chocolate Cookies","2 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Stir together the all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, cocoa powder, dry milk, baking soda and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, vegetable oil, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla and peppermint extracts. Gradually stir in the dry ingredients using a wooden spoon. Finally, fold in the milk chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","8 ounces almond paste",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","4 large eggs eggs",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","5 drops green food coloring",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","5 drops yellow food coloring",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","5 drops red food coloring",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","1 (12 ounce) jar seedless raspberry jam, heated",
"Italian Wedding Cookies II","1 (12 ounce) package semisweet chocolate chips, melted",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Break almond paste into a large bowl, and beat in butter, sugar, eggs, and almond extract until light and fluffy. Beat in the flour and salt. Split batter into three equal portions, mixing one portion with green food coloring, one with yellow, and one with red. Spread each portion out to 1/4 inch thickness into the bottom of an ungreased 9x13 inch baking pan."
"Step 3","Bake each layer for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned. Allow to cool."
"Step 4","On a cookie sheet or cutting board, stack the cakes, spreading tops of the first two layers with raspberry jam. Spread melted chocolate over top of the third layer. Chill in the refrigerator 1 hour, or until jam and chocolate are firm. Slice into small rectangles to serve."
"Rum Cookie Balls","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Rum Cookie Balls",".25 cup corn syrup",
"Rum Cookie Balls",".5 cup rum",
"Rum Cookie Balls","2 .67 cups crushed vanilla wafers",
"Rum Cookie Balls",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Rum Cookie Balls","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","In the microwave or in a metal bowl over a pan of simmering water, melt chocolate chips, stirring frequently until smooth. Remove from heat and stir in corn syrup and rum. Combine the vanilla wafer crumbs, confectioners' sugar and pecans; stir into the chocolate mixture until well blended. Chill until firm, about 1 hour."
"Step 2","Roll dough into 1 inch balls. Refrigerate in an airtight container until serving."
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 cup butter or margarine",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 cup molasses",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","4 cups whole wheat flour",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 tablespoon baking soda",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 tablespoon ground ginger",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 .5 teaspoons ground nutmeg",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 .5 teaspoons ground cloves",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 .5 teaspoons ground allspice",
"Whole Wheat Ginger Snaps","1 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and 1 1/2 cups of sugar until smooth. Mix in the eggs, and then the molasses. Combine the whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, ginger, nutmeg, cinnamon, cloves, and allspice, heaping the measures if you like a lot of spice. Stir the dry ingredients into the molasses mixture just until blended."
"Step 3","Roll the dough into small balls, and dip the top of each ball into the remaining white sugar. Place the cookies about 2 inches apart on the cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until the tops are cracked. Bake longer for crispy cookies, less time for chewy cookies. Cool on wire racks."
"Fruit Oatmeal Cookie Bars",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Fruit Oatmeal Cookie Bars",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Fruit Oatmeal Cookie Bars","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Fruit Oatmeal Cookie Bars",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fruit Oatmeal Cookie Bars","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Fruit Oatmeal Cookie Bars","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Fruit Oatmeal Cookie Bars","1 .5 cups any flavor fruit jam",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","Combine the butter, brown sugar, flour, baking soda, salt and rolled oats. Press 2 cups of the mixture into the bottom of the prepared pan. Spread the preserves over the top and sprinkle with the remaining crumb mixture, gently pressing crumbs into jam."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 35 to 40 minutes. Allow to cool before cutting."
"Thumbprint Cookies IV","1 cup butter",
"Thumbprint Cookies IV",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Thumbprint Cookies IV","2 large eggs eggs",
"Thumbprint Cookies IV","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Thumbprint Cookies IV",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Thumbprint Cookies IV","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Separate the eggs."
"Step 3","Cream the butter or margarine with the sugar. Beat in the egg yolks and vanilla. Stir in the flour and the salt."
"Step 4","Shape the dough into small balls and roll in the slightly beaten egg whites then in the chopped nuts. Press thumb in center of cookie to make an indentation."
"Step 5","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 7 minutes or until lightly brown. Cool then fill with your favorite frosting or jam."
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice",
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups dark brown sugar",
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies","1 cup solid pack pumpkin puree",
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies","10 ounces white chocolate, chopped",
"Pumpkin Pecan White Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup pecan halves",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs and vanilla, then stir in the pumpkin puree until well blended. Combine the flour, baking soda, and pumpkin pie spice; stir into the pumpkin mixture. Fold in the white chocolate and pecans. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Cookies should be at least 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 to 22 minutes in the preheated oven, until bottoms are lightly browned. Cool for 5 minutes on baking sheets before removing to cool on wire racks."
"Cookies....All Dressed","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cookies....All Dressed","1 cup white sugar",
"Cookies....All Dressed","1 cup brown sugar, packed",
"Cookies....All Dressed","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cookies....All Dressed","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cookies....All Dressed","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cookies....All Dressed","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cookies....All Dressed",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cookies....All Dressed","1 cup old-fashioned rolled oats",
"Cookies....All Dressed","1 cup crispy rice cereal",
"Cookies....All Dressed",".5 cup unsweetened shredded coconut",
"Cookies....All Dressed",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Cookies....All Dressed",".5 cup toffee baking bits",
"Cookies....All Dressed",".5 cup chopped salted pretzels",
"Cookies....All Dressed","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a bowl, mash the butter with the white and brown sugar until the mixture is creamy and well blended. Beat in eggs and vanilla extract. In a separate large mixing bowl, mix together the flour, baking soda, salt, rolled oats, rice cereal, coconut, pecans, toffee bits, pretzel pieces, and chocolate chips. Stir the butter mixture into the dry ingredients until evenly mixed."
"Step 3","Drop the dough by tablespoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets about 2 inches apart. Using a fork, flatten the cookies."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the bottoms are just starting to brown, about 12 minutes. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for about 5 minutes before removing to finish cooling on racks."

"Step 2","Shape into 36 balls and roll in confectioners' sugar. Keep in refrigerator."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI","1 egg",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI","1 .5 cups finely chopped zucchini",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VI",".75 cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Stir in the zucchini. Combine the flour, baking powder, salt and cinnamon; stir into the zucchini mixture. Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until edges are light brown. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Red Hot Sugar Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Red Hot Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Red Hot Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Red Hot Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Red Hot Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Red Hot Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Red Hot Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Red Hot Sugar Cookies","1 (2.25 ounce) package cinnamon red hot candies",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Whisk together flour, baking soda, and baking powder in a small bowl. Using an electric mixer, beat butter and sugar in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in egg and vanilla. Stir in the dry ingredients."
"Step 3","Roll dough out on lightly floured surface. Cut into heart shapes and place on ungreased baking sheets. Dot cookies with red hot candies."
"Step 4","Bake until golden, 8 to 10 minutes. Let stand on cookie sheet for 2 minutes before removing to cooling racks."
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 .75 cups quick cooking oats",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 egg",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies",".75 cup applesauce",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Applesauce Oatie Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. In a medium bowl, stir together the quick oats, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg, set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and applesauce. Stir the oatmeal mixture into the batter until well blended then fold in the chocolate chips, raisins and walnuts. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Holiday Painted Cookies","2 .33 cups flour",
"Holiday Painted Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Holiday Painted Cookies","1 teaspoon McCormick® Cinnamon, Ground",
"Holiday Painted Cookies",".25 teaspoon McCormick® Nutmeg, Ground",
"Holiday Painted Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Holiday Painted Cookies","1 .25 cups sugar",
"Holiday Painted Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Holiday Painted Cookies","1 egg",
"Holiday Painted Cookies","2 teaspoons McCormick® Pure Vanilla Extract",
"Holiday Painted Cookies","2 (16 ounce) containers white frosting",
"Step 1","Mix flour, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt in medium bowl. Set aside. Beat sugar and butter in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla; mix well. Gradually stir in flour mixture on low speed until well mixed. Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Roll dough on generously floured surface to 1/4-inch thickness. Cut out shapes with holiday cookie cutters. Place on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on baking sheets 1 minute. Remove to wire racks; cool completely."
"Step 4","Spoon 1 container of the frosting into medium microwavable bowl. Microwave on HIGH 20 to 30 seconds, stirring every 10 seconds. (Frosting should be a pourable consistency.) Dip tops of cookies into frosting. Microwave remaining container of frosting as needed. Place frosted cookies on wire rack set over foil-covered baking sheet. (The baking sheet will catch drips.) Let stand 10 minutes or until frosting is dried."
"Step 5","Prepare desired colors of Holiday Flavor Paints (see tips). Using small clean paint brushes, paint designs on cookies.Play Dough Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Play Dough Cookies","3 ounces cream cheese",
"Play Dough Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Play Dough Cookies","1 egg",
"Play Dough Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Play Dough Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Play Dough Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Play Dough Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Play Dough Cookies","assorted colors of paste food coloring",
"Play Dough Cookies","24 eaches lollipop sticks",
"Step 1","In a bowl cream butter, cream cheese and sugar until fluffy. Add egg and vanilla; beat until smooth."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl combine flour, baking powder and salt. Add dry ingredients to the creamed mixture. Stir till soft dough forms. Divide dough into fourths. Tint each with a different food color. Wrap in plastic wrap and chill for 2 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Working with half of each color, shape dough into 3/4 inch balls and for each cookie place 1 pink, 1 green, 1 blue and 1 orange ball together to make 1 large ball. Shape into a 12 inch long roll (like a snake), starting at one end, coil roll to make a 2 3/4 inch round cookie. Place cookies 3 inches apart on lightly greased baking sheet. Carefully insert lollipop sticks into bottoms of cookies."
"Step 4","Bake cookies for 8 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool and store in an airtight container."
"Orange Slice Cookies II","1 cup butter, softened",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","1 cup brown sugar",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","1 cup rolled oats",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Orange Slice Cookies II","1 cup chopped orange slices candy",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the oats, coconut and candy orange slices. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Monster Cookie Bars",".5 cup LAND O LAKES® Butter, softened",
"Monster Cookie Bars",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Monster Cookie Bars","1 egg",
"Monster Cookie Bars",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Monster Cookie Bars","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Monster Cookie Bars",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Monster Cookie Bars",".5 teaspoon sea salt",
"Monster Cookie Bars",".25 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Monster Cookie Bars",".33 cup rolled oats",
"Monster Cookie Bars","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Monster Cookie Bars",".5 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 8x8-inch baking pan."
"Step 2","Cream together butter and brown sugar. Mix in egg and vanilla."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, whisk flour, baking powder, and sea salt together. Gradually incorporate dry ingredients into the butter/sugar mixture. Mix thoroughly."
"Step 4","Stir in creamy peanut butter, oats, chocolate chips, and candy-coated chocolates. Spread mixture evenly in prepared baking pan."
"Step 5","Bake until set, 25 to 27 minutes. Allow to fully cool before cutting into bars."
"Germantown Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Germantown Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Germantown Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Germantown Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Germantown Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Germantown Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Germantown Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Germantown Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Germantown Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Germantown Cookies","1 teaspoon orange zest",
"Germantown Cookies","1 cup coconut",
"Germantown Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Germantown Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; stir into the butter mixture. Finally, mix in the orange zest, coconut, oats and pecans. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges begin to brown slightly. Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 2 to 3 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups butter, room temperature",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups white sugar",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","5 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons lime juice",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Lime Sandwich Sugar Cookies","3 drops green food color",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until well blended. Cover or wrap dough, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. If you are in a big hurry, freeze for a half hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 7 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","For the frosting: In a medium bowl, beat the lime juice, milk, confectioners' sugar and green food color until smooth and creamy. Add more milk or sugar if necessary to achieve a good spreading consistency. When cookies are completely cool, spread icing between cookies to make sandwiches."
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cardamom",
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups packed dark brown sugar",
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups applesauce",
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","6 cups rolled oats",
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups dried cherries",
"Apple-Cran-Cherry Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups dried cranberries",
"Step 1","Cream butter or margarine, cinnamon, cardamom, baking soda, and brown sugar. Mix in applesauce. Gradually blend in flour, and then oats. Stir in dried. Let dough sit for one hour."
"Step 2","Drop by teaspoonful onto ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes, or until edges are slightly browned. Cool on wire rack."
"Cool Whip Cookies","1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed",
"Cool Whip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cool Whip Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package lemon cake mix",
"Cool Whip Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Beat together the whipped topping and eggs together. Add the lemon cake mix and continue to mix. Dough will be thick."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls into a bowl of confectioners' sugar and roll to coat. Place cookies on the prepared baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8 minutes."
"Ranger Cookies III","1 .5 cups butter",
"Ranger Cookies III","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Ranger Cookies III","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Ranger Cookies III","3 large eggs eggs",
"Ranger Cookies III","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Ranger Cookies III","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Ranger Cookies III",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Ranger Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Ranger Cookies III","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ranger Cookies III","3 cups rolled oats",
"Ranger Cookies III","2 cups raisins",
"Ranger Cookies III","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Ranger Cookies III","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Cream butter with sugars; beat in eggs and vanilla. Stir in remaining ingredients."
"Step 2","Bake on ungreased cookie sheet for 8-10 minutes at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Three Hundred Chocolate Chip Cookies","12 .5 cups white sugar",
"Three Hundred Chocolate Chip Cookies","12 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Three Hundred Chocolate Chip Cookies","8 .33 cups butter",
"Three Hundred Chocolate Chip Cookies","25 large eggs eggs",
"Three Hundred Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup vanilla extract",
"Three Hundred Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup baking soda",
"Three Hundred Chocolate Chip Cookies","36 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Three Hundred Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 tablespoons salt",
"Three Hundred Chocolate Chip Cookies","9 .33 pounds semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a very large bowl, cream sugars and butter. Add eggs and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients and add gradually to creamed mixture. Stir in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Scoop with ice cream scoop onto baking sheets. Flatten balls with wet hands. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until start to brown."
"Davy Crockett Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Davy Crockett Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Davy Crockett Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Davy Crockett Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Davy Crockett Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Davy Crockett Cookies","2 cups self-rising flour",
"Davy Crockett Cookies","2 cups oats",
"Davy Crockett Cookies","2 cups chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the eggs, brown and white sugars, and vanilla. Add the oil and mix to combine. In a separate bowl, combine the flour and the oats. Gradually, stir flour mixture into egg mixture 1/2 cup at a time, stirring until completely mixed. Fold in chocolate chips. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven for 13 minutes. Remove from oven still slightly gooey, and let cool for 3 minutes before cutting into squares. Then cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes. Store in an air-tight container."
"Skillet Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Skillet Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Skillet Cookies II","1 cup dates, pitted and chopped",
"Skillet Cookies II","1 egg, beaten",
"Skillet Cookies II","2 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Skillet Cookies II",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Skillet Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Skillet Cookies II",".25 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","In a large skillet, melt the margarine. Add the sugar and dates; cooking and stirring until thick. Stir in the egg, and cook 5 more minutes over low heat. Remove from heat, mix in the cereal, nuts (or coconut), and vanilla. Let the mixture cool for a minute , then shape into walnut sized balls. Roll in confectioners' sugar, and serve."
"Filled Cookies III",".5 cup shortening",
"Filled Cookies III","1 cup white sugar",
"Filled Cookies III","1 egg",
"Filled Cookies III",".5 cup heavy cream",
"Filled Cookies III","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Filled Cookies III","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Filled Cookies III","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Filled Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Filled Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Filled Cookies III",".5 cup white sugar",
"Filled Cookies III","1 tablespoon all-purpose flour",
"Filled Cookies III","1 cup chopped raisins",
"Filled Cookies III",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Filled Cookies III",".5 cup water",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together shortening and 1 cup sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg, then stir in the cream and vanilla. Combine 3 1/2 cups flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Cover and refrigerate dough for 2 hours, or until firm."
"Step 2","To make the filling: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, stir together 1/2 cup of sugar and 1 tablespoon flour. Mix in the raisins, walnuts and water. Cook until thickened, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and allow to cool."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. On a floured surface, roll out dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Using a round cutter, cut out 48 circles 2 1/2 to 3 inches in diameter. Assemble the cookies by placing one onto the cookie sheet, place a teaspoon of filling in the center, then cover with another cookie. Press the edges together with a fork to seal. Repeat with remaining dough, spacing cookies 2 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are golden brown. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks. CAUTION: Filling will be EXTREMELY HOT!"
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","4 teaspoons baking powder",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons cinnamon",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Easy Pumpkin Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease two baking sheets."
"Step 2","Whisk sugar, pumpkin, vegetable oil, eggs, milk, and vanilla together in a large bowl until smooth."
"Step 3","Stir flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt together in a bowl. Gradually pour flour mixture into pumpkin mixture; stir to incorporate. Stir chocolate chips into dough. Drop spoonfuls of the dough 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until golden, 10 minutes."
"Uncle Mac's Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Uncle Mac's Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Uncle Mac's Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies","1 egg",
"Uncle Mac's Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Uncle Mac's Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies","2 tablespoons fruit preserves, any flavor",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, mix together peanut butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla until well blended. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Use a fork to make a criss-cross pattern on the top. Make a small hole in the top of each cookie using the handle of a wooden spoon. Fill the holes with preserves."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 11 minutes in preheated oven. Allow to cool for a couple of minutes on the cookie sheets before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Chewy Maple Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Chewy Maple Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chewy Maple Cookies","1 egg",
"Chewy Maple Cookies",".5 cup real maple syrup",
"Chewy Maple Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Maple Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Maple Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chewy Maple Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Maple Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a mixing bowl, cream shortening and brown sugar until fluffy. Beat in the egg, syrup, and vanilla until well mixed."
"Step 3","Combine flour, baking powder and salt. Add flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Stir in coconut. Drop by tablespoonfuls 2-inches apart onto greased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10-12 minutes."
"Easy, Chewy Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Easy, Chewy Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Easy, Chewy Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Easy, Chewy Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Easy, Chewy Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easy, Chewy Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Easy, Chewy Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat peanut butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until smooth. Stir egg, vanilla extract, and baking soda into peanut butter mixture; stir in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop mixture by small rounded spoonfuls onto a baking sheet about 2 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are flattened and golden, about 8 minutes."
"Make Ahead Peanut Butter Cookies","2 cups Make Ahead Cookie Mix",
"Make Ahead Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Make Ahead Peanut Butter Cookies",".33 cup shortening",
"Make Ahead Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Make Ahead Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Make Ahead Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine 2 cups of Make Ahead Cookie Mix with brown sugar, shortening, peanut butter, vanilla, and egg."
"Step 3","Shape dough into balls. Place dough on ungreased cookie sheets. Flatten with a fork. Bake 7-11 minutes."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from Karo®",".75 cup butter or margarine, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from Karo®",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from Karo®",".5 cup Karo® Light or Dark Corn Syrup",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from Karo®","1 egg",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from Karo®","2 teaspoons Spice Islands® Pure Vanilla Extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from Karo®","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from Karo®","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from Karo®",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies from Karo®","1 (12 ounce) package semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","Beat butter and sugar with electric mixer in large bowl until fluffy. Beat in corn syrup, egg and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour, baking soda and salt until combined."
"Step 3","Stir in chocolate chips."
"Step 4","Drop dough by heaping tablespoonfuls onto lightly greased baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake for 9 to 11 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool 1 to 2 minutes on pan; remove from pan to wire rack."
"Cup of Everything Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 cup crisp rice cereal",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 cup ground walnuts",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cup of Everything Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Cream together the butter and the sugars. Mix in the oil and the flour. Add in oatmeal, crispy rice cereal, coconut, nuts, vanilla, salt, baking soda, cream of tartar, eggs and chocolate chips. Mix until well blended."
"Step 2","Drop by teaspoons or tablespoons on a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 - 15 minutes."
"Swedish Tea Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Swedish Tea Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Swedish Tea Cookies",".33 cup light cream",
"Swedish Tea Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Swedish Tea Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Swedish Tea Cookies","1 .25 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Swedish Tea Cookies","3 tablespoons evaporated milk",
"Swedish Tea Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cut 1 cup of the butter into the flour until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the cream and form the dough into a ball."
"Step 3","Roll dough out 1/2 inch thick and cut with a small round cutter. Roll cut circles in granulated sugar and place on ungreased cookies sheets. Prick cookies a few times with a fork."
"Step 4","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes. Let cookies cool before frosting."
"Step 5","To Assemble: Frost bottoms of half of the cookies and place the remaining cookies on top to make sandwich cookies."
"Step 6","To Make Buttercream Frosting: Beat 1/2 cup of the butter until fluffy. Gradually add the confectioners' sugar. Beat in the evaporated milk and the vanilla. Adjust milk and confectioners' sugar amounts to get buttercream to a good spreading consistency.Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mindy Custer's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Whisk together the flour and baking soda in a bowl."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mash the butter and margarine together until thoroughly blended, and mix in the white sugar, brown sugar, and instant pudding mix. Beat in eggs and vanilla extract until the mixture is smooth and creamy. Mix in the flour in several additions, then mix in the chocolate chips. Dough will be stiff."
"Step 3","Drop by tablespoon onto an ungreased, nonstick baking sheet, about 2 inches apart; flatten the cookies slightly."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until light brown and still soft on top, 8 to 10 minutes. Do not overbake. Allow to cool for 1 minute on the baking sheets before removing and cooling completely on racks."
"Swedish Waffle Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Swedish Waffle Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Swedish Waffle Cookies","6 tablespoons heavy cream",
"Swedish Waffle Cookies","white sugar for dusting",
"Swedish Waffle Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Swedish Waffle Cookies",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Swedish Waffle Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"Swedish Waffle Cookies","2 teaspoons Swedish arrack punsch",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a bowl, cream together 1 cup butter and the flour until smooth and creamy. Stir in heavy cream. Scrape dough into a ball."
"Step 3","Sprinkle the white sugar on a cutting board. Roll out the dough to about a 1/4-inch thickness on the sugared surface. Using a 3-inch round cookie cutter, cut dough into 24 circles. Using the rolling pin, roll each circle into a slightly oval shape. Place cookies on an ungreased cookie sheet about an inch apart."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges of the cookies get very lightly brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool slightly on cookie sheet; then transfer them to cooling racks using a spatula."
"Step 5","To make the filling, mix together 1/2 cup of butter, confectioners' sugar, egg yolk, and Swedish arrack punsch in a bowl. Beat until mixture is well blended and creamy."
"Step 6","To assemble, spread about a rounded teaspoon of filling on the bottom of one cookie and place another cookie, bottom side down, on the filling to form a sandwich. Repeat with the rest of the cookies."
"INCREDIBLE Raspberry Cheesecake Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"INCREDIBLE Raspberry Cheesecake Cookies","1 egg",
"INCREDIBLE Raspberry Cheesecake Cookies","1 (17.5 ounce) pouch sugar cookie mix",
"INCREDIBLE Raspberry Cheesecake Cookies",".67 cup raspberry baking chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a bowl, beat the cream cheese until soft and fluffy with an electric mixer, then beat in the egg until thoroughly combined. Mix in the cookie mix, then stir in the raspberry chips. Drop the dough about 2 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets with a tablespoon or small scoop. Lightly pat the cookies to flatten."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges of the cookies are lightly golden, 9 to 12 minutes. Cool before serving."
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies",".67 cup packed brown sugar",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup quick cooking oats",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup shredded zucchini",
"Spicy Zucchini Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Stir together the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, and cloves in a bowl; set aside. Beat the butter and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until creamy. Add the egg and the vanilla extract. Mix in the flour mixture and oats until just incorporated."
"Step 3","Wring the zucchini in a clean towel to remove any excess moisture. Stir the zucchini and raisins into the dough; mixing just enough to evenly combine. Drop batter by rounded teaspoonfuls 2-inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets. Bake for 14 to 16 minutes or until the bottom edges turn golden brown."
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","2 teaspoons ground nutmeg",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","2 cups persimmon pulp",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","2 cups raisin paste",
"Persimmon Raisin Cookies","2 cups chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease two baking sheets."
"Step 2","Cream the sugar and shortening together in a large mixing bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs, one at a time. Stir in the flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, and nutmeg, blending thoroughly. Mix in the persimmon pulp, raisin paste, and walnuts. Drop by spoonfuls onto prepared cookies sheets, and spread out slightly."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until cookie top springs back when touched, 12 to 15 minutes. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Chocolate Oatmeal Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a bowl."
"Step 2","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar in a bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Beat the first egg into the butter until completely blended, then beat in vanilla extract with the last egg. Mix in flour mixture until just incorporated. Fold in oats and chocolate chips, mixing just enough to evenly combine."
"Step 3","Drop tablespoonfuls of the dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until cookies are set, 11 to 12 minutes. Cool in baking sheets for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies","1 egg",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
