"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies",".67 cup buttermilk",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Oatmeal Buttermilk Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg. Combine the flour, baking soda, nutmeg, cinnamon and allspice; stir into the sugar mixture alternately with the buttermilk. Mix in the oats, walnuts and raisins. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Kiss Cookies","1 cup margarine, softened",
"Chocolate Kiss Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Kiss Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Kiss Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Kiss Cookies","1 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Chocolate Kiss Cookies","1 (6 ounce) bag milk chocolate candy kisses",
"Chocolate Kiss Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream margarine with sugar and vanilla until light and fluffy. Mix in flour and walnuts, beating on low speed of an electric mixer until well mixed. Cover, and refrigerate dough for 2 hours, or until firm enough to handle."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Remove wrappers from chocolate kisses. Shape approximately 1 tablespoon of dough around each chocolate kiss; be sure to cover chocolate completely. Place cookies on an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. While cookies are still warm, roll them in confectioners' sugar."
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II","1 cup butter",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II","1 egg yolk",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II",".67 cup cold water",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II","1 cup cornflakes cereal",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II","10 medium (2-3/4 dia) (approx 3 per lb)s apples - peeled, cored and sliced",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II",".75 cup white sugar",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II","1 tablespoon milk",
"Danish Pastry Apple Bars II",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, combine flour and salt. Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. In a cup, beat egg yolk, stir the cold water into the yolk. Gradually stir the egg mixture into the flour mixture until dough can be packed into a ball. On a clean dry surface, roll out 1/2 of the dough large enough to cover the bottom and sides of a 9x13 inch pan. Lay the dough in the pan."
"Step 3","Place the cornflakes over the dough in the pan. Arrange apple slices over the top of the corn flake layer. Sprinkle the sugar and cinnamon over the apples. Roll out the second half of the dough to cover the entire pan. Lay over the filling and pinch the edges of the two crusts together. Beat the egg white until foamy, and brush onto the top crust."
"Step 4","Bake for 45 to 50 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Drizzle with glaze while still warm."
"Step 5","To make the glaze: In a small bowl, beat the confectioners' sugar with the milk and almond extract until smooth."
"Butter Cookies V","2 cups butter, softened",
"Butter Cookies V","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Butter Cookies V","4 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Butter Cookies V","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Butter Cookies V","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Butter Cookies V",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in the yolks one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Shape dough into logs about 2 inches in diameter. Wrap in waxed paper and refrigerate or freeze until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Unwrap rolls. You can roll the logs in nuts or sprinkles before slicing. Slice into 3/8 inch wide slices. Place slices 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Do not brown. Remove to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Mincemeat Cookies I","1 cup shortening",
"Mincemeat Cookies I","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Mincemeat Cookies I",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mincemeat Cookies I","3 large eggs eggs",
"Mincemeat Cookies I","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mincemeat Cookies I","1 teaspoon salt",
"Mincemeat Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mincemeat Cookies I","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Mincemeat Cookies I","1 .5 cups prepared mincemeat, drained",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Cream shortening, sugar and eggs together, then beat in vanilla. Sift the flour, salt and baking soda together, and add to shortening mixture. Mix until well blended. Stir in the nuts and mincemeat and mix well. Drop by teaspoonfuls on the cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes until light brown."
"French Cookies (Belgi Galettes)","2 pounds dark brown sugar",
"French Cookies (Belgi Galettes)","1 pound butter",
"French Cookies (Belgi Galettes)","7 large eggs eggs",
"French Cookies (Belgi Galettes)","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"French Cookies (Belgi Galettes)","6 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, stir together the brown sugar and butter until smooth and creamy; then add eggs and vanilla, and beat well. Gradually stir in flour. Set bowl over a hot water bath, and stir to blend ingredients. Cover, and refrigerate overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat the galette iron."
"Step 3","Shape dough into 1 inch balls, and place in the galette iron. Close the iron, and cook the cookies. This should take about 30 seconds in an electric galette iron, or 2 to 4 minutes in a handheld iron over a medium flame. Carefully remove cookies and cool on wire racks."
"Applesauce Cookies II","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Applesauce Cookies II","1 egg",
"Applesauce Cookies II",".75 cup shortening",
"Applesauce Cookies II","1 cup applesauce",
"Applesauce Cookies II","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Applesauce Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Applesauce Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Applesauce Cookies II",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Applesauce Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Applesauce Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Applesauce Cookies II","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Applesauce Cookies II","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the brown sugar and shortening until smooth. Stir in the egg, and then the applesauce until well blended. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves; stir into the applesauce mixture. Mix in walnuts and raisins. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges start to brown. Cool on cookie sheets for a few minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 tablespoon baking soda",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 .5 tablespoons ground cinnamon",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 tablespoon ground nutmeg",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 tablespoon ground allspice",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","2 pinches salt",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 cup margarine, softened",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Vancouver Island Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 egg",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","3 tablespoons molasses",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 .5 cups quick cooking oats",
"Vancouver Island Cookies","1 cup sweetened flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 baking sheets."
"Step 2","Whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, and salt in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat margarine, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat egg, molasses, and vanilla into butter mixture until blended. Stir flour mixture into butter mixture until dough forms; fold in oats and coconut until just combined."
"Step 4","Roll dough into 1 1/4-inch balls and place 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are lightly browned, about 12 minutes. Allow to cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes; remove to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Freezer Butter Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Freezer Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Freezer Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Freezer Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Freezer Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Freezer Butter Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Freezer Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Freezer Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Freezer Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Freezer Butter Cookies",".25 cup colored candy sprinkles",
"Step 1","Blend flour, salt, baking soda, and cream of tartar in a medium bowl. Combine butter, shortening, and sugar in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth. Mix in egg and vanilla. Slowly add flour mixture to the sugar blend."
"Step 2","Divide dough in 1/2 and form into two 2-inch diameter logs. Shake the candy sprinkles evenly over a sheet of waxed paper. Roll the dough logs over the sprinkles, making sure the sprinkles adhere to the sides. Wrap the logs in waxed paper and refrigerate for 3 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 4","Remove 1 dough log from the refrigerator. Unwrap and place on a flat surface. Slice dough into 1/2-inch rounds and place on prepared cookie sheets. Rewrap and return any unused dough to the refrigerator; only slice it just as you are ready to place it on a cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until the bottoms start to brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the cookie sheets for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. Repeat with remaining dough."
"Dad's Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Dad's Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"Dad's Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Dad's Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Dad's Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Dad's Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dad's Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Dad's Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Dad's Favorite Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream together the shortening, peanut butter and sugars. Beat in egg. Combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt; gradually stir into the peanut butter mixture. Cover and refrigerate dough for at least one hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Make small balls of dough. Flatten with fork dipped in flour to form cross-wise pattern."
"Step 3","Bake for 10-12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until just set. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars",".5 cup butter",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars","7 ounces flaked coconut",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars","14 ounces sweetened condensed milk",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars","12 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Triple Layer Cookie Bars",".5 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In one 13x9 inch baking dish, melt the butter. Sprinkle the graham cracker crumbs over the melted butter . Top with the coconut, then the sweetened condensed milk and bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown."
"Step 3","In a saucepan over low heat melt the chocolate chips and peanut butter together. Stir until creamy and pour over the baked bars. Let cool thoroughly then cut into bars. Garnish with more flaked coconut. Store bars in an airtight container."
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars IV","2 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars IV","1 cup peanut butter",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars IV","1 cup butter, melted",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars IV","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars IV","2 .75 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, stir together graham cracker crumbs, confectioners' sugar, peanut butter and melted butter. Press firmly into the bottom of a 9x13 inch pan. Melt chocolate chips over a double boiler or in the microwave, stirring occasionally. Spread melted chocolate over the crumb crust. Chill for about 5 minutes, then cut into bars before the chocolate is completely set, then chill until ready to serve."
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 ⅛ cups all-purpose flour",
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup light brown sugar",
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Golden Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F ( 190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift together in a large bowl flour, baking soda and salt. To this add sugars, egg, vanilla extract and butter. Beat until smooth and well blended. Stir in nuts and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden colored. Cool on wire rack."
"Peanut Surprise Cookies",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies",".5 cup light brown sugar",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies","1 egg",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies",".67 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies","1 (8.75 ounce) bag chocolate covered creamy caramel candies",
"Peanut Surprise Cookies",".25 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, peanut butter, 1/2 cup white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Cover and chill dough until firm, about 30 minutes."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Roll chilled dough into 1 inch balls. Press a caramel candy into the center of each ball so that it is completely covered with dough. Roll balls in remaining sugar and place 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until set. Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely.Pignoli Cookies I","12 ounces almond paste",
"Pignoli Cookies I",".5 cup white sugar",
"Pignoli Cookies I","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Pignoli Cookies I","4 large egg whites egg whites",
"Pignoli Cookies I","1 .5 cups pine nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line 2 cookie sheets with foil; lightly grease foil."
"Step 2","Mix almond paste and granulated sugar in food processor until smooth. Add confectioners' sugar and 2 egg whites; process until smooth."
"Step 3","Whisk remaining 2 egg whites in small bowl. Place pine nuts on shallow plate. With lightly floured hands, roll dough into 1 inch balls. Coat balls in egg whites, shaking off excess, then roll in pine nuts, pressing lightly to stick. Arrange balls on cookie sheets, and flatten slightly to form a 1 1/2 inch round."
"Step 4","Bake 15 to 18 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned. Let stand on cookie sheet 1 minute. Transfer to wire rack to cool."
"Nut Cookie Tartlets","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Nut Cookie Tartlets","2 (3 ounce) packages cream cheese",
"Nut Cookie Tartlets","1 cup butter",
"Nut Cookie Tartlets","6 tablespoons white sugar",
"Nut Cookie Tartlets","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Nut Cookie Tartlets","1 egg",
"Nut Cookie Tartlets",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Nut Cookie Tartlets","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","To make Pastry: Cream together butter and cream cheese. Add the 6 tablespoons white sugar, 2 cups flour and blend well."
"Step 2","Shape into balls about 1 inch in diameter (flour palms of hands to facilitate rolling). Place ball in greased tartlet pan and flatten. Should fill pan by 3/4."
"Step 3","To Make Filling: Mix together vanilla, egg, brown sugar, and chopped nuts."
"Step 4","After flattening ball in tartlet tin make a thumb print in center and fill with a full 1/2 teaspoon of nut filling."
"Step 5","Bake in a 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 17 to 20 minutes. Cool completely before removing from pan."
"All-Natural No-Bake Cookies","1 cup honey",
"All-Natural No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup coconut oil",
"All-Natural No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup cocoa powder",
"All-Natural No-Bake Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"All-Natural No-Bake Cookies","1 cup natural peanut butter",
"All-Natural No-Bake Cookies","1 cup unsweetened flaked coconut",
"All-Natural No-Bake Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Combine honey, coconut oil, and cocoa powder in a small pot and bring to a boil; cook at a boil for 2 minutes and remove from heat. Stir oats, peanut butter, coconut, and vanilla extract into the hot honey mixture until the peanut butter melts and the mixture is smooth."
"Step 2","Drop mixture by spoonful onto waxed paper. Set aside to cool until firm, about 20 minutes."
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies","1 egg",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies","1 .75 cups granola",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Granola-Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup chopped, unsalted dry-roasted peanuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, salt and baking soda, stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the granola, chocolate chips and peanuts. Drop dough by heaping teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets, about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are lightly browned around edges. Remove cookies to wire racks and allow to cool."
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup brown sugar",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies","⅛ cup honey",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies","⅛ cup butter",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies","⅛ cup natural peanut butter",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 banana, mashed",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies","⅝ cup whole wheat flour",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies","⅛ cup oat bran",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 pinch pumpkin pie spice",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup dried cranberries",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Very Cranberry Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons sunflower seeds",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, mix together the brown sugar, honey, butter and peanut butter until smooth. Stir in the banana and vanilla. Combine the whole wheat flour, oat bran, oats, baking soda, salt and pumpkin pie spice in a separate bowl. Stir the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients until it forms a smooth dough. Mix in the cranberries, chocolate chips and sunflower seeds. Drop by spoonfuls onto an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are lightly browned at the edges."
"Passion Bars","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Passion Bars","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Passion Bars","1 cup brown sugar",
"Passion Bars",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Passion Bars",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Passion Bars",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Passion Bars","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Passion Bars",".75 cup peanut butter",
"Passion Bars","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking pan."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the oats, flour, brown sugar, salt and baking soda. Cut in the butter to form a crumbly mixture. Reserve 1 1/2 cups of the crumbs, and pat the rest evenly into the bottom of the prepared pan. In a medium bowl, stir together the sweetened condensed milk and peanut butter. Spread evenly over the oatmeal layer. Sprinkle the chocolate chips over the peanut butter layer, then crumble the reserved crust over the top."
"Step 3","Bake for 30 to 35 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Cool completely before cutting into bars."
"No Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .75 cups white sugar",
"No Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"No Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup margarine (such as Country Crock®)",
"No Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"No Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","3 cups quick-cooking oats",
"No Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup creamy peanut butter",
"No Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Line a baking sheet with waxed paper."
"Step 2","Bring sugar, milk, margarine, and cocoa powder to a boil in a large saucepan for 1 1/2 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in oats, peanut butter, and vanilla extract until dough is evenly mixed."
"Step 3","Drop tablespoonfuls of dough on prepared baking dish and let rest until cooled and set, about 50 minutes."
"No Bake Chocolate Oat Bars","1 cup butter",
"No Bake Chocolate Oat Bars",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"No Bake Chocolate Oat Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"No Bake Chocolate Oat Bars","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"No Bake Chocolate Oat Bars","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"No Bake Chocolate Oat Bars",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Step 1","Grease a 9x9 inch square pan."
"Step 2","Melt butter in large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in brown sugar and vanilla. Mix in the oats. Cook over low heat 2 to 3 minutes, or until ingredients are well blended. Press half of mixture into the bottom of the prepared pan. Reserve the other half for topping."
"Step 3","Meanwhile, melt chocolate chips and peanut butter in a small heavy saucepan over low heat, stirring frequently until smooth. Pour the chocolate mixture over the crust in the pan, and spread evenly with a knife or the back of a spoon."
"Step 4","Crumble the remaining oat mixture over the chocolate layer, pressing in gently. Cover, and refrigerate 2 to 3 hours or overnight. Bring to room temperature before cutting into bars."
"Forgotten Party Cookies","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Forgotten Party Cookies",".5 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Forgotten Party Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Forgotten Party Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Forgotten Party Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Beat egg whites until stiff."
"Step 3","Add cream of tartar and salt. Beat until stiff."
"Step 4","Add sugar and beat until glossy. Add vanilla (or any flavoring) and any coloring, if desired. Add chocolate chips, nuts or raisins if desired."
"Step 5","Drop on greased sheet. Place in preheated oven and turn heat off. Leave for 4-6 hours or over night. Do not double recipe as oven will not hold the cookies."
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II",".33 cup molasses",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II",".25 cup shortening",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II","2 tablespoons packed brown sugar",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II","1 pinch ground nutmeg",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II","1 dash ground allspice",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Moravian Ginger Cookies II","1 .5 tablespoons half-and-half cream",
"Step 1","Mix molasses, shortening and brown sugar in a large bowl. Stir in flour, salt, baking soda, baking powder, and spices. Cover and refrigerate about 4 hours or until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll half of the dough at a time to 1/8 inch thickness or paper-thin on a floured cloth-covered surface. Cut into 3 inch rounds with floured cutter."
"Step 4","Place about 1/2 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 1/8 inch thick cookies about 8 minutes; paper-thin cookies about 5 minutes or until light brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheet. Cool completely."
"Step 5","To Make Frosting: Mix 1 cup confectioners' sugar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, and 1-2 tablespoons half-and-half until of spreading consistency. Spread frosting on cooled cookies."
"Brooke's Best Bombshell Brownies","1 cup butter, melted",
"Brooke's Best Bombshell Brownies","3 cups white sugar",
"Brooke's Best Bombshell Brownies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Brooke's Best Bombshell Brownies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Brooke's Best Bombshell Brownies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Brooke's Best Bombshell Brownies","1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Brooke's Best Bombshell Brownies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Brooke's Best Bombshell Brownies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13 baking dish."
"Step 2","Combine the melted butter, sugar, and vanilla in a large bowl. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each, until thoroughly blended."
"Step 3","Sift the flour, cocoa powder, and salt in a bowl. Gradually stir flour mixture into the egg mixture until blended. Stir in the chocolate morsels. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared baking dish."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until an inserted toothpick comes out clean, 35 to 40 minutes. Remove, and cool pan on wire rack before cutting."
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon banana extract",
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Banana Nut Cookies","2 cups chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter or margarine with mixer. Blend in whole eggs, sugar, and extract. Add flour, baking soda, and salt. When the ingredients are thoroughly mixed, add oats and pecans. Mix on lower speed until consistent."
"Step 3","Drop pieces of the dough using an ice cream scoop onto an ungreased cookie tray roughly 3 to 4 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake 8 to 10 minutes. Eight minutes would yield crispy cookies with a chewy, slightly doughy center. For harder, crispier cookies, bake longer. Cool on wire rack."
"Grandma Sheets' Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Grandma Sheets' Sugar Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Grandma Sheets' Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Grandma Sheets' Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Grandma Sheets' Sugar Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Grandma Sheets' Sugar Cookies","1 cup milk",
"Grandma Sheets' Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Grandma Sheets' Sugar Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Mix together the sugar, shortening, baking powder and ground nutmeg. Beat the eggs and add to mixture. Combine the milk and baking soda and pour into mixture. Add the flour. You can start out with a good mixer at first but you'll need to switch to hand-mixing when dough gets too thick, adding enough flour so the dough is not too sticky and you can roll it out to about 1/4 inch or so."
"Step 2","Flour counter and rolling pin and top of dough. If it is very humid where you live it may help to refrigerate dough 15 minutes or so and you can also refrigerate the portion of the dough that you're not presently working with. Roll out dough to 1/4 inch. Cut out with any cookie cutter and place on cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for about 8 minutes, or until ever so lightly browned around edges or on bottom. Remove from sheets and cool on flattened grocery bags or wire racks."
"Aunt Sally Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","2 cups shortening",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","1 cup molasses",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","5 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","1 tablespoon ground ginger",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","1 cup sour milk",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Aunt Sally Cookies",".5 teaspoon distilled white vinegar",
"Aunt Sally Cookies",".5 cup water",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","18 regulars large marshmallows",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Aunt Sally Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together 1 cup white sugar and shortening until smooth. Stir in the egg yolks and molasses. Combine the flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and ginger; stir into the molasses mixture alternately with the sour milk. Cover and chill for 30 minutes."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface roll the dough out to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut into rectangular shapes (I like to use a Spam can). Place cookies 1 inch apart onto an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Step 4","To make the frosting, combine 1 1/2 cups sugar, vinegar, water and marshmallows. Mix well and place over a pot of simmering water. when the marshmallows have melted, stir in the egg whites. Remove from heat and beat with an electric mixer for 7 minutes. Stir in the vanilla and confectioners' sugar until well blended. Frost cooled cookies."
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Caramel Nougat Bar Peanut Butter Cookies","36 fun size bars milk chocolate covered caramel and nougat candy",
"Step 1","Cream together white sugar, brown sugar, butter or margarine, vanilla, peanut butter and the egg."
"Step 2","Add in flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt."
"Step 3","Wrap 1 heaping teaspoon of dough around a bite sized milk chocolate covered caramel and nougat candy bar. Bake 13-16 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Let cool 5 minutes before removing from pan."
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","1 egg",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","3 tablespoons boiling water",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","1 tablespoon margarine",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","3 tablespoons boiling water",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Frosted Molasses Ginger Sandwich Cookies","2 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together 1 cup margarine and sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and molasses until well blended. Dissolve the baking soda in boiling water; stir into the molasses mixture. Gradually mix in the flour to make a smooth dough. Cover and chill dough for at least 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/8 inch in thickness. Cut into circles using a 3 inch round cutter. Cut a smaller 1 inch circle out of half of the cookies. It is easier to cut the center hole after the cookies have been placed onto the cookie sheets. Place cookies 1 inch apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 7 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until edges begin to darken. Allow cookies to cool completely before sandwiching. Frost solid cookies and place a cookie with the center hole on top."
"Step 4","To make the frosting: Beat 1 tablespoon of margarine and water together. Blend in the ginger and salt. Gradually beat in the confectioners' sugar until the desired consistency is reached. Sandwich between cooled cookies."
"Arny Cookies","2 cups shortening",
"Arny Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Arny Cookies","5 large eggs eggs",
"Arny Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Arny Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Arny Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Arny Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Arny Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Arny Cookies","1 pound confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 deg. F (180 deg. C)."
"Step 2","Cream together shortening and granulated sugar."
"Step 3","Beat in 4 eggs, then stir in flour, salt and baking soda."
"Step 4","Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls on to ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake at 350 deg. F (180 deg. C) for 10 to 12 minutes."
"Step 6","Prepare frosting by combining melted butter, vanilla, 1 egg, and powdered sugar in a medium bowl. Beat with electric mixer until smooth. Frost cookies when they are cool."
"Back-to-School Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Back-to-School Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Back-to-School Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Back-to-School Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Back-to-School Cookies","3 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Back-to-School Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Back-to-School Cookies",".25 cup heavy cream",
"Back-to-School Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Back-to-School Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar, or as needed",
"Back-to-School Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon juice, or as needed",
"Back-to-School Cookies","assorted food coloring",
"Step 1","Beat white sugar and butter together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Add eggs and vanilla extract and beat until well mixed. Sift together flour, baking powder, and salt and stir into the creamed butter mixture alternately with the heavy cream until dough is evenly mixed. Chill dough in refrigerator, 2 to 3 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Roll cookie dough on a floured work surface. Cut dough into strips about 2 1/2 inches long and about as thick as a pencil, forming one end into a point. Arrange pencils on the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 12 to 14minutes. Transfer parchment paper with cookies to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 5","Mix enough confectioners' sugar and lemon juice together in a bowl to form a thick icing. Divide icing among several small bowls and mix different colors of food coloring into each bowl."
"Step 6","Decorate pencil cookies with colored icing so they look like colored pencils. Allow icing to dry completely."
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons loose-leaf tea, or more to taste",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cardamom",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chai-Spiced Shortbread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Grind tea into a fine powder using a spice grinder. Mix in cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, cloves, salt, and pepper."
"Step 3","Beat butter, sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl using an electric mixer until creamy. Add the spiced tea mixture and mix thoroughly. Fold in flour, 1/2 cup at a time, until a stiff dough forms."
"Step 4","Transfer dough to a lightly floured surface and roll out to 1/4-inch thickness. Cut into 2-inch pieces with a cookie cutter or knife. Arrange cookies on baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges begin to brown slightly, about 20 minutes."
"Gelatin Spritz Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Gelatin Spritz Cookies","1 .5 cups butter",
"Gelatin Spritz Cookies","1 (3 ounce) package fruit flavored Jell-O® mix",
"Gelatin Spritz Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Gelatin Spritz Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Gelatin Spritz Cookies","1 egg",
"Gelatin Spritz Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Cream butter, sugar and gelatin. Add egg and vanilla. Beat well. Gradually add flour and baking powder. Blend until smooth."
"Step 2","Refrigerate dough until firm. (If using a cookie press, no need to refrigerate dough before use.) Roll into balls and press with bottom of glass with sugar. (Use an ungreased cookie sheet). Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 7-10 minutes.Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cinnamon Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cinnamon Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cinnamon Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Cinnamon Sugar Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Cinnamon Sugar Cookies",".75 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cinnamon Sugar Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","2 .5 tablespoons ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt; set aside. In a medium bowl, cream butter with 1/4 cup white sugar and brown sugar. Mix in egg and vanilla. Add the sifted dry ingredients, and mix until well blended. Divide dough into 3 equal portions. Roll into logs 2 inches in diameter, wrap, and refrigerate for 3 to 4 hours. These logs can be frozen for up to 6 weeks."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Mix 1/2 cup sugar and cinnamon on a flat plate or a piece of wax paper. Unwrap dough logs, and roll in the cinnamon mixture. Cut into 1/4 inch slices, and place 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks. Baked cookies can be kept in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks."
"Snowballs II","1 cup butter",
"Snowballs II",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Snowballs II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Snowballs II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Snowballs II","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Snowballs II","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Snowballs II",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for dusting, or as needed",
"Snowballs II",".25 cup finely crushed peppermint candy canes",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream the butter with 1/2 cup of the confectioners' sugar and the vanilla. Mix in the flour, pecans, and salt. Roll about 1 tablespoon or so of dough into balls and place on an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until bottoms are golden, about 15 minutes. Do not allow these cookies to get too brown: it's better to undercook them than to overcook them. While cookies are still hot, roll them in confectioners' sugar. Once they have cooled, roll them in confectioners' sugar once more."
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies",".25 cup butter",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies",".25 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies",".25 cup brown sugar, firmly packed",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies","1 egg",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies","1 ⅛ cups all-purpose flour",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies","1 cup butterscotch chips",
"Coco-Scotcheroo Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut, firmly packed",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat the butter, shortening, brown sugar, and white sugar in a large bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, vanilla extract, and almond extract. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients. Gently stir in the butterscotch chips and coconut. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake until set and lightly browned, about 10 to 12 minutes. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes. Transfer cookies wire racks to cool completely."
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups butter",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","5 cups rolled oats",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups dark chocolate chips",
"George's Chocolate Chip Cookies","12 (1 ounce) squares German sweet chocolate, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla. In a blender or food processor, process the oats until finely chopped. Then, in separate bowl, combine chopped oatmeal, flour, baking powder and baking soda. Add flour mixture to butter mixture. Gradually add the chopped milk chocolate chips and whole chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Roll dough into golf ball size balls. Press with fork. Bake for 6 to 8 minutes. Do not overbake. When they come out of the oven, the cookies will be soft. Place a chocolate chunk in the center."
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon orange extract",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon orange zest",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies","1 cup cornmeal",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Cornmeal Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Step 1","in a medium bowl, cream sugar and butter until fluffy. Add egg yolks, vanilla, orange extract, and orange zest. Cream well. Sift together the flour, cornmeal, and salt, and stir into the creamed mixture. Refrigerate dough until firm. For refrigerator cookies, roll dough into logs before refrigerating."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll out cookie dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut out cookies with a cookie cutter and place on ungreased cookie sheets. For refrigerator cookies, slice logs into 1/4 inch slices. Sprinkle cookies with sugar and ground nutmeg. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Edges should be golden brown. Remove cookies from pan to cool on a wire rack."
"Chocolate Rainbow Cookie Bars","2 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Chocolate Rainbow Cookie Bars",".33 cup melted butter",
"Chocolate Rainbow Cookie Bars","1 (12.5 ounce) can chocolate sweetened condensed milk",
"Chocolate Rainbow Cookie Bars","2 cups mini candy-coated chocolates",
"Chocolate Rainbow Cookie Bars","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Chocolate Rainbow Cookie Bars","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","In a small bowl, combine the graham cracker crumbs and butter. Press into the bottom of the prepared baking pan. Pour the condensed milk over the crumbs as evenly as possible. Sprinkle the candies, coconut and nuts over the milk, press in lightly."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes. Cool before cutting into bars."
"Coconut Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Coconut Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Coconut Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Coconut Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Coconut Rolled Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Coconut Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 cup finely chopped red and green candied cherries",
"Coconut Rolled Sugar Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Coconut Rolled Sugar Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","In mixing bowl beat butter or margarine until softened. Add the sugar and beat until fluffy. Add the milk and vanilla and mix well."
"Step 2","Add the flour and beat until well mixed. Stir in the cherries and pecans."
"Step 3","Shape into three 7-inch long rolls. Roll in the coconut to coat."
"Step 4","Wrap in plastic wrap and chill for several hours or overnight."
"Step 5","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F."
"Step 6","Cut rolls into 1/4-inch slices and place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake about 12 minutes or until done. Remove to a wire rack and cool."
"Refrigerator Cookies II",".5 cup shortening",
"Refrigerator Cookies II","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Refrigerator Cookies II","1 egg",
"Refrigerator Cookies II",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Refrigerator Cookies II","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Refrigerator Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Refrigerator Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Mix shortening, sugar, egg and vanilla thoroughly. Blend flour, soda and salt; stir in."
"Step 2","Form into roll 2 1/2 across. Wrap in waxed paper. Chill until firm."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 4","With a thin sharp knife, slice 1/8 inch thick. Place a little apart on ungreased baking sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes."
"Venice High School Cherry Butter Cookies","2 cups butter, softened",
"Venice High School Cherry Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Venice High School Cherry Butter Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Venice High School Cherry Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Venice High School Cherry Butter Cookies","4 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Venice High School Cherry Butter Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Venice High School Cherry Butter Cookies",".5 cup chopped maraschino cherries",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the butter, vanilla and confectioners' sugar until smooth. Mix in salt, then stir in flour by hand until dough is stiff. Add the walnuts and cherries, and mix into the dough, kneading like bread on a clean floured surface."
"Step 3","Roll dough into ping pong sized balls, and place onto ungreased cookie sheets. Press down balls with a fork to make a criss cross pattern on top."
"Step 4","Bake for 15 to 17 minutes in the preheated oven. Let stand on the baking sheet for a few minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Surprise Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Surprise Cookies",".5 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"Surprise Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Surprise Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Surprise Cookies","1 egg",
"Surprise Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Surprise Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Surprise Cookies","42 piece (0.2 oz)s chocolate-covered caramel candies",
"Step 1","Beat butter or margarine, peanut butter, 1/2 cup granulated sugar and brown sugar together until fluffy. Beat in egg. Sift flour and baking powder together; stir into butter mixture. Chill dough thoroughly, 2 to 3 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll dough into 1-inch balls. Press a chocolate-covered caramel into the middle of each ball. Roll dough around it. Roll each ball in granulated sugar. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden brown. Let cool 2-3 minutes, then remove from cookie sheets."
"Lavender and Citrus Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Lavender and Citrus Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Lavender and Citrus Sugar Cookies","1 extra large egg",
"Lavender and Citrus Sugar Cookies","1 extra large egg yolk",
"Lavender and Citrus Sugar Cookies","3 .5 teaspoons finely grated lemon zest",
"Lavender and Citrus Sugar Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons crushed dried lavender flowers",
"Lavender and Citrus Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Lavender and Citrus Sugar Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Beat butter and sugar in the work bowl of a stand mixer until mixture is creamy; beat egg, egg yolk, lemon zest, lavender, and vanilla extract into butter-sugar mixture at low speed. Beat flour into moist ingredients, 1 cup at a time, to make a workable dough. Form dough into a ball, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate for 3 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll dough out on a floured work surface to a thickness of about 1/8 inch. Cut dough into shapes using cookie cutters and place cookies onto baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until firm, 9 to 10 minutes. Allow cookies to cool on sheets for 2 to 5 minutes before transferring to wire racks to finish cooling."
"Peppermint Hot Cocoa Cookies","1 roll Pillsbury® refrigerated sugar cookie dough",
"Peppermint Hot Cocoa Cookies","3 tablespoons unsweetened baking cocoa",
"Peppermint Hot Cocoa Cookies","1 cup marshmallow creme",
"Peppermint Hot Cocoa Cookies",".33 cup crushed peppermint candies",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F. In medium bowl, break apart cookie dough. Knead in baking cocoa until thoroughly combined."
"Step 2","Shape dough into 20 (1 1/2-inch) balls. Place on ungreased cookie sheets, and press down slightly with fingers. Bake 10 to 13 minutes or until centers of cookies are set; cool 2 minutes on pans. Transfer to cooling racks to cool completely, about 15 minutes."
"Step 3","Meanwhile, with spatula sprayed with cooking spray, transfer marshmallow creme to microwavable cup sprayed with cooking spray. Microwave uncovered on Medium (50%) 60 to 90 seconds or until melted. Cool slightly, then transfer to resealable food-storage plastic bag."
"Step 4","Cut 1/8 inch from 1 corner of bag, then drizzle cookies with marshmallow creme, and sprinkle with crushed peppermint candies. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes but no longer than 12 hours before serving."
"Brown Rim Cookies","2 cups butter flavored shortening",
"Brown Rim Cookies","1 .33 cups white sugar",
"Brown Rim Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Brown Rim Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Brown Rim Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Brown Rim Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until well blended. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. When cookies have cooled, turn them over and look at the bottom to see the brown rim."
"Peanut Butter Cookies VIII","1 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VIII",".33 cup water",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VIII","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VIII","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the peanut butter, water and eggs until smooth and well blended. Stir in the cake mix. Use your hands if necessary to blend thoroughly. Roll into walnut sized balls or drop by spoonfuls 3 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Press each cookie down using a floured fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 teaspoon salt",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 cup butter",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze",".75 cup white sugar",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze",".75 cup brown sugar, packed",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","2 large eggs eggs",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 cup rolled oats",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Ocean Spray® Craisins®)",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze",".5 cup freshly squeezed orange juice",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 orange, zested",
"Crazy Yummy Cranberry Pecan Cookies with Orange Glaze","1 tablespoon butter",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift the flour, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat together the butter, white and brown sugars, and vanilla extract with an electric mixer until the mixture is creamy and well blended. Beat in eggs, one at a time, and then gradually beat in the flour just until the mixture makes a soft dough. Stir in the pecans, rolled oats, and cranberries, and drop by heaping spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are set and the edges are slightly brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Let the cookies cool for 1 minute on baking sheets before removing to wire racks to finish cooling. Glaze cookies while still a little warm."
"Step 4","Place the confectioners' sugar and orange juice in a microwave-safe bowl, and stir to dissolve the sugar. Stir in the orange zest and butter, and microwave on medium power until the butter melts and the mixture is warm, about 30 seconds. Stir the warm glaze until smooth, and drizzle over cookies."
"The Best Brown Butter Salted Rice Krispies® Treats",".5 cup butter",
"The Best Brown Butter Salted Rice Krispies® Treats","1 (16 ounce) package miniature marshmallows",
"The Best Brown Butter Salted Rice Krispies® Treats","2 tablespoons bourbon",
"The Best Brown Butter Salted Rice Krispies® Treats","1 teaspoon sea salt",
"The Best Brown Butter Salted Rice Krispies® Treats","8 cups crispy rice cereal (such as Rice Krispies®)",
"The Best Brown Butter Salted Rice Krispies® Treats","1 pinch flaked sea salt (such as Maldon®)",
"Step 1","Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly, until golden brown and has a nutty aroma, about 5 minutes. Add marshmallows to browned butter, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook, stirring occasionally, until marshmallows are melted, 3 to 4 minutes."
"Step 2","Stir bourbon and 1 teaspoon sea salt into marshmallow mixture and remove saucepan from heat. Add rice cereal to marshmallow mixture and mix until cereal is evenly coated with marshmallow mixture; transfer to a 9x13-inch baking dish."
"Step 3","Place a sheet of parchment paper over rice cereal mixture and press into dish. Remove parchment paper and sprinkle flaked sea salt over the top. Cool treats to room temperature, at least 30 minutes."
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Robin's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup chopped dry roasted peanuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the vanilla and peanut butter. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Finally, fold in the chopped peanuts. Roll dough into walnut sized balls, place onto an unprepared cookie sheet, and press down slightly with a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies",".75 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Oatmeal Cherry Walnut Cookies","1 cup dried cherries",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a mixer bowl, combine the white sugar, brown sugar and shortening. Beat until smooth and creamy. Add the eggs one at a time mixing well after each one. Beat mixture until well combined."
"Step 3","Mix in the milk, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon and vanilla to the egg mixture. Beat for one minute. Add the flour and mix until incorporated. Add the walnuts and mix again. Add the oats one cup at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in the dried tart cherries and mix just until they are distributed evenly."
"Step 4","Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of batter about 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Do not shape them, they will spread evenly during the baking process. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 to 13 minutes. The tops of the cookies should just turn a light golden brown. Remove the cookies from the oven and let sit on the sheets for about 5 minutes before moving the cookies to cooling racks. Let cookies cool to room temperature than place in airtight containers for storage."
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies","Crisco® Original No-Stick Cooking Spray",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies",".5 cup Crisco® Baking Sticks All-Vegetable Shortening",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies","1 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies","1 .75 cups Pillsbury BEST® All Purpose Flour",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies","2 .5 cups prepared granola",
"Chocolate Chip Granola Cookies","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Coat baking sheets with no-stick cooking spray."
"Step 2","Beat shortening and brown sugar in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until creamy. Beat in eggs, milk and vanilla. Combine flour, salt and baking soda in medium bowl. Add to egg mixture. Mix well. Stir in granola and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 9 to 10 minutes or until bottoms are lightly browned. Cool 2 minutes. Remove to wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake","1 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake",".67 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake","4 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake","2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips, divided",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 10 1/2x15 1/2-inch baking pan and line with waxed paper."
"Step 2","Beat 1 cup butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; add eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition until smooth. Mix 2 teaspoons vanilla extract and salt into creamed butter mixture. Gradually stir flour into creamed butter until just incorporated; fold 1 cup chocolate chips into batter. Spread batter into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned on the edges, 20 to 25 minutes. Remove from oven and cool completely."
"Step 4","Melt remaining 1 cup chocolate chips in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching. Beat confectioners' sugar and 3/4 cup butter together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth; add melted chocolate and 2 teaspoons vanilla extract and mix until frosting is smooth. Spread frosting over cooled cookie cake.Salted Chocolate Cookies","nonstick cooking spray",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon sea salt",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup butter, cut into chunks",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies",".67 cup brown sugar",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Salted Chocolate Cookies","1 tablespoon sea salt, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper and spray with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Combine flour, cocoa powder, baking powder and 1/2 teaspoon sea salt in a bowl."
"Step 3","Place butter in a saucepan over low heat and cook until melted, 3 to 5 minutes. Add chocolate chips and stir until completely melted. Remove from the heat."
"Step 4","Combine brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract in a bowl and beat with an electric mixer until creamy. Pour a small amount of the chocolate mixture into the egg mixture and stir until well combined. Slowly add remaining chocolate mixture, stirring constantly so the eggs don't curdle. Fold in the flour mixture until just combined. Do not overmix."
"Step 5","Drop 6 large scoops of batter about 2 inches apart onto each of the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies have spread and flattened to a diameter of 4 1/2 inches or larger, and the tops are crinkled and puffed, 12 to 14 minutes. Immediately sprinkle with sea salt."
"Step 7","Place baking sheets on a wire rack and cool for 18 to 20 minutes. Remove cookies with a spatula onto serving platter."
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies",".33 cup buttermilk",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Drop Cookies",".75 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon; stir in the oats and set aside. Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until light. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Stir in the flour mixture alternately with the buttermilk. Fold in the raisins and walnuts. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Apricot Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Apricot Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Apricot Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Apricot Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Apricot Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Apricot Cookies","1 egg",
"Apricot Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Apricot Cookies","1 cup apricot preserves",
"Apricot Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream the butter and sugar in a medium size mixing bowl. Mix flour, baking powder, salt, egg and vanilla extract into the butter-sugar mixture. Cool dough in the refrigerator for 1 hour."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface roll dough out to 1/4 inch thick. Cut the dough into rounds with a round cookie cutter or glass. Using the tip of a teaspoon place a small drop of apricot preserves into the middle of the circle. Brush edges with water and fold the dough over so that the cookie is in the shape of a half moon; seal edges Arrange on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 12 minutes, or until golden brown. Dust the cookies with powdered sugar while still hot."
"Royal Coconut Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Royal Coconut Cookies","2 cups flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Sift the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt together into a bowl."
"Step 3","Cream the butter and the sugar together. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Add the flour mixture and beat until smooth, about 2 minutes. Stir in the oats and flaked coconut."
"Step 4","Shape dough into 1 inch balls and place on the prepared baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 to 15 minutes."
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies","2 tablespoons water",
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Wafer Cookies","45 piece (blank)s chocolate covered thin mints",
"Step 1","Sift together flour, baking soda and salt. Set aside."
"Step 2","Cream butter or margarine with white and brown sugars. Blend and beat well. Add eggs and water. Stir in vanilla. Add dry ingredients and mix thoroughly."
"Step 3","Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 5","Enclose 1 chocolate mint wafer in 1 tablespoon of chilled dough. Bake on greased cookie sheet for 10-12 minutes."
"Mountain Cookies II","1 cup butter",
"Mountain Cookies II","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Mountain Cookies II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mountain Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mountain Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mountain Cookies II","1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Mountain Cookies II","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Mountain Cookies II","2 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Mountain Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mountain Cookies II",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Mountain Cookies II",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Mountain Cookies II",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Mountain Cookies II","2 tablespoons water",
"Mountain Cookies II",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Mountain Cookies II","2 tablespoons butter",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","To Make Dough: In a mixing bowl, cream 1 cup butter, 1 cup confectioner's sugar and 2 teaspoons vanilla. Combine 2 cups flour and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Gradually add to the creamed mixture and mix well."
"Step 3","Shape into 1 inch balls; place 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Make a deep indentation in the center of each cookie."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until the edges just start to brown. Remove to wire racks to cool completely."
"Step 5","To Make Filling: Beat cream cheese, 1 cup confectioner's sugar, 2 tablespoons flour, and 1 teaspoon vanilla in a mixing bowl. Add pecans and coconut; mix well."
"Step 6","Spoon 1/2 teaspoon of the filling into each cookie."
"Step 7","To Make Topping: Heat chocolate chips, 2 tablespoons butter or margarine and water in a small saucepan until melted. Stir in 1/2 cup confectioner's sugar. Drizzle over cookies."
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II",".5 cup margarine",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II","1 egg",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II",".25 cup milk",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II","18 regulars large marshmallows",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II","3 tablespoons margarine, softened",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies II","1 .5 tablespoons heavy whipping cream",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt and cocoa, set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the vanilla and milk. Gradually stir in the dry ingredients until well blended. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 minutes in the preheated oven. Cut the large marshmallows into halves. When the cookies come out of the oven, press one piece of marshmallow into the top of each one. Return the cookies to the hot oven for an additional 2 minutes. Cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Step 4","In a medium bowl, combine the confectioners' sugar, cocoa and salt. Beat in the softened margarine and heavy cream until icing is smooth. Frost cooled cookies."
"No Bake Cookies VI","2 cups white sugar",
"No Bake Cookies VI",".5 teaspoon salt",
"No Bake Cookies VI",".5 cup butter",
"No Bake Cookies VI",".5 cup milk",
"No Bake Cookies VI",".5 cup peanut butter",
"No Bake Cookies VI","3 cups rolled oats",
"No Bake Cookies VI","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"No Bake Cookies VI",".5 cup powdered chocolate drink mix",
"Step 1","In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, combine the sugar, salt, butter and milk. Bring to a boil, then boil for 1 full minute. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate drink mix. Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let stand until completely cool. Have a wonderful day!!!"
"Mom's Island Treasures","1 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mom's Island Treasures",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Mom's Island Treasures",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mom's Island Treasures",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mom's Island Treasures","⅞ cup butter, softened",
"Mom's Island Treasures",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mom's Island Treasures",".33 cup white sugar",
"Mom's Island Treasures","1 egg",
"Mom's Island Treasures","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mom's Island Treasures","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Mom's Island Treasures","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Mom's Island Treasures","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in the egg then stir in the vanilla. Gradually mix in the dry ingredients. Mix in the chocolate chips, coconut and pecans. Roll dough into 1 inch balls and place the cookies 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Earl Grey Cookies","1 cup butter, room temperature",
"Chocolate Earl Grey Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Earl Grey Cookies","2 .5 tablespoons Earl Grey tea, finely ground in a coffee grinder",
"Chocolate Earl Grey Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Earl Grey Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Earl Grey Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Earl Grey Cookies",".67 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Earl Grey Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together butter, sugar, and tea. Beat in vanilla, then eggs, one at a time until incorporated. Sift together flour, cocoa powder, and baking powder; fold into egg mixture until just mixed."
"Step 3","Drop cookies by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven for 8 minutes."
"Pudding Chocolate Chippers","1 cup shortening",
"Pudding Chocolate Chippers","1 cup white sugar",
"Pudding Chocolate Chippers",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Pudding Chocolate Chippers","1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Pudding Chocolate Chippers","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pudding Chocolate Chippers","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pudding Chocolate Chippers","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pudding Chocolate Chippers",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Pudding Chocolate Chippers","12 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixing bowl cream the shortening with the white and brown sugars. Stir in the instant vanilla pudding mix. Lightly beat the eggs then add them to the creamed mixture. Mix well."
"Step 3","Sift the flour, baking soda and salt together. Add the flour mixture to the egg mixture. Mix until combined. Stir in the chocolate chips. Drop teaspoonfuls of the dough onto ungreased cookie sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes or until done."
"Chocolate Protein Balls","1 cup rolled oats",
"Chocolate Protein Balls",".5 cup natural peanut butter",
"Chocolate Protein Balls",".33 cup honey",
"Chocolate Protein Balls",".25 cup chopped dark chocolate",
"Chocolate Protein Balls","2 tablespoons flax seeds",
"Chocolate Protein Balls","2 tablespoons chia seeds",
"Chocolate Protein Balls","1 tablespoon chocolate-flavored protein powder, or to taste",
"Step 1","Stir oats, peanut butter, honey, chocolate, flax seeds, chia seeds, and protein powder together in a bowl until evenly mixed. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes."
"Step 2","Scoop chilled mixture into balls. Keep cold until serving."
"Graham Cracker Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Graham Cracker Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Graham Cracker Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Graham Cracker Cookies","1 egg",
"Graham Cracker Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Graham Cracker Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Graham Cracker Cookies","1 cup graham cracker crumbs",
"Graham Cracker Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Graham Cracker Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Graham Cracker Cookies",".75 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Graham Cracker Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Graham Cracker Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Beat together margarine and sugars until light and fluffy. Blend in egg and vanilla. Add combined flour, graham cracker crumbs, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips , M & M's, and nuts."
