"Step 2","Drop dough by heaping tablespoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets about 3 inches apart . Press 2 or 3 additional M & M candies on top of cookies if desired."
"Step 3","Bake in pre-heated oven 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8-10 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on sheet about 3 minute and remove to wire racks."
"Double Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package moist yellow cake mix",
"Double Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Double Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Double Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Double Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Double Nut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup sliced almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Melt the butter in a sauce pan over low heat. Pour into bowl and combine with cake mix and egg. Beat on low with an electric mixer until blended."
"Step 3","Stir in chocolate chips, pecans and 1/4 cup of almonds."
"Step 4","Shape dough into balls. Press top of ball in remaining almonds."
"Step 5","Bake for 9-11 minutes or until lightly browned."
"Poinsettia Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Poinsettia Cookies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Poinsettia Cookies","1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Poinsettia Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Poinsettia Cookies","1 egg",
"Poinsettia Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Poinsettia Cookies","1 teaspoon red food coloring",
"Poinsettia Cookies","1 cup red decorator sugar",
"Poinsettia Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar, sifted",
"Poinsettia Cookies","2 teaspoons water",
"Poinsettia Cookies","1 drop yellow food coloring",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with aluminum foil or parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, sugar and cream cheese until light and fluffy using an electric mixer. Add egg and vanilla; mix until well blended. Stir in flour by hand using a sturdy spoon while adding enough red food coloring to make the dough turn a pretty red color."
"Step 3","Roll the balls in the red decorator sugar and place them on the prepared cookie sheets, spacing 1 inch apart. Refrigerate the cookies on their cookie sheets until firm, about 10 minutes."
"Step 4","When the cookies are firm, make three slices across each cookie to make 6 slices like a pie, cutting only about 2/3 of the way through the cookie balls."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes, until cookies appear dry. Cool on the cookie sheets, then peel away from the aluminum foil."
"Step 6","Make the icing for the cookies by mixing the confectioners' sugar and water until it reaches a piping consistency. Add a drop of yellow food coloring. Put icing into a pastry bag or resealable bag and cut a small piece off of the corner. Pipe small dots onto the center of the cookies. Allow icing to dry before storing cookies in an airtight container at room temperature. Cookies can be stored for up to two weeks."
"Holly Berry Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Holly Berry Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Holly Berry Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Holly Berry Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Holly Berry Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Holly Berry Cookies",".5 cup butter, chilled",
"Holly Berry Cookies","1 egg",
"Holly Berry Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Holly Berry Cookies",".67 cup seedless raspberry jam",
"Holly Berry Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Holly Berry Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Holly Berry Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Holly Berry Cookies",".25 cup cinnamon red hot candies",
"Holly Berry Cookies","4 drops green food coloring",
"Step 1","In a large bowl combine the flour, white sugar, ground cinnamon, baking powder and salt. Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. In a small bowl beat the egg and 1/4 cup of milk. Add this to the crumb mixture until the dough is moistened. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface roll out the dough to 1/8 inch thick. Cut with a 2 inch round cookie cutter. Place on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cool on wire racks. Once cool spread jam on half of the cookies then top each with another cookie."
"Step 5","To Make Glaze: Combine the confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons milk and vanilla until smooth. Spread glaze over the cookie and decorate with red cinnamon candy before the glaze is set. Let dry. Using a small new paintbrush and green food coloring, paint holly leaves on cookies."
"Cookie Press Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups unsalted butter, softened",
"Cookie Press Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Cookie Press Butter Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Cookie Press Butter Cookies","2 tablespoons water",
"Cookie Press Butter Cookies","3 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cookie Press Butter Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Cookie Press Butter Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Cookie Press Butter Cookies","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Cookie Press Butter Cookies","2 tablespoons water",
"Step 1","Cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Mix in the egg yolks, 2 tablespoons water, flour, salt and vanilla. Chill the dough."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Fill the cookie press and shape the cookies on an ungreased baking sheet. Brush the top of each cookie with the egg whites mixed with 2 tablespoons of the water. Decorate as desired."
"Step 4","Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) until the cookies are golden brown on top, about 10 minutes."
"Chocolate Scotcheroo Bars","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Scotcheroo Bars","1 cup light corn syrup",
"Chocolate Scotcheroo Bars","1 cup peanut butter",
"Chocolate Scotcheroo Bars","6 cups crispy rice cereal",
"Chocolate Scotcheroo Bars","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Scotcheroo Bars","1 cup butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","Butter a 9x13 inch baking pan."
"Step 2","In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the sugar and corn syrup, and bring to a rolling boil. Remove from heat, and stir in peanut butter. Mix in the rice cereal until evenly coated. Press the mixture into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","In a glass bowl in the microwave, melt the chocolate and butterscotch chips, stirring occasionally until smooth and well blended. Spread over the top of the bars. Chill until set, then cut into bars."
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 cup wheat germ",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","2 cups chopped pecans",
"Momma's Wheat Germ Cookies","1 cup chopped pitted dates",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs, one at a time then stir in the vanilla. In a separate bowl, combine the oats, wheat germ, flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Stir the dry ingredients into the creamed mixture. Finally, mix in the coconut, pecans and dates. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for a couple minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"No Bake Chocolate Cookies II","2 cups white sugar",
"No Bake Chocolate Cookies II",".5 cup milk",
"No Bake Chocolate Cookies II",".5 cup margarine",

"No Bake Chocolate Cookies II",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","In a saucepan over medium heat, combine sugar, milk, and margarine. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally, then boil for 4 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in the oats, vanilla, cocoa and coconut. Spoon onto waxed paper and allow to cool for at least an hour. Store in an airtight container.Ricotta Cookies II",".5 pound butter",
"Ricotta Cookies II","1 .75 cups white sugar",

"Ricotta Cookies II","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Ricotta Cookies II","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ricotta Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Ricotta Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Ricotta Cookies II","5 tablespoons milk",
"Ricotta Cookies II","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Ricotta Cookies II","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Ricotta Cookies II",".25 cup colored candy sprinkles",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together butter, sugar, eggs, ricotta cheese, and vanilla extract. Combine the flour, baking powder, and baking soda; blend into the creamed mixture, mixing in additional flour as necessary to form a workable dough. Roll dough into teaspoon-sized balls, and arrange on an ungreased cookie sheet."

"Sugar Cookies IV","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Sugar Cookies IV","1 cup butter",
"Sugar Cookies IV","1 egg",
"Sugar Cookies IV","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Sugar Cookies IV","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookies IV","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sugar Cookies IV","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Sugar Cookies IV",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Mix confectioners' sugar, butter or margarine, egg, vanilla and almond extract. Stir in flour, baking soda and cream of tartar."
"Step 2","Roll into big ball and wrap in plastic wrap and let chill for at least 3 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Divide dough into halves. Roll each half 3/16 inch thick on lightly floured board. Cut desired shapes with 2 to 2 1/2 inch cookie cutters. Sprinkle with granulated sugar. Place on lightly greased cookie sheets. Bake until edges are a light brown, 6 - 8 minutes."
"Cocoa Kiss Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cocoa Kiss Cookies",".66 cup white sugar",
"Cocoa Kiss Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cocoa Kiss Cookies","1.66 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cocoa Kiss Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Cocoa Kiss Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Cocoa Kiss Cookies","1 (9 ounce) bag milk chocolate candy kisses",
"Cocoa Kiss Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour and cocoa, add to the flour mixture, mix until all of the flour is absorbed. Finally, stir in the pecans. Cover and refrigerate dough for at least 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Unwrap chocolate kisses. Mold about 1 tablespoon of dough around each chocolate kiss. Place 1 1/2 inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until set. Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. Roll cooled cookies in confectioners' sugar."
"Cookie Balls","1 pound chocolate sandwich cookies, crushed",
"Cookie Balls","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Cookie Balls","1 pound vanilla-flavored candy coating, melted",
"Step 1","In a large mixing bowl, combine crushed cookies and cream cheese to form a stiff dough. Roll into balls and dip with a fork in melted candy coating. Let rest on waxed paper until set."
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies II","2 cups white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 cup evaporated milk",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies II",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies II","2 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","In a medium saucepan, put together the sugar, evaporated milk, cocoa powder, and butter; bring to a boil while stirring. Boil for 1 minute; remove from heat. Stir in the peanut butter and rolled oats. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper. Cool and serve."
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","1 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup powdered sugar",
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon hazelnut extract or vanilla extract*",
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","1 egg",
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup mini semisweet chocolate chips",
"Double Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread, almond butter, or peanut butter, or more as needed",
"Step 1","Line two cookie sheets with Reynolds® Parchment Paper; set aside."
"Step 2","Stir together flour, cocoa powder, and salt in a medium bowl; set aside. In a large bowl beat butter using an electric mixer on medium to high speed for 30 seconds. Add powdered sugar and hazelnut extract. Beat until combined, scraping sides of bowl occasionally. Beat in egg until combined. Beat in as much of the flour mixture as you can with the mixer. Using a wooden spoon, stir in any remaining flour mixture and the chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Cover and chill about 1 hour or until dough is easy to handle."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Place balls 2 inches apart onto prepared cookie sheets. Place a sheet of parchment paper over the dough balls. Using the bottom of a glass, flatten balls into circles, about 1 1/2 inches in diameter. Remove top sheet of parchment paper; set aside."
"Step 5","Bake 8 to 10 minutes or just until tops are firm. Transfer the cookies on the parchment paper to a wire rack; cool completely."
"Step 6","Spread a rounded teaspoon of the chocolate hazelnut spread onto flat side of half of the cookies. Top with the remaining cookies."
"Prize Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Prize Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Prize Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Prize Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Prize Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Prize Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Prize Cookies","1 (9 ounce) package condensed mincemeat, crumbled",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar until fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the mincemeat."
"Step 3","Drop dough by teaspoons onto the prepared baking sheets. Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking pans to cool on wire racks."
"Easy Chocolate Cookies","1 (19.8 ounce) package brownie mix",
"Easy Chocolate Cookies","1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix",
"Easy Chocolate Cookies","⅜ cup vegetable oil",
"Easy Chocolate Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the brownie mix and dry instant pudding. Add the oil and eggs; mix until well blended. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Place the cookies 2 inches apart onto the cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 6 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm. I think they are best if removed when the middle is still soft. Cool on cookie sheets for 1 minute before removing to wire racks."
"Healthier No Bake Cookies I","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Healthier No Bake Cookies I",".5 cup low-fat (1%) milk",
"Healthier No Bake Cookies I",".5 cup butter",
"Healthier No Bake Cookies I","4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Healthier No Bake Cookies I",".5 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"Healthier No Bake Cookies I","3 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Healthier No Bake Cookies I",".5 cup unsweetened coconut",
"Healthier No Bake Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Combine sugar, milk, butter, and cocoa in a saucepan. Bring to a boil and cook until sugar dissolves, about 1 1/2 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter, oats, coconut, and vanilla extract. Roll dough into walnut-sized balls and place on waxed paper. Let cool until hardened."
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","1 .75 cups sugar, divided",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans, toasted",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies",".67 cup butter, softened",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","8 cups powdered sugar, divided, or more as needed",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies",".25 cup milk, plus more as needed",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Snickerdoodle Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Line two cookie sheets with Reynolds® Parchment Paper."
"Step 2","Beat the butter with an electric mixer on medium to high speed for 30 seconds in a large mixing bowl. Add 1 1/2 cups sugar, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt. Beat until combined, scraping the sides of the bowl occasionally. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition just until combined. Beat in the vanilla. Beat in as much of the flour as you can with the mixer. Using a wooden spoon, stir in any remaining flour and the pecans. Cover and chill about 1 hour or until the dough is easy to handle."
"Step 3","Combine 1/4 cup sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a small bowl."
"Step 4","Shape dough into 1 1/2-inch balls. Roll the balls in the sugar mixture to coat. Arrange 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets. Flatten the dough balls slightly."
"Step 5","Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are firm and bottoms are very light brown. Let cool on the cookie sheets for 2 minutes. Slide the parchment paper with baked cookies on it to wire racks and let cool completely. Once cooled, slide the parchment paper onto a work surface."
"Step 6","Spread Cinnamon Buttercream Frosting onto the flat side of half of the cookies. Top with remaining cookies, flat-sides down."
"Step 7","Cinnamon Buttercream Frosting: Beat butter with an electric mixer on medium speed in a large mixing bowl until smooth. Add 2 cups powdered sugar, beating well. Beat in 1/4 cup milk, cinnamon, and vanilla. Gradually beat in 6 cups more powdered sugar. Beat in 2 to 4 teaspoons more milk until the frosting is of spreading consistency."
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 eaches eggs",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Nutella® Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup rainbow chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk both flours and baking soda together in a medium bowl."
"Step 3","Cream the brown sugar, chocolate-hazelnut spread, butter, and white sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer. Beat in eggs and vanilla."
"Step 4","Add the flour mixture to the butter mixture; stir until a stiff dough forms. Mix in chocolate chips and rainbow chocolate chips."
"Step 5","Roll dough into 2-inch balls. Place 1 to 2 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies have risen, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 5 to 10 minutes; cookies will firm up as they cool. Remove to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Basic Chocolate Drop Cookies",".25 cup sifted cocoa",
"Basic Chocolate Drop Cookies","2 cups Basic Cookie Mix",
"Basic Chocolate Drop Cookies","1 egg",
"Basic Chocolate Drop Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Basic Chocolate Drop Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Basic Chocolate Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift cocoa into Basic Cookie Mix. Beat egg lightly and stir into mixture. Melt butter over low heat and stir into mixture. Add water and vanilla and mix well. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven."
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".5 cup canola oil",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".75 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".5 cup egg substitute",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X","1 teaspoon water",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".25 cup oat bran",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".25 cup wheat germ",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".75 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Raisin Cookies X",".75 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, oil, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg substitute, vanilla and water. Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the oats, oat bran, wheat germ, raisins and walnuts. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 18 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Toffee Crunch Cookies","1 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Toffee Crunch Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Toffee Crunch Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Toffee Crunch Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Toffee Crunch Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Toffee Crunch Cookies","1 egg",
"Toffee Crunch Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Toffee Crunch Cookies","2 cups toffee baking bits",
"Toffee Crunch Cookies",".33 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Combine and sift flour, baking soda, and salt. In a separate bowl, cream butter or margarine. Add sugar, egg, and vanilla; mix until smooth and creamy."
"Step 2","Stir in dry ingredients; blend in toffee bits and pecans."
"Step 3","Drop tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto greased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until done, 12 to 15 minutes. Remove from baking sheets and cool."
"Italian Chocolate Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies","4 teaspoons baking powder",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies",".33 cup milk",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies","2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies","1 tablespoon butter, softened",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Italian Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup hot milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift 3 cups flour twice. In a large bowl, mix flour, baking powder, white sugar and cocoa. Cream 1 cup butter or margarine; blend into flour mixture. Add 1/3 cup milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla and nuts. Mix thoroughly with hands until well blended. (Dough should be the consistency of pie crust, but not sticky.)"
"Step 3","For each cookie, pinch off about 1 teaspoon dough. Roll by hands into balls, each about one-inch in diameter. Place on greased baking sheets. Do not flatten. Bake about 10 minutes, until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheets; cool on racks. When cool, drizzle each generously with chocolate frosting. Sprinkle with candy sprinkles if desired."
"Step 4","To make Chocolate Frosting: Melt the chocolate squares over low heat. Cream with 1 tablespoon of butter or margarine, 1 teaspoon vanilla and 2 cups of confectioner's sugar. Gradually add hot milk, beating until smooth."
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground nutmeg",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies",".5 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","1 cup butter-flavored spread",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","2 tablespoons sour cream",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","1 tablespoon olive oil",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons almond extract",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","1 tablespoon amaretto liqueur",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons bourbon",
"Almondy Warmth Cookies",".5 cup chopped almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a cookie sheet. Sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a medium bowl. Set aside."
"Step 2","Cream together brown sugar, white sugar, and vegetable oil spread in a medium bowl. Stir in sour cream, olive oil, almond extract, amaretto and bourbon, blending well after each addition."
"Step 3","Gradually stir flour mixture into sugar mixture until well blended. Stir in almonds if desired. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake until just crisp around the edges, 12 to 14 minutes."
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint",".75 cup sugar",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint","2 teaspoons pure vanilla extract",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint","1 cup bittersweet chocolate chips",
"Double Chocolate Chip Cookies with Peppermint",".5 cup coarsely chopped soft peppermint candy",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a small bowl, stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. In a large bowl, stir together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until creamy and smooth. Stir in vanilla; then stir in eggs one at a time, stirring until the mixture is creamy and well incorporated. Gradually stir in the flour, 1/2 cup at a time, mixing well between each addition. Stir in the semi-sweet chips, then the bittersweet chips. Mix in the peppermint candy, stirring until evenly distributed. Drop by spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in a preheated oven for 9 to 11 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove from oven; allow cookies to cool momentarily on the sheets before removing them to wire racks to cool completely."
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies",".5 cup water",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies","1 egg",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies",".5 cup flaxseed meal",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies",".25 cup brewers' yeast",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies","3 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Chewy Double-Chocolate Lactation Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat sugar, butter, and shortening together in a bowl using an electric mixer until creamy. Add water, egg, and vanilla extract and mix well. Add flour, flaxseed meal, cocoa powder, yeast, salt, and baking soda. Mix well. Fold oats, chocolate chips, and walnuts into the dough."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, about 12 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes; transfer to a wire rack to cool completely."
"August Fig Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"August Fig Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"August Fig Cookies",".25 cup golden brown sugar",
"August Fig Cookies","1 egg",
"August Fig Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"August Fig Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"August Fig Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"August Fig Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"August Fig Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"August Fig Cookies",".5 cup fresh figs, halved",
"August Fig Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease two baking sheets."
"Step 2","Mix butter, white sugar, and brown sugar by hand in a bowl. Add egg and vanilla extract; stir to combine. Combine flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt together in a separate bowl; stir into sugar mixture."
"Step 3","Scoop the meat out of figs and reserve 2 tablespoons. Chop figs and scooped middles. Fold chopped figs and walnuts into the cookie dough."
"Step 4","Drop spoonfuls of batter on the prepared baking sheet. Top each mound with small amounts of reserved fig pulp."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookie edges are lightly browned, 12 to 15 minutes."
"Mom's Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Mom's Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Mom's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract",
"Mom's Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Mom's Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Mom's Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mom's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mom's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Step 1","Beat butter, egg, vanilla extract, and almond extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth. Add confectioners' sugar and beat until incorporated. Mix flour, baking soda, and cream of tartar into butter mixture until dough sticks together. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 3 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 3","Cut dough into quarters and roll each quarter onto a floured work surface to almost 1/4-inch thickness. Cut dough into shapes using cookie cutters and arrange on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake each batch in the preheated oven until edges start to brown, about 8 minutes.Chewy Brownie Cookies",".67 cup vegetable shortening",
"Chewy Brownie Cookies","1 .5 cups packed light brown sugar",
"Chewy Brownie Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chewy Brownie Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Brownie Cookies","1 tablespoon water",
"Chewy Brownie Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Brownie Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chewy Brownie Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Brownie Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Brownie Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat vegetable shortening and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in one egg until completely incorporated. Beat in last egg along with vanilla extract and water. Combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt in a small bowl. Stir flour mixture into creamed mixture at low speed until just blended; fold in chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until cookies are set, 7 to 9 minutes. Cool 2 minutes on baking sheet; transfer cookies to wire racks to cool completely."
"Funfetti® Birthday Cookies","1 (15.25 ounce) package cake mix with candy bits (such as Pillsbury® Funfetti®), or more to taste",
"Funfetti® Birthday Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Funfetti® Birthday Cookies",".33 cup vegetable oil",
"Funfetti® Birthday Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Funfetti® Birthday Cookies","5 tablespoons multicolored candy sprinkles",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix cake mix, eggs, and vegetable oil together in a large bowl to form a dough."
"Step 3","Combine confectioners' sugar and sprinkles together in a small bowl."
"Step 4","Shape dough into 1-inch balls and roll each in the confectioners' sugar mixture. Arrange cookie balls on baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until tops are golden, about 6 minutes. Cool on the baking sheets, about 5 minutes, before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".25 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".25 cup honey",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".25 cup unsulfured molasses",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies","1 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Peanut Butter Molasses Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, peanut butter and 1/2 cup white sugar until smooth. Stir in the honey, molasses, egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon and ginger. Stir the dry ingredients into the molasses mixture until well blended. Roll dough into walnut sized balls and roll the balls in the remaining 1/2 cup of sugar. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Press a criss cross into the top with a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Cream Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cream Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cream Cookies",".33 cup heavy cream",
"Cream Cookies",".5 cup white sugar, or as needed",
"Step 1","In a bowl, mash the butter and flour together until smooth and creamy. Beat in the cream, 1 to 2 tablespoons at a time, until thoroughly combined."
"Step 2","Scrape the dough onto a large sheet of plastic wrap, wrap tightly, and chill at least 1 hour to overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 4","Roll the dough out 1/4 inch thick on a floured work surface, and cut into 2-inch circles with a cutter. Place sugar into a shallow bowl, and dip each cookie into the sugar on both sides. Place the cookies onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until the edges turn light golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Allow to cool for about 5 minutes on sheets before removing to cool completely on racks."
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies",".75 cup shortening (such as Crisco®)",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies","1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Soft Chocolate Pudding Cookies","1 .5 cups chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine shortening, sugars, milk, and vanilla extract in a large bowl. Beat in eggs. Whip mixture until light and fluffy."
"Step 3","Combine flour, pudding mix, salt, and baking soda in a separate bowl. Pour over the shortening mixture and beat until well blended. Fold in chocolate chips."
"Step 4","Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of cookie dough onto ungreased cookie sheets, spacing them 3 inches apart."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven, 1 cookie sheet at a time, until edges are set, 11 to 15 minutes. Repeat with remaining cookie sheets. Cool each batch for 5 minutes before moving cookies onto a cooling rack."
"Rocky Road Cookies with Marshmallows",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Rocky Road Cookies with Marshmallows",".25 cup butter",
"Rocky Road Cookies with Marshmallows","1 egg",
"Rocky Road Cookies with Marshmallows","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Rocky Road Cookies with Marshmallows","2 ounces white chocolate, chopped, divided",
"Rocky Road Cookies with Marshmallows","2 ounces dark chocolate, chopped, divided",
"Rocky Road Cookies with Marshmallows","1 tablespoon cocoa powder",
"Rocky Road Cookies with Marshmallows",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Rocky Road Cookies with Marshmallows",".5 cup miniature marshmallows",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine brown sugar and butter in a bowl; beat until creamy. Beat in egg. Mix in flour, 1/2 of the chopped chocolate, cocoa powder, and baking powder until dough comes together."
"Step 3","Drop spoonfuls of the dough onto a cookie sheet, allowing enough room for the cookies to spread. Flatten slightly."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are done but tops are a bit gooey, about 5 minutes."
"Step 5","Remove from the oven. Push remaining chocolate and mini marshmallows into the tops. Continue baking until tops are set, about 5 minutes more. Be careful to remove cookies before marshmallows burn."
"Lemon Cream Cookie Bars","1 (17.5 ounce) pouch dry sugar cookie mix (such as Betty Crocker®)",
"Lemon Cream Cookie Bars","1 stick butter, softened",
"Lemon Cream Cookie Bars","1 egg",
"Lemon Cream Cookie Bars","1 (14 ounce) can fat-free sweetened condensed milk",
"Lemon Cream Cookie Bars","2 eaches lemons, zested and juiced",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease an 8-inch square pan."
"Step 2","Pour cookie mix into a bowl and add butter. Mix together using a fork until crumbly. Add egg and mix until well blended. Press 1/2 of the mixture into the bottom of the prepared pan; reserve remaining mixture for the topping."
"Step 3","Bake crust in the preheated oven for 15 minutes."
"Step 4","Meanwhile, combine condensed milk, lemon juice, and lemon zest in a bowl and mix well; filling may thicken as it sits."
"Step 5","Remove crust from the oven; it will be puffy. Leave oven on. Let crust cool for 10 minutes."
"Step 6","Spread lemon filling over the crust in the pan. Top with reserved mixture by crumbling it over the filling."
"Step 7","Return pan to the hot oven and bake until lightly browned, about 30 minutes more."
"Step 8","Allow to cool completely, about 1 hour. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours before cutting into bars and serving."
"Grandma's Lace Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Grandma's Lace Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Grandma's Lace Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"Grandma's Lace Cookies","1 cup quick cooking oats (such as Quaker™)",
"Grandma's Lace Cookies","3 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Grandma's Lace Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Grandma's Lace Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Grandma's Lace Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil."
"Step 2","Melt butter in a microwave-safe bowl in a microwave. Add sugar and stir to combine. Add beaten egg and mix well. Stir in oats, flour, vanilla extract, salt, and baking powder."
"Step 3","Drop teaspoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden brown, about 8 minutes. Let cool completely before removing cookies from foil."
"Filled Date Cookies","2 cups dates, pitted and chopped",
"Filled Date Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Filled Date Cookies",".75 cup water",
"Filled Date Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Filled Date Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Filled Date Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Filled Date Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Filled Date Cookies",".5 cup fat free sour cream",
"Filled Date Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Filled Date Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Filled Date Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Filled Date Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Filled Date Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","To prepare the filling, cook the dates, 3/4 cup of sugar and water over medium-high heat, stirring constantly, until thickened. Stir in the nuts, remove from the heat and set aside."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 3","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir in the eggs, sour cream and almond extract. Sift together the flour, salt, baking soda and cinnamon, stir into the creamed mixture. Drop a rounded teaspoon of dough onto an unprepared cookie sheet, place a scant teaspoon of the filling on top of it, then top with an additional 1/2 teaspoon of dough. Repeat with the rest of the dough."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until slightly browned."
"Saltine Toffee Cookies","4 ounces saltine crackers",
"Saltine Toffee Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Saltine Toffee Cookies","1 cup dark brown sugar",
"Saltine Toffee Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Saltine Toffee Cookies",".75 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Line cookie sheet with saltine crackers in single layer."
"Step 3","In a saucepan combine the sugar and the butter. Bring to a boil and boil for 3 minutes. Immediately pour over saltines and spread t cover crackers completely."
"Step 4","Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 5 to 6 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle chocolate chips over the top. Let sit for 5 minutes. Spread melted chocolate and top with chopped nuts. Cool completely and break into pieces."
"Spiced Sugar Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Spiced Sugar Cookies",".25 cup Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend",
"Spiced Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Spiced Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Spiced Sugar Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spiced Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Spiced Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Spiced Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Spiced Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Spiced Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Beat butter with Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend until light and fluffy."
"Step 2","Beat in egg until well blended. Beat in vanilla."
"Step 3","Whisk flour, cinnamon, baking powder, nutmeg, allspice and salt together."
"Step 4","Stir into butter mixture in two additions."
"Step 5","Wrap dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes."
"Step 6","Roll on lightly floured surface or between sheets of waxed paper to 1/4-inch thick."
"Step 7","Using desired cookie cutter, cut out shapes."
"Step 8","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place cookies 2-inches apart on parchment paper-lined baking sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden. Let cool on racks."
"Rumford Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Rumford Sugar Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Rumford Sugar Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Rumford Sugar Cookies","2 tablespoons water",
"Rumford Sugar Cookies","3 teaspoons baking powder",
"Rumford Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Rumford Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Rumford Sugar Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","(Directions as written:) Cream fat and sugar, beat in whipped eggs, add baking powder and 1 cup flour, then water and spices; add remaining flour gradually, working in more flour until dough is stiff enough to roll."
"Step 2","Sprinkle flour over pastry board. Make a ball of dough, lay it on the board. Rub rolling pin with flour and roll out dough into a sheet 1/4 inch thick. Cut in round cakes, sift granulated sugar over each, and bake quickly 400 - 450 F. (200 - 230 C)."
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup honey",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup crispy rice cereal",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup jumbo semisweet chocolate chips",
"Yummy Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, white sugar, brown sugar and honey until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Using a wooden spoon, stir in the oats, cereal, jumbo chocolate chips and milk chocolate chips. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Famous Amos Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Thoroughly cream sugars, margarine, oil, egg, milk and vanilla."
"Step 2","Add dry ingredients, nuts and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8-12 minutes. (Cookies are light in color when done.)"
"No Bake Macadamia Nut Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"No Bake Macadamia Nut Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"No Bake Macadamia Nut Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"No Bake Macadamia Nut Cookies",".5 cup soy milk",
"No Bake Macadamia Nut Cookies","2 tablespoons carob powder",
"No Bake Macadamia Nut Cookies",".25 cup macadamia nut butter",
"No Bake Macadamia Nut Cookies","3 cups oats",
"Step 1","Place white sugar, brown sugar, butter, milk, and carob powder in a large pan over medium-high heat; bring to a boil. Boil for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally."
"Step 2","Remove the pan from the heat, and stir in macadamia nut butter until dissolved. Stir in oatmeal until well incorporated. Drop onto a waxed paper lined cookie sheet, and place in the refrigerator to cool."
"Chocolate Chip Kiss Cookies","48 piece (blank)s milk chocolate candy kisses, unwrapped",
"Chocolate Chip Kiss Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Kiss Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Kiss Cookies",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Kiss Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Kiss Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Kiss Cookies","1 cup mini semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large mixing bowl, beat butter or margarine, sugar, brown sugar and vanilla until well blended. Add flour, blend until smooth. Stir in small chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Unwrap chocolate kiss candies. Mold scant tablespoons of dough around each chocolate piece, covering completely. Shape into balls; place on ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Shape into balls; place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until set. Cool slightly; remove from cookie sheet to wire rack. Cool completely. NOTE: I buy chocolate dessert topping and drizzle over cooled cookies."
"Cyclops Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Cyclops Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Cyclops Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cyclops Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cyclops Cookies","1 egg",
"Cyclops Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Cyclops Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cyclops Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cyclops Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cyclops Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cyclops Cookies","⅛ teaspoon baking soda",
"Cyclops Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Cyclops Cookies","48 piece (blank)s milk chocolate candy kisses, unwrapped",
"Step 1","In a large mixer bowl beat the butter or margarine and peanut butter with an electric mixer on medium speed for about 30 seconds. Add 1/2 cup of the white sugar and the brown sugar and beat until fluffy. Add the egg, milk and vanilla and beat well."
"Step 2","In a medium mixing bowl stir together the flour baking powder, salt and baking soda. With the mixer on low speed gradually add the flour mixture to the peanut butter mixture. Beat until well combined. Cover and chill dough for 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Shape dough into 1 inch balls. Roll balls in additional sugar. Place about 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake at 375 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes or until the edges are firm. Immediately press a chocolate kiss atop each cookie. Transfer cookies to a cooling rack and let cool."
"Cake Mix Cookies III","1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix",
"Cake Mix Cookies III","1 egg",
"Cake Mix Cookies III",".75 cup vegetable oil",
"Cake Mix Cookies III",".25 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Cake Mix Cookies III","2 cups butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","Combine all ingredients in the order given. (Do not use mixer.) Drop by teaspoon onto an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 2","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for about 7 minutes. Do not let them get brown around the edges! Cool on the cookie sheet at least 10 minutes before trying to remove them, they will break!"
"Dixie Sugar Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Dixie Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Dixie Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon lemon zest",
"Dixie Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Dixie Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Dixie Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs, beaten",
"Dixie Sugar Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Dixie Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dixie Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Dixie Sugar Cookies",".5 tablespoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl blend the shortening, salt, lemon zest and nutmeg together. Add the sugar and beat well. Beat in the eggs and milk and mix until well combined."
"Step 3","Sift flour, baking powder and baking soda together. Add to the shortening mixture and blend until combined."
"Step 4","Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the baking sheets and flatten with a glass. Sprinkle tops with sugar. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8 to 12 minutes. Enjoy!"
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","1 cup water",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","2 cups raisins",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground allspice",
"Dave's Big Raisin Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Step 1","Add water to raisins and boil 5 minutes. Set aside to cool."
"Step 2","Cream shortening, sugar, eggs and vanilla. Add cooled raisins and water. Sift together the flour, baking powder, soda, salt, cinnamon, allspice, and nutmeg. Add flour mixture to raisin mixture, blend well."
"Step 3","Chill dough until firm."
"Step 4","Drop by teaspoon onto lightly greased cookie sheets. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes. Let cool for a few minutes on cookie sheet before removing.Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup dried currants",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies","2 tablespoons coffee flavored liqueur (such as Kahlua®)",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies","4 ounces unsweetened chocolate",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies","2 ounces bittersweet chocolate",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies","3 tablespoons unsalted butter",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies","⅛ teaspoon cayenne pepper",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup sugar",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies","2 medium (blank)s eggs",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chef John's Chili Chocolate Cookies","1 cup dark chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Line two baking sheets with parchment paper or silicone baking mats."
"Step 3","Heat currants and coffee liqueur in a saucepan over low heat until it begins to simmer, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside."
"Step 4","Combine unsweetened chocolate, bittersweet chocolate, and butter in bowl. Place bowl on top of a saucepan filled with 1-inch of water set over low heat. Stir chocolate mixture occasionally until melted, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside."
"Step 5","Mix flour, black pepper, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and cayenne pepper in large bowl and set aside."
"Step 6","Whisk sugar and eggs in a small bowl until light, fluffy, and pale yellow, about 5 minutes. Slowly whisk in vanilla and melted chocolate mixture."
"Step 7","Fold flour mixture into sugar and chocolate mixture until combined."
"Step 8","Stir in dark chocolate chips and liqueur-soaked currants."
"Step 9","Drop spoonfuls of cookie dough 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 10","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are almost set, about 12 minutes."
"Step 11","Remove from the oven and leave on baking sheets to cool, 5 minutes."
"Step 12","Transfer to cooling rack and allow to finish cooling, 5 minutes."
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies",".67 cup vegetable oil",
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies","1 egg",
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies",".25 cup molasses",
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Crackle Top Molasses Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl mix oil and 1 cup of sugar. Add egg, beat well. Stir in molasses, 2 cups flour, baking soda and spices. If necessary, add more flour to make a firm dough."
"Step 3","Shape dough into 1 1/4 inch balls. Roll in 1/3 cup sugar. Place 3 inches apart on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 14 minutes or until tops crack. Remove from baking sheet and cool on rack."
"Blueberry Drop Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Blueberry Drop Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Blueberry Drop Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Blueberry Drop Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Blueberry Drop Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Blueberry Drop Cookies","1 egg",
"Blueberry Drop Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Blueberry Drop Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Blueberry Drop Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons lemon zest",
"Blueberry Drop Cookies","1 cup fresh blueberries",
"Step 1","In a large mixing bowl, cream the shortening, sugar, egg, milk, almond extract and lemon zest. Mix well after the addition of each ingredient. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; blend into the sugar mixture. Fold in the blueberries. Cover and chill for 4 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets, about 1 1/2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Let the cookies cool on the baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","1 (18 ounce) jar peanut butter",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"The Whole Jar of Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup chopped peanuts",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Add the eggs, yolks, and vanilla; mix until fluffy. Stir in peanut butter. Sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Finally, stir in the peanuts. Refrigerate the dough for at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Roll dough into walnut sized balls. Place on the prepared cookie sheet and flatten slightly with a fork. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies should look dry on top. Allow to cool for a few minutes on the cookie sheet before removing to cool completely on a rack. These cookies taste great when slightly undercooked."
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons light corn syrup",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons water",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups chopped semisweet chocolate",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, peanut butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the corn syrup, water, and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Fold in chocolate chunks. Drop by 1/4 cupfuls 3 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 14 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are golden. Allow cookies to cool for 1 minute on the cookie sheet before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","2 cups butter",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","6 cups quick cooking oats",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","2 cups chocolate chips",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","2 cups chopped and toasted walnuts",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","1 cup coconut",
"Wilderness Place Lodge Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a very large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, salt and baking soda; stir into the sugar mixture until well incorporated. Mix in oats, then stir in the chocolate chips, nuts, coconut and raisins. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Let cookies cool for a few minutes on the cookie sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","1 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","1 .25 cups packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","2 tablespoons milk",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","3 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Coconut Chewy","1 cup shredded coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the milk and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the sugar mixture until well blended. Stir in the oats, chocolate chips. walnuts and coconut until evenly distributed. Drop by rounded tablespoons onto ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven for a chewy cookie or 14 minutes for a firmer cookie."
"Step 4","Cool for 1 minute on the cookie sheet and then remove to wire rack. Cool completely and then store in tightly sealed container."
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies","1 pound semisweet chocolate, chopped",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup Dutch process cocoa powder",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies","10 tablespoons unsalted butter",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons instant coffee granules",
"Ultimate Double Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Melt chocolate over a double boiler or in the microwave, stirring occasionally until smooth. Sift together flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream butter with white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in coffee crystals and vanilla until well blended. Stir in melted chocolate. Using a wooden spoon, stir in the dry ingredients just until everything comes together. Cover, and let stand for 35 minutes so the chocolate can set up."
"Step 3","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line two cookie sheets with parchment paper. Roll dough into walnut sized balls, or drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets, leaving 2 inches between cookies."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies will be set, but the centers will still be very soft because of the chocolate. Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheets for 10 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Cowboy Cookies III","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cowboy Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cowboy Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cowboy Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cowboy Cookies III","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cowboy Cookies III","1 cup white sugar",
"Cowboy Cookies III","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cowboy Cookies III","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cowboy Cookies III","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cowboy Cookies III","2 cups rolled oats",
"Cowboy Cookies III","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets. Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Gradually stir in the sifted ingredients. Stir in the rolled oats and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before removing."
"Peanut Butter Kiss Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Kiss Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Kiss Cookies","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Kiss Cookies","18 piece (blank)s milk chocolate candy kisses, unwrapped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","Combine sugar, peanut butter, and egg."
"Step 3","Shape into 1 inch balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet. NOTE: If dough is too sticky, refrigerate 1/2 hour or until easy to handle."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 minutes. Remove cookies from oven. Press a chocolate kiss into the center of each warm cookie."
"Three Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Three Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Three Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine the peanut butter, white sugar and egg. Mix until smooth."
"Step 3","Drop spoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 6 to 8 minutes. Do not overbake! These cookies are best when they are still soft and just barely brown on the bottoms."
"Chocolate Crinkles II","1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Crinkles II","2 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Crinkles II",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Chocolate Crinkles II","4 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Crinkles II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Crinkles II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Crinkles II","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chocolate Crinkles II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Crinkles II",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, mix together cocoa, white sugar, and vegetable oil. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; stir into the cocoa mixture. Cover dough, and chill for at least 4 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper. Roll dough into one inch balls. I like to use a number 50 size scoop. Coat each ball in confectioners' sugar before placing onto prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes. Let stand on the cookie sheet for a minute before transferring to wire racks to cool."
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze",".5 pound bacon",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze",".5 cup white sugar",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze","1 egg",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze","1 .5 cups quick cooking oats",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze","⅞ cup confectioners' sugar",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze","1 .5 tablespoons water, or as needed",
"Bacon Oatmeal Breakfast Cookies With Maple Glaze","1 .5 tablespoons real maple syrup",
"Step 1","Place the bacon in a large, deep skillet, and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain the bacon slices on a paper towel-lined plate. When cool, chop the bacon, and set aside."
"Step 2","Beat the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a large mixing bowl until fluffy with an electric mixer on medium speed, then mix in egg, and vanilla extract until thoroughly combined. Whisk the flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon together in a bowl, and stir the flour mixture into the butter mixture. Gradually stir in the oats and bacon, about 1/3 cup of oats at a time, and cover the dough. Refrigerate at least 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Thoroughly grease baking sheets."
"Step 4","Scoop about 1/3 cup of dough per cookie, roll into balls, and place the balls at least 3 inches apart on the greased baking sheets. Use a fork dipped in water to flatten the balls slightly."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are golden brown with slightly browner edges, 10 to 12 minutes. Allow to cool on baking sheets 3 to 5 minutes before removing to finish cooling on racks."
"Step 6","To make glaze, whisk confectioners' sugar, water, and maple syrup together in a bowl until smooth. Let the glaze stand about 5 minutes to slightly thicken; drizzle onto the tops of the cookies. Allow glazed cookies to stand about 20 minutes to set up before storing."
"Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies","2 cups peanut butter",
"Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies","4 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies","2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheet."
"Step 2","Combine peanut butter, eggs, and sugar and mix until smooth. Mix in chocolate chips and nuts, if desired. Spoon dough by tablespoons onto a cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Let the cookies cool on the cookie sheets for 5 to 10 minutes before removing."
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies II","1 .25 cups margarine, softened",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies II","2 cups white sugar",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies II",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies II","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies II","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together margarine and sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until just blended. Mix in walnuts. Drop by spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool for a couple of minutes on the cookie sheet before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Russian Tea Cakes I","1 cup butter",
"Russian Tea Cakes I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Russian Tea Cakes I","6 tablespoons confectioners' sugar",
"Russian Tea Cakes I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Russian Tea Cakes I","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Russian Tea Cakes I",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream butter and vanilla until smooth. Combine the 6 tablespoons confectioners' sugar and flour; stir into the butter mixture until just blended. Mix in the chopped walnuts. Roll dough into 1 inch balls, and place them 2 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 minutes in the preheated oven. When cool, roll in remaining confectioners' sugar. I also like to roll mine in the sugar a second time."
"Chococonut Chip Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Chococonut Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chococonut Chip Cookies",".5 cup light brown sugar",
"Chococonut Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chococonut Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chococonut Chip Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chococonut Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chococonut Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chococonut Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chococonut Chip Cookies","2 cups flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in chocolate chips and coconut. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Peanut Butter Bars I","1 cup butter or margarine, melted",
"Peanut Butter Bars I","2 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Peanut Butter Bars I","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Peanut Butter Bars I","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Bars I","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Peanut Butter Bars I","4 tablespoons peanut butter",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, mix together the butter or margarine, graham cracker crumbs, confectioners' sugar, and 1 cup peanut butter until well blended. Press evenly into the bottom of an ungreased 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","In a metal bowl over simmering water, or in the microwave, melt the chocolate chips with the 4 tablespoons peanut butter, stirring occasionally until smooth. Spread over the prepared crust. Refrigerate for at least one hour before cutting into squares."
"Thumbprint Cookies I",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Thumbprint Cookies I",".25 cup packed brown sugar",
"Thumbprint Cookies I","1 egg",
"Thumbprint Cookies I",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Thumbprint Cookies I","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Thumbprint Cookies I",".25 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Thumbprint Cookies I",".67 cup any flavor fruit jam",
"Thumbprint Cookies I",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F. Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Separate egg, reserving egg white. Cream butter or margarine, sugar, and egg yolk."
"Step 3","Add vanilla, flour and salt, mixing well."
"Step 4","Shape dough into balls. Roll in egg white, then walnuts. Place on cookie sheets about 2 inches apart. Bake for 5 minutes."
"Step 5","Remove cookies from oven. With thumb, dent each cookie. Put jelly or preserves in each thumbprint. Bake for another 8 minutes."
"Snickerdoodles I","1 cup shortening",
"Snickerdoodles I","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Snickerdoodles I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Snickerdoodles I","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Snickerdoodles I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Snickerdoodles I","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Snickerdoodles I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Snickerdoodles I","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Snickerdoodles I","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening and 1 1/2 cups sugar. Stir in the eggs. Sift together the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until well blended. In a small bowl, stir together the 2 tablespoons of sugar, and the cinnamon. Roll dough into walnut sized balls, then roll the balls in the cinnamon-sugar. Place them onto an unprepared cookie sheet, two inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Edges should be slightly brown. Remove from sheets to cool on wire racks.English Cookie Bars",".5 cup butter, softened",
"English Cookie Bars","2 cups brown sugar",
"English Cookie Bars","2 large eggs eggs",
"English Cookie Bars",".5 cup applesauce",
"English Cookie Bars","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"English Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"English Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"English Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"English Cookie Bars",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"English Cookie Bars","1 cup cold coffee",
"English Cookie Bars","1 cup chopped pecans",
"English Cookie Bars","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
