"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the butter, brown sugar, eggs and applesauce. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; stir into the batter alternately with the cold coffee. Finally, mix in the raisins and pecans. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned. Cool and cut into bars."
"Polvorones de Canele (Cinnamon Cookies)","1 cup butter",
"Polvorones de Canele (Cinnamon Cookies)",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Polvorones de Canele (Cinnamon Cookies)",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Polvorones de Canele (Cinnamon Cookies)",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Polvorones de Canele (Cinnamon Cookies)","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Polvorones de Canele (Cinnamon Cookies)","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Polvorones de Canele (Cinnamon Cookies)","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Polvorones de Canele (Cinnamon Cookies)","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in vanilla. Combine flour, salt, and 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon; stir into the creamed mixture to form a stiff dough. Shape dough into 1 inch balls. Mix together 1 cup confectioners' sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon; roll balls in cinnamon mixture."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in preheated oven, or until nicely browned. Cool cookies on wire racks."
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","2 cups butter, melted",
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","2 cups white sugar",
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","4 large eggs eggs",
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","2 cups cornflakes cereal",
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Cowboy Cookies (Dunkin' Platters)","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine the melted and cooled butter or margarine with the brown and white sugars. Beat in the eggs at medium speed of an electric mixer. Add the vanilla, oats, corn flakes, flour, baking soda and baking powder; beating well."
"Step 3","Drop tablespoon sized spoonfuls of the dough on to an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 minutes for a soft and chewy cookie."
"Liz's Astounding Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Liz's Astounding Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup packed brown sugar",
"Liz's Astounding Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Liz's Astounding Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Liz's Astounding Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Liz's Astounding Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 ⅛ cups all-purpose flour",
"Liz's Astounding Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Liz's Astounding Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Liz's Astounding Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a mixing bowl, cream shortening and sugars. Add beaten egg and vanilla, mix well. Sift flour, baking soda and salt together. Stir into creamed mixture; blend thoroughly. Fold in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoon onto cookie sheets. Bake in oven for 6-9 minutes, depending on size. Do not overbake. Cookies should be a little brown around the edges when taken out. Let cookies cool for a few minutes before removing from baking sheet. Finish cooling on rack. NOTE: If you use miniature chocolate chips, you can decrease the amount needed in recipe from 11/4 cups to 1 cup and not affect the quality of the cookies."
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Squares","1 cup butter",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Squares","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Squares","2 cups peanut butter",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Squares","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Squares",".5 cup butter",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Squares","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Melt 1 cup butter or margarine over low heat. Remove from heat and stir in confectioners' sugar, peanut butter and graham cracker crumbs. Spread mixture in a jelly roll pan. Pat down evenly."
"Step 2","To Make Topping: Melt together 1/2 cup butter or margarine with 1 cup chocolate chips. Spread this mixture over peanut butter mixture. Refrigerate 1/2 hour. Cut into squares."
"Spoon Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Spoon Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Spoon Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Spoon Cookies","6 large eggs eggs",
"Spoon Cookies","4 teaspoons baking powder",
"Spoon Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spoon Cookies","1 (1.75 ounce) package multicolored sprinkles (jimmies)",
"Spoon Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Spoon Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Cream the butter or margarine with the white sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the vanilla and eggs and mix well. Stir in the baking powder and flour. Drop dough by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets. In a small bowl beat milk into the confectioners' sugar a tablespoon at a time until it is of a drizzling consistency."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for about 10 minutes. Let cookies cool then drizzle with confectioners' sugar and milk glaze then sprinkle with candy sprinkles."
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","1 cup butter",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","1 cup white sugar",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","12 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe I","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Cream butter, sugars, eggs and vanilla until very smooth and fluffy."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, mix together flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda. In a food processor, blend oatmeal until fine. Add to flour mixture."
"Step 4","Stir butter mixture into flour/oatmeal mixture. Blend well."
"Step 5","Add chocolate chips and walnuts. Stir until blended. Roll into golf balls size and bake for 8-10 minutes. You do not want to over bake these."
"Anise Cookies IV","1 cup shortening",
"Anise Cookies IV","1 cup white sugar",
"Anise Cookies IV","6 large eggs eggs",
"Anise Cookies IV","1 .5 teaspoons anise extract",
"Anise Cookies IV","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Anise Cookies IV","4 teaspoons baking powder",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening, sugar and eggs until smooth. Stir in the anise extract. Combine the flour and baking powder; stir into the wet ingredients. Scoop out spoonfuls and roll into balls. Place balls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until light brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. Frost when cool if desired."
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies","1 cup softened butter",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies",".67 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate-Cheesecake Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a large bowl using an electric mixer until smooth. Beat in eggs and vanilla extract until creamy."
"Step 2","Sift flour, cocoa powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Add flour mixture to butter mixture. Fold in nuts. Refrigerate dough for 1 hour."
"Step 3","While dough is chilling, beat cream cheese, sugar, egg, and vanilla extract together in a bowl until smooth."
"Step 4","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 5","Remove dough from fridge and form about 1 tablespoon dough into a ball; make an indentation and fill with about 1 teaspoon filling. Place cookie on an ungreased baking sheet. Repeat with remaining dough and filling."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, 11 to 13 minutes. Allow cookies to cool completely before removing from the baking sheet, about 20 minutes."
"Pudding Cookies III","1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix",
"Pudding Cookies III","1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix",
"Pudding Cookies III","1 cup sour cream",
"Pudding Cookies III","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pudding Cookies III","1 (16 ounce) container prepared chocolate frosting",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the cake mix and instant pudding. Stir in the sour cream and eggs until well blended. Batter will be stiff. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. When cool, frost with chocolate frosting if desired."
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon butter, or as needed",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon hot water",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons heavy whipping cream",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"European Cookie Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup European cookie spread (such as Biscoff®)",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Generously grease a baking sheet with 1 tablespoon butter."
"Step 2","Beat 1 cup softened butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a bowl with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Beat one egg into the batter until fully integrated. Add second egg with vanilla extract; beat until smooth."
"Step 3","Dissolve baking soda into hot water in a small bowl; stir into the batter along with the heavy cream. Add flour and chocolate chips into the batter; stir vigorously for 20 seconds. Stir the cookie spread through the batter."
"Step 4","Drop batter onto prepared baking sheet in portions spaced about 1-inch apart."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 20 minutes. Let cookies cool for 5 minutes on sheet before moving to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies",".33 cup butter, softened",
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies",".33 cup shortening",
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies","1 egg",
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies","2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Fabulous Chocolate Cookies","3 tablespoons confectioners' sugar for dusting",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, shortening and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt and cocoa; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. When cookies are cool, dust with confectioners' sugar."
"Trillionaire Cookies","1 (12 ounce) jar caramel ice cream topping",
"Trillionaire Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Trillionaire Cookies","36 eaches buttery round crackers",
"Trillionaire Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","In a medium saucepan, combine caramel topping and pecans over medium heat."
"Step 2","Stirring constantly, bring to a boil and cook 3 to 5 minutes longer or until mixture thickens. Remove from heat and allow to cool 5 minutes."
"Step 3","Spoon about 1 1/2 teaspoons caramel mixture on top of each cracker. Refrigerate 1 hour or until firm"
"Step 4","In a small saucepan, melt chocolate chips over low heat, stirring constantly. Remove from heat."
"Step 5","Using tongs, dip bottom of each cracker in chocolate. Transfer to waxed paper and refrigerate 1 hour or until chocolate is firm. Can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator."
"Praline Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Praline Cookies",".67 cup packed brown sugar",
"Praline Cookies","1 egg",
"Praline Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Praline Cookies",".5 teaspoon maple flavored extract",
"Praline Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Praline Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Praline Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Praline Cookies","1 cup pecan halves",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Beat in egg, vanilla and maple flavoring. Beat in salt and flour until a smooth dough is formed. Shape dough into a log 12 inches long, wrap in wax paper, and refrigerate overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Line cookie sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Slice dough into 1/4 inch slices. Place slices on cookie sheet. Top each cookie with a pecan half. Bake for 10 minutes in preheated oven, or until golden brown."
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies",".75 cup melted shortening",
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies",".25 cup molasses",
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Rolled Molasses Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, blend the shortening, sugar, molasses and egg. Add the baking soda, flour, clove, ginger, cinnamon and salt; mix well."
"Step 3","Form into 1 inch balls and roll in granulated sugar."
"Step 4","Place on cookie sheets 2 inches apart and bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on a flat surface."
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups butter",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 cups milk",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","12 cups all-purpose flour",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Italian Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine the butter and milk. Cook until melted, stirring occasionally. Set aside to cool."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves. Stir in the milk mixture by hand until the dough is firm and not tacky. Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Roll the dough into 1 1/2 inch balls and place onto the prepared cookie sheets. These cookies do not spread much, so you can place them fairly close together."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks. Glaze with a thin confectioners' icing when cool to preserve freshness."
"Salted Peanut Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Salted Peanut Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Salted Peanut Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Salted Peanut Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Salted Peanut Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Salted Peanut Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Salted Peanut Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Salted Peanut Cookies","2 cups salted peanuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix shortening (part butter or margarine), brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla thoroughly. Measure flour and sift into a separate bowl. Blend together flour, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl. Stir into egg mixture. Mix in peanuts."
"Step 3","Drop rounded teaspoons of dough about 2 inches apart on lightly greased baking sheet. Flatten with bottom of greased glass dipped in sugar. Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until golden brown."
"Caramel Cookies",".5 cup butter, room temperature",
"Caramel Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Caramel Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Caramel Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Caramel Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Caramel Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Caramel Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Caramel Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Caramel Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt; blend into the creamed mixture. Mix in the walnuts. Form dough into long roll about 2 inches in diameter. Wrap in waxed paper and refrigerate overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper. Unwrap the roll of dough and using a sharp knife, slice the roll into 1/4 inch coins. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Frosted Reindeer Cookies","1 roll Pillsbury® refrigerated sugar cookie dough",
"Frosted Reindeer Cookies",".25 cup all-purpose flour",
"Frosted Reindeer Cookies","1 cup vanilla creamy ready-to-spread frosting",
"Frosted Reindeer Cookies","64 eaches small pretzel twists",
"Frosted Reindeer Cookies","64 eaches semisweet chocolate chips",
"Frosted Reindeer Cookies","16 eaches gumdrops, cut in half",
"Step 1","In large bowl, break up cookie dough. Stir or knead in flour until well blended. Reshape into triangle-shaped log. If too soft to cut into slices, refrigerate up to 30 minutes."
"Step 2","Heat oven to 350 degrees F. With thin sharp knife, cut dough into 32 (1/4-inch) triangular slices. On ungreased cookie sheets, place slices 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake 7 to 11 minutes or until set. Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets to cooling rack. Cool completely, about 15 minutes."
"Step 4","Frost cookies with frosting. Place 2 pretzel twists on each triangle near corners for antlers. Lightly press 2 chocolate chips into each cookie for eyes and 1 halved gumdrop for nose. Store between sheets of waxed paper in tightly covered container."
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies","2 .5 cups blanched almond flour",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies","1 cup pitted and chopped dates",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies",".5 cup chopped dried cherries",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies","2 tablespoons chia seeds, or more to taste",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies",".5 teaspoon sea salt",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies",".5 cup coconut oil",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies","1 egg",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies","2 tablespoons maple syrup",
"Paleo Almond Date Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine almond flour, dates, cherries, walnuts, chia seeds, baking soda, and sea salt in a large bowl; whisk to blend. Add coconut oil, egg, maple syrup, and vanilla extract; blend well with a spoon or fork until dough comes together."
"Step 3","Scoop dough onto prepared baking sheets with a small cookie scoop."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, about 15 minutes. Turn off oven and let cookies sit with oven door closed, about 10 minutes more. Remove from oven and let cool.Perfect Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup gluten free, casein free margarine",
"Perfect Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Perfect Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Perfect Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Perfect Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup salted natural peanut butter",
"Perfect Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Perfect Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup soy flour",
"Perfect Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 cup tapioca flour",
"Perfect Gluten-Free Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 cup potato flour",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Mix in the egg and peanut butter. Combine the baking soda, soy flour, tapioca flour and potato flour; stir into the batter to form a dough. Roll teaspoonfuls of dough into balls and place them 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Powdered Sugar Cookies III","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies III","1 egg",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies III","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies III","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies III","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Powdered Sugar Cookies III","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Mix together the shortening, egg, and confectioners' sugar. Stir in vanilla, cream of tartar, salt, baking soda and flour. Mix well."
"Step 2","Roll dough into 1 inch in diameter balls. Place on cookie sheet. Press down with a glass bottom dipped in sugar. ( I have also used cookie stamps dipped into sugar.)"
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for about 10 minutes or just until edges are turning golden. Let cool slightly before removing from the cookie sheet."
"Mini Candy Bar Cookies","60 mini chocolate-coated caramel-peanut nougat candy bars (such as Snickers®)",
"Mini Candy Bar Cookies","2 (18.25 ounce) packages French vanilla flavored cake mix",
"Mini Candy Bar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mini Candy Bar Cookies",".67 cup vegetable oil",
"Mini Candy Bar Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper. Unwrap all the mini candy bars."
"Step 2","Empty the 2 cake mixes into a large bowl, and stir eggs, vegetable oil, and water into the mixes. The batter will be stiff. Roll heaping tablespoons of dough into 1-inch balls. Push a mini candy bar into the cookie ball, and carefully cover the entire candy piece with dough. If any chocolate is visible, the cookie will leak. Place the filled cookies onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven for 11 minutes. Cookies will not look brown on top. Cool for 5 minutes on the baking sheets before removing to finish cooling on racks."
"Grandma's Drop Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Grandma's Drop Sugar Cookies","2 cups butter, softened",
"Grandma's Drop Sugar Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandma's Drop Sugar Cookies","1 cup coconut flakes",
"Grandma's Drop Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Grandma's Drop Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Grandma's Drop Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat sugar and butter together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Mix flour, coconut flakes, vanilla extract, salt, and baking soda into creamed butter mixture until dough is smooth. Spoon dough onto a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are lightly browned, about 10 minutes."
"Chewy Peanut Butter Brownies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Brownies",".33 cup margarine, softened",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Brownies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Brownies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Brownies","2 large eggs egg",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Brownies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Brownies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Brownies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chewy Peanut Butter Brownies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C ). Grease a 9x9 inch baking pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together peanut butter and margarine. Gradually blend in the brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, and vanilla; mix until fluffy. Combine flour, baking powder, and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture until well blended."
"Step 3","Bake for 30 to 35 minutes in preheated oven, or until the top springs back when touched. Cool, and cut into 16 squares."
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies",".25 cup granulated sugar",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies","1 (3.3 ounce) package JELL-O White Chocolate Flavor Instant Pudding",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies","2 .25 cups flour",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies","1 cup dried cranberries",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies",".5 cup chopped PLANTERS Walnuts",
"Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies","2 (4 ounce) packages BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate, melted",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 375 degrees F."
"Step 2","Beat butter, sugars, pudding mix and vanilla in large bowl with mixer until blended. Add eggs and baking soda; mix well. Gradually beat in flour. Stir in chocolate morsels, cranberries and nuts."
"Step 3","Drop teaspoonfuls of dough, 2 inches apart, onto baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 8 to 10 min. or until golden brown. Cool on baking sheets 3 min. Remove to wire racks; cool completely."
"Step 5","Dip half of each cookie into melted chocolate. Place on waxed-paper covered baking sheet; let stand until chocolate is firm."
"Christmas Stars",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Christmas Stars","1 cup white sugar",
"Christmas Stars","2 large eggs egg",
"Christmas Stars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Christmas Stars","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Christmas Stars","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Christmas Stars",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Christmas Stars","6 tablespoons strawberry jam",
"Christmas Stars",".25 cup green decorator sugar",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Gradually add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Sift together flour, baking powder, and salt. Stir flour mixture into the butter mixture until well blended. Divide dough in half and wrap in plastic. Refrigerate dough for three hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease two cookie sheets or line them with parchment paper."
"Step 3","On a floured surface, roll out half of the dough to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut dough into star shapes using a 3- to 4-inch star cookie cutter. Using a 1- to 2-inch star cookie cutter, cut a star into the center of half of the big stars. Place the full stars on one cookie sheet and the tops--the cookies with the center cutouts--on another. Sprinkle colored sugar on the star tops, if desired."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until edges are golden brown, 6 to 8 minutes. Allow cookies to cool completely. (You can re-roll the mini stars cut out of the centers, or bake them separately for about 5 minutes.) Repeat with remaining cookie dough."
"Step 5","After cookies cool completely, spread 1 teaspoon of preserves in the center of each full star cookie. Place a cut-out cookie on top of the layer of preserves. Pack cookies between waxed paper in a covered tin to preserve freshness."
"Double Fudge Brownie Cookies","1 box brownie mix (for 13” x 9” pan), 18 to 22 ounces",
"Double Fudge Brownie Cookies",".25 cup all-purpose flour",
"Double Fudge Brownie Cookies","1 teaspoon Spice Islands® Pure Vanilla Extract",
"Double Fudge Brownie Cookies",".5 teaspoon Spice Islands® Pure Almond Extract",
"Double Fudge Brownie Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Double Fudge Brownie Cookies",".25 cup Mazola® Corn Oil",
"Double Fudge Brownie Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Combine brownie mix and flour in a mixing bowl. Stir in extracts, eggs and oil; blend thoroughly. Dough will be stiff. Add chocolate chips. Drop by rounded tablespoons onto greased baking sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes; cool on rack."
"Humungous Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Humungous Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese",
"Humungous Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Humungous Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Humungous Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Humungous Cookies","2 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Humungous Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Humungous Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Humungous Cookies","2 cups chopped semisweet chocolate",
"Humungous Cookies","1 cup coarsely chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly grease two 12 inch pizza pans."
"Step 2","Stir together flour, baking soda and salt and set aside."
"Step 3","Using a large bowl, cream together butter, cream cheese and sugars. Add eggs and beat until fluffy. Add flour mixture to creamed mixture, blending until dough becomes stiff. Stir in chocolate chunks and nuts until well blended."
"Step 4","Divide dough in two. Press each half into the prepared pans. Bake 20-25 minutes or until lightly browned around the edges. Centers should be firm. Cool in the pan on wire rack. Serve by cutting into wedges."
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Hillary Clinton's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Brush baking sheets lightly with vegetable oil."
"Step 2","Combine flour, salt and baking soda on waxed paper."
"Step 3","Beat together shortening, sugars and vanilla in large bowl with electric mixer until creamy. Add eggs and beat until light and fluffy."
"Step 4","Gradually beat in flour mixture. Stir in rolled oats and then chocolate chips."
"Step 5","Drop batter by rounded teaspoonsfuls onto baking sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes or till golden. Cool cookies on sheets for 2 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool completely."
"Extra Easy Pumpkin Cookies","1 (14 ounce) can 100% pure pumpkin",
"Extra Easy Pumpkin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Extra Easy Pumpkin Cookies",".5 cup applesauce",
"Extra Easy Pumpkin Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Extra Easy Pumpkin Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package spice cake mix",
"Extra Easy Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon cinnamon",
"Extra Easy Pumpkin Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Extra Easy Pumpkin Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease two baking sheets."
"Step 2","Beat the pumpkin, eggs, applesauce, and vanilla together in a large mixing bowl. Stir in the cake mix, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves until well blended and creamy. Drop by spoonfuls on prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until tops are firm when lightly touched, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool on racks."
"Peppermint Lace Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Peppermint Lace Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Peppermint Lace Cookies","2 teaspoons peppermint extract",
"Peppermint Lace Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peppermint Lace Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Peppermint Lace Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Peppermint Lace Cookies",".33 cup crushed peppermint candies",
"Peppermint Lace Cookies","2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar, or as needed",
"Peppermint Lace Cookies","1 tablespoon very finely crushed peppermint candies, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter and 1 cup confectioners' sugar in a large bowl until creamy and smooth; stir peppermint extract into butter mixture. Whisk flour and salt in a bowl and stir into butter mixture. Gently fold rolled oats and 1/3 cup crushed peppermint candies into the dough."
"Step 3","Drop dough by teaspoonful onto ungreased baking sheets, leaving 3 inches between cookies; press cookies 1/4 inch thick with your fingertips."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies have lightly browned edges, 10 to 12 minutes. Let cookies cool on baking sheets for at least 5 minutes before removing to finish cooling on wire racks."
"Step 5","Stir 2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar with 1 tablespoon very finely crushed peppermint candies in a small bowl; transfer to a fine-mesh wire strainer. Dust cooled cookies with peppermint candy mixture."
"Tahini Cookies","6 tablespoons tahini",
"Tahini Cookies",".5 cup honey",
"Tahini Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Tahini Cookies","1 .5 cups quick cooking oats",
"Tahini Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the tahini, honey and cinnamon. Mix in walnuts and oats until well blended. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Cookies should be about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are slightly brown. Cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Crisp Little Lemon Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package lemon cake mix",
"Crisp Little Lemon Cookies","1 cup crisp rice cereal",
"Crisp Little Lemon Cookies",".5 cup butter, melted",
"Crisp Little Lemon Cookies","1 egg",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, combine the cake mix and crispy rice cereal. Stir in the egg and melted butter until everything comes together."
"Step 3","Roll into firm 1 inch balls and place them 2 inches apart on an unprepared cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool for 1 minute on the baking sheets before removing to cool completely on wire racks."
"Red Velvet Crinkle Cookies","6 tablespoons butter",
"Red Velvet Crinkle Cookies","1 cup powdered sugar",
"Red Velvet Crinkle Cookies","1 teaspoon cornstarch",
"Red Velvet Crinkle Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) box Duncan Hines® Red Velvet Cake Mix",
"Red Velvet Crinkle Cookies","2 large eggs",
"Red Velvet Crinkle Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon zest",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Melt butter; set aside to cool. Place powdered sugar and cornstarch in shallow dish. Mix with a fork to blend."
"Step 2","Place cake mix, cooled butter, eggs and lemon zest in large mixing bowl. Mix by hand until well blended and a dough forms."
"Step 3","Form dough into 1-inch balls and roll in powdered sugar. Place on cool, ungreased baking sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake, 1 sheet at a time, in center of oven for 9 to 11 minutes or until set. Cool 1 minute. Transfer to wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 5","Store in airtight container with wax paper or parchment separating layers."
"Cornmeal Cookies I",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Cornmeal Cookies I",".75 cup white sugar",
"Cornmeal Cookies I","1 egg",
"Cornmeal Cookies I","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cornmeal Cookies I",".5 cup cornmeal",
"Cornmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cornmeal Cookies I",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cornmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cornmeal Cookies I",".5 cup raisins",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, blend butter and sugar until creamy. Add egg and beat well."
"Step 2","In another bowl, stir together flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt; gradually add to butter mixture. Add vanilla and blend thoroughly. Stir in the optional raisins."
"Step 3","Form dough into ball, wrap tightly in plastic wrap, and chill until firm, about 1 hour."
"Step 4","Roll out dough on well-floured board to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut with cookie cutters (2 1/2 inches in diameter) and place 1 inch apart on lightly greased cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in 350 degree F (175 degrees C) oven for 10-12 minutes or until edges are golden. Store in airtight container."
"Christmas Ornament Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies",".67 cup packed brown sugar",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies","1 egg",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies",".33 cup molasses",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies",".33 cup butter",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies","2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Christmas Ornament Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream 1/2 cup of butter or margarine. Add brown sugar and beat. Beat in egg and molasses. In a separate bowl, combine 2 3/4 cups of flour, soda and spices. Add to butter mixture. Blend well."
"Step 3","Roll dough out 1/8 inch thick on floured surface. Cut into shapes. Bake for 6-8 minutes."
"Step 4","To Make Frosting: Cream 1/3 cup butter. Gradually add 2 cups sifted confectioners sugar, 1 tablespoon milk and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. Beat until smooth. Put in a pastry bag with small tip and decorate cookies."
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 cup SPLENDA® Sugar Blend",
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 tablespoon molasses",
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","3 cups old-fashioned oatmeal, uncooked",
"Crispy-Chewy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","Stir together flour, soda, and cinnamon. Set aside."
"Step 3","Beat butter and SPLENDA® Sugar Blend at medium speed with an electric mixer until fluffy. Add eggs, molasses and vanilla, beating until blended. Gradually add flour mixture, beating at low speed until blended."
"Step 4","Stir in oats and raisins."
"Step 5","Drop dough by rounded tablespoons onto lightly greased baking sheets."
"Step 6","Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool slightly on baking sheets. Remove to wire racks; cool completely."
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III","1 cup white sugar",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III","1 teaspoon salt",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III",".75 cup shortening",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III","1 egg, beaten",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III","1 cup mashed ripe bananas",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III","1 .75 cups rolled oats",
"Banana Oatmeal Cookies III",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg. Cut in shortening until almost no lumps remain. Stir in the egg and bananas; mix well. Finally, stir in the oats and walnuts. Drop by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are browned. Remove from pans immediately to cool on wire racks."
"Nougat Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Nougat Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Nougat Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Nougat Cookies","1 egg",
"Nougat Cookies","2 teaspoons water",
"Nougat Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Butter a small cake pan."
"Step 2","To prepare Nougat: In a frying pan place 1/2 cup of sugar over medium heat and stir. Sugar will turn into liquid caramel. When syrup becomes dark brown, pour into cake pan and let harden."
"Step 3","Crush nougat in a mortar or between waxed paper with a hammer into small pieces."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (175 degrees C). In a medium bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Separate the egg and add the yolk and water. Blend thoroughly. Stir in 1/2 cup of sifted flour and the nougat. Mix well. Sift in the rest of the flour."
"Step 5","Knead the dough lightly on a board. Roll the dough into a 1-inch in diameter log. Slice into 1/2-inch thick cookies. Place on greased cookie sheets 3 inches apart and press down with a fork."
"Step 6","Bake 10 to 12 minutes.Kay's Shortbread","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Kay's Shortbread",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Kay's Shortbread",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Kay's Shortbread",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Kay's Shortbread","1 cup butter, softened",
"Kay's Shortbread","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Kay's Shortbread","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the flour, baking powder, salt and confectioners' sugar. Stir in the butter and vanilla, and mix until a stiff dough forms. Pat dough into 9-inch round cake pan, and prick well with a fork. Sprinkle remaining sugar over dough."
"Step 3","Bake for 30 to 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden. Cut into wedges while warm. Cool on wire rack; separate cookies."
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","48 piece (0.2 oz)s chocolate-covered caramel candies (such as Rolo®)",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Rolo®-Filled Chocolate Cookies","4 ounces chocolate almond bark (chocolate confectioners coating)",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, cocoa powder, and baking soda together in a small bowl. Beat 1 cup white sugar, brown sugar, and butter together in a large bowl until light and fluffy. Add vanilla extract and eggs; beat well. Stir flour mixture into sugar mixture; mix well."
"Step 3","Lightly flour hands. Shape about 1 tablespoon dough around 1 chocolate-covered caramel candy, covering it completely. Repeat with remaining dough and caramel candies."
"Step 4","Place 2 tablespoons white sugar in a small bowl. Press one side of each ball into sugar. Place balls, sugar sides up, onto a baking sheet, about 2 inches apart."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until cookie is set and slightly cracked, 7 to 10 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for about 2 minutes. Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 6","Melt almond bark in a saucepan over low heat. Drizzle over cookies."
"Toasted Oats Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Toasted Oats Cookies","2 .33 cups rolled oats",
"Toasted Oats Cookies",".5 cup sifted all-purpose flour",
"Toasted Oats Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Toasted Oats Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Toasted Oats Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Toasted Oats Cookies","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Toasted Oats Cookies","1 egg",
"Toasted Oats Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In medium skillet, over medium heat, heat butter until lightly browned. Be careful not to burn. Add oats; saute, stirring constantly, until golden -- about 5 minutes. Remove from heat; cool."
"Step 3","Meanwhile, sift flour with cinnamon, salt, and soda; set aside."
"Step 4","In large bowl, combine sugar, egg, and vanilla. With wooden spoon, or portable electric mixer at medium speed, beat until light."
"Step 5","Stir in rolled oats and flour mixture until well combined."
"Step 6","Drop by slightly rounded teaspoonfuls, 3 inches apart, onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 7","Bake 10 to 12 minutes, or until golden. Remove to wire rack. Cool."
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, divided",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies","2 tablespoons boiling water",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies","2 tablespoons instant coffee powder",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies","1 egg",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mocha Chocolate Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Melt 1/2 cup chocolate chips in microwave or double-boiler, stirring occasionally until smooth. Cool to room temperature. In a small bowl, dissolve instant coffee in boiling water; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in egg, coffee, and melted chocolate. Combine flour, baking soda, and salt; mix into batter. Stir in the remaining chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by heaping teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven. Allow to stand 2 to 3 minutes on the cookie sheets before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 cup vegetable shortening",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Favorite Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package peanut butter chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter, shortening, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat the first egg into the butter until completely blended, then beat in the vanilla with the second egg. Mix flour, baking powder, cocoa powder, and salt in another bowl; mix the flour mixture into the butter mixture until just incorporated. Fold in peanut butter chips, mixing just enough to evenly combine."
"Step 3","Drop spoonfuls of the dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until cookies are set, about 8 minutes."
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies","100 piece (blank)s chocolate mint wafer candies",
"Starlight Mint Surprise Cookies","100 halves walnut halves",
"Step 1","Combine flour, baking soda, salt, white sugar, butter or margarine, brown sugar, eggs and vanilla. Combine and mix at lowest speed until dough forms."
"Step 2","Drop by scant teaspoons 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheets. Press candy wafer on top of each - mold dough sides up around mint. Cover with scant teaspoons of dough. Top each with walnut half."
"Step 3","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 9-12 minutes."
"Gobble Up Granola Snacks","2 .5 cups crispy rice cereal",
"Gobble Up Granola Snacks","2 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Gobble Up Granola Snacks",".5 cup raisins",
"Gobble Up Granola Snacks",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Gobble Up Granola Snacks",".5 cup light corn syrup",
"Gobble Up Granola Snacks",".5 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"Gobble Up Granola Snacks","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, stir together the rice cereal, oats, and raisins. Set aside. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Combine the brown sugar and corn syrup in a small saucepan over medium heat. Heat just until boiling, then remove from heat and stir in peanut butter and vanilla until smooth. Pour over the cereal and oat mixture, and mix well."
"Step 3","Press into the prepared pan using the back of a large spoon. Allow to cool, then cut into squares."
"Thumbprint Shortbread Cookies",".75 cup margarine",
"Thumbprint Shortbread Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Thumbprint Shortbread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Thumbprint Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Thumbprint Shortbread Cookies","1 (16 ounce) container chocolate fudge frosting",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until smooth. Mix in the flour and chopped pecans. Shape tablespoonfuls of dough into balls and place them 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Press a thumb or finger deeply into the center of each cookie."
"Step 3","Bake for 9 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until edges are lightly browned. Allow cookies to cool for a couple of minutes on the baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely. Fill each depression in the cookies with a dab of chocolate frosting. Let the icing set, preferably overnight."
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies","1 .5 cups chocolate syrup",
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies","2 tablespoons creme de menthe liqueur",
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies","6 tablespoons butter",
"Chocolate Mint Dessert Brownies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together 1 cup sugar and 1/2 cup of softened butter until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in the chocolate syrup. Stir in the flour until just blended. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until top springs back when lightly touched. Cool completely in the pan."
"Step 4","In a small bowl, beat the confectioners' sugar, 1/2 cup butter or margarine and creme de menthe until smooth. Spread evenly over the cooled brownies, then chill until set."
"Step 5","In a small bowl over simmering water, or in the microwave, melt the remaining 6 tablespoons of butter and the chocolate chips, stirring occasionally until smooth. Allow to cool slightly, then spread over the top of the mint layer. Cover, and chill for at least 1 hour before cutting into squares."
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie","1 cup butter, softened",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie","2 large eggs eggs",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie",".67 cup toffee baking bits",
"Minnesota's Favorite Cookie","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Stir in the milk chocolate and semisweet chips, toffee bits, and pecans. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheet before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Pizza Pan Oatmeal Cookie",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Pizza Pan Oatmeal Cookie",".75 cup rolled oats",
"Pizza Pan Oatmeal Cookie",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pizza Pan Oatmeal Cookie",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pizza Pan Oatmeal Cookie",".33 cup butter",
"Pizza Pan Oatmeal Cookie",".33 cup white sugar",
"Pizza Pan Oatmeal Cookie",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Pizza Pan Oatmeal Cookie","1 egg",
"Pizza Pan Oatmeal Cookie","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Combine dry ingredients. Mix remaining ingredients until well blended, then gradually add dry mixture. Stir until well blended. Press out on a lightly greased and floured pizza pan. (if you want to add chocolate chips, raisins, or nuts, press them into the dough once it is spread on the pan.)"
"Step 2","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12-15 minutes until lightly browned. Cool 10-15 minutes in the pan on a rack, then loosen carefully with a spatula. You may leave the cookie in the pan, but if you plan to serve it whole (like a birthday cake), slide it out of the pan at this point and continue to cool on a rack."
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .25 cups unbleached all-purpose flour",
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon coconut extract",
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"The Right Choice Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, cream the shortening with the brown sugar and white sugar. Stir in the eggs, coconut extract and milk. Then mix in the sifted dry ingredients. Finally, stir in the chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop cookie dough from a spoon in golf ball sized portions onto an unprepared cookie sheet. Bake for 9 to 11 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies should be slightly brown at the edges. Allow cookies to cool for a couple of minutes on the baking sheets before removing to cool completely on wire racks."
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies",".5 cup chopped macadamia nuts",
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sue's Oatmeal Macadamia Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Sift flour, resift with salt and baking soda. Stir in oats and nuts and set aside."
"Step 2","Cream together sugar and shortening. Add eggs and vanilla. Add dry ingredients and beat til thoroughly mixed."
"Step 3","Roll dough in waxed paper like logs, shaping as you roll. Refrigerate overnight."
"Step 4","Unroll cookie dough and slice 1/4 inch thick and place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes."
"Grandma's Apple Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies","1 .33 cups packed brown sugar",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies","1 egg",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies","1 cup dates, pitted and chopped",
"Grandma's Apple Cookies","1 cup chopped apples",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream the shortening and brown sugar together. Mix in the egg and milk. Stir in the apples. Add the flour, baking soda, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, ground nutmeg. Stir in the nuts and dates."
"Step 3","Either drop spoonfuls of dough onto a lightly greased cookie sheet or spread dough into a 13x18 inch lightly greased jelly roll pan. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes for the cookies or 20 to 25 minutes for the bars. Let cool then ice, if desired."
"Aunt Mary's Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Aunt Mary's Cookies","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Aunt Mary's Cookies","1 cup evaporated milk",
"Aunt Mary's Cookies","6 tablespoons butter",
"Aunt Mary's Cookies","1 (7 ounce) jar marshmallow creme",
"Aunt Mary's Cookies","3 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Step 1","Place sheets of waxed paper onto a work surface."
"Step 2","Stir sugar, cocoa, and evaporated milk together in a large nonstick saucepan over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil; boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and stir butter and marshmallow creme into cocoa mixture. Quickly stir graham cracker crumbs into mixture."
"Step 3","Drop cookies by the spoonful onto waxed paper; let stand until firm. Store in airtight containers."
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","2 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies",".25 cup butter, melted",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","1 tablespoon hot water, or as needed",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Gram Opal's Sugar Cookies","24 halves whole pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 baking sheets."
"Step 2","Sift flour, baking soda, and 1/8 teaspoon salt together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat 1 cup butter, white sugar, and egg in a bowl with an electric mixer until creamy, 2 to 3 minutes. Add flour mixture, vanilla extract, and lemon extract to butter mixture; stir until dough is well blended. Roll cookie dough into walnut-size balls and place 2 inches apart onto prepared cookie sheets. Press each ball down with the bottom of a glass to flatten slightly."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until baked through, 6 to 7 minutes. Cool."
"Step 5","Stir confectioners' sugar, 1/4 cup melted butter, hot water, and vanilla together in a bowl until sugar is completely dissolved and icing is smooth. Spread icing on cooled cookies and top each cookie with a pecan."
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon salt",
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 ⅛ teaspoons baking soda",
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup butter, softened",
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie",".5 cup white sugar",
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 large eggs eggs",
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","12 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Firefighter's Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","6 (1.4 ounce) bars chocolate covered English toffee, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl combine the flour, salt and baking soda."
"Step 3","In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugars. Mix until smooth. Add the vanilla and the eggs and beat well. Gradually add the flour mixture until well combined. Stir in the chocolate chips and chopped candy bars. Mix until combined."
"Step 4","Drop spoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes. Immediately remove the cookies from the sheet and let them cool on racks."
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","1 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","1 tablespoon Tennessee whiskey",
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chips Cookies with Tennessee Whiskey","1 (12 ounce) bag semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift flour, baking soda, and salt together into a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until smooth. Beat the first egg into the butter until completely blended; beat in the second egg. Add whiskey and vanilla extract; beat until smooth."
"Step 4","Mix flour mixture into creamed butter mixture until just incorporated; fold in chocolate chips. Form dough into 1-inch balls and place on a baking sheet, 1 to 2 inches apart."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are lightly browned, 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool."
"Peanut Butter-Banana Cookies","cooking spray",
"Peanut Butter-Banana Cookies","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter-Banana Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter-Banana Cookies",".5 cup plain instant oatmeal",
"Peanut Butter-Banana Cookies","1 medium banana",
"Peanut Butter-Banana Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter-Banana Cookies",".25 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Peanut Butter-Banana Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Coat a baking sheet with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Beat egg in a large bowl. Add peanut butter, oatmeal. banana, sugar, chocolate chips, and vanilla extract. Place 1-inch balls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet; press balls down using a spoon."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven 9 to 12 minutes; cookies will look slightly raw. Cool 10 minutes before serving."
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II",".75 cup shortening",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II",".5 cup applesauce",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II","1 egg",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II",".5 cup chopped raisins",
"Applesauce Raisin Cookies II",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the shortening, brown sugar, applesauce and egg until smooth, Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and cloves; stir into the applesauce mixture. Drop dough by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.Granny Mabel's Best Bar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Granny Mabel's Best Bar Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Granny Mabel's Best Bar Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Granny Mabel's Best Bar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Granny Mabel's Best Bar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Granny Mabel's Best Bar Cookies","1 .5 cups butter, melted",
"Granny Mabel's Best Bar Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Granny Mabel's Best Bar Cookies","1 (12 ounce) jar caramel ice cream topping",
"Granny Mabel's Best Bar Cookies","6 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together 2 cups flour, oats, brown sugar, salt and baking soda. Mix in melted butter until evenly distributed. Press half of the mixture into the bottom of the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly toasted. Remove from the oven and immediately sprinkle with chocolate chips. Let stand. In a small bowl, mix the caramel topping with the remaining flour; drizzle evenly over the chocolate chips. Sprinkle the remaining crust mixture evenly over the caramel layer and press down lightly."
"Step 4","Bake for 15 more minutes in the preheated oven. Allow to cool completely before cutting into squares."
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups butter, softened",
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies","1 tablespoon pumpkin pie spice",
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies","cooking spray",
"Pumpkin Spice Soft Sugar Cookies",".25 cup white sugar, or as needed",
"Step 1","Beat butter and 2 cups sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla; beat until smooth."
"Step 2","Sift flour, pumpkin pie spice, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl. Add flour mixture to butter mixture and beat until flour is completely incorporated. Cover dough with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray baking sheets with cooking spray."
"Step 4","Pour 1/4 cup sugar into a shallow bowl."
"Step 5","Drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets. Moisten the bottom of a glass with water and dip the glass in sugar. Gently flatten each drop of cookie dough with the bottom of the sugared glass."
"Step 6","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until set, 5 to 7 minutes."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII","1 .25 cups shortening",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII",".75 cup margarine",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII","2 cups brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII","4 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies VII","4 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, margarine, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Mix in the vanilla and eggs until well blended. Combine the flour, baking soda and baking powder; stir into the creamed mixture until just blended. Mix in the chocolate chips. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets. Cookies should be at least 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until edges are golden. Let cookies cool for an hour or so before eating. You can try them fresh from the oven, but they will crumble and fall apart."
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup Becel® Buttery Taste or Original Margarine*",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup firmly packed light brown sugar",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup granulated sugar",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs large Naturegg™ Omega 3 eggs",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups old-fashioned or quick oats",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped dried apples or fresh apple",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Apple Spice Oatmeal Cookies","3 tablespoons HERSHEY'S® Chipits® White Chocolate Baking Chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Combine flour, baking soda and salt in medium bowl; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat Becel Buttery Taste margarine with sugars in large bowl. Beat in eggs and vanilla until blended. Gradually add in flour mixture; beat just until blended. Stir in oats, apples and cinnamon."
"Step 3","Drop by tablespoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets, 2-inches (5 cm) apart."
"Step 4","Bake 8 minutes or until edges are golden. Cool 2 minutes on wire rack; remove cookies from sheets and cool completely. Microwave chocolate in small microwave-safe bowl until melted. Drizzle cookies with chocolate."
"Italian Fig Cookies II","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Italian Fig Cookies II",".33 cup white sugar",
"Italian Fig Cookies II",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Italian Fig Cookies II",".5 cup shortening",
"Italian Fig Cookies II","2 tablespoons butter",
"Italian Fig Cookies II",".5 cup milk",
"Italian Fig Cookies II","1 egg, beaten",
"Italian Fig Cookies II","1 .5 cups dried figs",
"Italian Fig Cookies II",".75 cup golden raisins",
"Italian Fig Cookies II",".25 cup slivered almonds",
"Italian Fig Cookies II",".25 cup white sugar",
"Italian Fig Cookies II",".25 cup hot water",
"Italian Fig Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Italian Fig Cookies II","1 pinch ground black pepper",
"Step 1","In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, 1/3 cup sugar and baking powder. Cut in shortening and butter until mixture resembles small peas. Stir in the milk and egg until the dough comes together. Divide dough into two pieces, wrap and refrigerate for about 2 hours or until easy to handle."
"Step 2","In a food processor or blender, grind the figs, raisins and almonds until they are coarsely chopped. In a medium bowl, stir together the 1/4 cup of sugar, hot water, cinnamon and pepper. Stir in the fruit mixture, cover and set aside until the dough is ready."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 4","On a lightly floured surface, roll each piece of the dough out to a 12 inch square. Cut each piece into 12 3x4 inch rectangles. Using a heaping tablespoon of filling for each rectangle, spread filling along one of the short sides of the rectangle. Roll up from that side. Place rolls, seam side down, on an ungreased cookie sheet. Curve each roll slightly. Snip outer edge of the curve three times."
"Step 5","Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden brown. Glaze with your favorite confectioners' glaze."
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","1 cup butter",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","3 large eggs",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","1 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","1 cup chocolate chunks",
"Chocolate Cookies with Fleur de Sel","fleur de sel to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl. Set aside."
"Step 3","Combine butter and chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl. Heat in 30-second intervals, stirring after each interval, until chocolate is melted and creamy. Add eggs one at a time, mixing well to incorporate each one. Add brown sugar, white sugar, and vanilla extract; mix well. Fold in flour mixture until no dry streaks remain. Fold in chocolate chunks."
"Step 4","Drop rounded teaspoonfuls of cookie dough onto a baking stone or nonstick cookie sheets. Sprinkle fleur de sel over the tops."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies flatten but centers still look soft, 10 to 14 minutes. Transfer to wire racks to cool."
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I",".5 cup shortening",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I",".75 cup white sugar",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup rolled oats",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup diced apple without peel",
"Apple Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Beat in the eggs until well blended. Combine the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt; stir into the sugar mixture until well blended. Fold in the walnuts, oats and apples. Drop dough by spoonfuls about 2 inches onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Let cool on wire racks."
"Meg's Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Meg's Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Meg's Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Meg's Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Meg's Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Meg's Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","1 .33 cups packed dark brown sugar",
"Meg's Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Meg's Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Meg's Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Stir together the flour, baking soda, salt and oats; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Mix in the dry ingredients until well blended before stirring in the chocolate chips. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet at least 3 inches apart. Flatten cookies to 1/2 inch thick."
"Step 3","Bake for 21 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Easy Sweet Coconut Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Easy Sweet Coconut Cookies",".5 cup vegetable shortening",
"Easy Sweet Coconut Cookies","1 egg",
"Easy Sweet Coconut Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easy Sweet Coconut Cookies","1 cup sifted all purpose flour",
"Easy Sweet Coconut Cookies","2 tablespoons sifted all purpose flour",
"Easy Sweet Coconut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Easy Sweet Coconut Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Easy Sweet Coconut Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","With an electric mixer, cream together the sugar, vegetable shortening, egg, and vanilla extract in a bowl until light and fluffy. Sift 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons of flour together with the baking powder and salt in a bowl, and stir the flour mixture into the creamed mixture; mix in the coconut until thoroughly combined. Drop the dough by teaspoons onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until very lightly browned, about 10 minutes; allow cookies to cool on sheets for about 1 minute before removing to finish cooling on baking racks."
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","1 cup butter",
