"Lori's Awesome Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","1 teaspoon coffee flavored liqueur",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Lori's Awesome Cookies","1 .5 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream the butter and the sugars using an electric mixer. Mix in the eggs, vanilla and coffee flavored liqueur."
"Step 3","Measure the oatmeal and blend in a blender to a fine powder. In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, oatmeal, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Stir the dry ingredients into the butter mixture until blended, then stir in the candy pieces. Roll into balls and place two inches apart on cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges start to turn golden."
"Oreo® No-Bake Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Oreo® No-Bake Cookies",".75 cup butter, cut into pieces",
"Oreo® No-Bake Cookies",".67 cup milk",
"Oreo® No-Bake Cookies","2 .5 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oreo® No-Bake Cookies","1 cup crushed chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®)",
"Oreo® No-Bake Cookies","1 (4 ounce) package cookies and cream instant pudding mix (such as Jell-O® Oreo®)",
"Oreo® No-Bake Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Combine sugar, butter, and milk in a large saucepan over medium heat; bring to a boil. Cook and stir until butter has melted and sugar has dissolved a bit, about 2 minutes. Turn off heat and stir in oats, crushed cookies, pudding mix, and vanilla extract. Let stand for 5 minutes."
"Step 2","Drop spoonfuls of batter 2 inches apart onto waxed paper. Let cool until set, about 30 minutes."
"Chocolate Cream Cheese Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Cream Cheese Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Chocolate Cream Cheese Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Chocolate Cream Cheese Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Cream Cheese Cookies","1 .33 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Cream Cheese Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Cream Cheese Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips, melted",
"Chocolate Cream Cheese Cookies","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Cream Cheese Cookies",".33 cup chopped nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift flour and baking soda together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Combine cream cheese and butter in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment; beat until smooth and creamy. Gradually beat in sugar and egg. Stir in melted chocolate chips. Add flour mixture, white chocolate chips, and nuts; stir until combined."
"Step 4","Drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until firm around the edges, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet briefly before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Holiday Shortbread Cookies","1 (7 ounce) package Finlandia Perfectly Salted Butter, softened",
"Holiday Shortbread Cookies","6 tablespoons sugar, plus extra for coating",
"Holiday Shortbread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Holiday Shortbread Cookies","1 egg white, beaten with",
"Holiday Shortbread Cookies","2 teaspoons cold water",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In the bowl of a stand mixer, cream together Finlandia Salted Butter and sugar on medium high until light and fluffy, about three minutes."
"Step 3","On the lowest speed, stir in flour, and mix just until blended. Remove from mixer, and knead dough into a ball. Chill for one hour."
"Step 4","Working with half of the dough at a time, roll it to about 1/4-inch thick on a well-floured board. Cut into desired shapes, and re-roll scraps as needed to cut more. Place cookies onto the prepared baking sheet, brush with egg wash, and decorate with sugar. Bake for 15 to 17 minutes or until very lightly golden brown on bottom and cooked through. Let cool about two minutes on the pan, then transfer cookies to a rack, sugar side up, to cool completely. Store in an airtight container for up to one week."
"Cherry Snowball Cookies","1 .25 cups confectioners' sugar, divided",
"Cherry Snowball Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cherry Snowball Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Cherry Snowball Cookies",".25 cup quick cooking oats",
"Cherry Snowball Cookies",".25 cup finely chopped sweetened coconut",
"Cherry Snowball Cookies",".25 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Cherry Snowball Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Cherry Snowball Cookies","15 cherries maraschino cherries, finely chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat 1/4 cup confectioner's sugar and butter with an electric mixer until smooth. Add flour; beat for 5 seconds. Add oats; beat for 5 seconds. Add coconut; beat for 5 seconds. Add walnuts; beat for 5 seconds. Add salt; beat for 5 seconds."
"Step 3","Mix cherries into the butter mixture, beating until dough comes together and turns light pink from cherries, about 25 seconds."
"Step 4","Drop spoonfuls of the dough 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in preheated oven until slightly golden, 18 minutes. Remove from oven. Pour remaining 1 cup confectioners' sugar into a shallow dish; roll warm cookies in sugar to coat. After rolling all of the cookies once, roll again in confectioners' sugar to coat."
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","1 cup margarine",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","1 cup white sugar",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","1 egg",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","1 cup unsulfured molasses",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","4 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","3 teaspoons baking soda",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","2 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","1 teaspoon mustard powder",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","1 teaspoon instant coffee granules",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV",".75 cup milk",
"Soft Molasses Cookies IV","4 tablespoons raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease a couple of cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the sugar and lard. Gradually mix in the egg, and molasses. Sift together the flour, baking soda, ginger, dry mustard, instant coffee, and cloves; stir this into the creamed mixture alternately with the milk."
"Step 3","Drop cookie dough by heaping teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Press a raisin or maraschino cherry into the center of each one. Bake for 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies","8 drops food coloring",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies",".75 cup chocolate hazelnut spread",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Fudgy Cookies",".75 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and food coloring. Mix in the chocolate hazelnut spread. Combine the flour, baking powder, and baking soda; stir into the sugar mixture until just blended. Fold in chocolate chips. Drop dough by spoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. These cookies spread."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Coated Peanut Butter Crackers",".75 cup peanut butter",
"Chocolate Coated Peanut Butter Crackers","2 pounds vanilla flavored confectioners' coating",
"Chocolate Coated Peanut Butter Crackers","80 eaches buttery round crackers",
"Chocolate Coated Peanut Butter Crackers","2 .25 ounces colored candy sprinkles",
"Step 1","Spread approximately 1 teaspoon peanut butter on each of half of the crackers. Top with remaining crackers to make peanut butter sandwiches."
"Step 2","Melt chocolate-flavored almond bark OR vanilla candy coating in the top of a double boiler over hot, not boiling, water. Reduce heat and keep chocolate in top of double boiler over simmering water."
"Step 3","Dip each cracker sandwich in chocolate, allowing excess to drain back into pot."
"Step 4","Place coated crackers on wax paper to cool. Sprinkle with multi-colored sprinkles or other holiday decoration. Allow coating to completely set, placing in refrigerator for 15 minutes, if necessary. Store between layers of wax paper in cool, dry place, or refrigerate. These also freeze well."
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies",".5 cup finely chopped almonds",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies","3 tablespoons grated orange zest",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies","2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies",".67 cup orange marmalade",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies","2 tablespoons orange juice",
"Glazed Orange Spice Cookies",".5 cup sliced almonds for garnish",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Combine the flour, baking powder, nutmeg, cloves, cinnamon, and salt."
"Step 2","Beat the shortening and butter with an electric mixer until smooth. Add the sugar and beat until combined. Mix in the chopped almonds and orange zest. Gradually add the flour mixture to the butter mixture and stir until combined."
"Step 3","Transfer the cookie dough to a lightly floured surface and roll it into a rectangle about 13 inches long. Cut the dough into 3 1/2-inch rectangles using a fluted pastry wheel or sharp paring knife. Place the cookies on an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 12 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool slightly on the baking sheets, and then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 5","Combine the sifted confectioners' sugar, the orange marmalade, and the orange juice and stir well. Spread the glaze on the cookies and garnish with sliced almonds, if desired."
"Super Strawberry-Banana Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package strawberry cake mix",
"Super Strawberry-Banana Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Super Strawberry-Banana Cookies",".33 cup vegetable oil",
"Super Strawberry-Banana Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Super Strawberry-Banana Cookies","1 banana",
"Step 1","Mix together the cake mix, eggs, and vegetable oil."
"Step 2","Drop by teaspoonful onto foil covered cookie sheet. Cook at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 7 to 8 minutes. Do not overbake. (Overbaking will cause your cookies to be hard as rocks!)"
"Step 3","Once your cookies are all done, lightly dust with confectioners' sugar. Place in container with the banana (leave the peel on), and cover with the foil from the baking sheet. After a couple of hours, or overnight, the cookies will take on some of the banana flavor and taste great! I discovered this by accident when I sent the strawberry cookies and a banana together for the dessert in my husband's lunch!"
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Brown Sugar Chocolate Crackle Cookies",".5 cup sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Melt the chocolate chips and combine with the brown sugar and vegetable oil. Add the eggs one at a time and beat well. Stir in the vanilla."
"Step 2","Combine the flour, baking powder and salt. Add flour mixture to the chocolate mixture. Stir in the chopped walnuts. Chill dough for a few hours."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets."
"Step 4","Drop teaspoonfuls of dough in confectioners' sugar and roll to coat. Place cookies on the prepared baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes. Let cookies cool on racks.Macaroon Cookie Bars","1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix",
"Macaroon Cookie Bars",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Macaroon Cookie Bars","1 egg",
"Macaroon Cookie Bars","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Macaroon Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Macaroon Cookie Bars","1 egg",
"Macaroon Cookie Bars","1 .25 cups flaked coconut",
"Macaroon Cookie Bars","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","In large bowl, mix together the cake mix, butter and 1 egg. Mixture will be crumbly. Press into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","In another bowl, mix together the sweetened condensed milk, vanilla and 1 egg until smooth. Stir in 1 cup of the coconut and pecans. Spread the mixture evenly over the prepared crust. Sprinkle remaining 1/4 cup coconut over top."
"Step 4","Bake for 30 to 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Cool on a wire rack before cutting into bars."
"Butterscotch Icebox Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Butterscotch Icebox Cookies","2 cups packed dark brown sugar",
"Butterscotch Icebox Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Butterscotch Icebox Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Butterscotch Icebox Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Butterscotch Icebox Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Butterscotch Icebox Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Butterscotch Icebox Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Cream butter, add sugar and cream well. Beat in eggs, then add sifted dry ingredients, vanilla and nuts."
"Step 2","Shape into rolls, wrap in wax paper and freeze or put in refrigerator until firm."
"Step 3","Slice and place about an inch apart on greased cookie sheet. Bake about 12 minutes at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 4","When done, remove from pan at once with a spatula. Store in a covered container and they will remain crisp."
"Spritz Cookies IV","1 cup butter",
"Spritz Cookies IV",".75 cup white sugar",
"Spritz Cookies IV","3 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Spritz Cookies IV","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Spritz Cookies IV","3 cups cake flour",
"Spritz Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Spritz Cookies IV",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together the butter and the sugar. Add the 3 beaten egg yolks and one teaspoon of almond extract. Mix until well blended."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, baking powder and salt. Gradually sift into the butter mixture and stir well."
"Step 4","Chill until firm (2 - 3 hours)."
"Step 5","Using a cookie press, press out cookies onto a cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes."
"Waffle Iron Chocolate Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Waffle Iron Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Waffle Iron Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Waffle Iron Chocolate Cookies","2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate",
"Waffle Iron Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Waffle Iron Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Waffle Iron Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Waffle Iron Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Melt chocolate over low heat. Cream together sugar and butter or margarine. Add chocolate and mix well."
"Step 2","Add eggs and dry ingredients. Mix well."
"Step 3","Heat waffle iorn. Non stick spray can be used to prepare iron."
"Step 4","Drop about 1 Tablespoon of dough in each section of preheated iron."
"Step 5","Bake until cookies start to turn brown. Be careful because they can burn easily."
"Step 6","Cool and frost with a white powdered sugar frosting. (See recipe for Vanilla Glaze.)"
"Cake Mix Cookies","1 (15.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Cake Mix Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cake Mix Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Cake Mix Cookies",".5 (11 ounce) package chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix cake mix, eggs, and vegetable oil together in a bowl until well mixed; fold in chocolate chips. Roll cookie dough into 12 balls and arrange on a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned around the edges, 7 to 9 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet 2 to 3 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool."
"Blueberry Shortbread Bars",".5 cup cold unsalted butter, cut into small cubes",
"Blueberry Shortbread Bars","1 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Blueberry Shortbread Bars",".5 cup white sugar",
"Blueberry Shortbread Bars",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Blueberry Shortbread Bars",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Blueberry Shortbread Bars",".25 teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder",
"Blueberry Shortbread Bars","1 egg yolk",
"Blueberry Shortbread Bars",".5 teaspoon ice water, or more if needed",
"Blueberry Shortbread Bars",".75 cup fresh blueberries",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Place butter cubes in the freezer for 15 minutes."
"Step 2","Whisk together flour, sugar, salt, and baking powder in a large bowl. Sprinkle in Chinese five-spice powder."
"Step 3","Cut in frozen butter using a pastry cutter until the butter pieces are about the size of peas. Mix in egg yolk and continue cutting in until thoroughly combined. Drizzle in ice water and stir to combine. The dough should just come together when pinched between your fingers."
"Step 4","Pour about 3/4 of the crumb mixture into an ungreased 9x9-inch baking dish. Press the mixture down firmly using the back of a spoon. Spread blueberries in one layer and sprinkle with remaining crumbly dough."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until the top is golden and sides are crisp and browned, 30 to 35 minutes. Cool completely before serving."
"Peanut Butter/Chocolate Chip Cookie Bars",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter/Chocolate Chip Cookie Bars","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Peanut Butter/Chocolate Chip Cookie Bars","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Peanut Butter/Chocolate Chip Cookie Bars","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Peanut Butter/Chocolate Chip Cookie Bars","1 cup peanut butter chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","Melt butter over low heat."
"Step 3","Pour butter into 13 x 9 inch pan. Sprinkle graham cracker crumbs over butter."
"Step 4","Pour condensed milk over crumbs. Sprinkle chocolate and peanut butter chips over milk mixture and press down firmly."
"Step 5","Bake 25 to 30 minutes."
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie",".5 teaspoon salt",
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup vegetable oil",
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie",".5 cup white sugar",
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 large eggs eggs",
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"The Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Stir together the flour, baking soda and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the vegetable oil, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and almond extracts. Blend in the dry ingredients, then fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Oreo® Cookie Bars","30 cookies chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®), crushed",
"Oreo® Cookie Bars","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Oreo® Cookie Bars","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Oreo® Cookie Bars",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oreo® Cookie Bars",".25 cup butter, softened",
"Oreo® Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oreo® Cookie Bars","1 cup sweetened flaked coconut",
"Oreo® Cookie Bars","2 tablespoons powdered sugar, or more as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease an 8x8-inch baking pan."
"Step 2","Mix cookies, sweetened condensed milk, chocolate chips, flour, butter, and vanilla together in a large bowl. Fold in coconut. Press mixture into the prepared baking pan."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 25 to 30 minutes. Dust with powdered sugar."
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon apple pie spice",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups firmly packed brown sugar",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup LAND O LAKES® Butter, softened",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup applesauce",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies","1 LAND O LAKES® Egg",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies","2 .5 cups uncooked old-fashioned oats",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup caramel bits",
"Caramel Apple Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup finely chopped dried apple rings",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 375 degrees F. Line cookie sheet with parchment paper; set aside."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda, salt and apple pie spice in bowl; set aside."
"Step 3","Combine brown sugar and butter in another bowl; beat until well mixed. Add applesauce, egg and vanilla; beat, scraping sides of bowl occasionally, until well mixed. Add flour mixture; beat at low speed until just combined. Stir in oats, caramel bits and dried apples."
"Step 4","Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls, 2 inches apart, onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Let stand 3 minutes on cookie sheet; remove to cooling rack."
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies","4 (1 ounce) squares milk chocolate, chopped",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies",".75 cup finely chopped blanched almonds",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies","1 .75 cups unbleached all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Almond Freezer Cookies",".5 cup apricot preserves",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, combine the almonds and the milk chocolate. Add half of the sugar, and mix well. Set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat the butter until soft. Stir in the vanilla and remaining sugar until well blended."
"Step 3","Mix in the egg and apricot preserves. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and cocoa powder. Stir into the egg mixture. Add the chocolate and nut mixture and stir until well blended. Mixture will be stiff."
"Step 4","Spread two lengths of plastic wrap about 12 inches long on a counter. Spoon half of the dough down each length of the wrap, forming strips 8 to 9 inches long. Bring the two long sides of the wrap together on top of one of the strips of dough. Press together close to the dough and smooth into a strip about 9 inches long, 3 inches wide and 1 inch high. Repeat with second strip. Freeze for at least 1 1/2 hours, or as long as you'd like."
"Step 5","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a cookie sheet with aluminum foil or baking parchment. Unwrap the frozen dough and cut 1/4 inch thick slices. Place on cookie sheets 2 inches apart."
"Step 6","Bake for about 11 minutes. Let cool on wire racks."
"Mini Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mini Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Mini Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Mini Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mini Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package miniature chocolate chips, divided",
"Mini Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies","1 tablespoon vegetable shortening",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, butter, sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl until dough is smooth. Reserve 1/4 the chocolate chips; stir remaining chips into dough until evenly distributed. Roll dough into 24 small logs and place a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until slightly golden around the edges, 15 to 20 minutes. Cool in baking sheet for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Step 4","Melt shortening in a small saucepan over medium-low heat; stir in reserved chocolate chips until melted, about 5 minutes. Dip cookies into chocolate and return to baking sheet. Refrigerate until firm."
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup butter, softened",
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup mashed bananas",
"Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Sift the flour, baking powder, salt, and baking soda together, and set aside."
"Step 2","Cream the butter with the sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and vanilla. Mix in the mashed bananas. Add the flour mixture, and stir until just combined. Stir in the chocolate chips. Drop by spoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven for 12 to 15 minutes."
"Persimmon Cookies III",".5 cup shortening",
"Persimmon Cookies III","1 cup white sugar",
"Persimmon Cookies III","1 egg",
"Persimmon Cookies III","1 cup persimmon pulp",
"Persimmon Cookies III","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Persimmon Cookies III",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Persimmon Cookies III",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Persimmon Cookies III",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Persimmon Cookies III",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Persimmon Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Persimmon Cookies III",".5 cup raisins",
"Persimmon Cookies III",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Beat in the egg and persimmon pulp. Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves and salt; stir into the persimmon mixture. Fold in raisins and walnuts. Drop by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are firm. Let cool on the cookie sheets for 1 minute before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice",
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup solid pack pumpkin puree",
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies","2 cups white chocolate chips",
"White Chocolate Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","In a small bowl, whisk together the flour, pumpkin pie spice and baking soda."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, with an electric mixer, cream butter and sugar. Beat in pumpkin pie puree. Beat in the eggs and vanilla. Beat in the flour mixture until just combined. Stir in the white chocolate and pecans."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded tablespoon 2 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) for 20-22 minutes until just set."
"Scottish Shortbread II","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Scottish Shortbread II",".33 cup white sugar",
"Scottish Shortbread II",".75 cup butter",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Blend all ingredients well. Dough will be stiff."
"Step 3","Press into a 9 x 9 inch buttered dish. Prick top with a fork."
"Step 4","Bake until pale golden brown on the edges. Cool and cut into squares."
"Sand Art Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Sand Art Cookies",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Sand Art Cookies",".5 cup candy-coated chocolate pieces",
"Sand Art Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Sand Art Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sand Art Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Sand Art Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Sand Art Cookies",".5 cup crisp rice cereal",
"Sand Art Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","In a 1 quart or 1 liter jar, layer the ingredients in the order given. Lightly pack down the jar after each addition. Attach a card with the following instructions:"
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a cookie sheet. Empty the entire contents of the jar into a medium bowl. Add 1 large egg and 1/2 cup of margarine melted; mix well. Form dough into 1 inch balls and bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Makes about 2 dozen cookies."
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies",".25 cup chopped walnuts",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 (3 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies",".5 cup white chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Add the eggs, milk and vanilla, stirring after each addition. Add the dry ingredients and mix until a stiff dough forms. Separate 1/4 of the dough form the rest and set aside in a small bowl. Add the nuts to the dough in the small bowl. Add the pudding mix and 3/4 cup of chocolate chips to the large portion of dough; mix until blended."
"Step 3","Roll the pudding flavored dough into walnut sized balls, and place them 1 1/2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets. Flatten the balls using your hand or the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar. Roll the dough from the small bowl into marble sized balls, place 1 ball on top of each of the flattened cookies. Then, on top of each cookie, place 1 of the white chocolate chips."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until cookies are set. Remove from the baking sheet to cool on wire racks. When cool, dust with confectioners' sugar if desired."
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies",".75 cup vegetable shortening",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons peppermint extract",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies","1 .75 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies","2 tablespoons vegetable shortening",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies","1 cup sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies","1 drop peppermint extract, or to taste",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies","1 drop red food coloring, or as needed",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies",".25 teaspoon milk, or as needed",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies",".25 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Filled Peppermint Valentine Heart Cookies","2 teaspoons vegetable shortening",
"Step 1","Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl until thoroughly combined. With an electric mixer or stand mixer, beat together the butter, 3/4 cup shortening, sugar, and brown sugar in a large bowl until fluffy; beat in the eggs, 1/4 cup milk, and 1 1/2 teaspoons of peppermint extract. Gradually beat in the flour mixture, about 1 cup at a time, until the mixture forms a soft dough. Divide the dough into 4 pieces, cover, and chill for 1 hour in refrigerator."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","To make filling, melt 1 3/4 cups of milk chocolate chips with 2 tablespoons of vegetable shortening in the top of a double boiler over hot (not boiling) water. Stir the mixture until very smooth, and remove the filling from the heat to cool and slightly thicken."
"Step 4","Remove one piece of cookie dough from refrigerator at a time, and working on a floured surface, roll the cookie dough out 1/8-inch thick, and cut out 120 hearts (total) with a 2 1/2-inch heart-shaped cookie cutter. Place half the hearts onto ungreased baking sheets. Carefully spread those hearts with about a teaspoon of the chocolate filling, avoiding the edges, and top each with another heart cookie. Gently pinch the edges of both cookies together to enclose the filling."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes; let cool for 1 minute on the baking sheets before removing to finish cooling on racks."
"Step 6","For peppermint drizzle, mix together the confectioners' sugar, 1 drop of peppermint extract (to taste), red food coloring to your desired shade of pink or red, and milk as needed in a bowl to make a smooth, thin icing. For chocolate drizzle, melt 1/4 cup of milk chocolate chips with 2 teaspoons of vegetable shortening over hot (not boiling) water in a double boiler; stir and heat until the mixture is thin enough to drip in strings from a spoon."
"Step 7","Drizzle each cooled cookie with a little peppermint drizzle on one side, and a little chocolate drizzle on the other. Let the cookies stand so the drizzle sets, about 30 minutes."
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","3 cups oats",
"Oatmeal Cinnamon Cookies","1 cup cinnamon chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter and brown sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Beat eggs and vanilla extract into creamed butter until incorporated. Mix flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon into creamed butter mixture until batter is just mixed; fold in oats and cinnamon chips. Drop batter, 1 to 2 tablespoons per cookie, onto a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are lightly browned, 10 to 15 minutes.Cornmeal Cookies II",".75 cup shortening",
"Cornmeal Cookies II",".75 cup white sugar",
"Cornmeal Cookies II","1 egg",
"Cornmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cornmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon butter flavored extract",
"Cornmeal Cookies II","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cornmeal Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cornmeal Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Cornmeal Cookies II",".5 cup cornmeal",
"Step 1","Cream together the shortening and the sugar. Add the egg. Sift together the flour, baking powder and cornmeal. Add in the vanilla, butter flavoring and salt."
"Step 2","Drop by spoonful onto greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until edges just turning slightly brown. Do not overbake."
"Chanukah Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chanukah Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chanukah Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chanukah Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Chanukah Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chanukah Cookies","2 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Chanukah Cookies","1 teaspoon orange juice",
"Chanukah Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking sheet. Whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt."
"Step 2","Beat the butter and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in one egg yolk until completely incorporated. Beat in the other egg yolk along with the orange juice and vanilla. Mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4-inch thickness. Cut into desired holiday shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies on prepared baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are golden, 10 to 12 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 cup butter, melted",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 cups brown sugar",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the melted butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time. Combine the flour, baking powder and baking soda, gradually stir into the sugar mixture. Fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup white sugar",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup shortening",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup vegetable oil",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 large eggs eggs",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","4 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon salt",
"My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, bowl, beat together the white sugar, brown sugar, oil and shortening until smooth. Stir in eggs and vanilla, beating well after each addition. Combine the flour, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt, stir into the sugar mixture. Finally , fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto an unprepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheet to cool on wire racks."
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 cups margarine, melted",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 cups raisin bran cereal",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 cups raisins",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 cup shredded coconut",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine the margarine, sugars, eggs and vanilla. Stir in the flour baking soda, baking powder, raisin bran, oats, raisins, coconut, chopped nuts and chocolate chips. Mix until well combined. Drop large tablespoon sized scoops onto a baking sheet. Bake until golden approximately 10 minutes."
"Peanut Butter Balls II","1 .5 cups peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Balls II","1 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Balls II","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Peanut Butter Balls II","1 .33 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Peanut Butter Balls II","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Peanut Butter Balls II","1 tablespoon shortening",
"Step 1","Mix together peanut butter, butter or margarine, confectioners' sugar, and graham cracker crumbs. Shape into 1 inch balls."
"Step 2","Melt chocolate chips and shortening in top of double boiler. Dip balls into chocolate mixture and let dry on waxed paper. (Poke each ball with a toothpick for easier dipping.)"
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies","2 teaspoons instant coffee granules",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies","2 tablespoons coffee-flavored liqueur",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Christine's Coffee Liqueur Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). In a small bowl, dissolve instant coffee crystals into the coffee liqueur; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. Gradually add eggs and coffee mixture while mixing. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a cookie sheet. Cookies should be at least 2 inches apart. Bake for 23 to 25 minutes. Immediately transfer cookies to cooling rack after baking. These keep well at room temperature or refrigerated."
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies","2 cups shortening",
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies","4 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Chip Marble Cookies","4 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, water, white sugar and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour and baking soda, stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in the chocolate chips, then fold in the cocoa powder last to create a marbled effect. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto a cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Molasses Cookies VI","1 cup butter, softened",
"Molasses Cookies VI","1 cup molasses",
"Molasses Cookies VI",".5 cup sour cream",
"Molasses Cookies VI","1 cup brown sugar",
"Molasses Cookies VI","1 tablespoon distilled white vinegar",
"Molasses Cookies VI","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Molasses Cookies VI","1 tablespoon baking soda",
"Molasses Cookies VI","1 teaspoon salt",
"Molasses Cookies VI","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Molasses Cookies VI","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the butter, molasses, sour cream, brown sugar and vinegar until smooth and well blended. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, ginger and cinnamon; stir into the molasses mixture. Dough will be very stiff when complete."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. Cookies can be iced, when cooled, with any standard icing recipe."
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter and Jelly Cookies",".5 cup any flavor fruit jam",
"Step 1","In a mixing bowl, cream shortening peanut butter and sugars. Beat in egg. Combine dry ingredients; gradually add to creamed mixture."
"Step 2","Cover and chill for 1 hour."
"Step 3","Roll into 1 inch balls; place 2 inches apart on greased baking sheets. Flatten slightly. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 minutes. Cool on wire rack. Spread jam on the bottom of half of the cookie; top with remaining cookie half."
"Mom's Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Mom's Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Mom's Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Mom's Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Mom's Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mom's Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Mom's Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mom's Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mom's Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Mom's Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Mom's Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Mom's Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Mom's Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Mom's Cookies","1 cup dates, pitted and chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together the shortening and the butter. Add the brown sugar and cream until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs until well blended."
"Step 3","Sift the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves over the creamed mixture. Mix in then stir in the raisins, nuts and dates."
"Step 4","Drop cookies onto ungreased baking sheets and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes or until golden."
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies","1 egg",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground cloves",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies","1 .5 cups grated zucchini",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Soft Zucchini Spice Cookies","1 teaspoon orange zest",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth, then beat in the egg. Combine the flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves; stir into the creamed mixture alternately with the milk. Finally, mix in the zucchini, walnuts, raisins and orange zest. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are lightly browned."
"Monster Cookies I","6 large eggs eggs",
"Monster Cookies I","2 .33 cups packed brown sugar",
"Monster Cookies I","2 cups white sugar",
"Monster Cookies I",".5 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Monster Cookies I","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Monster Cookies I","1 cup butter",
"Monster Cookies I","2 .67 cups peanut butter",
"Monster Cookies I","9 cups rolled oats",
"Monster Cookies I","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Cream butter and peanut butter together. Add the sugars and stir until well mixed."
"Step 3","Add eggs one at a time, then add vanilla."
"Step 4","Mix oatmeal and baking soda separately, then stir into batter."
"Step 5","Add chocolate chips last."
"Step 6","Drop by heaping teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake for 12-15 minutes."
"Old Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies III","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Old Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies III",".5 cup white sugar",
"Old Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies III",".67 cup butter, softened",
"Old Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies III",".25 cup water",
"Old Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies III","1 egg",
"Old Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies III","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Old Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies III",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Old Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies III","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Old Fashioned Oatmeal Cookies III","3 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","Combine all ingredients in order given. Refrigerate dough for several hours or overnight to get a thick consistency."
"Step 2","Drop by rounded teaspoonful onto lightly greased baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) 12-14 minutes. Let stand 1 minute before removing from baking sheet."
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies",".5 cup walnuts",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies",".5 cup whole wheat flour",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies","1 teaspoon kosher salt",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies",".75 cup unsalted butter, room temperature",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies",".5 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies","1 large egg",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies",".5 cup mashed very ripe banana",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies","1 cup old-fashioned rolled oats",
"Chocolate Chip Banana Cookies","8 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Spread walnuts onto a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until walnuts are toasted and fragrant, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from oven and cool; coarsely chop."
"Step 4","Whisk all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, salt, and baking soda together in a bowl. Beat butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until pale and fluffy; add egg and vanilla extract. Beat until just combined. Beat banana into creamed butter mixture until just combined."
"Step 5","Stir flour mixture into creamed butter mixture until dough is just combined; fold in oats, chocolate chips, and walnuts. Drop heaping spoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheets, spacing each mound about 1 1/2 inch apart."
"Step 6","Bake on the center rack of the preheated oven for 6 minutes. Rotate pans and bake until edges are browned, 6 to 7 more minutes. Cool cookies on the baking sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Maple Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Maple Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Maple Cookies","1 egg",
"Maple Cookies","1 cup real maple syrup",
"Maple Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Maple Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Maple Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Maple Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Maple Cookies",".33 cup granulated sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream the butter and brown sugar. Add the egg, syrup and vanilla. Mix until well blended. Sift together the flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into mixture until well blended. Shape into 1 inch balls and roll in sugar. Place on cookie sheets about 2 inches apart and flatten slightly."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Let cool on wire rack."
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup water",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup powdered protein supplement",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .33 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, peanut butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and water. Combine the flour, protein powder, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in chocolate chips. Drop dough by heaping spoonfuls onto un-greased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Urban Legend Cookies II","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","5 cups rolled oats",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","2 cups butter",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","2 cups white sugar",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","4 large eggs eggs",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","4 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","8 ounces finely grated chocolate bar",
"Urban Legend Cookies II","3 cups chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter and both sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. In a blender or food processor, process the oats until finely chopped."
"Step 3","Add the chopped oats, flour, baking soda, salt, baking powder into the creamed butter and sugar mixture and mix well. Stir in the chocolate and nuts."
"Step 4","Roll dough into 1 1/2 - 2 inch balls (do not press) and place 2 inches apart on a cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes."
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 cup butter, melted",
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies","1 cup crushed pistachios",
"Amazing White Chocolate Chip Pistachio Cookies",".5 cup white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a large bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add eggs 1 at a time, beating well after each addition; stir in vanilla extract."
"Step 3","Mix flour, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl; gradually stir into the creamed butter mixture until dough is just mixed. Fold pistachios and white chocolate chips into the dough."
"Step 4","Drop spoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges begin to crisp, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool cookies on the baking sheet for 2 to 3 minutes; transfer to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Cornmeal Cookies IV","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV","1 cup white sugar",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV","3 large eggs eggs",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV","1 tablespoon frozen orange juice concentrate",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV","2 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV","1 cup cornmeal",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Cornmeal Cookies IV",".66 cup sweetened dried cranberries",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and orange juice concentrate. Combine the flour, cornmeal, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves; stir into the sugar mixture. Fold in the dried cranberries. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.Cream Cheese Kolacky","3 ounces cream cheese",
"Cream Cheese Kolacky",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cream Cheese Kolacky","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Cream Cheese Kolacky",".5 cup any flavor fruit jam",
"Cream Cheese Kolacky",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Mix cream cheese and butter until smooth. Add flour slowly until well blended. Shape into a ball and chill overnight or for several hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll dough out 1/8 inch thick on a floured pastry board. Cut into 2 1/2 inch squares and place about 1/2 teaspoon jam or preserves in the center. Overlap opposite corners and pinch together. Place on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on wire racks. Sprinkle kolacky lightly with confectioner's sugar."
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Swirl and Chip Cookies","⅛ teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, rolled oats, baking soda and salt, stir into the creamed mixture. Then stir in the chocolate chips. Fold the cocoa powder in slightly, to create a marbled effect."
"Step 3","Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool for 2 minutes on the baking sheet before removing to cool on wire racks. Store in an airtight container."
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 ⅛ cups all-purpose flour",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies",".5 cup wheat germ",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 .25 cups golden raisins",
"Olympic Gold Medal Cookies","1 .33 cups chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the oats, wheat germ, raisins and walnuts. Drop cookies by heaping tablespoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Wet hands and flatten cookies slightly. Cookies should be about 3/4 inch thick, and 2 1/2 inches wide before baking."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","1 cup margarine",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon juice",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","3 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies",".25 cup margarine, softened",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons lemon juice",
"Shiela's Sugar Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the 1 cup margarine, shortening, white sugar and 1 cup confectioners' sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 teaspoon lemon juice. Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","To make frosting, combine the 3 cups confectioners' sugar, 1/4 cup margarine and 1 1/2 teaspoons lemon juice in a medium bowl. Mix until smooth, adding milk 1 tablespoon at a time until frosting has reached its desired consistency."
"Easy Layer Bar Cookies",".5 cup butter or margarine",
"Easy Layer Bar Cookies","1 cup graham cracker crumbs",
"Easy Layer Bar Cookies","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Easy Layer Bar Cookies","1 .5 cups butterscotch chips",
"Easy Layer Bar Cookies","1 .5 cups flaked coconut",
"Easy Layer Bar Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Easy Layer Bar Cookies","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Melt the butter or margarine in a 9x13 inch baking pan. Sprinkle the graham cracker crumbs evenly over the butter. Sprinkle on the chocolate chips and butterscotch chips. Cover with the flaked coconut. Sprinkle the walnuts on top of the coconut layer. Finally, pour the condensed milk over everything as evenly as you can."
"Step 3","Bake for 30 to 35 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool, and cut into bars."
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)","3 .33 cups vanilla wafer cookies, crushed",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)","2 tablespoons water",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)","1 .75 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)",".33 cup butter, room temperature",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)",".25 cup rum",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)",".5 cup butter, room temperature",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)","2 tablespoons rum, or to taste",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)","1 tablespoon sweetened condensed milk",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)","1 egg yolk",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, for dusting",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)",".25 cup confectioners' sugar, for dusting",
"Beehive Cookies (Czech Traditional Vceli Uly)","24 wafers vanilla wafer cookies",
"Step 1","Combine the cookie crumbs, water, 1 3/4 cups confectioners' sugar, 1/3 cup butter, 1/4 cup rum, and cocoa powder. Work the mixture into a smooth dough, wrap it in plastic, and refrigerate for 1 hour or until firm."
"Step 2","Beat the 1/2 cup butter with 3/4 cup confectioners' sugar. Mix in 2 tablespoons of rum, sweetened condensed milk, and egg yolk."
"Step 3","Grease a beehive mold or a walnut shell and coat it with cocoa or confectioners' sugar. Divide the chilled dough into balls to fit the size of your mold. Roll the balls in cocoa or sugar. Push the dough into the mold and make a hollow in the center."
"Step 4","Use a pastry bag or sandwich bag with the corner snipped off to pipe the filling in the cookie shell. Cover the filling with a vanilla wafer (the beehive base), and carefully remove the mold. Repeat with the remaining cookies. Store beehives in a cool place. Flavor will improve for 2 or 3 days."
"Susan's Cookies",".25 cup packed brown sugar",
"Susan's Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Susan's Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Susan's Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Susan's Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Susan's Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Susan's Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Susan's Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Susan's Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Susan's Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the white sugar , brown sugar and butter. Stir in the eggs, one at a time, and vanilla. Combine the flour, rolled oats, baking powder and baking soda, add to the sugar mixture and mix well with your hands to form a dough. Mix in the coconut last."
"Step 3","Drop cookies by teaspoons onto an unprepared cookie sheet and bake for 8 to 10 minutes, in the preheated oven. Cookies will turn golden brown. Remove to cool on baking racks."
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie","1 (18.25 ounce) package French vanilla cake mix (such as Duncan Hines® Moist Deluxe)",
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie","3 large eggs large eggs",
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie",".5 cup all-purpose flour, plus",
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie","3 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie",".33 cup soybean oil",
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie",".5 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature",
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie",".33 cup shortening",
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie","3 tablespoons half-and-half",
"My Version of the Famous Lofthouse® Cookie","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheet with silicone baking mats."
"Step 2","Beat cake mix, eggs, 1/2 cup flour, 3 tablespoons flour, and soybean oil together in a stand mixer until stiff."
"Step 3","Divide and roll dough into 1-inch balls and arrange on prepared baking sheets and flatten to about 1/2-inch thick."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until somewhat firm in the center, 12 to 14 minutes. Remove from oven and let cookies sit undisturbed until set, about 5 minutes more."
"Step 5","Spread a sheet of aluminum foil onto a countertop. Transfer cookies to foil to cool completely, at least 20 minutes."
"Step 6","Beat confectioners' sugar, butter, shortening, half-and-half, and vanilla extract together with a hand mixer until smooth; spoon into a pastry bag and pipe onto cooled cookies or just spread onto cookies using a spatula."
"Zucchini Nut Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies","1 egg",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies","1 cup grated zucchini",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Zucchini Nut Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Cream together shortening, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in egg. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in zucchini, raisins, and walnuts. Drop by rounded tablespoons onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned. Cool on the cookie sheets for a few minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon apple pie spice",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies","2 cups whole wheat flour",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons white sugar",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Soft Whole Wheat Sugar Cookies",".5 pound mini candy-coated chocolates",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl, combine first 10 ingredients and blend well. Stir in whole wheat flour."
"Step 3","Shape into 1 inch balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet, 2 inches apart. Flatten each cookie slightly with a fork."
"Step 4","Combine sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle over each cookie. Decorate with M and M's."
"Step 5","Bake in pre-heated oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown."
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Self Frosting Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the brown sugar, white sugar, and vegetable oil until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the creamed mixture, then mix in the rolled oats. Cover and chill for at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Roll cookie dough into walnut sized balls, roll the balls in the confectioners sugar to coat, and place 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Anise Cookies (Springerle)","4 large eggs eggs",
"Anise Cookies (Springerle)","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Anise Cookies (Springerle)","2 teaspoons lemon zest",
"Anise Cookies (Springerle)","4 .5 cups cake flour",
"Anise Cookies (Springerle)","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Anise Cookies (Springerle)","4 drops anise oil",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, beat the eggs and sugar until very light and fluffy. Stir in the anise oil and lemon zest. Add the flour and baking powder; mix until well blended. Cover and chill dough for 3 to 4 hours."
"Step 2","On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/4 to 1/8 inch thickness. Use a springerle rolling pin or board to make the designs. Cut into 1 1/2 inch rectangles, place onto a cookie sheet, and let them sit out overnight, uncovered, in a cool dry place."
"Step 3","The next morning, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Bake the cookies for 15 to 20 minutes. Do not let the cookies brown. Allow cookies to cool, and store in an airtight tin for 1 week to blend the flavors."
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars",".75 cup unsalted butter, cut into cubes",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars","4 large eggs eggs",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars","1 tablespoon all-purpose flour",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars","1 tablespoon lemon zest",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars",".5 cup lemon juice",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars","2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars","1 cup white sugar",
"Cheesecake Lemon Bars","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly butter a 9x13-inch baking dish."
"Step 2","Whisk together 1 1/2 cup flour and confectioners' sugar in a mixing bowl. Cut in the cold butter with a knife or pastry blender until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Press the crumbs into the bottom and up the sides of the prepared baking dish to form a crust."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 15 to 18 minutes. Remove from oven, and set aside."
"Step 4","Whisk together 4 eggs, 1 1/2 cup sugar, 1 tablespoon flour, lemon zest, and lemon juice in a bowl. Pour lemon mixture into the prepared crust. Skim off any bubbles from the surface of the filling. Mix the cream cheese and 1 cup sugar in a bowl until well blended. Whisk in 2 eggs, then spread over the lemon mixture. The mixtures will separate during baking."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until the filling is set, about 30 minutes."
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","1 cup white sugar",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","1 egg",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","2 tablespoons milk",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","1 cup confectioners' sugar, divided",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups",".33 cup pumpkin puree",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","2 .75 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups",".25 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Dianne's Pumpkin Cookie Cups","1 pinch ground cloves",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease 32 miniature muffin cups."
"Step 2","Sift flour, baking powder, salt, and 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg in a bowl. In a separate large mixing bowl, cream unsalted butter with sugar with an electric mixer until smooth and workable; beat in egg and milk. Set the mixer to low speed and and gradually beat in flour mixture, beating just until the dough comes together."
"Step 3","Pinch off dough by tablespoon, roll into a ball, and place balls into the prepared mini muffin cups."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until edges start to turn golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let stand for 1 minute. Use the back of a rounded teaspoon measure to press a small depression into the top of each cookie. Let the cookies cool for 5 minutes in pan before removing to finish cooling on a rack. It helps to give the cookies a little twist as you lift them out."
"Step 5","Beat cream cheese with 1 cup confectioners' sugar in a bowl with an electric mixer until smooth. Slowly beat in pumpkin puree until thoroughly combined.
