Beat in remaining 2 3/4 cups confectioners' sugar, a little at a time. Stir in cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg, 1/4 teaspoon ginger, and a pinch of cloves. Spoon or pipe the pumpkin mixture into each cookie cup."
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups quick cooking oats",
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Selma's Best Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Cream together shortening, white sugar, brown sugar. Then add 1 beaten egg."
"Step 2","Sift together flour, baking soda, and ground cinnamon and add to first mixture. Then add quick rolled oats, finely crushed walnuts or pecans and vanilla."
"Step 3","Cover and chill for an hour."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 5","Place walnut sized pieces of dough on a greased cookie sheet. Butter the bottom of a small glass, dip in sugar and flatten out the little pieces. You need not rebutter each time. Bake for 10 minutes."
"Drop Sugar Cookies II","2 cups butter, softened",
"Drop Sugar Cookies II","2 .5 cups shortening",
"Drop Sugar Cookies II","12 cups white sugar",
"Drop Sugar Cookies II","18 large eggs eggs",
"Drop Sugar Cookies II","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Drop Sugar Cookies II","24 cups all-purpose flour",
"Drop Sugar Cookies II","2 tablespoons baking soda",
"Drop Sugar Cookies II","2 tablespoons salt",
"Drop Sugar Cookies II","4 .5 cups sour milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter, shortening and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs a few at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture alternately with the sour milk. Use a size 16 cookie scoop or 1/4 cup measure to scoop out cookies onto the prepared cookie sheets. Cookies should be spaced at least 3 inches apart. Test a couple in the oven to see how much they spread, then see if they need to be flattened before the bake."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until the bottoms begin to turn golden. Let cool on baking sheets."
"Fried Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Fried Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Fried Cookies","2 .5 tablespoons shortening",
"Fried Cookies","2 .5 tablespoons brandy",
"Fried Cookies","2 teaspoons anise seed",
"Fried Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Fried Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fried Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil for frying",
"Fried Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a large bowl beat together eggs and sugar until thick and light colored. Then beat in shortening, brandy, anise seeds (optional) and salt. Beat in flour gradually."
"Step 2","On a floured surface, knead dough into a smooth ball. Divide ball into two equal pieces, wrap in waxed paper and chill in refrigerator for at least two hours."
"Step 3","Roll one piece of dough into a rectangle approximately 12 x 15 inches. (The other piece of dough should be left in refrigerator until ready to be rolled.) Using pastry wheel, cut dough into strips 6 x 1 inch."
"Step 4","Make a vertical slit in top 1/3 of the strip and draw the bottom end of it through OR tie a knot in the center. Repeat with remaining dough and set aside."
"Step 5","Heat oil in a deep frying pan to 360 degrees F (185 degrees C). Deep fry strips until golden brown. Drain on paper towels, cool, and sprinkle heavily with confectioners' sugar."
"Quick and Easy Brownies","1 cup butter, melted",
"Quick and Easy Brownies","2 cups white sugar",
"Quick and Easy Brownies",".5 cup cocoa powder",
"Quick and Easy Brownies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Quick and Easy Brownies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Quick and Easy Brownies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Quick and Easy Brownies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Quick and Easy Brownies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Quick and Easy Brownies",".5 cup walnut halves",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13-inch pan."
"Step 2","Combine the melted butter, sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla, eggs, flour, baking powder, and salt. Spread the batter into the prepared pan. Decorate with walnut halves, if desired."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out with crumbs, not wet. Cool on wire rack."
"Mom's Cookie Recipe","1 cup roasted Spanish peanuts",
"Mom's Cookie Recipe","5 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Mom's Cookie Recipe","1 cup white sugar",
"Mom's Cookie Recipe","1 cup light corn syrup",
"Mom's Cookie Recipe","1 cup peanut butter",
"Step 1","Grease a 9x13 inch baking pan. Pour cereal and peanuts into the pan and spread around evenly."
"Step 2","In a heavy sauce pan, bring sugar and corn syrup to a rolling boil, over medium heat. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter. Pour the sugar mixture evenly over the cereal and peanuts. Let cool and cut into squares."
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","1 (1 ounce) square milk chocolate",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies",".75 cup white sugar, divided, or as needed",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","1 large egg",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate-Cinnamon Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Microwave butter, unsweetened chocolate, and milk chocolate in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl for 15-second intervals, stirring after each interval, until butter is melted, about 2 minutes. Remove from the microwave and stir until chocolate is melted and combined."
"Step 2","Stir 1/2 cup white and brown sugar into the melted chocolate mixture until well blended. Stir in egg and vanilla extract until completely blended."
"Step 3","Mix together flour, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in a large bowl. Add chocolate mixture to flour mixture, mixing until well combined. Place dough in the refrigerator to cool for 30 minutes."
"Step 4","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Place remaining 1/4 cup white sugar in a small, shallow bowl."
"Step 5","Remove dough from the refrigerator and roll into 1-inch balls; knead dough before shaping if too firm. Roll balls in sugar, place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheets, and flatten with the bottom of a glass or a spatula."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are set, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","1 cup butter or margarine",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies",".5 cup water",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","1 .5 cups raisins",
"Jumbo Breakfast Cookies","6 cups toasted oat cereal rings (such as Cheerios®)",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a very large bowl, mix together the sugar, peanut butter, butter, water, vanilla and eggs until smooth. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the batter. Mix in the oats and raisins, then carefully stir in the cereal. Drop 1/2 cupfuls of dough onto ungreased cookie sheets, spacing cookies about 4 inches apart. Flatten cookies to 1 inch thick."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are lightly browned at the edges. Let stand on the cookie sheets for 5 minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely. Store at room temperature. I like to put each cookie into a sandwich bag which makes them easy to grab on the way out the door."
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups bread flour",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter, melted",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 cups brown sugar",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon peppermint extract",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"Thick Mint Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag dark chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Combine flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl."
"Step 2","Beat the butter, shortening, brown sugar, and white sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat the whole egg into the butter mixture until completely blended, then beat in the vanilla extract and peppermint extract with the egg yolk. Mix the flour mixture into the wet ingredients until just incorporated. Fold in the chocolate chips, mixing just enough to evenly combine. Scoop up the dough by heaping teaspoons and roll into 1/2-inch balls. Place 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges of the cookies become firm (the center will be slightly soft), about 10 minutes. Cool on the baking sheets for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Lemon Square Bars","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Lemon Square Bars","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Lemon Square Bars","1 cup butter, melted",
"Lemon Square Bars","4 large eggs eggs",
"Lemon Square Bars","2 cups white sugar",
"Lemon Square Bars","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Lemon Square Bars",".25 cup all-purpose flour",
"Lemon Square Bars","⅝ cup lemon juice",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together 2 cups flour and confectioners' sugar. Blend in the melted butter. Press into the bottom of the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, or until golden. In a large bowl, beat eggs until light. Combine the sugar, baking powder and 1/4 cup of flour so there will be no flour lumps. Stir the sugar mixture into the eggs. Finally, stir in the lemon juice. Pour over the prepared crust and return to the oven."
"Step 4","Bake for an additional 30 minutes or until bars are set. Allow to cool completely before cutting into bars."
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","1 cup margarine",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","1 cup sour cream",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","2 large eggs eggs",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","3 tablespoons grated orange zest",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV",".67 cup orange juice",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV",".25 cup margarine, melted",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","1 tablespoon grated orange zest",
"Orange Drop Cookies IV","3 tablespoons orange juice",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine, sugar and sour cream until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 3 tablespoons orange zest. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; stir into the sugar mixture alternately with 2/3 cup orange juice. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. In a small bowl, stir together the melted margarine, confectioners' sugar and 1 tablespoon orange zest. Mix remaining orange juice in 1 tablespoon at a time until desired consistency is reached. Spread over cooled cookies."
"Chocolate Brittle Surprise","35 crackers unsalted soda crackers",
"Chocolate Brittle Surprise","1 cup butter",
"Chocolate Brittle Surprise","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Brittle Surprise","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Brittle Surprise","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Cover cookie sheet with foil. Spray foil with cooking oil spray."
"Step 2","Place crackers on foil in 5 x 7 inch rows."
"Step 3","Microwave butter on high for 2 minutes. Add brown sugar and stir. Microwave on high for 2 more minutes, stirring every 30 seconds."
"Step 4","Pour over crackers. Bake 17 - 20 minutes (should bubble but not burn)."
"Step 5","Sprinkle chocolate chips over hot crackers. Spread after 2 minutes (chips have softened). Sprinkle nuts on top."
"Step 6","Refrigerate 1 hour. Break into pieces. Can be frozen."
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","1 .25 cups unbleached all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup smooth peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","6 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate",
"Peanut Butter Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","2 teaspoons butter",
"Step 1","In a large bowl mix together the butter until soft. Add the peanut butter and sugar and beat well. Mix in the egg and milk. Sift together the flour, salt, and baking soda. Add to the egg mixture slowly and mix until just blended. Form dough into 2 logs, and wrap in plastic wrap. Freeze for at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Chop chocolate into small pieces and place in the top of a double boiler over medium heat. Stir frequently until melted. Add butter or margarine and stir until melted. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature."
"Step 4","Remove one package of the dough from the freezer and unwrap. With a sharp, serrated knife, cut a few slices of the dough 1/4 inch thick and place on cookie sheet about 2 inches apart."
"Step 5","Quickly spoon a teaspoonful of the chocolate on each slice. Cut more slices, and top each with another slice of dough. If dough becomes too soft, rewrap it and return to freezer. Reheat chocolate if it becomes too hard."
"Step 6","Bake 10 to 12 minutes until lightly colored."
"Hello Dolly Cookies","1 cup graham cracker crumbs",
"Hello Dolly Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Hello Dolly Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Hello Dolly Cookies","1 cup shredded coconut",
"Hello Dolly Cookies",".25 cup butter, melted",
"Hello Dolly Cookies","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9 x 9 inch baking pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, combine graham crackers, chocolate chips, walnuts and coconut."
"Step 3","Pour melted butter over the dry ingredients and stir. Press into prepared baking pan. Drizzle the condensed milk over the top."
"Step 4","Bake for 25 - 30 minutes, until lightly colored on top. Let cool before cutting into bars."
"Soft Chocolate Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup cocoa powder",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Soft Chocolate Cookies",".25 cup confectioner's sugar, for dusting",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in one egg until completely incorporated; beat in last egg along with vanilla extract. Combine flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. Stir flour mixture into butter mixture until just incorporated; mix in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Roll dough into 2-inch balls, or drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart, onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until edges of cookies are firm, 10 to 12 minutes. Remove to wire racks. Dust warm cookies with confectioners' sugar, if desired."
"Banana Pudding Sugar Cookies",".67 cup shortening",
"Banana Pudding Sugar Cookies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Banana Pudding Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Banana Pudding Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Banana Pudding Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Banana Pudding Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Banana Pudding Sugar Cookies","1 (3.5 ounce) package instant banana pudding mix",
"Banana Pudding Sugar Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together shortening and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs one at a time. Stir in vanilla extract, baking powder, salt, and instant banana pudding mix. Mix in 2 cups flour. Gradually mix in remaining 1/2 cup flour as needed to form a workable dough. Cover, and chill in the refrigerator at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease baking sheets. Shape dough into walnut sized balls, and place 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets. Flatten balls to a thickness of about 1/4 inch."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned."
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","1 .75 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","2 .5 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","1 .75 cups rolled oats",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies","1 .75 cups corn flake cereal",
"Mom's Ranger Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a bowl until creamy."
"Step 3","Beat in eggs and vanilla extract until smooth."
"Step 4","In a separate bowl, whisk together both amounts of flour, salt, baking soda, and baking powder. Mix flour mixture into the liquid ingredients."
"Step 5","Gently mix rolled oats, corn flakes, and coconut into the dough until thoroughly combined."
"Step 6","Drop the dough by tablespoons onto baking sheets."
"Step 7","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are light golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Step 8","Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Brown Sugar Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Brown Sugar Cookies I","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Brown Sugar Cookies I","1 pinch salt",
"Brown Sugar Cookies I",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Brown Sugar Cookies I","1 egg",
"Brown Sugar Cookies I","1 tablespoon heavy whipping cream",
"Brown Sugar Cookies I","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Brown Sugar Cookies I",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Step 1","In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and brown sugar. Beat in egg, heavy cream, and vanilla."
"Step 2","Slowly add in flour, baking powder and salt. Mix until well blended. If dough seems too dry, add in water, 1/2 teaspoon at a time."
"Step 3","Cover and refrigerate for 4 hours."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F."
"Step 5","Roll out dough on a floured surface to a thickness of 1/8 of an inch. Cut with cookie cutters and place 1 1/2 inches apart on cookie sheets."
"Step 6","Bake 8 to 10 minutes, until lightly colored."
"Cherry Chip Cookies III","2 (18.25 ounce) packages cherry chip flavored cake mix",
"Cherry Chip Cookies III","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Cherry Chip Cookies III","1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed",
"Cherry Chip Cookies III",".5 cup confectioners' sugar for rolling",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Empty the packages of cake mix into a large bowl. Add eggs and whipped topping, and mix until well blended. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls and roll the balls in confectioners' sugar. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto an ungreased baking sheet and flatten slightly to keep them from rolling off."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Black Pepper Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Black Pepper Cookies","2 cups packed light brown sugar",
"Black Pepper Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Black Pepper Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Black Pepper Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Black Pepper Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Black Pepper Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Black Pepper Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground black pepper",
"Black Pepper Cookies","1 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Black Pepper Cookies","2 .5 cups raisins",
"Black Pepper Cookies","2 tablespoons chopped candied citron",
"Black Pepper Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Beat eggs with brown sugar. Stir in flour with baking soda, salt, spices and pepper. Add nuts, raisins and citron and stir to coat. Pour the egg-sugar mixture into flour mixture and stir to make a stiff dough. Chill."
"Step 2","Using rounded teaspoonful of dough roll into balls with floured hands. Put on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes. Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar."
"Elena's Cookies",".67 cup butter, softened",
"Elena's Cookies",".5 cup applesauce",
"Elena's Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Elena's Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Elena's Cookies","1 egg",
"Elena's Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Elena's Cookies","1 cup dry infant cereal",
"Elena's Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Elena's Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Elena's Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Elena's Cookies",".5 cup wheat germ",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease or line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a medium sized bowl mix the shortening, applesauce, white sugar, brown sugar, egg and vanilla. Beat until well combined."
"Step 3","In another bowl combine the infant cereal, flour, baking soda, salt and wheat germ. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix well."
"Step 4","Spoon tablespoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheets. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes or until just set. Let cool on wire racks before storing."
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","4 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies","1 cup buttermilk",
"Grandma's Sugar Cookies",".5 cup colored sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream the brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, and the shortening. Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Alternate adding the buttermilk with the dry ingredients."
"Step 3","Roll dough into walnut sized balls and roll the balls in colored sugar if desired. Place them 2 inches apart on an unprepared cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 13 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove to cool on wire racks."
"Oatmeal Icebox Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Oatmeal Icebox Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Icebox Cookies","1 egg",
"Oatmeal Icebox Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Icebox Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Oatmeal Icebox Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Icebox Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Icebox Cookies","1 tablespoon water",
"Oatmeal Icebox Cookies",".75 cup any flavor fruit jam",
"Step 1","Cream together the shortening and sugar and beat in the egg until light."
"Step 2","Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt and mix into the creamed mixture. Stir in the oatmeal and water until blended. Roll into a 2 inch roll and chill in the refrigerator for several hours or overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Slice cookie dough thinly and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 6-8 minutes. Cool and put together in sandwiches with jam."
"Party Sugar Cookies","1 (3 ounce) package fruit flavored Jell-O® mix",
"Party Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Party Sugar Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Party Sugar Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Party Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Party Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Party Sugar Cookies","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Party Sugar Cookies","1 egg white",
"Party Sugar Cookies",".25 cup colored sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the flavored gelatin, sugar and shortening until smooth. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in vanilla. Combine the flour and salt, stir into the creamed mixture."
"Step 3","Divide the dough into four pieces, and refrigerate any dough that is not yet being used. On a lightly floured surface, roll one piece of dough at a time out to 1/4 inch thickness. cut with cookie cutters and place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Brush the tops of the cookies with egg white, and sprinkle with colored sugar."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Do not brown. allow cookies to cool for a few minutes on the cookie sheets before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","2 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","1 cup shredded coconut",
"Raggedy Ann Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Cream the shortening, brown sugar and white sugar together until light and fluffy. Beat in the vanilla salt and eggs."
"Step 3","Sift the flour, baking soda and baking powder, add to the creamed mixture and stir to combine. Stir in the oats, rice cereal, coconut and nuts. Mix to combine."
"Step 4","Form dough into walnut sized balls and place on the prepared baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. These cookies should still be very soft when taken from the oven. Place on a cooling rack and let cool completely before storing in airtight containers."
"Seven Layer Magic Cookie Bars","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Seven Layer Magic Cookie Bars",".5 cup butter or margarine, melted",
"Seven Layer Magic Cookie Bars","1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk",
"Seven Layer Magic Cookie Bars","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Seven Layer Magic Cookie Bars","1 cup butterscotch-flavored chips",
"Seven Layer Magic Cookie Bars","1 .33 cups flaked coconut",
"Seven Layer Magic Cookie Bars","1 cup chopped nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (325 degrees F for glass baking pan). In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter; mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan."
"Step 2","Pour sweetened condensed milk evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with remaining ingredients; press down firmly with fork."
"Step 3","Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Chill if desired. Cut into bars or diamonds. Store covered at room temperature."
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies I","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies I",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies I",".5 cup cornstarch",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies I","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookies I","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","With an electric beater, mix together the butter or margarine and the confectioners' sugar."
"Step 2","Sift together the flour and the corn starch and mix in gradually in the butter mixture. Add the chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Shape dough into little balls of approximately 1 1/4 inch in diameter. Put on a non-greased cookie sheet. Bake at 330 degrees F (170 degrees C) for approximately 20 minutes.Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","1 (16.5 ounce) package refrigerated sugar cookie dough",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens",".67 cup all-purpose flour",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","1 (16 ounce) box confectioners' sugar",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","3 tablespoons meringue powder (powdered egg whites)",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","6 tablespoons water",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","1 teaspoon flavoring extract",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","Food coloring",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","Red food coloring",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","Red and pink sugar crystals",
"Valentine's Day Cookies from Reynolds® Kitchens","White nonpareils",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F."
"Step 2","Line cookie sheets with Reynolds® Parchment Paper; set aside. No need to add extra grease or spray your cookie sheets. Knead flour into sugar cookie dough until well blended. Roll out half of cookie dough at a time to 1/4-inch thickness between lightly floured sheets of Parchment Paper. Using Valentine cookie cutters, cut out cookies; place on parchment-lined cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 7 to 12 minutes, depending on the size of the cookies or until the edges begin to brown. Let stand one minute on cookie sheets. Slide Parchment Paper with cookies onto a wire racks to cool completely."
"Step 4","Icing and Decorating: Beat powdered sugar, meringue powder, water and extract in a large bowl, with an electric mixer, on high speed until smooth and thick, about 1 minute."
"Step 5","Divide icing into 3 small bowls. Leave one bowl of icing white. Stir food coloring in remaining 2 bowls to make pink and red icing of desired color. Cover icing tightly when not in use, icing dries quickly."
"Step 6","Pipe outlines of cookies with contrasting colors of icing using a decorating bag with tip. Or, place icing in plastic zipper bags. Snip off one corner with scissors and use to pipe icing."
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies II","1 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies II",".25 cup shortening",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies II",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies II",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies II",".33 cup water",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies II","2 cups buttermilk baking mix",
"Peanut Butter Chip Cookies II","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the peanut butter, shortening, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Stir in the water and baking mix. Mix in the chocolate chips. Roll into walnut sized balls and place 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheet. Flatten slightly with the tines of a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Grandma's Cutout Sugar Cookies","2 cups butter",
"Grandma's Cutout Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Grandma's Cutout Sugar Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Grandma's Cutout Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Grandma's Cutout Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Grandma's Cutout Sugar Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandma's Cutout Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Grandma's Cutout Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Grandma's Cutout Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Beat butter and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Add first egg while continuing to beat, incorporating the egg fully before adding the second and beating fully into the mixture. Beat vanilla extract and almond extract into the mixture with the third egg."
"Step 2","Stir flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl; add to the wet mixture and beat just until the wet and dry combine into a cookie dough. Shape dough into a ball, wrap in plastic wrap, and refrigerate until chilled, at least 3 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll dough out onto a flour-dusted surface and cut with cookie cutters. Arrange cut cookies onto baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake cookies in preheated oven until beginning to brown around edges, 6 to 8 minutes."
"Sugar Cookies I","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Sugar Cookies I","1 cup butter",
"Sugar Cookies I","1 egg",
"Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookies I","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Sugar Cookies I","3 tablespoons white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, beat the confectioners' sugar with butter until smooth. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and cream of tartar; mix into the batter until well blended. Cover and refrigerate dough for 2 to 3 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Divide dough in half and roll 3/16 inch thick on floured surface. Cut dough with cookie cutters and sprinkle with white sugar. Place cookies onto greased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 7 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven, or until delicately golden."
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders","1 teaspoon salt",
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders","1 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature",
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders",".75 cup white sugar",
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders","2 large eggs eggs",
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Halloween Chocolate Chip Cookies with Spiders","2 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips, divided",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda, salt, and baking powder in a large bowl and stir with a fork to mix ingredients well."
"Step 3","Combine butter, white sugar, and brown sugar in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Add eggs and vanilla extract and beat until smooth and fluffy. Add in flour mixture, 1 cup at a time, and mix in with a spatula until well incorporated. Fold in 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips until well combined."
"Step 4","Drop cookies onto ungreased baking sheets. Pour 1/2 cup chocolate chips into a bowl. Push about 3 to 4 chocolate chips onto each cookie, tip-side down, to make the spider bodies."
"Step 5","Bake in the the preheated oven until edges are golden, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack."
"Step 6","Melt remaining 1/2 cup chocolate in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 15-second intervals, stirring after each melting, 1 to 3 minutes. Spoon melted chocolate into a piping bag with a small tip and draw little legs on each side of the spider bodies to create spider legs."
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bar",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bar",".5 cup softened butter",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bar","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bar","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bar","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bar","2 cups chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bar","1 cup peanut butter",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Bar",".67 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Mix brown sugar and butter together in a large bowl until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Add vanilla extract and beat until combined. Add flour in batches, alternating with condensed milk, mixing dough until combined. Stir in 2 cups chocolate chips."
"Step 2","Line a 9x11-inch baking pan with parchment paper. Press the cookie dough into the pan using a spatula. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 3 hours."
"Step 3","Combine peanut butter and 2/3 cup chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in the microwave until smooth, about 45 seconds. Pour over the cookie dough and spread evenly. Chill for 1 hour."
"Favorite Black Walnut Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Favorite Black Walnut Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Favorite Black Walnut Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Favorite Black Walnut Cookies","2 large eggs egg",
"Favorite Black Walnut Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Favorite Black Walnut Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Favorite Black Walnut Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Favorite Black Walnut Cookies","1 cup chopped black walnuts",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream butter, white sugar, and brown sugar. Add eggs and beat until smooth. Sift together flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir dry ingredients into the creamed mixture until well blended. Stir in walnuts last. Shape dough into logs about 2 inches in diameter, wrap them in wax paper, and refrigerate until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Slice dough logs into 1/2 inch slices, and place on baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Mmmm nuttylicious!"
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies",".75 cup superfine sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies",".75 cup light brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon cinnamon",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies","1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Cinnamon Cookies","1 cup chopped nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, beat together the butter, brown sugar, confectioners' sugar, and vanilla until smooth and creamy; then add eggs, and beat well. In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and pudding mix. Gradually mix the dry into the creamy mixture until well blended. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts, if using. Drop by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in a preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, until golden brown. Remove from oven; allow cookies to cool momentarily on baking sheets before removing them to wire racks to cool completely."
"Peanutbutteriest Cookies Ever","1 .5 cups peanut butter",
"Peanutbutteriest Cookies Ever","1 cup butter, softened",
"Peanutbutteriest Cookies Ever","2 cups white sugar",
"Peanutbutteriest Cookies Ever","1 teaspoon boiling water",
"Peanutbutteriest Cookies Ever",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanutbutteriest Cookies Ever","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanutbutteriest Cookies Ever","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the peanut butter, butter, and white sugar until smooth. Stir in the water and vanilla. Combine the flour and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Press down lightly using the tines of a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Let cookies cool completely before removing from baking sheets."
"Christmas Cornflake Wreath Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Christmas Cornflake Wreath Cookies","4 cups miniature marshmallows",
"Christmas Cornflake Wreath Cookies","1 teaspoon green food coloring",
"Christmas Cornflake Wreath Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Christmas Cornflake Wreath Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Christmas Cornflake Wreath Cookies","4 cups cornflakes cereal",
"Christmas Cornflake Wreath Cookies","1 (2.25 ounce) package cinnamon red hot candies",
"Step 1","Microwave marshmallows and butter on High for 2 minutes. Stir, then microwave on High for 2 minutes more. Stir. (This can be done in a double boiler if one doesn't have a microwave.)"
"Step 2","Add and mix quickly the coloring, extracts, then cornflakes. Drop by spoonfuls in clumps on greased wax paper and decorate with 3 red hots each."
"Step 3","Once cool, transfer to lightly greased serving/storage tray with lightly greased fingers."
"Soft Molasses Cookies III","1 cup shortening",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III","1 cup dark brown sugar",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III","2 cups dark molasses",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III",".25 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III","1 tablespoon baking soda",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III","1 cup buttermilk",
"Soft Molasses Cookies III","9 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Cream shortening and sugar. Add molasses slowly, stirring constantly. Mix spices with cream of tartar and add to mixture."
"Step 2","Mix baking soda and buttermilk. Add alternately with the flour to the sugar and spices mixture. You may not need the whole 9 cups of flour but you should end up with a fairly stiff dough. Chill dough overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll dough out to at least 1/4-inch thick (the thicker the better), using as little flour as possible. Keep dough refrigerated when not rolling and cutting. Cut into cookies and brush with beaten egg. Bake for 10-12 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Alternately, you can form the dough into golf ball size round, roll in white sugar, place on a cookie sheet and then flatten slightly."
"Special Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Special Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Special Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Special Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Special Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Special Cookies","2 cups brown sugar",
"Special Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Special Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Special Cookies","4 cups high protein crisp rice and wheat cereal",
"Special Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Special Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Special Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time then stir in the vanilla. Blend in the sifted ingredients until just incorporated. Mix in the cereal, coconut, walnuts and raisins. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Cookies should be at least 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 9 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","1 .5 cups raisins",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies",".5 cup coffee flavored liqueur",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Coffee Liqueur Raisin Cookies","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Place raisins in a small bowl, and add coffee flavored liqueur. Heat in the microwave for approximately 2 minutes, or until hot. Set aside to cool (overnight is great). Drain, and reserve liquid."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 3","In a large bowl, cream together shortening and brown sugar. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then mix in milk and the reserved liquid from the raisins. Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Stir in oats. Mix in the walnuts and white chocolate chips, if desired. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I","1 egg",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I",".75 cup milk",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I","2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, melted",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I",".5 cup chopped black walnuts",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I","2 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I","2 tablespoons butter, softened",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Drop Cookies I","4 tablespoons milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together 1/2 cup butter or margarine and 1 cup light brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add egg, beat thoroughly. Add 1 teaspoon vanilla and mix well. Sift together flour and 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, add alternating with 3/4 cup milk to creamed mixture beginning and ending with dry ingredients. Blend in melted chocolate, then nuts."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets. Bake 10 -12 minutes. Cool on wire rack. When cool, frost with Chocolate Icing."
"Step 4","To Make Icing: Mix confectioners' sugar; 1/4 cup cocoa ; 2 tablespoons butter or margarine, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla and milk. Mix all ingredients until smooth and creamy (may need to add more milk to get creamy consistency) . Frost cookies."
"Chocolate Crispy Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Crispy Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Crispy Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Crispy Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Crispy Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Crispy Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Crispy Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Crispy Cookies","4 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Chocolate Crispy Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Stir together flour, baking soda and salt and set aside. Beat butter or margarine and sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Mix in flour mixture. Stir in cereal and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop onto greased baking sheet and bake for about 10 minutes or until lightly browned."
"Sugar Cookies IX","1 cup butter",
"Sugar Cookies IX","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Sugar Cookies IX","1 cup white sugar",
"Sugar Cookies IX","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sugar Cookies IX","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookies IX","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookies IX",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Sugar Cookies IX",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sugar Cookies IX",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Lightly grease a cookie sheet."
"Step 2","Cream together the butter or margarine, white sugar, brown sugar, and eggs. Add vanilla and stir."
"Step 3","Add the flour, salt, baking soda, and baking powder and mix well."
"Step 4","Drop by spoonfuls onto a lightly greased cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Bake at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) for about 12 minutes or until lightly browned."
"Super-Easy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup KRAFT Smooth Peanut Butter",
"Super-Easy Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Super-Easy Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 325 degrees F."
"Step 2","Mix all ingredients with large spoon until well blended."
"Step 3","Roll into 24 balls; place, 4 inches apart, on baking sheets. Flatten with fork."
"Step 4","Bake 20 min. or until lightly browned. (Do not overbake.)"
"Step 5","Cool 5 min. on baking sheets; transfer to wire racks. Cool completely."
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup brown sugar",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup coarsely chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour and baking soda, stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop by rounded ice cream scoops onto a cookie sheet, and press down slightly to flatten. Cookies should be about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 11 to 14 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies","2 .75 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies",".5 cup sour cream",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies",".5 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies","1 tablespoon white sugar",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies",".25 cup chopped walnuts, or to taste",
"Sour Cream Drop Cookies",".25 cup raisins, or to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Sift flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and nutmeg together into a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat 1 1/2 cups sugar and butter together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Beat in eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition; blend in sour cream and lemon extract. Gradually stir flour mixture into creamed butter mixture until dough is combined."
"Step 4","Drop dough by rounded tablespoons, about 3 inches apart, onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown around the edges, about 4 minutes. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon sugar over cookies; top with walnuts and raisins. Continue baking until bottoms of cookies begin to brown, 3 to 4 minutes more. Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","1 cup butter, softened",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs",".75 cup white sugar",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","1 egg",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","2 teaspoons rum flavored extract",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","3 tablespoons butter",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","2 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","2 tablespoons milk",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","1 teaspoon rum flavored extract",
"Nutmeg Cookie Logs","3 drops red food coloring",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together 1 cup butter or margarine and white sugar. Stir in 2 teaspoons vanilla, egg, and 2 teaspoons rum flavoring. Mix well. Add 3 cups flour and nutmeg."
"Step 3","Roll in long logs 1/2 inch in diameter. Cut into 3 inch strips. Place on lightly greased cookie sheets and bake 12 to 15 minutes. Let cool and frost."
"Step 4","To Make Frosting: Cream together 3 tablespoons butter and confectioner's sugar. Add 1/ 2 teaspoon vanilla and 1 teaspoon rum. Stir in milk (may add more to reach desired consistency). Add food coloring and spread over cooled cookies. Decorate with chocolate sprinkles (optional).Orange Drop Cookies I","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Orange Drop Cookies I","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Orange Drop Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Orange Drop Cookies I","1 tablespoon orange zest",
"Orange Drop Cookies I",".5 cup sour milk",
"Orange Drop Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Orange Drop Cookies I","3 teaspoons baking powder",
"Orange Drop Cookies I","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Orange Drop Cookies I","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Orange Drop Cookies I","1 teaspoon butter",
"Orange Drop Cookies I","3 tablespoons orange juice",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium size mixing bowl, mix together 3 teaspoons baking powder and 3 1/4 cups flour."
"Step 3","Beat together brown sugar and shortening then add eggs, orange rind and vanilla. Mix in flour mixture, alternating the flour mixture and sour milk until all is blended. Drop dough by teaspoonful onto cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 12-15 minutes. Let cool and frost cookies."
"Step 5","To Make Frosting: Mix together powdered sugar, 1 teaspoon butter and enough orange juice mixed in to make it able to spread over cooled cookies."
"St. Patrick's Chocolate & Mint Cheesecake Bars","1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate fudge cake mix with pudding (such as Betty Crocker® Triple Chocolate Fudge cake mix)",
"St. Patrick's Chocolate & Mint Cheesecake Bars",".5 cup butter, softened",
"St. Patrick's Chocolate & Mint Cheesecake Bars","3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened",
"St. Patrick's Chocolate & Mint Cheesecake Bars","1 (16 ounce) container cream cheese flavored frosting (such as Betty Crocker® Rich and Creamy)",
"St. Patrick's Chocolate & Mint Cheesecake Bars","3 large eggs eggs",
"St. Patrick's Chocolate & Mint Cheesecake Bars","6 drops green food coloring, or as needed",
"St. Patrick's Chocolate & Mint Cheesecake Bars","3 drops creme de menthe candy flavoring (such as Wilton®), or as needed",
"St. Patrick's Chocolate & Mint Cheesecake Bars","1 (10 ounce) package dark chocolate and mint chips (such as Nestle® Toll House® Dark Chocolate and Mint Morsels)",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat cake mix and butter with an electric mixer on low speed in a bowl until crumbly, 3 to 5 minutes. Set aside 1 cup for topping."
"Step 3","Press remaining crumb mixture into bottom of an ungreased 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 4","Place in preheated oven and bake until edges begin to crisp, about 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool slightly."
"Step 5","Beat cream cheese and frosting with an electric mixer on medium speed in a bowl until smooth, 3 to 5 minutes."
"Step 6","Drop eggs one at a time into the cream cheese mixture and beat until blended, 2 to 3 minutes."
"Step 7","Pour in 6 drops green food coloring, or more for a darker color; beat until color is blended, about 2 minutes."
"Step 8","Beat in creme de menthe candy flavoring until thoroughly blended, about 2 minutes. Taste and add more flavoring if needed."
"Step 9","Pour batter over the chocolate crust in the 9x13 pan."
"Step 10","Sprinkle 1 cup reserved crumb mixture over cheesecake batter."
"Step 11","Top with 1 cup chocolate and mint morsels; reserve remaining morsels for finishing touches."
"Step 12","Place the pan in the preheated oven and bake until set, 42 to 45 minutes."
"Step 13","Remove pan from oven and cool completely."
"Step 14","Cover and refrigerate until chilled, at least 2 hours."
"Step 15","Pour reserved chocolate and mint morsels into a small microwave-safe bowl. Microwave morsels in 45 second intervals; stir until completely melted and smooth."
"Step 16","Pour melted chocolate into a resealable plastic bag."
"Step 17","Clip a small bottom corner of the bag. Gently squeezing the bag, drizzle melted chocolate over the cooled cake through the clipped corner."
"Step 18","Cut cake into bars to serve."
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 .25 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (3 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix",
"Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Sift flour, baking powder and salt. Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs, milk and vanilla. Add flour mixture until blended. Do not overmix. By hand, mix in pistachio pudding mix, chocolate chips and nuts (optional)."
"Step 3","Shape by rounded teaspoonfuls into balls on sheet, about 2 1/2 inches apart. Flatten dough with dampened bottom of drinking glass. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until set. These cookies do not get very brown."
"No Bake Deluxe Hamburger Cookies","24 wafers vanilla wafer cookies",
"No Bake Deluxe Hamburger Cookies","12 small patty (0.6 oz)s small peppermint patties",
"No Bake Deluxe Hamburger Cookies","4 drops green food coloring",
"No Bake Deluxe Hamburger Cookies","12 medium green gumdrops, sliced",
"No Bake Deluxe Hamburger Cookies","2 tablespoons sesame seeds",
"No Bake Deluxe Hamburger Cookies","4 small rolls of apricot fruit leather",
"No Bake Deluxe Hamburger Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Place the coconut and the food coloring in a bowl with a lid. Shake till all coconut is covered. Set aside."
"Step 2","Place 12 of the vanilla wafers flat side up on a cookie sheet. After unwrapping all of the peppermint patties, place them on top of the wafers."
"Step 3","Unwrap the fruit roll-ups (optional) and cut into squares. Place on top of the all of the patties to look like cheese. Then place the sliced gumdrops on the top of that. Add the coconut."
"Step 4","Place the other half of the wafers over the top of the coconut. With a small kitchen brush lightly paint a VERY small amount of water on the tops of the cookies. Finally shake or sprinkle a small amount of sesame seeds over the wafers."
"Oatmeal Cookies","6 tablespoons margarine",
"Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Oatmeal Cookies","3 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Cookies","1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained",
"Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream the margarine with the brown sugar and white sugar. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda and cinnamon; add to the creamed mixture and stir until just combined. Finally, mix in the oats, raisins, pineapple and walnuts."
"Step 3","Drop dough by heaping teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet. Cookies should be about 2 inches apart. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool for a few minutes on the cookie sheet before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars","1 cup peanut butter",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars",".5 cup corn syrup",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars",".33 cup butter",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars","3 .33 cups rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars",".5 cup sunflower seeds",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars",".5 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Bars",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl stir together the peanut butter, the butter or margarine, the brown sugar, the syrup and the vanilla until smooth."
"Step 3","Add all the other ingredients. Stir well."
"Step 4","Press the mixture into 13 x 9 inch greased pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes. Let cool on wire rack before cutting into bars."
"Cinnamon Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Cinnamon Cookies I",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cinnamon Cookies I","3 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Cinnamon Cookies I","2 tablespoons milk",
"Cinnamon Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cinnamon Cookies I","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Cinnamon Cookies I",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cinnamon Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg yolks, then stir in the milk. Combine the flour, cinnamon, baking powder and salt, stir into the wet ingredients until well blended. Wrap dough and chill for at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut out cookies using a 2 1/4 inch cookie cutter. Place cookies 1 inch apart onto a cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned. Remove cookies to wire racks and cool."
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup candy-coated chocolate pieces",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup peanut butter chips",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons honey",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 pinch ground cinnamon",
"Fabulous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon, set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in the eggs, vanilla and honey. Stir in the dry ingredients, then fold in the chocolate chips, chocolate candies, peanut butter chips and nuts. Drop dough by teaspoons onto an unprepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 18 minutes in the preheated oven, until the cookies are golden around the edges. Remove from the baking sheet to cool on wire racks."
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II","1 cup butter (at room temperature)",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II","3 large eggs eggs",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II","8 ounces dates, pitted and chopped",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II","1 cup finely chopped pecans",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II",".5 cup water",
"Date Nut Pinwheel Cookies II",".5 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","Cream the butter and brown sugar together in a mixing bowl until smooth. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla. Sift the cinnamon, salt, baking soda, and flour together in a second mixing bowl. Slowly stir the flour mixture into the egg mixture until evenly blended."
"Step 2","Divide the dough evenly into three portions and place each on a square of waxed paper. Wrap and refrigerate until firm, about 1 hour."
"Step 3","Meanwhile, make the filling by combine the dates, pecans, water and white sugar in a saucepan set over low heat. Cook and stir until the filling has a paste-like consistency. Cool slightly."
"Step 4","Working with one portion at a time, roll out the dough on a lightly floured surface to make a rectangle about 1/4 inch thick. Spread 1/3 of the filling evenly over the dough; roll up to make a log. Repeat the process with the remaining dough. Refrigerate until firm, about 1 hour."
"Step 5","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Lightly grease two baking sheets."
"Step 6","Using a sharp, serrated knife, cut the rolls into 1/4 inch slices. Place the slices on prepared baking sheets."
"Step 7","Bake in preheated oven until set and lightly browned, about 15 minutes. Cool on racks."
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies","1 .75 cups rolled oats",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup melted shortening",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup melted butter",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Cape Cod Oatmeal Cookies","1 tablespoon molasses",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl stir together flour, cinnamon, baking soda and salt. Stir in remaining ingredients."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoon 1-1/2 inches apart on ungreased sheets (Make the cookies small). Bake for 12 minutes or until brown."
"Eggnog Thumbprints",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Eggnog Thumbprints",".5 cup white sugar",
"Eggnog Thumbprints",".25 cup packed brown sugar",
"Eggnog Thumbprints","1 egg",
"Eggnog Thumbprints",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Eggnog Thumbprints","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Eggnog Thumbprints",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Eggnog Thumbprints",".25 cup butter",
"Eggnog Thumbprints","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Eggnog Thumbprints","1 tablespoon rum",
"Eggnog Thumbprints","1 pinch ground nutmeg",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together 3/4 cup butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in egg and vanilla. Combine flour and salt; stir into the creamed mixture by hand to form a soft dough. Roll dough into 1 inch balls, and place balls 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Make an indention in the center of each cookie using your finger or thumb."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 minutes in preheated oven. Cool completely."
"Step 4","In a small bowl, mix together 1/4 cup butter, confectioners' sugar, and rum. Spoon rounded teaspoonfuls of filling onto cookies. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Let stand until set before storing in an airtight container."
"Spritz Cookies V","2 cups butter, softened",
"Spritz Cookies V","1 cup white sugar",
"Spritz Cookies V","1 egg",
"Spritz Cookies V","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Spritz Cookies V","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Spritz Cookies V","3 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Spritz Cookies V","1 cup cornstarch",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the vanilla and almond extracts. Combine the flour and cornstarch; stir into the creamed mixture until well blended. Fill cookie press and press out dough onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until edges are golden. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II","3 large eggs eggs",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II","1 .5 tablespoons fresh lemon juice",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II",".5 teaspoon lemon zest",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II",".25 cup chopped hazelnuts",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies II","1 teaspoon brandy",
"Step 1","Combine flour, baking powder, spices and salt."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat the sugar and eggs until thick and light-colored. Beat in the lemon juice. Beat in the lemon zest. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients. Stir in the hazelnuts. Cover and chill for 4 hours."
"Step 3","On a floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of 1/2 inch. Using a 1 1/2 inch round cookie cutter, cut out cookies and place 1 inch apart on lightly greased baking sheets. Cover the baking sheets with clean towels and leave undisturbed for 4 hours."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 5","Turn the cookies over and place a drop of brandy in the center of each cookie. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, until lightly colored. Transfer to wire racks to cool."
"Julia's Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies In A Jar","1 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Julia's Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies In A Jar",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Julia's Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies In A Jar",".5 cup white sugar",
"Julia's Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies In A Jar","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Julia's Best Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies In A Jar",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Step 1","Combine the flour, baking soda, white sugar, and the chocolate chips. Place 1/2 of the mixture in a clean quart sized glass jar, and pack firmly. Place the brown sugar on top, again packing firmly. Place the remaining flour mixture on top. Cover with a lid."
"Step 2","Attach an index card with the following directions: Empty contents of jar into a large bowl. In separate bowl combine 3/4 cup of butter, 1 1/2 eggs, and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Beat until creamy. Add to dry mixture. Drop by tablespoonful onto an ungreased cookie sheet, and bake in a preheated 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) oven for 8 to 10 minutes."
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake","2 cups shortbread cookie crumbs",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake",".25 cup melted butter",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake","3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake","1 cup sour cream",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake","1 cup white sugar",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake","4 large eggs eggs",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake",".25 cup fresh lemon juice",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake","1 lemon, zested",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake","4 large egg whites egg whites",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake",".25 cup white sugar",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake",".25 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Lemon Meringue Cheesecake","1 .5 cups lemon curd",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix cookie crumbs and melted butter together in a bowl until evenly combined; press into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan."
"Step 3","Beat cream cheese, sour cream, and 1 cup sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Mix lemon juice, vanilla extract, and lemon zest into cream cheese mixture, scraping bottom and sides of the bowl. Spread mixture over cookie crust in the springform pan."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until almost set in the center, about 1 hour. Cool to room temperature and refrigerate until completely cooled, at least 3 to 4 hours."
"Step 5","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 6","Beat egg whites in a bowl using an electric mixer until soft peaks form; add 1/4 cup sugar and cream of tartar and beat until stiff, but not dry, peaks form."
"Step 7","Spread lemon curd over cheesecake. Mound whipped egg whites over the curd, sealing around all the edges."
"Step 8","Bake in the preheated oven until meringue is golden brown, about 10 minutes. Chill uncovered in refrigerator, about 1 hour."
"The Best Lavender Sugar Cookies Ever","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"The Best Lavender Sugar Cookies Ever",".75 cup white sugar",
"The Best Lavender Sugar Cookies Ever",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"The Best Lavender Sugar Cookies Ever",".75 cup butter, softened",
"The Best Lavender Sugar Cookies Ever","1 egg",
"The Best Lavender Sugar Cookies Ever","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"The Best Lavender Sugar Cookies Ever",".5 teaspoon lavender flowers, or to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with waxed paper and grease the paper."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl. Stir butter and egg into flour mixture until smooth; add vanilla extract and lavender. Gently mix again until thoroughly combined."
"Step 3","Drop cookie dough by tablespoon about 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are fragrant and edges turn light golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes."
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies","2 cups unsalted butter at room temperature",
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice",
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies","6 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted",
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies",".33 cup lemon juice, or more to taste",
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies","3 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Lemon-Butter Shortbread Cookies","lemons, zested",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift or whisk flour, salt, and baking powder together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Place butter in a large mixing bowl and mix with a wooden spoon until very creamy. Add confectioners' sugar, lemon juice, and flour mixture; mix until well combined."
"Step 4","Roll dough out on a lightly floured surface to 1/4-inch thickness. Cut into rounds using a round cookie cutter. Transfer cookies to ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are light brown on the bottom but still very light on top, about 10 minutes. Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheets for about 2 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Step 6","Whisk melted butter and lemon juice together in a small bowl. Add lemon zest and whisk again. Whisk in confectioners' sugar 1 cup at a time. Add more lemon juice if necessary for a thin consistency."
"Step 7","Dip the top of each cookie in the glaze and transfer to a wire rack placed over waxed paper or parchment paper. Allow cookies to sit until glaze has set, about 2 hours."
"Step 8","Store cookies in an airtight container between layers of waxed paper."
"Cherry Chip Cookies I","1 cup margarine",
"Cherry Chip Cookies I","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Cherry Chip Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cherry Chip Cookies I","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cherry Chip Cookies I",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cherry Chip Cookies I",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Cherry Chip Cookies I","1 cup cherry baking chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine margarine, confectioner's sugar and vanilla. Beat until fluffy. Add flour, baking soda and oats. Mix well. Stir in cherry flavored chips (other flavors work well, too!)."
"Step 3","Drop by rounded teaspoonful onto ungreased cookie sheets and flatten slightly with fingers. Bake for 12 minutes. Remove immediately from cookie sheets and onto wire racks to cool."
"Gingerbread Man Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies","1 egg",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies","1 cup molasses",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons warm water",
"Gingerbread Man Cookies",".25 cup raisins for decorating",
"Step 1","Combine flour, ginger, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl and set aside."
"Step 2","In large bowl, cream shortening and sugar until smooth. Mix in egg and molasses. Dissolve baking soda in 1 1/2 teaspoons warm water and add to egg mixture; stir until combined."
"Step 3","Mix in dry ingredients well blended. Shape dough into a disk, wrap in plastic, and refrigerate overnight."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease cookie sheets or line them with parchment paper."
