"Step 5","Lightly flour a work surface. Roll out dough to a thickness of 1/4 inch. Cut out gingerbread men using cookie cutters and place 2 inches apart on cookie sheets. Use raisins to make eyes, noses and buttons."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven, or until firm, 10 to 12 minutes. Let cool on wire racks."
"Cream Cheese Cookies I","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cream Cheese Cookies I","1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Cream Cheese Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Cream Cheese Cookies I","1 egg yolk",
"Cream Cheese Cookies I",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cream Cheese Cookies I","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter, cream cheese, and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in egg yolk and vanilla. Stir in flour until well blended. Drop dough by spoonfuls or use a cookie press to place onto prepared cookie sheets. If using floral cookie press design, make an indentation in the center with a thimble, fill with preserves, or press candy into center."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 minutes in preheated oven. Cookies should be pale.Icelandic Pepper Cookies","1 .25 cups butter, softened",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies",".75 cup light corn syrup",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies","2 small eggs",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cloves",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Icelandic Pepper Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground black pepper",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar. Stir in corn syrup and eggs; cream well. Sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, cloves, ginger, and pepper. Add dry ingredients to the butter mixture, and mix until smooth. Refrigerate dough over night."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll out dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut out cookies with a 2 inch round cookie cutter. Place at least 1 inch apart on cookie sheet and bake for 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven."
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars","1 cup Becel® Buttery Taste or Original Margarine*",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars","1 cup firmly packed light brown sugar",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars",".25 cup granulated sugar",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars","2 large eggs large Naturegg™ Omega 3 eggs",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars","3 tablespoons HERSHEY'S® Chipits® White Chocolate Baking Chips",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars",".5 cup dried cranberries",
"Becel Anything Goes Cookie Dough Festive Gingerbread Cookie Bars",".5 cup toasted chopped pistachios",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 13 x 9-inch (33 x 23 cm) baking pan with foil or parchment paper leaving 2-inch (5 cm) overhang; spray with cooking spray and set aside. Combine flour, baking soda and salt in medium bowl; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat Becel Buttery Taste margarine with sugars in large bowl. Beat in eggs and vanilla until blended. Gradually add in flour mixture; beat just until blended. Stir in cinnamon and ginger. Spread into prepared baking pan. Combine chips, cranberries and pistachios in small bowl. Evenly sprinkle over dough; press gently."
"Step 3","Bake 24 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack 10 minutes. Using foil overhang, lift out of pan and cool completely. Cut into 30 pieces."
"Molasses Cookies V","5 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Molasses Cookies V","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Molasses Cookies V","2 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Molasses Cookies V","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Molasses Cookies V",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Molasses Cookies V",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Molasses Cookies V","1 cup shortening",
"Molasses Cookies V","1 cup white sugar",
"Molasses Cookies V","1 cup molasses",
"Molasses Cookies V","1 cup buttermilk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Sift together the flour, baking soda, ginger, cinnamon, cloves and nutmeg; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar until smooth, then stir in the molasses. Add the sifted ingredients alternately with the buttermilk, mixing well after each addition. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/8 inch thickness. If the dough is too soft, more flour can be added. Cut out cookies using cookie cutters and place them 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup strawberry yogurt fruit spread",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup olive oil",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Strawberry Cinnamon Oatmeal Cookies","3 .25 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the strawberry spread, margarine, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla, then stir in the olive oil. Combine the flour, baking soda and cinnamon; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the oats until well blended. Drop dough by heaping spoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the tops are lightly browned. Let cookies stand for 1 minute on the baking sheet before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Fruit Preserve Sandwich Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Fruit Preserve Sandwich Cookies",".25 cup butter",
"Fruit Preserve Sandwich Cookies","1 egg",
"Fruit Preserve Sandwich Cookies","2 tablespoons ground almonds",
"Fruit Preserve Sandwich Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Fruit Preserve Sandwich Cookies","1 cup any flavor fruit jam",
"Fruit Preserve Sandwich Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Sift the flour into a bowl and cut in the butter or margarine. Mix in the sugar and almonds. Using a fork, mix in the egg until dough becomes stiff."
"Step 3","Knead dough on a lightly floured surface until smooth. Roll out dough into a thin layer and cut into rounds, 2 inches wide. Re-roll trimmings and cut until you have 20 rounds. Place rounds on cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until light brown. Let cool on the sheet for about 3 minutes, then transfer to wire racks."
"Step 5","When biscuits are completely cold, spread half of the rounds with a thin layer of preserves and sandwich together. Dust with confectioners' sugar."
"Emily's Famous Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Emily's Famous Chocolate Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup Dutch process cocoa powder",
"Emily's Famous Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Emily's Famous Chocolate Shortbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Emily's Famous Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","1 .5 cups unsalted butter, chilled and cubed",
"Emily's Famous Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Emily's Famous Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Emily's Famous Chocolate Shortbread Cookies","1 cup chopped semisweet chocolate",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the confectioners' sugar, cocoa, flour and salt until well blended. Cut in the butter until lumps are no larger than peas. Add eggs and vanilla; mix until a stiff dough forms. It may take a minute to come together."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll out dough to 1/4 inch thickness and cut into desired shapes using cookie cutters. If the dough is too sticky, chill for a little bit. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the surface appears dry. Allow cookies to cool for a couple minutes on the baking sheet before removing to wire racks to cool completely. When cookies are completely cool, melt the chocolate over a double boiler or in the microwave. Stir frequently until smooth. Dip cookies or drizzle with the chocolate and place on waxed paper to set."
"Granny's Shortbread Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Granny's Shortbread Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Granny's Shortbread Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Granny's Shortbread Cookies","⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Granny's Shortbread Cookies","1 egg yolk",
"Granny's Shortbread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Granny's Shortbread Cookies","1 (2.25 ounce) jar red decorator sugar",
"Granny's Shortbread Cookies","1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together the butter, sugar, salt, nutmeg and egg yolk. Add the flour a little at a time until mixture is stiff."
"Step 3","Place onto floured board and knead lightly until the dough begins to crack. Roll out 1/4 inch thickness and cut into desired shapes."
"Step 4","Place on un-greased cookie sheet, decorate with colored sugar crystals and maraschino cherries."
"Step 5","Bake for 10 minutes or until golden brown."
"Spicy Pear Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","1 egg",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","1 pear - peeled, cored and diced",
"Spicy Pear Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Spicy Pear Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Spicy Pear Cookies","2 .5 tablespoons lemon juice",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl, beat margarine and sugar untill smooth. Beat in egg and vanilla. Combine flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and ginger; mix into batter. Stir in chopped pears, chopped nuts and raisins."
"Step 3","Drop about two inches apart by rounded tablespoonfuls onto baking sheets and bake 15 minutes or until edges are golden brown and center springs back when lightly touched. Remove to wire racks to cool."
"Step 4","Combine confectioners' sugar and lemon juice and mix until smooth. Spoon icing over coookies."
"Cherry Bell Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cherry Bell Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cherry Bell Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cherry Bell Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Cherry Bell Cookies",".5 teaspoon instant coffee granules",
"Cherry Bell Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Cherry Bell Cookies","1 .25 cups packed brown sugar",
"Cherry Bell Cookies",".25 cup dark corn syrup",
"Cherry Bell Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"Cherry Bell Cookies","1 tablespoon cream",
"Cherry Bell Cookies",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cherry Bell Cookies","1 tablespoon butter",
"Cherry Bell Cookies","3 tablespoons cherry juice",
"Cherry Bell Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped walnuts",
"Cherry Bell Cookies","60 cherries maraschino cherries, halved",
"Step 1","Sift together: 3 cups flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon ginger and 1/2 teaspoon instant coffee. Put aside."
"Step 2","Cream 1 cup butter or margarine. Add 1 1/4 cups brown sugar. Cream well. Blend in dark corn syrup, egg, and cream. Add dry ingredients and mix well."
"Step 3","Roll out dough, 1/3 at a time on floured board to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut cookies into 2 1/2 inch rounds. Place on ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 4","To Make Filling: Combine 1/3 firmly packed brown sugar, 1 tablespoon butter, 3 tablespoons cherry juice. Stir in 1 1/2 cups chopped nuts, chopped fine."
"Step 5","Place 1/2 teaspoon filling in center of each round. Shape into a bell by folding sides of dough to meet over the filling using spatula to fold over sides. Make top of bell narrower than at the clapper end. Place 1/2 of a maraschino cherry (cut side down) at open end of each bell for clapper. Bake at 350 degrees F for 12-15 minutes."
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","2 cups chocolate sandwich cookie crumbs",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","2 tablespoons butter, melted",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake",".25 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","2 pounds cream cheese, softened",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake",".33 cup heavy whipping cream",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","2 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","4 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","1 .5 cups chocolate sandwich cookie crumbs",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","16 ounces sour cream",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","1 cup heavy whipping cream",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Cookie Cheesecake","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Combine 2 cups cookie crumbs, melted butter, brown sugar, and cinnamon in a medium bowl; firmly press mixture evenly onto bottom and 1 inch up sides of a 10-inch springform pan. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 5 minutes; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually mix in 1 1/4 cups sugar, 1/3 cup whipping cream, flour, and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Beat in eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition. Pour 1/3 of batter into prepared pan. Top with 1 1/2 cups cookie pieces; pour in remaining batter."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes. Remove cake from oven. Combine sour cream, 1/4 cup sugar, and 1 teaspoon vanilla; spread evenly on cheesecake. Continue baking for 7 minutes. Turn oven off and leave in oven 30 minutes. Remove cheesecake, and let cool completely on a wire rack."
"Step 4","Combine 1 cup whipping cream and chocolate chips in a saucepan; stir over low heat until chocolate melts, and then stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla. Pour mixture over cheesecake while still warm. Refrigerate until serving time. Should be at least 8 hours for refrigerator time, remove about 1/2 hour to 1 hour before serving, remove ring from springform pan, decorate to choice and get out your fork!"
"Jam Filled Thumbprint Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, room temperature",
"Jam Filled Thumbprint Cookies",".67 cup granulated sugar",
"Jam Filled Thumbprint Cookies","2 large egg yolks large egg yolks",
"Jam Filled Thumbprint Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Jam Filled Thumbprint Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jam Filled Thumbprint Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Jam Filled Thumbprint Cookies",".5 cup assorted stone fruit jam such as peach, apricot or plum",
"Jam Filled Thumbprint Cookies","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with Reynolds® Parchment Paper."
"Step 2","Beat together butter and sugar with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes, stopping once or twice to scrape down the sides of bowl with a rubber spatula. Beat in egg yolks and vanilla extract. Reduce mixer speed and add flour and salt and mix until just incorporated."
"Step 3","Form dough into 1-inch balls and arrange on prepared baking sheet. Using your thumb, flatten balls slightly to make an indentation in the center of each cookie. Bake cookies for 8-10 minutes or until bottoms are just golden."
"Step 4","Remove baking sheet from oven. Fill each indentation with a heaping 1/2 teaspoon of jam. Bake for an additional 5 to 6 minutes, or until the edges of cookies are lightly golden. Transfer cookies to wire racks to cool."
"Orange Carrot Cookies","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","2 cups mashed cooked carrots",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Orange Carrot Cookies","1 orange, zested and juiced",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla and carrots. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the walnuts. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly golden. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","To make the glaze, put 1 cup of the confectioners' sugar into a medium bowl. Grate the rind of the orange into the bowl with the sugar. Squeeze in enough juice from the orange to form a thin but spreadable consistency. Mix until smooth. If necessary, stir in more confectioners' sugar. Spread onto the cooled cookies. Store in an airtight container."
"Everything Cookies I","1 cup butter",
"Everything Cookies I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Everything Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Everything Cookies I","1 egg, beaten",
"Everything Cookies I","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Everything Cookies I","1 cup quick cooking oats",
"Everything Cookies I","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Everything Cookies I","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Everything Cookies I","1 cup crisp rice cereal",
"Everything Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Everything Cookies I","1 teaspoon salt",
"Everything Cookies I","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Everything Cookies I","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix all ingredients. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake until lightly brown."
"Linzer Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Linzer Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Linzer Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Linzer Cookies","⅝ cup butter",
"Linzer Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Linzer Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Linzer Cookies","1 tablespoon lemon zest",
"Linzer Cookies","1 egg",
"Linzer Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Linzer Cookies","1 cup finely chopped almonds",
"Linzer Cookies",".25 cup chopped dried apricots",
"Linzer Cookies",".5 cup apricot preserves",
"Linzer Cookies","2 teaspoons lemon juice",
"Linzer Cookies","1 egg white",
"Linzer Cookies","2 tablespoons finely chopped almonds",
"Linzer Cookies","1 tablespoon coarse granulated sugar",
"Step 1","Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt; set aside. In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and cinnamon until light and fluffy. Beat in the lemon zest, egg and vanilla. Mix in 1 cup of chopped almonds, then stir in the sifted ingredients. Press 2/3 of the dough into the bottom of a greased or parchment lined 8x8 inch baking pan. Roll the remaining portion between two pieces of waxed paper, out to an 8 inch square. Refrigerate all of the dough for at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","While the dough is chilling, place the apricots into a small saucepan with water to cover. Bring to a boil and cook for three minutes. Remove from heat and set aside to cool. Drain the excess liquid from the apricots and mix in the preserves and lemon juice."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spread the apricot filling evenly over the chilled crust, leaving a 1/4 inch border on edges. Cut the chilled square of dough into 1/2 inch strips. Place the strips over the filling in a lattice design. Trim edges to fit and press the edges into the border. Brush the top with egg white then sprinkle with remaining chopped almonds and coarse sugar."
"Step 4","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until filling is bubbly and the crust is golden brown. Allow to cool completely before cutting into squares."
"Orange White Chocolate Chip Beltane Cookies","1 .25 cups butter, softened",
"Orange White Chocolate Chip Beltane Cookies","1 .33 cups white sugar",
"Orange White Chocolate Chip Beltane Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Orange White Chocolate Chip Beltane Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"Orange White Chocolate Chip Beltane Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Orange White Chocolate Chip Beltane Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Orange White Chocolate Chip Beltane Cookies","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Orange White Chocolate Chip Beltane Cookies","2 tablespoons orange zest",
"Orange White Chocolate Chip Beltane Cookies",".5 cup white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Sift together flour, baking powder, salt, and orange zest."
"Step 3","In a bowl of mixer, cream butter on medium speed, adding sugar gradually. Add vanilla and egg. Add flour mixture gradually, stopping frequently to push down from sides of bowl. When flour mixture is thoroughly combined, mix in chips."
"Step 4","Drop dough by scant spoonful onto baking sheet, spacing 1 inch apart, flattening slightly with back of spoon. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) 10 to 12 minutes or until beginning to brown. Allow to cool completely on cooling rack."
"Chocolate Air Cookies with Chocolate Chips","6 ounces dark chocolate, chopped",
"Chocolate Air Cookies with Chocolate Chips","3 large egg whites egg whites",
"Chocolate Air Cookies with Chocolate Chips",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Air Cookies with Chocolate Chips","1 pinch cream of tartar",
"Chocolate Air Cookies with Chocolate Chips",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Air Cookies with Chocolate Chips",".25 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with baking parchment."
"Step 2","Melt the chocolate in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching. Let chocolate cool slightly while preparing the egg whites."
"Step 3","Beat egg whites in a glass or metal bowl until foamy. Gradually add sugar, continuing to beat until stiff peaks form. Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the egg whites will form sharp peaks. Stir cream of tartar into the egg whites."
"Step 4","Scoop some of the egg whites into the cooled melted chocolate and fold until smooth. Fold the chocolate mixture into the remaining egg whites. Fold in vanilla extract. Stir chocolate chips into the mixture; drop by spoonful onto the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake until cookies set in their centers, 10 to 15 minutes."
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar",".25 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar",".75 cup wheat germ",
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar","1 cup quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar",".5 cup dried cherries",
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar",".5 cup golden raisins",
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar",".67 cup flaked coconut",
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Fruit Cookie Mix In A Jar",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Mix the flour, baking soda and salt together."
"Step 2","Starting with the brown sugar layer the ingredients in a 1 liter sized glass jar in the order given. Ending with the flour mixture."
"Step 3","Attach a card with the following directions: Oatmeal Fruit Cookies 1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line one baking sheet with parchment paper. 2. Empty the contents of the jar into a large bowl. Using a wooden spoon blend the mixture until well combined. 3. Using you hands work in 1/2 cup softened butter or margarine until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. 4. Beat 1 egg with 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1/4 cup milk. Still using your hands or a wooden spoon blend the egg mixture into the dough until well combined. 5. Drop teaspoon sized mounds 2 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 14 minutes or until the edges are lightly browned. Place cookies on a rack to finish cooling. Makes approximately 2 dozen cookies."
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies",".67 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies",".25 cup light corn syrup",
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies","48 small patty (0.6 oz)s small peppermint patties",
"Chocolate Mint-Filled Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","In heavy small saucepan over low heat, heat chocolate chips, stirring occasionally, until melted and smooth."
"Step 2","Pour melted chocolate into bowl and add flour, butter, corn syrup, baking soda, salt, egg and 1/2 cup sugar. Mix with electric mixer at low speed until blended. Increase speed to medium; beat until well mixed, scraping bowl frequently with rubber spatula."
"Step 3","Wrap dough with plastic wrap and refrigerate until easy to handle, about 2 hours."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 5","Measure 1/3 cup sugar into small bowl. Shape dough into 96 balls; roll balls in sugar to coat. Place in even number of balls, about 2 inches apart, on ungreased large cookie sheet."
"Step 6","Bake cookies 12 to 15 minutes until set. Immediately remove half of cookies from cookie sheet and invert onto work surface. While still hot, place chocolate-covered mint patties on remaining cookies, top side up. Press cookies together slightly so mint patty spreads out to cookie edges as it melts. With pancake turner, remove cookies to wire racks to cool. Repeat with remaining dough and mints."
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","1 cup buttermilk",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","1 egg white",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Great Gram's Sugar Cookies","2 tablespoons ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Mix all ingredients, except egg white, ground cinnamon and 2 T white sugar, in a large bowl until soft dough is formed."
"Step 2","Roll out on floured surface to 1/4 inch thickness and cut with cookie cutters. Paint cookies with egg white and sprinkle with cinnamon sugar, or colored sugars."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8-10 minutes on greased cookie sheets."
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cardamom",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar, firmly packed",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs, at room temperature",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons instant espresso powder",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Cardamom and Espresso Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, baking powder, baking soda, cardamom, cinnamon, and salt together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Cream brown sugar, butter, and white sugar together in a bowl until fluffy. Beat in eggs 1 at a time until thoroughly combined. Mix in instant espresso powder and vanilla extract."
"Step 4","Mix flour mixture into the butter mixture until just combined; do not overmix. Fold in chocolate chips."
"Step 5","Drop dough by the tablespoon onto the prepared baking sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are set, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool cookies on the pans 2 to 3 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mrs. Sigg's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream the butter, butter flavored shortening, and sugars. Add eggs and blend. Add peanut butter and vanilla. Add dry ingredients and stir until well blended."
"Step 2","Measure out tablespoonfuls of dough and roll into balls. Place 3 inches apart on lightly greased cookie sheets. Make criss-cross pattern with fork."
"Step 3","Bake in a pre-heated oven at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) 8-10 minutes until set, but not hard. Do not overbake. Leave on sheets for 2 minutes before removing. Cool, and store in covered container."
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".5 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 cup softened butter",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, and baking soda."
"Step 2","Beat the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in one egg until completely incorporated. Beat in the last egg along with the vanilla. Mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Fold in the chocolate chips; mixing just enough to evenly combine. Drop by heaped teaspoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are golden, 9 to 12 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chewy Coconut Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Coconut Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Coconut Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Coconut Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Chewy Coconut Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chewy Coconut Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chewy Coconut Cookies","1 egg",
"Chewy Coconut Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Coconut Cookies","1 .33 cups flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C.) Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla until light and fluffy. Gradually blend in the flour mixture, then mix in the coconut. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Cookies should be about 3 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly toasted. Cool on wire racks."
"Melted Snowman Cookies","4 eaches egg whites",
"Melted Snowman Cookies","8 cups confectioners' sugar, or as needed",
"Melted Snowman Cookies",".25 cup lemon juice, or as needed",
"Melted Snowman Cookies","24 cookies sugar cookies",
"Melted Snowman Cookies","24 regulars large marshmallows",
"Melted Snowman Cookies","1 (.75 ounce) tube black decorating gel",
"Melted Snowman Cookies","1 (.75 ounce) tube orange decorating gel",
"Melted Snowman Cookies","75 eaches silver nonpareils, or as desired",
"Melted Snowman Cookies","1 (.75 ounce) tube red decorating gel",
"Melted Snowman Cookies","1 (.75 ounce) tube green decorating gel",
"Step 1","Beat egg whites lightly in a large bowl using an electric mixer until frothy. Slowly beat enough confectioners' sugar into egg whites to make icing that will hold shape; blend in lemon juice until desired consistency is reached."
"Step 2","Arrange cookies about 1-inch apart on a large sheet of waxed paper. Spread icing onto each cookie, allowing icing to drip over edges to look like melting snow."
"Step 3","Grease a microwave-safe plate. Place 1 marshmallow onto plate."
"Step 4","Microwave marshmallow until it starts to puff up, 20 to 30 seconds. Immediately place marshmallow on the edge of 1 cookie while the icing is still wet to look like a melted snowman. Repeat with remaining marshmallows and iced cookies."
"Step 5","Decorate 'melted snowmen' by piping 'twig-like arms' using black decorating gel on the icing. Make 'coal eyes' and a 'mouth' on the marshmallow using black decorating gel. Make a 'carrot nose' under the 'coal eyes' using orange decorating gel. Make 'coat buttons' by arranging silver nonpareils down the middle of the icing. Make 'scarves' or 'bow-ties' using red decorating gel or green decorating gel."
"Step 6","Allow cookies to fully dry before removing from waxed paper, at least 1 hour."
"Pope's Valentine Cookies",".5 pound butter, softened",
"Pope's Valentine Cookies","2 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Pope's Valentine Cookies","1 cup sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Pope's Valentine Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Pope's Valentine Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (170 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix butter in a mixer until light, add remaining ingredients."
"Step 3","Knead until velvety. Roll one-half of the dough at a time to about 1/4 inch thickness using the smallest amount of flour possible."
"Step 4","Cut out and bake on a lightly greased pan for 12 minutes. Cookies will be almost white when cooked."
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Joey's Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the peanut butter, butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until well blended. Beat in the egg, milk, and vanilla one at a time. Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; stir into creamed mixture. Roll tablespoonfuls of dough into balls. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Press each ball once with fork tines."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are lightly browned."
"Chef John's Lemon Bars","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars",".5 cup unsalted butter at room temperature",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars",".25 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars",".25 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars","1 large egg yolk",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars","1 cup white sugar",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars","2 tablespoons all-purpose flour",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars",".25 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars","1 tablespoon freshly grated lemon zest",
"Chef John's Lemon Bars","1 teaspoon confectioners' sugar, or to taste",
"Step 1","Place an oven rack into middle position in oven and preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly oil an 8x8-inch baking dish."
"Step 2","Place 1 cup flour and butter in a mixing bowl and mash with the back of a spatula or wooden spoon until thoroughly combined. Mix in 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar, vanilla extract, and salt; mash mixture together until mixture looks like a slightly crumbly cookie dough."
"Step 3","Moisten your fingers with a little water and press dough into bottom of prepared baking dish. Use a fork to prick holes all over the crust."
"Step 4","Bake crust on center rack in the preheated oven until crust edges are barely golden brown, 22 minutes."
"Step 5","Beat eggs and egg yolks together in a bowl; whisk in white sugar and 2 tablespoons flour until smooth. Add lemon juice and lemon zest; whisk for 2 minutes. Pour lemon custard over crust."
"Step 6","Bake on center rack until custard is set and top has a thin white sugary crust, 25 minutes. Let cool completely before cutting into bars. Dip knife into very hot water, run around the edge, and cut into 16 squares. Dust cookies with 1 teaspoon confectioners' sugar."
"Butter Cookies II","1 cup butter",
"Butter Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Butter Cookies II","1 egg",
"Butter Cookies II","2 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Butter Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Butter Cookies II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and white sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour and salt; stir into the sugar mixture. Cover dough, and chill for at least one hour. Chill cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Press dough out onto ungreased, chilled cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly golden at the edges. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 large egg",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 ⅛ cups all-purpose flour",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup white chocolate chips",
"Amena's Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with a silicon mat or parchment paper."
"Step 2","Mash the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a large mixing bowl with a spatula until creamy and smooth, 2 to 3 minutes. Add the egg and vanilla; whisk vigorously for 20 to 30 seconds."
"Step 3","Whisk the flour, salt, and baking soda together in a small bowl; dump into the butter mixture and mix until just combined. Fold the semi-sweet chocolate chips, white chocolate chips, and milk chocolate chips into the mixture. Arrange onto the prepared baking sheet using a small scoop or large spoon."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 10 minutes; remove from oven and allow to cool on the sheet for 10 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to finish cooling completely."
"Homemade Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","2 (18.25 ounce) packages devil's food cake mix",
"Homemade Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Homemade Chocolate Sandwich Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Blend the above ingredients together with a pastry blender until mixed."
"Step 3","Roll in balls about the size of a quarter and place on ungreased baking sheets. Make an even number of balls."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 minutes. Let cookies stand on cookie sheet for 5-6 minutes before removing them to cooling rack. After cookies have cooled, put Cream Cheese Frosting (see recipe or use one can of pre-made frosting) between two cookies, putting bottom sides together."
"Step 5","NOTE: Adding chopped pecans to the cookies without making them into sandwiches is also very good. Spice cake mix can be used in place of Devil's food."
"Peanut Butter Cocoa No-Bake Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cocoa No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Cocoa No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Peanut Butter Cocoa No-Bake Cookies",".33 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Peanut Butter Cocoa No-Bake Cookies",".67 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cocoa No-Bake Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Peanut Butter Cocoa No-Bake Cookies",".5 cup chopped peanuts",
"Peanut Butter Cocoa No-Bake Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Place a piece of wax paper or foil on cookie sheet. Combine sugar, butter, milk and cocoa in medium saucepan."
"Step 2","Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture comes to rolling boil."
"Step 3","Remove from heat; cool 1 minute."
"Step 4","Add peanut butter; stir to blend. Add oats, peanuts and vanilla; stir to mix well. Quickly drop mixture by heaping teaspoons onto wax paper or foil. Cool completely. Store in cool, dry place."
"Pecan Pie Cookies",".25 cup butter",
"Pecan Pie Cookies",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Pecan Pie Cookies","3 tablespoons light corn syrup",
"Pecan Pie Cookies",".75 cup finely chopped pecans",
"Pecan Pie Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pecan Pie Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pecan Pie Cookies","1 cup brown sugar, packed",
"Pecan Pie Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Pecan Pie Cookies","1 egg",
"Pecan Pie Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Melt 1/4 cup of butter in a saucepan, and stir in the confectioners' sugar and corn syrup until the sugar is dissolved. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring often, and stir in the pecans until well combined. Refrigerate the mixture for 30 minutes to chill."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Sift the flour and baking powder together in a bowl, and set aside."
"Step 3","Beat brown sugar, 3/4 cup butter, egg, and vanilla extract in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until the mixture is creamy, about 2 minutes. Gradually beat in the flour mixture until well mixed. Pinch off about 1 tablespoon of dough, and roll it into a ball. Press the dough into the bottom of an ungreased cupcake pan cup, and use your thumb to press the dough into a small piecrust shape, with 1/4-inch walls up the sides of the cupcake cup. Repeat with the rest of the dough. Fill each little crust with about 1 teaspoon of the prepared pecan filling."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookie shells are lightly browned, 10 to 13 minutes. Watch closely after 10 minutes. Let the cookies cool in the cupcake pans for 5 minutes before removing to wire rack to finish cooling."
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies",".5 teaspoon kosher salt",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies",".67 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cake Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. This should take about 10 minutes! Add the eggs one at a time and mix to incorporate. Add the vanilla and mix thoroughly."
"Step 3","In a 1 gallon plastic food bag, place the all-purpose flour, baking soda, kosher salt and cocoa powder. Seal the bag and massage the ingredients to combine. The mixture will appear homogenous with no separate ingredients showing."
"Step 4","Add the flour and cocoa mix to the creamed butter and sugar. Mix together until the dough appears completely combined - about 3 minutes. Add all the walnuts and chocolate chips and stir them into the dough. Drop by two teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Or roll into balls, place about two inches apart on the sheet, and flatten slightly with your fingers."
"Step 5","Bake for 11 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). The cookies will appear to be just barely firm with a sheen to their surfaces. Allow to cool on the sheet for about one minute before removing to a cooling rack to cool completely. Store in airtight containers."
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies",".75 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies","1 (3.4 ounce) package instant butterscotch pudding mix",
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies","12 ounces semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine the flour and baking soda. Set aside."
"Step 3","Mix the butter, brown sugar, white sugar, pudding mix, and vanilla. Beat until creamy. Add the eggs and mix well. Gradually stir in the flour mixture. Stir in the chocolate chips and the chopped nuts. Drop from teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheets about 1 inch apart."
"Step 4","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes."
"Earthquake Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix",
"Earthquake Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Earthquake Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Earthquake Cookies",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Earthquake Cookies","1 tablespoon water",
"Step 1","Mix cake mix, eggs, shortening, and water in medium size bowl; mix with a spoon. Chill for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Shape dough into balls, roll in powdered sugar. Place on cookie sheet and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8-10 minutes; or until brown."
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV","1 .25 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV",".5 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Cookies IV",".5 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Sift together flour, baking soda, and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together butter, peanut butter, 1/2 cup white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in egg, then stir in vanilla. Gradually blend in the sifted ingredients. Shape dough into 1 inch balls. Roll in remaining sugar. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. Criss-cross with fork tines."
"Step 3","Bake at for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool slightly, and remove from pan."
"Chewy Sugar Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Sugar Cookies","1 .25 cups margarine",
"Chewy Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Chewy Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chewy Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chewy Sugar Cookies",".25 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). In a medium bowl, stir together the flour, baking soda, and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine and 2 cups sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then the vanilla. Gradually stir in the dry ingredients until just blended."
"Step 3","Wrap dough with plastic wrap and chill for 30 minutes to 1 hour."
"Step 4","Roll the dough into walnut-sized balls and roll the balls in remaining 1/4 cup of sugar. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets and flatten slightly."
"Step 5","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned at the edges. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Fudge Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix",
"Chocolate Fudge Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Fudge Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Chocolate Fudge Cookies","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the cake mix, eggs and oil until well blended. Fold in the chocolate chips. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Place the cookies 2 inches apart on the cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Neapolitan Cookies I","1 cup butter, softened",
"Neapolitan Cookies I","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Neapolitan Cookies I","1 egg",
"Neapolitan Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Neapolitan Cookies I","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Neapolitan Cookies I","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Neapolitan Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Neapolitan Cookies I",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Neapolitan Cookies I","5 drops red food coloring",
"Neapolitan Cookies I","1 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate, melted",
"Neapolitan Cookies I",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Divide dough equally into three small bowls. Add almond extract and red food coloring to one portion; stir until thoroughly mixed. Mix chocolate into second bowl, and walnuts into the third bowl."
"Step 2","Line a 9x5 inch loaf pan with waxed paper, and spread almond dough evenly in the bottom of the pan. Spread the walnut dough evenly over the almond layer, and top with chocolate dough layer. Cover layered dough with waxed paper, and place in the refrigerator until firm, about 4 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Turn out chilled dough by inverting pan; peel off waxed paper. With sharp knife, cut dough lengthwise in half. Slice each half of dough crosswise into 1/4 inch slices. Place slices on cookie sheet one inch apart."
"Step 4","Bake 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until light brown. Remove to wire racks to cool."
"Gooey Butter Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese",
"Gooey Butter Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Gooey Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Gooey Butter Cookies",".25 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Gooey Butter Cookies","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Gooey Butter Cookies",".25 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the cream cheese and butter. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Add cake mix, and stir until well blended. Roll into 1inch balls and roll the balls in the confectioners' sugar. Place 1 inch apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 13 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks.Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","1 cup butter, softened",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","1 egg",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","4 (1 ounce) squares bittersweet chocolate, chopped",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","4 ounces milk chocolate, chopped",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","4 ounces white chocolate, chopped",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","3 teaspoons shortening",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","3 (1 ounce) squares bittersweet chocolate",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","3 ounces milk chocolate",
"Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookie","3 ounces white chocolate",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream the butter or margarine with the brown sugar until light. Add the egg and mix well."
"Step 3","Stir in the flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda and salt. Mix in the nuts and the 4 ounces of the bittersweet, milk and white chocolates."
"Step 4","Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 5","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. Cool slightly. Dip cooled cookies into the Three Chocolate Glaze."
"Step 6","To Make Three Chocolate Glaze: Heat 1 teaspoon of the shortening with bittersweet chocolate over low heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. Remove from heat. Dip each cookie 1/2 inch deep into chocolate along one edge. Repeat with remaining shortening and chocolates. Rotate dipped edge of cookie for each type of chocolate."
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter-flavored shortening",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon coconut extract",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups sweetened flaked coconut",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Pecan Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. Beat shortening, butter, brown sugar, and white sugar in another bowl until smooth. Beat eggs into butter mixture one at a time, adding coconut extract and vanilla extract with the last egg. Stir flour mixture into butter mixture and fold in coconut, pecans, semisweet chocolate chips, and white chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Scoop up dough by spoonfuls and roll into 1-inch balls. Place balls 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets. Flatten dough balls slightly."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Evil Cookies",".67 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Evil Cookies","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Evil Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Evil Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Evil Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Evil Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Evil Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Evil Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Evil Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Evil Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Evil Cookies",".5 cup butterscotch chips",
"Evil Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Cream together shortening and sugars, blend in eggs and vanilla. Mix in flour, oats, baking powder, and salt. Stir in chips and nuts."
"Step 2","Spread into a 9 x 13 pan. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 25-30 minutes."
"Caramel Brownies II","1 (14 ounce) package individually wrapped caramels",
"Caramel Brownies II",".67 cup evaporated milk",
"Caramel Brownies II","1 (18.25 ounce) package German chocolate cake mix",
"Caramel Brownies II",".75 cup butter, melted",
"Caramel Brownies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Caramel Brownies II","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Caramel Brownies II","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease one 9x13 inch baking dish."
"Step 2","Melt caramels and 1/3 cup of the evaporated milk over very low heat, stirring occasionally until smooth."
"Step 3","Combine cake mix, melted butter, the remaining 1/3 cup evaporated milk, vanilla and nuts. Mix well and spread 1/2 of the batter into the prepared pan."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8 minutes."
"Step 5","Sprinkle the chocolate chips evenly over the partially cooked brownies. Pour the melted caramel mixture over the top and with a teaspoon drop the remaining 1/2 of the batter evenly over the top."
"Step 6","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 20 minutes. Let brownies cool in pan then cut into bars."
"Lots o' Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Lots o' Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Lots o' Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Lots o' Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Lots o' Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Lots o' Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Lots o' Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lots o' Cookies","1 .5 cups whole wheat flour",
"Lots o' Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Lots o' Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Lots o' Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Lots o' Cookies","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Lots o' Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped walnuts",
"Lots o' Cookies","2 cups flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream sugars, butter and shortening. Beat in eggs and vanilla until well blended."
"Step 3","Mix in sifted flours, salt and baking soda and stir well."
"Step 4","Stir in remaining ingredients."
"Step 5","Drop in teaspoon size balls on greased baking sheet about 2 inches apart. Bake 8 minutes or until edges are brown."
"Dishpan Cookies I","2 cups light brown sugar",
"Dishpan Cookies I","2 cups white sugar",
"Dishpan Cookies I","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Dishpan Cookies I","2 cups vegetable oil",
"Dishpan Cookies I","4 large eggs eggs",
"Dishpan Cookies I","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dishpan Cookies I","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Dishpan Cookies I","1 teaspoon salt",
"Dishpan Cookies I","1 .5 cups quick cooking oats",
"Dishpan Cookies I","4 cups cornflakes cereal",
"Dishpan Cookies I","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Dishpan Cookies I","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a LARGE bowl, cream brown sugar, sugar, vanilla, oil and eggs together. Add flour, soda, salt and oats. Mix well. Stir in corn flakes, coconut and pecans."
"Step 3","Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes."
"Step 4","Makes 10 dozen (2 inch) cookies. Caution: Halve this recipe if you don't want a ton of cookies."
"Lemon Nut Cookies",".5 cup margarine",
"Lemon Nut Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Lemon Nut Cookies","1 egg, separated",
"Lemon Nut Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Lemon Nut Cookies","2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice",
"Lemon Nut Cookies","2 teaspoons lemon zest",
"Lemon Nut Cookies","2 teaspoons orange zest",
"Lemon Nut Cookies","1 .25 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Lemon Nut Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Cream margarine with sugar. Add egg yolk (reserve egg white), lemon juice and grated lemon and orange peels and beat. Add flour and mix well. Chill for one hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Dip a teaspoonful of dough into slightly beaten egg white and then into nuts. Place nut side up, 2 inches apart on lightly-oiled cookie sheet. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until lightly browned. Transfer to cooling rack immediately."
"Apple Crisp Cookies","2 cups whole wheat flour, plus",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","2 tablespoons whole wheat flour",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Apple Crisp Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Apple Crisp Cookies",".5 cup demerara sugar",
"Apple Crisp Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","7 tablespoons apple butter",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","3 tablespoons apple juice",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Apple Crisp Cookies","1 apple, finely chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In a large bowl, mix all of the whole wheat flour together with the cinnamon, baking powder and salt."
"Step 2","In a separate bowl, mash the butter, demerara sugar, and brown sugar together until thoroughly combined, then stir in the apple butter until smooth. Stir in eggs, vanilla extract, and apple juice until well mixed; pour the liquid mixture into the flour mixture about 1/3 cup at a time, stirring after each addition. Mix in the oats and chopped apple."
"Step 3","With 2 teaspoons, form the dough into balls and place onto ungreased baking sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are lightly browned and set in the centers, about 10 minutes; allow to cool for about 2 minutes on baking sheets until removing to finish cooling on wire racks."
"Pina Colada Cookies I","1 (18.25 ounce) package pineapple flavored cake mix",
"Pina Colada Cookies I",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Pina Colada Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pina Colada Cookies I","2 teaspoons rum flavored extract",
"Pina Colada Cookies I","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Pina Colada Cookies I","1 .5 tablespoons milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cut the softened margarine or butter into the cake mix. Use a fork mash them together until they are well combined and the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Beat in the eggs, milk and rum extract and mix well. Stir in the flaked coconut until combined."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased baking sheet and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 to 15 minutes."
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup wheat germ",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup crispy rice cereal",
"Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together white sugar, brown sugar and shortening until fluffy. Stir in the vanilla and eggs. Combine the flour, wheat germ, salt and baking soda; mix into the batter. Stir in crispy rice cereal and chocolate chips. Drop by teaspoonfuls on an ungreased cookie sheet, spacing cookies 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 11 to 13 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are light brown at the edges. Cool well before eating as the chocolate can burn your mouth."
"Grandmother's Brown Sugar Cookies","3 cups packed brown sugar",
"Grandmother's Brown Sugar Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Grandmother's Brown Sugar Cookies",".75 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Grandmother's Brown Sugar Cookies","4 large eggs eggs",
"Grandmother's Brown Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Grandmother's Brown Sugar Cookies","5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandmother's Brown Sugar Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together the sugar, shortening and eggs. Add vanilla and mix well."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, baking soda, and cream of tartar. Add to brown sugar mixture and stir until it is a soft dough."
"Step 4","Roll out, cut with cookie cutters and bake for 8 to 10 minutes."
"Christmas Tree Cookies","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Christmas Tree Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Christmas Tree Cookies","1 egg",
"Christmas Tree Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Christmas Tree Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Christmas Tree Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Christmas Tree Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Christmas Tree Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Step 1","Mix confectioners' sugar, butter or margarine, egg, vanilla, and almond extract. Stir in flour, baking soda, and cream of tartar. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours."
"Step 2","Heat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Divide dough into halves. On lightly floured cloth-covered board, roll each half out to 3/16 inch thick. on lightly floured cloth-covered board. Cut into Christmas shapes."
"Step 3","Bake on parchment lined baking sheets for 7 to 8 minutes. Let cool on wire racks and decorate as desired."
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Mellow Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup miniature marshmallows",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the chocolate chips and marshmallows. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Orange Slice Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Orange Slice Cookies I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Orange Slice Cookies I","1 cup shortening",
"Orange Slice Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Orange Slice Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Orange Slice Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Orange Slice Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Orange Slice Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Orange Slice Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Orange Slice Cookies I","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Orange Slice Cookies I","2 cups orange-flavored fruit slice jelly candies",
"Step 1","In large mixing bowl, cream together sugars and shortening till fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla; beat well. Stir together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Stir into creamed mixture."
"Step 2","Stir in the oats, and the orange candy. NOTE: Dip a pair of kitchen shears into a glass of hot water or spray with a non-stick spray to make snipping the orange slices easier. Using about one tablespoon of mixture for each cookie, roll into one inch balls. Place on greased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in a 350 degree F (175 degrees C) oven for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove and cool on a wire rack."
"No Bake Cookies VII","1 cup creamy peanut butter",
"No Bake Cookies VII","1 cup marshmallow fluff",
"No Bake Cookies VII","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, mix together the peanut butter and marshmallow fluff. Stir in chocolate chips. Roll into 1 inch balls and serve."
"Buckeye Balls II","1 .5 cups creamy peanut butter",
"Buckeye Balls II",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Buckeye Balls II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Buckeye Balls II","4 cups sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Buckeye Balls II","6 ounces semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Buckeye Balls II","2 tablespoons shortening",
"Step 1","Line a baking sheet with waxed paper; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, mix peanut butter, butter, vanilla, and confectioners' sugar with hands to form a smooth stiff dough. Shape into balls using 2 teaspoons of dough for each ball. Place on prepared pan, and refrigerate."
"Step 3","Melt shortening and chocolate together in a metal bowl over a pan of lightly simmering water. Stir occasionally until smooth, and remove from heat."
"Step 4","Remove balls from refrigerator. Insert a wooden toothpick into a ball, and dip into melted chocolate. Return to wax paper, chocolate side down, and remove toothpick. Repeat with remaining balls. Refrigerate for 30 minutes to set."
"Crisp Rice Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Crisp Rice Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Crisp Rice Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Crisp Rice Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Crisp Rice Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Crisp Rice Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Crisp Rice Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Crisp Rice Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Crisp Rice Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly coat baking sheets with non-stick cooking spray."
"Step 2","Combine the flour, baking soda and salt. Set aside."
"Step 3","Cream the butter with the sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg and vanilla until well combined. Mix in the flour mixture. Stir in the cereal and chocolate chips. Drop by level tablespoons onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove immediately from baking sheets and cool on wire racks. Store in an airtight container."
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies","1 egg, separated",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies","1 tablespoon cardamom",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies",".33 cup chopped pecans",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies","1 .5 tablespoons Butter",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pecan Cardamom Bar Cookies","1 tablespoon milk, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C). Grease a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together 1cup of butter, white sugar and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Mix in the egg yolk and 1 tablespoon of vanilla. Combine the flour, cardamom and salt; stir into the batter until it forms a soft dough. Spread evenly in the prepared pan. Brush the top with egg white and sprinkle pecans over the top."
"Step 3","Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven. Prepare the frosting while the cookies bake."
"Step 4","Melt the remaining butter in a saucepan over low heat until it starts to brown. Remove from the heat and stir in confectioners' sugar until smooth. Stir in enough milk to achieve a drizzling consistency. Drizzle frosting onto the bars when warm. Cool, then cut into bars."
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies","1 .25 cups whole-wheat flour",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup ground flax seed",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups oats",
"Butterscotch Oatmeal Cookies","2 (6 ounce) packages butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, salt, and baking soda in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat the butter, brown sugar, flax seed, and white sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in one egg until completely incorporated. Beat in the last egg along with the vanilla extract. Add the flour mixture and beat until just incorporated. Fold oats and butterscotch chips into the dough just enough to evenly combine; drop by ice cream scoop or heaping spoonfuls onto baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until browned, 12 to 14 minutes. Allow to cool on baking sheets for 3 minutes before transferring to cooling rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies",".67 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies",".33 cup milk",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies",".5 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies","1 cup candy-coated peanut butter pieces (such as Reese's Pieces®)",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies","3 tablespoons melted butter",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies","3 tablespoons cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Halloween Cookies",".25 cup candy-coated peanut butter pieces (such as Reese's Pieces®), or to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat white sugar and 2/3 cup softened butter together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; mix in 1/3 cup milk, egg, and 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract. Stir flour, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt into creamed butter mixture until dough is just combined; fold in 1 cup candy-coated peanut butter pieces. Drop dough, 1 to 2 tablespoons per cookie, onto a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are crisp, 10 to 12 minutes. Allow cookies to cool on pans for 2 to 3 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Step 4","Beat 3 tablespoons melted butter and 3 tablespoons cocoa powder together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; beat in confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons milk, and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract until frosting is fluffy and smooth. Frost cookies and decorate with more candy-coated peanut butter pieces.Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars","1 pound fresh strawberries",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars",".5 lemon, juiced",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars","2 teaspoons cornstarch",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars","1 .5 cups old-fashioned rolled oats",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars",".5 cup whole wheat flour",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars",".5 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars",".5 teaspoon kosher salt",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars",".25 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Bars","8 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Butter a 9x12-inch baking dish."
"Step 2","Remove the green tops from strawberries using the tip of small, sharp knife or strawberry huller. Place the berries cut-side down on a work surface and cut in half. Slice each half lengthwise 3 to 5 times before turning and cutting across in a nice, uniform dice."
"Step 3","Combine diced strawberries, lemon juice, sugar, and cornstarch in a mixing bowl and stir until thoroughly combined and the cornstarch disappears. Set aside until needed."
"Step 4","Combine oats, all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, brown sugar, salt, and ginger in a mixing bowl. Pour in melted butter and stir thoroughly until dry ingredients are evenly coated."
"Step 5","Transfer 60% of the oatmeal mixture into the prepared baking dish and spread out into an even layer. Press the mixture down with the back of a spoon or spatula to compress slightly."
"Step 6","Place strawberries over the top using a slotted spoon. Do not press down. Reserve any accumulated juices in the bowl. Top with remaining oatmeal mixture and press down lightly with the back of a spoon or spatula. Drizzle reserved juices on top."
