"Step 7","Bake in the preheated oven until the top is golden brown, about 45 minutes. Press the top down with a spatula to compress slightly. Let cool completely, about 1 hour. Cut into bars and serve."
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 .25 cups flour",
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .33 cups butter, softened",
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .25 cups granulated sugar",
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup firmly packed light brown sugar",
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 teaspoons McCormick® Pure Vanilla Extract",
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Vanilla Rich Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Mix flour, baking soda and salt in medium bowl. Set aside. Beat butter and sugars in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla; mix well. Gradually beat in flour mixture on low speed until well mixed. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts."
"Step 2","Drop by rounded tablespoons about 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on baking sheets 1 minute. Remove to wire racks; cool completely."
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","2 teaspoons cream of tartar",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","1 pinch ground cinnamon",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","1 cup butter, softened",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","1 cup white sugar",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","3 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","4 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs",".25 cup milk",
"Christmas Cookie Cut Outs","2 drops any color food coloring",
"Step 1","Sift together flour, cream of tarter, baking soda, nutmeg, and cinnamon in a bowl; set aside. Beat the butter and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Add the eggs one at a time, allowing each egg to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next. Beat in the vanilla with the last egg. Mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Cover and refrigerate dough overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Roll out dough on floured surface to 1/2 inch thick. Cut into shapes with Christmas cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are golden, 8 to 10 minutes. If using cutters that have small appendages, such as reindeer legs, reduce the baking time or they will overcook. Remove cookies to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Step 4","Beat the butter and confectioners' sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl, mixture will be stiff. Add the vanilla and slowly mix in the milk a little at a time until a spreading consistency is reached. Stir in food coloring, if desired. Make sure cookies are completely cool before frosting."
"Clean Banana Oat Cookies","2 eaches bananas, mashed",
"Clean Banana Oat Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Clean Banana Oat Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"Clean Banana Oat Cookies","1 teaspoon honey",
"Clean Banana Oat Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Clean Banana Oat Cookies","1 cup oats",
"Clean Banana Oat Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Clean Banana Oat Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Clean Banana Oat Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Mix mashed bananas, milk, egg, honey, and vanilla extract together in a bowl. Stir in oats, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt."
"Step 3","Spoon batter into mounds on the baking sheet, spacing them a few inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until top looks dry and edges are golden, about 15 minutes."
"Twinlow Peanut Butter Cookies","7 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Twinlow Peanut Butter Cookies","2 tablespoons baking soda",
"Twinlow Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons salt",
"Twinlow Peanut Butter Cookies","6 cups brown sugar",
"Twinlow Peanut Butter Cookies","3 cups butter, softened",
"Twinlow Peanut Butter Cookies","3 cups peanut butter",
"Twinlow Peanut Butter Cookies","6 large eggs eggs",
"Twinlow Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar, or as needed",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Line several baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl."
"Step 4","In a separate large bowl, cream brown sugar, butter, and peanut butter together until evenly mixed and smooth."
"Step 5","Beat in eggs."
"Step 6","Stir the the flour mixture into the peanut butter mixture to make a smooth dough."
"Step 7","Place white sugar into a shallow bowl."
"Step 8","Roll dough into tablespoon-size balls, then roll in the white sugar to coat all sides."
"Step 9","Place cookies onto the prepared baking sheets at least 1 inch apart."
"Step 10","Press each cookie down flat with a fork, making a cross-cross pattern."
"Step 11","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned on the bottom, about 12 minutes. Allow to cool on baking sheets about 5 minutes before removing to finish cooling on wire racks."
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies","1 .5 cups dried cranberries",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies",".5 cup white chocolate chips",
"Chocolate-Cran-Oat Cookies",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)"
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in the eggs one at a time. Combine the rolled oats, flour, whole wheat flour, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the cranberries, white chocolate chips and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Butterscotch Cheesecake Bars","cooking spray",
"Butterscotch Cheesecake Bars","1 (11 ounce) package butterscotch chips",
"Butterscotch Cheesecake Bars",".5 cup butter",
"Butterscotch Cheesecake Bars","2 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Butterscotch Cheesecake Bars","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Butterscotch Cheesecake Bars","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk (such as Eagle Brand®)",
"Butterscotch Cheesecake Bars","1 egg",
"Butterscotch Cheesecake Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Heat butterscotch chips and butter together in a saucepan, stirring frequently, over low heat until melted, about 5 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat and stir graham cracker crumbs into butterscotch mixture. Measure 2/3 cup graham cracker-butterscotch mixture and set aside; press remaining mixture into the prepared baking dish to form a crust."
"Step 3","Beat cream cheese in a bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add sweetened condensed milk, egg, and vanilla extract; mix well. Pour cream cheese mixture over crust. Sprinkle reserved graham cracker-butterscotch mixture over cream cheese mixture layer."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes."
"Tiger Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Tiger Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Tiger Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Tiger Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Tiger Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Tiger Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Tiger Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Tiger Cookies","3 cups crushed sugar-frosted corn flake cereal",
"Tiger Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla; mix until fluffy. Sift together flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into butter mixture. Stir in the crushed cereal. Melt chocolate chips in a bowl over simmering water or in the microwave. Swirl melted chocolate gently into dough, leaving big streaks of chocolate."
"Step 3","Drop cookies by heaping teaspoonfuls onto unprepared cookie sheets. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes. After baking remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Hamburger Cookies","4 drops green food coloring",
"Hamburger Cookies",".5 teaspoon water",
"Hamburger Cookies",".25 cup flaked coconut",
"Hamburger Cookies","48 wafers vanilla wafers",
"Hamburger Cookies","24 piece (blank)s chocolate covered thin mints",
"Hamburger Cookies","1 tablespoon sesame seeds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a bowl, combine food coloring with a few drops of water. Add coconut and cover the container, shake until coconut is tinted. Set aside."
"Step 3","Place 1/2 of the vanilla wafers, flat side up, in an ungreased cookie sheet. Top each wafer with a peppermint patty. Place in the oven about 1 minute or just until chocolate begins to soften."
"Step 4","Remove cookies from oven and sprinkle each mint with 1/2 teaspoon coconut (for lettuce). Place another vanilla wafer on top and press gentle. With a clean paint brush, brush the top of each hamburger with just enough water to moisten so that the sesame seeds will stick when sprinkled on top of each cookie. NOTE: You can use canned chocolate frosting in place of peppermint patty, then eliminate the baking."
"Chai Butter Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"Chai Butter Cookies","1 cup chai tea mix",
"Chai Butter Cookies","1 .33 cups white sugar",
"Chai Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chai Butter Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chai Butter Cookies","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Chai Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Chai Butter Cookies",".5 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, 1 1/3 cups sugar, and chai tea mix until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each. Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; blend into the creamed mixture until all of the dry has been absorbed. Cover the dough, and refrigerate for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Roll the cookie dough into walnut sized balls, and roll the balls in sugar. Place the cookies onto greased cookie sheets about 3 inches apart, and flatten slightly using the tines of a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, just until the edges begin to brown. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Candy-Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I","1 cup shortening",
"Candy-Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Candy-Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I",".5 cup white sugar",
"Candy-Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Candy-Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Candy-Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Candy-Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Candy-Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I","1 teaspoon salt",
"Candy-Coated Milk Chocolate Pieces Cookies I","1 .5 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Thoroughly cream together shortening, sugars, eggs and vanilla."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, mix together the dry ingredients, except the candies. Add to creamed mixture and mix well."
"Step 4","Stir in 1/2 cup candies. Mix well. Drop by teaspoon unto cookie sheets and decorate with remaining candies. Bake for 10 - 12 minutes."
"Peanut Butter Cookies II","1 cup butter, softened",
"Peanut Butter Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cookies II","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Cookies II","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Cookies II","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Cookies II","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then mix in the peanut butter. Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; blend in to form a soft dough. Mix in coconut. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Flatten each cookie using the tines of a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on wire racks."
"Kristil's Frat House Cookies","2 cups butter",
"Kristil's Frat House Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Kristil's Frat House Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Kristil's Frat House Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Kristil's Frat House Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Kristil's Frat House Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Kristil's Frat House Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Kristil's Frat House Cookies","4 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Cream butter and sugars together until fluffy. Add eggs and blend well. Stir in salt, baking soda and flour. Blend until the flour is incorporated. Stir in the chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Use a melon baler sized ice cream scoop to scoop out chunks of dough. Place onto greased or parchment lined cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 to 15 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool cookies on a rack and place on a serving platter. Enjoy!"
"Lemonia Cookies","2 cups milk",
"Lemonia Cookies","2 tablespoons bakers' ammonia",
"Lemonia Cookies","2 .5 cups granulated sugar",
"Lemonia Cookies","1 cup lard",
"Lemonia Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Lemonia Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Lemonia Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon oil",
"Lemonia Cookies","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Dissolve the ammonia in the milk, and set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the lard and sugar until smooth. Mix in the lemon oil, eggs, and salt. Stir in the milk alternately with the flour to form a soft but manageable dough. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls. Place 2 inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten the cookies using the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until firm. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","1 cup butter",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","1 cup brown sugar",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","⅛ teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","2 cups rolled oats",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","2 cups crispy rice cereal",
"Cracker Jack Cookies II","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the oatmeal, coconut, crisp rice cereal and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Pudding Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pudding Cookies II","2 cups baking mix",
"Pudding Cookies II",".5 cup milk",
"Pudding Cookies II",".33 cup vegetable oil",
"Pudding Cookies II","2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix",
"Pudding Cookies II","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Combine the eggs and baking mix. Mix in the milk and oil. Stir in the pudding and the chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes."
"Melt In Your Mouth Cookies III","1 cup butter",
"Melt In Your Mouth Cookies III","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Melt In Your Mouth Cookies III","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Melt In Your Mouth Cookies III","1 pinch salt",
"Step 1","Combine the butter, flour and confectioners' sugar together. At first it will have a pie crust consistency. Roll into one large log and wrap in wax paper or plastic wrap. Chill for at least one hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Slice chilled log into 1/4 inch thick slices. Place cookies on a baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven until edges just begin to turn golden, about 10 minutes. Watch carefully so they don't burn."
"Neapolitan Cookies II","1 cup butter, softened",
"Neapolitan Cookies II",".5 cup white sugar",
"Neapolitan Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Neapolitan Cookies II","1 egg",
"Neapolitan Cookies II","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Neapolitan Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Neapolitan Cookies II",".25 cup chopped walnuts, toasted",
"Neapolitan Cookies II","1 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate, melted",
"Neapolitan Cookies II","2 tablespoons maraschino cherries, chopped",
"Step 1","Mix together butter or margarine, sugar, vanilla and egg."
"Step 2","Stir in flour and salt. Divide dough into 3 equal parts."
"Step 3","Mix nuts into one part. Mix melted and cooled chocolate into the second part. Mix cherries into remaining part."
"Step 4","Line bottom and ends of loaf pan (9 x 5 x 3 inches) with aluminum foil; allow ends of foil to extend 5 inches over end of pan."
"Step 5","Press nut dough evenly in bottom of pan. Press chocolate dough on top of nut dough. Press cherry dough on top of chocolate dough. Cover dough with the extended ends of foil."
"Step 6","Refrigerate at least 2 hours but no longer than 6 weeks."
"Step 7","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 8","Remove foil and dough from pan and remove foil from dough. Cut dough crosswise into 1/4 inch slices and cut each slice across the dough layers into half so that each half contains three layers. Place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 9","Bake until set (about 10 minutes). Immediately remove from cookie sheet."
"Nutella® Cookies",".5 cup butter, at room temperature",
"Nutella® Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Nutella® Cookies","1 egg",
"Nutella® Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Nutella® Cookies","1 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)",
"Nutella® Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Nutella® Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Nutella® Cookies","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Nutella® Cookies",".5 cup chopped hazelnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with aluminum foil or parchment paper."
"Step 2","Cream butter and sugar in a medium bowl with an electric mixer until white and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla extract; beat well. Add chocolate-hazelnut spread and mix completely. Slowly add flour and cocoa powder and mix well. Stir in chocolate chips and hazelnuts."
"Step 3","Drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven for 8 minutes. Turn the oven off and allow the cookies to sit in the oven for 2 minutes more."
"Step 5","Remove cookies from the oven and serve immediately or allow to cool."
"Mace Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mace Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Mace Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground mace",
"Mace Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Mace Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Mace Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Mace Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Mace Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mace Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon zest",
"Step 1","Combine flour, baking powder and mace. Set aside. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl, cream shortening and sugar together. Beat in eggs, then beat in the milk and vanilla extract. Beat in lemon zest. Gradually blend in dry ingredients. Cover and chill for at least four hours."
"Step 3","Roll out dough on floured surface to 1/8 inch thickness. Use a 2 inch round cookie cutter and cut into rounds. Place 1 inch apart on prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10-12 minutes or until lightly colored. Cool on cookie racks.White Chocolate, Chocolate Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter",
"White Chocolate, Chocolate Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate, Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"White Chocolate, Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"White Chocolate, Chocolate Cookies","1 .25 cups unsweetened cocoa powder",
"White Chocolate, Chocolate Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate, Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"White Chocolate, Chocolate Cookies","2 cups white chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition. Combine the cocoa, flour, and baking soda, gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in white chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until puffy but still soft. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies II","1 (18.25 ounce) package dark chocolate cake mix",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies II","1 (18.25 ounce) package low calorie chocolate cake mix",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies II","4 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies II",".67 cup vegetable oil",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies II","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Chocolate Sandwich Cookies II","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Lightly grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the dark and light chocolate cake mix. Add the eggs and oil, mix until well blended. Roll dough into 2 inch balls, and place them onto the prepared cookie sheet. Flatten the balls slightly with the back of a spoon."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm. Let cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before removing to cool on wire racks."
"Step 4","To make the filling, beat the cream cheese and confectioner' sugar together until smooth. Spread between two cooled cookies."
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 cup butter",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".25 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".25 cup boiling water",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III",".5 cup raisins",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies III","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Beat butter or margarine, sugars and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add flour and salt, mix well."
"Step 2","Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to mixture. Stir in rolled oats, raisins and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoonful onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10-12 minutes. Don't over cook. (There are no eggs in this recipe, I didn't forget to type it down)."
"Cookie in a Jar",".5 cup white chocolate chips",
"Cookie in a Jar",".5 cup crispy rice cereal",
"Cookie in a Jar","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cookie in a Jar",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cookie in a Jar",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cookie in a Jar",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cookie in a Jar",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Cookie in a Jar",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Cookie in a Jar",".5 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","In a 1 quart jar, layer the ingredients in the order listed. Pack down firmly after each addition."
"Step 2","Attach a tag with the following instructions: Cookie in a Jar 1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 2. In a large bowl, cream 1/2 cup margarine until light and fluffy. Mix in 1 egg and 2 tablespoons water. Add the entire contents of the jar, and stir until well blended. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. 3. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)","1 .25 cups packed brown sugar",
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)",".25 cup shortening",
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)","1 egg",
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)",".25 cup milk",
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)","1 cup unsulfured molasses",
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)","6 cups all-purpose flour",
"Marranitos (Mexican Pig-Shaped Cookies)","1 egg, beaten",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together brown sugar and shortening until smooth. Mix in 1 egg, milk, and vanilla until smooth. Stir in the baking soda, cinnamon, and molasses. Mix in flour until the dough is stiff enough to roll out."
"Step 3","Roll dough out on a lightly floured surface to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into cookies using a pig shaped cookie cutter. Place cookies 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets. Brush the remaining beaten egg over the tops of the cookies."
"Step 4","Bake for 15 to 17 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the centers of the cookies appear dry and edges are lightly browned."
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III","1 cup butter, softened",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III",".75 cup packed light brown sugar",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III",".5 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III","2 large eggs eggs",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III","1 cup coarsely chopped macadamia nuts",
"White Chocolate Macadamia Nut Cookies III","1 cup coarsely chopped white chocolate",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and almond extracts. Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the macadamia nuts and white chocolate. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown."
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup white chocolate chips",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup chopped walnuts",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup chopped pecans",
"Stephen's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup chopped almonds",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. Mix in the eggs and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt; add to butter mixture, and stir until just blended. With a large wooden spoon, stir in the white, milk, and semi-sweet chocolate chips. Stir in the walnuts, pecans, and almonds. Drop dough by heaping spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheet before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Independence Day Cookies","4 cups all purpose flour",
"Independence Day Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Independence Day Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Independence Day Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Independence Day Cookies","2 cups butter flavored shortening",
"Independence Day Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Independence Day Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Independence Day Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Independence Day Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package white chocolate chips",
"Independence Day Cookies","1 (12 ounce) package dried blueberries",
"Independence Day Cookies","2 (6 ounce) packages dried cranberries",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a bowl."
"Step 2","Beat the shortening, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in one egg until completely incorporated. Beat in the last egg. Mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Fold in the white chocolate chips, blueberries, and cranberries; mixing just enough to evenly combine."
"Step 3","Roll the dough into walnut-sized balls and place 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets. Flatten each ball to about 1/2-inch thick."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Dad's Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dad's Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Dad's Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Dad's Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Dad's Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Dad's Cookies","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Dad's Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Dad's Cookies",".75 cup vegetable oil",
"Dad's Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Dad's Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the flour, baking soda, salt, white sugar, brown sugar, oats and coconut. Make a well in the center and pour in the oil, eggs and vanilla. Mix well using your hands or a wooden spoon. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls and place 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Flatten slightly with a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, cookies should be a very light brown and chewy - not crisp. Cool for a couple of minutes on the baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Hoot Owl Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Hoot Owl Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Hoot Owl Cookies","1 egg",
"Hoot Owl Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Hoot Owl Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Hoot Owl Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Hoot Owl Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Hoot Owl Cookies","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Hoot Owl Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Hoot Owl Cookies","1 cup cashew halves",
"Step 1","Cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in egg and vanilla. Add baking powder and salt. Beat well. Add flour and mix until blended. Remove 2/3 of dough. Roll or pat dough out to form two 10 x 4 inch rectangles. Add cocoa to remaining 1/3 of dough. Mix until blended. Shape chocolate dough into two 10 inch long rolls. Place on rectangle and roll plain dough to cover chocolate dough completely, not including ends. Wrap in plastic wrap and chill at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Cut dough into 1/8 inch slices with a sharp knife. Place two slices side by side on a cookie sheet to resemble an owl's face. Pinch upper corners to resemble ears. Put chocolate chips in each dark circle for eyes and a cashew in the center for the beak."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned."
"Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","1 .5 cups unsalted butter",
"Rosemary Shortbread Cookies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary",
"Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Rosemary Shortbread Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Rosemary Shortbread Cookies","2 teaspoons white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and 2/3 cup of sugar until light and fluffy. Stir in the flour salt and rosemary until well blended. The dough will be somewhat soft. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees F). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into rectangles 1 1/2x2 inches in size. Place cookies 1 inch apart on the lined cookie sheets. Sprinkle the remaining sugar over the tops."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden at the edges. Cool on wire racks, and store in an airtight container at room temperature."
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","1 .5 cups solid pack pumpkin puree",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","1 .5 tablespoons ground cinnamon",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies",".5 tablespoon ground ginger",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies",".5 tablespoon ground cloves",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","1 egg white",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Pumpkin Whoopie Pies",".75 cup shortening",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Combine the oil and brown sugar. Mix in the pumpkin and eggs, beating well. Add the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, 1 teaspoon vanilla, cinnamon, ginger and cloves. Mix well."
"Step 3","Drop dough by heaping teaspoons onto the prepared baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes. Let cookies cool then make sandwiches from two cookies filled with Whoopie Pie Filling."
"Step 4","To Make Whoopie Pie Filling: Beat egg white and mix with the milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 cup of the confectioners' sugar. Mix well then beat in the shortening and the remaining cup of confectioners' sugar. Beat until light and fluffy."
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies","1 egg",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies","1 cup crushed cornflakes cereal",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chewy Crispy Coconut Cookies","1 .33 cups flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Stir in the egg and vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt and baking powder; stir into the creamed mixture. Add the oatmeal, crushed cereal and coconut and mix until combined."
"Step 3","Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto a cookie sheet. Cookies should be about 2 inches apart. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies should be light brown at the edges and on the bottom. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Cranberry Hootycreeks","⅝ cup all-purpose flour",
"Cranberry Hootycreeks",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Cranberry Hootycreeks",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Cranberry Hootycreeks",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cranberry Hootycreeks",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cranberry Hootycreeks",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cranberry Hootycreeks",".33 cup white sugar",
"Cranberry Hootycreeks",".5 cup dried cranberries",
"Cranberry Hootycreeks",".5 cup white chocolate chips",
"Cranberry Hootycreeks",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Layer the ingredients in a 1 quart or 1 liter jar, in the order listed."
"Step 2","Attach a tag with the following instructions: Cranberry Hootycreeks 1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a cookie sheet or line with parchment paper. 2. In a medium bowl, beat together 1/2 cup softened butter, 1 egg and 1 teaspoon of vanilla until fluffy. Add the entire jar of ingredients, and mix together by hand until well blended. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets. 3. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until edges start to brown. Cool on baking sheets, or remove to cool on wire racks."
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies",".5 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","3 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Sandwich Cookies","5 tablespoons milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixing bowl, cream the shortening, 1 cup creamy peanut butter and white and brown sugars. Add vanilla and then eggs, one at a time. Beat well after each addition. In a small bowl, combine flour, baking soda and salt. Add slowly to creamy mixture."
"Step 3","Shape into 1 inch balls and place on an ungreased cookie sheet, 2 inches apart. Flatten balls with a fork."
"Step 4","Bake for 7-8 minutes depending on size (I tend to keep a close eye on them and remove them as soon as they start to get golden. This helps to make them chewy.) Cool on wire racks."
"Step 5","To Make the filling: Combine 1/2 cup creamy peanut butter, confectioners' sugar, vanilla extract, and milk in a small bowl adding enough milk to make for a creamy, frosting like texture. Spread frosting on one cookie and top off to make sandwich."
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies","3 tablespoons strawberry puree",
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Chewy Strawberry Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon red colored sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat 1 1/2 cups white sugar and butter together in a bowl with an electric mixer until creamy, about 3 minutes. Beat egg into butter mixture. Add strawberry puree."
"Step 3","Stir flour, vanilla extract, baking powder, and salt into strawberry mixture with a spoon until flour is completely incorporated into dough."
"Step 4","Stir 1/2 cup white sugar and red sugar together in a shallow bowl."
"Step 5","Roll dough into walnut-sized balls, roll each ball in red sugar mixture, and place each ball 1 1/2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets. Lightly press each dough ball down to flatten."
"Step 6","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool."
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Kristen's Awesome Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening, brown sugar and white sugar. Stir in the egg, water and vanilla. Combine the flour, salt, baking soda and cinnamon, stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the rolled oats. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on baking sheets for a couple of minutes before removing to cool on wire racks."
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I",".5 cup shortening",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup white sugar",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I",".5 cup butter",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Coconut Oatmeal Cookies I","2 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium mixing bowl cream shortening, butter, and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla until blended. Set aside."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, combine dry ingredients, withholding the coconut until all other dry ingredients are blended. Add coconut."
"Step 4","Combine wet and dry ingredients until moist. Drop on greased cookie sheet about 1-2 inches apart. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden. Remove from oven immedietly- if overcooked cookies get HARD."
"Santa Sugar Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Santa Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups granulated sugar",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","2 eaches eggs",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons almond extract",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","PAM® Original No-Stick Cooking Spray",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","2 (7 ounce) pouches red decorating cookie icing",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","2 (7 ounce) pouches white decorating cookie icing",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","22 piece (blank)s red candy-coated chocolate pieces",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","44 eaches semisweet chocolate morsels",
"Santa Sugar Cookies","Reddi-wip® Original Dairy Whipped Topping",
"Step 1","Combine flour, baking powder and salt in medium bowl; set aside. Beat butter and sugar in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy. Add eggs, vanilla and almond extracts; mix well. Gradually add flour mixture, beating on low speed after each addition until well blended. Divide dough into 3 portions; wrap each tightly in plastic wrap. Refrigerate dough 2 hours or until thoroughly chilled and firm enough to handle."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Spray baking sheets and 5-inch Santa face cookie cutter with cooking spray; set aside. Roll out 1 portion of dough to 1/4-inch thickness on floured surface with floured rolling pin. Cut out cookies with prepared cutter. Transfer with metal spatula to baking sheet, placing 1 inch apart. Repeat with remaining dough portions, spraying cutter with additional cooking spray as needed."
"Step 3","Bake 7 to 10 minutes or until edges of cookies are browned lightly. Cool on baking sheet 1 minute before removing cookies and placing on wire racks to cool completely."
"Step 4","Use red icing to fill in the hat, leaving the tip of the hat blank. Use white icing to fill in the tip of the hat, the brim of the hat, the beard and to make 2 dots in the center of the face for the eyes. Place a red candy centered between the eyes at the top of the beard for the nose and a mini morsel on each white dot to make eyes. Top beard with Reddi-wip® just before serving."
"Monster Cookies II","1 cup margarine, softened",
"Monster Cookies II","2 cups white sugar",
"Monster Cookies II","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Monster Cookies II","3 cups peanut butter",
"Monster Cookies II","6 large eggs eggs",
"Monster Cookies II","1 .5 teaspoons corn syrup",
"Monster Cookies II","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Monster Cookies II","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Monster Cookies II","9 cups rolled oats",
"Monster Cookies II",".5 pound candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Monster Cookies II",".5 pound semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, white sugar, brown sugar, and peanut butter until smooth. Beat in the eggs, two at a time, then stir in the corn syrup and vanilla. Mix in baking soda and oats until well blended. Stir in the chocolate candies and chocolate chips. Roll dough into 2 inch balls, and place 3 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten slightly with a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool on cookie sheets for a few minutes, before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Grandma's Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Step 1","In a small saucepan, combine raisins and enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and remove from heat. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a cookie sheet. Drain plumped raisins, reserve 6 tablespoons of the liquid."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar. Gradually add eggs, vanilla, and the 6 tablespoons water from the raisin pan; mix until light and fluffy. Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg; stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the oats and raisins; mixing until just combined. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, edges should be golden brown."
"Rosenmunnar","1 cup butter, softened",
"Rosenmunnar",".5 cup white sugar",
"Rosenmunnar","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Rosenmunnar",".5 cup any flavor fruit jam",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add sifted flour, and mix well. Shape dough into 1-inch balls and place on cookie sheets. Imprint your thumb in the center to make a 1/2-inch indentation. Fill with your favorite preserves."
"Step 3","Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until golden brown at the edges."
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup brown sugar",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies","1 egg white, beaten until foamy",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies",".25 cup unsweetened applesauce",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies","1 large naval orange, zested and juiced",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup quick-cooking oats",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies",".75 cup chopped walnuts",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Orange Oatmeal Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Stir egg white and applesauce into butter mixture until just combined into a dough. Add orange juice with pulp and orange zest to the dough; stir."
"Step 3","Mix flour, oats, walnuts, baking soda, cream of tartar, and cinnamon in a separate bowl; fold into the dough until evenly incorporated."
"Step 4","Drop by heaping tablespoon onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in preheated oven until bottom of cookies are lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on baking sheets 2 to 3 minutes before moving to wire racks to cool completely."
"Skinny Girl Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup whole wheat pastry flour",
"Skinny Girl Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup cocoa nibs",
"Skinny Girl Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup honey",
"Skinny Girl Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons pureed prunes",
"Skinny Girl Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Skinny Girl Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Skinny Girl Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 pinch sea salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flour, cocoa nibs, honey, prunes, vanilla extract, baking powder, and sea salt together in a bowl until batter is smooth. Scoop batter using a cookie scoop and drop into a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned, about 8 minutes."
"Chocolate Teddy Bear Cookies",".67 cup butter",
"Chocolate Teddy Bear Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Teddy Bear Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Teddy Bear Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Teddy Bear Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Teddy Bear Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Teddy Bear Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Teddy Bear Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream together the butter or margarine, sugar and vanilla. Add the eggs. In a separate bowl, mix dry ingredients. Gradually add to the creamed mixture and blend. Chill until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 3","For each cookie: Roll: 1 ball for the body (1 inch), 1 ball for the head (3/4 inch), 4 small balls for arms/legs (1/2inch), 2 smaller balls for ears, and 1 tiny ball for the nose. Arrange on ungreased cookie sheet. With tooth pick, draw eyes and mouth."
"Step 4","Bake 6 minutes or until set. Let cool 1 minute, then remove from cookie sheet. Optional: Make a ribbon around their necks using licorice whips (after baking)."
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II",".75 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II","1 .25 cups brown sugar",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II","1 egg",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II",".33 cup milk",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II","3 cups rolled oats",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II",".25 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Chewy Oatmeal Cookies II","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter flavored shortening and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg then stir in the milk and vanilla. Mix in the flour, oats, baking soda and cinnamon until well blended. Fold in the walnuts and if desired, raisins. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Creme de Menthe Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Creme de Menthe Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Creme de Menthe Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Creme de Menthe Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Creme de Menthe Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons creme de menthe liqueur",
"Creme de Menthe Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Creme de Menthe Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Creme de Menthe Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Creme de Menthe Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups mint chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs, then stir in the creme de menthe liqueur. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the mint mixture. Mix in the chocolate chips by hand using a wooden spoon. Drop dough by heaping teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Cookies should be at least 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Jasmine Cookies",".67 cup margarine, softened",
"Jasmine Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Jasmine Cookies","1 egg",
"Jasmine Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jasmine Cookies","1 tablespoon jasmine tea leaves, chopped",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until well light and fluffy. Stir in the egg, then the flour. Mix in the tea leaves. Form the dough into a ball, and flatten to about 1 inch. Wrap in plastic wrap, and refrigerate for about 15 minutes, or until firm."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Roll the dough into walnut sized balls, and place on cookie sheets. Flatten slightly."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven until the edges begin to brown slightly. Remove cookies from baking sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Mesquite Cookies",".5 cup mesquite flour",
"Mesquite Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mesquite Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Mesquite Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Mesquite Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Mesquite Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Whisk together the mesquite flour, all-purpose flour, and cinnamon; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat the butter and sugar with an electric mixer in a bowl until smooth. Add the eggs one at a time, allowing each egg to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next. Mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until golden, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups white chocolate chips",
"Pistachio White Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped pistachio nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, shortening, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, oats, baking powder and baking soda; blend into the creamed mixture to form a dough. Fold in the white chocolate chips and pistachios. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Citrus Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Citrus Cookies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Citrus Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Citrus Cookies","1 tablespoon lemon juice",
"Citrus Cookies","2 teaspoons lemon zest",
"Citrus Cookies","6 drops yellow food coloring",
"Citrus Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Cream together butter or margarine and sugar. Add salt, zest, juice, and food coloring. Mix until well blended."
"Step 2","Add flour a half cup at a time, mixing well. Dough should ball up when finished. Shape into a cylinder about 2 1/2 inches in diameter. Chill for 4 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Slice into 24 cookies and bake on cookie sheet 6 to 8 minutes."
"Wednesday Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Wednesday Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Wednesday Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Wednesday Cookies","1 cup sour cream",
"Wednesday Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Wednesday Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Wednesday Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Wednesday Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Wednesday Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Wednesday Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Wednesday Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Wednesday Cookies","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Wednesday Cookies",".25 cup all-purpose flour",
"Wednesday Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Wednesday Cookies","1 pound confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Stir in the eggs and vanilla, then the sour cream. Sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and baking soda, stir into the creamed mixture. Cover and chill for at least 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Drop cookies by heaping teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks. Frost the flat side with icing when cool."
"Step 4","To make the icing, combine the shortening, milk, egg whites, 1/4 cup of flour, vanilla and confectioners' sugar in a medium bowl. Mix on the high speed of an electric mixer until fluffy. The longer you mix, the fluffier it will be."
"Turtles® Fudge Chocolate Chip Cookies","Crisco® Original No-Stick Cooking Spray",
"Turtles® Fudge Chocolate Chip Cookies","5 ounces unsweetened baking chocolate",
"Turtles® Fudge Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup butter",
"Turtles® Fudge Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (14 ounce) can Eagle Brand® Sweetened Condensed Milk",
"Turtles® Fudge Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 (7.4 ounce) packages Martha White® Chocolate Chip Muffin Mix",
"Turtles® Fudge Chocolate Chip Cookies",".67 cup chopped pecans",
"Turtles® Fudge Chocolate Chip Cookies","48 eaches foil-wrapped chocolate covered caramel candies, unwrapped",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Coat large baking sheet with no-stick cooking spray. Microwave chocolate and butter in uncovered large microwave-safe bowl on HIGH for 2 minutes or until butter is melted. Stir until chocolate is completely melted and smooth. Stir in sweetened condensed milk. Stir in muffin mix until completely blended."
"Step 2","Roll tablespoonfuls of dough into balls. Dip bottoms into pecans. Place on baking sheet with nut side up, 2 inches apart. Bake 7 to 8 minutes or just until cookies look slightly crackled and centers are still soft. Immediately press a caramel candy into center of each cookie. Remove to wire rack. Swirl caramel candy gently with knife while candy is warm, if desired. Cool completely."
"Moravian Sugar Cookies","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups dark molasses",
"Moravian Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon distilled white vinegar",
"Step 1","Mix together flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, cloves and ginger."
"Step 2","In a separate bowl, cream together the brown sugar, butter and shortening. Add to the flour mixture and mix well. Add molasses and vinegar. Mix well."
"Step 3","Cover and chill dough overnight."
"Step 4","Roll out a small amount of dough to 1/8 (or less) inch thick. Cut into desired shapes."
"Step 5","Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 10 minutes or until light brown."
"Chocolate Rum Balls I","3 .25 cups crushed vanilla wafers",
"Chocolate Rum Balls I",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Rum Balls I",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Rum Balls I","1 .5 cups chopped walnuts",
"Chocolate Rum Balls I","3 tablespoons light corn syrup",
"Chocolate Rum Balls I",".5 cup rum",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, stir together the crushed vanilla wafers, 3/4 cup confectioners' sugar, cocoa, and nuts. Blend in corn syrup and rum."
"Step 2","Shape into 1 inch balls, and roll in additional confectioners' sugar. Store in an airtight container for several days to develop the flavor. Roll again in confectioners' sugar before serving."
"Raisin Lemon Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Raisin Lemon Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Raisin Lemon Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Raisin Lemon Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Raisin Lemon Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Raisin Lemon Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Raisin Lemon Cookies",".25 cup lemon juice",
"Raisin Lemon Cookies","2 teaspoons lemon extract",
"Raisin Lemon Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Raisin Lemon Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease 2 cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In large bowl, cream shortening, sugar, eggs, lemon juice and lemon extract. Mix until well blended. Blend in the flour, baking soda and salt. Stir in the oats and raisins. Drop dough by spoonfuls 2 inches apart on to cookie sheets."

"Date Filled Cookies","1 cup dates, pitted and chopped",
"Date Filled Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Date Filled Cookies",".75 cup water",
"Date Filled Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Date Filled Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Date Filled Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Date Filled Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Date Filled Cookies","1 .25 cups rolled oats",
"Date Filled Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a small saucepan over low heat, mix dates, sugar and 1/2 cup of water. Bring to a boil, and cook for 15 minutes, or until thick and smooth. Set aside to cool."
"Step 3","Cream butter and brown sugar together until smooth. Gradually mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Add the oatmeal and mix well. Stir in 2 to 4 tablespoons of water. Form the dough into a ball and refrigerate for 15 minutes."
"Step 4","On a floured surface, roll dough to 1/8 inch thickness and cut into 2 inch rounds. Place 1/2 of the rounds on cookie sheets. Spoon date mixture in the center of each round and top with another round. Press edges firmly together."
"Step 5","Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until browned."
"Cherry-Almond Icebox Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cherry-Almond Icebox Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Cherry-Almond Icebox Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cherry-Almond Icebox Cookies",".5 cup sliced blanched almonds",
"Cherry-Almond Icebox Cookies",".5 cup chopped red candied cherries",
"Cherry-Almond Icebox Cookies","2 ounces white chocolate",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line bottom and sides of an 11x7-inch glass baking pan with parchment paper; leave paper hanging over pan edges so that cookies can be lifted out after baking."
"Step 2","Beat butter and brown sugar together with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes. Stir flour into butter mixture until crumbly; stir in almonds and cherries. Press mixture evenly into the bottom of prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden at edges, about 20 minutes. Score with a sharp knife into bars while in the pan and still warm; allow cookies to cool about 30 minutes. Lift cookies from pan and slice to separate along scored marks."
"Step 4","Melt white chocolate in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 30-second intervals, stirring after each melting, for 1 to 3 minutes (depending on your microwave). Do not overheat or chocolate will scorch. Drizzle melted white chocolate over cookies or dip half of each cookie into melted white chocolate."
"Sugar Free Chocolate Tea Cookies",".25 cup shortening",
"Sugar Free Chocolate Tea Cookies","3 tablespoons sugar substitute with aspartame (such as Equal packets)",
"Sugar Free Chocolate Tea Cookies","1 egg",
"Sugar Free Chocolate Tea Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugar Free Chocolate Tea Cookies","2 tablespoons skim milk",
"Sugar Free Chocolate Tea Cookies","1 .25 cups cake flour",
"Sugar Free Chocolate Tea Cookies","1 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate, melted",
"Step 1","Cream shortening. Add sugar substitute, egg, vanilla and milk and blend well."
"Step 2","Add half the flour, mix well and stir in chocolate and the rest of the flour."
"Step 3","With cookie press, press onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Use hands and make small ball if you do not have press. Putting flour on your hands, this keeps dough from sticking. Press down with fingers on top of each cookie."
"Step 4","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 20 minutes."
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies","6 tablespoons brewed espresso",
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies","1 egg",
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies",".75 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Turkish Coffee and Cacao Nib Cookies",".5 cup cacao nibs",
"Step 1","Heat espresso and 1/4 cup sugar in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Simmer until mixture has reduced to a thick syrup, 12 to 15 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool for 30 minutes."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Combine butter, 3/4 cup sugar, and egg in a bowl; beat using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Mix in vanilla extract, baking powder, and baking soda until well combined. Mix in cooled espresso syrup. Add flour and mix until blended. Fold in cacao nibs."
"Step 4","Scoop 2 tablespoons dough per cookie onto the prepared baking sheets, leaving 2 inches of space between each for about 12 cookies per sheet."
"Step 5","Bake 1 baking sheet with cookies in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes. Repeat with the second baking sheet.McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies","3 cups flour",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies","2 teaspoons McCormick® Ground Ginger",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies","1 teaspoon McCormick® Ground Cinnamon",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies",".25 teaspoon McCormick® Ground Nutmeg",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies",".75 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies","1 egg",
"McCormick® Gingerbread Men Cookies","1 teaspoon McCormick® Pure Vanilla Extract",
"Step 1","Mix flour, ginger, cinnamon, baking soda, nutmeg and salt in large bowl. Beat butter and brown sugar in another large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy. Add molasses, egg and vanilla; beat well. Gradually beat in flour mixture on low speed until well mixed. Press dough into a thick flat disk. Wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Roll out dough to 1/4-inch thickness on lightly floured work surface. Cut into gingerbread men shapes with 5-inch cookie cutter. Place 1 inch apart on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until edges of cookies are set and just begin to brown. Cool on baking sheets 1 to 2 minutes. Remove to wire racks; cool completely. Decorate cooled cookies as desired. Store cookies in airtight container up to 5 days."
"Scottish Shortbread IV","2 cups butter",
"Scottish Shortbread IV","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Scottish Shortbread IV","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream butter and brown sugar. Add 3 to 3 3/4 cups flour. Mix well."
"Step 3","Sprinkle board with the remaining flour. Knead for 5 minutes, adding enough flour to make a soft dough. Roll to 1/2 inch thickness. Cut into 3x1 inch strips. Prick with fork and place on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V","1 (3.3 ounce) package instant white chocolate pudding mix",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies V","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Stir together the flour, baking soda, salt and instant pudding powder; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Blend in the eggs and vanilla. Gradually mix in the dry ingredients until just blended. Stir in the chocolate chips by hand using a wooden spoon. Scoop cookies using an ice cream scoop or by heaping tablespoons. Place cookies at least 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly golden. Cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"White Chocolate and Cranberry Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"White Chocolate and Cranberry Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"White Chocolate and Cranberry Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"White Chocolate and Cranberry Cookies","1 egg",
"White Chocolate and Cranberry Cookies","1 tablespoon brandy",
"White Chocolate and Cranberry Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"White Chocolate and Cranberry Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"White Chocolate and Cranberry Cookies",".75 cup white chocolate chips",
"White Chocolate and Cranberry Cookies","1 cup dried cranberries",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and brandy. Combine the flour and baking soda; stir into the sugar mixture. Mix in the white chocolate chips and cranberries. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. For best results, take them out while they are still doughy. Allow cookies to cool for 1 minute on the cookie sheets before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Grandma's Gingersnaps",".75 cup margarine",
"Grandma's Gingersnaps","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandma's Gingersnaps","1 egg",
"Grandma's Gingersnaps",".25 cup molasses",
"Grandma's Gingersnaps","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Grandma's Gingersnaps","1 tablespoon ground ginger",
"Grandma's Gingersnaps","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Grandma's Gingersnaps","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Grandma's Gingersnaps",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Grandma's Gingersnaps",".5 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine and 1 cup white sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and molasses until well blended. Combine the flour, ginger, cinnamon, baking soda and salt; stir into the molasses mixture to form a dough. Roll dough into 1 inch balls and roll the balls in the remaining sugar. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","2 tablespoons vanilla extract",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies",".5 cup light molasses",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","2 teaspoons salt",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","2 teaspoons ground nutmeg",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","2 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","1 (10 ounce) package HERSHEY®'S Cinnamon Chips",
"Cinnamon, Spice and Everything Nice Cookies","1 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees F)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening and 2 cups sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and molasses. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, nutmeg and ginger; stir into the sugar mixture until well blended. Mix in cinnamon chips. Dough will be stiff. Roll into walnut sized balls and roll each ball in remaining sugar. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet and flatten slightly."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until tops are crackled. Let cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon coarse salt",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .75 cups brown sugar",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups chocolate chips",
"Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies","18 eaches unwrapped caramel candies (such as Werther's®), each cut into 6 pieces",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Whisk flour, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat brown sugar, butter, and white sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until creamy. Beat eggs, 1 at a time, into butter mixture until blended; beat in vanilla extract. Stir flour mixture into butter mixture until dough is just combined; fold in chocolate chips."
"Step 4","Divide dough into thirty six 2 tablespoon-size balls; arrange on a baking sheet. Press 3 caramel pieces into each dough ball."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden brown, 13 to 15 minutes. Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool."
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies",".67 cup butter, softened",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies",".75 cup granulated sugar",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies","1 egg",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies","1 (16 ounce) can vanilla frosting",
"Valentine Conversation Heart Cookies","Food coloring",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Line two cookie sheets with Reynolds® Parchment Paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium to high speed for 30 seconds. Add sugar, baking powder, and salt. Beat until combined, scraping the sides of the bowl occasionally. Beat in the egg, milk, and vanilla until combined. Beat in as much of the flour as you can with the mixer. Using a wooden spoon, stir in any remaining flour. Divide dough in half. If necessary, cover and chill dough about 30 minutes or until easy to handle."
