"Step 3","Roll half the dough at a time between two sheets of parchment paper to 1/8- to 1/4-inch thickness. Using a 2 1/2-inch heart-shape cookie cutter, cut out cookie shapes, re rolling dough as needed until all the dough is cut out. Place shapes 1 inch apart on prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 6 to 8 minutes or until edges are firm and bottoms are very light brown. Transfer the parchment paper with baked cookies to wire racks and let cool. Once cooled, slide the parchment paper onto a work surface."
"Step 5","Tint frosting as desired with food coloring. Frost cookies with one color and use another color to pipe a message over the frosted cookies."
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies",".75 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies","2 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies",".33 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies","1 cup peanut butter chips",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Cookies","10 eaches chocolate covered peanut butter cups, cut into eighths",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, peanut butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, and baking soda; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Mix in the chocolate chips, peanut butter chips, and peanut butter cups. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Let cool for 1 or 2 minutes on sheet before removing, or they will fall apart."
"Dishpan Cookies II","2 cups margarine",
"Dishpan Cookies II","2 cups white sugar",
"Dishpan Cookies II","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Dishpan Cookies II","4 large eggs eggs",
"Dishpan Cookies II","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Dishpan Cookies II","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Dishpan Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Dishpan Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Dishpan Cookies II","4 cups cornflakes cereal",
"Dishpan Cookies II","1 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Dishpan Cookies II","2 cups flaked coconut",
"Dishpan Cookies II","3 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until just blended. Then mix in the corn flakes cereal, rolled oats, coconut, and chocolate chips. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are lightly browned. Cool on wire racks."
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","Reynolds® Parchment Paper",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups flour",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup granulated sugar",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Tiffany's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup coarsely chopped nuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line cookie sheets* with Reynolds Parchment Paper; set aside. On another sheet of Reynolds® Parchment Paper, combine flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat together butter, brown sugar and granulated sugar in a large mixing bowl, with an electric mixer, until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla."
"Step 3","Add flour mixture gradually to butter mixture; beat until well blended. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Drop by rounded tablespoons onto parchment-lined cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool."
"No-Bake Peanut Butter Cookies III","3 cups white sugar",
"No-Bake Peanut Butter Cookies III",".75 cup butter",
"No-Bake Peanut Butter Cookies III",".75 cup milk",
"No-Bake Peanut Butter Cookies III",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"No-Bake Peanut Butter Cookies III","1 .5 cups peanut butter",
"No-Bake Peanut Butter Cookies III","4 .5 cups quick-cooking oats",
"Step 1","In a saucepan over medium heat, combine sugar, butter and milk. Bring to a rapid boil and boil for one full minute. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla and peanut butter. Mix in the oats, stirring until the mixture begins to cool. Transfer to a large bowl if it does not fit into the pan well. Drop batter by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let cool until set."
"Chewy Cereal Cookies","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Chewy Cereal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chewy Cereal Cookies","2 cups high-protein crisp rice and wheat cereal (such as Kellogg's® Special K®)",
"Chewy Cereal Cookies","1 cup flaked coconut",
"Chewy Cereal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a clean and dry glass or metal bowl, beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar while continuing to whip until stiff peaks form. Fold in cereal, coconut and vanilla. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm. Allow to cool completely before removing from cookie sheets."
"Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 .33 cups rolled oats",
"Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar",".5 cup white sugar",
"Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Layer the ingredients in a 1 quart jar in the order given. Press each layer firmly in place before adding the next layer."
"Step 2","Include a card with the following instructions: Cowboy Cookie Mix in a Jar 1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. 2. In a medium bowl, mix together 1/2 cup melted butter or margarine, 1 egg, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla. Stir in the entire contents of the jar. You may need to use your hands to finish mixing. Shape into walnut sized balls. Place 2 inches apart on prepared cookie sheets. 3. Bake for 11 to 13 minutes in the preheated oven. Transfer from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Very Chocolate Cookies","1 .25 cups margarine, softened",
"Very Chocolate Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Very Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Very Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Very Chocolate Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Very Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Very Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Very Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Very Chocolate Cookies","2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt, gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Fold in chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto unprepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Do not overbake. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Unbaked Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Unbaked Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Unbaked Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Unbaked Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Unbaked Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Unbaked Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies","5 tablespoons cocoa powder",
"Unbaked Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Unbaked Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Unbaked Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Cook butter or margarine, milk and sugar in kettle and boil for 1 and 1/2 minutes."
"Step 2","Add peanut butter, oatmeal, cocoa powder and any one of the optional ingredients."
"Step 3","Drop on waxed paper and allow to cool before serving."
"Marshmallow Crispie Bars","3 tablespoons butter",
"Marshmallow Crispie Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Marshmallow Crispie Bars","4 cups miniature marshmallows",
"Marshmallow Crispie Bars","4 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Step 1","Coat a 9 x 13 inch pan with spray oil or margarine."
"Step 2","In a large saucepan, melt the butter or margarine over low heat. Add the vanilla. Melt the marshmallows into the margarine, stirring. Add the cereal when the marshmallows have melted; stir until cereal is coated. Quickly pour into the prepared pan. Use a sheet of waxed paper to press the mixture down flat and evenly into the pan."
"Step 3","Let set for 2 to 3 hours. Cut into squares."
"Magic Cookie Bars from EAGLE BRAND®",".5 cup butter or margarine, melted",
"Magic Cookie Bars from EAGLE BRAND®","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Magic Cookie Bars from EAGLE BRAND®","1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk",
"Magic Cookie Bars from EAGLE BRAND®","2 cups semisweet chocolate morsels",
"Magic Cookie Bars from EAGLE BRAND®","1 .33 cups flaked coconut",
"Magic Cookie Bars from EAGLE BRAND®","1 cup chopped nuts",
"Step 1","Heat oven to 350 degrees F (325 degrees for glass dish). Coat 13x9-inch baking pan with no-stick cooking spray."
"Step 2","Combine graham cracker crumbs and butter. Press into bottom of prepared pan. Pour sweetened condensed milk evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with chocolate chips, coconut and nuts. Press down firmly with a fork."
"Step 3","Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Cut into bars or diamonds. Store covered at room temperature."
"West Coast Trail Cookies","1 cup unbleached all-purpose flour",
"West Coast Trail Cookies",".5 cup whole wheat flour",
"West Coast Trail Cookies",".33 cup flax seed meal",
"West Coast Trail Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"West Coast Trail Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"West Coast Trail Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"West Coast Trail Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"West Coast Trail Cookies","1 cup dark brown sugar",
"West Coast Trail Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"West Coast Trail Cookies","2 eaches eggs",
"West Coast Trail Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"West Coast Trail Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"West Coast Trail Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"West Coast Trail Cookies","1 cup dried cranberries",
"West Coast Trail Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened shredded coconut",
"West Coast Trail Cookies",".5 cup coarsely chopped pumpkin seeds",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk together all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, flax seed meal, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat together butter, brown sugar, and white sugar in a large bowl until smooth and creamy; Stir in eggs and vanilla. Stir flour mixture into creamed butter mixture until dough is just combined. Fold oats, chocolate chips, cranberries, coconut, and pumpkin seeds into dough just until evenly combined."
"Step 4","Shape dough into 1 1/2-inch balls or drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets about 2 inches apart; press to flatten slightly."
"Step 5","Bake cookies in the preheated oven until lightly golden at the edges, about 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 10 minutes; transfer to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Frosted Banana Bars",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Frosted Banana Bars","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Frosted Banana Bars","2 large eggs eggs",
"Frosted Banana Bars","1 cup sour cream",
"Frosted Banana Bars","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Frosted Banana Bars","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Frosted Banana Bars","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Frosted Banana Bars",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Frosted Banana Bars","1 cup mashed ripe bananas",
"Frosted Banana Bars","1 (16 ounce) container cream cheese frosting",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the sour cream and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the batter. Finally, mix in the mashed banana. Spread evenly into the prepared pan."
"Step 3","Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Allow bars to cool completely before frosting with the cream cheese frosting.Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III",".5 cup shortening",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III","1 egg",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III","2 tablespoons milk",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Cup Cookies III","24 eaches miniature peanut butter cups",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease mini muffin pans. Sift together the flour and baking soda. Set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the white sugar, brown sugar, and shortening. Add the peanut butter and egg; mix until blended. Stir in the milk and vanilla alternately with the dry ingredients. Press rounded tablespoons of dough into the prepared mini muffin cups. Press dough up the sides of the cup, leaving a hole in the middle. Press a peanut butter cup into the center of each cup, being careful not to push all the way through the dough."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool completely before removing from pans."
"Pebber Nodder (Danish Christmas Cookies)","1 cup butter",
"Pebber Nodder (Danish Christmas Cookies)","1 cup sugar",
"Pebber Nodder (Danish Christmas Cookies)","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pebber Nodder (Danish Christmas Cookies)","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pebber Nodder (Danish Christmas Cookies)","1 teaspoon ground cardamom",
"Pebber Nodder (Danish Christmas Cookies)","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, stirring until light and fluffy. Combine the flour, cardamom and cinnamon; stir into the sugar mixture just until blended."
"Step 3","Separate the dough into 6 balls, and roll each ball into a rope about as big around as your finger on a lightly floured surface. Cut into 1/2-inch pieces, and place them on an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned. Cool on baking sheets for a few minutes, then transfer to wire racks to cool completely."
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies","1 egg",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies","10 ounces white chocolate, chopped",
"Cinnamon White Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Beat butter and shortening together with an electric mixer until creamy and smooth; gradually add white sugar and brown sugar, beating on medium speed, until incorporated. Beat in egg and vanilla extract."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl; mix into butter mixture until incorporated. Fold in white chocolate and cinnamon. Refrigerate dough for 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 4","Drop dough by the heaping tablespoonful onto the prepared baking sheet, leaving 3 inches between cookies."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned on the edges, 12 to 14 minutes. Cool on the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool on a wire rack until cookies are firm."
"Graham Cookies","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Graham Cookies",".33 cup butter",
"Graham Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Graham Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Graham Cookies",".33 cup peanut butter",
"Graham Cookies","15 large rectangular piece or 2 squares or 4 small rectangular pieces graham crackers, broken into small pieces",
"Step 1","In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the cocoa, butter, milk, and sugar. Bring to a boil, then cook for an additional 30 seconds. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter. Finally, stir in the crackers and nuts. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Chill or let stand until firm."
"Granny's Filled Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Granny's Filled Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened",
"Granny's Filled Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Granny's Filled Cookies","12 ounces any flavor fruit jam",
"Step 1","Mix cream cheese and butter well in large bowl until well blended and creamy."
"Step 2","Add in flour slowly, beating well after each addition. Roll dough into 1-inch balls and wrap well in cellophane. Store in fridge overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll out dough balls flat and place a 1/2 teaspoon full of the jam in the center. Fold sides over and place on ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 5","Bake for 13-15 minutes until brown and the jam starts to bubble hard. Cool for 3 minutes and place on cooling rack. Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired."
"Halfway Cookies","2 eaches eggs, separated",
"Halfway Cookies","1 tablespoon water",
"Halfway Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Halfway Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar, divided",
"Halfway Cookies","1 cup butter, at room temperature",
"Halfway Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Halfway Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Halfway Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Halfway Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Halfway Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Whisk egg yolks and water together in a small bowl."
"Step 3","Combine egg yolk mixture, flour, 1/2 cup brown sugar, butter, white sugar, vanilla extract, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer on low speed until dough comes together."
"Step 4","Press dough evenly into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking pan. Scatter chocolate chips over dough."
"Step 5","Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl, using clean beaters, until foamy. Gradually add remaining 1 cup brown sugar, continuing to beat until stiff peaks form. Spread beaten egg whites over chocolate chips."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until top is lightly golden and edges start to pull away from the sides of the pan, 20 to 25 minutes. Cool completely before cutting into squares, about 30 minutes."
"Smart Cookies","1 cup shortening",
"Smart Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Smart Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Smart Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Smart Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Smart Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Smart Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Smart Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Smart Cookies","1 .5 cups candy-coated chocolate pieces",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, brown sugar, and white sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, stir in the Smarties ™. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Coconut Cookies","2 cups unsweetened shredded coconut",
"Coconut Cookies","1 cup almond flour",
"Coconut Cookies",".33 cup maple syrup",
"Coconut Cookies","3 .5 tablespoons melted coconut oil",
"Coconut Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Coconut Cookies","⅛ teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Stir together coconut, almond flour, maple syrup, coconut oil, vanilla extract, and salt in a bowl until well blended."
"Step 3","Drop cookie dough in tablespoon-sized mounds onto the prepared baking sheets. Cover and refrigerate or freeze until use."
"Step 4","If baking cookies, preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 5","Transfer cookies to 2 ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until browned, 5 to 10 minutes."
"Healthier Easy Sugar Cookies","2 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Healthier Easy Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Healthier Easy Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Healthier Easy Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Healthier Easy Sugar Cookies",".25 cup nonfat plain yogurt",
"Healthier Easy Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Healthier Easy Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Healthier Easy Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Stir flour, baking soda, and baking powder in a small bowl."
"Step 2","Beat butter, yogurt, and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Add egg allowing it to blend into butter mixture. Beat in vanilla extract. Mix in flour mixture until just incorporated. Roll dough into walnut-sized balls and place 2-inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until golden, 8 to 10 minutes. Let stand on baking sheet two minutes before removing to cool on wire racks."
"Brookies (Fudgy Brownie Cookies)","1 (18.25 ounce) package brownie mix",
"Brookies (Fudgy Brownie Cookies)",".33 cup vegetable oil",
"Brookies (Fudgy Brownie Cookies)","1 egg",
"Brookies (Fudgy Brownie Cookies)","2 tablespoons water",
"Brookies (Fudgy Brownie Cookies)",".5 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Brookies (Fudgy Brownie Cookies)","30 piece (blank)s milk chocolate candy kisses (such as Hershey's Kisses®), unwrapped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Stir brownie mix, oil, egg, and water together in a bowl until dough is thick and begins to pull away from sides of the bowl. Roll dough into 1-inch balls and place 2 inches apart on a baking sheet."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until just set in the center, 8 to 10 minutes."
"Step 4","Cool brookies on the baking sheet for 5 minutes; transfer to a wire rack. Sift confectioners' sugar over brookies and cool for 5 minutes more. Gently place 1 chocolate kiss in the center of each brookie."
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies",".75 cup peanut butter",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies",".33 cup light brown sugar",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 egg",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Mom's Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies","1 (8 ounce) package milk chocolate candy kisses (such as Hershey's Kisses®), unwrapped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat peanut butter and shortening together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; add white sugar and brown sugar and beat until fluffy. Add egg, milk, and vanilla extract to creamed mixture and beat until smooth."
"Step 3","Mix flour, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl; gradually beat into the creamed mixture until dough is just mixed. Shape dough into 1-inch balls and arrange on a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Immediately press a chocolate kiss into the center of each cookie. Transfer cookies to a wire rack to cool."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado","cooking spray",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado",".75 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado",".5 cup mashed avocado",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado","1 egg",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies with Avocado","10 ounces chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray baking sheets with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. Beat white sugar, brown sugar, butter, avocado, and vanilla extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer until creamy; beat in egg until smooth. Stir flour mixture, a few tablespoons at a time, into creamed mixture until dough is just mixed; stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by the spoonful onto the baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool cookies on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups quick cooking oats",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Nutty Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup coarsely chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream the margarine, butter and both sugars until light and fluffy."
"Step 2","Add the eggs, milk and vanilla and beat until well blended."
"Step 3","Sift the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt together and add to the butter mixture. Stir just until blended. Stir in the oats until well blended. Fold in the chocolate and walnuts."
"Step 4","Cover and refrigerate the dough for at least 1 hour."
"Step 5","Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 6","Take a teaspoonful (for small cookies) or a tablespoonful (for large cookies) of dough and shape the dough into balls. Flatten slightly into rounded disks. Place 2 inches apart on the cookie sheets and bake until the edges are slightly browned, about 10 minutes."
"Step 7","Remove from the oven and let cool on the sheets for about 10 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool completely."
"Peanut Brittle Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Peanut Brittle Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Brittle Cookies","1 egg",
"Peanut Brittle Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Brittle Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Brittle Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Brittle Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Peanut Brittle Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped peanuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F ( 165 degrees C ). Grease a 15x9 inch pan."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and the sugar. Mix in the egg and vanilla. Sift together the flour, baking soda and cinnamon; stir into the creamed mixture. Then stir in 1 cup of the peanuts."
"Step 3","Spread the mixture evenly into the prepared baking pan. Sprinkle the remaining peanuts over the top. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, until edges pull away from the sides of the pan. Cool and cut into bars."
"Really Nice Spice Cookies",".75 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Really Nice Spice Cookies",".33 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Really Nice Spice Cookies",".5 cup dark brown sugar",
"Really Nice Spice Cookies","1 egg",
"Really Nice Spice Cookies",".75 cup sifted all-purpose flour",
"Really Nice Spice Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Really Nice Spice Cookies",".25 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Really Nice Spice Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, light brown sugar and dark brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg until well blended. Combine the flour, cinnamon, nutmeg and ginger; stir into the creamed mixture to form a stiff dough. Knead lightly in the bowl for a few turns. Shape dough into 25 small balls. Place balls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets and flatten slightly."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden."
"Spring Biscotti",".25 cup butter",
"Spring Biscotti",".75 cup white sugar",
"Spring Biscotti","1 tablespoon orange zest",
"Spring Biscotti",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Spring Biscotti","2 large eggs eggs",
"Spring Biscotti","1 egg white",
"Spring Biscotti","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Spring Biscotti","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Spring Biscotti",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Spring Biscotti","2 ounces white chocolate, chopped",
"Spring Biscotti",".5 cup dried cranberries",
"Spring Biscotti","1 .25 cups pistachio nuts",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together butter, sugar, orange zest, and vanilla with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Mix in eggs and egg white one at a time, beating well after each addition. Sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt; gradually blend into the creamed mixture using a wooden spoon. Stir in the white chocolate, dried cranberries, and pistachios. Cover, and chill for 30 minutes, or until dough is no longer sticky."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Turn dough out on a lightly floured surface, and divide into halves. Form each half into a flattish log about 12 inches long by 3 inches wide. Arrange logs at least 3 inches apart on baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake for 30 minutes in preheated oven, or until pale gold. Allow logs to cool on the baking sheet until cool enough to handle. On a cutting board, cut logs crosswise on a diagonal into 1 inch thick slices. Arrange on baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until golden. Transfer biscotti to wire racks, and cool completely. Store in an airtight container at room temperature."
"Plum Jam Cookies","8 ounces butter",
"Plum Jam Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Plum Jam Cookies","1 egg",
"Plum Jam Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Plum Jam Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Plum Jam Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Plum Jam Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Plum Jam Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Plum Jam Cookies","1 cup plum preserves",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F( 190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Beat in the egg and water. Sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt; stir into the butter mixture until well blended."
"Step 3","On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut with a 2 inch round cookie cutter. Put half of the cookies onto a cookie sheet and spread 1/2 of a teaspoon of plum jam in the center of each one. With a thimble, or small cookie cutter , cut the center out of the remaining cookies. Place these on top of the jam topped cookies to make sandwiches. Press together. Bake cookies for 10 minutes then remove to a rack to cool."
"Frying Pan Cookies","1 .5 cups dates, pitted and chopped",
"Frying Pan Cookies",".25 cup butter",
"Frying Pan Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Frying Pan Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Frying Pan Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Frying Pan Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Frying Pan Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Frying Pan Cookies","3 cups crisp rice cereal",
"Frying Pan Cookies",".5 cup flaked coconut",
"Frying Pan Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Melt butter or margarine in heavy skillet. Add slightly beaten eggs. Stir in dates, sugar, salt and vanilla. Cook over low heat stirring constantly until thick and well blended."
"Step 2","Have ready crisp rice cereal and chopped nuts in large bowl. Stir cooked mixture into them until coated."
"Step 3","Chill. Put by teaspoonful on cookie sheet. Chill again. When cold roll in crisp rice crumb and coconut mixture or powdered sugar."
"Chocolate Sugar Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Sugar Cookies","1 egg",
"Chocolate Sugar Cookies",".25 cup light corn syrup",
"Chocolate Sugar Cookies","2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, melted",
"Chocolate Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large mixing bowl, cream shortening, sugar, and egg. Stir in syrup and melted chocolate. Sift flour, salt, baking soda, and ground cinnamon; add to creamed mixture. Chill 1 hour."
"Step 3","Roll dough 1/8 inch thick on a well-floured pastry cloth. Cut into shapes."
"Step 4","Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet for 10 to 12 minutes."
"Pattern Cookies",".67 cup shortening",
"Pattern Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Pattern Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pattern Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Pattern Cookies",".33 cup milk",
"Pattern Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pattern Cookies","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Pattern Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together the shortening and sugar. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla and milk. Combine the flour , baking powder and salt, stir into the wet mixture. Cover and chill for about 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper. On a lightly floured surface, roll dough out to 1/4 to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until middle of cookie springs back when touched. Cool on wire racks. Frost with frosting if desired.Magic Cookie Bars II",".5 cup margarine, melted",
"Magic Cookie Bars II","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Magic Cookie Bars II","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Magic Cookie Bars II",".75 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Magic Cookie Bars II",".75 cup butterscotch chips",
"Magic Cookie Bars II","1 .5 cups flaked coconut",
"Magic Cookie Bars II","1 .33 cups sweetened condensed milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Pour melted margarine into a 9x13-inch pan. Sprinkle the graham cracker crumbs evenly over the margarine. Place the chopped nuts over the crumbs, and scatter the chocolate and butterscotch chips over the nuts. Add the coconut over all, and pour the milk evenly over the top."
"Step 3","Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until lightly brown on top. Cool at least 20 minutes, then cut into desired sized bars."
"3-Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"3-Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"3-Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix peanut butter, sugar, and egg together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Roll mixture into small balls and arrange on a baking sheet; flatten each with a fork, making a criss-cross pattern."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes. Cool cookies on the baking sheet for 2 minutes before moving to a plate."
"Hedgehog Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Hedgehog Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Hedgehog Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Hedgehog Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Hedgehog Cookies","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Hedgehog Cookies","1 cup butter-flavored shortening",
"Hedgehog Cookies",".25 cup corn syrup",
"Hedgehog Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Hedgehog Cookies","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Hedgehog Cookies","1 cup pecans",
"Hedgehog Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl. Whisk sugar, shortening, corn syrup, eggs, and vanilla extract in a separate bowl. Stir sugar mixture into flour mixture until just combined. Refrigerate dough until chilled, 30 minutes to 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Scoop cookie dough using a cookie scoop or 1 tablespoon so all the cookies are uniform; shape dough into teardrop-shaped cookies. Flatten the pointed side of each cookie to form the 'face'. Arrange cookies on baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until golden, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheets for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Step 5","Pulse pecans in a food processor until finely chopped; transfer to a bowl."
"Step 6","Melt chocolate chips in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching."
"Step 7","Dip the top of each cookie in the melted chocolate, spreading to fully coat the 'body' of each hedgehog. Press cookies, chocolate-side down, into the ground pecans forming the 'fur'. Arrange cookies on a sheet of waxed paper to set, about 30 minutes."
"Step 8","Transfer the remaining melted chocolate to a piping bag or plastic bag with a corner snipped. Pipe chocolate onto the pointed end of each cookie for eyes and a nose."
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup margarine or butter",
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup shortening",
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup plain nonfat yogurt",
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Yogurt Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the brown sugar, white sugar, margarine and shortening until light and fluffy. Stir in yogurt and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture until incorporated, then mix in chocolate chips. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges begin to brown. Cool for a minute on the cookie sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Cut-Out Cookies in a Flower Pot","2 cups butter, softened",
"Cut-Out Cookies in a Flower Pot","3 cups white sugar",
"Cut-Out Cookies in a Flower Pot","4 large eggs eggs",
"Cut-Out Cookies in a Flower Pot","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Cut-Out Cookies in a Flower Pot","1 tablespoon butter flavored extract",
"Cut-Out Cookies in a Flower Pot","7 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cut-Out Cookies in a Flower Pot","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Cut-Out Cookies in a Flower Pot","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and flavorings and mix well. Stir flour, baking powder and salt together. Add to batter and mix well."
"Step 2","Chill 3-4 hours or overnight before using."
"Step 3","Roll cookies out approximately 1/4 inch thick and insert cookie sticks at least 1/3 to 1/2 way into cookie."
"Step 4","Bake cookies at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8-10 minutes. This dough keeps well in a covered container in the refrigerator for a couple of weeks."
"Step 5","Decorate as desired. Display 3-7 cookies in a 6 inch clay pot (depending on size of cookie). Weigh pot down with dried beans and cut a circle of Styrofoam to fit snugly into top. Add ribbons and enjoy."
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies",".25 cup white sugar for rolling",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies","24 piece (blank)s chocolate candy spheres with smooth chocolate filling (such as Lindt Lindor Truffles), refrigerated until cold",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies","48 eaches decorative candy eyeballs",
"Peanut Butter Spider Cookies",".5 cup prepared chocolate frosting",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with baking parchment."
"Step 2","Beat shortening, peanut butter, brown sugar, and 1/2 cup white sugar together with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat egg into the creamy mixture until fully incorporated. Stir milk and vanilla extract into the mixture until smooth."
"Step 3","Mix flour, baking soda, and salt together in a small bowl; add to the wet mixture in the large bowl and stir until completely incorporated into a dough. Divide and shape dough into 48 balls."
"Step 4","Spread 1/4 cup white sugar into a wide, shallow bowl. Roll dough balls in sugar to coat and arrange about 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Remove cookies from oven and quickly press a dimple into the middle of each cookie using the blunt end of a wooden spoon. Cool cookies on sheets for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire cooling rack to cool completely."
"Step 6","Cut each chocolate sphere into two hemispheres. Put one piece atop each cookie with the rounded side facing upwards."
"Step 7","Spoon frosting into a pastry bag with a small round tip or a plastic freezer bag with one end snipped off. Dab a small amount of frosting onto the back of each candy eyeball and stick two onto each chocolate candy to resemble eyes. Then pipe frosting in four thin lines, starting at the base of the candy, on each side atop the cookie to resemble spider legs."
"Step 8","Let frosting harden at room temperature, about 30 minutes. Store cookies in an airtight container."
"Lemon Sugar Tea Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Lemon Sugar Tea Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Lemon Sugar Tea Cookies","1 egg",
"Lemon Sugar Tea Cookies","2 tablespoons corn syrup",
"Lemon Sugar Tea Cookies","1 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Lemon Sugar Tea Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lemon Sugar Tea Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Lemon Sugar Tea Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Lemon Sugar Tea Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together butter and 1 cup sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in egg, corn syrup, and lemon extract. Stir in flour, baking soda, and baking powder. Cover dough, and chill in the refrigerator at least 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper. Roll chilled dough into walnut sized balls. Roll balls in remaining sugar, and place on the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned."
"Peanut Blossoms II","1 cup shortening",
"Peanut Blossoms II","1 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Blossoms II","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Peanut Blossoms II","1 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Blossoms II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Blossoms II",".25 cup milk",
"Peanut Blossoms II","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Peanut Blossoms II","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Blossoms II","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Peanut Blossoms II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Blossoms II",".5 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Peanut Blossoms II","2 (9 ounce) bags milk chocolate candy kisses, unwrapped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, peanut butter, brown sugar, and 1 cup white sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, and stir in the milk and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture until well blended. Shape tablespoonfuls of dough into balls, and roll in remaining white sugar. Place cookies 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to12 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from oven, and immediately press a chocolate kiss into each cookie. Allow to cool completely; the kiss will harden as it cools."
"Gingerbread Men Cookies","3 cups flour",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies","2 teaspoons McCormick® Ginger, Ground",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies","1 teaspoon McCormick® Cinnamon, Ground",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies",".25 teaspoon McCormick® Nutmeg, Ground",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies",".75 cup firmly packed brown sugar",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies","1 egg",
"Gingerbread Men Cookies","1 teaspoon McCormick® Pure Vanilla Extract",
"Step 1","Mix flour, ginger, cinnamon, baking soda, nutmeg and salt in large bowl. Set aside. Beat butter and brown sugar in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy. Add molasses, egg and vanilla;mix well. Gradually beat in flour mixture on low speed until well mixed. Press dough into a thick flat disk. Wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Roll out dough to 1/4-inch thickness on lightly floured work surface. Cut into gingerbread men shapes with 5-inch cookie cutter. Place 1 inch apart on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until edges of cookies are set and just begin to brown. Cool on baking sheets 1 to 2 minutes. Remove to wire racks; cool completely. Decorate cooled cookies as desired. Store cookies in airtight container up to5 days."
"Pfeffernusse Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies",".25 cup honey",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies",".25 cup shortening",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies",".25 cup margarine",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cardamom",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","2 teaspoons anise extract",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons baking soda",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","1 teaspoon ground black pepper",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Pfeffernusse Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar for dusting",
"Step 1","Stir together the molasses, honey, shortening, and margarine in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until creamy. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. Stir in the eggs."
"Step 2","Combine the flour, white sugar, brown sugar, cardamom, nutmeg, cloves, ginger, anise, cinnamon, baking soda, pepper, and salt in a large bowl. Add the molasses mixture and stir until thoroughly combines. Refrigerate at least 2 hours."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Roll the dough into acorn-sized balls. Arrange on baking sheets, spacing at least 1 inch apart."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven 10 to 15 minutes. Move to a rack to cool. Dust cooled cookies with confectioners' sugar."
"Anna's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Anna's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Anna's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Anna's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Anna's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Anna's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Anna's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Anna's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Anna's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the vanilla and eggs one at a time. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the sugar mixture. Finally, mix in the chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are golden. Remove from baking sheet to cool on wire racks."
"Best Breakfast Cookie","2 cups brown sugar",
"Best Breakfast Cookie","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Best Breakfast Cookie","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Best Breakfast Cookie","1 tablespoon baking soda",
"Best Breakfast Cookie","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Best Breakfast Cookie","1 teaspoon salt",
"Best Breakfast Cookie","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Best Breakfast Cookie",".25 cup canola oil",
"Best Breakfast Cookie",".5 cup prune puree",
"Best Breakfast Cookie","2 tablespoons water",
"Best Breakfast Cookie","5 large egg whites egg whites",
"Best Breakfast Cookie","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Best Breakfast Cookie",".75 cup raisins",
"Best Breakfast Cookie",".25 cup chopped walnuts",
"Best Breakfast Cookie",".33 cup chopped dried apricots",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets or line with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the brown sugar, oats, flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. Make a well in the center and pour in the canola oil, prune puree, water, egg whites and vanilla. Mix until well blended. Stir in the raisins, walnuts and apricots. Scoop cookies using an ice cream scoop, or roll into golf ball sized balls. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets and flatten to 1/2 tall with wet hands. These cookies do not flatten very much while baking."
"Step 3","In the preheated oven, bake 8 minutes for chewy cookies 10 to 12 minutes for dry cookies. Cookies will not get crisp. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks."
"Fudge Puddles",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Fudge Puddles",".5 cup creamy peanut butter",
"Fudge Puddles",".5 cup white sugar",
"Fudge Puddles",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Fudge Puddles","1 egg",
"Fudge Puddles",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Fudge Puddles","1 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fudge Puddles",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fudge Puddles",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Fudge Puddles","1 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Fudge Puddles","1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Fudge Puddles","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Fudge Puddles","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Fudge Puddles",".75 cup pecan halves",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift together flour, baking soda and salt."
"Step 3","Cream butter, peanut butter and white and brown sugars. Mix in egg and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. Stir the flour mixture into creamed mixture. Shape the dough into 48 balls, 1 inch each. Place each ball in one compartment of a mini muffin tin."
"Step 4","For filling, put chocolate chips in a double boiler over simmering water. Stir in milk and vanilla, mix well."
"Step 5","Bake for 14 to 16 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from oven and immediately make wells in the center of each using a melon baller. Cool in pan for 5 minutes. Then carefully remove to wire racks. Using a measuring cup fill each shell with the chocolate mixture. Top with a pecan half."
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup margarine",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup light brown sugar",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups sifted whole wheat pastry flour",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Whole-Wheat Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Generously grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Stir in the vanilla and eggs. Combine the whole wheat flour, all purpose flour, baking soda and salt, gradually blend into the creamed mixture. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts if desired. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. For bar cookies, press dough into a 10x15 inch jelly roll pan and bake for 12 to 15 minutes."
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies I","1 .25 cups butter, softened",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies I","2 cups white sugar",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies I","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies I",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Chocolate Cookies I","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the chocolate chips. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 9 minutes in the preheated oven. Cookies will be soft. Cool slightly on cookie sheet; remove from sheet onto wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Mice","4 (1 ounce) squares semisweet chocolate",
"Chocolate Mice",".33 cup sour cream",
"Chocolate Mice","1 cup chocolate cookie crumbs",
"Chocolate Mice",".33 cup chocolate cookie crumbs",
"Chocolate Mice",".33 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Chocolate Mice","24 eaches silver dragees decorating candy",
"Chocolate Mice",".25 cup sliced almonds",
"Chocolate Mice","12 (2 inch) pieces long red vine licorice",
"Step 1","Melt the chocolate, and combine with sour cream. Stir in 1 cup chocolate cookie crumbs. Cover and refrigerate until firm."
"Step 2","Roll by level tablespoonfuls into balls. Mold to a slight point at one end (the nose)."
"Step 3","Roll dough in confectioners sugar (for white mice), and in chocolate cookie crumbs (for dark mice). On each mouse, place dragees in appropriate spot for eyes, almond slices for ears, and a licorice string for the tail."
"Step 4","Refrigerate for at least two hours, until firm."
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men",".5 cup margarine",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men",".5 cup sugar",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men",".5 cup molasses",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men","1 egg yolk",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men","1 teaspoon ginger",
"Eileen's Spicy Gingerbread Men",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until smooth. Stir in molasses and egg yolk. Combine the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, ginger, and nutmeg; blend into the molasses mixture until smooth. Cover, and chill for at least one hour."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm. Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks. Frost or decorate when cool."
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".5 cup butter",
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".5 cup shortening",
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".5 cup white sugar",
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 egg",
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II","1 .5 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine flour, baking soda and salt. In another bowl, combine soften butter with shortening, sugar and brown sugar and vanilla. Beat until creamy. Beat in egg. Gradually add flour mixture and mix well. Stir in chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Bake on ungreased cookie sheet for 8-10 min. Note: I take them out of the oven before they start to turn dark! Do not double this recipe, or they don't bake soft. Can make this recipe for bars too. Spread dough into greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake them at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 15-20 minutes."
"Cinnamon Cookies II","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cinnamon Cookies II","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Cinnamon Cookies II","1 egg",
"Cinnamon Cookies II","1 .5 tablespoons molasses",
"Cinnamon Cookies II","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cinnamon Cookies II","1 ⅛ teaspoons baking soda",
"Cinnamon Cookies II","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together butter and sugar."
"Step 3","Mix in egg and molasses, blending well."
"Step 4","Mix flour, baking soda and cinnamon; add to creamed mixture, mixing well."
"Step 5","Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet."
"Step 6","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes."
"Maple Pecan Shortbread Squares","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Maple Pecan Shortbread Squares",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Maple Pecan Shortbread Squares",".5 cup softened butter",
"Maple Pecan Shortbread Squares","1 egg",
"Maple Pecan Shortbread Squares",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Maple Pecan Shortbread Squares","3 tablespoons pure maple syrup",
"Maple Pecan Shortbread Squares",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine the flour and 1/3 cup brown sugar in a mixer. Mix in the softened butter until a dough has formed. Press into an ungreased 8x8-inch baking dish, and prick with a fork."
"Step 3","Bake the shortbread in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 20 minutes. While the shortbread is baking, beat the egg in a mixing bowl along with 1/3 cup brown sugar, maple syrup, and pecans. Pour the pecan mixture over the hot crust, and return to the oven. Continue baking until firmed, 12 to 15 minutes. Remove from the oven, and immediately run a knife around the edges to prevent sticking. Cool completely, then cut into 1-inch squares to serve.Owl Cookies","1 .25 cups candy-coated milk chocolate pieces",
"Owl Cookies","2 tablespoons milk",
"Owl Cookies","24 ounces dry sugar cookie mix",
"Owl Cookies","1 cup cashew halves",
"Step 1","In a small saucepan combine 3/4 cup of the candies and milk. Melt over low heat, stirring until smooth. Remove from heat."
"Step 2","Prepare cookie mixes according to package directions. Stir melted chocolate into half the dough. Form chocolate dough into two 12-inch long rolls about 1 inch in diameter. Wrap in wax paper or foil. Chill until firm, about 2 hours."
"Step 3","Divide plain dough in half. On a well-floured surface, roll each plain half out to a 12 x 6 inch rectangle. Place a chocolate roll on long edge. Roll up, pressing doughs lightly together so plain dough encases chocolate roll. Repeat with remaining dough."
"Step 4","Wrap each roll in wax paper or foil. Chill about 2 hours until firm. Preheat oven to 375 F (190 C)."
"Step 5","Cut each roll into 1/4 inch slices. Place 2 slices so they are touching on greased baking sheet. In the center of each chocolate circle, place one of the remaining candies for eye. Where the slices touch, place a cashew to form nose."
"Step 6","Bake until the plain cookie is lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool cookies on baking sheets 2 to 3 minutes. Remove and cool on wire racks."
"Ritz® Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Ritz® Cookies","3 large egg whites egg whites",
"Ritz® Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Ritz® Cookies","20 eaches buttery round crackers",
"Ritz® Cookies","1 cup chopped pecans",
"Step 1","Crumble crackers finely in mixing bowl and add pecans. In another bowl, add 1/2 cup sugar to beaten egg whites slowly and beat until very stiff. Add remaining 1/2 cup sugar slowly. Add vanilla. Fold this mixture into crackers and nuts."
"Step 2","Spoon onto lightly greased cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until light brown."
"Sesame Thumbprint Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Sesame Thumbprint Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Sesame Thumbprint Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Sesame Thumbprint Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Sesame Thumbprint Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sesame Thumbprint Cookies","2 tablespoons sesame seeds",
"Sesame Thumbprint Cookies",".75 cup any flavor fruit jam",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream the butter and sugar together. Add the almond extract and the salt. Stir in the flour and mix well."
"Step 3","Shape tablespoonfuls of the dough into walnut-sized balls then roll the balls in sesame seeds to cover completely. Place balls on ungreased cookie sheets and flatten slightly. With your thumb, indent the center of each cookie. Fill indentations with jam or preserves."
"Step 4","Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes. Remove cookies from baking sheets and let cool on a rack. Store cooled cookies in an air-tight container."
"Perfect Vegan Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Perfect Vegan Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Perfect Vegan Sugar Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Perfect Vegan Sugar Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Perfect Vegan Sugar Cookies",".5 cup vegan margarine (such as Earth Balance®)",
"Perfect Vegan Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Perfect Vegan Sugar Cookies","2 tablespoons coconut milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Sift flour, baking soda, and salt into a bowl."
"Step 3","Cream sugar and vegan margarine with an electric mixer in a bowl, about 2 minutes; add vanilla extract. Stir in flour mixture. Add coconut milk, 1 tablespoon at a time, until dough comes together. Wrap in plastic wrap and chill for 30 minutes."
"Step 4","Roll out dough on a floured surface to 1/4 to 1/2-inch thickness. Dip cookie cutter in flour; cut out cookies and place them on the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden, about 10 minutes."
"Spritz Cookies III","1 cup butter",
"Spritz Cookies III",".67 cup sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Spritz Cookies III","1 egg",
"Spritz Cookies III","1 egg yolk",
"Spritz Cookies III","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Spritz Cookies III","2 .75 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Spritz Cookies III","72 eaches red and green candied cherries, quartered",
"Step 1","Cream together butter and confectioner's sugar in bowl until light and fluffy, using electric mixer at medium speed. Beat in egg, egg yolk and almond extract; blend well."
"Step 2","Gradually stir flour into creamed mixture, mixing well."
"Step 3","Fit flower crown design into cookie press. Place 1/2 of the dough in cookie press at a time, forcing dough through press, about 1 inch apart, on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Place 1/4 of a red or green candied cherry in center of each. Bake in 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) oven 7-10 minutes or until set but not browned. Remove from baking sheets; cool on racks."
"Brysell Cookies","2 cups butter",
"Brysell Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Brysell Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Brysell Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Brysell Cookies",".5 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Stir in the flour and vanilla. Roll dough into two logs about 10 inches long. Roll dough logs in finely chopped nuts so that the whole surface is coated. Wrap in plastic and refrigerate for up to two hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Slice dough logs into 1/4 inch thick slices and place them on a cookie sheet. Bake in the preheated oven for 7 to 9 minutes."
"Whitney's Peanut Butter Cookie Balls","1 cup peanut butter",
"Whitney's Peanut Butter Cookie Balls","1 cup butter, softened",
"Whitney's Peanut Butter Cookie Balls","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Whitney's Peanut Butter Cookie Balls","1 cup graham cracker crumbs",
"Whitney's Peanut Butter Cookie Balls","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Mix ingredients by hand, roll into balls. Roll or dip into the following ingredients: coconut, cocoa, sprinkles, icing sugar, graham cracker crumbs. Refrigerate. Enjoy!!!"
"Cowboy Cookies II","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cowboy Cookies II","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cowboy Cookies II",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Cowboy Cookies II",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Cowboy Cookies II","1 cup shortening",
"Cowboy Cookies II","1 cup white sugar",
"Cowboy Cookies II","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cowboy Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cowboy Cookies II","2 cups rolled oats",
"Cowboy Cookies II","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cowboy Cookies II","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Blend shortening and sugars together. Add eggs, and beat until fluffy. Whisk together flour, soda, salt, and baking powder; mix into the egg mixture. Stir in oats, vanilla, and chocolate chips. Drop by teaspoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheets"
"Step 2","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 minutes. Cool on wire racks."
"Mighty S'more Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","1 (14.4 ounce) package graham crackers, smashed to crumbs",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","1 tablespoon hot water",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","1 (12 ounce) bag chocolate chips",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","1 cup miniature marshmallows",
"Mighty S'more Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line two baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat the first egg into the butter mixture completely before adding the second with the vanilla extract; continue beating until you get a smooth batter. Stir graham cracker crumbs and salt into the creamed batter."
"Step 3","Dissolve baking soda in hot water in a small bowl; stir into the batter. Fold chocolate chips and marshmallows through the batter."
"Step 4","Sprinkle flour into the batter while stirring until flour is completely incorporated and you get a cookie dough texture."
"Step 5","Scoop small balls of the dough from the bowl and drop onto prepared baking sheets. Depress each dough ball slightly using the back of a spoon."
"Step 6","Bake in preheated oven until the edges begin to brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Let cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before moving to cooling racks."
"Peanut Butter Cookies VI",".5 cup margarine",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VI",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VI","1 cup white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VI","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VI",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VI","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VI","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Peanut Butter Cookies VI",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine, peanut butter, and sugar. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; stir into the peanut butter mixture. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the unprepared cookie sheet."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Do not overbake: cookies will be soft and chewy. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup milk",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies",".25 cup peanut butter",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies","1 (10 ounce) package peanut butter chips",
"Step 1","Place oats in a blender or food processor and pulse until oats resemble flour. Transfer oats to a large bowl and stir in flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt."
"Step 2","Beat butter, milk, peanut butter, white sugar, and brown sugar in another bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs one at a time, allowing each egg to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next. Beat in vanilla extract with the last egg; stir in oat mixture until well blended. Fold in peanut butter chips, mixing just enough to evenly combine. Refrigerate dough for 30 minutes."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Drop 1-inch spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 5","Bake in preheated oven until cookie centers are set, 10 to 12 minutes."
"Cake Mix Cookies V",".5 cup butter",
"Cake Mix Cookies V","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cake Mix Cookies V","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Cake Mix Cookies V",".67 cup quick cooking oats",
"Cake Mix Cookies V",".5 cup finely chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix butter and eggs until light and fluffy. Stir in cake mix, quick oats, and walnuts. Roll dough into walnut sized balls. Place cookies onto the prepared baking sheet, and flatten slightly with the bottom of a glass that has been buttered and dipped in sugar."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven, or until golden brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies","2 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies","1 .25 cups packed brown sugar",
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies","2 large eggs large eggs",
"Chewy Cinnamon Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Stir together graham cracker crumbs, flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt in a mixing bowl; set aside."
"Step 2","Beat the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, allowing each egg to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next. Mix in vanilla. Mix in the flour mixture. Scoop the dough out onto ungreased baking sheets by rounded spoonfuls."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until slightly browned at the edges, 9 to 11 minutes."
"Cream Cheese Cookies III",".33 cup butter",
"Cream Cheese Cookies III",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cream Cheese Cookies III","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Cream Cheese Cookies III",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Cream Cheese Cookies III","8 ounces cream cheese",
"Cream Cheese Cookies III",".25 cup white sugar",
"Cream Cheese Cookies III","1 egg",
"Cream Cheese Cookies III","2 tablespoons milk",
"Cream Cheese Cookies III","1 teaspoon lemon juice",
"Cream Cheese Cookies III",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together butter and sugar. Add flour and nuts. Pat into a 9 x 9 pan. (Reserve some for top.) Bake for 12 minutes."
"Step 3","Cream together cream cheese, sugar and add remaining ingredients Pour on top of crust. Sprinkle reserved crumbs over top. Bake for 20 minutes. Let cool."
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Ice Cream Cake","1 (18 ounce) package small chocolate chip cookies",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Ice Cream Cake",".25 cup margarine, melted",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Ice Cream Cake","1 cup hot fudge topping",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Ice Cream Cake","2 quarts vanilla ice cream",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Ice Cream Cake","1 cup whipped cream",
"Chocolate Chip Cookie Ice Cream Cake","12 cherries cherries",
"Step 1","Crush half the cookies (about 20) to make crumbs. Combine crumbs with melted margarine and press into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan or pie plate. Stand remaining cookies around edge of pan. Spread 3/4 cup fudge topping over crust. Freeze 15 minutes."
"Step 2","Meanwhile, soften 1 quart of ice cream in microwave or on countertop. After crust has chilled, spread softened ice cream over fudge layer. Freeze 30 minutes."
"Step 3","Scoop remaining quart of ice cream into balls and arrange over spread ice cream layer. Freeze until firm, 4 hours or overnight. To serve, garnish with remainder of fudge topping, whipped cream and cherries."
"Chewy Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups butter, melted",
"Chewy Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Chewy Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chewy Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chewy Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chewy Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chewy Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chewy Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chewy Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip Cookies","2 cups peanut butter chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, mix together butter and sugar. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Combine flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt; gradually stir into the butter mixture. Mix in peanut butter chips. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven. Cool for 1 minute before placing on wire racks to cool completely."
"Coconut-Pecan Cookies","1 cup coconut flakes",
"Coconut-Pecan Cookies",".5 cup chopped pecans",
"Coconut-Pecan Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Coconut-Pecan Cookies",".67 cup lightly packed brown sugar",
"Coconut-Pecan Cookies",".67 cup white sugar",
"Coconut-Pecan Cookies","1 egg",
"Coconut-Pecan Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Coconut-Pecan Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Coconut-Pecan Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Step 1","Heat a small skillet over medium-low heat. Toast coconut flakes and pecans in batches until lightly browned and fragrant, about 3 minutes."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper."
"Step 3","Cream butter, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Mix in egg and vanilla extract. Beat to combine."
"Step 4","Combine flour and baking soda in a bowl. Add to butter mixture and mix until just combined. Stir in toasted pecans and coconut."
"Step 5","Place scoops of dough on the prepared baking sheet using a 1 1/2-tablespoon spring-hinged scoop."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes. Carefully remove from baking sheet and transfer to a cooling rack."
"Coconut-Cornflake Cookies","3 large egg whites egg whites",
"Coconut-Cornflake Cookies","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Coconut-Cornflake Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Coconut-Cornflake Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Coconut-Cornflake Cookies","2 .5 cups flaked coconut",
"Coconut-Cornflake Cookies","1 .5 cups cornflakes cereal",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (170 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat egg whites until stiff (the egg whites not your arm)."
"Step 3","Stir in sugar, salt and vanilla."
"Step 4","Blend coconut and corn flakes and add to egg white mixture."
"Step 5","Drop on ungreased parchment paper. Bake for 15-18 minutes."
"Cracked Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies",".5 cup vegetable oil",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies","3 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies","1 pinch salt",
