"Cracked Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies",".25 cup white sugar, for rolling",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat 2 cups sugar, butter, and vegetable oil with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth. Add egg yolks one at a time, allowing each egg to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next. Sift flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt into the egg yolk mixture; stir. Stir in vanilla extract. Roll the dough into walnut-sized balls."
"Step 3","Spread 1/4 cup sugar onto a flat surface. Roll the balls of dough in sugar to coat. Arrange onto baking sheets spaced at least 2 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven cooked in the middle, but not yet browned, about 15 minutes."
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies","1 .33 cups all-purpose flour",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies","1 pinch salt",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies",".5 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies","1 egg",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies",".75 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies","2 .5 tablespoons water",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies",".75 cup white chocolate chips",
"Mommy's Loving Care Cookies",".5 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with parchment paper, or grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Mix flour, salt, baking soda and unsweetened cocoa powder in a medium size mixing bowl."
"Step 3","Cream butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla and water in a mixing bowl until fluffy. Blend flour mixture into the egg mixture until mixed well. Stir white chocolate and chocolate chips into the dough. Drop tablespoon-size dough approximately 1 inch from each other on cookie sheet."
"Step 4","Bake cookies for 9 minutes.Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","4 ounces milk chocolate, grated",
"Urban Legend Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .5 cups chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Measure oats into a blender or food processor, and then blend to a fine powder. Set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together butter and sugars. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix together flour, oats, salt, baking powder, and baking soda. Stir dry ingredients into creamed butter and sugar. Add chocolate chips, grated chocolate, and nuts."
"Step 3","Drop by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 6 to 8 minutes in the preheated oven."
"Princess Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Princess Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Princess Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Princess Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Princess Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Princess Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Princess Cookies",".25 cup lemon juice",
"Princess Cookies","1 lemon, zested",
"Princess Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl until thoroughly combined. In a mixing bowl, beat the butter and sugar with an electric mixer until creamy, about 5 minutes, then beat in eggs, one at a time, incorporating each before adding the next. Beat in the lemon juice, lemon zest, and vanilla extract. Gently mix in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Chill the dough about 30 minutes."
"Step 3","Scoop up about 1 1/2 teaspoon of dough per cookie, gently form into a ball, and place the balls onto baking sheets about 2 inches apart."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are set and just beginning to brown at the edges, about 8 minutes; cool on baking sheets for 1 minute before removing to finish cooling on racks."
"Jelly Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Jelly Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Jelly Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Jelly Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Jelly Cookies","1 egg",
"Jelly Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Jelly Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Jelly Cookies",".25 cup raspberry preserves",
"Jelly Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","Cream the butter with the white sugar and brown sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla."
"Step 3","Mix the flour and baking powder together. Stir in the flour mixture into the butter mixture and combine."
"Step 4","Form dough into 1 inch balls and place on the prepared baking sheet. Make an indentation in each cookie and fill with jam. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 to 15 minutes. Let cool completely and sprinkle with confectioners' sugar."
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II","2 cups white sugar",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II",".5 cup molasses",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II","2 large eggs eggs",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II","1 teaspoon salt",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies II","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Step 1","Melt shortening and cool. Add sugar, eggs and molasses; beat well."
"Step 2","Sift the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, salt, ground cloves and ginger. Add to the molasses mixture and stir until well combined. Chill dough for at least 3 hours or overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking sheet."
"Step 4","Remove dough from the refrigerator and form into walnut sized balls. Roll balls in white sugar. Place balls about 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes for chewy cookies and 10 to 12 minutes for crisper cookies. Store cookies in an airtight container."
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I",".75 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I","1 egg",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I",".25 cup molasses",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Step 1","Cream together until light and fluffy butter flavored shortening and brown sugar. Add egg and molasses and beat well. Sift together flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, ground cloves and ginger. Add to creamed mixture and mix well."
"Step 2","Chill at least 1 hour or overnight."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll into 1-inch balls, roll in sugar. Place balls 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Cool slightly before removing from pan."
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Never Fail Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In medium bowl, combine flour, salt, baking soda, and baking powder. Stir with fork so all ingredients are mixed."
"Step 3","In large bowl, combine sugars, and butter. Mix until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla and beat until smooth and fluffy."
"Step 4","Add 1 cup of dry ingredients at a time to mixture until all is incorporated. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop cookies onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for about 10-15 minutes or until edges are golden brown."
"Banana Bread Cookies","1 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Banana Bread Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Banana Bread Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Banana Bread Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Banana Bread Cookies","1 banana, peeled and mashed",
"Banana Bread Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Banana Bread Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Banana Bread Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Banana Bread Cookies","3 tablespoons butter",
"Banana Bread Cookies",".33 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Banana Bread Cookies","1 tablespoon milk",
"Banana Bread Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together shortening and white sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs, vanilla extract, and banana. Combine flour, baking soda, and salt; blend thoroughly into the shortening mixture to make a sticky batter. Drop by rounded tablespoons onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned."
"Step 4","In a medium bowl, blend butter, confectioners' sugar, milk and vanilla extract. Adjust amount of milk as necessary to attain a drizzling consistency. Drizzle over warm cookies."
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting","1 cup butter",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting","1 cup white sugar",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting","3 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting",".5 cup shortening",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting","1 pound confectioners' sugar",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting","5 tablespoons water",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookies with Buttercream Frosting",".25 teaspoon butter flavored extract",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, mix together butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; gradually stir flour mixture into butter mixture until well blended using a sturdy spoon. Chill dough for 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into desired shapes using cookie cutters. Place cookies 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 4 to 6 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove cookies from pan and cool on wire racks."
"Step 4","Using an electric mixer, beat shortening, confectioners sugar, water, salt, vanilla extract, and butter flavoring until fluffy. Frost cookies after they have cooled completely."
"Snappy Turtle Cookies","1 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking soda",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies","1 egg, beaten",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies","1 egg, separated",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies",".25 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies","⅛ teaspoon maple flavored extract",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies","42 halves pecan halves",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies","2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies","1 tablespoon butter",
"Snappy Turtle Cookies","1 cup sifted confectioners' sugar",
"Step 1","Sift together 1 1/2 cups flour, baking soda and salt. Cream 1/2 cup butter and gradually add 1/2 cup brown sugar, creaming well. Add egg and egg yolk and beat well. Blend in vanilla and maple flavoring. Add the dry ingredients gradually, mixing thoroughly. Chill to slightly firm dough."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Arrange pecan halves in groups of five on greased baking sheets to resemble head and legs of a turtle. Shape dough into balls; dip bottom into unbeaten egg white and press lightly onto nuts. Use a rounded teaspoon of dough for each, so tips of nuts will show when cookies are baked. Bake for 10 to 13 minutes. Do not overbake. Cool; frost tops generously with Chocolate Frosting."
"Step 4","To Make Frosting: Combine 2 (1-ounce) squares of unsweetened chocolate ( or 1/3 cup semi-sweet chocolate pieces), 1/4 cup milk and 1 Tablespoon butter in top of double boiler. Heat over boiling water until chocolate melts; blend until smooth. Remove from heat; add 1 cup sifted confectioners' sugar. Beat until smooth and glossy. If too thin, add more confectioners' sugar until the desired consistency."
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".5 cup shortening",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".25 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 egg",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 ⅛ cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together shortening, brown sugar and white sugar. Mix in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the batter until moistened. Mix in the walnuts and chocolate chips. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges are light brown."
"Fresh Ginger Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Fresh Ginger Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Fresh Ginger Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Fresh Ginger Cookies","2 tablespoons grated fresh ginger",
"Fresh Ginger Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Fresh Ginger Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Fresh Ginger Cookies",".25 cup molasses",
"Fresh Ginger Cookies","1 egg",
"Fresh Ginger Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Step 1","In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, soda, and salt. In a separate bowl, beat ginger, butter, and 1 cup sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in molasses and egg. Gently fold in flour mixture until just combined. Chill for 1 hour."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Roll dough into 1 1/2 inch balls and then roll them in sugar. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake until edges start to brown, about 15 minutes. Centers will be slightly soft. Let stand on cookie sheets 1 minute and remove to racks to cool completely."
"Empire Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Empire Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Empire Cookies","1 egg",
"Empire Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Empire Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Empire Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Empire Cookies",".5 cup raspberry jam",
"Empire Cookies","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Empire Cookies",".25 teaspoon almond extract",
"Empire Cookies","1 tablespoon hot water",
"Empire Cookies",".25 cup candied cherries, chopped",
"Step 1","Cream butter. Add sugar, creaming well. Beat in egg and vanilla. Combine flour and baking powder; gradually add to creamed mixture."
"Step 2","On a lightly floured surface, roll out dough to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut into 2 inch rounds, and place on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes, or until very lightly browned at edges. Cool thoroughly."
"Step 4","Spread half of the cookies with jam, and top with remaining cookies."
"Step 5","Combine confectioners' sugar, almond extract, and enough hot water to make a thin icing. Frost tops of cookies. Top each with a small piece of candied cherry."
"Red Velvet Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Red Velvet Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Red Velvet Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Red Velvet Cookies","2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened baking chocolate, broken into pieces",
"Red Velvet Cookies",".5 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Red Velvet Cookies",".67 cup brown sugar, firmly packed",
"Red Velvet Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Red Velvet Cookies","1 large egg",
"Red Velvet Cookies","1 tablespoon red food coloring",
"Red Velvet Cookies",".75 cup sour cream",
"Red Velvet Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Red Velvet Cookies",".25 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Red Velvet Cookies","4 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature",
"Red Velvet Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Red Velvet Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar, sifted",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) with the rack in the middle position. Grease baking sheets or line with parchment paper. Sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt."
"Step 2","Break the chocolate squares into chunks, place in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave on High until the chocolate melts, about 90 seconds. Stir the chocolate until smooth and set aside to cool."
"Step 3","In a large bowl, beat 1/2 cup butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until light and fluffy; pour in the egg and beat until smooth. Mix in the red food coloring and chocolate, scraping the bowl down regularly, until evenly blended, about 30 seconds. Add half of the sifted dry ingredients, stirring until well incorporated. Beat in the sour cream and mix in the remaining dry ingredients. Fold in the chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls of the dough 2 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake one sheet at a time in the preheated oven until they spring back when pressed, about 9 minutes. Cool in the pans for 5 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"Step 5","For the cream cheese frosting, whip 1/4 cup butter, cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth. Blend in the powdered sugar in half cup portions until the frosting reaches the desired consistency."
"Sugar Cookie Drops","1 cup butter",
"Sugar Cookie Drops","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Sugar Cookie Drops","1 .5 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Sugar Cookie Drops","1 cup white sugar",
"Sugar Cookie Drops","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sugar Cookie Drops","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sugar Cookie Drops","4 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sugar Cookie Drops","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sugar Cookie Drops","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Sugar Cookie Drops",".5 cup white sugar for decoration",
"Step 1","Preheat oven 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, oil, confectioners' sugar, and 1 cup white sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs one at a time, and stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, and cream of tartar; stir into the creamed mixture. Roll dough into 1 inch balls, and then roll the balls in remaining white sugar. Place onto ungreased cookie sheets, and flatten with a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges begin to brown. Cool on wire racks."
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 cup coconut oil",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 cup lightly packed brown sugar",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 cup crushed corn flakes",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies",".5 cup shredded coconut",
"Coconut Buffalo Chip Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 2 baking sheets."
"Step 2","Mix flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl."
"Step 3","Beat coconut oil, brown sugar, and white sugar together in a separate bowl until creamy and smooth. Beat eggs and vanilla extract into coconut oil mixture. Mix flour mixture into coconut oil mixture until just blended. Fold rolled oats, corn flakes, chocolate chips, shredded coconut, and raisins into the batter."
"Step 4","Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of batter onto the prepared baking sheet."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are lightly browned and middles are cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool cookies on the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack."
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies","2 cups oatmeal",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies","1 cup sugar",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies","2 large eggs eggs, beaten",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies","5 tablespoons light molasses",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"WWII Oatmeal Molasses Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, stir together the flour, oatmeal, baking soda, baking powder, and salt."
"Step 3","In another large bowl, beat the sugar with the shortening until smooth and creamy; mix in beaten eggs, molasses, and vanilla. Gradually mix in the dry ingredients. Stir in walnuts and raisins. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes, or until slightly browned. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Cream Cheese Squares","2 (8 ounce) cans refrigerated crescent roll dough",
"Cream Cheese Squares","2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese",
"Cream Cheese Squares","1 cup white sugar",
"Cream Cheese Squares","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cream Cheese Squares",".5 cup margarine, melted",
"Cream Cheese Squares",".25 cup white sugar",
"Cream Cheese Squares","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch pan."
"Step 2","Press one can of the crescent rolls into the bottom of the prepared pan. In a medium bowl, mix together the cream cheese, 1 cup of sugar, and vanilla until smooth and creamy. Spread over the crescent layer. Unroll the second can of crescent rolls and lay them on top of the cream cheese layer. Do not press down. Pour the melted margarine over the entire pan. Combine the remaining 1/4 cup of sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle over the top."
"Step 3","Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the top is crisp and golden."
"Cooky Cookies","1 cup vegetable oil",
"Cooky Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Cooky Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Cooky Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Cooky Cookies","1 egg",
"Cooky Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Cooky Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cooky Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cooky Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Cooky Cookies","1 cup cornflakes cereal",
"Cooky Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Cooky Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Cooky Cookies","1 cup unsweetened flaked coconut",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter and sugars until fluffy. Slowly add oil and beat until oil is well incorporated. Add egg and vanilla, beat to mix."
"Step 3","In a small bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. Add to butter mixture and stir just until mixed. Combine corn flakes, oatmeal, nuts and coconut and add to cookie mixture; mix just until combined."
"Step 4","Use a cookie scoop to produce consistently sized cookies, but you can drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet, if you don't have a scoop. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Since these are so rich, you can chill the individual balls of cookie dough and then freeze them in freezer bags. You can then take them directly from the freezer to the oven, just add a few minutes to the cooking time."
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .67 cups all-purpose flour",
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking powder",
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup butter, softened",
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Ashley's Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; set aside."
"Step 3","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Gradually stir in the sifted ingredients, then stir in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Magic Cookie Bars I",".5 cup margarine, melted",
"Magic Cookie Bars I","1 .5 cups graham cracker crumbs",
"Magic Cookie Bars I","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Magic Cookie Bars I","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Magic Cookie Bars I","1 .33 cups flaked coconut",
"Magic Cookie Bars I","1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Into bottom of 9 x1 3 pan pour melted margarine. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over melted margarine, chopped nuts over crumbs, then distribute chocolate chips over nuts. Add the coconut and pour milk over all."
"Step 3","Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned on top. Cool 15 minutes before cutting into finger length bars.Donna's Coconut Almond Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Donna's Coconut Almond Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Donna's Coconut Almond Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Donna's Coconut Almond Cookies","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Donna's Coconut Almond Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Donna's Coconut Almond Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Donna's Coconut Almond Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Donna's Coconut Almond Cookies","1 cup sweetened flaked coconut",
"Donna's Coconut Almond Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Beat butter, shortening, and sugar in a bowl until creamy. Mix almond and vanilla extracts and salt into creamed mixture. Gradually beat in flour until smooth. Stir coconut into dough."
"Step 3","Scoop up dough by heaping tablespoonfuls, roll into balls, and arrange about 2 inches apart on prepared baking sheets. Dip the bottom of a glass in flour and press cookies 1/4 inch thick."
"Step 4","Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Let cool on baking sheets for 2 or 3 minutes before removing cookies."
"Step 5","While cookies are baking, heat half the chocolate chips in a small bowl in a microwave oven for 30 seconds; stir. Repeat steps, heating and stirring until chocolate chips are melted, smooth, and warm. Place remaining chocolate chips into melted chocolate and continue heating and stirring until all chips are melted and just warm. Transfer melted chocolate to a resealable plastic sandwich bag. Snip a small corner off the bag with a scissors."
"Step 6","Hold the bag like a pastry bag and squeeze a thin line of melted chocolate onto warm cookies in a zigzag pattern. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to let the chocolate harden, about 30 minutes."
"Honeybee Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Honeybee Cookies",".5 cup packed brown sugar",
"Honeybee Cookies",".5 cup honey",
"Honeybee Cookies","1 egg",
"Honeybee Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Honeybee Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Honeybee Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Honeybee Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, beat the butter, brown sugar, hone and egg on medium speed, scraping bowl constantly, until smooth."
"Step 3","Stir in the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon. Mix until just combined."
"Step 4","Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased or parchment lined baking sheet. Bake until set and light brown around edges (surfaces of cookies will appear shiny), 7 to 9 minutes. Let stand 3 to 5 minutes before removing cookies to a wire rack to cool."
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV","1 tablespoon water",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV","2 large egg whites egg whites",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV","1 .75 cups unbleached all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies IV",".5 cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter flavored shortening, water, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg whites and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Blend in the oats and mini chocolate chips. Drop dough by half-teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 7 to 9 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges begin to brown. Remove from baking sheets to cool on wire racks. Cool at least 10 minutes before eating."
"Edible Cookie Dough",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Edible Cookie Dough",".5 cup butter",
"Edible Cookie Dough","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Edible Cookie Dough",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Edible Cookie Dough","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Edible Cookie Dough","2 tablespoons milk",
"Edible Cookie Dough",".5 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Edible Cookie Dough",".5 cup mini chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Combine brown sugar and butter in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy. Beat in vanilla extract and salt. Add flour; mix until a crumbly dough forms. Mix in milk. Fold in milk chocolate chips and mini chocolate chips."
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies",".5 teaspoon lemon extract",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies","3 .5 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons baking powder",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies","1 cup buttermilk",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies",".33 cup white sugar",
"Starr's Soft Sugar Cookies",".5 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat together white and brown sugars, butter and shortening until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs, vanilla and lemon extract to mix well."
"Step 3","Sift together nutmeg, flour, baking powder, cream of tartar, salt and soda. Add alternately with buttermilk to creamed mixture."
"Step 4","Drop tablespoonfuls of dough 2 1/2 inches apart onto greased baking sheet. With the back of the spoon, spread round and round making the outer edge of the cookies a little thicker than the center. Sprinkle generously with the reserved white sugar and place a fat raisin in the center of each cookie."
"Step 5","Bake about 10 minutes. For softer cookies, bake in hot oven (425 degrees F (220 degrees C)) for about 8 minutes or until no indentation remains when you touch the center of the cookie with your fingertip. Remove cookies and cool on racks."
"Country Oatmeal Cookie in a Jar",".75 cup white sugar",
"Country Oatmeal Cookie in a Jar",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Country Oatmeal Cookie in a Jar","1 cup rolled oats",
"Country Oatmeal Cookie in a Jar","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Country Oatmeal Cookie in a Jar","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Country Oatmeal Cookie in a Jar",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Country Oatmeal Cookie in a Jar","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Country Oatmeal Cookie in a Jar","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Using a 1 quart or 1 liter jar, layer in the ingredients in the order given. Pack down the jar after each addition. Put the lid on, and cover with an 8 inch circle of fabric. Secure the fabric over the lid using a rubber band, then cover the rubber band by tying a nice piece of ribbon or raffia around the lid. Attach a tag to the ribbon with the following instructions:"
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). In a medium bowl, cream together 3/4 cup of softened butter, with 2 eggs and 1 teaspoon of vanilla. Add the entire contents of the jar, and mix by hand until combined. Drop dough by heaping spoonfuls onto an unprepared cookie sheet. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven."
"Acorn Candy Cookies","1 tablespoon prepared chocolate frosting",
"Acorn Candy Cookies","24 piece (blank)s milk chocolate candy kisses (such as Hershey's Kisses®), unwrapped",
"Acorn Candy Cookies","24 wafers mini vanilla wafer cookies (such as Nilla®)",
"Acorn Candy Cookies","24 eaches butterscotch chips",
"Step 1","Smear a small amount of frosting onto the flat bottom of a candy kiss. Press onto the flat bottom of the vanilla wafer. Smear a little more frosting onto the flat bottom of a butterscotch chip, and press onto the rounded top of the cookie. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Set aside to dry, about 30 minutes."
"Really Basic Peanut Butter Cookies","1 egg",
"Really Basic Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Really Basic Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Combine egg, sugar and peanut butter, mixing well. Roll dough into small balls and place on a cookie sheet. Flatten balls with a fork."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes. Let cookies cool on cookie racks. Variation: add chocolate or peanut butter flavored chips to the dough for an extra little twist."
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies","1 cup whole wheat flour",
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies","1 .25 cups packed brown sugar",
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies",".75 cup whole bran cereal",
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies","2 .5 cups raisins",
"Raisin Peanut Butter Bran Cookies","2 cups rolled oats",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line cookie sheets with aluminum foil or baking parchment."
"Step 2","In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add peanut butter and sugar and stir until melted. Remove from heat."
"Step 3","Transfer to large mixing bowl and stir in bran cereal. Stir in eggs and vanilla and mix well. Fold in raisins and oatmeal and stir until well blended."
"Step 4","Sift together flour and baking soda and add to mixture. Mix thoroughly."
"Step 5","Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto cookie sheets. Dip a fork into water and press to flatten dough to 1/2 inch thickness."
"Step 6","Bake for 15 minutes, or until cookies are lightly colored. Reverse sheet once during baking time. Let stand on wire racks to cool."
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup crunchy peanut butter",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup brown sugar",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 cup milk",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon cream",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 .75 cups all-purpose flour",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 .5 cups rolled oats",
"New Brunswick Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup milk chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, peanut butter, white sugar and brown sugar. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the milk, cream and vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon, stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, mix in the rolled oats and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Grandma's Coconut Corn Flake Cookies","4 large egg whites egg whites",
"Grandma's Coconut Corn Flake Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandma's Coconut Corn Flake Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Grandma's Coconut Corn Flake Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Grandma's Coconut Corn Flake Cookies","3 cups corn flake cereal",
"Grandma's Coconut Corn Flake Cookies","1 cup sweetened flaked coconut",
"Grandma's Coconut Corn Flake Cookies",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper sprayed with cooking spray."
"Step 2","Beat the egg whites in a bowl with an electric mixer until they form stiff peaks. Gradually beat in the sugar, adding about 2 tablespoons at a time. Beat in the salt and vanilla extract until the mixture is glossy and holds its shape. Gently and lightly use a rubber spatula to fold the corn flakes, coconut, and walnuts into the meringue. Gently run the spatula through the center of the bowl, then around the sides of the bowl, repeating until fully incorporated. Drop the mixture by rounded tablespoons onto the prepared baking sheets."
"Step 3","Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are very lightly browned and set, 20 to 30 minutes. Let cool completely before removing with a metal spatula; warm cookies are very fragile."
"Easy Almond Thin Cookies","1 egg white, room temperature",
"Easy Almond Thin Cookies",".33 cup coconut sugar",
"Easy Almond Thin Cookies",".5 teaspoon almond extract",
"Easy Almond Thin Cookies",".5 cup almond flour",
"Easy Almond Thin Cookies","1 tablespoon slivered almonds, chopped",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Line 8x8-inch baking dish with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Whisk egg white, coconut sugar, and almond extract together in a bowl. Fold almond flour into egg mixture until just combined; spread batter into baking dish. Sprinkle almonds over top of batter and press down lightly."
"Step 3","Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, about 25 minutes. Transfer cookies to a cooling rack using the parchment to lift it out of baking dish. Cool to room temperature, about 1 hour."
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","1 cup shortening",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","1 cup butter, softened",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","2 .25 cups white sugar",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","3 large eggs eggs",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","1 tablespoon vanilla extract",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","1 teaspoon almond extract",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","5 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","1 tablespoon baking powder",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","1 .5 teaspoons salt",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","1 cup slivered almonds, chopped",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","1 cup white chocolate chips",
"Soft Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries","1 (6 ounce) package cherry-flavored sweetened dried cranberries (such as cherry-flavor Craisins®)",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat sugar, shortening, and butter together in a large bowl with an electric mixture until smooth. Beat eggs, vanilla extract, and almond extract into butter mixture."
"Step 3","Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl. Gradually add flour mixture to butter mixture until dough just comes together. Stir almonds, white chocolate chips, and dried cranberries into the dough."
"Step 4","Drop rounded tablespoons of dough about 2 inches apart on baking sheets. Bake cookies until bottom edges are light golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool cookies for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","2 cups whole almonds",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","boiling water to cover",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)",".67 cup chopped dried apricots",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","8 dates Medjool dates, pitted and chopped",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","4 .5 cups unbleached all-purpose flour",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","1 tablespoon ground cinnamon",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","2 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","1 .5 teaspoons baking powder",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)",".5 teaspoon ground cardamom",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","2 large eggs eggs",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","1 cup brown sugar",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","1 cup honey",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)",".25 cup blackstrap molasses",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","1 tablespoon water",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","2 teaspoons almond extract",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","2 teaspoons grated orange zest",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","1 teaspoon grated lemon zest",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)",".75 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","2 tablespoons whole milk",
"Holiday Lebkuchen (German Spice Cookies)","1 teaspoon lemon zest",
"Step 1","Cover almonds with boiling water in a bowl. Let stand for 1 to 2 minutes and drain. Rinse with cold water and drain again. Pat almonds dry and remove skin. Allow almonds to dry on paper towels."
"Step 2","Place half the almonds in a food processor; pulse until finely chopped. Add apricots and dates; pulse until fruit is chopped. Reserve remaining 1 cup almonds."
"Step 3","Combine flour, cinnamon, ginger, baking powder, cloves, cardamom, and salt in bowl. Beat eggs, brown sugar, honey, molasses, water, almond extract, orange zest, and 1 teaspoon lemon zest in a large bowl with an electric mixer until smooth. Add apricot mixture, blending until evenly distributed. Gradually stir in flour mixture on medium speed until dough comes together. Cover dough with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 8 hours to overnight."
"Step 4","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 5","Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface and roll out to about 1/2-inch thick. Cut out cookies with a 2 1/2 to 3-inch diameter cookie cutter. Arrange cookies about 1 inch apart on ungreased baking sheets."
"Step 6","Lightly press 3 almonds into each cookie with tips towards the center to create a star pattern."
"Step 7","Bake in preheated oven until cookies begin to brown, about 12 minutes. Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool on a wire rack."
"Step 8","Meanwhile, whisk confectioners' sugar, milk, and 1 teaspoon lemon zest in a bowl until glaze is smooth. Brush warm cookies with glaze and allow cookies to cool completely."
"Old English Cookies","2 cups packed brown sugar",
"Old English Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Old English Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Old English Cookies","3 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Old English Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Old English Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Old English Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Old English Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Old English Cookies","1 cup brewed coffee",
"Old English Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Old English Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Old English Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C ). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the sugar and shortening. Add the egg and mix well. Sift together the flour, cloves, cinnamon, baking soda, and baking powder; add to the creamed mixture. Stir in the coffee until well blended, then stir in the raisins, nuts, and chocolate chips."
"Step 3","Drop cookies by tablespoonful onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 15 minutes; cool on a wire rack."
"Caramel Bars","32 piece (blank)s individually wrapped caramels, unwrapped",
"Caramel Bars","5 tablespoons heavy cream",
"Caramel Bars","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Caramel Bars","1 cup rolled oats",
"Caramel Bars",".75 cup brown sugar",
"Caramel Bars",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Caramel Bars",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Caramel Bars",".75 cup butter, melted",
"Caramel Bars",".5 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Caramel Bars",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). In a medium saucepan over low heat, melt together the caramels and heavy cream, stirring occasionally until smooth."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, stir together the flour, oats, brown sugar, baking soda and salt. Stir in the melted butter until well blended. Press Half of the mixture into the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking pan. Reserve the rest."
"Step 3","Bake the crust for 8 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove and sprinkle with chocolate chips and walnuts. Pour the caramel mixture over the top and then crumble the remaining crust mixture over everything."
"Step 4","Return to the oven and bake for an additional 12 minutes, or until the top is lightly toasted. Cut into squares while it is still warm."
"Cranberry Bars","1 (12 ounce) package whole cranberries",
"Cranberry Bars","1 cup white sugar",
"Cranberry Bars",".75 cup water",
"Cranberry Bars","1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix",
"Cranberry Bars",".75 cup butter, melted",
"Cranberry Bars","2 large eggs eggs",
"Cranberry Bars","1 cup rolled oats",
"Cranberry Bars",".75 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Cranberry Bars","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Cranberry Bars","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the cranberries, white sugar, and water. Cook, stirring occasionally until all of the cranberries have popped, and the mixture is thick, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat, and set aside to cool."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 3","In a large bowl, mix together the cake mix, melted butter, and eggs. Stir in the oats, brown sugar, ginger and cinnamon. Set aside about 1 1/2 cups of the mixture, and spread the rest into the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pack down to form a solid crust, getting it as even as possible. Spread the cooled cranberry mixture over the crust. Pinch off pieces of the remaining mixture and place evenly over the cranberry layer."
"Step 4","Bake for 35 to 40 minutes in the preheated oven, until the top is lightly browned. Cool in the pan for about 40 minutes before slicing into bars."
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies","1 cup sour cream",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Sour Cream Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, beat the butter or margarine, 1 1/2 cups sugar, eggs, and vanilla until fluffy."
"Step 2","Sift flour with baking powder, baking soda and salt. At low speed, beat sour cream into the egg mixture, gradually beat in the flour until well mixed. Add raisins and mix by hand. Refrigerate dough for 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease baking sheets."
"Step 4","Mix the 1/2 cup white sugar with the ground cinnamon."
"Step 5","Drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle cookies with the cinnamon sugar mixture. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove to wire racks to cool."
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies",".5 teaspoon baking powder",
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies","1 cup cornflakes cereal",
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies","2 tablespoons flaked coconut",
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies",".75 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Munchy Crunchy Cookies","1 cup rolled oats",
"Step 1","In a 1 liter jar, mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Pack down, and add the remaining ingredients in the following order: sugar, brown sugar, cornflake cereal, coconut, chocolate chips, oatmeal. Pack down after each ingredient."
"Step 2","Decorate jar, and attach a label with the following: Munchy Crunchy Cookies 1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 2. In a large bowl, stir together 1/2 cup melted butter, 1 egg, and 1/4 teaspoon of vanilla. Add entire contents of the jar, and mix well. Roll dough into 2 inch balls, and place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. 3. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in preheated oven. Cool on wire racks."
"Easter M&M® Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Easter M&M® Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Easter M&M® Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Easter M&M® Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Easter M&M® Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Easter M&M® Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Easter M&M® Cookies",".75 teaspoon salt",
"Easter M&M® Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Easter M&M® Cookies","2 cups Easter-colored candy-coated chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)",
"Step 1","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Beat butter and sugars together in a large bowl on medium speed until fluffy, about 5 minutes. Beat in eggs and vanilla extract. Add flour, salt, and baking soda and mix on low speed. Stir in milk chocolate candies."
"Step 3","Refrigerate dough for 1 hour for best results."
"Step 4","Scoop tablespoons of dough onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten slightly with your palm."
"Step 5","Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are flattened and light brown, 8 to 14 minutes. Cool on the cookie sheet for a few minutes, then remove and place on a cooling rack.Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III",".75 cup all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III",".5 teaspoon baking soda",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III",".5 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III",".5 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III","1 egg",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III","1 cup quick cooking oats",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III","3 tablespoons butter, softened",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III","1 cup confectioners' sugar",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III",".5 cup smooth peanut butter",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies III","2 .5 tablespoons heavy whipping cream",
"Step 1","In a large bowl, cream together 1/2 cup butter or margarine, 1/2 cup peanut butter, white sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla. Add egg and beat well."
"Step 2","In another bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Add these dry ingredients to the creamed mixture. Stir. Add oatmeal and stir."
"Step 3","Drop by teaspoons onto greased baking sheet, and press each mound down with a fork to form 1/4 inch thick cookies. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes, or until cookies are a light brown."
"Step 4","To Make Filling: Cream 3 tablespoons butter or margarine with the confectioners' sugar, 1/2 cup smooth peanut butter, and the cream. Spread filling onto half of the cooled cookies, then top with the other half to form sandwiches."
"Chocolate Mint Candies Cookies",".75 cup butter",
"Chocolate Mint Candies Cookies","1 .5 cups brown sugar",
"Chocolate Mint Candies Cookies","2 tablespoons water",
"Chocolate Mint Candies Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Mint Candies Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Mint Candies Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Mint Candies Cookies","1 .25 teaspoons baking soda",
"Chocolate Mint Candies Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Mint Candies Cookies","3 (4.5 ounce) packages chocolate covered thin mints",
"Step 1","In a saucepan over medium heat, cook the sugar, butter and water, stirring occasionally until melted. Remove from heat, stir in the chocolate chips until melted and set aside to cool for 10 minutes."
"Step 2","Pour the chocolate mixture into a large bowl, and beat in the eggs, one at a time. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt, stir into the chocolate mixture. Cover and refrigerate dough for at least 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Roll cookie dough into walnut sized balls and place 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, be careful not to overbake. When cookies come out of the oven, Press one mint wafer into the top of each cookie and let sit for 1 minute. When the mint is softened, swirl with the back of a spoon or toothpick to make a pattern with the green filling of the mint wafer. For smaller cookies, break mints in half."
"Chocolate Mint Cookies I",".75 cup butter",
"Chocolate Mint Cookies I","1 .5 cups packed brown sugar",
"Chocolate Mint Cookies I","2 tablespoons water",
"Chocolate Mint Cookies I","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Mint Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Mint Cookies I","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Mint Cookies I","1 .25 teaspoons baking soda",
"Chocolate Mint Cookies I",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Mint Cookies I","36 piece (blank)s chocolate mint wafer candies",
"Step 1","In a large pan over low heat, cook butter, sugar and water until butter is melted. Add chocolate chips and stir until partially melted. Remove from heat and continue to stir until chocolate is completely melted. Pour into a large bowl and let stand 10 minutes to cool off slightly."
"Step 2","At high speed, beat in eggs, one at a time into chocolate mixture. Reduce speed to low and add dry ingredients, beating until blended. Chill dough about 1 hour."
"Step 3","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 4","Roll dough into balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet about 2 inches apart. Bake 8-10 minutes. While cookies are baking unwrap mints and divide each in half. When cookies are brought out of the oven, put 1/2 mint on top of each cookie. Let the mint sit for up to 5 minutes until melted, then spread the mint on top of the cookie. Eat and enjoy!"
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies","2 teaspoons ground ginger",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies",".75 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies",".75 cup margarine, softened",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies","1 egg",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies","1 tablespoon water",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies",".25 cup molasses",
"Big Soft Ginger Cookies","2 tablespoons white sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Sift together the flour, ginger, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, and salt. Set aside."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the margarine and 1 cup sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the egg, then stir in the water and molasses. Gradually stir the sifted ingredients into the molasses mixture. Shape dough into walnut sized balls, and roll them in the remaining 2 tablespoons of sugar. Place the cookies 2 inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet, and flatten slightly."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. Store in an airtight container."
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 cup butter flavored shortening",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 cup packed light brown sugar",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","3 cups rolled oats",
"Beth's Spicy Oatmeal Raisin Cookies","1 cup raisins",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together the butter, butter flavored shortening, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, and vanilla until smooth. Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, and salt; stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the oats and raisins. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake 10 to 12 minutes until light and golden. Do not overbake. Let them cool for 2 minutes before removing from cookie sheets to cool completely. Store in airtight container. Make sure you get some, because they don't last long!"
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup shortening",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies",".5 cup margarine, softened",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies",".75 cup white sugar",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup quick-cooking oats",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a large bowl, cream together shortening, margarine, brown sugar, white sugar, and peanut butter until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time until well blended. Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the oats until just combined. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until just light brown. Don't over-bake. Cool and store in an airtight container."
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Soft Oatmeal Cookies","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Step 1","In a medium bowl, cream together butter, white sugar, and brown sugar. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla. Combine flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in oats. Cover, and chill dough for at least one hour."
"Step 2","Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Roll the dough into walnut sized balls, and place 2 inches apart on cookie sheets. Flatten each cookie with a large fork dipped in sugar."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 cup butter, softened",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".67 cup cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies I",".5 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In large bowl, beat butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla until light and fluffy. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt; stir into the butter mixture until well blended. Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or just until set. Cool slightly on the cookie sheets before transferring to wire racks to cool completely."
"Cracked Sugar Cookies I","1 .25 cups white sugar",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies I","1 cup butter",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies I","3 large egg yolks egg yolks",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies I","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies I","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Cracked Sugar Cookies I",".5 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Lightly grease 2 cookie sheets."
"Step 2","Cream together sugar and butter. Beat in egg yolks and vanilla."
"Step 3","Add flour, baking soda, and cream of tartar. Stir."
"Step 4","Form dough into walnut size balls and place 2 inches apart on cookie sheet. Don't flatten. Bake 10 to 11 minutes, until tops are cracked and just turning color."
"Molasses Sugar Cookies","1 .5 cups shortening",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies","2 cups white sugar",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies",".5 cup molasses",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies","4 cups all-purpose flour",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies","4 teaspoons baking soda",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon ground ginger",
"Molasses Sugar Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Step 1","Melt the shortening in a large pan on the stove, and cool."
"Step 2","Add sugar, eggs, and molasses, beat well."
"Step 3","In a separate bowl, sift dry ingredients together and add to the pan. Mix well and chill 3 hours or overnight."
"Step 4","Form into walnut-size balls. Roll in granulated sugar. Place on greased cookie sheet about 2 inches apart."
"Step 5","Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 8-10 minutes."
"Step 6","Store in an airtight container to keep from getting overly crisp. If they do lose their softness, an easy way to restore it is to place one slice of fresh bread in the container with the cookies for a couple of hours or overnight and they will be soft again!"
"No Bake Cookies V","2 cups white sugar",
"No Bake Cookies V",".25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"No Bake Cookies V",".5 cup milk",
"No Bake Cookies V",".5 cup margarine",
"No Bake Cookies V","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"No Bake Cookies V","1 pinch salt",
"No Bake Cookies V",".5 cup chunky peanut butter",
"No Bake Cookies V","3 cups quick cooking oats",
"Step 1","In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the sugar, cocoa, milk and margarine. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Boil for 1 minute, then remove from heat and stir in the vanilla, salt, peanut butter and oats."
"Step 2","Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Allow cookies to cool for at least 1 hour. Store in an airtight container."
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies","4 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies","6 tablespoons butter",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies","3 large eggs eggs",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies",".5 cup all-purpose flour",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies","2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies",".25 teaspoon baking powder",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Chocolate Truffle Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","In the microwave or in a metal bowl over a pan of simmering water, melt unsweetened chocolate, 1 cup of the chocolate chips, and the butter stirring occasionally until smooth. Remove from heat and set aside to cool. In a large bowl, whip eggs and sugar until thick and pale, about 2 minutes. Stir in the vanilla and the chocolate mixture until well mixed. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt; gradually stir into the chocolate mixture. Fold in remaining 1 cup chocolate chips. Cover dough and chill for at least an hour or overnight."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Roll chilled dough into 1 inch balls. Place on ungreased cookie sheets so they are 2 inches apart."
"Step 3","Bake for 9 to 11 minutes in the preheated oven. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup butter, softened",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie",".75 cup white sugar",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie",".75 cup packed brown sugar",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 large eggs eggs",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon salt",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Giant Chocolate Chip Cookie","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","In large bowl, beat butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well."
"Step 2","Gradually add flour, salt, and baking soda, beating until well blended. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts."
"Step 3","Spread in greased 14 inch round pizza pan. Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 20-25 minutes. Cool cookie in pan on a cooling rack. Decorate as desired."
"Lactation Cookies","2 tablespoons flax seed meal",
"Lactation Cookies",".25 cup water",
"Lactation Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Lactation Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Lactation Cookies",".5 cup brown sugar",
"Lactation Cookies","3 eaches egg yolks",
"Lactation Cookies","1 .5 teaspoons pure vanilla extract",
"Lactation Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Lactation Cookies",".25 cup brewers' yeast",
"Lactation Cookies","1 tablespoon wheat germ",
"Lactation Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Lactation Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Lactation Cookies",".5 teaspoon cream of tartar",
"Lactation Cookies","2 .5 cups old-fashioned oats",
"Lactation Cookies","1 cup chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Mix flaxseed with water in small bowl and let soak for 5 minutes."
"Step 3","Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar together in a large mixing bowl until creamy. Add egg yolks and vanilla extract; beat to incorporate. Stir flax seed mixture into the butter mixture."
"Step 4","Mix flour, brewer's yeast, wheat germ, baking soda, salt, and cream of tartar in a separate bowl; add to butter mixture and stir until just combined. Fold oats and chocolate chips into the dough."
"Step 5","Roll dough into walnut-sized balls and place 2 inches apart onto a baking sheet."
"Step 6","Bake in the preheated oven until the edges are golden, 10 to 12 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely."
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies","2 cups sifted all-purpose flour",
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies","1 tablespoon ground ginger",
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies","2 teaspoons baking soda",
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies","1 teaspoon ground cinnamon",
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies",".75 cup shortening",
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies","1 egg",
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies",".25 cup dark molasses",
"Grandma's Gingersnap Cookies",".33 cup cinnamon sugar",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Sift the flour, ginger, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt into a mixing bowl. Stir the mixture to blend evenly, and sift a second time into another bowl."
"Step 3","Place the shortening into a mixing bowl and beat until creamy. Gradually beat in the white sugar. Beat in the egg, and dark molasses. Sift 1/3 of the flour mixture into the shortening mixture; stir to thoroughly blend. Sift in the remaining flour mixture, and mix together until a soft dough forms. Pinch off small amounts of dough and roll into 1 inch diameter balls between your hands. Roll each ball in cinnamon sugar, and place 2 inches apart on an ungreased baking sheet."
"Step 4","Bake in preheated oven until the tops are rounded and slightly cracked, about 10 minutes. Cool cookies on a wire rack. Store in an air tight container."
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 teaspoons hot water",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","2 cups semisweet chocolate chips",
"Best Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","Cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Dissolve baking soda in hot water. Add to batter along with salt. Stir in flour, chocolate chips, and nuts. Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased pans."
"Step 3","Bake for about 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are nicely browned."
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","2 .5 cups all-purpose flour",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","2 teaspoons ground cinnamon",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground nutmeg",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies",".5 teaspoon ground cloves",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies",".5 cup butter, softened",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","1 cup canned pumpkin puree",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","1 egg",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","2 cups confectioners' sugar",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","3 tablespoons milk",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","1 tablespoon melted butter",
"Iced Pumpkin Cookies","1 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, ground cloves, and salt; set aside."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the 1/2 cup of butter and white sugar. Add pumpkin, egg, and 1 teaspoon vanilla to butter mixture, and beat until creamy. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop on cookie sheet by tablespoonfuls; flatten slightly."
"Step 3","Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven. Cool cookies, then drizzle glaze with fork."
"Step 4","To Make Glaze: Combine confectioners' sugar, milk, 1 tablespoon melted butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Add milk as needed, to achieve drizzling consistency."
"Peanut Butter Chip Chocolate Cookies","1 cup butter",
"Peanut Butter Chip Chocolate Cookies","1 .5 cups white sugar",
"Peanut Butter Chip Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Peanut Butter Chip Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Peanut Butter Chip Chocolate Cookies","2 cups all-purpose flour",
"Peanut Butter Chip Chocolate Cookies",".67 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Peanut Butter Chip Chocolate Cookies",".75 teaspoon baking soda",
"Peanut Butter Chip Chocolate Cookies",".5 teaspoon salt",
"Peanut Butter Chip Chocolate Cookies","2 cups peanut butter chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt, stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the peanut butter chips. Drop cookies by heaping teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until set. Cool on wire racks."
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 cup butter, softened",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","2 .25 cups all-purpose flour",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies",".75 cup unsweetened cocoa powder",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 cup chopped walnuts",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","1 tablespoon white sugar",
"Caramel Filled Chocolate Cookies","48 piece (0.2 oz)s chocolate-covered caramel candies",
"Step 1","Beat butter until creamy. Gradually beat in white sugar and brown sugar. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Combine flour, baking soda, and cocoa. Gradually add to butter mixture, beating well. Stir in 1/2 cup walnuts. Cover and chill at least 2 hours."
"Step 2","Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)."
"Step 3","Combine remaining 1/2 cup nuts with the 1 tablespoon sugar. Divide the dough into 4 parts. Work with one part at a time, leaving the remainder in the refrigerator until needed. Divide each part into 12 pieces. Quickly press each piece of dough around a chocolate covered caramel. Roll into a ball. Dip the tops into the sugar mixture. Place sugar side up, 2 inches apart on greased baking sheets."
"Step 4","Bake for 8 minutes in the preheated oven. Let cool for 3 to 4 minutes on the baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely."
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup butter",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup white sugar",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".33 cup packed brown sugar",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup peanut butter",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 teaspoon vanilla extract",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 egg",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup all-purpose flour",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 teaspoon baking soda",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".25 teaspoon salt",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies",".5 cup rolled oats",
"Outrageous Chocolate Chip Cookies","1 cup semisweet chocolate chips",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)."
"Step 2","In a medium bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth. Stir in the peanut butter, vanilla and egg until well blended. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; stir into the batter just until moistened. Mix in the oats and chocolate chips until evenly distributed. Drop by tablespoonfuls on to lightly greased cookie sheets."
"Step 3","Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges start to brown. Cool on cookie sheets for about 5 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","3 cups all-purpose flour",
"Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon baking powder",
"Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","1 teaspoon salt",
"Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup unsalted butter, softened",
"Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup packed brown sugar",
"Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup white sugar",
"Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","2 large eggs eggs",
"Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","2 cups peanut butter chips",
"Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","1 cup peanut butter",
"Old Fashioned Peanut Butter Cookies","2 teaspoons vanilla extract",
"Step 1","Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper."
"Step 2","Mix flour, baking powder and salt in a medium bowl."
